Matthew: Yeezuu yaabɔɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Yeezuu ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, cir *Davɩd Nyɩ m, Abraham do gʊaa m sɔ.
Abraham n Izakkɩ yɩ,
Izakkɩ n Zakɔɔb yɩ,
Zakɔɔb n Ziida kan a dannɔ kɩ yɩ,
Ziida n Farɛɛs kan Zaaraa kɩ yɩ,
ŋ da m Tamaar m,
Farɛɛs n Ɛsrɔm yɩ,
Ɛsrɔm n Aram yɩ,
Aram n Aminadaab yɩ,
Aminadaab n Naasɔɔn yɩ,
Naasɔɔn n Salmɔɔn yɩ,
Salmɔɔn n Boozɩ yɩ,
a da m Rahab m,
Boozɩ n Zobɛɛd yɩ,
a da m Rutɩ m,
Zobɛɛd n Yesee yɩ,
Yesee n cir Davɩd yɩ,
Davɩd n Salomɔɔn yɩ,
a da nyɩnta Iirii lʊ,
Salomɔɔn n Roboam yɩ,
Roboam n Abɩya yɩ,
Abɩya n Azaa yɩ,
Azaa n Zozafat yɩ,
Zozafat n Zooram yɩ,
Zooram n Ozɩyas yɩ,
Ozɩyas n Zowatan yɩ,
Zowatan n Akaazɩ yɩ,
Akaazɩ n Ezekɩyas yɩ,
Ezekɩyas n Manase yɩ,
Manase n Amɔɔn yɩ,
Amɔɔn n Zozɩyas yɩ,
Zozɩyas n Zekonɩyas kan a dannɔ kɩ yɩ.
A n a ga kʊ ʊ kan *Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa tarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ kɩ.
Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ,
Zekonɩyas Salatɩyɛl yɩ,
Salatɩyɛl n Zorobabɛl yɩ,
Zorobabɛl n Abiyud yɩ,
Abiyud n Eliyakim yɩ,
Eliyakim n Azɔɔr yɩ,
Azɔɔr n Sadɔk yɩ,
Sadɔk n Akim yɩ,
Akim n Eliyud yɩ,
Eliyud n Eleyazaar yɩ,
Eleyazaar n Matan yɩ,
Matan n Zakɔɔb yɩ,
Zakɔɔb n Maarii zim Zozɛf yɩ,
Maarii bɩ do ɩ Yeezuu yɩ n n'a birm Krista.

Yaabɔɔ wɔɔ haay lɛ a zɛ kʊ ra bueeresi-si. A n a sa Abraham ma an ta m Davɩd ra bueeresi, an a sa Davɩd ma an ta m Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa ma bueeresi, an a sa Babɩlɔnnɩ lɔmbaa ma an ta m Krista ra bueeresi.
Yeezuu yɩrɛ bɩ zaa ba n nɩ: A da Maarii bɩ, nyɩnta a ʊ Zozɛf jaan, bɩ, an lɛɛ ka kʊ Maarii n a ba Zozɛf lʊ bɩ, *Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka Maarii n jɩsɩ sa.
A jaan Zozɛf bɩ kʊ gʊaa mɩŋŋa m bɩ, a n a ŋʊa k'a a da nyannɩ ʊ y. A n a hɔɔn da k'a wɔ saa kʊ gɔsɩ b'a dɔ y.
K'a n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Zuuba Malɛɛka bʊr zi nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zozɛf, Davɩd do gʊaa, ɩ bɩ nyi ba k'ɩ Maarii sa ɩ ba ɩ lʊ y, bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa y'a ka, an nɩ jɩsɩ bɩ m,
a nyɩ yɩm yar, k'ɩ tɔ ka Yeezuu, bala, a m n'a do bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ a mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ.»
Naa do woo… naa, ba ʊ kʊ meerbaa kʊ Woso a ba kan a lɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ.
A ba n nɩ: nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ k'a n yar dɔ bɩ jɩsɩ sim,
an nyɩ yɩ yar, n y'a tɔ karɛ Emanʊwɛl,
a jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ.
Zozɛf k'a bɩ gu hinceem ma bɩ, a hɔ kʊ Zuuba malɛɛka b'a hɩ m bɩ ba: A Maarii gaa, an a ba a lʊ,
bɩ, a n a dɔ lʊ y, an ta an aa dɔmɩm k'a nyɩyar bɩ yɩ ʊ bɩ ku, an a tɔ ka Yeezuu.
Yeezuu bɩ, yɩ a ʊ Betelehɛm ʊ Zidee kʊ ʊ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ dɔmɩm ʊ, bɩ hɔdonno a to dɔjɩr ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr Zerizalɛm ʊ,
ŋnɩ laaka da: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir k'a yɩ b'ɩ ka? Wɔɔ monyaa yɩ dɔjɩr ʊ bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n bʊr k'ʊ b'a da ʊ.»
Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a da bɔ ʊ kan Zerizalɛm zannɔ kɩ haay.
A n wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an laaka da ŋ han kʊ niŋŋə kʊ Krista bɩ n nɩ yɩŋ ʊ bɩ ma.
Brɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: Betelehɛm ʊ Zidee kʊ ʊ, bala, hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a hɩ bɩ n naa do.
B'ɩbɩɩ Betelehɛm, Zidee kʊ,
ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m poore Zidee kʊrɔ gʊtɔɔ wɔɔ barla y.
Bala, cir bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ bireyaa ʊ,
an ka Israyɛl mɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ.
A m bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ n hɔdonno wɔɔ bir sɛɛrɛ, an laaka da ŋ han dɔmɩm kʊ monyaa bɩ bɔ ʊ bɩ ma.
A n ŋ nyɔɔ Betelehɛm ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta a laaka da nyɩ bɩ mim ma mɩŋŋa, k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, k'a a wusigə a b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, kʊ m ta m aa da ʊ sɔ.»
Cir bɩ k'a naa hɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʊr, ta kʊ ŋ nawʊm bɩ, monyaa kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a yɩ dɔjɩr b'ɩ tarɛ ŋ lɛɛ, an ta an aa jɩm lɛɛ kʊ nyɩ bɩ n ta ʊ bɩ burə ʊ.
Monyaa bɩ kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʊta.
Ŋ gasʊ cɛ b'ʊ, ŋn'aa nyɩ bɩ yɩ kan a da Maarii kɩ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, ŋnɩ yaa da m, bɩ jɛ ʊ, ŋn'a mɔdrɔ wɔɔ hʊr, ŋnɩ gan wʊ ma: Sarma m kan tidəər nyisi kɩ, *mɩɩr kɩ.
Bɩ Woso a hɩ ŋ nɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ bɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ zi y. Naa minto bɩ, brɔɔ zaa vanta sa ŋnɩ doo a kʊ ʊ.

A hʊr kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka a hɩnka Zozɛf m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti ɩ nyɩ bɩ gaa kan a da bɩ kɩ, ɩ ɩ si, ɩ ta Eziptɩ ʊ, nyɩnta b'ʊ k'an ta an aa dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ m yarɛ m meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ ku, bala, Hɩrɔɔdɩ y'a kam nyɩ bɩ ma, k'a zɛ.»
Zozɛf n wuti, an nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa gunuu ʊ, an a hʊr an ta Eziptɩ ʊ.
A gɔɔta b'ʊ an ta, an Hɩrɔɔdɩ garɛ ku, kʊ Woso meerbaa k'a ba kan a lɛsinnɩsorazaa lɛ kɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ.
Mɔɔ m Nyɩ bɩ bir, k'an bɔ Eziptɩ ʊ.

Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a b'a dɔ a ʊ, hɔdonno wɔɔ a yamba a m bɩ, a wuti nɔmaa gandaara m. A n gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ Betelehɛm ʊ kan kʊrɔ vantɔɔ k'a a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'aa nyɩnɔ poorero yaarɔ kʊ ŋ dɔɔraa hɩɩya gɛɛ ŋ n a ku rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ. Amba hɔdonno wɔɔ a hɩ m, nyɩnta k'a ʊ, an laaka da k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm dɔ bɩ ma.
Naa ma bɩ, hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii a hɩ bɩ kʊ yɩ, a ʊ:
N zeedarɛ ma Ramaa ʊ,
nyikəre kan heerzarlɛ gʊta kɩ:
Rasɛl nɩ nyi karɛ a nyɩnɔ minto,
a lɛ baa kʊ n n'a wɔ zɩnzɛ a nɩ y, nyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga bɩ tɔ ma.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ garɛ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka a hɩnka Zozɛf m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ Eziptɩ ʊ.
A n meer ba kan kɩ, a ʊ: «Wuti, ɩ nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa ɩ ɩ wusigə, ɩ ta Israyɛl tara ra. Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyɩ bɩ meeyaa bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gɩnga.»
Zozɛf n wuti, an nyɩ bɩ kan a da bɩ kɩ gaa, an ta Israyɛl ʊ.
Bɩ, Zozɛf k'a a ma, n ʊ, Arkelayus nɩ cirbəə m Zidee ʊ a zɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ, nyibəə a nyasʊ k'an ta b'ʊ bɩ kɩ, bɩ Woso meer ba kan kɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ, an ta Galilee kʊ ʊ.
A n aa nyɩnta kʊ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma Nazarɛtɩ ʊ b'ʊ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ, ŋ ʊ:
N y'a birm Nazarɛtɩ gʊaa.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ bɩ, Zaan-Batiisi bʊr Zidee poo nɔ ʊ, an nɩ Woso lemim pa dam.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a sugur yɛ, bala, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.»
A mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ ma, a ʊ:
Gʊaa leer nɩ bɔm poo nɔ ʊ:
k'a Zuuba zaa banka,
k'a zaa fɔɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩmbanka
kʊ ŋ nɩ yɩ tɩrga.
Zaan bɩ, yoonde ka huu a a du a ma, an kʊmbar sa an a so a ʊ, bɩsɩnɔ kan zɔɔn kɩ n a hɔbɩrɛ.
A m naa, Zerizalɛm, Zidee kʊ bɩ haay, kɔ k'a tɔ m Zʊrdɛn kʊrɔ wɔɔ haay nɩ tam zi,
ŋ n'a mimbʊnyaarɔ hɩrɛ, Zaan nɩ batɛm karɛ ŋ ʊ Zʊrdɛn kɔ ʊ.
K'a farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zɛm gʊta batɛm sire bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɩnnɔ kʊsɩrɔ do, nka y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʊ, a a si Woso nɔmaa gʊta k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ lɛɛ?
K'a zibəə k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, awɔɔ heerlʊrlɛ yɩ bɩ ba.
B'a b'a hɔɔn da a ʊ, awɔɔ zɩ m Abraham nɩ y. Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Woso a da ma an jaarɔ nɔɔn duro wusigə an ŋ ba Abraham nyɩnɔ.
Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, n sɩga banka k'an gɔrɔ zɩnzɛ ra ŋ məsi ma, gɔ niŋŋə k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa darɛ y, n y'a zɛm la, n n a da sɛ ʊ.»
«Mɔɔ ɩ batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʊ hi ʊ a heer k'awɔɔ lʊr bɩ minto. Bɩ, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʊ bɩ paŋŋa lɛ da mɔɔ ra, mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʊsɔrɔ waa a gannɔ ʊ y, a batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan sɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
A y'a gʊr m a wɔ ʊ, a y'a tʊyaa waarɛ an a hɔyaa gʊr an a zar sɩ ʊ, bɩ, a sɛ k'a bɩr lihim bɩ nyam puur b'ʊ.»
A m bɩ, Yeezuu n a to Galilee ʊ, an bʊr Zʊrdɛn ʊ Zaan zi, k'a bɩ batɛm si.
Bɩ, Zaan a gu an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m, ɩ batɛm ka mɔɔ ʊ, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ya, ɩ nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi!»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «A to k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʊ naa ma, bala, naa n'a karɛ, wɔɔ n hɔ haay k'an tɩrga Woso ma bɩ ba.» Zaan n yɛ kɛɛrɛ.
Yeezuu k'a batɛm bɩ si bɩ, a bɔ hi b'ʊ. A m bɩ, brama n a gʊ, an Woso Ɛspri yɩ an nɩ zerle, am cirpʊʊrɛ hɔ bɩ m an bɩ zer la.
Leer n a to mim ʊ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Ba mɔɔ Nyɩ m na. Mɔɔ ŋʊa gʊta. A mɔɔ nɔ yɩ paan….»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ta Yeezuu m poo nɔ ʊ, kʊ Sʊtaana n a gɩnga ma.
K'a a lɛ kʊsɩ dɔmɩm busi sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ bɩ, nɔ b'a nyasʊ.
Sʊtaana n a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ka kʊ jaarɔ nɔɔn duro n a ba hɔbɩrɛ.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «N y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ gʊaa n'a bɩm bala k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba y,
bɩ lemim haay k'a nɩ bɔm Woso lɛ ʊ bɩ m.»
Sʊtaana n a gaa an ta m Zerizalɛm ʊ, an a der Wosocɛ bɩ mim ʊ.
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ hɩr ɩ ɩ da tara ʊ, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ:
A lɛrɔ karɛ a malɛɛkarɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'ɩbɩɩ busu a wɔrɔ ʊ k'ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ gəm zɛ y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «N y'a gʊrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʊ:
Ɩ bɩ da Zuuba ɩ Woso lɛ ʊ y.»
Sʊtaana n a ya, an ta m ci gʊta mim ʊ, an durnya cirbəəro kʊrɔ hɩnka m kan ŋ paŋŋa kɩ,
an a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ kukurə zɛ mɔɔ taa, ɩ mɔɔ da ʊ, mɔɔ naa haay karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ.»
Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʊ, Sʊtaana! Bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ:
Zuuba Woso y'a deem ɩbɩɩ nɩ yaa dam nɩ, ɩ da ʊ.»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Sʊtaana n a bɔ a jɛ ʊ, lɛɛm bɩ malɛɛkarɔ n bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a a ma, n ʊ, n Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ bɩ, a a hʊr, an ta Galilee ʊ.
A n gɔɔta Nazarɛtɩ ʊ y. A hʊr a ʊ, an aa nyɩnta Kapɛrnawum ʊ. Kʊ m bɩ, an nɩ Galilee higʊta lɛ ra Zabɩlɔn kan Nɛftalii kɩ kʊrɔ wɔɔ barla.
Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro n kʊ yɩ.
Zabɩlɔn tara, Nɛftalii tara, higʊta zaa, kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zʊrdɛn kɔ gəm la
kan doro vantɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Galilee ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Do k'a nɩ monsigə ʊ bɩ lɛɛgure gandaara yɩ,
gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛ kʊ ʊ kan zɛ hinni kɩ rɔ wɔɔ,
lɛɛgure bʊr brɔɔ minto.
A n a sa naa ma bɩ, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ Woso lemim pa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a bɔ a taam k'a sugur yɛ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.»
Yeezuu k'a nɩ Galilee higʊta lɛ ra an nɩ tam bɩ, a gʊɔɔ yɩ hɩɩya: Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n n'a birm Pɩyɛɛr kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa zom higʊta b'ʊ, bala, zɔbənno m.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a bʊr a zu mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bam gʊɔɔ kama zannɔ.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ y'a zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ to, ŋn'ɩ zum Yeezuu ʊ.
K'a ta lɛɛ bɩ, a Zakkɩ yɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ m ŋn'ɩ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ kan a zɩ Zebedee bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a zaŋŋarɔ bankam. A n ŋ bir.
Ŋ n a bɔ a zɩ b'ʊ kan kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ kɩ lɛɛm, ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʊ.

Yeezuu gasʊ Galilee kʊ b'ʊ haay, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam, an nɩ yaaba do haay waam kan kʊsɩ do haay kɩ zamaa bɩ bire ʊ.

A tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ, an ta kan Siirii kʊ kɩ haay, a m naa, n nɩ zɛm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cicir bam yaaba do haay kan kʊsɩ do haay nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m: Gʊɔɔ kʊ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ, parparlɔzannɔ, mɛgarɛzannɔ kɩ an ŋ waa.
Zamaa cir gʊta nɩ zure a jɛ ʊ, a to ŋ y'a ʊ Galilee ʊ, Taraburo ʊ, Zerizalɛm kan Zidee kɩ, kan Zʊrdɛn kɔ gəm la kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a zamaa bɩ yɩ bɩ, a der ci burə ʊ, an nyɩnta. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma.
A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
«Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ m:
Ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ bʊgʊ-bʊgʊdɔɔ wɔɔ m:
Ŋ y'a hɔjirle yɩm durnya ʊ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m nyikərezannɔ m:
Woso bra barɛ ŋ nɩ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ kʊ tɩrgabaa nɔ nɩ ŋ zɛm kan mɩsɩ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m:
Hɔ yɩ ŋ kam.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m cicirzɛrɛzannɔ m:
Woso yɩ ŋ cicir zɛrɛ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m heerhuzannɔ m:
Ŋ Woso yɩrɛ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a kam kʊmarɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ m:
Woso yɩ ŋ birle a nyɩnɔ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cicir bam tɩrgabaa tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ m:
Ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, kʊ n y'awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ, n nɩ cicir karɛ awɔɔ ma, n nɩ ŋʊaar do haay karɛ awɔɔ ra mɔɔ minto,
k'a heer nyɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʊta m, bala, awɔɔ ganwʊrɛ gʊta yɩm arzana ʊ. A ba n y'a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ m.»
«Durnya yɛ n'awɔɔ m. Bɩ, kʊ yɛ nyɩntabaa bɔ, n y'a bam lɔ, k'a a ya, a nyɩntabaa ka ʊ? A zibəə ba ʊ dɔ y, a lo n nawʊm garga ra, gʊɔɔ nɩ tʊntɔm la.»
«Durnya lɛɛgure n'awɔɔ m, kʊ k'a nɩ zigi burə ʊ bɩ b'a dam ma, an a nyaakʊm da y.
Kʊ gʊaa sɛ nya fɩtɩrɛ ʊ a bɩr a cɩntam kasɩ taa y, a cɩnta a tɩr a ʊ hɔ burə ʊ an cɛ bɩ gu gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ daahan minto.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ lɛɛgure n yɔ ncɩnaaʊ gʊɔɔ mɩm ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔ awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ b'ʊ, awɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ minto.»
«A b'a hɔɔn da a ʊ, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m bɩ Moyiisi lɛ, gɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ rɔ wɔɔ zar y. Mɔɔ n bʊr kʊ m bɩ ŋ zar y, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊ yɩ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, an lɛɛ ka kʊ tara kan brama kɩ n cem bɩ, Woso lɛ bɩ nyɩ deem bɩ bɩ cenle y, a jɩ deem bɩ cenim sɔ y, kʊ nawɔnnɔ haay n bɔkarɛ an kʊ yɩ.

Naa minto bɩ, kʊ gʊaa bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ bɩ poore deem taan… ma an a dɩnda gʊɔɔ m kʊ ŋ n'a ba maam sɔ, a zaa bɩ do bir n nawʊm gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay poore Woso cirbəə b'ʊ. Bɩ gʊaa k'a zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an a dɩnda gʊɔɔ m ŋn'a ba maam sɔ bɩ, bɩ zaa nyɩntam gʊta Woso cirbəə b'ʊ.
Kʊ m sɩra hɩ awɔɔ m. K'awɔɔ tɩrgabaa n cem wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ tɩrgabaa kɩ han, awɔɔ bɩ gasʊm Woso cirbəə ʊ y.»
«Awɔɔ ma n n a hɩ wɔɔ yaabɔɔ m, n ʊ: ‹Ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y›, kʊ gʊaa a mim meeyaa bɔ ʊ, a a ga m, kʊ n n ta m dʊdɔkənno taa.

Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʊ gʊaa nɔmaa ba kan a mim kɩ, a a ga m, kʊ n n ta a zaa m dʊdɔkənno taa. Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a mim m, a ʊ: ‹Hɔɔnwarzaa›, a a ga m, kʊ n n ta a zaa m dʊdɔkənno jɩtannɔ taa. Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a mim m, a ʊ: ‹hɔɔzaa›, a ga a ʊ m k'an ta sɛhar ʊ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ta Wosocɛ ʊ k'ɩ yaa ganwʊrɛ ka Woso ʊ, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, ɩ ɩ zar ɩ mim ma,
k'ɩ ganwʊrɛ bɩ to Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ɩ ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ zɛ kʊ ra kan ɩ mim bɩ kɩ, k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ ɩ wusigə ɩ bʊr, ɩ b'ɩ ganwʊrɛ bɩ ka Woso ʊ.
K'ɩbɩɩ jɩm ɩ tarɛ ɩ m dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, k'ɩ tɔ ʊ, a kʊ ma zaa ra. K'a n yɩ ncɩnaaʊ y, a y'ɩ kam dʊdɔkər ʊ, dʊdɔkər bɩ n ɩ ka lɔnnɔdɔmazannɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Ɩbɩɩ bɩ bɔm b'ʊ k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ zɩm bɩ ka haay y, bɩ tanka deem taan… bɩ gɔɔtarɛ y.»
«Awɔɔ ma, n ʊ: ‹Ɩ bɩ jaan da y.›
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʊ gʊaa dɩga lʊ ma a hɔɔn n ta zi, a jaan da kan kɩ a heer ʊ.»
«K'ɩ bɩsɩ mɩnyaa bɩ y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʊ, ɩ zo laatʊ ɩ ma. Bala, a jɩra k'ɩ mɛ vəŋŋə deem n a zaar ba, k'ɩ mɛ bɩ haay bɩ ta sɛhar ʊ y.
Bɩ, k'ɩ bɩsɩ wɔ bɩ y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra ɩ zo laatʊ ɩ ma. A jɩra k'ɩ mɛ vəŋŋə deem n a zaar ba, k'ɩ mɛ bɩ haay bɩ ta sɛhar ʊ y.»
«N y'a ya, n n a hɩ sɔ, n ʊ: ‹Kʊ gʊaa la a lʊ ra k'an wɔsaalʊmaci ka ʊ.›
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʊ gʊaa la a lʊ ra, bɩ jaan bɛɛ a a da y, lʊ bɩ da an nawʊm jaandarɛ ma. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa lʊ k'a gʊ a zim ma sa, jaan a da.»
«Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ wɔɔ yaabɔɔ m, n ʊ: ‹Ɩ bɩ ɩ lerbɔrɛ to y, b'a ka kʊ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ler bɔ Zuuba m ɩ ɩ wer si bɩ n kʊ yɩ.›
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a b'a wer si fɩɩga y: A b'a wer si brama tɔ nɩ y, bala, Woso cirbəəduu m bɩ.
A b'a wer si tara tɔ nɩ y, bala, a gam cɩntarahɔ m bɩ, a b'a wer si Zerizalɛm tɔ nɩ y, bala, cir gʊta bɩ kʊ m bɩ.
Ɩ b'ɩ wer si ɩ mim tɔ nɩ y, bala ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ ka minkə deem n a ba kunkum gɛɛ fu y.
K'awɔɔ ɩ meer barɛ, kʊ ɩɩn… m, k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ɩɩn… m. Kʊ ayy… m, k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ayy… m. Meerbaa k'a n'a nam ma bɩ, a to a ʊ a Bʊnyaabarɛzaa
bɩ zi.»
«Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ, n ʊ: ‹Mɩnyaa nɩ sompim mɩnyaa bɩncɛ ʊ, sɔ nɩ sompim sɔ bɩncɛ ʊ.›
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ gʊaa a ba awɔɔ m bʊnyaa, a b'a bʊnyaa ba m sɔ y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a wɔ ta ɩ bɩsɩ paasɩ rɛ, k'ɩ ɩ jɩsa paasɩ bɩ ka ʊ k'an a ta rɛ.
Kʊ gʊaa ʊ, k'a dʊdɔ ka kan ɩ kɩ, k'a ɩ huudaara yɔ ɩ m, k'ɩ to k'an ɩ huukuurə sa sɔ.
Kʊ gʊaa paŋŋa ba ɩ ma, k'a ɩ da tarɛ ma ganjɩbɔʊrɛ tisi kan a kɩ, k'ɩ ta ganjɩbɔʊrɛ tisi hɩɩya kan kɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa hɔ yɛ ɩ han, k'ɩ ka ʊ. Kʊ gʊaa ʊ, k'a zɩm sa ɩ zi, ɩ bɩ ɩ gu han y.»
«Awɔɔ ma, n n a hɩ, n ʊ: ‹K'ɩ ɩ gʊaa ŋʊa, k'ɩ sɔ ɩ jɩm m.›
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: K'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʊa, k'a yaa da Woso m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ nyɩnɔ paan…rɔ. Bala, a a ka woso nɩ gum gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ ra kan gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A a ka sɔ, la nɩ bam gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ra kan gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʊarɛ, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka? Bala, yawʊrsinno wɔɔ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a danyɩnɔ m bala, bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam, an nɩ yɩrɛ a hɔ? Kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ ra?
K'a maam, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa paan… amba awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ n mɩŋŋa paan… bɩ m.»
«A b'a ka k'a a zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba, kʊ gʊɔɔ n dɩga a ma y. K'awɔɔ ŋ ba kʊ ŋ nɩ dɩga a ma, awɔɔ bɩ ganwʊrɛ yɩm awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ zi y.

K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kam cicirzaa ʊ, ɩ bɩ hɔ ba kʊ gʊaa haay n a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kam gʊaa ʊ, amba zambʊzannɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bam sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ kan zaa birero ʊ kɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ y'a ganwʊrɛ yɩ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, k'ɩ ɩ gan wʊrɛ, k'ɩ jɩsa wɔ bɩ bɩ hɔ k'ɩ bɩsɩ wɔ n'a bam bɩ dɔ y.
K'ɩ ganwʊrɛ bɩ nyaakʊm da ɩ ka, ɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ hɔ nyaakʊndarɛ yɩm bɩ ganwʊrɛ karɛ ɩ ʊ.»

«K'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ, a bɩ yɩ am zambʊzannɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa kʊ gʊɔɔ n a yɩ bɩ, jɩm ŋ tɩr a ʊ sokʊmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kan zaarɔ zɛkʊrajɩrɔ kɩ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ bɩr yaa darɛ. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, sɩra m, ŋ y'a ganwʊrɛ yɩ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, k'ɩ lɛ taa kɩ yaa da, gasʊ ɩ cɛ ʊ ɩ lɛ ta, ɩ yaa da ɩ Zɩ Woso k'a nɩ b'ʊ bɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛɛ k'a nyaakʊm da bɩ yɩm bɩ, a y'ɩbɩɩ zibəə k'ɩbɩɩ nyaakʊm da bɩ ganwʊrɛ karɛ ɩ ʊ.
K'awɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ, a bɩ meer ba gʊta am kɩfɩɩrɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. A hɔɔn ŋn'a darɛ, ŋ ʊ, k'a meer ba gʊta, Woso y'a yaadarɛ mam.
A b'a ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, awɔɔ Zɩ Woso bɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, an n'a yɛm han.»
«K'awɔɔ k'a yaa da, k'a da ncɩnaaʊ:
Wɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ,
k'ɩ tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ,
k'ɩ cirbəə n bʊr,
k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ n ba tara burə ʊ,
amba an nɩ bam arzana ʊ bɩ m.
Wɔɔ her hɔbɩrɛ ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Wɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʊ,
amba wɔɔ n'ʊ muno kʊrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʊ bɩ m.
Dɔ wɔɔ ma k'ʊ bɩ yɛ ʊ ʊ do makra bʊnyaa nɔ ʊ y,
bɩ wɔɔ yɔ Bʊnyaabarɛzaa bɩ wɔ ʊ.
[Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ so cirbəə ʊ kan paŋŋa kɩ, lɛbɔʊrɛ kɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ.»]
«Kʊ sɩra nɩ, k'awɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʊ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɩr sugur kam gʊɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ b'awɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʊ sɔ y.»
«K'awɔɔ y'a lɛ kʊsɩrɛ, a bɩ tɩr a meer zɩnzar kʊ ʊ, am zambʊzannɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. A meer ŋ tɩr a zɩnzar kʊ ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, a a lɛ kʊsɩ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: ŋ y'a ganwʊrɛ yɩ.
K'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ lɛ kʊsɩrɛ, k'ɩ hi da ɩ meer ʊ, ɩ tidəər zɛ ɩ mim ma,
kʊ gʊɔɔ b'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, ɩ lɛ ɩ kʊsɩ y. Bɩ, k'ɩ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛɛ k'a nyaakʊm da ʊ bɩ n a dɔ a deem. B'a y'ɩ ganwʊrɛ karɛ ɩ ʊ.»
«A b'a ka arzaka ma durnya burə ʊ naa ʊ y. Bala, bɛɛ kan muku kɩ y'a zarm, konno ɩ cɛlɛ yarm, ŋn'a sarɛ.
Bɩ k'ɩ ka arzana arzaka ma. Bala, muku kan bɛɛ kɩ ba b'ʊ k'a zar y, konno ba b'ʊ k'a cɛlɛ yar, k'a sa y.
Bala, lɛɛ k'ɩ arzaka n ta ʊ b'ɩ heer n ta ʊ sɔ.»
«Mɛsim fɩtɩrɛ m mɩnyaa m. K'ɩ mɩnyaa mɩŋŋa ɩbɩɩ mɛ bɩ haay ɩ lɛɛgure ʊ.
Bɩ k'ɩ mɩnyaa bɩ mɩŋŋa y, ɩbɩɩ mɛ bɩ haay nyɩntam monsigə ʊ. K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lɛɛgure k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ monsigə nɩ, monsigə bɩ do yɩm gʊta bidə.»
«Gʊaa ba ʊ an b'a dam ma, an zuubɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ zi ba y. A deem ŋʊam, an sɔ deem m, gɛɛ, an a zɛ kʊ ra kan deem kɩ, an kaanm deem m. Awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a zu Woso ʊ, k'a a ya, a zu busoo ʊ y.»
«Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a b'a heer kɔ a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ mim ma y. B'a b'a heer kɔ huu mim ma sɔ y. Mɩsɩrbaa n lɛ da hɔbɩrɛ m na? Mɛsim bɩ n lɛ da huu m na?
K'a dɩga bɛnnɔ ma: ŋ bɩr hɔ duure y, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔ darɛ y, ŋ bɩr hɔ zarm sɩ ʊ y, b'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ yɩ ŋ tʊrm! Awɔɔ n lɛ da ŋ nɩ gallɛm hɔka ra?
Nka n'a dam ma, an a mɩsɩrbaa da ra poore tɔkkɛ a hɔɔn k'a n'a dam ma gʊta minto?
Bɔ y'a ka, awɔɔ n'a heer kɔm huu mim ma? K'a dɩga pooyaa hɔvuro ma, ŋ yɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr zi barɛ, bɩ ŋ bɩr huu barɛ y.
Bɩ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ awɔɔ m, Salomɔɔn mɩŋŋa, b'a kan a cirbəə bɩ kɩ, a n huu du a ma, am ŋ deem hɔ bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʊ Woso ɩ huu dum pooyaa bur ma ncɩnaaʊ, bɩ ta an a ʊ her kʊ sɛ n b'a bɩ booti m, a bɩ huu dure awɔɔ ma an lɛ da brɔɔ m na? Sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ!
K'a maam, a b'a heer kɔ a bɩr a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Bɔ wɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ? Bɔ wɔɔ n'a mire? Bɔ wɔɔ n'a dure ʊ ma?
Naa do haay kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ma kʊsɩ-kʊsɩ, b'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ b'a dɔ, a ʊ, awɔɔ lɛ taa ŋ ma.
K'a lɛɛ ka a ka Woso cirbəə bɩ ma, kan a tɩrgabaa kɩ. Maam bɩ, Woso hɔ k'a gɔɔta bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.
Naa minto bɩ, a b'a heer kɔ booti mim ma y. Booti dɩgarɛ a mɩŋŋa mim ma. Dɔmɩm biyəə y'a mɩŋŋa mim m.»
«A bɩ gʊaa dʊdɔ yar y, kʊ Woso b'a dʊdɔ yar y.
K'awɔɔ gʊaa dʊdɔ yar lʊnlɔ, awɔɔ dʊdɔ yar n nawʊm maam sɔ, hɔganhɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m gʊɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ nɩ nyɩntam hɔganhɔ awɔɔ minto sɔ.
A lɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ bur k'a n'ɩ mim mɩm ʊ bɩ yɩrɛ, an bɔkarɛ kusə n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʊ, b'ɩ bɩr a yɩrɛ?
Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ, ɩ hɩ ɩ danyɩ m, ɩ ʊ, jɩm kʊ m bur bɔ ɩ mɩm ʊ, an bɔkarɛ kusə n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʊ!
Zambʊzaa, kusə bɩ bɔ ɩ mɩm ʊ cɩna, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, ɩ bur bɩ bɔ ɩ danyɩ bɩ mɩm ʊ.
A bɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa ka jino ʊ y, kʊ n bɛɛ m, ŋ y'a bɔrɛ, ŋn'awɔɔ bɩ. A bɩ hɔ wɩsɩ sa a ka kurkuuro ʊ y, kʊ n bɛɛ m, ŋ tʊntɔm la.
K'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ. K'awɔɔ a ka ma, awɔɔ y'a yɩm. K'awɔɔ cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʊrɛ awɔɔ m.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa hɔ yɛ, a y'a yɩm. K'a a ka ma, a y'a yɩm. Kʊ gʊaa cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʊm nɩ.
Gʊaa y'awɔɔ bire ʊ a nyɩ nɩ bur yɛm han, an jaa ka ʊ ra?
Gɛɛ, k'a zɔ yɛ han, a mɩm kaŋ ʊ ra?
Awɔɔ k'an bʊnyaa ncɩnaaʊ a bɔkarɛ a hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ka a nyɩnɔ ʊ dɔ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ bɛɛ lɛ da ra? A hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a yɛm han rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa haay kʊ gʊɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a ba ŋ nɩ sɔ. Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ ciro wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ.
K'a gasʊ cɛlɛ fɔɔrɛ bɩ m, bala, cɛlɛ gʊta bɩ kan zaa zanta bɩ kɩ bɩ, ta ŋ nawʊm nyaanlɛ bɩncɛ ʊ. Gʊɔɔ gʊta yɩ ŋ sam.
Bɩ, cɛlɛ fɔɔrɛ bɩ kan zaa kʊsɩ bɩ kɩ bɩ, ta ŋ nawʊm mɩsɩrbaa bɩncɛ ʊ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʊta y.
K'a dundo a zi kan ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bʊr ŋ tɩr a ʊ awɔɔ zi, am seero hɔ bɩ m, an bɔkarɛ poojino kʊsɩrɔ m.
Ŋ zibəəro awɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɔm ma. N bɩr tʊgɔ nyɩ nɔm laa gɔ ra y, n bɩr sɔɔn nyɩ nɔm laazankʊrɛ ra y.
Gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ, nyɩ mɩŋŋa an n'a dam, gɔ bʊnyaa bɩ, nyɩ bʊnyaa an n'a dam sɔ.
Gɔ mɩŋŋa b'a dam ma an nyɩ bʊnyaa da y, gɔ bʊnyaa b'a dam ma, an nyɩ mɩŋŋa da sɔ y.
Gɔ haay k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam bɩ, a zɛ n nawʊm la, n n'a dam sɛ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ ŋ zibəəro awɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɔm ma.
Gʊaa haay k'a n'a hɩm mɔɔ ma: ‹Zuuba, Zuuba› bɩ bɛɛ nɩ gasʊm Woso cirbəə ʊ y. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bam nɔ wɔɔ m.
Dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, gʊɔɔ gʊta y'a hɩrɛ: ‹Zuuba, Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ tɔ minto, wɔɔ Woso lɛ si ʊ so ra. Ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma wɔɔ la zinəro ra. Wɔɔ hoserlo ba gʊta ɩbɩɩ tɔ minto.›
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ n awɔɔ dɔ fɩɩga y. K'a a hʊr mɔɔ jɩr ʊ, mimbʊnyaabənno!›
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ ba naa mam bɩ, an nɩ zi bam nɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a hɔɔn n ta ʊ, an a cɛ dɔ ci burə ʊ kɩ.
La n ba, hi n yar, hɩnhɛr n hɔn kan paŋŋa kɩ, an a mom cɛ b'ʊ, a n a da y. Bala, a jɩr bɩ da n y'a ʊ ci burə ʊ.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ ba naa mam b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ bɩ, gʊaa bɩ do bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa yarma k'a cɛ dɔ nyɩntaa burə ʊ kɩ.
La n ba, hi n yar, hɩnhɛr n hɔn kan paŋŋa kɩ, an a mom cɛ b'ʊ, cɛ bɩ n wurgə, a hɔsɩ n gɔɔta y.»
Yeezuu k'a hɔ dɩnda ncɩnaaʊ an a nya bɩ, gʊɔɔ cir gʊta kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ minto.
Bala, Yeezuu bɩr hɔ dɩndarɛ am ŋ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Woso paŋŋa an nɩ hɔ bɩ dɩndam nɩ.
Yeezuu k'a a to ci bɩ mim ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ cir gʊta zu a jɛ ʊ.
Kusimə n b'a zɔ ma, an kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, k'ɩ lɛ taa, ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ mɔɔ waa, ɩ dintim naa do gʊ mɔɔ ma.»
Yeezuu n a wɔ hʊr, an a da ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ lɛ taa, ɩ waa. Kʊ dintim bɩ n gʊ ɩ ma.» Lɛɛm bɩ, a kusiməbaa bɩ nya ma.
A m bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, bɩ ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ m, k'ɩ ganwʊrɛ kʊ Moyiisi lɛ ka kʊ n n a ba bɩ ka, k'an nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ waarɛ bɩ kasɛtɩ gʊaa haay minto.»
Yeezuu k'a nɩ gasʊm Kapɛrnawum ʊ bɩ, sʊrdaarɔ cir bʊr zi, an a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Zuuba, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ nɩ wʊtam har ʊ, a mɛ n ga, an nɩ fɩr yɩm gʊta.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ tam, m aa a waa.»
Bɩ sʊrdaarɔ cir b'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ n gasʊ mɔɔ har ʊ y, meerbaanyɩ ba deem bala, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ y'a waam!

Lɛɛzannɔ y'a so mɔɔ mɩŋŋa ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ m so sʊrdaarɔ ʊ. Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ deem m, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Ta!›, b'a ta. Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ a vanta m, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Bʊr!›, b'a bʊr. Kʊ mɔɔ m ya, m a hɩ m zibəənyɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Naa ba!›, b'a a ba.»
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a dɩga gʊaa bɩ ma, an zɛ kədə, an a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ n sɩrakarɛ naa do lɔɔ yɩ Israyɛl gʊaa zi y.
A hɩ mɔɔ n nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊɔɔ y'a tom gʊta dɔjɩr ʊ kan meer kɩ ŋnɩ bɩ nyɩnta kan Abraham kɩ Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ bɩ Woso cirbəə b'ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ n lɛɛ ka n ŋ bɔ ʊ Woso cirbəə bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ, n brɔɔ nyɔɔm garga ra monsigə ʊ. Nyikəre kan sɔsʊrɛ kɩ nyɩntam b'ʊ.»
Meerbaa naa do jɛ ʊ, Yeezuu a hɩ sʊrdaarɔ cir bɩ m, a ʊ: «Doo har ʊ, k'an ba ɩbɩɩ m, amba ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.» Wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ lɛɛm bɩ, zibəənyɩ b'a waa.
Yeezuu k'a gasʊ Pɩyɛɛr har ʊ bɩ, a Pɩyɛɛr dində yɩ an nɩ wʊtam mɛmarɛ m.
A n a wɔ da a wɔ ma mɛmarɛ bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʊ, an wuti an nyasʊ Yeezuu m.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, n bʊr gʊɔɔ m gʊta zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ. Yeezuu meer ba bala an la zinəro wɔɔ ra, an yaabazannɔ wɔɔ waa haay.
Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʊ:
A ɩ hɔ haay k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ mɛsim ma bɩ sa,
an wɔɔ yaabarɔ gʊ wɔɔ ma.
Yeezuu k'a gʊɔɔ cir gʊta yɩ, ŋnɩ bɩr a ma bɩ, a lɛ ka a ʊ, k'a ta higʊta bɩ gəm deem la.
Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem n a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ zure ɩbɩɩ jɛ ʊ lɛɛ haay k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ taŋ ʊ b'ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɛɛʊnrɔ ɩ yaarɔ m, bɛnnɔ ɩ cɛlɩŋŋarɔ m, bɩ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ ba bɩncɛ m k'a a mim cɩnta ʊ y.»
Karɩndanyɩ vanta n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, zaa ka m ʊ, kʊ m aa nɩ m zɩ gər bir, kʊ m a dɔ m bʊr.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ, k'ɩ gəəno to kʊ ŋ n'a gəəno bir.»
Yeezuu gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ n zu a jɛ ʊ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʊta wuti hi bɩ burə ʊ, an a ŋʊa k'a ka kʊ hi m kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ mom. Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ, an nɩ hinceem bam.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, wɔɔ yɔ! Kʊ m bɛɛ m wɔɔ gɩngam!»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ nyi barɛ, sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ!» A n wuti an jɩm, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma kan higʊta bɩ kɩ. Lɛɛ bɩ n zɛ sɩɩ…
Ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɩ gʊaa bɩ kara n naa, baa hɩnhɛr kan hi kɩ n n'a lɛ sire?»

Yeezuu k'a lee ku higʊta bɩ tʊr deem ʊ Gadara zannɔ kʊ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a m bɩ, gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʊ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ n bɔ gəənoyaarɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ b'a zɛ ʊ. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro nyɩnta bʊnyaa gʊta. Naa minto bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an cem lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ y.
Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba wɔɔ nɩ Woso Nyɩ? Bʊr ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ bɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩm bɩ n a ku cɩna ra?»
A n bɔkarɛ, kurkuuro cir gʊta ɩ nyɩnta laatʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩrɛ.
Zinəro wɔɔ n'a yɛm Yeezuu han gʊta, ŋ ʊ: «K'ɩ la wɔɔ ra, k'ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta!» Ŋ nɩ bɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ mɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ gasʊ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʊ. A m bɩ, kurkuuro cir gʊta bɩ n bra si, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'a zar higʊta b'ʊ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Kurkuuro dundonno wɔɔ n bra si, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ hɩ kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ, kan hɔ k'a ba gʊɔɔ kʊ zinəro n ta ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩ kɩ.
A m bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a yaa Yeezuu zɛ ʊ. A yɩ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ han gʊta k'an bɔ a kʊ b'ʊ.
Naa jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, an a wusigə, an higʊta bɩ zɛ ra an ta a kʊ ʊ.
N n mɛgarɛzaa busu wʊtarahɔ ra, n nɩ bʊr m Yeezuu zi. K'a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr m nɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ tɔ ʊ, ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ.»
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ a heer ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do ɩ Woso sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ!»
Yeezuu k'a hɔ k'a nɩ ŋ heer ʊ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto, awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʊ?
Kara m zanta? Mɔɔ n b'a hɩm lʊgɔ bɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ: Ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛ, gɛɛ, ɩ wuti ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ gʊr, ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ, a ʊ: Gʊaanyɩ b'ɩ lɛ m tara burə ʊ, k'a gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʊ.» A n a hɩ lʊgɔ bɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ gʊr ɩ doo!»
Gʊaa bɩ n wuti an doo.
Gʊɔɔ cir gʊta kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ da bɔ ʊ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ, k'a paŋŋa naa do ka gʊɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ tam bɩ, a a to, an gʊaa yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam yawʊrsire bɩncɛ b'ʊ, a tɔ m Matiyee, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ!» A n wuti an zu a jɛ ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu nɩ nyɩntam Matiyee har ʊ b'ʊ k'a hɔ bɩ bɩ, yawʊrsinno kan mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ gʊta kan kɩ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: «A lɔ, awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʊrsinno kɩ, mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ?»
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩzannɔ lɛ baa lɔɔtɔr ma y, yaabazannɔ lɛ n taa lɔɔtɔr ma.
K'a ta, a yaa a ka meerbaa naa do jɩ ma: ‹Cicirzɛrɛ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, mannɩ barɛ bɛɛ y›. Mɔɔ n bʊr kʊ m bɩ gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bir y. Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m bɩ mimbʊnyaabənno bir.»
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto m, wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n'ʊ lɛ kʊsɩm, b'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kʊsɩrɛ?»

Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ɩ lʊsarɛ cibsa barɛ, lʊ bɩ zim bɩ nɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bireyaa ʊ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ y'a dam ma, ŋnɩ heerzarlɛ ba ra? Bɩ dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʊ, n zɛm bɩ lʊ bɩ zim bɩ gʊ ŋ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ kʊsɩm dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ.
Gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kər sam, an n'a tam huu gusire rɛ y. Bala, pɛɛra daa kər bɩ huu gusire bɩ gaam an a kaansʊ, an lɛ da biisi ra.

Gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ dɩvɛn daa sam k'a tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʊ y. Kʊ m bɛɛ m, hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ hɩnhaanm, dɩvɛn bɩ n a lo hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ n a zaar ba. Bɩ dɩvɛn daa bɩ tɔ n tɩr a ʊ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʊ, dɩvɛn bɩ kan hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ b'a zaarbarɛ y.»

K'a nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ cir deem n a zɔ ma, an sʊnta a taa, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ ɩ ga, a n maasɩrɛ ba cɩna y. Bɩ, bʊr ɩ wɔ ka a mim la, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n wuti kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʊ.
Bɩ, lʊ n ta ʊ, ma n'a dam zi a dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya hɔ m naa, an a zɔ Yeezuu ma jɛ ʊ, an a wɔ da Yeezuu huu lɛ ma.
Bala, lʊ bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ m wɔ da a huu lɛ ma tɔkkɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m waam.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ an dɩga a jɛ ʊ, an lʊ bɩ yɩ an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ, ɩ heer ba kookoo, ɩ sɩrakarɛ y'ɩ bʊmbɔ». Lɛɛm bɩ, lʊ b'a waa wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a lee ku zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ har ʊ bɩ, k'a hirpenno wɔɔ yɩ kan gʊaa cir bɩ bʊgʊr barɛ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«K'a bɔ, nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ n ga y. Hinceem a a ba.» Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʊm ma.
Kʊ n bɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, a gasʊ zi, an nyɩ bɩ sa a wɔ ma, a m bɩ, nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ n wuti.
Mim naa do n ta lɛ haay ʊ kʊ bɩ do ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a hʊr b'ʊ bɩ, bʊʊrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ b'a zɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ zu a jɛ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ baa dam, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ cicir zɛ *Davɩd Nyɩ!»
Yeezuu k'a lee ku har ʊ bɩ, bʊʊrɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, an ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ sɩra ka a ʊ, mɔɔ yɩ m dam ma, m naa ba ra?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩɩn…, Zuuba.»
A m naa, Yeezuu n a wɔ da ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔ k'awɔɔ sɩra ka k'a yɩ bɩ, k'a yɩ maam.»
Ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ n gʊ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka ŋ ʊ paŋŋa m, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi! A b'a ka gʊaa n a dɔ y!»
Bɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda sa lɛɛm, ŋn'a mim dɩndam kʊ b'ʊ haay.
Yeezuu k'a n'a hʊrm bɩ, n bʊr gʊaa m zinə n ta m, an a ba bəətir.
Yeezuu k'a la zinə bɩ ra bɩ, bəətir b'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ meer bam. Gʊɔɔ cir gʊta bɩ zɛ kədə. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Hɔ naa do lɔɔ n ba cɩna Israyɛl kʊ naa ʊ y!»
Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zinəro jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɩ paŋŋa kaŋ ʊ, an nɩ lam zinəro wɔɔ ra.»
Yeezuu ɩ bɩrm kʊnɔrɔ wɔɔ ʊ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ sokʊmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta pa dam sɔ, an nɩ yaaba do haay waam kan kʊsɩ do haay kɩ.
K'a gʊɔɔ cir gʊta bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ cicir a nyasʊ, bala, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ heerzarlɛ nɔ ʊ kan kɔrɛ kɩ, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ ba dundor m bɩ m.
A n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Mɔsa zibəə bɩ gʊta, bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʊta y.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a yɛ Wutuzaa bɩ han k'an zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ a mɔsa zibəə bɩ tɔ ma.»
Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an paŋŋa ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a da zinəro wɔɔ ma, kʊ ŋ nɩ la ŋ la, kʊ ŋ nɩ yaaba do haay waa, kan kʊsɩ do haay kɩ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔrɔ ba n nɩ: Lɛɛkarɛ zaa bɩ tɔ m, Sɩmɔɔn, n n'a hɩm ma Pɩyɛɛr, kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ.
Filipi kan Bartelemii kɩ, Toma kan yawʊrsirezaa Matiyee kɩ, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kan Tade kɩ.
Sɩmɔɔn *Zelɔtɩ, kan Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kɩ, b'ɩ Yeezuu da jɩnnɔ wɔ ʊ bɩ.
Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro nyɔɔ, an lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: «A bɩ kɩfɩɩrɔ zaa sa y, b'a bɩ gasʊ Samarii zannɔ kʊ ʊ y.
Bɩ k'a ta Israyɛl do zi, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi.
K'awɔɔ ɩ tam k'a bɩr a pa darɛ, a ʊ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.
K'a yaabazannɔ waa, k'a gəəno mɩm bɔ ʊ, k'a kusiməro waa, a dintim gʊ ŋ ma, k'a la zinəro ra. A ka n y'a ʊ awɔɔ ʊ vam, k'a ka vam sɔ.
A bɩ sarma sa, b'a bɩ busoo sa sɔ y. A bɩ bɔɔlʊgʊ zar a mɔr ʊ sɔ y.
A bɩ hɩra sa zaa bɩ sarɛ minto, b'a bɩ huu sa hɩɩya y. A bɩ kʊsɔ kan bara kɩ sa y, bala, zibəəzaa b'a ga m, an hɔbɩrɛ yɩ.
K'awɔɔ gasʊ kʊ poore ʊ gɛɛ kʊ gʊta ʊ, k'a laaka da, kʊ gʊaa ta ʊ a lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ si a har ʊ, k'a gɔɔta b'ʊ k'an ta an awɔɔ hʊrlɛ ku.
K'awɔɔ ta k'a gasʊ har b'ʊ, k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.›
Kʊ har bɩ do a ga m, k'awɔɔ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta kan kɩ. Bɩ, k'a n a ga m, k'awɔɔ laafɩɩ n a wusigə awɔɔ zi.
Har bɩ do nɔ ʊ kʊ ŋ n awɔɔ si, kʊ ŋ n a tʊr ka awɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋn'a si sɔ, k'a ɩ bɔm har bɩ do ʊ, gɛɛ kʊ bɩ do ʊ, k'a taanyisi gʊ a gannɔ ma.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, kʊ naa do fɩryɩrɛ yɩm gʊta an lɛ da Sodɔm kan Gomɔɔr kɩ kʊ ra.»
«K'a tʊr ka mɩŋŋa, awɔɔ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʊm am seero hɔ bɩ m poojino bireyaa ʊ. Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a hɔɔn ka mɩŋŋa, am mɩnnɔ hɔ bɩ m. K'a yɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mim ba ʊ y, am cirpʊnnɔ hɔ bɩ m.
K'a dundo a zi kan gʊɔɔ kɩ, bala, ŋ y'awɔɔ gʊrm, ŋnɩ ta awɔɔ m dʊdɔkənno zi. Ŋ y'awɔɔ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m a sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ.
Ŋ tarɛ awɔɔ m kʊrɔ lɛɛzannɔ kan cinno kɩ taa mɔɔ tɔ ma. Naa nɩ nyɩntam kasɛtɩ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ.
Kʊ ŋ bɩ ta awɔɔ m brɔɔ lɛɛ, a b'a hɔɔn da k'awɔɔ meer bam lʊnlɔ, gɛɛ, bɔ awɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ y. Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ.
Bala, awɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ meer barɛ a zim y, awɔɔ Zɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ meer k'awɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ darɛ awɔɔ lɛ ʊ.
Danyɩnɔ kʊ kam zɛ ma. Zɩ y'a nyɩ karɛ, n n a zɛ. Nyɩnɔ wutire ŋnɩ jɩm kan a zɩrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Gʊaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma. Bɩ gʊaa k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Kʊ ŋ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma kʊ niŋŋə ʊ, k'a a si a ta kʊ vanta ʊ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɩ Israyɛl kʊnɔrɔ wɔɔ nyarɛ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ m bɔkarɛ, an bʊr y.
Karɩndanyɩ bɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba ra y, zibəənyɩ bɩ n lɛ da a zuuba ra sɔ y.
Karɩndanyɩ a ga m, an yɩ am a karɩnsaamba m. Zibəənyɩ a ga m, an yɩ am a zuuba m. Kʊ n har bɩ zaa bɩ ba zinəro jɩtaarɛ, awɔɔ hɔɔn ʊ naa, n b'a bam har bɩ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m ncɩnaaʊ ra?
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a bɩ nyi ba gʊɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, hɔ ba ʊ, an a nyaakʊm da, n ba yɩrɛ y. Mim ba ʊ, an a nyaakʊm da, n b'a dɔrɛ y.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m monsigə ʊ bɩ, k'a hɩ garga ra, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam sɔ awɔɔ y'a minto bɩ, k'a pa da kʊ gʊaa haay n a ma.
A bɩ nyi ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɛsim zɛm gər, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ gʊaa nyi zɛ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. K'a nyi ba Woso m. Bɩ y'a da ma, an mɛsim kan nyi kɩ zaar ba sɛhar ʊ.
N bɩr bɛnnɔ hɛɛnm hɩɩya wacɩr la? A n bɔkarɛ deem taan… bɩr gam k'awɔɔ Zɩ bɛɛ zaa ka y.
B'awɔɔ, ŋ y'awɔɔ minkə bɩ lɛ dɔ.
K'a maam, a bɩ nyi ba y. Awɔɔ gore ta ʊ, an lɛ da bɛnnɔ haay ra.
Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ gʊɔɔ lɛɛ, a ʊ, a mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ zaa dɔ sɔ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gʊɔɔ lɛɛ, mɔɔ bɩsɩ karɛ a zaa ma sɔ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ lɛɛ.
A b'a hɔɔn da, a ʊ, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ kʊ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta ʊ tara burə ʊ y. Mɔɔ n bʊr kʊ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta ʊ y. Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ zoobarɛ m.
Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ m gʊaa gʊ a zɩ ma, kʊ m nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ gʊ a da ma, kʊ m lʊ gʊ a nyar ma.
Gʊaa har gʊɔɔ n nɩ yɩrɛ a jɩnnɔ.
Kʊ gʊaa a zɩ ŋʊa gɛɛ a da an lɛ da mɔɔ m, gʊaa bɩ do n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʊaa y. Kʊ gʊaa a nyɩyar gɛɛ a nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ ŋʊa an lɛ da mɔɔ m, gʊaa bɩ do n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʊaa sɔ y.
Kʊ gʊaa n a gɔdarkʊra busu an zu mɔɔ ʊ, a n a ga m, an yɩ mɔɔ gʊaa y.
Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a a meeyaa bʊmbɔ, a b'a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ gʊaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.»
«Kʊ gʊaa awɔɔ si, mɔɔ a m si. Mɔɔ si k'a ʊ bɩ, bɔzaa ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a a si.
Kʊ gʊaa wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa si k'an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ minto, a wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ganwʊrɛ yɩm. Kʊ gʊaa gʊaa tɩrga si a tɩrgabaa tɔ ma, a gʊaa tɩrga ganwʊrɛ yɩm.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ gʊaa hi ka hɩnnɩ ʊ tɔkkɛ nyɩnɔ poorero nɔɔn duro deem ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ m bɩ tɔ ma, gʊaa bɩ do bɩ kʊrɔm ganwʊrɛ ma y.»
Yeezuu k'a hɔ dɩnda a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m an a nya bɩ, a a hʊr lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ k'a yaa Woso lemim pa da, k'a hɔ dɩnda sɔ kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Zaan k'a nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'a to an Krista zibəəro wɔɔ mim ma, an a karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɔɔ,
kʊ ŋ n aa laaka da han, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ ɩ zɛrɛ ma bɩ gɛɛ, gʊaa vanta nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «K'a ta a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam, an n'a yɩm naa dɩnda Zaan m:
Bʊʊrɔ mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, lʊgɔrɔ ɩ tam, kusimoo y'a waam, dintim nɩ gʊrɛ ŋ ma, tikkiro ɩ meerbaa mam, gəəno y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, lemim nyɩnta ɩ hɩm ŋʊazannɔ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʊaa k'a n a sɩrakarɛ to mɔɔ minto bɩ m.»
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a hʊr bɩ, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a hɩm zamaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a poohɔɔn ʊ? Hɩnhɛr awɔɔ yɩ, an nɩ niigə gɔ yəŋŋəm gɛ?
Bɔ awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a paan…? Gʊaa m, an huu wɩsɩ da a ra gɛ? Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ huu wɩsɩrɔ darɛ a ra rɔ wɔɔ ɩ cinno harlɔ ʊ.
Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gɛ? Ɩɩn…, mɔɔ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a lɛ da wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ra.
Zaan mim n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'an ɩbɩɩ zaa banka.›
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lannɔ nyɩnɔ barla gʊaa ba ʊ an lɛ da Zaan-Batiisi ra y. A n bɔkarɛ gʊaa k'an poore Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ bɩ lɛ da m.
A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa Zaan-Batiisi Woso lemim padarɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ, an lee ku dɩɩtaa naa ma bɩ, arzana bɩ gasʊ n nawʊŋ ʊ paŋŋa m, tʊntɔʊrɛzannɔ n'a soŋ ʊ.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay kan Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩnda, an ta an Zaan dɔmɩm ku.
K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, *Elii niŋŋə kʊ n ʊ a zɛm bɩ m Zaan m.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ tʊr m k'an a ma!
Kʊ m her gʊɔɔ nɔɔn makra ba kan bɔ kɩ? Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ yaa nyɩnta daasɩyaa ʊ, ŋn'a to, ŋn'ɩ kʊ bimbirm, ŋ ʊ:
Wɔɔ hir hɛ awɔɔ m,
b'awɔɔ n sar ba y!
Wɔɔ zɛlaa lɔ awɔɔ m,
b'awɔɔ n nyi ka y!
Bala, Zaan k'a bʊr bɩ, a bɩr hɔ bɩrɛ y, a bɩr dɩvɛn mim sɔ y. N n a hɩrɛ, n ʊ: zinə n ta m.

Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bʊr, an nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim, n n'a hɩm ma, n ʊ: Naa do naa, nɔzaa m, bɩ, bɛɛmir m sɔ. Yawʊrsinno kan mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ hannyɩ m. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yɛm Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ ŋ ʊ, Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ tɩrga.»
A m naa, Yeezuu n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʊrɔ k'a hoserlo ba ʊ gʊta bɩ ŋ n a bɔ a taam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

«Korazɛn, ɩbɩɩ kʊsɩ yɩm! Bɛtsayɩdaa, ɩbɩɩ kʊsɩ yɩm sɔ! Bala, hoserlo kʊ ŋ ba awɔɔ bireyaa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ ba ŋ y'a ʊ Tiir kʊ ʊ kan Sidɔn kʊ kɩ, k'an naa brɔɔ huu yiiro gʊr ŋnɩ ŋ ka a ra ŋnɩ suu lo a ra, k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a lɛ taa k'a a bɔ a taam.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, awɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ nyɩntam kʊsɩ, an lɛ da Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ m.
B'ɩbɩɩ, Kapɛrnawum, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ busure ɩ lee ku brama ra?
Ɩbɩɩ zerm ɩ gasʊ gəənokʊ ʊ!
Bala, kʊ hoserlo kʊ ŋ ba ɩbɩɩ zi rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ ba ŋ y'a ʊ Sodɔm kʊ ʊ, k'an naa a gɔɔta an ta ʊ her dɔmɩm ʊ.
Naa y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dʊdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, ɩbɩɩ fɩryɩrɛ yɩm kʊsɩ an lɛ da Sodɔm hɔ ra.»

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba, a ʊ: «Zɩ k'a a so tara ʊ kan brama kɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m barka, k'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nyaakʊm da gʊɔɔ hɔɔnzannɔ m kan hɔdonno kɩ m, ɩ bɔkarɛ, ɩ ŋ hɩnka nyɩnɔ poorero m bɩ minto.
Ɩɩn…, Zɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'a ŋʊa ɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ.
Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔ haay ka mɔɔ ʊ. Zɩ bɩ y'a deem ɩ Nyɩ bɩ dɔ. Nyɩ bɩ y'a deem ɩ Zɩ bɩ dɔ kan gʊɔɔ k'a lɛ n taa k'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bala.
K'a bʊr mɔɔ zi, awɔɔ haay k'awɔɔ mɔr gorezaa busu an n'a kɔm nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ hoonsire karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.
K'a zu mɔɔ ʊ, k'a mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ si, bala, mɔɔ bʊgʊ-bʊgʊ, mɩŋŋazerlezaa m mɔɔ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ hoonsire yɩm.
Bala, zuuba k'an kʊsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔr kʊ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ bɩ gore ba ʊ sɔ y.»
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, sabaa hinni ʊ, Yeezuu bɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʊ, nɔ n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ hɔyaa yɩnyarm ŋn'a tiŋŋəre, ŋn'a sʊm.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Dɩga ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, hɔ k'a n a ga barɛ m *sabaa hinni ʊ bɩ ŋn'a bam.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mim k'a pakra ba Davɩd m kan a gʊɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ, hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba, nɔ k'a a nyasʊ bɩ,
gasʊ k'a ʊ Woso zɛʊjɩ bɩncɛ ʊ, an mannɩ bur bɩ gʊr an a bɩ, kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ lɛ ba ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a bɩ kʊ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɛɛ m bala bɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra?
Gɛɛ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Moyiisi lɛrɔ ci b'ʊ, n ʊ: Woso zɛʊjɩ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɩr zum sabaa hinni b'ʊ y, bɩ kʊrɔma bɛɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Gʊaa ɩ naa ʊ, an lɛ da Wosocɛ bɩ ra.
N ʊ: cicirzɛrɛ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, mannɩbarɛ bɛɛ y, k'awɔɔ meerbaa naa do jɩ ma, awɔɔ bɩ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro dʊdɔ yarlɛ y, bala, ŋ n kʊrɔma y.
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa.»
Cem kʊ Yeezuu ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, ta a ʊ, an aa gasʊ ŋ sokʊmacɛ ʊ.
Lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊaa n nɩ b'ʊ, a wɔ deem n ga. Ŋ n laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʊ: «A a ga m, kʊ n nɩ gʊaa waa *sabaa hinni ʊ ra?» A hɩ ŋ y'a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, k'a Yeezuu ku, a mim ka ra.
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Nka n'awɔɔ bire ʊ, a ser deem bala n n'a dam yaa ʊ sabaa hinni ʊ, b'a bɩ tarɛ an aa a bɔ yaa b'ʊ?
Gʊaa n lɛ da ser m denter la? K'a maam, a a ga m, kʊ n nɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba gʊaa m sabaa hinni ʊ.»
A m bɩ, an a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ wɔ bɩ hʊr!» Gʊaa bɩ n a hʊr, a wɔ bɩ n a banka mɩŋŋa am deem bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a dɩnda k'a ka zaa ma k'a Yeezuu ku a zɛ.
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hʊr lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ, gʊaa cir gʊta n zu a jɛ ʊ, an yaabazannɔ wɔɔ waa haay.
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa, a ʊ: A b'a ka gɔsɩ n a dɔ y.
Kʊ hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ Zibəənyɩ kʊ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ.
Gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam kan m heer kɩ haay bɩ,
mɔɔ yɩ m Ɛspri bɩ kaŋ ʊ.
A mɔɔ lɛrɔ hɩ m do gʊta m.
A b'a kam nyaa ma y.
A bɩ zee darɛ y.
Gɔsɩ b'a leer mam zaarɔ bire ʊ y.
A bɩ niigə gɔ paŋŋawarzaa darɛ y.
A bɩ fɩtɩrɛ k'a sɛ paŋŋa ba ʊ bɩ lihire y.
A ba a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, an ta an paŋŋa ka tɩrgabaa ʊ.
Do haay sɩra kaŋ ʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, n bʊr gʊaa m Yeezuu zi, zinə n ta m, an a ba bʊʊ, bəətirbaa n ta m sɔ. Yeezuu n a waa, a n nɩ meerbarɛ, a mɩm n nɩ lɛɛ yɩm sɔ.
Gʊaa cir bɩ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «*Davɩd Nyɩ bɛɛ m na?»
Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Naa do k'an naa, la a nawʊm zinəro ra, zinəro jɩtaarɛ Bɛlzebul paŋŋa m bala.»
Yeezuu k'a hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ k'a gʊɔɔ bɩr kʊ mam bɩ y'a darɛ. Kʊnɔ gɛɛ, har kʊ kʊmarɛ ba ʊ bɩ y'a dam sɔ.
Kʊ Sʊtaana bʊr an nɩ lam Sʊtaana ra, gʊngʊrɛ m bɩ. A kʊ bɩ y'a dam ma, an jɩm dʊntɔ ra?
Bɩ kʊ Bɛlzebul paŋŋa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, awɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ la kʊ ŋ nawʊrɛ ŋ la sɔ bɩ, ŋ paŋŋa b'a to ka? Bɩ y'a ka ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n n'awɔɔ dʊdɔ karɛ.
Bɩ kʊ Woso *Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, k'a maam k'a dɔ a ʊ, Woso cirbəə bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi.
A n ta ʊ sɔ bɩ, gʊaa ba ʊ, an b'a dam ma, an gasʊ gʊaa paŋŋazaa har ʊ, k'a mɔrlɔ gʊr, k'a n ser ka, an a kʊsɩ, an bɔkarɛ, an gasʊ, an mɔrlɔ wɔɔ gʊr y.
Gʊaa k'a ba kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ jɩm m. Gʊaa k'a bɩr a dam mɔɔ han an a so kʊ ma bɩ, a hɩsɩga a nawʊm.»
«Naa y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Woso mimbʊnyaarɔ haay kan sʊnsɔrɔ haay kɩ sugur kam gʊɔɔ ʊ. Bɩ, gʊaa biyəə k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sʊnsɔ wʊm bɩ, a b'a sugur yɩm fɩɩga y.
Kʊ gʊaa meer ba Gʊaanyɩ bɩ ma, a y'a sugur yɩm, bɩ k'a meer ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma, a b'a sugur yɩm tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, b'a b'a yɩm booti hinni ʊ sɔ y.»
«K'a dɔ a ʊ: gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ, nyɩ mɩŋŋa a n'a dam. Gɔ bʊnyaa bɩ nɩ nyɩ bʊnyaa dam. N gɔ biyəə dɔ a nyɩ ma.
Mɩnnɔ kʊsɩrɔ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a mim mɩŋŋa hɩ a kʊsɩrabaa bɩ nɔ ʊ? Bala, hɔ k'a gʊaa heer han b'a lɛ n'a hɩm.
Gʊaa mɩŋŋa k'a n'a mɩŋŋabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʊm mim mɩŋŋa m a heer ʊ. Gʊaa bʊnyaa k'a n'a bʊnyaabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʊm mim bʊnyaa m a heer ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ: Meerbaa k'a nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ haay kʊ gʊaa n'a bam bɩ, Woso y'a larm ma.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ meerbaa n n'ɩ bʊmbɔrɛ, ɩ meerbaa n n'ɩ dam mim ʊ sɔ.»
Naa kur bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ɩ hoser ba k'ʊ a yɩ.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Her naa gʊɔɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ m, ŋ bɩr Woso lɛ sire y, ŋ y'a kam makra ma, bɩ kʊ makra bɩ nɩ, ŋ bɩ makra vanta yɩrɛ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zonas makra bɩ bɛɛ y.
Bala, Zonas k'a gɔɔta zɔ gʊta nɔ ʊ hi ʊ dɔmɩm kaakʊ bɩ, sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ gɔɔtam maam sɔ tara noom ʊ dɔmɩm kaakʊ, sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ.

Dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, Niniivɩ gʊɔɔ wutire, ŋnɩ her gʊɔɔ nɔɔn da lɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ gumə war bɩ hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Bala, Niniivɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ a bɔ a taam ŋnɩ sugur yɛ Zonas Woso lemim padarɛ ma. Bɩ naa ʊ bɩ, gʊaa ta ʊ an lɛ da Zonas ra.

Dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, lʊ cir k'a a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ ma an bʊr k'a b'a tʊr ka Salomɔɔn mindɔrɛ meerbaa ma bɩ, a zamaana naa do gumə war bɩ hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ. Bala, a to a ʊ kʊ laatʊrɛ ʊ, an bʊr k'a b'a tʊr ka ma, an bɔkarɛ, gʊaa ɩ naa ʊ an lɛ da Salomɔɔn ra.»
«Kʊ zinə bɔ gʊaa mɛ ʊ, a da an nawʊm lɛɛ gəəro zi, k'a a ka hoonsire bɩncɛ ma, bɩ k'a bɩr a yɩrɛ,
b'a hɩ a heer ʊ, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ yɩ m wusigəre m bɩncɛ gusire ʊ.› K'a yaa leeku bɩ, a yaa dɩga a gɔsɩ n a so cɛ b'ʊ, bɩ dintim ba b'ʊ sɔ y. Hɔ haay ɩ cɛ b'ʊ, a bɩncɛrɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa.

K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, b'a ta an aa zinəro vantɔɔ gaa saanhɩna, ŋ bʊnyaabaa n lɛ da a mɩŋŋa ra, ŋnɩ bɩ gasʊ, ŋn'a so gʊaa bɩ do ʊ. Gʊaa bɩ do mim bɩ bʊnyaabaa lɛ dam biisi hɔ ra. Zamaana naa do k'an bʊnyaa naa, a mim yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ.»
Yeezuu k'a nɩ meer bam kan gʊɔɔ cir bɩ kɩ bɩ, a da kan a danyɩnɔ kɩ bʊr, ŋnɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋn'a ŋʊam k'a meer ba kan kɩ. [
Gʊaa n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Ɩ da kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ garga ra, ŋ lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan ɩ kɩ.»]
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ gʊaa bɩ nʊ, a ʊ: «Nka m mɔɔ da? Nkɔɔ m mɔɔ danyɩnɔ?»
A n bɔkarɛ, an a wɔ nyɔɔ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ da bɩ ba n nɩ, kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʊaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ danlʊ m, mɔɔ da m.»
Hinni bɩ dɔ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ har ʊ, an aa nyɩnta higʊta bɩ lɛ ra,
zamaa cir gʊta a so kʊ ma a jɩr ʊ. A m bɩ, Yeezuu n kɔ, an aa nyɩnta kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, zamaa bɩ haay n nɩ jɩnɩm hi bɩ lɛ ra.
A hɔ dɩnda ŋ nɩ gʊta hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom darɛ nɔ ʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ bɔ, k'a hɔ duu.
A duu k'a nawʊm bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa gʊr ma, bɛnnɔ n bʊr, ŋnɩ b'a bɩ haay.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʊ, taa n nyɩnta b'ʊ gʊta y. Hɔyaa bɩ n bɔ lɛɛm, kʊ taa ba b'ʊ gʊta bɩ minto.
Woso k'a der bɩ, a na hɔka bɩ ma, an ga, k'a məsi ba ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a zar laa gaa ʊ, laa bɩ n haan, an ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʊ, ŋnɩ haan, ŋnɩ ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da. A yaa deem yaa ka zɔrɔ, deem busɔrdɩ, deem bukərku.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ tʊr m bɩ, k'an a tʊr ka ma.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n tɩr meer ba kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom nɩ?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Woso a ka k'awɔɔ n Woso cirbəə bɩ minno kʊ ŋ y'a nyaakʊm da rɔ wɔɔ dɔ, b'a n a ka nawɔnnɔ ʊ y.
Bala, gʊaa k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a yarɛ n n a ka ʊ, a hɔ n yɩ gʊta, bɩ gʊaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ, n bɩ yɔm nɩ.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom m. Bala, ŋ yɩ dɩgam, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y. Ŋ y'a tʊr kam, bɩ ŋ bɩr a marɛ, ŋ bɩr a jɩ mam sɔ y.
Kʊ hɔ kʊ Ezayii a hɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ ŋ minto. A ʊ:
Awɔɔ mim mam gʊta,
b'awɔɔ b'a jɩ marɛ y.
Awɔɔ dɩgam mɩŋŋa,
b'awɔɔ bɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ y.
Bala, do naa do heer a ta.
Ŋ tʊr bɩr mim marɛ y,
ŋ y'a mɩnyaarɔ tɩnta,
k'a bɩ lɛɛ yɩ, k'a bɩ mim ma y,
k'a heer bɩ mim jɩ ma y,
k'a bɩ sugur yɛ, a a bɔ a taam kʊ mɔɔ n a waa y!
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ jɩra: awɔɔ mɩnyaarɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, awɔɔ tʊʊrɔ ɩ mim mam!
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʊta kan gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ gʊta kɩ a ŋʊa, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm naa yɩ, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y. K'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam naa ma, bɩ ŋ n a ma y.»
«K'a tʊr ka hɔduure hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom bɩ jɩ ma.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ zaa lezi bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim bɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr a jɩ mam nɔ wɔɔ m. Bala, lɛɛm bɩ, Sʊtaana lemim kʊ n y'a duu ŋ heer ʊ bɩ si ŋ han.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'a sim lɛɛm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m brɔɔ m.
Bɩ, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ məsi ba ʊ y, hindeem gʊɔɔ m. Kʊ heerzar gɛɛ fɩryɩrɛ bʊr Woso lemim bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ ŋ y'a do lɛɛm.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ laarɔ bireyaa ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ m, ŋnɩ Woso lemim bɩ ma, durnya hɔɔndama kan a arzaka lɛtaama kɩ ŋ lemim bɩ zɛ, a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y.
Hɔyaa k'a nɩ lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ ma, ŋn'a jɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ m: Ŋ n'ɩ nyɩ dam. A yaa deem ɩ nyɩ dam zɔrɔ, deem busɔrdɩ, deem bukərku.»
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom vanta da, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a hɔdo mɩŋŋa duu a hɔsɩra ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Gum k'a bɩ da gʊɔɔ nɩ hinceem bam bɩ, gʊaa bɩ jɩm deem n bʊr, an bɩ sʊr duu hɔyaa bɩ barla, an a hʊr.
Hɔyaa bɩ k'a bɩ bɔ, an ma, an yaa ka bɩ, sʊr bɩ n bɔ sɔ.
Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ n b'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: ‹Zuuba, hɔdo mɩŋŋa bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ duu ɩ hɔsɩra b'ʊ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ sʊr n bʊr, an ta ʊ?›
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: ‹Jɩm deem ɩ hɔ naa do ba›. A m naa, zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ʊ ta, ʊ aa sʊr bɩ wʊnwʊr la?› A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ:
‹Ayy… Bala, k'awɔɔ k'a sʊr bɩ wʊnwʊr, awɔɔ cenle a hɔka bɩ wʊnwʊr sɔ.

K'a ŋ to kʊ ŋ nɩ ma kan kʊ kɩ, k'an ta, an aa hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm ku. Hɔdarɛ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm zibənno wɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ: K'a lɛɛ ka a sʊr bɩ gʊr, a kʊsɩ, a da sɛ ʊ, k'a bɔkarɛ a hɔyaa bɩ gʊr a zar m sɩ ʊ.› »
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom vanta da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan hɔ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma mutardɩ yaa, kʊ gʊaa n'a sam, an n'a duum a hɔsɩra ʊ bɩ kɩ.
A m hɔdo haay rɔ wɔɔ poore. Bɩ, kʊ n y'a duu an bɔ, ma an nawʊm, an nɩ lɛ dam hɔyaa haay ra: a ba an nawʊm gɔ gʊta, bɛnnɔ n b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ cɛ kɩnka a vəŋŋəro ma.»
A a ya an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʊ rɛ kan nyʊnyɔɔ kɩ. Lʊ n a sa, an a tʊntɔ kan nyisi kɩ mɔr gʊta lɛ ma kaakʊ. Nyisi bɩ n ta an der.»
Minno nɔɔn duro haay hɩ Yeezuu n nawʊrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom m. A bɩr hɔsɩ hɩm gʊɔɔ cir bɩ m, k'a hɩ bɛɛ a nawʊm hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom nɩ y.
Kʊ hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a hɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ. A a hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ gʊrɛ,
m hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ,
m hɔ k'a nyaakʊm da durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʊ tee… bɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ.
Yeezuu k'a zamaa cir bɩ to, an doo bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Sʊr hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom bɩ jɩ dɩnda wɔɔ m.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa do duum bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ m.
Hɔsɩra bɩ, durnya m. Hɔdo mɩŋŋa bɩ, Woso cirbəə nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m. Sʊr bɩ, Sʊtaana nyɩnɔ m.
Jɩm k'a sʊr bɩ duu bɩ, Sʊtaana m. Hɔdarɛ bɩ, durnya nyarɛ m. Hɔdənno wɔɔ, malɛɛkarɔ m.
Amba kʊ ŋ nɩ sʊr gʊrm ŋn'a dam sɛ ʊ bɩ, yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ:
Gʊaanyɩ bɩ y'a malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔrɛ, ŋnɩ hɔ haay k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ gʊm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ gʊr Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ. Ŋ mimbʊnyaabənno wɔɔ gʊrm sɔ, ŋnɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ,
ŋn'aa ŋ zar sɛhar ʊ. Ŋ nyi kam b'ʊ, ŋn'a sɔ sʊ.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ tɩrgarɔ wɔɔ gure am wosogure hɔ bɩ m, ŋ Zɩ bɩ cirbəə nɔ ʊ b'ʊ. Gʊaa k'a nɩ tʊr m, k'a n'a tʊr ka ma.»

«Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʊ rɛ kan arzaka gʊta kʊ n y'a nyaakʊm da hɔsɩra ʊ bɩ kɩ, gʊaa n sʊr la: a n so ra, an a nyaakʊm da. K'a heer nyɔɔ bɩ, an a hʊr, an aa hɔ haay k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ hɛɛ, an hɔsɩra bɩ do si m.»
«Woso cirbəə b'a ya an bɔ kʊ rɛ kan terbarɛzaa k'a n'a kam nyɛɛnyaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma kɩ.
K'a nyɛɛnyaa wɩsɩ yɩ, a busoo nɩ yɩm gʊta bɩ, an ta, an aa hɔ haay k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ hɛɛ, an b'a si m.»
«Woso cirbəə b'a ya, an bɔ kʊ rɛ kan zaŋŋa kʊ ŋ n'a zom hi ʊ, an nɩ zɔ do haay gʊrlɛ an nɩ bɔm nɩ bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ zɔnɔ a han bɩ n y'a gaa, n n bɔ m hi bɩ lɛ ra. N n bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta, ŋnɩ zɔnɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ nyʊkɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ zar mɔr ʊ, ŋnɩ zɔnɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ lo.
Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ. Malɛɛkarɔ zɛm bɩ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ gʊ gʊɔɔ tɩrgarɔ wɔɔ ma,
ŋnɩ ŋ zar sɛhar ʊ. Ŋ nyi kam b'ʊ, ŋn'a sɔ sʊ.»
Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ naa haay woo… ma mɩŋŋa ra?» Ŋ ʊ: «Ɩɩn…»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaamba biyəə k'a n'a bam Woso cirbəə kʊ bɩ karɩndanyɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ rɛ kan harzaa k'a nɩ hɔ gusire kan hɔ daa kɩ bɔrɛ a arzaka ʊ bɩ kɩ.»
Yeezuu k'a hɔbɔkʊrɛnoonno nɔɔn duro da an ŋ nya bɩ, a a hʊr lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ,

an doo kʊ k'a tʊr ʊ b'ʊ. A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam kʊ bɩ do sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ a to mindɔrɛ naa do m ka? A a ba lɔ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ?
Gɔwurezaa bɩ nyɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na? Maarii nyɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na? Zakkɩ, Zozɛf, Sɩmɔɔn, Ziidi, a danyɩnɔ bɛɛ m nawɔnnɔ ra?
Awɔɔ danlʊrɔ ba wɔɔ bire ʊ naa ʊ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, an n'a dam naa do haay barɛ ma?»
Naa do a ka, ŋ n kaanm Yeezuu m. A m naa, Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ɩ daʊrɛ yɩm bɩncɛ haay ʊ, b'a bɩr a yɩm a kʊ ʊ, a bɩr a yɩm a har ʊ sɔ y.»
Yeezuu n hoser ba b'ʊ gʊta y, ŋ sɩrakarɛwar bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Yeezuu mim ma, bala a tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ.
A n n'a hɩrɛ a zibəənyɩnɔ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do, Zaan-Batiisi m! K'a a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ y'a ka, an paŋŋa yɩ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ.»
Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, ŋnɩ Zaan nyasʊ, ŋn'a sur, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, a dam Filipi lʊ k'an ta m, a tɔ m Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ bɩ minto.
Bala, Zaan a hɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʊ: «A n a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n a ba ɩ lʊ y!»
Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ŋʊa k'a Zaan zɛ gər, b'a ɩ nyi bam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m. Bala, brɔɔ haay ɩ dɩgam Zaan ma, ŋ ʊ: Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m.
Bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm cibsa hinni ʊ, Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ sar ba gʊɔɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ bir cibsa ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, an Hɩrɔɔdɩ nɔ yɩ.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a wer si, a ʊ: hɔ k'a lɛ n taa haay bɩ, a y'a kaŋ ʊ.
Nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ da bɩ n a nyʊnnyɔɔta, a ʊ: «A n Zaan-Batiisi mim yɛ laaga burə ʊ.» Nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ n a yɛ maam sɔ.
Cir bɩ heer n a zar, b'a b'a dam ma, an a gu y, k'a wer si hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ minto. A m bɩ, an lɛ ka kʊ n n'a ka ʊ.
A n gʊaa deem nyɔɔ, an aa Zaan mim gʊ ma lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'ʊ,
an bʊr m laaga ʊ, an b'a ka nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ b'ʊ, an a si, an aa a ka a da ʊ.
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ Zaan gər bɩ sa, ŋn'aa bir, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'aa hɔ k'a a ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu k'a mim naa do ma bɩ, a a hʊr lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ, an da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ k'a ta toore ma a deem. Gʊɔɔ cir kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʊr a kʊrɔ ʊ a gam ma, k'a zu a jɛ ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a bɔ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a gʊaa cir yɩ gʊta, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ cicir n a nyasʊ, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ ŋ yaabazannɔ waarɛ.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gum da, bɩ pooyaa m naa, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra kʊ ŋ nɩ ta kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ŋn'a bɩ!»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A n a ga m, ŋn'a hʊr y. K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʊ a zim.»
A m bɩ, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bur soor kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya wɔɔ n ta m naa ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ŋ ka m ʊ naa ʊ».

A n lɛ ka, kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta bur bɩ ra, an bur soorlɔ wɔɔ si kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ a wɔ ʊ, an dɩga brama, an barka da Woso m. A n buuro wɔɔ zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a ka zamaa b'ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay a bɩ, an ŋ ka. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bur kan zɔ kɩ kuuro kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔ bɩ bɩ rɔ wɔɔ, yaarɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ tisi soor ma. N n lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ lɛ sa y.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a ka karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bra higʊta bɩ gəm deem la, k'a gɔɔta a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra.
K'a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra an a nya bɩ, a a hʊr a deem, an ta ci ra, k'a yaa da. Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, a gɔɔta b'ʊ a deem.
Kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ n a gʊ hi bɩ lɛ bɩ ma, an ta laatʊ hi bɩ bire ʊ. Bala, hɩnhɛr y'a nyam kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ zi, hikurero wɔɔ n'a monɩm kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ
Dɔ k'a bʊr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a wuti an tɔ hi bɩ ra, an nɩ tarɛ ŋ zi.
Kʊ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a yɩ an nɩ tam hi bɩ ra bɩ, nyibəə gasʊ ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Toor m!» Ŋ n'ɩ zee dam.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, a ʊ: «K'a sɩra ka, mɔɔ m, a da bɩ bɔ ʊ y!»
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ m paan… k'ɩ lɛ ka kʊ m bʊr ɩ zi hi bɩ burə ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bʊr.» Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ tɔm hi bɩ ra k'a ta Yeezuu zi.
K'a hɩnhɛr bɩ yɩ an nɩ hɔnm kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, a da bɔ ʊ, hi bɩ n'a monɩm, an zee da, a ʊ: «Zuuba, m bɔ lɛ m!»
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a wɔ nyɔɔ an a nyasʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ poore! A lɔ ɩbɩɩ n sɩnsɩm ka?»
Ŋ n'a da kʊ ʊ, ŋnɩ gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kukurə zɛ a taa, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m paan….»
Kʊ ŋ higʊta bɩ zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ yaa lee ku Zenezarɛtɩ ʊ.
Kʊ bɩ do gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, ŋn'a dɔ bɩ, ŋ yaa a hɩ kʊ b'ʊ haay kan kʊrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʊ, a bʊr. Ŋ n bʊr yaabazannɔ wɔɔ m haay Yeezuu zi.
Ŋ n a yɛ han, k'a a wɔ da a huu lɛ tɔkkɛ ma. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a wɔ da ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ yɩ haay.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ a to Zerizalɛm ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ:
«Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr zum wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ ʊ? Ŋ n'ɩ hɔ bɩm, bɩ ŋ n a wɔ hir y. A n a ga nɩ y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «B'awɔɔ, a lɔ awɔɔ bɩr zum Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, a bɔkarɛ, an nɩ zum a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ ʊ?
Woso a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʊ. Bɩ gʊaa k'a zɩ bɔ ʊ gɛɛ a da a bɔ ʊ, pakra m, kʊ n n a zɛ gər.›
B'awɔɔ ʊ, kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a zɩ m, gɛɛ a da m, a ʊ: ‹Daahan kʊ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ, Woso hɔ nɩ.›
Pakra bɛɛ m kʊ gʊaa bɩ do m a da a zɩ kan a da kɩ han y. Woso lemim bɩ zar awɔɔ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ minto.
Zambʊzannɔ, Ezayii gumə ta ʊ, an awɔɔ mim hɩ, a ʊ:
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro, mɔɔ da ŋ nawʊŋ ʊ a lɛ m, bɩ ŋ heer laatʊ mɔɔ ma.
Daʊrɛ kʊ ŋ n'a kam mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, vam m.
Bala, durnya mim ŋn'a dɩndam gʊɔɔ m, ɩ ʊ Woso hɔ m.»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu zamaa bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a tʊr ka mɩŋŋa k'a jɩ ma!
Hɔ k'a nɩ gasʊm gʊaa lɛ ʊ an ta a nɔ ʊ bɩ bɛɛ nɩ dintim kam ma y, bɩ hɔ k'a nɩ bɔm gʊaa lɛ ʊ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.»
A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʊ, a busu ŋ ma ra?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Hɔ haay kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ n a sɔɔn bɩ, n y'a wʊrm.
K'a ŋ to, bʊʊrɔ nɩ bʊʊrɔ gaam. Bɩ, kʊ bʊʊ bʊr, an nɩ bʊʊ gaarɛ, ŋ gʊaa hɩɩya haay y'a zarm yaa ʊ!»
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do jɩ hɩ ʊ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ gɔɔta, awɔɔ n a jɩ dɔ ra?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʊ, hɔ haay k'a nɩ gasʊm gʊaa lɛ ʊ, an nɩ tarɛ a nɔ ʊ bɩ, ta an nawʊm, an nɩ bɔm garga ra ra?
Bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ bɔm gʊaa lɛ ʊ bɩ, a to a nawʊm gʊaa heer ʊ, bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.
Bala, gʊaa heer hɔɔndarɛ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ bɔŋ ʊ: gərzɛrɛ, jaandarɛ, koorbarɛ, gʊɔɔ tɔ zarlɛ, kan sʊnsɔwʊrɛ kɩ.
Nawɔnnɔ nɩ dintim kam gʊaa ma, bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, ɩ n ɩ wɔ hir bɩ bɩr dintim kam gʊaa ma y.»
Yeezuu k'a cem b'ʊ bɩ, a ta Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Lʊ nɩ b'ʊ an ta Yeezuu zi, zɩɩfʊ bɛɛ nɩ y, Kanaan do nyɩ m, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «M cicir zɛ Zuuba, *Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ zinə n ta m, an nɩ fɩr kam ma gʊta.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ y. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma, ŋn'a yɛ han, ŋ ʊ: «La lʊ naa do ra, bala, a ɩ wɔɔ kɔm kan a zeedarɛ kɩ.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʊ Israyɛl gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan seero kʊ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi.»
Bɩ, lʊ b'a gu an bɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, bʊr ɩ da mɔɔ han!»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A n a ga m, n nɩ nyɩnɔ hɔbɩrɛ sa, n n a ka jinnyɩnɔ ʊ y.»
Lʊ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, Zuuba, baa jinnyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bʊtʊ k'a a lo ŋ zuubarɔ wɔɔ taa bɩ gʊrlɛ, ŋn'a bɩrɛ.»
A m naa Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Lʊ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ gandaa ʊ! Ɩ hɔ k'ɩ lɛ n taa bɩ yɩm!» Lɛɛm bɩ, a nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ b'a waa wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ.
Yeezuu a hʊr b'ʊ, an ta Galilee higʊta lɛ ra, an aa der ci ra, an nyɩnta.
Gʊɔɔ cir gʊta bʊr zi, lʊgɔrɔ m, bʊʊrɔ m, gandeenzannɔ m, bəətinno kan yaabazannɔ vantɔɔ kɩ m, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ nyɩnta Yeezuu taa, an ŋ waa.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, kʊ bəətinno nɩ meer barɛ, gandeenzannɔ n a gannɔ yɩ, lʊgɔrɔ nɩ tam mɩŋŋa, bʊʊrɔ nɩ lɛɛ yɩm bɩ minto. Ŋ y'a lɛ bɔ Israyɛl Woso ʊ.

Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zamaa bɩ cicir ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hɔ m naa, ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, hɔsɩ ba ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a bɩrɛ y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m ŋ da zaa ra kan nɔ kɩ y. Kʊ n bɛɛ nɩ, ŋ y'a dundom zaa ra.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'ʊ bur yɩ ka pooyaa ʊ naa ʊ, ʊ a ka gʊɔɔ cir naa ʊ, k'an ŋ ka?»
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʊ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Saanhɩna kan zɔ poorenyɩnɔ kɩ.»
A n lɛ ka kʊ zamaa bɩ n nyɩnta tara ʊ.
A n bur saanhɩna bɩ sa kan zɔnɔ wɔɔ kɩ an yaa da Woso m barka, an n'a zɩnzɛm la, an n'a kam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'a kam, zamaa b'ʊ.
Ŋ n a bɩ, an ŋ ka, an a yɔ, ŋn'a kuuro gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma saanhɩna.
Zamaa bɩ gʊɔɔyaarɔ a zɔ tisi si ma, n n lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ lɛ sa y.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ da zaa ra, an da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ an ta Magadaan ʊ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ hoser yɛ han, k'a makra ba.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ woso lɛ a zo, b'awɔɔ ʊ, lɛɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa, bala, brama bɩ piin….
Dɔgta m, b'awɔɔ ʊ la bam her, bala, brama bɩ piin… b'a kundə sɔ. Awɔɔ brama mim dɔ, b'awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bam dɩɩtaa rɔ wɔɔ jɩ dɔ y.
Her gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr Woso lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ ɩ hoser yɛrɛ, bɩ ŋ bɩ hoser vanta yɩrɛ kʊ Zonas hɔ bɩ bɛɛ y.» A n a gʊ ŋ ma, an cem.
A hʊr kʊ Yeezuu ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ŋnɩ bra higʊta bɩ gəm deem bɩ ra bɩ, bur tɔ bɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi, k'a a ba laatʊ farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ nyʊnyɔɔ bɩ ma.»
Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ n bur sa bɩ y'a ka an naa hɩ.»
Yeezuu n a dɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A lɔ awɔɔ n'a hɩm kʊ m, a ʊ: kʊ wɔɔ n bur sa bɩ minto nɩ? Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ gʊta y!
Awɔɔ gɔɔta a bɩr naa jɩ dɔm na? Kʊ mɔɔ bur soor zɩnzɛ ra, m a ka gʊɔɔyaarɔ tisi soor ʊ bɩ, a tɔ b'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ ra? Awɔɔ kuuro gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ?
Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ bur saanhɩna zɩnzɛ ra m a ka gʊaa tisi si ʊ bɩ, kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ awɔɔ kuuro gʊr ʊ? A tɔ b'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ ra?
A a ba lɔ awɔɔ n a jɩ ma, a ʊ, bur bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma? K'a dundo a zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ, sadisɛɛnrɔ nyʊnyɔɔ bɩ kɩ.»
A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a jɩ ma, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, bur barɛ nyʊnyɔɔ bɛɛ an n'a hɩm ma y. Farizɛɛnrɔ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ hɔdɩndarɛ an n'a hɩm ma.
Ŋ yaa lee ku kʊ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma, ŋ ʊ: Filipi-Sezaaree kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ. Yeezuu laaka da a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han, a ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: nka m Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nɩ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: Zaan-Batiisi m, nawɔnnɔ ʊ: *Elii m, gɔsɩnnɔ a ya, ŋ ʊ: Zeremii m, gɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ deem m.»
A n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: nka m mɔɔ nɩ?»
Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ si, an a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Krista bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ nyɩ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mimbirenyɩntazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, Sɩmɔɔn, Zonas nyɩnnɩ, bala, gʊaa bɛɛ sɩra naa do hɩnka ɩbɩɩ nɩ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, Pɩyɛɛr
n'ɩbɩɩ m, bɩ ci naa do mɔɔ n nɩ m sokʊma bɩ dɔrɛ a burə ʊ. Zɛ kan a paŋŋa kɩ bɩ bʊrm la y.
Mɔɔ Woso cirbəə cɛnyɩrɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a kʊsɩm tara burə ʊ bɩ, n y'a kʊsɩm arzana ʊ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a hʊrm tara burə ʊ bɩ, n y'a hʊrm arzana ʊ.»
Naa do jɛ ʊ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʊ mɩŋŋa, a ʊ: ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ m, ŋ ʊ, Krista n'awɔɔ nɩ y.

A n a sa wakatɩ bɩ do ma, Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Pakra m, kʊ m ta Zerizalɛm ʊ kʊ m aa fɩr yɩ gʊta gʊɔɔgusinno kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ wɔ ʊ. Ŋ mɔɔ zɛm gər. B'a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, Woso mɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n Yeezuu gaa, an bɔ m toore ma, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kɩ, a ʊ. «Woso dɔrɛ ɩ ma kan naa kɩ Zuuba, mim naa do b'ɩ b'ɩ yɩrɛ y.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ, an a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʊ! Sʊtaana, mɔɔ makra ɩbɩɩ n'a bam, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan Woso hɔ kɩ y. Gʊɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ m.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʊ, k'an sɔ a mɩŋŋa m, k'an a gɔdarkʊra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a a meeyaa bʊmbɔ, a b'a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa ga mɔɔ tɔ ma a y'a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a so durnya hɔ haay ʊ, an bɔkarɛ an kʊrɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ ma, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka? Gɛɛ gʊaa y'a mɩsɩrbaa lʊrm kan bɔ kɩ?
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ a Zɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, a gʊaa biyəə zibəə nyɔɔdʊ kaŋ ʊ.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ naa, gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ b'a kure, kʊ ŋ n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an bʊr a cirbəə nɔ ʊ y.»
Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu Pɩyɛɛr gaa, kan Zakkɩ kɩ a danzaa Zaan kɩ, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma a minto, ci jintə mim ʊ.
A n a lʊr ŋ mɩm ʊ. A meer nɩ yɔm am wosogure hɔ bɩ m, a huuro wɔɔ nɩ nyakɩ bɔm, ŋn'a ba fu fɩrr….
*Elii n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan Moyiisi kɩ, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan Yeezuu kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʊ, a mɩŋŋa. K'ɩ lɛ taa, kʊ m bur ba kaakʊ: ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem.»
K'a nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, warkʊ k'a nɩ yɔm bʊr an b'a ku ŋ la. Meerbaa n a to warkʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ba mɔɔ Nyɩ m na. Mɔɔ ŋʊa gʊta. A mɔɔ nɔ yɩ paan…. K'a a tʊr ka ma.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a dundo, ŋn'a meer kunku tara ma, dabɔʊ gʊta k'a ŋ nyasʊ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu n a zɔ ŋ ma, an a wɔ da ŋ ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a wuti, a da bɩ bɔ ʊ y!»
Kʊ ŋ y'a bɔ ŋnɩ dɩga bɩ, ŋ n gɔsɩ yɩ dɔ, kʊ Yeezuu y'a deem bɛɛ y.
Kʊ ŋ n'ɩ zerm ci bɩ ra bɩ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: «Hɔ k'awɔɔ yɩ naa, a b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, k'an ta, an Gʊaanyɩ bɩ mɩmbɔʊrɛ ku gəəno bire ʊ.»
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ, Elii lɛɛkarɛ an bʊr?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, Elii nɩ lɛɛkarɛ an bʊr k'a bɩ hɔ haay banka.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Elii bʊr kara, bɩ ŋ n a dɔ y, a hɔɔnhɔ ŋ y'a ba m. Gʊaanyɩ bɩ fɩr yɩrɛ ŋ wɔ ʊ maam sɔ.»
A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, Zaan-Batiisi an n'a hɩm ma.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku zamaa cir gʊta bɩ zi bɩ, gʊaa a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an kukurə zɛ a taa, an a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Karɩnsaamba, m nyɩnnɩ cicir zɛ, hɔɔ n'a zɛm, an nɩ fɩr yɩm gʊta, a tɩr a da sɛ ʊ, gɛɛ hi ʊ.
Mɔɔ n bʊr m ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'a waa y.»
Yeezuu n meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʊ: «Zamaana sɩrakarɛwar zannɔ, gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm bam karɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ? Dɔmɩm karɔ mɔɔ nɩ m yarɛ, m yɛ kɔrɛ ma awɔɔ minto? K'a bʊr m mɔɔ zi.»
Yeezuu n həən si zinə bɩ ma, an bɔ nyɩ bɩ mɛ ʊ, nyɩ bɩ n laafɩɩ yɩ wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar a deem, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ y'a ka wɔɔ n ʊ da ma, ʊ la zinə bɩ ra?»

A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ k'an poore bɩ m. Bala, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan mutardɩ yaa kɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɩm ci naa do m, a ʊ: wuti, ɩ ta lɛɛ naa do ʊ! A wutire an ta, awɔɔ bɩ jɩram hɔsɩ barɛ ra y. [
Bɩ, zinə ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hɔ ba ʊ an b'a dam ma an a ka, an bɔ, kʊ yaadarɛ bɛɛ kan lɛkʊsɩrɛ kɩ y.]»
Hindeem ʊ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a so kʊ ma haay Galilee ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «N Gʊaanyɩ bɩ dam gʊɔɔ wɔ ʊ.
Ŋ y'a zɛm, b'a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, Woso y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.» Meerbaa naa do ŋ heer zar gʊta.
Kʊ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lee ku Kapɛrnawum ʊ bɩ, Wosocɛ yawʊrsinno a zɔ Pɩyɛɛr ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ bɩr Wosocɛ yawʊr kam na?»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A y'a kam.» Pɩyɛɛr k'a lee ku har ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu lɛɛ ka m an a lar, a ʊ: «Sɩmɔɔn, kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, nkɔɔ durnya cinno nɔɔm nɩ yawʊr sire ŋ han? Ŋ nyɩnɔ m gɛɛ, saanɔɔ nɩ?»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Saanɔɔ m.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'a maam ŋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ barla y.

Bɩ k'ʊ lɛ baa kʊ ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ, ʊ ʊ zar a ma bɩ, ta higʊta b'ʊ, ɩ yaa ka zo hi b'ʊ. Zɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ lɛɛ kam an ka bɩ mom bɩ, bɔ zɔ bɩ do m, ɩ lɛ gʊ, ɩbɩɩ busoo yɩrɛ a lɛ b'ʊ, an nɩ mɔɔ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ yawʊr karɛ bɔm. K'ɩ bɔ ʊ, ɩ b'a ka yawʊrsinno wɔɔ ʊ.»
Wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Nka m jɩtaarɛ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ?»
Yeezuu n nyɩ poore bir an a jɩm ŋ bire ʊ,
an bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a lʊr a a ba, am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ nɩ, awɔɔ bɩ gasʊm Woso cirbəə b'ʊ y.
Gʊaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa zerm am nyɩ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, bɩ zaa n jɩtaarɛ Woso cirbəə b'ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a nyɩ poore si mɔɔ tɔ ma am nyɩ naa do m bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m si.»
«Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a ka nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka mɔɔ rɔ nɔɔn duro gʊaa deem n a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ, kʊ n jɛnlajaa gʊta kʊsɩ a wer ma, n n a da higʊta ʊ, a jɩra.
Kʊsɩ nɩ kan durnya kɩ, kʊ minno n ta ʊ, ŋn'ɩ gʊɔɔ dom mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ bɩ minto. Minno wɔɔ duro bɩ nyam durnya nɔ ʊ y, bɩ kʊsɩ ɩ kan gʊaa k'a ka ŋn'ɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ.

K'ɩ wɔ gɛɛ, ɩ gam y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, ɩ zo laatʊ ɩ ma k'ɩ gasʊ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ b'ʊ, ɩ wɔ deem m, gɛɛ ɩ gam deem m, bɩ jɩra, gasʊ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʊrɛ ɩ wɔ hɩɩya m, gɛɛ ɩ gam hɩɩya m sɛhar k'a lihire ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
K'ɩ mɩnyaa y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʊ ɩ zo laatʊ ɩ ma, k'ɩ gasʊ ɩ mɩnyaa deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, bɩ jɩra, gasʊ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʊrɛ ɩ mɩm hɩɩya m sɛhar ʊ bɩ m.
K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka a nyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro gʊaa deem bɔ ʊ y. Bala, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, arzana ʊ bɩ, ŋ malɛɛkarɔ ɩ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ mɛ yɩm wakatɩ haay. [
Bala Gʊaanyɩ bɩ, bʊr a ʊ, k'a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ.]
Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lʊnlɔ? Kʊ gʊaa ɩ seero m zɔrɔ, deem n a bɔ ʊ an nyaam, a bɩ bunɛɛhʊ a yaa nɛɛhʊ rɔ wɔɔ tom zigi ra, an ta an aa a ka deem k'a nyaam bɩ ma ra?
K'a ser bɩ yɩ, a heer yɩm nyɩnta kan kɩ an lɛ da bunɛɛhʊ a yaa nɛɛhʊ rɔ kʊ ŋ n nyaam nɔ wɔɔ ra.
Awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ lɛ baa sɔ kʊ nyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro gʊaa deem n nyaam y.
K'ɩ danyɩ a zar ɩ ma, k'ɩ ta zi, ɩ yaa hɔ k'a ba ɩbɩɩ m bɩ hɩ m, ɩbɩɩ kan kɩ a hɩɩya. K'a ɩbɩɩ mim bɩ si, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ a zɛ kʊ ra.
Bɩ, k'a n a tʊr ka ɩ ma, k'ɩ gʊaa na ɩ ma deem gɛɛ hɩɩya, amba Wosoci a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Gʊaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʊ y'a ga mim kasɛtɩ barɛ m.›
Kʊ gʊaa bɩ lɛ baa k'a tʊr ka brɔɔ ma sɔ, k'ɩ hɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ m. K'a ʊ a b'a tʊr kam kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ ma, k'ɩ dɩga ma kɩfɩr gɛɛ, yawʊrsirezaa.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: hɔ haay, k'awɔɔ n'a gum ma tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, n y'a gum ma sɔ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ. Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ nɩ yɛm ma tara burə ʊ, n yɛm ma sɔ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ: K'awɔɔ gʊaa hɩɩya a zɛ kʊ ra tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, k'a hɔ niŋŋə haay yɛ yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ hɔ bɩ do karɛ ŋ ʊ.
Bala, lɛɛ kʊ gʊɔɔ a so kʊ ma ʊ hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʊ mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ bireyaa ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, kʊ mɔɔ danyɩ a zar mɔɔ ma, gallɛm karɔ mɔɔ nɩ sugur kaŋ ʊ? Gallɛm saanhɩna gɛɛ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ gallɛm saanhɩna y, bɩ, gallɛm busaanhɩna a gallɛm saanhɩna.»
«Naa do minto bɩ, Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʊ rɛ kan cir k'a wuti k'a a zibəənyɩnɔ lar ŋ zibəə ma.
A sɩŋŋɩda k'a k'a ba bɩ, bʊr n y'a ʊ zibəənyɩ deem m, an ta talan
waa bu zɩm m.
Bɩ, gʊaa bɩ ba hɔsɩ m an b'a zɩm bɩ karɛ y. A m bɩ, cir bɩ n lɛ ka, kʊ n nɩ gʊaa bɩ hɛɛ kan a lʊ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan hɔ niŋŋə k'an ta m haay kɩ, k'a cɩnta zɩm bɩ bɩncɛ ʊ.
A m naa, zibəənyɩ bɩ n kukurə zɛ cir bɩ taa, an cicir ba a lɛ ra, a ʊ: ‹M cicir zɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m zɩm bɩ kam haay!›
Gʊaa bɩ cicir n cir bɩ nyasʊ, an zɩm bɩ to m, an a da zaa ra.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n bɔ, an a muno wɔɔ deem zɛ ʊ zaa ra, a zɩm n ta ra *deniyee zɔrɔ, an a wɔ so a bʊkɔ ʊ, an n'a ŋʊam k'a hoonsi ta rɛ, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʊ: ‹M zɩm bɩ ka m ʊ.›
A mim bɩ n kukurə zɛ a taa, an cicir ba a lɛ ra, a ʊ: ‹M cicir zɛ, mɔɔ yɩ m zɩm bɩ kam.›
Bɩ, gʊaa b'a gu, an ta, an aa a ka, n n a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, k'an tolle ba, an zɩm bɩ ka, an a nya.
Zibəənyɩnɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ heer a zar gʊta, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa hɔ haay woo… k'a ba bɩ hɩ cir bɩ m.
Cir bɩ n zibəənyɩ bɩ bir an a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Zibəənyɩ bʊnyaa, mɔɔ ɩ zɩm bɩ to ɩbɩɩ m haay, k'ɩbɩɩ cicir ba mɔɔ lɛ ra bɩ minto.
Ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da ma sɔ, ɩ ɩ mim bɩ cicir zɛ, amba mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ cicir zɛ bɩ n na?›
Cir bɩ nɔ n ma ʊ gʊta, an gʊaa bɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ k'an fɩr yɩ, k'an zɩm bɩ ka haay.»
Yeezuu n a ya, an a na ma, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ y'a barɛ awɔɔ m ncɩnaaʊ, k'awɔɔ bɩr sugur kam kʊ ʊ kan a heer kɩ haay y.»
Yeezuu k'a naa do dɩnda haay bɩ, a a hʊr Galilee ʊ, an ta Zidee ʊ, Zʊrdɛn kur.
Zamaa cir gʊta zu a jɛ ʊ, an ŋ yaabazannɔ waa b'ʊ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ n a zɔ ma, k'a nyasʊ meerbaa nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa a da ma, an la a lʊ ra, baa kʊ mim kara m na?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Wosoci b'ʊ ra? A ʊ: ‹A sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ, Woso gʊaa da kan lʊ kɩ.›
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹Bɩ y'a ka: gʊaa y'a gʊrɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, an a zɛ kʊ ra kan a lʊ kɩ, ŋ gʊaa hɩɩya bɩ n a ba deem.›
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ŋ bɩ hɩɩya dɔ y, ŋ deem. Bɩ, gʊaa bɩ hɔ kʊ Woso a zɛ kʊ ra bɩ gʊngʊm kʊ ma y.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m Moyiisi ʊ, n nɩ harcɩntarɛ kaansʊrɛ ci ba, kʊ n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ la lʊ ra?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ heerkarɛ minto y'a ka Moyiisi n lɛ ka k'awɔɔ n la a lannɔ ra. Bɩ, durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ, ncɩnaaʊ bɛɛ y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʊ gʊaa la a lʊ ra, bɩ lʊ bɩ n jaan da y, an lʊ vanta sa, gʊaa bɩ do, jaandarɛzaa m.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa kan a lʊ kɩ mim b'ɩ yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ gʊaa n lʊ sa y, a jɩra.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa haay bɛɛ nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do sire y, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso paŋŋa ka ŋ ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a si rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ y'a sim.

Minno y'a hʊnhɔ y'a karɛ gʊɔɔ bɩr lʊ sire y: Gʊɔɔ ta ʊ, yɩ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ lʊ si y, gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʊ, gʊɔɔ y'a ba ŋ nɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʊ, ŋ bɩr lʊ sire y Woso cirbəə bɩ minto. Gʊaa k'a n'a dam ma, an meerbaa naa do si bɩ, k'an a si.»
Gʊɔɔ bʊr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi, k'an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an yaa da ŋ tɔ ma, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yɛ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, ŋn'a bam kan ŋ kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a nyɩnɔ poorero wɔɔ to, ŋnɩ bʊr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ tolle y. Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.»
A n a wɔ ka nyɩnɔ wɔɔ mim la, an a hʊr lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, gʊaa a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an a lar, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, bɔ mɩŋŋa mɔɔ n'a barɛ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ larm hɔ mɩŋŋa mim ma? Gʊaa mɩŋŋa ba ʊ kʊ Woso deem bɛɛ y. K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ gasʊ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'ɩ zu Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ.»
Gʊaa bɩ n laaka da Yeezuu han, a ʊ: «Karɔɔ m Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ barla?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ kasɛtɩ ŋʊaar ba ɩ ka ɩ mim la y,
ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʊ, ɩ ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʊa bɩ m.»
Nyukumbueere bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ zu lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro haay ʊ, bɔ ɩ gɔɔta mɔɔ n'a barɛ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa paan… k'ɩ ta ɩ yaa hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʊ haay bɩ hɛɛ, ɩ busoo bɩ ka ŋʊazannɔ ʊ. Maam bɩ, ɩbɩɩ arzaka yɩm arzana ʊ. K'ɩ bʊr, ɩ bɩr zum mɔɔ ʊ.»
Bɩ, nyukumbueere bɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a heer a zar gʊta, an a hʊr kan heerzar kɩ, bala, arzakazaa gʊta m.
A m naa, Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a wer ta ʊ kʊ arzakazaa n gasʊ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ: Yoonde gasʊ huuka yaa ʊ zanta, an lɛ da arzakazaa gasʊ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ m.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə meerbaa naa do minto, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɩ nka n'a dam ma kɛɛrɛ an bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ?»
Yeezuu n dɩga ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ b'a dam ma y, bɩ, Woso a da hɔ haay ma.»
Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʊ: «Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to k'ʊ zu ɩbɩɩ ʊ, a nyɩntam wɔɔ ma lɔ?»

Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bʊr an nɩ nyɩntam a cirbəəduu paŋŋazaa bɩ ra durnya daa b'ʊ, awɔɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ k'a zu mɔɔ ʊ naa, awɔɔ nyɩntam sɔ duuro ra kan mɔɔ kɩ k'ʊ Israyɛl do bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ ka.
Bɩ, gʊaa haay k'a gʊ a harlɔ ma, gɛɛ a danyɩnɔ ma, a danlʊrɔ ma gɛɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, a nyɩnɔ ma, a hɔsɩrarɔ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a nawɔnnɔ haay yɩm gallɛm zɔrɔ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ gʊta nyɩntam jɛzannɔ, jɛzannɔ gʊta n nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛzannɔ.»
«Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʊ rɛ kan gʊaa k'a wuti dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, k'a gʊɔɔ sa a dɩvɛnsɩra zibəə ma bɩ kɩ.
A n lɛ sa kan zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ k'a *deniyee deem ka ŋ ʊ hindeem zibəə busoo. A n ŋ nyɔɔ a hɔsɩra b'ʊ.
A n a ya, an a bɔ dɔgta wakatɩ nɛɛhʊ ma an gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm daasɩyaa ʊ, bɩ ŋ ba zibəə nɩ y.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹K'a ta mɔɔ hɔsɩra b'ʊ sɔ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ zibəə busoo k'a a ga m karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.›
Ŋ n ta hɔsɩra b'ʊ. A n a ya, an bɔ sinsebir ʊ kan yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʊ kɩ ma, an a ya, an a ba maam sɔ.
Yirbəə wakatɩ soor k'a a ku bɩ, a a ya, an bɔ, an gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm daasɩyaa b'ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹Bɔ m, awɔɔ n gɔɔta naa ʊ dɔgta m saa…, b'awɔɔ ba zibəə nɩ y?›
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: ‹Gɔsɩ n wɔɔ sa zibəə ma y.› A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹K'a ta mɔɔ hɔsɩra b'ʊ sɔ a yaa zi ba.›
Lɛɛ k'a bʊr k'a lihi bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zaa b'a hɩ a zibəədɩgamazaa bɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bir, ɩ ŋ busoo ka ŋ ʊ. A sɩŋŋɩda ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr jɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'ɩ nyambʊr lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma.›
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr yirbəə wakatɩ soor ma rɔ wɔɔ a zɔ, n nɩ deniyee deem-deem ka ŋ ʊ.
Lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a zɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, a y'a yɩrɛ an lɛ da. Bɩ, deniyee deem-deem ŋ y'a ka ŋ ʊ sɔ.
Busoo bɩ kʊ ŋ n'a sim bɩ, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam hɔsɩrazaa bɩ ma.
Ŋ ʊ: ‹Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro, bʊr ŋ y'a ʊ jɛ ʊ, ŋ n zi ba wakatɩ deem taan…, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩ busoo ka ŋ ʊ hɔdeem kan wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ zi wɔɔ ba, ʊ kɔ dɔgta m tee… woso n wɔ wɔɔ ʊ, am sɛ hɔ bɩ m!›
Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ n a hɩ ŋ gʊaa deem m, a ʊ: ‹M gʊaa, mɔɔ n tu ta ɩbɩɩ rɛ y, ɩbɩɩ n lɛ sa kan mɔɔ kɩ kʊ m deniyee deem ka ɩ ʊ hindeem zibəə busoo ra?
Ɩ zibəə busoo si k'ɩ hʊr. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ m busoo ka gʊaa k'a bʊr jɛ ʊ naa ʊ, amba mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m a ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ naa m.
Mɔɔ ba lɛ m kʊ m m hɔɔnhɔ ba m busoo m na? Gɛɛ nɔntaama n ta ɩbɩɩ m kʊ mɔɔ m mɩŋŋa bɩ minto ra!› »
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, jɛzannɔ yɩm lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ n yɩ jɛzannɔ.»
Yeezuu a hʊr, an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʊ. A n karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gaa a hɔ, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«K'a tʊr ka, ta kʊ wɔɔ nawʊm Zerizalɛm ʊ naa, bɩ n nɩ zɛm bɩ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊ ʊ, n n a ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʊ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ n a ka zɛ ma.
Ŋ y'a kam kɩfɩɩrɔ ʊ, brɔɔ n yaa wʊ ma, ŋn'a zɛ madɩr m, ŋn'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, b'a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, Woso y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.»
Zebedee nyɩnɔ da a zɔ Yeezuu ma kan a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an kukurə zɛ a taa, k'a hɔ yɛ han.
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩ lɛ n taa?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Lɛ ka kʊ mɔɔ nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm n bɩ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ. Deem ɩ bɩsɩ, deem ɩ jɩsa.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n hɔ k'a n'a yɛm bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a fɩryɩrɛ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ ra?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ʊ da ma.»

Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Fɩryɩrɛ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ. Bɩ, k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ jɩsa kan mɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ kɩ nyɩntarɛ nɩ, mɔɔ n m da ma, m zaa ka y, bala, mɔɔ n m so ŋ ʊ y. N zɛm bɩ ŋ ka gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩncɛrɔ wɔɔ banka ŋ minto rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ buro kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ nɔ ma ʊ kan danyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʊ: gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma kɩfɩɩrɔ wɔɔ, ŋ cinno ɩ paŋŋa barɛ ŋ ma, paŋŋazannɔ n n'a hɔɔnhɔ bam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ.
B'a n a ga m, an yɩ ncɩnaaʊ awɔɔ bire ʊ y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a yɩ jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bire ʊ, k'an a ba awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a yɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa awɔɔ bire ʊ, k'an a ba awɔɔ lɔ.
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n bʊr kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a hɔɔnhɔ ba y, bʊr a ʊ k'a b'a ba gʊɔɔ zibəənyɩ, k'a ga, kʊ gʊɔɔ gʊta n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.»
Bɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ Zeriko ʊ bɩ, gʊaa cir gʊta zu Yeezuu jɛ ʊ.
Bʊʊrɔ nyɩnta hɩɩya zaa bɩ lezi. Kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʊ: Yeezuu n nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʊ. «Karɩnsaamba, *Davɩd Nyɩ, wɔɔ cicir zɛ!»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ bʊgʊr barɛ ŋ ma, ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a tʊr ka, bɩ ŋ y'a banka ŋn'a da ra: «Karɩnsaamba, Davɩd Nyɩ, wɔɔ cicir zɛ!»
Yeezuu n jɩm, an ŋ bir, an ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m bɔ ba awɔɔ minto?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, a ka kʊ wɔɔ n lɛɛ yɩ.»
Yeezuu n ŋ cicir zɛ, an a wɔ da ŋ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ, ŋn'ɩ zum Yeezuu ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a zɔ Zerizalɛm ma, ŋn'a zɔ Bɛtfazee jɩr ʊ Oliviyee ci mim ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta kʊ k'a n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʊ. Awɔɔ brada yɩrɛ, n n a kʊsɩ kan a nyɩnnɩ kɩ, k'a hʊr a bʊr ŋ nɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa awɔɔ lar a hʊrlɛ zaa ma, k'a hɩ m a ʊ: Zuuba lɛ n taa. B'a yɩ ŋ tore ŋnɩ bʊr.»
Ba mim naa do ʊ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ hɔ k'a hɩ naa n kʊ yɩ. A ʊ:
K'a hɩ *Siyɔn zannɔ m, a ʊ:
K'a dɩga a cir k'a nɩ zɛrɛ a zi mɩŋŋazerle m,
an da bra ʊ, brapoo m, brada nyɩnnɩ m.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba.
Ŋ n bʊr brada bɩ m kan a nyɩnnɩ bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a huuro ka ŋ la, Yeezuu n da ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta n a huuro ka zaa bɩ ra, gɔsɩnnɔ n gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar ŋn'a ka zaa bɩ ra sɔ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu lɛɛ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a jɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«*Hozaana *Davɩd Nyɩ!
Gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ!
Woso n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ arzana ʊ!»
Yeezuu k'a gasʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, kʊ bɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋn'ɩ bɩrlɛ a mim ma, ŋn'ɩ laaka dam, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do nka nɩ?»
Zamaa bɩ n'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Yeezuu m, a to a ʊ Nazarɛtɩ ʊ, Galilee kʊ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n gasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ lam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ ra. A busoolʊrlɛzannɔ taabɩrlɔ hɩnhɩsɩga kan cirpʊnnɔ hɛɛnno nyɩntaragɔrɔ kɩ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «N n a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹N mɔɔ cɛ bɩ birm yaadarɛcɛ› ra? Awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a sa, a ba konno nyaakʊndajɩ!»
Bʊʊrɔ kan kusiməro kɩ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ an ŋ waa.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ heer n yɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ y, kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ an nɩ zi gʊta barɛ, kan nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zee dam Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Hozaana, Davɩd Nyɩ!»
Ŋ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ mam na?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩɩn…, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba fɩɩga Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ ka nyɩnɔ kan banfinnirɔ kɩ n n'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ› ra?»
A m bɩ, Yeezuu n ŋ to b'ʊ, an a hʊr an bɔ kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ, an ta Betanii ʊ dɔ n mɛ m b'ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a wusigə dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, an nɩ tam kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, nɔ a nyasʊ.
A n sɔɔn yɩ zaa bɩ lezi, an a zɔ ma b'a n hɔsɩ yɩ ma k'a lɛɛ bɛɛ bala y. A m bɩ, an a hɩ sɔɔn bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ ɩ nyɩ da dɔ y!» Lɛɛm bɩ, sɔɔn bɩ ga.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, ŋnɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʊ: «A a ba lɔ sɔɔn bɩ n ga lɛɛm ncɩnaaʊ?»
