Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: k'awɔɔ sɩra ka, bɩ bɩsɩkarɛ b'awɔɔ heer ʊ, awɔɔ mɔɔ zi kʊ mɔɔ ba sɔɔn naa do m bɩ bam. B'awɔɔ a da ma sɔ, a hɩ ci naa do m, a ʊ, ɩ bɔɔta naa ʊ, ɩ ɩ da higʊta ʊ. A bam maam.
K'awɔɔ sɩra ka, hɔ haay k'awɔɔ n n'a yɛm yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ haay bɩ, Woso yɩ ŋ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a gasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Lɛ kara ɩbɩɩ n ta m k'ɩ naa ba? Nka ɩ lɛ bɩ do ka ɩ b'ʊ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ m awɔɔ lar mim deem ma, deem bala, k'awɔɔ nyɩ bɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɔkarɛ, m lɛ kʊ mɔɔ n ta m bɩ jɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
Batɛm kʊ Zaan n n'a kam bɩ, a to a ʊ Woso zi gɛɛ, gʊɔɔ zi?» Ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ a to a ʊ Woso zi, a y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Bɔ minto m, wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʊ?
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ zi, wɔɔ ɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ kʊ ŋ Zaan dɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan… bɩ, ŋ bɩ yɛm kan ʊ kɩ y.»
A m naa, ŋn'a nyɩ bɔ Yeezuu nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ n a dɔ y.» Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ bɩ lɛ kʊ mɔɔ n ta m, m nɩ naa bam bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ y.»
«Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam mim naa do ma lɔ? Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta nyɩnɔ m hɩɩya. A n a hɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: ‹M nyɩnnɩ, ta her ɩ yaa zi ba mɔɔ *dɩvɛnsɩra ʊ.›
Nyɩ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ bɩ tarɛ y.› Maasɩrɛ k'a ba bɩ, a a hɔɔndarɛ lʊr an ta hɔsɩra b'ʊ.
Gʊaa bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ nyɩ vanta bɩ m maam sɔ. Nyɩ bɩ do ʊ: ‹Ɩɩn…, baaba,› b'a n ta y.

Nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro bire ʊ bɩ, nka y'a zɩ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ m». Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, yawʊrsinno kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa hɛɛnm nɔ kɩ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ.

Bala, Zaan-Batiisi bʊr awɔɔ zi, an zaa mɩŋŋa hɩnka awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a mim si y. Bɩ, yawʊrsinno kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa hɛɛnm nɔ kɩ a mim si. Awɔɔ naa yɩ, b'awɔɔ gɔɔta awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam k'a mim si y.»

«K'a tʊr ka hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom vanta ma: Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta, an dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn, an lambaar da ma, an yaa hɔn, k'a bɩr dɩvɛn bɩ hi bɔŋ ʊ, an bɛŋŋʊ dɔ sɔ k'a tɩr dɔ hɔsɩra bɩ ma. A n a sa, an a da gʊɔɔ wɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a zi ba, k'a b'a nyɔɔdʊ bɩ jir. A n a hʊr, an ta kʊ ʊ.
Dɩvɛn mɔsa k'a ku bɩ, an a zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɔsɩra bɩ zibənno wɔɔ zi, kʊ ŋ n'aa a hɔ si, ŋnɩ b'a ka a ʊ.
Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ŋ nyasʊ, ŋnɩ deem dundu, ŋnɩ deem zɛ gər, ŋnɩ deem bɩmba jaarɔ m, ŋn'a zɛ, an ga.
Hɔsɩrazaa bɩ n a ya, an zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ gʊta an lɛ da biisi bɩ m. Bɩ, zibənno wɔɔ a ya ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ba lɛɛkarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ba nawɔnnɔ m sɔ.
A nyarɛ ma bɩ, a nyɩyar a nyɔɔ, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ nyɩ m naa, ŋ y'a daŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, zibənno wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to ŋnɩ nyɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a dɩndam kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: ‹Naa n nɩ zɛm b'a so a zɩ arzaka b'ʊ. K'a bʊr, k'ʊ a zɛ, k'ʊ ʊ so arzaka b'ʊ!›
Ŋ n a nyasʊ, ŋnɩ bɔ m hɔsɩra b'ʊ, ŋn'a zɛ gər.»
Yeezuu n laaka da ŋ han, a ʊ: «Kʊ dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ bʊr, bɔ an n'a bam zibənno wɔɔ nɩ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «A gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro zɩnzɛm, a bɩ ŋ cicir zɛrɛ y, an hɔsɩra bɩ ka gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ ʊ ŋn'a zi ba, ŋn'a hɔ ka ʊ a dɔmɩm ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n hɔ kʊ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ karɩnda ba ra? A a hɩ, a ʊ:
Jaa kʊ cɛdonno wɔɔ a zo bɩ
y'a ba cɛ bɩ jɩr jaa paŋŋazaa.
Hɔ kʊ Zuuba a ba bɩ n naa do,
wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔ mɩŋŋa gʊta.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, n Woso cirbəə bɩ yɔrɛ awɔɔ m, n n a ka do vanta ʊ an cirbəə bɩ zibəə k'a a ga m bɩ ba. [
Kʊ gʊaa a do jaa naa do ra, a hɩsɩga dam, bɩ kʊ jaa b'a da gʊaa ra a gʊaa bɩ do hɔɔnsɩrɛ.]»
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ kʊ ŋ Yeezuu hɔbɔkʊrɛnoonno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ, ŋ y'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a hɩ a nawʊrɛ a ma.
Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʊ, bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m, bala, zamaa b'ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa.
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Woso cirbəə bɔ kʊ rɛ kan cir k'a a nyɩnnɩ lʊsarɛ cibsa ba kɩ.
A n a zibəənyɩnɔ nyɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'aa gʊɔɔ k'a hɩ ŋ nɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ cibsa bɩ rɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋ ʊ, a bɩ zɛrɛ y.

A n a ya, an zibəənyɩnɔ vantɔɔ nyɔɔ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹K'a yaa hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ bir cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: mɔɔ cibsa bɩ banka m a nya, mɔɔ m dono zɩnzɛ kan m hɔbɩsɩrɔ gʊtɔɔ kɩ, hɔ haay banka, k'a bʊr cibsa bɩ ma kɛɛrɛ.›
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n dɩga cibsa birle bɩ ma hɔsɩ y, ŋn'a hʊr ŋnɩ ta a zibəəjɩrɔ ʊ, naa n ta hɔsɩra ʊ, naa n ta daasɩ ʊ mɔdrɔ hɛɛjɩ ʊ.
Ŋ n gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋnɩ nyannɩ da ŋ ma, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Cir bɩ nɔ n ma ʊ, an sʊrdaarɔ nyɔɔ ŋn'aa gərzenno nɔɔn duro zɩnzɛ, ŋnɩ sɛ da ŋ kʊ bɩ ma.
A m naa, an a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ m, a ʊ: ‹Cibsa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bankarɛ nya, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a ga kʊ ʊ ba y.
K'a ta zaazɛkʊrarɔ wɔɔ ra, kʊ nka awɔɔ yɩ, k'a hɩ m k'an bʊr cibsa bɩ ma.›
A zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʊr, ŋnɩ zaarɔ sa ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, kan gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kɩ. Gʊɔɔ n cɛ kʊ n nɩ cibsa bɩ baŋ ʊ bɩ han.
Cir bɩ gasʊ k'a dɩga gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an a to, an gʊaa yɩ, gʊaa bɩ do n harcɩntarɛ cibsa huu du a ma y.
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ ɩ gasʊ naa ʊ, b'ɩbɩɩ ba harcɩntarɛ cibsa huu nɩ?› Bɩ gʊaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ y.
A m bɩ, cir bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹K'a gannɔ kan a wɔrɔ kɩ kʊsɩ a zo garga ra, monsigə ʊ. Lɛɛ bɩ do an nɩ nyi kaŋ ʊ, an a sɔ sʊ.› »
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «N gʊɔɔ bir gʊta, bɩ, n nɩ ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ poore.»
Naa jɛ ʊ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ ta, ŋn'aa a so kʊ ma, k'a a ka zaa k'a nɩ Yeezuu nyasʊm ma a meerbaa nɔ ʊ bɩ dɔ.

Ŋ n a karɩndanyɩnɔ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ jɛzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu zi, kʊ ŋ n'aa hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ sɩra ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm, Woso zaa ɩbɩɩ n'a dɩndam sɩra bɩncɛ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyi bam gʊɔɔ nɩ y, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩr gʊɔɔ nyʊkɔŋ ʊ sɔ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ hɩ wɔɔ m, wɔɔ lɛ bɩ zaa ka k'ʊ Rɔm cir yawʊr ka ʊ gɛɛ, ʊ b'a ka ʊ gɛ?»
Bɩ, kʊ Yeezuu ŋ zambʊ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zambʊzannɔ! Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ makra barɛ?
K'a busoo kʊ n nɩ Rɔm cir yawʊr kam nɩ bɩ hɩnka m m.» Ŋ n deniyee deem hɩnka m.
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Gʊaa mim kʊ n y'a da ʊ naa kan gʊrsɩra naa do kɩ, nka hɔɔ nɩ?»
Ŋ ʊ: «Rɔm cir hɔɔ m.» A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a maam k'a hɔ kʊ Rɔm cir hɔ m bɩ ka ʊ, k'a hɔ kʊ Woso hɔ m bɩ ka ʊ sɔ.»
Meerbaa naa do a ka ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hʊr, ŋnɩ Yeezuu to.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, sadisɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʊr Yeezuu zi. Bala, sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ b'a ʊ y. Ŋ n laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʊ:
«Karɩnsaamba, Moyiisi a gʊrsɩra ba an a ka wɔɔ ʊ, a ʊ, kʊ gʊaa cɛmba ta ʊ, an ga an a lʊ to, b'a nyɩ ba ʊ y, k'a dam n lʊ bɩ si, k'an nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ a cɛmba bɩ minto.
A n bɔkarɛ, danyɩnɔ ɩ nyɩnta saanhɩna wɔɔ bire ʊ, lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʊ sa an ga, b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan lʊ bɩ kɩ y.
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʊ bɩ si, an ga, an lʊ bɩ to b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y. A kaakʊ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ, saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ gɩnga bɩ ŋ n nyɩ yɩ kan lʊ bɩ kɩ y.
Ŋ haay kur bɩ, lʊ bɩ n ga sɔ.
Gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, kʊ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ, nka y'a so lʊ b'ʊ ŋ bireyaa ʊ? Bala, gʊɔɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay lʊ bɩ si.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ n gʊrsɩra mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ dɔ kan Woso paŋŋa kɩ bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ n'a nyʊnnyɔɔm.
Bala, gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, yar bɩr lʊ sarɛ y, lʊ bɩr yar sarɛ y, bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan malɛɛkarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, kʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ mim nɩ, awɔɔ n hɔ kʊ Woso a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ karɩnda ba ra? A a hɩ, a ʊ:
‹Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.› Gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, gʊɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m.»
Yeezuu hɔdɩndarɛ naa do cem zamaa bɩ hɔɔndarɛ han.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu a ka sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a ya ŋnɩ meer ba bɩ, ŋ y'a so kʊ ma.
Ŋ gʊaa deem kʊ wosocikarɩnsaamba gʊta m bɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, k'a makra ba.
A ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay bire ʊ, kara ɩ lɛ da?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: « ‹K'ɩ Zuuba Woso ŋʊa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay.›
Lɛ k'a lɛ da, a m lɛ gʊta bɩ m naa do.
Lɛ hɩɩya hɔ k'a gʊtabaa lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ ku bɩ m naa do: ‹K'ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.›
Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kɩ haay məsi m lɛrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔn duro m.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a so kʊ ma bɩ, Yeezuu laaka da ŋ han, a ʊ:
«Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam Krista ma lʊnlɔ? Nka nyɩ nɩ?» Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «*Davɩd Nyɩ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «B'a yɩ lɔ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ka Davɩd n a bir a Zuuba? Bala, Davɩd b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ zuuba m,
a ʊ: nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʊ,
kʊ m tolle ba m a ka, k'ɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ɩ gam taa.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ Davɩd y'a birm a Zuuba, yɩ an nawʊm lɔ kɛɛrɛ kʊ Krista n yɩ *Davɩd Nyɩ?»
Gɔsɩ n a da ma, an a nyɩ bɔ nʊ y. Hinni bɩ do tɛkka ma, gʊaa ba ʊ dɔ, a heer n kookoo k'a lar mim ma y.
Yeezuu a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ meer bam kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
«Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋn'a hɩnkam gʊɔɔ m.
Bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a sɩra ka ŋ ʊ, a hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m haay bɩ ba, b'a bɩ zu ŋ zibəə ʊ y. Bala, ŋ bɩr hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a dɩndam gʊɔɔ m bɩ barɛ y.
Ŋ tɩr mɔr gorezaa kʊsɩ ŋn'a ka gʊaa mee, bɩ ŋ bɩr a wɔ dam ma k'a a da a zaa han, an a busu y.
Ziro kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam haay rɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ nawʊm kʊ gʊɔɔ m dɩga a ma, bɩ y'a ka, Wosoci lemim kʊ ŋ tɩr a kʊsɩ a tusə ma gɛɛ a za ma bɩ ba ŋ tɩr a ʊ jintə, ŋ tɩr pɛɛra lensəzannɔ dɔ a huuro rɛ, k'an bɩr yɩm.
Lɛɛ mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋ tɩr a ka ma cibsarɔ bɩncɛ ʊ, sokʊma bɩncɛ ʊ, lɛɛ wɩsɩ ŋ tɩr a kam ma.
A ŋʊa ŋ tɩr a ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr yaa darɛ a m mɩŋŋa gʊɔɔ gaa ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n bɩr a birm karɩnsaamba.
B'awɔɔ, a bɩ yɛ kʊ n n'a bir karɩnsaamba y, bala, danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m haay, awɔɔ karɩnsaamba bɩ deem.
A bɩ gɔsɩ bir tara burə ʊ a ʊ, a Zɩ y, bala, awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ deem, an nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ.
A b'a ka ma kʊ n n'a bir jɩtaarɛ y. Bala, awɔɔ jɩtaarɛ bɩ deem, Krista m.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ da awɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ, k'an yɩ awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa a mɩŋŋa busu, Woso y'a zerm. Kʊ gʊaa a mɩŋŋa zer, Woso y'a busum.»

«Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ lɛ tam kʊ gʊɔɔ bɩ gasʊ y. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr gasʊrɛ y, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a gasʊ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩr brɔɔ tore ŋn'ɩ gasʊrɛ y.

Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ awɔɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ zonno hɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, a a ya, a gaa, an nɩ yaa jintoo dam kʊ n n'a hɩ a ma gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ. Naa minto m, awɔɔ hʊnhʊrlɛ n nɩ yɩm maam-maam.]

Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ tam kʊrɔ ʊ tara burə ʊ kan kɔɔlʊʊ nɔ ʊ kɩ an n'a kam gʊaa deem taan… ma k'an zu awɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, bɩ k'awɔɔ ku b'awɔɔ ka an yɩ sɛhar gʊaa gallɛm hɩɩya an lɛ da awɔɔ m.
Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ k'an bʊʊrɔ, an nɩ zaa hɩnkam gʊɔɔ m, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Kʊ gʊaa ler bɔ Wosocɛ bɩ tɔ ma hɔsɩ bɛɛ nɩ y, bɩ k'a ler bɔ Wosocɛ bɩ sarma bɩ tɔ ma pakra m k'an hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ ba.›
Hɔɔnwarzannɔ, bʊʊrɔ n'awɔɔ m! Kara ɩ lɛ da a mim nɩ? Sarma bɩ m gɛɛ, Wosocɛ k'a ka sarma bɩ nɩ yɩm Woso hɔ bɩ nɩ?
Awɔɔ a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Kʊ gʊaa ler bɔ mannɩduu ma hɔsɩ bɛɛ y, bɩ k'a ler bɔ mannɩhɔ k'a n'a burə ʊ bɩ ma, pakra m k'an hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ ba.›
Bʊʊrɔ n'awɔɔ m! Kara ɩ lɛ da? Mannɩhɔ bɩ n gɛɛ, mannɩduu k'a nɩ mannɩhɔ bɩ kam Woso ʊ bɩ nɩ?
Gʊaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm mannɩduu bɩ ma bɩ, ler bɔ a nawʊm duu bɩ ma, kan hɔ niŋŋə haay k'a nɩ duu bɩ burə ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm Wosocɛ bɩ ma bɩ, ler bɔ a nawʊm Wosocɛ bɩ ma, kan Woso k'a nɩ cɛ b'ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ ler bɔm arzana ma, ler bɔ a nawʊm Woso duu bɩ ma kan Woso mɩŋŋa k'a nyɩnta ra bɩ kɩ.

Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ dʊlɛɛrɔ bu hɔ ganwʊrɛ bɔŋ ʊ an n'a kam Woso ʊ, a bɔkarɛ, a hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ to, amba: Tɩrgabaa, mɩŋŋabaa, kan sɩrabarɛ kɩ, nawɔnnɔ awɔɔ a ga m, a ŋ ba, a ŋ gɔɔtarɔ wɔɔ ba sɔ.
Awɔɔ k'an bʊʊrɔ, an nɩ zaa hɩnkam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɔ mire sʊrm k'a mɛɛm bɔ ʊ, b'awɔɔ ɩ yoonde monɩm.

Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔmihɔ kan hɔbɩrɛ mɔr burə kɩ sʊrgɔm, k'a dintim gʊ ŋ ma. Bɩ, ŋ nɔ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ koorbaa zibəə kan a hɔɔndarɛ bʊnyaarɔ kɩ yɩ ŋ han.
Farizɛn, bʊʊ n'ɩbɩɩ m, lɛɛ ka ɩ hɔmihɔ bɩ nɔ sʊrgɔ, a burə bɩ hu bɔm sɔ.
Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, bɔ awɔɔ ʊ kʊ rɛ kan gəənoyaarɔ huro kɩ, ŋ burə gʊɛrɛ n ta ʊ, an bɔkarɛ, ŋ nɔ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, yaarɔ kan hɔɔ vənno do haay kɩ yɩ ŋ han.
Awɔɔ do m bɩ, gʊɔɔ ɩ dɩgarɛ a ma gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, an bɔkarɛ zambʊ kan bʊnyaabaa kɩ y'awɔɔ heer han.»
«Kʊsɩ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ zambʊzannɔ kɩ, gəənoyaarɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bankam mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ minto, gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ yaarɔ gʊɛrɛ dam ma.
A bɔkarɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta ʊ yaabɔɔ dɔmɩm ʊ, wɔɔ b'ʊ zɛm kʊ ra kan ŋ kɩ, ʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ y.›
Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ kasɛtɩ karɛ a ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m.
K'a maam, k'a a tʊntɔ ʊ, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ yaabɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda ba bɩ nyambʊr.
Mɩnnɔ, cɩrkarɔ do n'awɔɔ m! Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ, k'a a da ma, a a si Woso k'awɔɔ dʊdɔ yar, an awɔɔ da sɛhar ʊ bɩ lɛɛ?
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ, hɔɔnzannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ zi. Awɔɔ nɔɔn zɩnzɛm, a gɔsɩnnɔ wɔ gɔdarkʊrarɔ ma, awɔɔ nɔɔn zɛm madɩɩrɔ m a sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ, a fɩr ka ŋ ma kʊrɔ ʊ.

Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ hʊnhʊrlɛ yɩm gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ minto, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa gʊaa tɩrga Abɛl zɛrɛ ma, an ta an aa Baraki nyɩ Zakarii k'awɔɔ zɛ Wosocɛ bɩ bɩncɛ paan… bɩ kan mannɩduu bɩ kɩ bire ʊ bɩ ma.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hʊnhʊrlɛ k'a a ga m gʊɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ naa do minto bɩ, her zamaana naa do n nɩ hʊnhʊrlɛ bɩ do yɩm.»

«Zerizalɛm, Zerizalɛm, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɩnzɛm, ɩ nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ nyɔɔ ɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩmbam jaarɔ m bɩ! Mɔɔ gallɛm karɔ m a ŋʊa kʊ m ɩ ɩ zamaa so kʊ ma m taa amba kʊrda tɩr a nyɩnɔ so kʊ ma a zarɔ taa bɩ m, b'awɔɔ n yɛ!
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, ‹N y'a bɔrɛ awɔɔ cɛ b'ʊ.›
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: an a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y, k'awɔɔ m b'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Barka ɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ mim ʊ!› »
Yeezuu k'a bɔ Wosocɛ b'ʊ k'a a hʊr bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma ŋn'ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ dɔrɛ mim hɩm nɩ.
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Naa k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm haay naa, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: jaa deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim burə ʊ y. Ŋ haay zɛm bɩ wurgə.»
Yeezuu k'a nɩ nyɩntam Oliviyee ci mim ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ a zɔ ma a minto, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «A hɩ wɔɔ m, ba naa do nawʊm brɔ? Makra kara n n'ɩbɩɩ zɛrɛ hɩnkarɛ kan durnya nyarɛ kɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi kʊ gɔsɩ b'awɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ y.
Bala, gʊɔɔ zɛm gʊta, ŋnɩ meer ba mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ m Krista,› bɩ ŋ gʊɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔm gʊta.
Awɔɔ yarbarɛ mim mam, kan yarbarɛ k'a n'a dam ma an bɩ wuti bɩ mim kɩ, a bɩ dabɔʊ ba y. Bala, pakra m, kʊ naa haay n ba, bɩ durnya bɩ nyarɛ bɛɛ m cɩna y.
Do deem gʊɔɔ wutire ŋnɩ yar ba kan do vanta kɩ, tara deem zannɔ wutire ŋnɩ yar ba kan tara vanta zannɔ kɩ, nɔ nyɩntam kʊrɔ ʊ, bɩncɛrɔ niŋŋoo nyiŋŋəm.
Naa do haay bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ rɛ kan lʊ nyɩ yɩrɛ fɩryɩrɛ sɩŋŋɩda kɩ.
Bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gʊrm, ŋnɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma, ŋn'a zɩnzɛ. Doro haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ minto.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ gʊɔɔ gʊta sɩrakarɛ tom, ŋnɩ ŋʊaar ba kʊ m, ŋnɩ sɔ kʊ m.
Ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɛm gʊta ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ gʊta nyʊnnyɔɔ.
Mimbʊnyaa pasɩm gʊta, an a ka gʊaa cir gʊta ŋʊarɛ n nyɔɔ.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nyasʊ a sɩrakarɛ m kaŋŋɩda an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku bɩ, bɩ zaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Ŋ Woso lemim nyɩnta naa do pa dam durnya haay nɔ ʊ, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ, doro minto. Naa jɛ, durnya nyarɛ n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ.»
«K'awɔɔ bɩ ‹Gʊaa kʊ hɔzaarbarɛzaa bʊnyaa m bɩ yɩ›, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Danɩyɛl n a hɩ ma bɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam lɛɛ mɩŋŋa kʊ Woso bɩncɛ m, b'a n a ga nɩ y, gʊaa k'a nɩ karɩnda bam bɩ, k'a n'a jɩ ma mɩŋŋa.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʊ bɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a si, ŋnɩ ta ciro ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a n'a cɛ mim ʊ bɩ, a b'a ka zerle ma k'a gasʊ a cɛ ʊ a hɔsɩ sa y.
Gʊaa k'a n'a hɔsɩra ʊ sɔ bɩ, a bɩ doo k'a yaa a huu sa y.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, a yɩm kʊsɩ lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ wɔɔ ma, kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
K'a yaa da Woso m k'awɔɔ sire bɩ bɩ nyɩnta la barɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ gɛɛ, *sabaa hinni ʊ y.
Bala, a nyɩntam fɩryɩrɛ gʊta dɔmɩnnɔ an lɛ da fɩryɩrɛ haay ra, an a sa durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma an naa ma ku, naa lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʊ y, b'a bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ fɩɩga y.
Kʊ Woso bɛɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro bɔrɛ, gɔsɩ bɩ larɛ y. Bɩ, a ŋ bɔrɛ a gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto.
Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʊ: Krista ɩ naa ʊ, gɛɛ, a ɩ bra ʊ, a b'a si y.
Bala, kristarɔ ŋʊaarzannɔ kan ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ gʊta. Ŋ hoserlo bam kan makrarɔ kɩ, k'an yɩ ʊ, a a da ma, a gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ.
K'a tʊr ka mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ ser ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m.
Kʊ n b'a hɩ awɔɔ m, n ʊ, k'a dɩga, a ɩ poo ʊ, a bɩ ta y, gɛɛ kʊ n y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, n ʊ, a a nyaakʊm da naa ʊ, a b'a si y.
Amba brama tɩr nyakɩ bɔ dɔjɩr ʊ an ta meer ʊ bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛm maam sɔ.
Lɛɛ kʊ hɔgər n ta ʊ bɩ, gɔbɩrgʊrɔ n n'a som kʊ ma ʊ.»
«Kʊ fɩr gʊta dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ cem,
woso bɩ gum dɔ y,
mom bɩ gum sɔ y,
monyaarɔ surm,
brama hɔɔpaŋŋazannɔ haay nyiŋŋəm.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ makra y'a hɩnkam brama. ‹Do haay n nyi ka. Ŋ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an a to brama warkʊ mim ʊ› kan paŋŋa kɩ, lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊta nɔ ʊ.
‹Ŋ hir gʊta bɩ hɛm, an a malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ durnya gʊrga siro wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, an a sa durnya lɛ ma an ta a cɩntarɛ ma.› »
«K'a makra sa sɔɔn ma: k'awɔɔ b'a yɩ, an lɛɛ daa da, a lɛɛ nɩ kure, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, siire a zɔ.
A maam sɔ, k'awɔɔ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro yɩ, k'a dɔ a ʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ a zɔ, bɩ, yɩ an nawʊm maam sɔ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zamaana naa do bɩ cenim, kʊ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ cenle y.»
«A n ta ʊ bɩ, gɔsɩ n dɔmɩm bɩ do kan a wakatɩ kɩ dɔ y. Baa, malɛɛkarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y, Nyɩ bɩ n a dɔ sɔ y. Zɩ bɩ y'a dɔ a deem.
Hɔ k'a ba Nowee
dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ sɔ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ.

Kʊ sɩra nɩ, an lɛɛ ka kʊ hi m durnya bɩ Nowee dɔmɩm b'ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ lʊ kam cɛ ʊ, ŋn'a nyɩnɔ kam gʊɔɔ ʊ ŋnɩ ŋ kam cɛ ʊ, an ta an aa dɔmɩm kʊ Nowee gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ bɩ ku.
Ŋ n a zu a ʊ, ŋ n a dɔ ŋ ʊ hɔsɩ ɩ barɛ y, hi bɩ n tolle ba an bɩ cem ŋ nɩ haay. A yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ.
Kʊ gʊaa hɩɩya ɩ hɔsɩra ʊ: n deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.
Kʊ lannɔ hɩɩya ŋn'ɩ jaa lɔm, n deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.
Naa minto bɩ, a b'a zu a ʊ y, bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ bɩ dɔ y.
K'a mim naa do jɩ ma mɩŋŋa. Kʊ harzaa b'a dɔ a ʊ, koor bɩ zɛm gunuu wakatɩ naa do ma, a bɩ hinceem barɛ y, a bɩ koor bɩ tore an gasʊ a cɛ b'ʊ y.
Bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ sɔ k'a a banka, bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛm wakatɩ k'awɔɔ bɩr a hɔɔn dam ma b'ʊ y.»
«Zibəənyɩ kara n mɩŋŋa, a hɔɔn n ta ʊ? Zibəənyɩ lɛɛzaa zibəə ka ʊ, a ʊ, an dɩga zibəənyɩnɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa k'a nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ kaŋ ʊ a dɔmɩm ʊ.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ do nyɩntam mimbirenyɩntazaa, k'a lɛɛzaa b'a wusigə an bʊr har ʊ, an b'a ku an nɩ zibəə k'a ka ʊ bɩ barɛ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lɛɛzaa bɩ y'a kam an yɩ a har bɩ haay arzaka dɔmazaa.
Bɩ, kʊ zibəənyɩ bʊnyaa m, a y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʊ, a ʊ, mɔɔ Zuuba maasɩrɛ ba a bɩr zɛrɛ y.
A n wuti, an a muno wɔɔ zɛ, an hɔ bɩ, an bɛɛ mi kan bɛɛminno kɩ.
B'a Zuuba bɩ zɛm dɔmɩm kʊ zibəənyɩ bɩ bɩr dɔm ma b'ʊ, kan wakatɩ k'a n a dɔ bɩ kɩ ʊ.
A zibəənyɩ bɩ hʊnhʊrm mɩŋŋa, an zambʊzannɔ fɩryɩrɛ ka ma, bɩncɛ niŋŋə k'a nɩ nyi kaŋ ʊ, an a sɔ sʊ ʊ b'ʊ.»
«Woso cirbəə bɩ bɔ kʊ rɛ kan nyɩmbɔnnɔ buro kʊ ŋ y'a fɩtɩrɛrɔ gʊr, ŋnɩ bɔ k'a yaa n'a zim zɛ ʊ kɩ.
Soor hɔɔn ɩ ba ʊ y, soor hɔɔn n ta ʊ.
Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n a fɩtɩrɛrɔ gʊr, bɩ ŋ n nyɔɔ tɔ mɔr ʊ, ŋn'a sa y.
Bɩ, ŋ hɔɔn n ta ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ nyɔɔ tɔ mɔdrɔ ʊ ŋn'a na a fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, zim bɩ bɔkarɛ an maasɩrɛ ba a bɩr zɛrɛ y. Hinceem n nyɩmbɔnnɔ bu rɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋnɩ hinceem ba.
Gunuu wakatɩ bueerehɩɩya k'a b'a ku bɩ, zee n bɔ, a ʊ: ‹Zim bɩ ba n nɩ! K'a bɔ a yaa a zɛ ʊ!›
A m naa, nyɩmbɔnnɔ bu rɔ wɔɔ n gu, ŋn'a fɩtɩrɛrɔ bankarɛ.
Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm, ŋ ʊ: ‹K'a nyɔɔ bɩ ka wɔɔ ʊ poore, bala, wɔɔ fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ lihim.›
Ŋ hɔɔn ta ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: ‹Ayy…, bala, a bɩ gʊta y, a bɩ wɔɔ bɔm kan awɔɔ kɩ y. K'a ta a yaa n a hɔ si a hɛɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ zi.›

Ŋ hɔɔn ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n ta k'a yaa nyɔɔ bɩ si, a hʊr kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ bɩ, zim bɩ gɔɔta an bʊr ŋ jɛ ʊ, nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʊ ŋ y'a banka rɔ wɔɔ n gasʊ kan kɩ harcɩntarɛ cibsa cɛ ʊ b'ʊ, n nɩ cɛlɛ bɩ gaa, n n a ta a nyɩ m.
Maasɩrɛ k'a ba bɩ, nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ bʊr, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ: ‹Karɩnsaamba, karɩnsaamba, cɛ bɩ gʊ wɔɔ m!›
Bɩ, b'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: ‹Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ n awɔɔ dɔ y.› »
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «A bɩ hinceem ba y, bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm bɩ kan wakatɩ bɩ kɩ dɔ y.»
«Woso cirbəə b'a ya, an bɔ kʊ rɛ kan gʊaa k'a n'a ŋʊam k'a ta kʊ ʊ, an a zibəənyɩnɔ bir, an a arzaka ka ŋ ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔ ma bɩ kɩ.
A n talan
soor ka deem ʊ, an talan hɩɩya ka naa do ʊ, an talan deem ka a vanta ʊ. Gʊaa biyəə n n'a dam ma an zi ba m b'a ka ʊ, an bɔkarɛ, an cem.
Gʊaa k'a talan soor bɩ yɩ bɩ n ta an ter ba m, an talan soor vanta yɩ an a na ma.
Gʊaa k'a talan hɩɩya yɩ bɩ n ta an ter ba m sɔ, an talan hɩɩya yɩ an a na ma.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a talan deem yɩ bɩ, ta a ʊ, an aa yaa hɔn, an a zuuba bɩ busoo nyaakʊm da ʊ.
Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ zuuba bɩ, k'a ta tee… bɩ, a a bɔ an bʊr, an n'a busoo bɩ mim laaka darɛ ŋ han.
Gʊaa k'a talan soor yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an talan soor k'a yɩ an a na ma bɩ hɩnka, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, talan soor ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ hɔɔ, talan soor vanta ba mɔɔ yɩ na.›
A zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga n'ɩbɩɩ m, a mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ sɩra zi ba hɔ poore nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ hɔ gʊta zibəə karɛ ɩ ʊ, bʊr ɩ heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.›
Zibəənyɩ k'a talan hɩɩya yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Talan hɩɩya ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ, talan hɩɩya vanta ba mɔɔ yɩ na.›
A zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ sɩra zi ba hɔ poore nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ hɔ gʊta zibəə karɛ ɩ ʊ, bʊr ɩ heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.›
Zibəənyɩ k'a talan deem yɩ bɩ n a zɔ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ gʊaa kʊsɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, lɛɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ duu ʊ bɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ daŋ ʊ, lɛɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ sɔɔn ʊ bɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ saŋ ʊ.
Nyibəə mɔɔ nyasʊ, mɔɔ n ta m aa ɩ busoo bɩ biitə tara ʊ, dɩga, ɩ busoo bɩ ba n nɩ.›
A zuuba bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: ‹Zibəənyɩ bʊnyaa yakʊzaa ra! Ɩbɩɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ hɔ dam lɛɛ kʊ mɔɔ n hɔ duu ʊ, m nɩ hɔ sam lɛɛ kʊ mɔɔ n hɔ sɔɔn ʊ.
A dɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ʊ maam bɩ, mɔɔ busoo bɩ cɩnta ɩbɩɩ nawʊm busoocɩntarɛcɛ ʊ, mɔɔ wusigəre ma, mɔɔ yɩ m busoo bɩ sam kan nyɔɔdʊ kɩ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a busoo talan deem k'an ta m bɩ yɔm, a ka talan bu zaa b'ʊ.
Bala, gʊaa k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a kam bɩ zaa ʊ, an a na ma, a hɔ m yɩ gʊta. Bɩ gʊaa k'a bam bɩ, baa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ, n bɩ yɔm nɩ.
Bɩ, k'a zibəənyɩ hɔ vam naa do zo garga ra monsigə ʊ. Lɛɛ bɩ do an nɩ baa daŋ ʊ, an a sɔ sʊ.› »
«Kʊ Gʊaanyɩ bʊr a cirbəə nɔ ʊ kan malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a nyɩntam a cirbəəduu paŋŋazaa bɩ ra.
Durnya kʊrɔ haay gʊɔɔ y'a som kʊ ma a lɛɛ, an gʊɔɔ gʊngʊ a hɔ, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor tɩr seero gʊ biiro ma bɩ m.
A seero wɔɔ nyɔɔrɛ a bɩsɩ, an biiro wɔɔ nyɔɔ a jɩsa.
Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a bɩsɩ ra zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹Awɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ barka n nɩ kan a kɩ bɩ, k'a bʊr, a cirbəə kʊ Woso a banka awɔɔ minto durnya darɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ si.
Bala, nɔ mɔɔ zɛ, awɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ, mɩsɩ mɔɔ zɛ, awɔɔ n hi ka mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ bʊr awɔɔ zi saana, awɔɔ mɔɔ si a har ʊ,
mɔɔ nyɩnta dɩgɩ, awɔɔ n huu du mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n nyɩnta laafɩɩ y, awɔɔ bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, awɔɔ m bʊr mɔɔ zi b'ʊ.›
Meerbaa naa do jɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: ‹Zuuba, wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ nɔ n'ɩbɩɩ zɛrɛ, ʊ hɔbɩrɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ, gɛɛ mɩsɩ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, ʊ hi ka ɩ ʊ?
Wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ saana, ʊ ɩbɩɩ si ʊ har ʊ, gɛɛ ɩbɩɩ n dɩgɩ, ʊ huu du ɩ ma?
Wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ ɩ nɩ yaaba m, gɛɛ ɩ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, ʊ ta, ʊ aa dɩga ɩ ma?›
Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hɔɔ nɔɔn duro k'awɔɔ n n'a bam gʊɔɔ poorero nɔɔn gʊaa deem m bɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩ, a ba awɔɔ nawʊm mɔɔ m.›
Naa jɛ ʊ, a y'a hɩm jɩsa ra zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹K'a jɩ bɔ mɔɔ ma a ta laatʊ, awɔɔ kʊ Woso lerbɔrɛ bʊnyaa n'a jɛ ʊ, k'a ta sɛ k'a lihire ba ʊ, n n a banka Sʊtaana kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ minto b'ʊ.
Bala, nɔ mɔɔ zɛ, b'awɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ y, mɩsɩ mɔɔ zɛ, b'awɔɔ n hi ka mɔɔ ʊ y,
mɔɔ nyɩnta saana, awɔɔ n mɔɔ si a har ʊ y, mɔɔ nyɩnta dɩgɩ, awɔɔ n huu du mɔɔ ma y, mɔɔ n nyɩnta laafɩɩ y, awɔɔ n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma y, mɔɔ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, awɔɔ n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma sɔ y.›
Brɔɔ y'a hɩm nɩ, ŋ ʊ: ‹Zuuba, wɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ brɔɔ nɔ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, mɩsɩ n'ɩ zɛrɛ, gɛɛ saana, ɩ n dɩgɩ, ɩ nɩ yaaba m, ɩ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, wɔɔ n dɩga ɩbɩɩ ma, k'ʊ da ɩ han?›
Cir bɩ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a ba gʊɔɔ poorero nɔɔn duro gʊaa deem m bɩ, awɔɔ n a ba mɔɔ m sɔ y.›
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a hʊrlɛ ŋnɩ ta hʊnhʊrlɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, bɩ gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ tam mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba haay bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ pakkɩ cibsa n zizer.
N Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊrɛ, n n a zɛ gɔdarkʊra ma.»
A m naa, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, kan kʊ bɩ gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ n a so kʊ ma wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ *Kayiifʊ har ʊ.
Ŋ n kʊ ma k'a Yeezuu nyasʊ hɔɔnkarɛ m, a zɛ gər.
Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Ʊ b'a nyasʊ cibsa bɩ bire ʊ y, kʊ m bɛɛ zɛkʊma nyɩntam zamaa bɩ bire ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a ta Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n n'a birm kusimə bɩ har ʊ, Betanii ʊ bɩ,
Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ bɩm bɩ, lʊ n a zɔ ma tidəər k'a lɛ n kʊsɩ m albatɩr jaa gedre ʊ, an a burgu Yeezuu mim la.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ nɔ n yɩ y, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ noonkahɔma n naa?
N y'a da ma, n nɩ tidəər naa do hɛɛ busoo gʊta ma, n n a ka ŋʊazannɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʊ, ŋ yɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ lʊ naa do heer kɔrɛ? Zibəə mɩŋŋa a a ba mɔɔ m naa.
Ŋʊazannɔ gɔɔtarɛ ŋnɩ bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ tee…, bɩ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ tee… y.
Tidəər naa do k'a a burgu mɔɔ ra naa, mɔɔ gər birle a a banka.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lɛɛ haay kʊ gʊɔɔ n nɩ lemim nyɩnta naa do dɩndaŋ ʊ durnya lɛɛ haay ʊ bɩ, ŋ lʊ naa do zi k'a a ba bɩ tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a dɩnda.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem bɩ ta wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi.
A n aa a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ, awɔɔ: «Bɔ hɔ awɔɔ n n'a kam mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ Yeezuu nyasʊ m a ka a ʊ?» Brɔɔ n wanzurfu busooyaa lɛ sa bukərku, ŋn'a ka ʊ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ʊ, Zidas y'a kam toore mɩŋŋa ma k'a Yeezuu nyasʊ a ka ŋ ʊ.
Bur kʊ n nɩ nyʊnyɔɔ da ʊ cibsa lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bʊr Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʊ aa pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ banka lɛɛ kara ʊ ɩbɩɩ minto?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «K'a ta kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ niŋŋəzaa naa zi, a hɩ m, a ʊ: Karɩnsaamba ʊ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm a zɔ, ɩbɩɩ har mɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ bɩ bɩŋ ʊ kan ŋ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu nyɩnta k'a hɔ bɩ kan bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kʊ ŋ n'a bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʊaa deem mɔɔ nyasʊrɛ, an mɔɔ ka.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ heer n a zar, ŋn'ɩ laaka dam han deem-deem, ŋ ʊ: «Yɩ a nawʊm mɔɔ ra, Zuuba?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a a wɔ nyɔɔ laaga b'ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɩ m.
Gʊaanyɩ bɩ garɛ amba hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gʊrsɩra ba a tɔ ma bɩ m, bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊm k'a ka bɩ kʊsɩ yɩrɛ. Kʊ gʊaa bɩ do ɩ nɩ yɩ, a jɩra m.»
Zidas k'a nɩ zɛm b'a nyasʊ an a ka bɩ n a lar, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ m gɛɛ karɩnsaamba?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩ ɩ zi m.»
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kʊ ŋ n'a bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu bur sa an barka da Woso m, an a zɩnzɛ ra, an bɔkarɛ an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a si a bɩ, naa do naa mɔɔ mɛ m.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, an hɔmire sa, an barka da Woso m, an bɔkarɛ an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ haay k'a mi.
Bala, mɔɔ ma n naa, gʊaasɩbabaa ma m, an a lo gʊɔɔ ciiro minto, mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn daa mi dʊntɔ y, an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n a mim kan awɔɔ kɩ m Zɩ cirbəə nɔ ʊ bɩ ku.»
Kʊ ŋ cibsa bɩ laarɔ lɔ ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a hʊr ŋnɩ ta Oliviyee ci ra.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Gum naa do ʊ bala, awɔɔ haay y'a sɩrakarɛ tom mɔɔ minto, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ seero dundor bɩ zɛm, seero wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.›
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩm bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Baa kʊ nawɔnnɔ haay a sɩrakarɛ to, mɔɔ bɩ m sɩrakarɛ tore y.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Gum naa do ʊ bala, an lɛɛ ka koo baadarɛ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʊ ɩ ʊ, ɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Baa kʊ ga mɔɔ nawʊm kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bɩ m. Mɔɔ bɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y.» A muno wɔɔ haay n a hɩ maam sɔ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ kʊ n n'a birm Gɛtsemanee ʊ b'ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a nyɩnta naa ʊ, kʊ m aa yaa da lɛɛ naa do ʊ kʊ m bʊr.»
A n Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zebedee nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Heerzar kan dabɔʊ kɩ gasʊ ʊ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ heer a zar an a zɔ zɛ ma, k'a gɔɔta naa ʊ, a bɩ hinceem ba y.»
A n ta lɛɛ poore, an a do an a meer ku tara ma, an nɩ yaa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, kʊ fɩryɩrɛ naa do y'a dam ma an a gʊ mɔɔ ma, k'ɩ gʊ m ma. Kan naa kɩ haay ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba.»
A n a wusigə, an bʊr karɩndanyɩnɔ kaakʊrɔ wɔɔ zi, a bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba. A n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, awɔɔ n a da a mɩŋŋa ma a jɩm wakatɩ deem nɔ ʊ tɔkkɛ kan mɔɔ kɩ y!
K'a yaa da, a bɩ hinceem ba y, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʊ. Gʊaa heer lɛ taa, b'a mɛsim paŋŋa ba ʊ y.»
A n a ya, an a bɔ a hɩɩya hɔ ma, an yaa da, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, kʊ pakra m kʊ fɩryɩrɛ naa do n mɔɔ yɩ, k'an yɩ maam, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ n kʊ yɩ.»
A n a ya, an a bɔ an bʊr karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ ŋ yɩ ŋn'ɩ hinceem barɛ, hinceem k'a nɩ ŋ zɛm bɩ minto m.
Yeezuu n a ya, an a gʊ ŋ ma a kaakʊ hɔ ma, an aa so a yaadarɛ bɩ ra.
A n a bɔ an bʊr karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ hinceem bam, an nɩ hoon sim na? K'a dɩga a wakatɩ a ku, n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊrɛ, n n a ka mimbʊnyaabənno ʊ.
K'a wuti! K'ʊ ʊ hʊr! Gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʊm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ lee ku.»

K'a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem Zidas bɩ lee ku. Bʊr a ʊ kan zamaa cir gʊta kɩ, ŋn'ɩ kargʊrɔ m kan bənkənno kɩ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.
Zidas bɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ k'a n'a bam ŋnɩ Yeezuu dɔ ŋn'a nyasʊ bɩ makra hɩnka ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ yaa dam nɩ kan daʊrɛ kɩ bɩ, gʊaa bɩ do m, k'a nyasʊ.»
Zidas n a zɔ Yeezuu ma lɛɛm, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m!» A n bɔkarɛ, an yaa da m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «M gʊaasɩba, hɔ k'ɩ bʊr, kɩ b'a ba bɩ ba.» A m naa, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a nyasʊ.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem a kargʊ gaa ʊ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ deem sakʊ, an a tʊr gʊ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ kargʊ bɩ du a caan ʊ, bala, gʊaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ yar bam kargʊ m bɩ, kargʊ n n'a zɛm gər.
Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ n da ma, m m Zɩ bir, an malɛɛkarɔ tisi bam hɔka-hɔka nyɔɔ mɔɔ m lɛɛm na?
Bɩ k'a yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, Wosoci bɩ meerbaa y'a bam lɔ, an kʊ yɩ? Bala, a a hɩ, a ʊ: Pakra m k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʊ.»
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ gʊaa cir bɩ m, a ʊ: «Bʊr awɔɔ ʊ kargʊrɔ m kan bannɔ kɩ k'a bɩ mɔɔ nyasʊ, ɩ ʊ, dazaamazaa m mɔɔ nɩ! Mɔɔ nyɩnta Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ dɔmɩm haay, m nɩ hɔ dɩndam, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ nyasʊ y.
Bɩ naa do haay naa, ba a ʊ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Wosoci b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n kʊ yɩ.» A m naa, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay n a si, ŋn'a bɔ Yeezuu ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Yeezuu nyasʊ rɔ wɔɔ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ *Kayiifʊ har ʊ. Lɛɛ bɩ do wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ a so kʊ ma ʊ, kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n zu Yeezuu jɛ ʊ laatʊ, an ta an aa lee ku wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʊ. A n gasʊ har b'ʊ, an aa nyɩnta kan hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a dɩga mim bɩ nyambʊrlɛ ma.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ haay kɩ y'a kam mim ma k'a ka Yeezuu ra, k'a ku a dʊdɔ yar, a ka kʊ n n a zɛ gər.
Bɩ, ŋ bɩr mim yɩrɛ y, baa kʊ gʊɔɔ bʊr gʊta ŋnɩ ŋʊaar ba k'a ka ra bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ yɩ k'a ka ra y. Gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ bʊr.
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do a hɩ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ m da ma, m Wosocɛ bɩ wurgə, m m ya, m a dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʊ nɔ ʊ.»
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n wuti, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩr a nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ ra? Bɔ mim gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro n a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ minto na?»
Bɩ, Yeezuu bɩr hɔsɩ hɩrɛ y. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a ya, an lɛ ka ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩ wer si Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ tɔ ma, sɩra hɩ wɔɔ m, ɩbɩɩ m Krista Woso Nyɩ bɩ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩrɛ, bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩ bɩsɩ ra, awɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ, an bɩr zɛm warkʊ mim ʊ.»
A m naa, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ n ma ʊ, an a huuro kɩnkaansʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Woso sʊnsɔ a a wʊ, kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə a ya an ta wɔɔ ma ra? Awɔɔ Woso sʊnsɔ k'a wʊ bɩ ma.
Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ kɛɛrɛ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «A a ga zɛ m.»
Ŋ n lihi da a meer ma, ŋn'a wɔrɔ hunhuŋŋu ŋn'a zɛrɛ, gɔsɩnnɔ n n'a wɔ tɩntam lɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa zi ba, ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m, Krista, nka y'ɩ zɛ?»
Kʊ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ nyɩntam tɩnsara b'ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩlʊrɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem a zɔ ma, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ɩ kan Galilee gʊaa Yeezuu bɩ kɩ sɔ!»
Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka gʊaa haay lɛɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ hɩ naa jɩ dɔ y.»
A n a hʊr b'ʊ, an nɩ tam har bɩ lɛ ma, zibəənyɩlʊ vanta n a yɩ, an a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do nyɩnta kan Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ kɩ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka Yeezuu ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ m wer si, mɔɔ n gʊaa naa do dɔ y.»
Kʊ maasɩrɛ ba poore bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a zɔ Pɩyɛɛr ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ sɩra m, ŋ gʊaa n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ, ɩbɩɩ meerbaa y'ɩ tojɩ hɩnkarɛ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a wer sim, an n'a tarɛ a rɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n gʊaa naa do dɔ y!» Lɛɛm bɩ, koo n baa da.
Pɩyɛɛr n mim kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʊ koo n bɔkarɛ, an baa da.» A n bɔ, an nɩ nyi kam kan heer zar gʊta kɩ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ dɔgta mɩŋŋa m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan tara bɩ gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ lɛ sa k'a Yeezuu ka zɛ ma.
Ŋ n a sur, ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'aa ka Rɔm lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ b'ʊ.
Zidas Yeezuu nyasʊ an a ka, bɩ, k'a b'a yɩ ŋnɩ Yeezuu dʊdɔ yar k'a zɛ gər bɩ, a kʊrkʊr da, an a bɔ an a wanzurfu busooyaa bukərku rɔ wɔɔ ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʊ kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ʊ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a n hɔsɩ ba naa kʊ mɔɔ ka ŋn'a zɛ naa, mimbʊnyaa mɔɔ ba.» Bɩ brɔɔ a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Kara ɩ pakra ba wɔɔ ma? Ɩbɩɩ mim m!»
A n aa busoo bɩ lo Wosocɛ b'ʊ, an a hʊr, an ta an aa bar da a ma.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ n busoo bɩ gʊr, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, a n a ga m, kʊ wɔɔ n busoo naa do zar Wosocɛ bɩ busoo ra y, bala, gərzɛrɛ busoo m.»
Ŋ nɩ kʊ ma, ŋnɩ busoo bɩ sa ŋnɩ mɔrdor hɔsɩra si m, k'an yɩ saanɔɔ gəənoyaa.
Bɩ y'a ka, n n hɔsɩra bɩ do tɔ ka, n ʊ: ‹Ma sɩra,› an ta, an her dɔmɩm ku.

A m naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii meerbaa k'a ba bɩ n kʊ yɩ: ‹Ŋ wanzurfu bukərku bɩ sa, ŋnɩ mɔrdor bɩ hɔsɩra bɩ si m, amba Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m. Gʊaa kʊ Israyɛl nyɩnɔ kʊ ma, ŋn'a ter ba bɩ busoo m.›

A m naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zeremii meerbaa k'a ba bɩ n kʊ yɩ: ‹Ŋ wanzurfu bukərku bɩ sa, ŋnɩ mɔrdor bɩ hɔsɩra bɩ si m, amba Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m. Gʊaa kʊ Israyɛl nyɩnɔ kʊ ma, ŋn'a ter ba bɩ busoo m.›
Bɩ, Yeezuu yaa jɩm lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ lɛɛ. Bɩ n a lar, a ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ hɩ ɩ zim.»
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ mim kam Yeezuu ra, b'a n hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ ʊ y.
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩr minno kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ karɛ ɩ ra bɩ mam na?»
Bɩ, Yeezuu n deem taan… nyɩ bɔ ʊ y, naa do a ka cir bɩ n zɛ kədə.
Pakkɩ cibsa biyəə ma, lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ bɩ tɩr lɔ kʊ zamaa bɩ lɛ n taa bɩ bɔ, an a ka ŋ ʊ.
A n bɔkarɛ lɔ deem ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, lɔ wɩsɩ, a tɔ m Barabas.
Pɩlatɩ n laaka da gʊaa cir k'a so kʊ ma b'ʊ bɩ han, a ʊ: «Nka awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ mɔɔ n wɔ saa ma, Barabas gɛɛ, Yeezuu kʊ n n'a birm Krista bɩ nɩ?»
Bala, Pɩlatɩ a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ Yeezuu nyasʊ ŋ y'a ʊ ŋn'a ka a ʊ jɩmbaa minto.
Pɩlatɩ k'a nɩ nyɩntam dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ, a laarɛ nyɔɔ da ma, kʊ n n a hɩ m, n ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ gasʊ gʊaa tɩrga naa do mim ʊ y. Bala, gunuu ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ fɩr yɩ nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ a minto.»
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ k'ɩ gʊaa cir bɩ nyʊnnyɔɔm, kʊ ŋ nɩ Barabas bɔrɛ yɛ, kʊ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu garɛ yɛ.
Lɛɛzaa Pɩlatɩ bɩ n a ya, an ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Ŋ gʊaa hɩɩya bɩ barla bɩ, kara awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m bɔ m a ka a ʊ?» Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Barabas.»
Pɩlatɩ n laaka da ŋ han, a ʊ: «Bɩ bɔ mɔɔ n'a bam Yeezuu kʊ n n'a birm Krista bɩ nɩ?» Ŋ haay n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «A wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!»
Pɩlatɩ n laaka da, a ʊ: «Mimbʊnyaa kara a a ba?» Ŋ n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!»

Pɩlatɩ k'a n'a yɩrɛ, a ʊ, awɔɔ b'a dam mim bɩ bankarɛ ma bɩ, bɩ zamaa bɩ y'a ŋʊam k'a lɛɛ zɛ kʊ ma bɩ, a hi kusi, an a wɔ hir m zamaa bɩ lɛɛ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ba gʊaa naa do zɛrɛ barla y, awɔɔ mim m!»
Zamaa bɩ haay n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ: «K'a zɛrɛ mim n wɔɔ yɩ, kan ʊ nyɩnɔ kɩ.»
A m naa do, Pɩlatɩ n Barabas bɔ, an a ka ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩr m, an a ka kʊ n n a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Pɩlatɩ sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n ta Yeezuu m lɛɛzaa bɩ har ʊ b'ʊ, sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ haay n a so kʊ ma ŋnɩ bɩr Yeezuu ma,
ŋn'a huuro bɔ ma, ŋnɩ zaba piinə du ma,
ŋnɩ laa waa ŋn'a ku a mim ma, ŋ ʊ, cinno firgə m, ŋnɩ bənkə da a bɩsɩ wɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa ŋn'ɩ yaa wʊm ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m zɩɩfʊrɔ cir!»
Ŋ n'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma, ŋn'ɩ bənkə bɩ sarɛ ŋn'a zɛm nɩ a mim ma.
Kʊ ŋ yaa wʊ ma ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ zaba bɩ bɔ ma, ŋn'a huuro wɔɔ du ma, ŋn'a hʊr m k'a yaa wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Bɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ Sirɛnnɩ gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ zɛ ʊ, sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n paŋŋa ba ma, an Yeezuu gɔdarkʊra bɩ busu.
Ŋ n lee ku lɛɛ kʊ ŋ n'a birm Golgotaa b'ʊ, a jɩ ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ, ‹Minkorgo bɩncɛ.›
Ŋ n dɩvɛn war kʊ ma kan hɔ hɛɛnr kɩ, ŋn'a ka ʊ, k'an a mi. K'a da a lɛ ma bɩ, a n a ŋʊa an a mi y.
Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, ŋnɩ pʊɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma ŋnɩ ŋ jir.
Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ dɔm ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu zɛ bɩ jɩ gʊrsɩra ba warga ma, Yeezuu mim la gɔdarkʊra bɩ ma, ŋ ʊ: ‹Yeezuu m naa, zɩɩfʊrɔ cir m.›
Ŋ konno wɔ hɩɩya gɔdarkʊra ma Yeezuu jɩr ʊ, deem a bɩsɩ, deem a jɩsa.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cenim b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n'a mim zukə zɛrɛ, ŋn'a sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ.
Ŋ n'a hɩm Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'ɩ dam ma, ɩ Wosocɛ bɩ wurgə, ɩ ya, ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʊ nɔ ʊ bɩ, ɩ bʊmbɔ ɩ zim kʊ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ zer gɔdarkʊra bɩ ma!»
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ yaa wʊm ma sɔ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«A gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ bʊmbɔ, b'a b'a dam ma, an a mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ y. Kʊ Israyɛl cir nɩ, k'an zer gɔdarkʊra bɩ ra kɛɛrɛ, k'ʊ sɩra ka ʊ.
A sɩra ka Woso ʊ, an a hɩ a ʊ, Woso Nyɩ n'a mɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kʊ Woso y'a ŋʊarɛ, k'a n a yɔ wa.»
Konno kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma a jɩr ʊ rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʊnsɔ wʊm sɔ.
Sinsebir k'a da bɩ, monsigə gʊta zɛ tara burə ʊ, an ta an wakatɩ kaakʊ ku yirbəəre m.
Yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʊ zeezi bɩ, Yeezuu zee gʊta da, a ʊ: «Eloyii, Eloyii, lama sabaktaani?» A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Woso, mɔɔ Woso, bɔ m, ɩ ɩ bɔ mɔɔ ʊ?»
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ naa ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A ɩ *Elii birm!»
Ŋ gʊaa deem n bra si, an aa hɔ mafʊ-mafʊda sa, an a nyɔɔ hɔ hɛɛnr ma an a da bənkə ma, an a ka Yeezuu ʊ k'an a mi.
Bɩ, a muno wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Jɩm cɩna, k'ʊ dɩga a Elii zɛm b'a bʊmbɔ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a ya, an zee gʊta da, an ga.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Wosocɛ bɩ pɛɛra bɩ n zɛ kumbir, an a sa mim ʊ an b'a zɛ tara ma. Tara n nyiŋŋə, ciro n wunwu,
gəənoyaarɔ n a gʊngʊ. Wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a mɩm bʊmbɔ ʊ gʊta.
Ŋ n bɔ yaarɔ wɔɔ ʊ, Yeezuu k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ hinni ʊ, ŋnɩ gasʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ mɩŋŋa b'ʊ, gʊɔɔ gʊta nɩ ŋ yɩ.
Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ cir, kan sʊrdaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔm Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ tara bɩ nyiŋŋəre yɩ, kan hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba haay bɩ kɩ, ŋ da n bɔ ʊ gʊta, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Sɩra m, Woso Nyɩ m paan…»
Lannɔ nyɩnta b'ʊ guta, ŋn'a to laatʊ ŋn'ɩ dɩgam, zu ŋ y'a ʊ Yeezuu jɛ ʊ Galilee ʊ tee…, ŋn'a dam han.
Magdalaa Maarii nyɩnta ŋ barla, kan Maarii, Zakkɩ kan Zozɛf kɩ da bɩ, kan Zebedee nyɩnɔ da kɩ.
Woso lɛ k'a b'a zo bɩ, Arimatee kʊ gʊaa arzakazaa deem k'a tɔ m Zozɛf bʊr, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩ deem m sɔ.
A n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, an aa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han. Pɩlatɩ n lɛ ka, n n a ka ʊ.
A n gər bɩ sa, an pɛɛra fɛʊda burgu ma,
an a da a mɩŋŋa yaa daa k'a hɔ ci ʊ b'ʊ, an jaa gʊta gərgu an a ta rɛ, an a hʊr.
Magdalaa kʊ Maarii kan Maarii vanta bɩ k'ɩ nyɩntam b'ʊ, ŋn'a meer nya yaa bɩ rɛ.
*Sabaa bankarɛ hinni k'a cem dɔ n mɛ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ zu kʊ ʊ ŋnɩ ta Pɩlatɩ zi.
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ lɛɛzaa, ŋʊaarzaa naa do k'a nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʊ: Dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩm bɔŋ ʊ bɩ, a tɔ ɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ.

Lɛ ka kʊ n n dɔ yaa bɩ ma, k'an ta an dɔmɩm kaakʊ bɩ ku, k'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ bʊr, ŋn'a gər bɩ kʊna, ŋn'a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: A a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ y. Kʊ m bɛɛ m, ŋʊaar naa do lɛ dam lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ m.»
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ ɩ sʊrdaarɔ m, k'a ta a ka ŋnɩ dɔ yaa bɩ ma amba awɔɔ a da ma bɩ m.»
Ŋ n a hʊr, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa jaa k'a ta yaa bɩ lɛ bɩ kʊsɩ, ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ da a dɔma ʊ.
Sabaa hinni bɩ k'a cem bɩ, hatʊ hinni ʊ wutigʊta m bɩ, Magdalaa Maarii kan Maarii deem bɩ kɩ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga yaa bɩ ma.
Tara n nyiŋŋə lɛɛm, Zuuba malɛɛka n a to brama an zer, an bɩ jaa bɩ gərgu an a gʊ yaa bɩ rɛ, an nyɩnta ra.
A mɛ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan brama nyakɩ kɩ, a huu bɩ fu am lajaa hɔ bɩ m.
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ da n bɔ ʊ, ŋ mɛ nɩ hinkəm, ŋn'a ba ɩ ʊ, gɩnga ŋ y'a ʊ.
Bɩ, malɛɛka bɩ meer ba kan lannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʊ: «A da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ Yeezuu kʊ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ awɔɔ n'a kam ma.
A ba naa ʊ dɔ y, a a mɩm bɔ ʊ amba a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ m, k'a bʊr a dɩga lɛɛ k'a nɩ wʊtaŋ ʊ hɔɔ bɩ ma.
Bɩ, k'a ta zɔɔ a yaa hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: A a mɩm bɔ ʊ, bɩ, a ɩ lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʊ, lɛɛ bɩ do awɔɔ naa yɩ ʊ, naa do mɔɔ kʊ m a hɩ awɔɔ m.»
Lannɔ wɔɔ a hʊr yaa bɩ ra zɔɔ-zɔɔ, kan dabɔʊ kɩ heernyɔɔ gʊta kɩ, ŋn'a si, k'a yaa mim bɩ hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ, Yeezuu bʊr an ŋ zɛ ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.» Lannɔ wɔɔ n a zɔ ma ŋn'a gannɔ nyɩnnyasʊ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ a taa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. K'a ta a yaa hɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ ta Galilee ʊ, ŋ mɔɔ yɩm b'ʊ.»
Kʊ ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, sʊrdaarɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʊr kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩ hɔ k'a ba haay bɩ sa, ŋn'a dɩnda wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m.
Brɔɔ n a so kʊ ma, kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ kʊ ma, ŋnɩ busoo ka sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ ʊ gʊta.
Ŋ nɩ lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «K'a hɩ a ʊ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ ɩ bʊr gunuu ʊ, ŋnɩ b'a gər bɩ kʊna, bɩ ma bɩ, wɔɔ hinceem ba.
Bɩ, kʊ lɛɛzaa b'a ma, wɔɔ y'a dɩndarɛ dɔm, mim b'a nɔrɛ awɔɔ ma y.»
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n busoo bɩ si, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ bɩ ba, mim naa do n bɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, an ta an lee ku her dɔmɩm ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeem nɔ wɔɔ n a hʊr, ŋnɩ ta Galilee ʊ, ci kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ a ʊ, ŋnɩ ta ra bɩ burə ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ yaa yɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ kukurə zɛ, bɩ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩnsɩm ka.
Yeezuu n a zɔ ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «N paŋŋa do haay ka mɔɔ ʊ, brama kan tara kɩ burə ʊ.
Bɩ, k'a ta doro haay zi, a yaa gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ba mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ, a batɛm ka ŋ ʊ, Zɩ kan Nyɩ kɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ tɔ ma.
A hɔ kʊ mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m haay bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ zu ʊ. Bɩ mɔɔ ba n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ, k'an ta an durnya nyarɛ ku.»
Mark: Lemim nyɩnta k'a nɩ Woso Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista bɩ mim dɩndam bɩ n naa do.
Mim bɩ, a sɩŋŋɩda a ba, amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a gʊrsɩra ba biisi bɩ m, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'an b'ɩ zaa banka.
A mɩŋŋa leer nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
k'a Zuuba zaa banka,
k'a a zaarɔ kʊ ŋ y'a tʊntɔ rɔ wɔɔ banka, k'a ŋ zɛ kʊ ŋ n yɩ tɩrga.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zaan a hɩnka poohɔɔn ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ pa dam, a ʊ: «K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a batɛm si, k'a a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ.»
Zidee kʊ zannɔ kan Zerizalɛm kʊ zannɔ kɩ bʊr Zaan zi, ŋnɩ batɛm si Zʊrdɛn kɔ ʊ, ŋn'a mimbʊnyaarɔ hɩrɛ.
Zaan bɩ, yoonde ka huu a du a ma, an kʊmbar so a ʊ. Bɩsɩnɔ kan zɔɔn kɩ a n'a bɩrɛ.
A hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, a y'a hɩm gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa nɩ mɔɔ jɛ ʊ, an nɩ zɛm, bɩ, a zaa paŋŋa cem mɔɔ han. Mɔɔ n m ga m, m sʊnta a taa, m a kʊsɔrɔ bar tɔkkɛ hʊnhʊr y.
Mɔɔ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʊ hi nɔ ʊ, bɩ, a mɩŋŋa zɛm bɩ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a to Nazarɛtɩ ʊ, Galilee kʊ nɔ ʊ, an bʊr Zʊrdɛn kɔ ʊ k'a bɩ batɛm si Zaan zi.
Bɩ, k'a bɩ batɛm si an a nya, an nɩ bɔm hi b'ʊ bɩ, brama a gʊ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer a mim ʊ, am cirpʊʊrɛ hɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ leer a to mim ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Nyɩ kʊ mɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʊa kan m heer kɩ haay.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka an ta poohɔɔn ʊ.
A gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔmɩm busi, Sʊtaana n'a gɩngam ma. A mɩsɩrbaa ba a nawʊm poohɔɔ barla, bɩ malɛɛkarɔ bʊr k'a b'a da han.
N Zaan nyasʊ, n n a du, Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ an bʊr Galilee ʊ,
an nɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa dam gʊɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Dɔmɩm b'a ku, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ. K'a bɔ a taam, k'a lemim nyɩnta bɩ si.»
Kʊ Yeezuu nɩ tam Galilee higʊta lɛ ra bɩ, a zɔbənno yɩ hɩɩya, Sɩmɔɔn kan a danzaa Andɩr kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɔ bam, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa zom higʊta b'ʊ, bala, zɔbənno m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a bʊr a zu mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bam gʊɔɔkamazannɔ!»
Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ to, ŋn'ɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan kɩ.
K'a ta lɛɛ poore bɩ, a Zebedee nyɩnɔ yɩ, Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋarɔ bankarɛ a kɔɔlʊʊ nɔ ʊ.
Yeezuu n ŋ bir lɛɛm, ŋn'a zɩ Zebedee to kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ kan zibənno wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hʊr, ŋn'ɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan kɩ.
Ŋ gasʊ Kapɛrnawum kʊ nɔ ʊ, *sabaa hinni ʊ, Yeezuu n gasʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ, an hɔ dɩnda.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ minto. Bala Woso paŋŋa an nɩ hɔ bɩ dɩndam nɩ, a bɩ hɔdeem kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ kɩ y.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊaa kʊ zinəro n ta m nɩ ŋ sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ, an nɩ zee darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
«Bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba wɔɔ nɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu? Bʊr ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ bɩ wɔɔ zibəə zar gɛ? Kʊ nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ dɔ: Woso gʊaa mɩŋŋa n'ɩbɩɩ m.»
Yeezuu n meer ba ma, a ʊ: «Ɩ tʊr ka, k'ɩ bɔ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ!»
Zinə bɩ n gʊaa bɩ hinkə kan paŋŋa kɩ, an bɔ a mɛ ʊ kan zee kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'ɩ laaka dɩndam kʊ han, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m naa? Hɔdɩndarɛ daa kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ bɩ ba n nɩ! A m lɛ da bɩ, Yeezuu ɩ həən sim zinəro wɔɔ ma, ŋn'a lɛ sire.»
Yeezuu tɔ bɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ, Galilee kʊ ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ bɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ ta Sɩmɔɔn kan Andɩr kɩ har ʊ, kan Zakkɩ kɩ Zaan kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn dində ɩ wʊtam kan mɛmarɛ kɩ. Lɛɛm bɩ, n yaabazaa bɩ mim hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu a zɔ, an a wɔ nyasʊ, an a ka an wuti. Mɛmarɛ bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʊ, an wuti, an nyasʊ ŋ nɩ.
Yirbəəre m bɩ, woso lɛzore dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, n bʊr yaabazannɔ m kan hɔɔzannɔ kɩ m haay Yeezuu zi.
Kʊ bɩ zannɔ haay a so kʊ ma har bɩ lɛ ma.
A yaabazannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cicir bam yaaba do haay m nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ waa gʊta, an la zinəro ra gʊta gʊɔɔ mɛ ʊ. Yeezuu n zinəro wɔɔ to ŋn'ɩ meer barɛ y, kʊ ŋ y'a dɔ bɩ minto.
Dɔgta mɩŋŋa m, Yeezuu wuti, an bɔ, an ta poohɔɔn ʊ, an nɩ yaa dam b'ʊ.
Sɩmɔɔn wuti kan a muno kɩ, ŋn'a dɩndaŋ ʊ,
ŋn'aa yɩ, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma!»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ʊ ta kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lezima rɔ wɔɔ ʊ sɔ, kʊ m aa Woso lemim nyɩnta dɩnda ŋ nɩ. Bala, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto.»
A a da Galilee kʊrɔ wɔɔ zi haay, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ ŋ sokʊmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra.
Kusimə deem n b'a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an sʊnta, an a zuutə a taa, an n'a yɛm han, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ mɔɔ waa.»
Yeezuu a cicir zɛ, an a wɔ hʊr, an a da ma, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ lɛ taa ma k'ɩ laafɩɩ yɩ.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, yaaba bɩ bɔ kusimə bɩ mɛ ʊ, an a ba mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a nyɔɔ, an lɛ ka ʊ,
an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Dundo ɩ zi, ɩ b'a ka ɩ hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y. Ta ɩ yaa ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ m, *hubɔrɛ mannɩ kʊ Moyiisi lɛ ka awɔɔ ʊ k'a ba bɩ, k'ɩ bɩ ba, kʊ gʊaa biyəə n a dɔ, a ʊ, ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ yɩ.»

Bɩ, gʊaa bɩ bɔ, an a hʊr, an a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ mim bɩ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m lɛɛ haay ʊ. Naa do minto ma, Yeezuu b'a dam ma, an a hɩnka, an gasʊ kʊnɔ ʊ y. Gɔɔta a tɩr a ʊ bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʊ. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ a to lɛɛ haay ʊ, ŋn'ɩ zɛm Yeezuu zi.
Dɔmɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ cem nɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, Yeezuu a wusigə, an bʊr Kapɛrnawum kʊnɔ ʊ, bɩ gʊɔɔ a ma ŋ ʊ, a lee ku an nɩ har ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ cir gʊta bʊr, ŋnɩ b'a so kʊ ma b'ʊ, lɛ ba b'ʊ y, baa cɛlɛ ma bɩ, lɛ ba ʊ sɔ y. Yeezuu nɩ Woso lemim dɩndam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʊr zi mɛgarɛzaa m, ŋn'a busu gʊaa si.
Kʊ ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ Yeezuu zi bɩ, zamaa bɩ minto m, ŋ n cɛ mim bɩ hɔn ra, bɩncɛ kʊ Yeezuu n ta ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ busu kan a wʊtarahɔ bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a zer cɛ bɩ yaa bɩ m.
Kʊ Yeezuu ŋ sɩrakarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ!»
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩntam, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ a heer ʊ, ŋ ʊ:
«Bɔ m, gʊaa naa do nɩ meer naa do barɛ? Woso sʊnsɔ a n'a wʊm! Nka y'a da ma, an gʊaa mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka ʊ, kʊ Woso deem bɛɛ?»
Zɔɔ-zɔɔ bala, hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma a heer ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a dɔ a zim, an ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto m awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʊ?
Kara m naanaa? Mɔɔ n b'a hɩm mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ: ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛɛ, ɩ wuti, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ gʊr, ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?
Bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ, a ʊ: Gʊaanyɩ b'a da ma, an gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʊ, tara burə ʊ naa ʊ.»
A n a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ wuti, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ gʊr, ɩ doo ɩ har ʊ!»
Lɛɛm bɩ, a wuti, an a wʊtarahɔ bɩ gʊr, an bɔ m, gʊaa biyəə mɩm m. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ n mim naa do lɔɔ yɩ deem y.»
Yeezuu a ya, an ta Galilee higʊta lɛ ra. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay bʊr zi, an nɩ Woso lemim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
K'a nɩ cenim bɩ, a Alfee nyɩnnɩ Levii yɩ. A n nɩ nyɩntarɛ a yawʊrsire bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ!» Levii bɩ n wuti, an nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan kɩ.
Kʊ Yeezuu nɩ nyɩntam Levii har ʊ b'ʊ k'a hɔ bɩ bɩ, yawʊrsinno kan mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ gʊta nyɩnta kan kɩ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, gʊɔɔ gʊta zu kʊ ʊ kan Yeezuu kɩ.

Zɛkʊrazannɔ n ta ʊ, ŋn'ɩ ŋ birm farizɛɛnrɔ. Kʊ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a yɩ, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʊrsinno wɔɔ kɩ, mimbʊnyaabənno wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: «A lɔ, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan yawʊrsinno wɔɔ kɩ, mimbʊnyaabənno wɔɔ kɩ?»
Yeezuu k'a mim bɩ ma bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩzannɔ lɛ baa lɔɔtɔr ma y, bɩ yaabazannɔ lɛ n taa lɔɔtɔr ma. Mɔɔ n bʊr kʊ m bɩ gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bir y, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɩ mimbʊnyaabənno bir.»

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ y'a lɛ kʊsɩm. Ŋ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ Yeezuu lar, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto nɩ, Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ n'a lɛ kʊsɩm, b'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a lɛ kʊsɩrɛ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom darɛ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ɩ lʊsarɛ cibsa barɛ, lʊ bɩ zim bɩ n gɔɔta, an nɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, ŋ y'a lɛ kʊsɩm na? Kʊ lʊ bɩ zim bɩ nɩ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a lɛ kʊsɩ y.
Dɔmɩnnɔ niŋŋoo zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ, kʊ n bɩ lʊ bɩ zim bɩ gʊ ŋ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ kʊsɩm dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ.»
A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kər sam, an a sɩnsar kan huu gusire kɩ y. Pɛɛra daa kər bɩ n nɩ huu gusire hɔ bɩ gaam, an n'a kaansʊm, an nɩ cenim biisi han.»

A n a ya, an a vanta hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ *dɩvɛn daa sam k'a tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʊ y. Kʊ n bɛɛ m, dɩvɛn bɩ hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ hɩnhaanm. Dɩvɛn bɩ kan hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a zaar bam. Bɩ, k'a dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʊ.»
Hindeem ʊ, *sabaa hinni ʊ, Yeezuu bɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʊ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ hɔyaa gɔyir yɩnyarm.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Dɩga, hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bam sabaa hinni ʊ! A n a ga m, ŋn'a ba a hinni ʊ y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mim k'a pakra ba Davɩd m kan a gʊɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ, hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba, nɔ k'a ŋ nyasʊ bɩ,

gasʊ k'a ʊ Wosocɛ ʊ kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Abɩyataar dɔmɩm ʊ, an bur kʊ ŋ y'a cɩnta Woso m bɩ gʊr, an a bɩ kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra? Bɩ, ŋ n a ga m, ŋn'a bɩ, kʊ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ bɛɛ m bala y.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Hoonsire dɔmɩm bɩ ba Woso ʊ, gʊaa minto, bɩ, a n gʊaa ba hoonsire dɔmɩm minto y.
Bɩ y'a ka, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa.»
Sabaa vanta hinni ʊ, Yeezuu a ya, an gasʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, gʊaa deem n ta ʊ, a wɔ n ga.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma, hɔ k'a n'a bam *sabaa hinni ʊ, k'a gʊaa bɩ waam k'a yɩ. A ka brɔɔ nawʊm ma, k'a mim ka Yeezuu ra, mim naa do jɛ ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti, ɩ bʊr bireyaa ʊ naa ʊ!»
B'a a hɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Sabaa hinni ʊ, bɔ barɛ n mɩŋŋa? Zibəə mɩŋŋa barɛ m gɛɛ, zibəə bʊnyaa barɛ nɩ? Gʊaa meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ m gɛɛ, gʊaa zɛrɛ nɩ?» Bɩ ŋ bɩr a nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ y.
A ɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma a jɩr ʊ kan nɔmaa kɩ, a heer n a zar ŋ heerkarɛ bɩ minto. A n a hɩ gʊaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ wɔ bɩ hʊr!» B'a a hʊr, a wɔ bɩ n a banka.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hɔɔn dam hɔ k'a n'a bam, k'a Yeezuu ku a zɛ bɩ ma.
Yeezuu ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ Galilee higʊta lɛ ra. Zamaa gʊta n zu a jɛ ʊ. Zamaa bɩ, a to ŋ y'a ʊ Galilee ʊ, Zidee ʊ,
Zerizalɛm ʊ, Idumee ʊ, kan Zʊrdɛn kɔ kur zannɔ kɩ, Tiir kʊ kan Sidɔn kʊ zannɔ kɩ. Gʊɔɔ gʊta n bʊr zi, hɔ haay k'a a ba bɩ minto.
A a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ, k'a a zɔ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ m mɔɔ jɩr ʊ, kʊ zamaa bɩ b'a da ma, ŋn'a so mɔɔ ʊ y.
Yeezuu k'a gʊɔɔ waa gʊta bɩ minto y'a ka, yaabazannɔ wɔɔ haay lɛ n taa k'a lɛɛ ka a a zɔ ma, a a wɔ da ma.
Zinəro wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ kukurə zɛ, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʊ: «Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m!»
A həən si ŋ ma kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ, ŋ b'a ka n n'a dɔ y.
Yeezuu der ci ra, an nɩ gʊɔɔ k'a lɛ n taa ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ birm. Brɔɔ ŋ bʊr zi.
A n ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ gʊaa bueerehɩɩya, kʊ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta kan a kɩ, k'a bɩr ŋ nyɔɔm, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ dɩndam,
kʊ ŋ n paŋŋa yɩ, ŋnɩ wɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ la zinəro ra.
Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ Yeezuu ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ ba n nɩ: Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n n'a hɩm ma Pɩyɛɛr ta ʊ,
Zebedee nyɩ Zakkɩ ta ʊ, kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ. Yeezuu tɔ vanta ka brɔɔ ma, a ʊ: Bʊanɛrgɛs, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ: bramahəənsire nyɩnɔ.
Andɩr ta ʊ sɔ, kan Filipi kɩ, Bartelemii kɩ, Matiyee kɩ, Toma kɩ, kan Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kɩ, Tade kɩ, Sɩmɔɔn *Zelɔtɩ kɩ sɔ,
kan Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʊ gʊaa Zidas, k'a Yeezuu zambʊ zɛ bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu a wusigə, an bʊr har ʊ, zamaa bɩ n a ya, an a so kʊ ma. Bɩ minto nɩ, Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ba toore m k'a hɔ bɩ y.
Bɩ k'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ma bɩ, ŋ bʊr, k'a b'a gaa, bala ŋ y'a hɔɔndarɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A mim n'a wusigəm!»
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɛlzebul nɩ kan kɩ!» Ŋ y'a hɩ sɔ, ŋ ʊ: «Zinəro cir daahan minto y'a ka, an wɔ ʊ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra.»
Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sʊtaana y'a bam lɔ, an zoo ba kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ?
Kʊ k'a gʊɔɔ bɩr kʊ mam bɩ y'a darɛ.
Kʊ har gʊɔɔ a gʊngʊ, har bɩ do b'a dam ma, an ta lɛɛ y.
Kʊ Sʊtaana bʊr, an nɩ yar bam kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, kʊ gʊngʊrɛ ta ʊ, a b'a dam ma, an jɩm mim ʊ dʊntɔ y, bɩ, a cirbəə bɩ nyam.
Gʊaa ba ʊ, an b'a dam ma, an gasʊ gʊaa paŋŋazaa har ʊ, k'a mɔrlɔ gʊr, k'a n ser ka, an bʊr la an a sʊr y. K'a sʊr an a nya, b'a bɔkarɛ an gasʊ, an mɔrlɔ wɔɔ gʊr.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso mimbʊnyaarɔ haay kan sʊnsɔrɔ haay kɩ sugur kam gʊɔɔ ʊ.
Bɩ gʊaa biyəə k'a nɩ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri sʊnsɔ wʊm bɩ, a b'a sugur yɩm fɩɩga y. A mimbʊnyaa bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim ʊ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu naa do hɩ, kʊ ŋ ʊ: Sʊtaana nɩ kan kɩ bɩ minto.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu da kan Yeezuu danyɩnɔ kɩ bʊr, ŋnɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋ n nyɔɔ da kʊ ŋ n Yeezuu bir.
Zamaa bɩ nyɩnta, n nɩ bɩr ma, n n'a hɩm nɩ, n ʊ: «Gaafra, ɩbɩɩ da kan ɩbɩɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ y'ɩbɩɩ birm garga ra.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Nka m mɔɔ da? Nkɔɔ m mɔɔ danyɩnɔ?»
A n bɔkarɛ, an a bɔ, an nɩ dɩgam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ŋnɩ bɩr ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ da bɩ ba n nɩ, kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ!
Gʊaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ danlʊ m, mɔɔ da m.»
Yeezuu a ya, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam Galilee higʊta lɛ ra. Zamaa a so kʊ ma gʊta ŋnɩ bɩr ma, an wuti, an aa nyɩnta kɔɔlʊʊrɔ wɔɔ deem ʊ hi bɩ nɔ ʊ. Zamaa bɩ haay n nyɩnta tara ʊ hi bɩ lɛ ra.
A hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom darɛ nɔ ʊ, a hɔ dɩnda ŋ nɩ gʊta. A hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«K'a tʊr ka: gʊaa ɩ bɔ k'a hɔ duu, a duure nɔ ʊ bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʊm.
K'a n'a duum bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa gʊr ma. Bɛnnɔ n bʊr, ŋnɩ b'a bɩ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛ ʊ, taa n nyɩnta b'ʊ gʊta y. Hɔyaa bɩ n lɛɛ ka an bɔ, kʊ taa ba ʊ gʊta b'ʊ bɩ minto.
Woso k'a der bɩ, an na hɔka bɩ ma, an ga, kʊ ŋ məsi ba ʊ bɩ minto.
Gɔsɩnnɔ a zar laa bɩncɛ ʊ, laa bɩ n haan, an a ta ŋ mee, ŋ n nyɩ da y.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʊ, ŋnɩ haan, ŋnɩ ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da. A yaa deem yaa ka bukərku, deem busɔrdɩ, deem zɔrɔ.»
Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a jɩ ma, k'an a tʊr ka ma mɩŋŋa.»
Kʊ zamaa b'a hʊr bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta kan Yeezuu kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a larm a hɔbɔkʊrɛnoonno wɔɔ jɩ ma.
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ Woso cirbəə mim k'a nyaakʊm da bɩ yɩ, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr a kam ma k'a yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, a hɩ n nawʊrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom darɛ m.
Bɩ minto y'a ka
gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y,
ŋn'a tʊr kam, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ marɛ kʊ ŋ b'a da ma ŋn'a bɔ a taam kʊ Woso n sugur ka ŋ ʊ y.»
Yeezuu n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do jɩ dɔ ra? Bɩ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, a hɔbɔkʊrɛnoonno haay jɩ dɔ?»
Hɔduurezaa bɩ, Woso lemim a n n'a duum.
Hɔyaa k'a a lo zaa lezi bɩ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ Woso lemim bɩ ma, lɛɛm bɩ Sʊtaana lemim kʊ n y'a duu ŋ heer ʊ bɩ si ŋ han.
B'a hɔdeem kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo jaarɔ bɩncɛrɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'a sim lɛɛm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ məsi ba ʊ y, hindeem gʊɔɔ m. Kʊ cicir gɛɛ fɩryɩrɛ bʊr Woso lemim bɩ minto, bɩ ŋ y'a to.
Gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo laa bireyaa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ mam.
Kan durnya hɔɔndama bɩ kɩ, braba a mɩŋŋa m arzaka kama kɩ, kan hɔɔ vantɔɔ lɛtaama kɩ gasʊ ŋ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ zarm, a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y.

A nyambʊrlɛ ma bɩ, gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ n ta ʊ, ŋnɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan hɔyaa k'a a lo bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ marɛ, ŋn'ɩ yɛm ma, ŋn'ɩ nyɩ dam. A yaa deem nɩ nyɩ dam bukərku, deem busɔrdɩ, deem zɔrɔ.
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «N bɩr sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʊ, n n'a cɩntam kasɩ gɛɛ gargʊ taa y, gɛɛ lɔ? A cɩnta n nawʊm hɔ burə ʊ.
Bala, mim haay kʊ gʊɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a dɔ naa ma bɩ, ŋ zɛm b'a dɔ. Hɔ ba ʊ n n a nyaakʊm da a dɔ n mɩ y.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a jɩ ma, k'an a tʊr ka ma mɩŋŋa.»
Yeezuu a vanta hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ makra barɛ hɔ bɩ, n zɛm b'a sa, n nɩ ganwʊrɛ makra bam, n n'a ka awɔɔ ʊ. N y'a lɛŋŋa dam sɔ.
Bala, n hɔ kam gʊaa k'an ta m b'ʊ; Gʊaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa k'a ta m poore, n y'a yɔm nɩ.»
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ duum tara ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ hinceem a n'a barɛ gɛɛ, jɩm a nawʊrɛ, sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ, hɔyaa bɩ, haan a nawʊm, an nɩ mam, b'a n a dɔ kʊ ba a nawʊm lʊnlɔ y.
Tara bɩ n'a zi barɛ, hɔyaa bɩ n nɩ lɛɛkarɛ an nɩ haanm, an nɩ gɔ dam, an nɩ jɩsɩ sim, a nyambʊrlɛ ma bɩ, an nɩ nyɩ dam.
Hɔyaa bɩ k'a ma bɩ, a da n nawʊm, k'a dɔmɩm a ku bɩ minto.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'ʊ Woso cirbəə makra ba lʊnlɔ kan bɔ kɩ?
Bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan hɔ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma mutardɩ bɩ yaa kɩ; A m hɔyaa haay k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ poore, n n'a duum.
Kʊ n y'a duu, ma a nawʊm, an nɩ gɔ dam an lɛ da hɔyaa haay ra, an nɩ haanm gʊta, a vəŋŋəro n ta ʊ, bɛnnɔ n b'a dam ma ŋnɩ cɛ kɩnka ma.»
Yeezuu ɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta dɩndam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m kan makrarɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kɩ gʊta, kʊ ŋ n'a da ma ŋn'a jɩ ma.
Hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom an n'a dam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m bala, bɩ k'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a y'a jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ haay.
Hinni bɩ do yirbəə m bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Ʊ bra gəm deem bɩ ra.»
Kʊ Yeezuu a gʊ zamaa bɩ ma bɩ, a zu kʊ ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'aa gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ. Kɔɔlʊʊrɔ vantɔɔ nyɩnta b'ʊ sɔ kan kɩ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʊta wuti an nɩ hɔnm. Hi kurə bɩ n'a tɔm kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, an a han lɛɛm.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu a mim ka minkarahɔ ra an nɩ hinceem bam kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ jɛ ʊ, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gɩngarɛ bɩr hɔsɩ barɛ ɩbɩɩ m na?»
K'a gu bɩ, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma, an a hɩ higʊta bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ tʊr ka ɩ zɛ sɩɩ…» Hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm, lɛɛ bɩ n zɛ sɩɩ….
Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ nyi barɛ ncɩnaaʊ? Awɔɔ ba sɩrakarɛ nɩ?»
Nyibəə gʊta n gasʊ ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɩ, gʊaa bɩ kara n naa, hɩnhɛr kan hi kɩ n'a lɛ sire?»
Ŋ yaa lee ku higʊta tʊr ʊ, Gerazaa zannɔ kʊ ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu nɩ zerm kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ bɩ, gʊaa kʊ zinəro n ta m bɔ gəənoyaa ra, an b'a zɛ ʊ.
A wʊtajɩ m gəənoyaa ra bɩ m. Baa kan pɔyaabar kɩ, gʊaa paŋŋazaa ba ʊ, an b'a dam ma, an a nyasʊ y.
Bala, dɔmɩm biyəə bɩ, ŋ pɔyaa da a gam ʊ, ŋn'a wɔ kʊsɩ pɔyaabar m, an a cencer haay. Gʊaa ba ʊ an nɩ bʊrm ma y.
Sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ, gəənoyaarɔ an nɩ wʊtaŋ ʊ kan ciro wɔɔ burə kɩ, zee an n'a dam, an nɩ yaaba darɛ a mɩŋŋa ma jaarɔ m.
K'a a to an Yeezuu yɩ laatʊ bɩ, a bra si, an aa sʊnta a taa,
an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʊ: «Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han Woso tɔ ma gʊta: ɩ bɩ zibʊnyaa ba mɔɔ nɩ y!»
Bala, Yeezuu y'a hɩm zinə bɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ!»
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ tɔ m bɔ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ tɔ m Leziyɔn,
bala wɔɔ gʊta.»
A n a yɛ Yeezuu han kan a heer kɩ haay, a ʊ: «A bɩ la a ra tara bɩ nɔ ʊ y!»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, kurkuuro cir gʊta nɩ ci bɩ zeezi, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm.
Zinəro wɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A ka k'ʊ gasʊ kurkuuro wɔɔ mɛ ʊ!»
A n zaa ka ŋ ʊ. Zinəro wɔɔ n bɔ, ŋnɩ gasʊ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʊ. Kurkuuro wɔɔ haay n'a to ci bɩ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'aa a zar higʊta b'ʊ, ŋnɩ gɩnga haay. Kurkuuro wɔɔ a zɔ tisi hɩɩya ma.
Kurkuuro dundonno wɔɔ n bra si, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ hɩ taranɔzannɔ wɔɔ m, kan lezimazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba bɩ ma,
ŋnɩ bʊr Yeezuu jɩr ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩ gʊaa kʊ zinəro Leziyɔn n ta m bɩ yɩ, an huu du a ma, an nɩ nyɩntam kan laafɩɩ kɩ. Dabɔʊ n ŋ nyasʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta, ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba gʊaa kʊ zinəro n ta m bɩ m, kan kurkuuro wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ dɩnda gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Ŋ n a da a ra, ŋn'a yɛm Yeezuu han k'an a hʊr a tara bɩ ra.
Kʊ Yeezuu bʊr an nɩ dam kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ bɩ, gʊaa kʊ zinəro n ta m bɩ k'a waa b'a yɛ han k'a bɩr kan kɩ.
Bɩ Yeezuu n zaa ka ʊ y, b'a a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Doo ɩ yaa a hɩ ɩ har zannɔ m. K'ɩ hɔ kʊ Zuuba a ba ɩbɩɩ m a cicirzɛrɛ minto bɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ.»
Gʊaa bɩ n a hʊr, an aa hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba a m haay bɩ dɩnda Taraburo wɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m. Gʊaa haay n zɛ kədə.
Kʊ Yeezuu a wusigə kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ m an higʊta bɩ zɛ ra an lee ku tʊr deem bɩ ra b'ʊ bɩ, zamaa cir gʊta a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋnɩ bʊr zi. Nyɩnta Yeezuu b'ʊ higʊta bɩ lɛ ra.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ cir deem n bʊr, a tɔ m Zayɩɩr. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a kukurə zɛ a taa,
an a yɛ han kan a heer kɩ haay, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ poore a zɔ zɛ ma, bʊr ɩ bɩ ɩ wɔ ka nyɩ bɩ mim la, k'an a waa, k'an la sɔ.»
Yeezuu n cem kan kɩ, zamaa gʊta n zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ, ŋn'a so ʊ, ŋn'ɩ tʊntɔm kʊ ra.
Lʊ n ta ʊ, ma n'a dam zi a dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya hɔ m naa.
A a yɔ gʊta nyɩsɩbənno wɔ ʊ, a nyɩsɩbarɛ nɔ ʊ. A a wɔhɔ zar haay a tar la, b'a n a waa y. Yaaba bɩ n'a dam la.
Lʊ bɩ k'a Yeezuu mim ma bɩ, a bʊr a kur zamaa gaa ʊ b'ʊ, an a wɔ da a huu ma.
Bala, lʊ b'a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ m wɔ da a huu tɔkkɛ ma, mɔɔ yɩ m waam.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, lʊ bɩ yaaba b'a da jɩm ʊ. A n a dɔ a ʊ, yaaba bɩ bɔ a mɛ ʊ, b'a a waa.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a dɔ a ʊ, paŋŋa bɔ a mɛ ʊ poore, an a wusigə zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, an laaka da, a ʊ: «Nka y'a wɔ da mɔɔ huu ma?»
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ yɩ zamaa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔtam, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ nɩ laaka darɛ, ɩ ʊ, nka y'a wɔ da ɩbɩɩ ma gɛ?»
Yeezuu nɩ dɩndɩgarɛ a jɩr ʊ, k'a zaa yɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʊ b'ɩ nyi bam a mɛ n nɩ hinkəm, k'a hɔ k'a ba a m bɩ dɔ bɩ, a bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa, an a sɩra hɩ m haay.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʊmbɔ, ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ, bɩ, ɩ ɩ waa ɩ yaaba bɩ minto.»
K'a nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʊɔɔ a to zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ har ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ ga. K'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ Zuuba da kɔrɛ ma lʊnlɔ gɛ?»
Bɩ, Yeezuu n a tʊr ka mim bɩ ma y. A n a hɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, sɩra ka bala.»
A n yɛ kʊ gɔsɩ n zu kʊ ʊ kan a kɩ y. Pɩyɛɛr a gaa bala, Zakkɩ kan a danzaa Zaan kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ har ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu gʊɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ tatʊr barɛ, ŋn'ɩ baa darɛ, ŋn'ɩ zee dam.
A n gasʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ tatʊr kan baadarɛ kɩ nɩ? Nyɩ bɩ n ga y, hinceem a ba.»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʊm Yeezuu ma. A n la gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ra, ŋnɩ bɔ, an nyɩ bɩ zɩ kan a da kɩ to, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ gasʊ nyɩ bɩ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
K'a nyɩ bɩ wɔ sa bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Taliita kum» A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: «M nyɩnnɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, wuti!»
Lɛɛm bɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ wuti, an nɩ tam. Bala, nyɩ bɩ dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya. A m bɩ, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə.
Yeezuu lɛ ka gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.» A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka nyɩ b'ʊ, k'an a bɩ!»
Yeezuu a hʊr lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an ta kʊ k'a tʊr ʊ b'ʊ.

*Sabaa hinni k'a a ku bɩ, Yeezuu hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ. Zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gʊta y'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ a to mindɔrɛ naa do m ka? A to awɔɔ ʊ hɔɔn naa do m ka, an a da ma, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ a wɔ nɩ?
Awɔɔ bɛɛ m Maarii nyɩ, an nɩ gɔ wum bɩ ra? Zakkɩ, Zozɛs, Ziidi kan Sɩmɔɔn kɩ danyɩ bɛɛ ra? Awɔɔ danlʊrɔ ba wɔɔ bire ʊ naa ʊ ra?» Naa do a ka ŋ n kaanm Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ daʊrɛ yɩrɛ a zɩ kʊ ʊ kan a yɩrɛrɔ kɩ, a har gʊɔɔ kɩ bire ʊ y.»
Yeezuu n hoser ba b'ʊ y, kʊ gʊɔɔ k'a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an ŋ waa rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y.
Yeezuu zɛ kədə ŋ sɩrakarɛ war bɩ tɔ ma.
Yeezuu cem an nɩ hɔ dɩndam kʊrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu n bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ ŋ nyɔɔm hɩɩya-hɩɩya, an lɛ ka ŋ ʊ kʊ ŋ n la zinəro ra.
A a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ sa a wɔ ʊ zaa sarɛ minto y. Bur, hɛra, busoo, a b'a sa y, k'a maam bara m.
Bɩ, k'a kʊsɔrɔ da ʊ, k'a huu sa deem.»
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a lee ku kʊ ʊ, k'a gɔɔta har kʊ n y'awɔɔ si ʊ b'ʊ, an ta, an awɔɔ hʊrlɛ dɔmɩm ku.
K'awɔɔ ta kʊ ʊ, ŋ nɩ kaanm awɔɔ m, kʊ ŋ n a tʊr ka awɔɔ mim ma, k'a ɩ doom, k'a kʊ bɩ taanyisi gʊngʊ a gam ma, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ.»
Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a hʊr ŋn'a hɩm gʊɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'a a bɔ a taam, k'a sugur yɛ.»
Ŋ la zinəro ra gʊta, ŋ nyɔɔ nɔ yaabazannɔ gʊta ma, ŋnɩ ŋ waa.
Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Yeezuu mim ma, bala, a tɔ bɔ lɛɛ woo… ʊ. Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zaan-Batiisi a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ. Bɩ y'a ka, an paŋŋa yɩ, an nɩ hoserlo bam.»
Nawɔnnɔ ʊ: «*Elii m.» Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ deem m am biisi hɔɔ wɔɔ m.»
Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba bɩ ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Zaan-Batiisi m! Mɔɔ n a ka, n n a mim gʊ ma bɩ y'a a ya, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ!»
A yɩ sɩra, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, n nɩ Zaan nyasʊ, n n'a sur, n n'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ bɩ, naa ba a ʊ: a dam Filipi lʊ k'a yɔ m a tɔ m Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ bɩ minto.
Bala, Zaan a hɩ Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʊ: «A n a ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ m ɩ dam lʊ yɔm y!»
Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩnta an sɔ Zaan m, a lɛ n taa k'a ka kʊ n n a zɛ, b'a b'a dam ma y.

Hɩrɔɔdɩ ɩ nyi bam Zaan m, an nɩ kum la, bala, a a dɔ, a ʊ: Zaan bɩ, gʊaa tɩrga nɩ, gʊaa mɩŋŋa m sɔ. K'a a tʊr ka Zaan meerbaa bɩ ma bɩ, a n a dɔ kʊ bɔ an n'a hɩm Zaan nɩ y, b'a a meerbaa bɩ ŋʊa, an n'a tʊr kam ma.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, toore a ka Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ ʊ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ a kʊ lɛɛzannɔ, yarbənno jɩtannɔ, kan Galilee gʊɔɔ gʊtɔɔ kɩ bir a yɩrɛ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ ma.

Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ gasʊ hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ cɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an sar ba zamaa bɩ bire ʊ; a Hɩrɔɔdɩ nɔ yɩ kan hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ kɩ. Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a hɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa bɩ yɛ mɔɔ han, kʊ m a ka ɩ ʊ.»
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a wer si bɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ ʊ, baa kʊ mɔɔ cirbəə tara bɩ zɛkumbir m.»
Nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ n bɔ, an aa a hɩ a da m, a ʊ: «M bɔ yɛ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zaan-Batiisi mim yɛ.»
Nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ n ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an aa a hɩ cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ lɛ n taa dɩɩtaa, k'ɩ Zaan-Batiisi mim da laaga ʊ, ɩ ka m ʊ.»
Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ heer a zar, bɩ, a b'a dam ma, an a gu ma y, k'a a wer si hɔbɩrɛbinno wɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ minto.
Lɛɛm bɩ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ lɛ ka a dɔmazaa deem ʊ, k'an bʊr Zaan mim m. A dɔmazaa bɩ n ta lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an aa Zaan mim gʊ ma,
an bʊr m laaga ʊ, an b'a ka nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ b'ʊ, an a si, an a ka a da ʊ.
Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ Zaan gər bɩ sa, ŋn'aa bir.
Yeezuu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʊr zi, ŋnɩ hɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m, kan hɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a dɩnda gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ n toore yɩ k'a hɔ bɩ gʊɔɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm, ŋn'a wusigəm bɩ minto. Bɩ minto y'a ka, a ʊ: «K'a bʊr k'ʊ bɔ toore ma, bɩncɛ kʊ gʊɔɔ ba ʊ b'ʊ, k'a hoon si poore.»
Ŋ yaa da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, ŋnɩ ta toore ma bɩncɛ kʊ gɔsɩ ba ʊ b'ʊ.
Bɩ gʊɔɔ gʊta ŋ cenle yɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ dɔ, ŋnɩ bra si a gam ma, ŋnɩ lɛɛ ka Yeezuu m kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu bɔ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a zamaa cir gʊta yɩ. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ cicir n a nyasʊ, bala, bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan hɔbɩsɩ cir kʊ ŋ dɔmazaa ba ʊ bɩ kɩ. A a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ hɔ gʊta dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Gum k'a bʊr an nɩ dam bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gum da, bɩ pooyaa m naa,
gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra kʊ ŋ nɩ ta kʊrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ŋn'a bɩ!»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a bɩ!» Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ʊ aa bur si *deniyee zɔɔhɩra k'ʊ b'a ka ŋ ʊ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a yaa dɩga a, bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʊ?» Kʊ ŋ yaa dɩga a bɩ, ŋ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bur soor n ta ʊ kan zɔ kɩ hɩɩya.»
A n lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n zamaa bɩ nyɩnta bur butur bɩ ra.
Ŋ nɩ nyɩnyɩnta zɔrɔ-zɔrɔ, busoor-busoor.
Yeezuu bur soor bɩ si kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ a wɔ ʊ, an dɩga brama, an a barka da ʊ, an ŋ zɩnzɛra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n a ka zamaa b'ʊ. A zɔ hɩɩya bɩ jir zamaa bɩ m sɔ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay a bɩ, an ŋ ka.
Ŋ bur kan zɔ kɩ kuuro gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
Bur bɩ binno wɔɔ barla, yar tisi soor ɩ nyɩnta ʊ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, k'a bra gəm la Bɛtsayɩdaa zeezi.» A mɩŋŋa n gɔɔta k'a zamaa bɩ da zaa ra.
K'a ŋ da zaa ra, an a nya bɩ, a a hʊr, an ta ci ra k'a yaa da.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ hi bireyaa ku, a mɩŋŋa nɩ gəm la.
K'a yɩ hɩnhɛr n a nya ŋ lɛ, ŋn'a yɔm kan kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bɔrɛ kɩ bɩ, dɔ k'a bʊr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a wuti an tɔ hi ra, an nɩ tarɛ ŋ zi, an a yo k'a cem ŋ han.
Kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ an nɩ tam hi ra bɩ, ŋ yɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʊ: «Toor m,» ŋn'ɩ zee dam.
Bala, ŋ haay a yɩ, nyibəə n ŋ nyasʊ. Lɛɛm bɩ, Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, a ʊ: «K'a sɩra ka, mɔɔ m, a da bɩ bɔ ʊ y!»
A n da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ kan ŋ kɩ, hɩnhɛr bɩ n jɩm. Ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋ n a so a ʊ y.
Baa kʊ ŋ bur bɩ jirle yɩ bɩ, ŋ n hɔsɩ jɩ ma ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu a da hɔ haay ma y.
Kʊ ŋ higʊta bɩ zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ yaa lee ku Zenezarɛtɩ gəm la, ŋn'a kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ kʊsɩ.
Kʊ ŋ zer lɛɛm bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu dɔ.
Ŋ n a si, ŋnɩ ta kʊrɔ haay ʊ, ŋn'aa yaabazannɔ busu a gʊraŋŋarɔ m, ŋnɩ bʊr ŋ nɩ bɩncɛ kʊ Yeezuu n ta ʊ b'ʊ.

Bɩncɛ k'a nɩ taŋ ʊ, kʊrɔ gʊtɔɔ ʊ, kʊrɔ poorero ʊ, bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʊ, zɛ n nawʊm yaabazannɔ m daasɩrɔ ʊ, ŋn'a yɛm han, k'an yɛ kʊ ŋ n'a wɔ da a huu lɛ ma bala. Bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a wɔ da ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ yɩ haay.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ y'a to Zerizalɛm ʊ, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋnɩ bʊr Yeezuu zi,
ŋnɩ Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm kan dintim kɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ŋ n a wɔ hir y.
Kʊ sɩra nɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ kɩ haay hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ bɩ, a wɔ ŋn'a hirm mɩŋŋa, amba ŋ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ y'a to daasɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr, ŋ bɩr hɔ bɩm kʊ ŋ n dintim gʊ a ma y. Ŋ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ vantɔɔ ta ʊ gʊta, amba hɛrɔ sʊrgɔrɛ, gərlo kan hɔbɩrɛ mɔdrɔ kɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ laaka da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr zum wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm, bɩ ŋ n hi nyasʊ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zambʊzannɔ, Ezayii gumə ta ʊ, Woso lɛ k'a a si an so ra, an awɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ nɔ ʊ, bala, a a gʊrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʊ, a ʊ:
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro, mɔɔ da ŋ nawʊŋ ʊ a lɛ m,
bɩ ŋ heer laatʊ mɔɔ ma,
bɩ mɔɔ daʊrɛ bɩ vam m.
Durnya mim ŋ n'a dɩndam gʊɔɔ m, Woso hɔ bɛɛ y.
Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ to, an nɩ zum gʊɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɔ awɔɔ ʊ a jɛ m, an nɩ zum a yɩnnɩbayɩ ʊ.
Bala, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʊ,› bɩ, ‹Gʊaa k'a zɩ bɔ ʊ kan a da kɩ, kʊ ŋ n a zɛ gər.›
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩm, a ʊ: Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a zɩ m gɛɛ a da m, a ʊ: hɔ kʊ mɔɔ m ga m, m m dam ɩbɩɩ han bɩ ‹kɔrbaan m› a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Woso mannɩ hɔ m.›
A n a ga m, k'an a da a zɩ han gɛɛ a da han dɔ y.
A ba awɔɔ nawʊm ncɩnaaʊ an nɩ Woso lemim bɩ zaar bam a yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ m. Ziro ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ lɔɔrɔ awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam gʊta.»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu zamaa bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a tʊr ka mɔɔ ma, k'a da a heer ʊ.
Hɔ ba ʊ, an n'a tom garga ra, an gasʊ gʊaa nɔ ʊ k'a dintim ka ma y. Bɔ n'a tom gʊaa nɔ ʊ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma. [
Gʊaa k'a nɩ tʊr m bɩ, k'an a tʊr ka ma.]»
K'a a gʊ zamaa bɩ ma, an gasʊ har ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a lar hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do jɩ ma.
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ n naa do jɩ dɔ ra? Awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʊ: hɔ k'a n'a tore, an nɩ gasʊm gʊaa nɔ ʊ bɩ b'a dam ma, an dintim ka ma ra?
Bala, a nɔ an nɩ gasʊŋ ʊ, an ta, an nɩ bɔm garga ra, a bɩr gasʊrɛ a heer ʊ y.» Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Yeezuu y'a hɩnkarɛ, a ʊ: «hɔbɩrɛ haay mɩŋŋa.»
A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ nɩ bɔm gʊaa nɔ ʊ bɩ nɩ dintim kam ma.
Bala, gʊaa heer hɔɔndarɛ bʊnyaa bɩ n nɩ bɔŋ ʊ: so a mɩŋŋa ʊ, koorbarɛ, gərzɛrɛ,
jaandarɛ, gʊaa hɔ ŋʊarɛ, zibʊnyaa do haay barɛ, bra ba gʊaa m, mɩsɩrbaa bʊnyaa barɛ, jɩm barɛ, gʊaa tɔ zarlɛ, mɩŋŋa busure kan yarmabaa kɩ.
Hɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro haay, bɔ ŋ nawʊm gʊaa heer ʊ, ŋn'ɩ dintim kam ma.»
Yeezuu k'a cem b'ʊ bɩ, a ta Tiir kʊ ʊ, an aa gasʊ har ʊ, a lɛ baa kʊ ŋ n a yɩ y. Bɩ, a n a da ma, an a nyaakʊm da y.
Bala, lʊ nɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ m, zinə nɩ kan kɩ. Bɩ, lʊ bɩ Yeezuu mim ma, an bra si, an bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa.
Lʊ bɩ, grɛkkɩ do m, yɩ a ʊ Siirii kʊ Fenisii ʊ. A n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an la zinə bɩ ra nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ mɛ ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «A to kʊ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ŋ hɔ bɩ, an ŋ ka. A n a ga m, ŋnɩ nyɩnɔ hɔbɩrɛ sa, ŋn'a ka jinnyɩnɔ ʊ y.»
Lʊ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, Zuuba, bɩ, jinnyɩnɔ wɔɔ tɩr hɔbɩrɛ kuuro kʊ ŋ y'a lunlo taabɩr bɩ taa bɩ gʊr, ŋn'a bɩ.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Meerbaa naa do minto, doo, zinə bɩ bɔ ɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ mɛ ʊ.»
Lʊ bɩ n a hʊr, an doo, an aa a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, an nɩ wʊtam gargʊ burə ʊ. Zinə bɩ n bɔ a mɛ ʊ.
Yeezuu a hʊr Tiir kʊ ʊ, an a bɔ, an bɔ Sidɔn ʊ kan Taraburo wɔɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ, an ta Galilee higʊta zeezi.
N bʊr tikki m Yeezuu zi. Tikki bɩ, bɛkka m sɔ. N n a yɛ han k'an a wɔ ka a mim la, k'an a waa.
Yeezuu n a gaa zamaa bɩ jɩr ʊ, an bɔ m toore ma, an a nyʊkʊnnyɩnɔ dundu tikki bɩ tʊr ʊ, an lihi da, a nyʊkʊr ma, an a nɔ a nɛɛm ma,
an a bɔɔta an dɩga brama, an hoonsi bɔ a rɛ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɛfata!»
A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ gʊ!» A tʊʊrɔ wɔɔ n a gʊ lɛɛm, a nɛɛm bɩ n a bɔ kʊ zi, an nɩ meer bam mɩŋŋa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.» Yeezuu k'a lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: ŋ b'a hɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a pa da, an lɛ da biisi ra.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A ɩ hɔ haay bam mɩŋŋa; A ɩ tikkiro tʊr gʊm, a a ka bəətinno nɩ meer bam!»
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ bɩ, zamaa gʊta a ya, an ta ʊ, bɩ hɔbɩrɛ ba ʊ kʊ ŋ n a bɩ y. Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Zamaa bɩ cicir ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, ŋ dɔmɩm kaakʊ mɔɔ zi, bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ ba ŋ ʊ y.
Kʊ mɔɔ ŋ da zaa ra kan nɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a dundom zaa ra, bɩ gɔsɩnnɔ a to laatʊ.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «K'ʊ bur yɩ ka poohɔɔn ʊ naa ʊ, ʊ a ka ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a bɩ k'an ŋ ka?»
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bur karɔ n ta awɔɔ ʊ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Saanhɩna»
A n lɛ ka, a ʊ, ŋ n nyɩnta tara ʊ. A n bur saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ gʊr, an a barka da ʊ, an n'a zɩnzɛ ra, an n'a kam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'a kam zamaa b'ʊ.
Zɔnnyɩnɔ nyɩnta ŋ ʊ sɔ. Yeezuu n ŋ barka da ʊ, a ʊ: ŋ n a ka ŋ ʊ sɔ.
Ŋ n a bɩ, an ŋ ka. Ŋ n a kuuro gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma saanhɩna.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta, ŋn'a zɔ tisi si ma. Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ da zaa ra.
Lɛɛm bɩ, a da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam Dalmanutaa zeezi.
Farizɛɛnrɔ bʊr, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Yeezuu kɩ, ŋn'a yɛ han, k'an hoser kʊ Woso a ka ʊ bɩ ba, k'a dɩga a, a y'a dam ma, an a ba gɛ.
Yeezuu hoon gʊta si, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto her zamaana naa nɩ hoser yɛrɛ? Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, hoser ba ʊ mɔɔ n n'a bam awɔɔ zamaana naa do minto y.»
A n a gʊ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ma, an aa da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, an bra gəm deem bɩ ra.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, bur sarɛ tɔ bɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ. Bur deem bala nɩ ŋ ʊ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Yeezuu lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi, k'a ba laatʊ farizɛɛnrɔ nyʊnyɔɔ bɩ ma, kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ hɔ bɩ kɩ ma sɔ.»
Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʊ kɩ, kʊ bur ba ŋ ʊ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu n a ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a karɛ? Bur k'a ba awɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto m gɛ? Awɔɔ hɔɔn gɔɔta a n gu k'a jɩ dɔ ra? Awɔɔ heer ɩ ka gɛ?
Awɔɔ mɩnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ bɩ, ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩm na? Awɔɔ tʊʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ bɩ, ŋ bɩr mim mam na?
Kʊ mɔɔ bur soor zɩnzɛ ra, m a ka gʊaa tisi soor ʊ bɩ, a tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʊ ra? Awɔɔ kuuro gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Bueerehɩɩya.»
«Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ bur saanhɩna zɩnzɛ ra m a ka gʊaa tisi si ʊ bɩ, kasɩ lɛ ma karɔ awɔɔ kuuro gʊr ʊ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Saanhɩna.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ gɔɔta a n a dɔ, a ʊ, bur mim bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma ra?»
Ŋ lee ku Bɛtsayɩdaa ʊ, n n bʊr bʊʊ m Yeezuu zi, n n a yɛ han, k'an a wɔ da bʊʊ bɩ ma, k'an lɛɛ yɩ.
A n bʊʊ bɩ gaa a wɔ ma, an bɔ m bɔlɛɛma, an lihi da a mɩm ma, an a wɔ ka a mim la, an n'a larm, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔsɩ yɩm na?»
K'a mɩm bɩ gʊ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ yɩm, ɩ ʊ, gɔrɔ m, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an a wɔ ka gʊaa bɩ mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ ra. Gʊaa bɩ nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ…, an a waa, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa.
Yeezuu n a da a har zaa ra, a ʊ: «Ɩ b'a ka ɩ gasʊ kʊnɔ b'ʊ y!»
Yeezuu ɩ tam kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ Filipi-Sezaaree kʊrɔ jɩnjɛɛnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ. Zaa ra bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩm, ŋ ʊ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: Zaan-Batiisi m, nawɔnnɔ ʊ: *Elii m, gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem m.»
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Nka m mɔɔ nɩ?» Pɩyɛɛr n meerbaa bɩ sa, an a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m.»
A n lɛ ka ŋ ʊ mɩŋŋa, a ʊ: ŋ b'awɔɔ mim bɩ hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, a n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: pakra m, kʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n cicir ba gʊta. Bɩ, gʊɔɔgusinno kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ, kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ kaanɩm nɩ, an ta kan a zɛrɛ kɩ, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʊ dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ.
A n minno nɔɔn duro nyaakʊm da an n'a hɩrɛ y. Pɩyɛɛr n a gaa an bɔ m toore ma, an nɩ nyaa bam kan Yeezuu kɩ, a ʊ: a n a ga m, an naa hɩ y.
Bɩ, Yeezuu k'a wusigə an dɩga a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, a həən si Pɩyɛɛr ma, a ʊ: «Ɩ jɛ bɔ mɔɔ jɩr ʊ! Sʊtaana, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan Woso hɔ kɩ y. Gʊɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ m.»
Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ, an a karɩndanyɩnɔ bir kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʊ, k'an a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ to, k'an a gɔdarkʊra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, gʊaa k'a a lɛ n taa k'a meeyaa bʊmbɔ bɩ, a b'a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa ga mɔɔ tɔ ma, kan lemim nyɩnta bɩ kɩ tɔ ma, a y'a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a so durnya hɔ haay ʊ, an bɔkarɛ, an ga, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka?
Bɔ gʊaa bɩ n n'a sam, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ nɩ?

Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma kan mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ kɩ tɔ ma, her zamaana jaandənno nɔɔn duro kan mimbʊnyaabənno nɔɔm kɩ bireyaa ʊ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ b'a zaa nyannɩ zɛm, dɔmɩm k'a nɩ zɛŋ ʊ, kan malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ kɩ b'ʊ y.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ naa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ hinni b'a kure y, ŋn'ɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ yɩm kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ.»
Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu Pɩyɛɛr, Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma a minto ci jintə mim ʊ, an a lʊr ŋ mɩm ʊ.
A huuro wɔɔ nɩ nyakɩ bɔm, gʊaa ba ʊ an b'a nyakɩ bɔrɛ bɩ makra barɛ y.
*Elii n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan Moyiisi kɩ, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan Yeezuu kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʊ, a mɩŋŋa. K'ʊ bur ba kaakʊ: ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem.»
Dabɔʊ ŋ haay nyasʊ. Bɩ y'a ka, Pɩyɛɛr n a dɔ kʊ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y.
Warkʊ bʊr an b'a ku ŋ la, meerbaa n a to warkʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Nyɩ kʊ mɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ n naa do, k'a tʊr ka ma.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, a bɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ, ŋnɩ dɩga a jɩr ʊ bɩ, ŋ n gɔsɩ yɩ kʊ Yeezuu bɛɛ m a deem kan ŋ kɩ y.
Kʊ ŋ n'ɩ zerm ci bɩ ra bɩ, a lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: «hɔ kʊ ŋbɔɔ n a yɩ bɩ, ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y, k'an ta, an Gʊaanyɩ bɩ mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ku gəəno bire ʊ.
Ŋ lɛ naa do si, bɩ, ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa larm: ‹Mɩmbɔʊrɛ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ mim bɩ ma.› »
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ Elii n lɛɛ ka an bʊr Krista m gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, Elii nɩ lɛɛ karɛ an bʊr k'a bɩ hɔ haay banka. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, a m lɔ, ŋn'a gʊrsɩra ba ŋ ʊ: Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bɔʊrɛ yɩm b'a fɩr yɩm gʊta gɛ?
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, Elii bʊr, bɩ ŋ y'a hɔɔnhɔ ba m, amba hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gʊrsɩra ba a minto bɩ m.»
Kʊ Yeezuu a wusigə kan karɩndanyɩnɔ kaakʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ zi bɩ, ŋ zamaa cir gʊta yɩ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan ŋ kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a yaa daʊrɛ yaa da m.
A n karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a kam kan ŋ kɩ?»
Gʊaa n a to zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, an a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: karɩnsaamba, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ, m nyɩ m ɩbɩɩ zi, zinə n ta m, an a ba bəətir.
K'a wuti ma bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ, a do an nawʊm b'ʊ, an lihihur ta a lɛ rɛ, an n'a sɔ sʊrɛ, a mɛ bɩ n a ba taŋŋɩ-taŋŋɩ. Mɔɔ n a yɛ ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʊ ŋ nɩ la zinə bɩ ra, bɩ ŋ n a da ma y.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Do sɩrakarɛ war zannɔ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm karɔ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ? Kʊ m nyasʊ awɔɔ m dɔmɩm karɔ? K'a nyɩ bɩ gaa, a bʊr m mɔɔ zi.»
Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m. Nyɩ bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ lɛɛm bɩ, zinə bɩ n a hinkə, an a do tara ʊ, an nɩ pɩr kam, an nɩ lihi bɔrɛ a rɛ.
Yeezuu n a zɩ bɩ lar, a ʊ: «Yaaba b'a sɩŋŋɩda ba brɔ an nɩ nyɩ bɩ ma?» A ʊ: «A nyɩbaa ma.
Dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʊ, a a zɛ, an a da sɛ ʊ, gɛɛ hi ʊ k'an ga. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ dam hɔsɩ ma, k'ɩ da wɔɔ han, ɩ cicirzɛrɛ minto.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʊ: k'ɩ y'ɩ dam ma! Hɔ woo… a da ma an ba sɩrakarɛzaa m.»
