Lɛɛm bɩ, nyɩ bɩ zɩ bɩ n zee da, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, m sɩrakarɛ war bɩ minto!»
Yeezuu k'a zamaa bɩ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zɛm gʊta bɩ, a həən si zinə bɩ ma, a ʊ: «Zinə, ɩbɩɩ n nɩ gʊaa bam bəətir, ɩ n n'a bam tikki, bɔ nyɩ naa do mɛ ʊ, bɩ, ɩ b'ɩ ya ɩ gasʊ y!»
Zinə bɩ n nyɩ bɩ hinkə kan paŋŋa kɩ, an bɔ a mɛ ʊ kan zee kɩ. Nyɩ bɩ n gɔɔta am gər hɔ bɩ m. Gʊɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Ga a ʊ.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a sa a wɔ ma, an a busu, an a jɩm brama.
Kʊ Yeezuu gasʊ har ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a lar a deem, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto y'a ka wɔɔ n ʊ da ma, ʊ la zinə bɩ ra?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zinə ncɩnaaʊ do bɩ, hɔ ba ʊ, an b'a dam ma an a ka, an bɔ, kʊ yaadarɛ bɛɛ y.»
Yeezuu k'a cem kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ bra Galilee ʊ, Yeezuu n a ŋʊa kʊ n n a dɔ y.
Bala, a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «N Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊm, ŋn'a ka gʊɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'a zɛ, b'a zɛ bɩ kur bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.»
Bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ŋ n'a jɩ dɔrɛ y, b'a larlɛ nyibəə ta ŋ nɩ.
Ŋ yaa lee ku Kapɛrnawum ʊ. Gasʊ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ har ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ n'a kam zaa ra bɩ?»
Ŋ n zɛ pi, bala, zaa ra bɩ, ŋ bʊgʊr ba kʊ ma jɩtambaa minto.
Yeezuu n nyɩnta, an gʊaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr jɩtaarɛ, k'an bɩr gʊaa haay jɛzaa, k'an bɩr gʊaa haay zibəənyɩ.»
A n nyɩ gaa, an a jɩm ŋ bire ʊ, an a wɔ burgu ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Gʊaa k'a nyɩnɔ nɔɔm gʊaa deem da ʊ bɩ, a ba a ʊ mɔɔ m. Bɩ gʊaa k'a mɔɔ da ʊ bɩ, a n mɔɔ da ʊ m deem y, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a da ʊ sɔ.»
Zaan n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gʊaa yɩ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, wɔɔ k'ʊ a gʊ ma k'a bɩr zum kʊ ʊ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ minto.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A b'a gʊ ma y, bala, gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ lam zinəro ra mɔɔ tɔ m, an a ya, an mɔɔ tɔ zar y.
Gʊaa k'a bɩr jɩm bam kan wɔɔ kɩ y, wɔɔ gʊaa m.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a hi ka awɔɔ ʊ poore a mi, kʊ mɔɔ gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ minto, a zaa bɩ kʊrɔm a ganwʊrɛ ma y.
Kʊ gʊaa a ka nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ nɔɔn duro gʊaa deem n'a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ, kʊ n jɛnlajaa gʊta kʊsɩ a wer ma, n n a da higʊta ʊ, a jɩra.
K'ɩ wɔ y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, k'ɩ gasʊ ɩ wɔ deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ b'ʊ, bɩ jɩra, gasʊ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʊm ɩ wɔ hɩɩya m sɛhar k'a lihire ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
K'ɩ gam y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ zɛ ra, k'ɩ gasʊ ɩ gam deem m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ b'ʊ, bɩ jɩra, gasʊ k'ɩbɩɩ nawʊm ɩ gam hɩɩya m sɛhar ʊ bɩ m.
K'ɩ mɩnyaa y'ɩ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma, k'ɩ bɔ ʊ, k'ɩ gasʊ ɩ mɩnyaa deem m, Woso cirbəə b'ʊ, bɩ jɩra, k'ɩ gasʊ ɩ mɩm hɩɩya m sɛhar ʊ bɩ m,
bɩncɛ kʊ mukuno bɩr gɩngaŋ ʊ, sɛ bɩr lihiŋ ʊ sɔ y.
Bala, n sɛ sam, n nɩ yɛ da gʊaa haay ma.
Yɛ naa, hɔ mɩŋŋa m. Bɩ kʊ yɛ b'a nyɩntabaa nɩ y, k'a banka bɔ nɩ? K'a ka kʊ yɛ n bɩr ta a ma, k'a nyɩnta kan kʊ kɩ laafɩɩ.»
Yeezuu a hʊr b'ʊ, an ta Zidee ʊ, Zʊrdɛn kur, zamaa n a ya, an a so kʊ ma a jɩr ʊ, an a ya, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, am dɔmɩm haay hɔ bɩ m.
Farizɛɛnrɔ n a zɔ k'a nyasʊ meerbaa nɔ ʊ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'a larlɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Yar a da ma an la a lʊ ra gɛ?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Bɔ Moyiisi a gʊrsɩra ba awɔɔ nɩ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Moyiisi ʊ, n n harcɩntarɛ kaansʊrɛ ci ba, kʊ n n bɔkarɛ, n n la lʊ ra.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ heerkarɛ minto y'a ka, an lɛ naa do gʊrsɩra ba.
Durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ, Woso yar da kan lʊ kɩ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, yar n n'a gʊm a zɩ ma kan a da kɩ, k'a nyɩnta kan a lʊ kɩ.
Bɩ, ŋ gʊaa hɩɩya bɩ y'a bam mɛsim deem. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ŋ bɩ gʊaa hɩɩya dɔ y, mɛsim deem zannɔ m.
Hɔ kʊ Woso a zɛ kʊ ra bɩ, a b'a ka gʊaa n a gʊngʊ kʊ ma y.»
Kʊ ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ doo har ʊ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya, ŋn'a lar mim naa do jɩ ma.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a la a lʊ ra, an a vanta sa bɩ, jaan an n'a dam kan bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ, kʊ lʊ a gʊ a zim ma, an a vanta sa, jaan an n'a dam kan bɩ kɩ sɔ.»
Gʊɔɔ bʊr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a yɛ han k'an a wɔ da ŋ ma, b'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yɛ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
Yeezuu k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a nɔ ma ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ to ŋnɩ bʊr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ tolle y, bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɔ m Woso cirbəə bɩ m.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a n Woso cirbəə bɩ si am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ m bɩ, a bɩ gasʊŋ ʊ y.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, a a wɔ burgu ŋ ma, an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la, an nɩ ŋ barka daŋ ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ zaa sa, ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, gʊaa n a si, an bɩ kukurə zɛ a taa, an a yɛ han, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba mɩŋŋa, bɔ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba, kʊ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto, ɩ n nɩ mɔɔ birm mɩŋŋa? Gʊaa mɩŋŋa ba ʊ kʊ Woso deem bɛɛ y.
Ɩbɩɩ Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ. ‹Ɩ bɩ gʊaa zɛ y, ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ ŋʊaar ba y, ɩ b'ɩ hɔɔn da gʊaa hɔ ma k'an yɩ ɩ hɔ y, ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʊ.› »
Gʊaa bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ naa haay sɩŋŋɩda sa m nyɩbaa ma, m n'a barɛ.»
Yeezuu n dɩga gʊaa bɩ ma, an a ŋʊa, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ deem ɩ jɩra ɩbɩɩ ma: ta, hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ hɛɛ haay, ɩ jir ŋʊazannɔ m. Ɩbɩɩ yaa arzaka yɩ Woso zi, k'ɩ bʊr ɩ zu mɔɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, gʊaa bɩ heer a zar gʊta, an a hʊr kan heerzarlɛ kɩ, bala, a arzaka nyɩnta ʊ gʊta.
Yeezuu k'a dɩga a jɩr ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə gasʊʊrɛ nyɩntam arzakazannɔ ma kaŋŋɩda!»
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə a meer naa do barɛ minto. Yeezuu n a ya, an so ra, a ʊ: «M danyɩnɔ, Woso cirbəə gasʊʊrɛ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Yoonde gasʊ huuka yaa m nyɩntam zanta an lɛ da arzakazaa gasʊ Woso cirbəə ʊ m.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya ŋnɩ zɛ kədə an lɛ da, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Nka n nɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ?»
Yeezuu n dɩga ŋ ma, a ʊ: «Gʊaa b'a dam ma, an a mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ y, bɩ Woso y'a da hɔ haay ma.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to, k'ʊ zu ɩbɩɩ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ gʊaa a gʊ a har, kan a zɩ kɩ, a da kɩ, a dakumbonno kɩ, a danlʊrɔ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a tara kɩ ma mɔɔ minto kan lemim nyɩnta bɩ minto kɩ,
a zaa har, kan da kɩ, dakumbonno kɩ, danlʊrɔ kɩ, nyɩnɔ kɩ, tara kɩ yɩm gallɛm zɔrɔ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro ʊ, kan fɩryɩrɛ kɩ. Durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʊ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩm sɔ.
Lɛɛkarɛzannɔ gʊta nyɩntam jɛzannɔ, jɛzannɔ nyɩntam lɛɛkarɛzannɔ.»

Ŋ y'a hʊr, ŋnɩ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʊ. Yeezuu nɩ tarɛ ŋ lɛɛ. Dabɔʊ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ, nyibəə gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ zu kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ. Yeezuu a ya, an bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir a jɩr ʊ, an nɩ mim k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ ba m bɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«K'a dɩga, ta kʊ wɔɔ nawʊm Zerizalɛm ʊ naa, n yaa Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊ n a ka wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ ʊ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ ʊ. Ŋ y'a dʊdɔ yarlɛ k'a zɛ gər, ŋn'a da do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔ ʊ.
Ŋ yaa wʊm ma, ŋ lihi dam ma, ŋ y'a zɛm madɩɩrɔ m, ŋ y'a zɛrɛ an ga, bɩ, dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.»
Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han naa ma bɩ, ɩ bɩ zɛ wɔɔ m ma y.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ mɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ minto?»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'ʊ a yɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩbɩɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ ʊ, k'ɩ ka kʊ wɔɔ gʊaa deem n nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ, deem ɩbɩɩ jɩsa.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n hɔ k'a n'a yɛm bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ a da ma, a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a mim laaga ʊ bɩ mi ra? Gɛɛ awɔɔ a da ma a fɩryɩrɛ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ ra?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ʊ da ma.» Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Laaga hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a mim bɩ, awɔɔ y'a mim, fɩr kʊ mɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ,
bɩ, k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ jɩsa kan mɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ kɩ nyɩntarɛ nɩ, mɔɔ n m da ma m zaa ka y, bala, mɔɔ n m so ʊ y. Bɩncɛ bɩ banka Woso ʊ ŋ zannɔ minto.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ buro wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ nɔ ma ʊ kan Zakkɩ kɩ, Zaan kɩ.
Yeezuu n ŋ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʊ: gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma cinno wɔɔ, brɔɔ nɩ paŋŋa barɛ a kʊrɔ ma, paŋŋazannɔ n'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ a gʊɔɔ ma.
B'a bɩ nyɩntarɛ ncɩnaaʊ awɔɔ bire ʊ y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bire ʊ, k'an a ba zibəənyɩ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a bɩr lɛɛkarɛzaa awɔɔ bire ʊ, k'an a ba awɔɔ haay lɔ.
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n bʊr kʊ gʊɔɔ n b'a hɔɔnhɔ ba y, bʊr a ʊ k'a b'a da gʊɔɔ han, k'a a mɩsɩrbaa ka gʊɔɔ gʊta bʊmbɔrɛ minto.»
Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, zamaa bɩ kɩ yaa lee ku Zeriko ʊ. Kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔm kʊnɔ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, bʊʊ ɩ nyɩnta zaa lezi b'ʊ, a tɔ m Bartimee, Time nyɩ m, an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm.
K'a a ma ŋ ʊ: Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu m bɩ, an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʊ: «*Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ bʊgʊr bam ma, ŋ ʊ, an a tʊr ka, b'a a banka, an a da ra: «*Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!»
Yeezuu n jɩm, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a bir!» N n a bir, n n a hɩ m, n ʊ: «Ɩ tɔ ʊ, wuti, a y'ɩ birm.»
Bʊʊ bɩ n a gɔbga bɔ a ra, an a zo, an wuti kan bra kɩ, an bʊr Yeezuu zi.
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʊ m bɔ ba ɩ nɩ?» Bʊʊ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, a ka kʊ m m ya, m lɛɛ yɩ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ta, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʊmbɔ.» Lɛɛm bɩ, a mɩnyaa ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, an zu Yeezuu ʊ, an nɩ tam.
Kʊ ŋ n'a zɔm Zerizalɛm ma, Bɛtfazee kan Betanii kɩ jɩr ʊ, ci kʊ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ zeezi bɩ, Yeezuu a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya,
an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta kʊ k'a n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʊ. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ yaa gasʊ b'ʊ lɛɛm nɩ, awɔɔ brapoo yɩm, n n a kʊsɩ, bɩ gʊaa n da ʊ cɩna y. K'a hʊr a bʊr m.
Kʊ gʊaa awɔɔ lar, a ʊ: bɔ minto m awɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ, k'a hɩ m, a ʊ: Zuuba lɛ n taa, a y'a tore awɔɔ m bʊr m lɛɛm.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋ n'aa brapoo yɩ, n n a kʊsɩ tɩnsara harlɛ ma zaa lɛ zi, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʊr.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ŋ lar, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m, awɔɔ n nɩ brapoo bɩ hʊrlɛ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, amba Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ m, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n ŋ to, ŋn'a hʊr.
Ŋ n ta brapoo bɩ m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a huuro ka brapoo bɩ ra, Yeezuu n da ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta n a huuro ka zaa bɩ ra, gɔsɩnnɔ n gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar hɔsɩrarɔ ʊ, ŋn'a ka ra.
Bɔɔ nɩ Yeezuu lɛɛ, kan bɔɔ n'a kur lɔ wɔɔ kɩ ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʊ: «*Hozaana! Kʊ gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ!
Kʊ cirbəə k'a nɩ zɛm naa n barka yɩ, am wɔɔ yaaba Davɩd hɔ bɩ m. *Hozaana! K'ɩ tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ brama.»
A n gasʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ, Wosocɛ ʊ. K'a dɩga hɔ haay ma bɩ, a a hʊr an ta Betanii ʊ kan bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kʊ gum da bɩ minto.
A dɔ k'a mɛ ŋn'ɩ bɔm Betanii ʊ bɩ, nɔ Yeezuu nyasʊ.
A n a to, an sɔɔn yɩ laatʊ a lɛɛ n ta ʊ, an ta kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a yaa dɩga a hɔsɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ gɛ. A zɔ k'a ʊ sɔɔn bɩ ma bɩ, a lɛɛ a yɩ, bala, sɔɔn bɔɔnrɛ dɔmɩm bɛɛ y.
A n a hɩ sɔɔn bɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa b'a yarɛ an ɩbɩɩ nyɩ bɩ dɔ y!» A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a ma.

Yeezuu yaa lee ku Zerizalɛm ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. Gasʊ kʊ Yeezuu ʊ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ lam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ ra Wosocɛ hallu ʊ b'ʊ. A busoolʊrlɛzannɔ mɔdrɔkuntərehɔɔ hɩnhɩsɩga kan cirpʊnnɔ hɛɛnno nyɩntaragɔrɔ kɩ.
Bɩ, a n gɔsɩ to an nɩ cenim mɔr m Wosocɛ hallu ʊ b'ʊ y.
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «N y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: ‹N mɔɔ cɛ bɩ birm yaadarɛ cɛ, do haay minto.› Awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a sa, a ba konno bɩncɛ.»
Kʊ Yeezuu naa hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ n a ma bɩ, ŋ y'a karɛ a zɛrɛ zaa ma. Bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam. Bala, zamaa b'a lɛ bɔ Yeezuu hɔdɩndarɛ b'ʊ.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ tara bɩ nɔ ʊ, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
A dɔ k'a mɛ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ sɔɔn bɩ yɩ, an ga kan a məsi kɩ.
Pɩyɛɛr n hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Dɩga, Zuuba, sɔɔn k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ lɛ da ʊ bɩ ga haay!»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a sɩra ka Woso ʊ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ gʊaa a hɩ ci naa do m: ‹Ɩ bɔɔta, ɩ ɩ da kɔ ʊ,› bɩ bɩsɩkarɛ ba a heer ʊ, k'a a sɩra ka, a ʊ: hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ bɩ barɛ, a bam, amba a a hɩ bɩ m.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɛm a yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, k'a sɩra ka, a ʊ, awɔɔ yɩ, bɩ n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ jɩm brama, an nɩ yaa dam, kʊ hɔ y'awɔɔ heer ʊ kan gʊaa kɩ, k'a sugur ka ʊ, k'awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ n awɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ sugur ka awɔɔ ʊ sɔ. [
Bɩ k'awɔɔ n sugur ka a muno ʊ, awɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ b'awɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ wɔɔ sugur karɛ y.]»
Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ a ya, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ. Yeezuu k'a nɩ bɩmbɩrm Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ bʊr zi, ŋ ʊ:
«Nka ɩ lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ naa barɛ minto? Nka ɩ zaa ka?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ m awɔɔ lar mim deem ma, k'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɔkarɛ, m bɩncɛ kʊ n lɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
Batɛm kʊ Zaan nyɩnta an n'a kam bɩ, a to a ʊ Woso zi gɛɛ, gʊɔɔ zi? K'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ!»
Ŋ n'ɩ bɩsɩ kɩnkam kʊ ma, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ: a to a ʊ Woso zi, a y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ: bɔ minto m wɔɔ n a mim si gɛ?
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ: a to a ʊ gʊɔɔ zi, zamaa bɩ bɩ yɛrɛ y. Kʊ zamaa bɩ Zaan dɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan… bɩ minto.»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ n a dɔ y.» Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʊ n lɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m sɔ y.»

Yeezuu n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom darɛ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta an dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn, an lambaar da ma, an yaa hɔn, k'a bɩr dɩvɛn nyɩ bɩ hi bɔŋ ʊ, an bɛŋŋʊ dɔ sɔ, an gʊɔɔ sa kʊ ŋ n dɔ dɩvɛnsɩra bɩ ma, an a hʊr an ta zaa ra.
Dɩvɛn mɔsa k'a a ku bɩ, a n a zibəənyɩ deem nyɔɔ wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, k'an aa a hɔ si, an b'a ka a ʊ.
Ŋ n a nyasʊ, ŋn'a zɛ, ŋn'a da zaa ra a wɔ n tu.
Wutu zaa bɩ n a ya, an zibəənyɩ vanta nyɔɔ. Wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a zɛ, ŋnɩ yaaba da a mim ma, ŋnɩ fɩr ka ma.
A n a ya, an a kaakʊ hɔ nyɔɔ, ŋn'a zɛ gər. Bɩ jɛ ʊ, an gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ nyɔɔ, ŋnɩ fɩr ka gɔsɩnnɔ ma, ŋnɩ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ.
A kur ma hɔ ma bɩ, a nyɩ k'a ŋʊa bɩ y'a deem ɩ gɔɔta, an a nyɔɔ ŋ zi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Ŋ mɔɔ nyɩ bɩ daŋ ʊ.›
Wutu zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a dɩnda kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: ‹A n nɩ zɛm b'a so arzaka b'ʊ. K'a bʊr, k'ʊ a zɛ, k'ʊ ʊ so wutu b'ʊ.›
Ŋ n a nyasʊ, ŋn'a zɛ gər, ŋnɩ bɔ m dɩvɛnsɩra b'ʊ, ŋn'a zo.»
«Bɔ dɩvɛnsɩra zaa bɩ n'a barɛ? A zɛm, an b'a dɩvɛnsɩra zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, an a sa, an a ka a vantɔɔ ʊ.
Awɔɔ n naa karɩnda ba ra?
Jaa kʊ cɛdonno a bɔ ʊ ŋn'a zo bɩ,
bɩ y'a ba jaa paŋŋazaa, cɛ bɩ dɔrɛ minto.
Zuuba ɩ naa ba, bɩ wɔɔ yɩ hɔ gʊta m.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a tʊr ka ma rɔ wɔɔ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʊ, bɩ, ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m. Ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ: hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da Yeezuu ʊ awɔɔ minto. Ŋ n a hʊr, ŋn'a gʊ ma.
N farizɛɛnrɔ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʊɔɔ kɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu zi kʊ ŋ n'aa a nyasʊ a meerbaa nɔ ʊ.

Ŋ n b'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, wɔɔ dɔ sɩrazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ heer tɩrga kan gʊaa biyəə kɩ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩr dɩgam gʊaa meer ma bala y, Woso zaa ɩbɩɩ n'a dɩndam sɩra bɩncɛ ʊ. Zaa ta ʊ k'ʊ *Rɔm cir yawʊr ka gɛ? A a ga m gɛɛ a n a ga nɩ?»
Bɩ, kʊ Yeezuu ŋ zambʊ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, awɔɔ n'a gɩngam mɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʊ? K'a bʊr wacɩr m deem, kʊ m dɩga a.»
Ŋ n bʊr m. Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ŋʊasa naa do kan gʊrsɩra naa do kɩ, nka hɔ nɩ?» Ŋ ʊ: «*Rɔm cir hɔ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a hɔ kʊ cir a so ʊ bɩ ka ʊ, k'a hɔ kʊ Woso a so ʊ bɩ ka ʊ.» Meerbaa naa do nyɩbɔʊrɛ a ka, ŋ n zɛ kədə.
Sadisɛɛnrɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ, gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ bɩ, ŋ bʊr Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ laaka da han, ŋ ʊ:
«Zuuba, Moyiisi a gʊrsɩra ba an a ka wɔɔ ʊ, a ʊ, ‹Kʊ gʊaa ga, an a lʊ to, b'a nyɩ ba ʊ y, k'a danyɩ n lʊ bɩ si, k'an nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ a danyɩ bɩ minto.›
Danyɩnɔ ɩ nyɩnta saanhɩna. Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʊ sa, an ga, an a gʊ lʊ bɩ ma, bɩ nyɩ ba ʊ y.
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʊ bɩ si, an ga, b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y. A kaakʊ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ.
Saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ gɩnga, bɩ ŋ n nyɩ yɩ kan lʊ bɩ kɩ y. Ŋ haay kur bɩ, lʊ bɩ n bɩ ga.
Gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, kʊ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ, ŋ haay bireyaa ʊ, nka y'a so lʊ b'ʊ? Bala, gʊɔɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ haay lʊ bɩ si.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ n gʊrsɩrarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan Woso paŋŋa kɩ dɔ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ nɩ nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, kʊ gəəno b'a mɩm bɔ ʊ, yar bɩr lʊ sarɛ y, lʊ bɩr yar sarɛ y. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan malɛɛkarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ kʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ mim nɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba Moyiisi ci bɩ nɔ ʊ ra, dɔmɩm kʊ Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ tutugu nɔ ʊ bɩ, a ʊ: ‹Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.›
Gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m. Awɔɔ ɩ nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ nɔ ʊ gʊta.»
Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ bɩ ma, a a yɩ, Yeezuu a nyɩ bɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa, an a zɔ, an Yeezuu lar, a ʊ: «Lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay bire ʊ kara ɩ lɛ da?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Lɛ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ n naa do: ‹K'a tʊr ka Israyɛl zannɔ, Zuuba k'a m wɔɔ Woso bɩ, a y'a deem m Zuuba.
K'ɩ Zuuba ɩ Woso bɩ ŋʊa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay, kan ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay.›
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: ‹K'ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.› Lɛ vanta ba ʊ an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra y.»
Wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra ɩbɩɩ hɩ, karɩnsaamba, a mɩŋŋa gʊta: ‹Woso y'a deem m, bɩ a vanta ba ʊ, an a na ma y.
Ɩ Woso ŋʊa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩ hɔɔn kɩ haay, ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay, k'ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m,› bɩ jɩra mannɩ haay kʊ n nɩ sɛ nyaŋ ʊ bɩ m, kan ganwʊrɛrɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.»
Yeezuu k'a yɩ gʊaa b'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩ laatʊ Woso cirbəə bɩ ma y.» Bɩ kur bɩ, gʊaa biyəə ɩ nyi bam Yeezuu larlɛ m.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto m wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ: *Davɩd Nyɩ m Krista bɩ m gɛ?
*Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka Davɩd n a hɩ, a ʊ:
Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m:
nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʊ,
kʊ m b'a ka k'ɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta ɩ gam taa.
Davɩd mɩŋŋa y'a birm Zuuba. Kʊ Zuuba n a ba lɔ, an nyɩnta *Davɩd Nyɩ gɛ?» Zamaa bɩ n'a tʊr kam ma kan heernyɩnta kɩ.
Yeezuu y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ a hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩmbɩrm zabarɔ m, ŋn'a kam daʊrɛ ma zamaa gʊta bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
ŋn'a kam lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ ma hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, kan sokʊma bɩncɛ kɩ.
Ŋ n'ɩ zonno hɔ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a mɩŋŋabaa hɩnkam kan yaadarɛrɔ jintoo kɩ. Ŋ hʊnhʊrlɛ yɩm maam-maam.»
Yeezuu nyɩnta an a meer nya busoo daʊrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ rɛ, an nɩ dɩgam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ busoo bɩ daʊrɛ ma. Arzakazannɔ wɔɔ barla gɔsɩnnɔ y'a daŋ ʊ gʊta.
Zoro n bɩ tanka hɩɩya zar ʊ.
Yeezuu n a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zoro ŋʊazaa naa do busoo bɩ zar ʊ gʊta, an lɛ da gʊaa haay k'a n'a daŋ ʊ bɩ ra.
Bala, ŋ haay busoo k'a zibəə ba ŋ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a da ʊ. Bɩ zoro bɩ kan a cicir bɩ kɩ, a a mɩsɩrbaa hɔ sa haay, an a da ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a bɔ Wosocɛ b'ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, dɩga cɛ bɩ jaarɔ wɔɔ gʊɛrɛ ma kan a dɔrɛ kɩ!»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɩga ɩbɩɩ nawʊm cɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔrɛ gʊtabaa ma ra? Jaa deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a mim burə ʊ y. Ŋ haay zɛm bɩ wurgə.»

Yeezuu yaa nyɩnta Oliviyee ci bɩ ra, an a meer nya Wosocɛ bɩ rɛ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zakkɩ kɩ, Zaan kɩ, Andɩr kɩ kʊ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, gɔsɩ ba b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ laaka naa do da Yeezuu han, ŋ ʊ: «Naa do bam brɔ?
A hɩ wɔɔ m, makra kara n nɩ nawɔnnɔ nyarɛ bɩ hɩnkam wɔɔ nɩ?»
Yeezuu n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi kʊ gɔsɩ b'awɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ y.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta zɛm, ŋnɩ bɩ meer ba mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʊ: ‹Krista n a mɩ,› bɩ ŋ gʊɔɔ gʊta nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ.
K'awɔɔ bɩ yar mim ma kan yar k'a n'a dam ma, an bɩ wuti bɩ kɩ, a bɩ dabɔʊ ba y, bala, pakra m kʊ naa haay n ba. Bɩ, durnya nyarɛ bɛɛ m naa cɩna y.

Do deem gʊɔɔ wutim ŋnɩ yar ba kan doro vantɔɔ kɩ. Tara deem zannɔ wutim ŋnɩ yar ba kan tara vanta zannɔ kɩ. Bɩncɛrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ tara nyiŋŋəm. Nɔ nyɩntaŋ ʊ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, k'a dɔ, a ʊ: fɩryɩrɛ sɩŋŋɩda a zɔ.

K'a dundo a mɩŋŋa zi, ŋ y'awɔɔ gʊrm, ŋnɩ ta awɔɔ m dʊdɔkənno zi, ŋ y'awɔɔ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ. Ŋ tarɛ awɔɔ m tara lɛɛzannɔ kan cinno kɩ taa mɔɔ minto. Nawɔnnɔ y'awɔɔ yɩm mɔɔ minto, an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ brɔɔ minto.
Bɩ pakra m kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka, ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da durnya haay nɔ ʊ, kʊ durnya nyarɛ n bɔkarɛ, an a ku.

Kʊ ŋ b'awɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m dʊdɔkənno bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a a hɔɔn da hɔ k'awɔɔ n aa a hɩ bɩ ma y. Mim k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr awɔɔ hɔɔn ʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, b'awɔɔ n n'a hɩm. Bala, awɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ meer bam dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ meer bɩ barɛ awɔɔ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Danyɩnɔ kʊ kam zɛ ma. Zɩ y'a nyɩ karɛ n n a zɛ. Nyɩnɔ wutim nyaam kan a zɩrɔ kɩ, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Gʊaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ gʊaa k'a nyasʊ a sɩrakarɛ m kɔɔkɔɔ an ta an fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nyarɛ ku, bɩ zaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.»

«K'awɔɔ bɩ ‹Gʊaa kʊ hɔzaarbarɛzaa bʊnyaa m bɩ› yɩ an nɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə ʊ, b'a n'a ga m, an nyɩnta bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ, gʊaa niŋŋə k'a n'a karɩnda bam bɩ ma bɩ, k'an a jɩ ma. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam Zidee ʊ bɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a si ŋnɩ ta ciro ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a n'a cɛ mim ʊ bɩ, a b'a ka ma k'a zer a gasʊ a cɛ ʊ, k'a hɔsɩ sa dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ y.
Gʊaa k'a n'a hɔsɩra ʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ, a b'a bɔ an doo k'a yaa a huu sa y!
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, mim pakra bam lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ m, kan bɔɔ n nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
K'a yaa da, kʊ naa do bɩ lee ku la dɔmɩm ʊ y.
Bala, a nyɩntam fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ k'an nyɩnta ʊ hallɩ durnya kʊ Woso a da bɩ sɩŋŋɩda ma, an ta an naa ma ku, bɩ, ʊ b'ʊ yarɛ, ʊ a do yɩ fɩɩga y.
Kʊ Woso bɛɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro bɔrɛ, gʊaa ba ʊ an b'a dam ma, an a meeyaa bʊmbɔ y. Bɩ gʊɔɔ k'an ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto, a dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro bɔrɛ.
Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ, a ʊ: Krista ɩ naa ʊ, gɛɛ, a ɩ bra ʊ, a b'a si y.
Ŋʊaarzannɔ kʊ ŋ Krista tɔ sa ŋn'a ka a ma rɔ wɔɔ, kan ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ gʊta. Ŋ makrarɔ bam gʊta kan hoserlo kɩ k'a a da ma, a gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ m, k'a dundo a zi kan hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ haay awɔɔ m, b'a n'a ku cɩna bɩ kɩ.»
«Bɩ kʊ fɩryɩrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ bɩ cem, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʊ, woso b'a yarɛ an gu y, mom b'a yarɛ an gu sɔ y.
Monyaarɔ surm, brama paŋŋa haay y'a zɛm kʊ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an a to warkʊ nɔ ʊ an bɩr zɛm kan paŋŋa kɩ, cirbəə gʊta kɩ.
A n bɔkarɛ, an malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ, ŋn'aa gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, an a sa dɔjɩr ma an ta kan meer kɩ.
K'a sɔɔn makra bɩ sa. K'awɔɔ b'a yɩ, an lɛɛ daa da, an nɩ kum, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ siire a zɔ.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ, k'a dɔ a ʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm a zɔ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: zamaana naa do bɩ cenim, kʊ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ cenle y.
Bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do kan wakatɩ bɩ do kɩ, gʊaa ba ʊ an b'a dɔrɛ y. Baa malɛɛkarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y. Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n a dɔ sɔ y. K'a maam, Zɩ bɩ y'a deem y'a dɔ.
K'a dundo a zi, a bɩ hinceem ba y. Bala, awɔɔ n dɔmɩm bɩ do zɛrɛ dɔ y.
Bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ tam kʊ ʊ bɩ kɩ, an a har to a zibəənyɩnɔ m, an lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, an zibəə ka gʊaa biyəə ʊ k'an a ba. A n a hɩ hardɔmazaa bɩ m, a ʊ: a bɩ hinceem ba y.
K'a b'a zu a ʊ y. Bala, awɔɔ n har bɩ zaa bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm dɔ y. Kʊ dibsir nɩ, kʊ wuti gʊta nɩ, kʊ koo baadarɛ dɔmɩm nɩ, kʊ dɔmɩrɛ nɩ, awɔɔ n a dɔ y.
Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr ʊ bɩ, a b'a ka, an bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ hinceem ba y.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, awɔɔ haay mɔɔ hɩ a m. K'a bɩ hinceem ba y.»
*Pakkɩ cibsa kan bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma *cibsa kɩ gɔɔta dɔmɩm hɩɩya. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a kam zaa k'a n'a sam k'a Yeezuu ku a nyasʊ a mim ka ra, kʊ n n'a zɛ bɩ ma.
Ŋ y'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ʊ b'a ba cibsa hinni ʊ y. Kʊ n bɛɛ nɩ, zamaa bɩ wutim yar m kan wɔɔ kɩ a minto.»

Yeezuu nyɩnta Betanii ʊ, gʊaa deem kʊ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn kusimə bɩ har ʊ. K'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ, lʊ deem bʊr har ʊ b'ʊ kan gedre kɩ, n n a ba albatɩr jaa m, tidəər n a han. A ji n nyɩnta, a lɛ m kʊsɩ, an tidəər gedre bɩ yi, an tidəər bɩ lo Yeezuu ra.
Bɩ, naa do gʊɔɔ gʊta heer zar, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ tɔ ma m, n n tidəər naa do zaar barɛ?
N y'a da ma, n n tidəər naa do hɛɛ, a busoo n cem *deniyee zɔɔkarkʊ han, n n a ka ŋʊazannɔ ʊ.» Bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam lʊ bɩ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a lʊ bɩ to zenyy… Bɔ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer zarlɛ? Zibəə mɩŋŋa a ba mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Ŋʊazannɔ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ bire ʊ dɔmɩm haay. Awɔɔ y'a dam ma a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa ʊ. Bɩ mɔɔ, mɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay y.
Lʊ naa do, hɔ k'a a da ma b'a a ba. K'a tidəər nɔ mɔɔ mɛ ma bɩ, lɛɛ a ka, an mɔɔ mɛsim banka mɔɔ birle minto.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: durnya nɔ ʊ, bɩncɛ kʊ n nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa daŋ ʊ haay bɩ, n y'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʊ, n n lʊ naa do hɔ k'a a ba bɩ hɩ sɔ.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem bɩ ta, an aa wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ yɩ, k'a Yeezuu nyasʊ a ka ŋ ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ heer nyɔɔ gʊta, ŋnɩ ler bɔ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'a busoo ka ʊ.» Zidas n yɛ, an n'a kam dɔmɩm k'a n'a dam ma a Yeezuu nyasʊ a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ ma.
Bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm ma bɩ, n nɩ pakkɩ sinnyɛɛm mannɩ baŋ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa kʊ aa pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba ka, ɩbɩɩ minto?»
A n a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta tara nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ gʊaa zɛŋ ʊ, an hi busu gər ʊ, k'a zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ,
a gasʊ bɩncɛ k'a nɩ gasʊŋ ʊ b'ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, k'a hɩ har bɩ zaa m, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba ɩ laaka dam: bɩncɛ kara awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩŋ ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ?›
A cɛ gʊta hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ m mim ʊ, ŋn'a banka haay. Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ baŋ ʊ.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hʊr, ŋnɩ ta tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'aa hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba a a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ m, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, Yeezuu bʊr kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʊaa deem k'a nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ mɔɔ nyasʊm, an mɔɔ ka.»
Ŋ haay nɩ nyɩntam kan heer zar kɩ. Ŋ gʊaa deem-deem n'a larm, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ m gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ gʊaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ deem m. Gʊaa k'a n'a wɔ nyɔɔm kan mɔɔ kɩ laaga b'ʊ, bɩ m.
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ cenim amba hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gʊrsɩra ba a tɔ ma bɩ m. Bɩ kʊsɩ ɩ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʊm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ kɩ. Kʊ gʊaa bɩ do ɩ nɩ yɩ, a jɩra.»
Kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm bɩ, Yeezuu bur sa, an a barka da ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a si, naa do naa, mɔɔ mɛ m.
Bɩ kur bɩ, a a ya, an laaga sa, dɩvɛn n a han, an barka yaa da Woso m, an a ka ŋ ʊ, ŋ haay n a mi.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ma m naa, gʊaasɩbabaa ma m, an a lo gʊɔɔ gʊta minto.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn mi dɔ y, an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ m ya, m a mi kan awɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ ku.»
Kʊ ŋ barka laarɔ wɔɔ lɔ ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ bɔ ŋnɩ ta Oliviyee ci ra.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ y'a wɩsɩrabaa tom, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ seero dundor bɩ zɛm, seero wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.›
Bɩ mɔɔ mɩmbɔʊrɛ kur bɩ, mɔɔ lɛɛ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Baa kʊ gʊaa haay bɩ wɔ saa a wɩsɩrabaa ma, mɔɔ bɩ wɔ saa n ma y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, gum naa do ʊ bala, koo bɩ baa dam gallɛm hɩɩya y, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, an so ra kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ ga mɔɔ nawʊm kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ a jɩra, mɔɔ bɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y.» A muno wɔɔ n a hɩ maam sɔ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋ ta bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a birm Gɛtsemanee ʊ b'ʊ. Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a nyɩnta naa ʊ, kʊ m yaa da, kʊ m bʊr.»
A n Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zakkɩ kɩ Zaan kɩ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, heerzar gʊta kan dabɔʊ kɩ gasʊ ʊ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ heer a zar an a zɔ zɛ ma. K'a gɔɔta naa ʊ, a bɩ hinceem ba y.»
A n ta lɛɛ poore, an kukurə zɛ, an a meer ku tara ma, an nɩ yaa darɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ, kʊ fɩryɩrɛ k'awɔɔ n n'a yɩm bɩ y'a dam ma, an a gʊ a ma.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, hɔ ba ʊ an kɔɔkɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma y. Fɩr naa do gʊ mɔɔ ma, kan bɩ kɩ haay, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔ ba.»
A n a bɔ, an bʊr a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, a bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba, an ŋ gu, an a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Sɩmɔɔn, hinceem ɩbɩɩ n'a bam na, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ da ɩ mɩŋŋa ma wakatɩ deem ma tɔkkɛ ra!
K'a yaa da, a bɩ hinceem ba y, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ heer lɛ taa, bɩ mɛsim paŋŋa ba ʊ y.»
A n a bɔ, an ta yaadarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an a ya, an so a yaadarɛ bɩ ra.
A n a bɔ, an bʊr a hɩɩya hɔ ma a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ dɩga a, ŋ hinceem ba. Bala, hinceem ta ŋ nɩ gʊta. Ŋ n hɔ k'a n'a hɩm nɩ bɩ dɔ y.
A n a bɔ an bʊr a kaakʊ hɔ ma ŋ zi, an b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a lɛ taa, k'a hinceem ba kɛɛrɛ, k'a hoon si. Hɔ haay nya. Dɔmɩm a ku. Naa ma bɩ, n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊrɛ n a ka mimbʊnyaabənno ʊ.
K'a wuti, k'ʊ ta, gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʊm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ lee ku.»

Kʊ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, Zidas, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem bɩ lee ku lɛɛm, kan gʊɔɔ cir kɩ, bannɔ kan kargʊrɔ kɩ a wɔ ʊ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.
Zunzukʊrazaa bɩ lɛɛ ka an makra hɩnka ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ m wɔ burgum ma bɩ, bɩ zaa m. K'a nyasʊ, a dɔ ma mɩŋŋa, a ta m.»
Zidas k'a lee ku lɛɛm bɩ, a a zɔ Yeezuu ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba.» A n a burgu ma.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro Yeezuu nyasʊ lɛɛm.
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem kargʊ gaa ʊ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ sakʊ, an a tʊr gʊ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bʊr awɔɔ kargʊrɔ m kan bannɔ kɩ m k'a bɩ mɔɔ nyasʊ, ɩ ʊ, dazaamazaa n mɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʊ dɔmɩm haay, m nɩ karɩnda bam Wosocɛ ʊ, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ nyasʊ y.» Naa do naa, ba a ʊ, kʊ hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ bɩ n kʊ yɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a gʊ ma, ŋn'a si.
Nyukumbueere deem zu a jɛ ʊ, an gɔbga zu a kɔɔn ʊ. Gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n a nyasʊ.
Bɩ n a mɩŋŋa yɔ, an a si a mɛ m dɩgɩ, an gɔbga bɩ to ŋ wɔ ʊ.
Ŋ ta Yeezuu m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ har ʊ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ, gʊɔɔgusinno kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ a so kʊ ma b'ʊ.
Pɩyɛɛr n zu Yeezuu jɛ ʊ laatʊ, an ta, an aa lee ku wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʊ b'ʊ, an aa nyɩnta kan hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ nyɩkam sɛ ma.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan dʊdɔkənno vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay y'a kam mim ma k'a ka Yeezuu ra, a dʊdɔ yar, k'a ka kʊ n n a zɛ gər, bɩ ŋ bɩr a yɩrɛ y.
Bala, kasɛtɩ ŋʊaarzannɔ bʊr gʊta, bɩ ŋ meerbaa bɩ bɩr zum kʊ y.
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n wuti, ŋnɩ ŋʊaar ba, ŋn'a ka a lɛ m, ŋ ʊ:
«Wɔɔ ma an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Wosocɛ naa do kʊ ŋ y'a dɔ a wɔ m naa, mɔɔ y'a wurgəm, bɩ dɔmɩm kaakʊ nɔ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a vanta dɔm, b'a bɩ nyɩntam gʊaa wɔ zibəə y.»
Bɩ kan hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ kɩ, ŋ meerbaa bɩ bɩr a gam kʊ ʊ y.
Bɩ kur bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ wuti gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, an Yeezuu lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ mim gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ra na? Ɩbɩɩ b'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ ra?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ y. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a ya, an a lar, a ʊ: «Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m na? Ɩbɩɩ m Nyɩ kʊ Woso barkazaa b'a nyɔɔ bɩ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m. B'awɔɔ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩm an aa nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩsɩ ʊ, an a to brama warkʊ nɔ ʊ, an bɩr zɛm.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ ma ʊ, an a mɩŋŋa huuro kɩnkaansʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə a ya, an ta wɔɔ ma ra?
Awɔɔ ma an Woso sʊnsɔ wʊ. Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam lɔ?» Ŋ haay n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A a ga zɛ m.»
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma, ŋnɩ pɛɛra ku a meer ma, ŋn'a zɛm, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ nka nɩ zɛrɛ k'ɩ dɔ ɩ hɩ!» Hallɛdɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n'a zɛm.
Kʊ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ hallu b'ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩlʊrɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem bɩ bʊr b'ʊ.
A n bɩ Pɩyɛɛr yɩ, an nɩ nyɩ kam sɛ ma, an dɩga a meer ma, an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu Nazarɛtɩ gʊaa bɩ kɩ sɔ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n a dɔ y. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ hɩ naa, mɔɔ n a jɩ ma y.» A n bɔ, an ta zaŋŋʊ ʊ.
Zibəənyɩlʊ bɩ k'a a ya an a yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Naa do naa ŋ gʊaa deem m.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka. Bɩ kur bɩ, kʊ maasɩrɛ ba poore bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ haay a ya, ŋn'a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ sɩra m, ɩbɩɩ, ŋ gʊaa n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ. Bala, Galilee gʊaa n'ɩbɩɩ m.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an n'a wer sire, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n gʊaa k'awɔɔ n'a mim dɩndam naa dɔ y.»

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, koo baa da gallɛm hɩɩya hɔ ma. Pɩyɛɛr bɔkarɛ, an mim kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ: «Koo bɩ baa dam gallɛm hɩɩya y, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʊ.» A n bɔ zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an nɩ nyi karɛ.

Wutigʊta m bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kan dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ a zɛ kʊ ra, k'a dɩga hɔ k'a n'a bam bɩ ma. Ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu wɔrɔ sur, ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'aa ka Pɩlatɩ ʊ.
Pɩlatɩ n a lar, a ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ hɩ.»
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ŋʊaar ba ŋn'a kam la kan ŋʊaarbaa do haay kɩ.
Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an a lar, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ b'a nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ ra? Dɩga mim haay kʊ ŋ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ ma.»
Bɩ Yeezuu n a ya, an hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ ʊ Pɩlatɩ nʊ y. Pɩlatɩ n zɛ kədə.
Kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ bʊr ŋn'ɩ cibsa gʊta barɛ, Pɩlatɩ bɩ, lɔ kʊ ŋ y'a yɛ bɩ, an n'a bɔrɛ, an wɔ saa.
Bala, gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Barabas bɩ nyɩnta lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yar ba tara nɔ ʊ ŋnɩ gər zɛ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, ŋn'aa hɔ k'a n'a karɛ ŋ ʊ biisi bɩ yɛ.
Pɩlatɩ n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m zɩɩfʊrɔ cir bɩ bɔ, m wɔ saa gɛ?»
Bala, a a dɔ a ʊ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ nɔ nɩ tam Yeezuu ma, kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ a ŋʊa bɩ minto.
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zamaa bɩ nyʊnnyɔɔ, kʊ Pɩlatɩ m Barabas bɔ an wɔ saa.
Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an zamaa bɩ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m a ba gʊaa k'awɔɔ n'a birm zɩɩfʊrɔ cir bɩ nɩ?»
Ŋ n zee da, ŋ ʊ: «K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!»
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ a a ba an bʊnyaa?» Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ zee da, an lɛ da biisi ra: «K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!»
Pɩlatɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a zamaa bɩ heer nyɔɔ bɩ, a Barabas bɔ an wɔ saa, an a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, an a ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Yarbənno Yeezuu gaa ŋnɩ ta m hallu ʊ, bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma Pretʊaar b'ʊ, kan yarbənno kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋnɩ cinno huu kʊ n y'a ba pɛɛra piinə m da Yeezuu ra, ŋnɩ laa waa, ŋn'a ku a mim ma.
Ŋ n'ɩ yaa dam nɩ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m.»
Ŋ n'a zɛrɛ a mim ma bara m, ŋn'ɩ lihi dɩndam ma. Ŋ n sʊnta a taa, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam nɩ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a hɔɔnhɔ ba Yeezuu m ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ cinno huu bɩ bɔ ma ŋn'a huuro wɔɔ du ma, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ k'a yaa a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Sirɛnnɩ gʊaa deem kʊ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn b'a to a har ʊ, an nɩ tam kʊnɔ ʊ. Alɛsandɩr kan Rifis kɩ baaba m. Yarbənno wɔɔ n paŋŋa ba ma k'an Yeezuu gɔdarkʊra bɩ busu.
Ŋ n ta Yeezuu m bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a birm Golgotaa b'ʊ. A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Minkorgo bɩncɛ.›
Ŋ n dɩvɛn war kʊ ma kan *mɩɩr kɩ ŋn'a ka Yeezuu ʊ, b'a n a mi y.
Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, ŋnɩ pʊɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma ŋnɩ ŋ jir. Gʊaa biyəə kan a hɔ kɩ.
Ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma ŋn'a nya dɔgta m wakatɩ nɛɛhʊ ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu zɛ bɩ jɩ gʊrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʊ warga ma Yeezuu mim la gɔdarkʊra bɩ ma: ‹Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir m.›
Ŋ konno wɔ hɩɩya gɔdarkʊrarɔ ma bɩncɛ deem ʊ kan Yeezuu kɩ. Deem a jɩsa, deem a bɩsɩ. [
Hɔ kʊ n nyɩnta, n n a da Wosoci nɔ ʊ bɩ kʊ yɩ: ‹N y'a lɛ sa n n a da mimbʊnyaabənno barla.›]
Cenlezannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cenim b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʊnsɔ wʊm, ŋn'a mim zɛm zukə-zukə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Haya! Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ Wosocɛ wurgə, ɩ ɩ bɔ, ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʊ nɔ ʊ bɩ,
ɩ mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ, k'ɩ zer gɔdarkʊra bɩ ma.»
Wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ sɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a dɩndam kan kʊ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ yaa wʊm Yeezuu ma, ŋ ʊ: «A a muno bʊmbɔ, an bɔkarɛ, a b'a dam ma an a mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ y.»
Kʊ Krista, Israyɛl cir bɩ n zer gɔdarkʊra ma kɛɛrɛ, k'ʊ a yɩ, k'ʊ sɩra ka. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a sʊnsɔ wʊm sɔ.
Sinsebir k'a bɩ da bɩ, monsigə gʊta zɛ tara burə ʊ an ta an wakatɩ kaakʊ ku yirbəəre m.
Wakatɩ kaakʊ bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu zee gʊta da, a ʊ: «Eloyii, Eloyii, lama sabaktaani?» A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Woso, mɔɔ Woso, bɔ nɩ, ɩ ɩ bɔ mɔɔ ʊ?»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ naa ma, ŋ ʊ: «K'a tʊr ka, a ɩ *Elii birm k'an b'a da a han.»
Ŋ deem n bra si an aa hɔ mafʊ-mafʊda sa, an a nyɔɔ hɔ hɛɛnr ma, an a du bənkə ma, an a ka Yeezuu ʊ k'an a mi, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a to, k'ʊ dɩga a Elii zɛm b'a zer gɛ.»
Yeezuu n zee gʊta da, an ga.
Wosocɛ bɩ pɛɛra
bɩ n kaansʊ a bire ʊ, an a sa mim ʊ an b'a zɛ tara ma.
Yarbənno cir bɩ n jɩm, an a nya Yeezuu rɛ. K'a yɩ an ga maam bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, gʊaa naa do nyɩnta Woso Nyɩ paan….»
Lannɔ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋnɩ jɩm laatʊ ŋn'ɩ dɩgam. Magdalaa Maarii nyɩnta ŋ bire ʊ, kan Salomee kɩ, Zozee kan Zakkɩ poore da Maarii kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta Galilee ʊ bɩ, lannɔ nɔɔn duro nyɩnta ŋnɩ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ, ŋn'a dam han. Lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ, ŋnɩ bʊr Zerizalɛm ʊ.
Woso lɛ ter. *Sabaa bankarɛ wakatɩ m, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʊ, hoonsire dɔmɩm n bɩr booti m.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Arimatee kʊ gʊaa deem k'a tɔ m Zozɛf bɩ lee ku. Nyɩnta a ʊ gʊaa gʊta dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʊ. A nyɩnta, an nɩ dɔm Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ ma. A n a heer ba koodə, an ta Pɩlatɩ zi, k'a yaa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han.
Yeezuu k'a ga lɛɛm ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Pɩlatɩ zɛ kədə, an yarbənno cir bɩ bir, an a lar kʊ Yeezuu garɛ bɩ maasɩrɛ ba gɛ.
K'a hɔ kʊ yarbənno cir b'a hɩ bɩ ma bɩ, a Yeezuu gər bɩ ka Zozɛf ʊ.
Zozɛf n pɛɛra fɛʊda si, an a ka, n n Yeezuu gər bɩ zer gɔdarkʊra bɩ ma, an pɛɛra fɛʊda bɩ burgu ma, an aa wʊta yaa kʊ n y'a hɔn ci ʊ b'ʊ. A n jaa gʊta gərgu, an a ta yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
Magdalaa Maarii kan Zakkɩ da Maarii kɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam bɩncɛ kʊ n nɩ Yeezuu gər bɩ wʊtaŋ ʊ bɩ ma.
*Sabaa hinni bɩ k'a cem bɩ, Magdalaa Maarii kan Salomee kɩ, Maarii Zakkɩ da kɩ tidəər si k'a yaa da Yeezuu ma.
Hatʊ hinni k'an lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ wutigʊta m bɩ, ŋ bʊr yaa ra b'ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, woso n haan y.
Ŋ n'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Nka n nɩ jaa bɩ gʊm wɔɔ m yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ?»
Kʊ ŋ y'a bɔɔta ŋnɩ dɩga bɩ, ŋ jaa k'a nyɩnta gʊta bɩ yɩ, n n a gərgu, n n a gʊ yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
Ŋ n gasʊ yaa b'ʊ, ŋn'aa nyukumbueere yɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam bɩsɩ ʊ, an zaba fu du a ma. Ŋ da n bɔ ʊ gʊta.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu kʊ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma b'awɔɔ n'a kam ma. A a mɩm bɔ ʊ, a ba naa ʊ dɔ y. Ba bɩncɛ kʊ n y'a wʊta ʊ bɩ n na.»
Bɩ, k'a yaa a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʊ: «A lɛɛkarɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ Galilee ʊ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do awɔɔ n n'a yɩŋ ʊ, amba a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ m.»
Ŋ n bɔ yaa b'ʊ, ŋnɩ bra si kan mɛhinkə kɩ, ŋ n a so a ʊ y. Kan dabɔʊ k'an ta ŋ nɩ bɩ kɩ, ŋ n yɛ, ŋ n a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.
Yeezuu k'a mɩm bɔ ʊ hatʊ hinni k'an lɛɛkarɛ dɔmɩm bɩ wutigʊta m bɩ, a lɛɛ ka an a hɩnka Magdalaa Maarii m. A n nyɩnta an la zinəro ra saanhɩna a mɛ ʊ bɩ m.
Magdalaa Maarii n ta, an aa hɔ k'a yɩ bɩ hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m. Brɔɔ haay heer nyɩnta an a zar, ŋn'ɩ nyi karɛ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a tʊr ka Magdalaa Maarii meerbaa bɩ ma an n'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, a a mɩm bɔ ʊ, b'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, ŋ n a si nɩ y.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩnka makra do vanta m karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ bɔm tara nɔ ʊ.
Ŋ n a wusigə, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ a muno karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ brɔɔ n a si sɔ y.

A nyarɛ ma bɩ, a a hɩnka karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeem nɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm. Yeezuu n ŋ sɩrakarɛ war kan ŋ heerkarɛ bɩ kɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ. Kʊ ŋ n gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ rɔ mim si bɩ minto.
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta durnya haay nɔ ʊ, a yaa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da gʊɔɔ m.
Gʊaa k'a sɩra ka, an yɛ an batɛm si sɔ bɩ, bɩ zaa n nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm. Bɩ gʊaa k'a bɩ sɩra kam bɩ, a zaa bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y.
Ba makrarɔ kʊ sɩrakarɛzannɔ a da ma, ŋnɩ ŋ ba bɩ n na: Ŋ lam zinəro ra mɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋ lemim daarɔ hɩrɛ.
Kʊ n cem ŋnɩ mɩnnɔ gʊr a wɔ ʊ gɛɛ, ŋnɩ nyɩsɩ da hɔ ʊ, ŋn'a ka ŋ ʊ, a bɩ hɔsɩ barɛ ŋ nɩ y. Ŋ y'a wɔ kam yaabazannɔ ra, bɩ brɔɔ y'a waam.»
Kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu meer ba kan ŋ kɩ an a nya bɩ, a der, an ta arzana ʊ, an aa nyɩnta Woso bɩsɩ ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n ta, ŋn'aa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da lɛɛ haay ʊ. Zuuba bɩ y'a darɛ ŋ han, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ paŋŋa daŋ ʊ kan hoserlo barɛ kɩ.]
Luke: Jɩtaarɛ Teofil, gʊɔɔ gʊta a tʊntɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ minno kʊ ŋ ba wɔɔ bire ʊ ŋnɩ cem nɔ wɔɔ gʊrsɩra ba.
Kasɛtɩzannɔ kʊ ŋ minno wɔɔ yɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ma kan a nyarɛ kɩ, ŋn'a ba Woso lemim nyɩnta padənno wɔɔ ɩ b'a dɩnda wɔɔ m amba ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ, mɔɔ laaka dɩnda mɩŋŋa. Jɩtaarɛ Teofil, a ta mɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, kʊ m mim haay sa a sɩŋŋɩda ma an ta kan a nyarɛ kɩ, m a gʊrsɩra ba ɩbɩɩ ma,
k'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ, ɩ ʊ, hɔ kʊ n y'a dɩnda ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, sɩra m.
Zidee cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər deem ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a tɔ m Zakarii. Abɩya hargʊaa m, a m wosocɛmannɩbər sɔ. A lʊ bɩ tɔ m Elizabɛtɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Aarɔn yaŋŋa m sɔ.
Ŋ hɩɩya haay nyɩnta gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ Woso taa. Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ hɔ kʊ Zuuba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ bam mɩŋŋa.
Ŋ n nyɩ yɩ y, bala, Elizabɛtɩ bɩ cɩna m, ŋ hɩɩya haay gusi.
Hindeem ʊ, Zakarii y'a wosocɛmannɩbərbaa zi bam Woso taa. Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Abɩya wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ zibəə hinni m.
Amba wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ tɩr a ba bɩ m bɩ, pʊɛɛga bɩ, a da a ʊ Zakarii mim la hinni bɩ do ʊ, k'an sɛ nya tidəər nyisi ʊ, an gasʊ m Wosocɛ ʊ, bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa b'ʊ.
Zamaa bɩ jɩm garga ra, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam tidəər nyisi bɩ sɛ nyaʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ.
Zuuba Woso malɛɛka deem a hɩnka Zakarii m, an jɩm brama tidəər nyisi bɩ sɛnyaʊrɛhɔ bɩ bɩsɩ ʊ.
Zakarii k'a a yɩ bɩ, a nyi wer ma, nyibəə n gasʊ ʊ.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zakarii, ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, bala, Woso ɩbɩɩ yaa si. Ɩbɩɩ lʊ Elizabɛtɩ bɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ an a ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ. B'ɩbɩɩ y'a birm Zaan.
B'a nyɩntam heernyɩnta kan heernyɔɔ zee kɩ ɩbɩɩ minto. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ gʊta y'a heer nyɔɔm a yɩrɛ minto.
A nyɩntam gʊaa gʊta Zuuba Woso taa. A bɩ dɩvɛn mire y, a bɩ bɛɛ kʊsɩ vanta mim sɔ y. K'a bʊr an a da nɔ ʊ, *Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a heer hanm.
A bɔm Israyɛl gʊɔɔ lɛɛ, an bʊr ŋ nɩ ŋ Zuuba Woso zi.

A lɛɛ kam Zuuba lɛɛ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa *Elii hɔɔn kan a paŋŋa kɩ m, k'a bɩ ‹zɩrɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ›, kʊ bayɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ n hɔɔn yɩ an gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ m. K'an zamaa banka mɩŋŋa, kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔ Zuuba ma.»
Zakarii n malɛɛka bɩ lar, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, m a dɔ mɔɔ ʊ sɩra nɩ? Mɔɔ gusi, mɔɔ lʊ bɩ gusi sɔ.»
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gabrɩyɛl m mɔɔ m, m nɩ Woso lɛɛ. Mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʊ, kʊ m bɩ meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, kʊ m bɩ lemim nyɩnta hɩ ɩbɩɩ m.
Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam bəətir, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ meer ba dɔ y, an ta an minno nɔɔn duro nyarɛ dɔmɩm ku. Bala, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ meerbaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kʊ yɩ dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a cɩnta b'ʊ y.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, zamaa b'ɩ dɔm Zakarii ma. Ŋ zɛ kədə, k'a maasɩrɛ ba Wosocɛ bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa b'ʊ bɩ minto.
K'a bɔ bɩ, a n a da ma an nɩ hɔsɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ y. Bɩ minto y'a ka ŋn'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, Woso makra a yɩ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ. A n hɔɔrɔ bɩmba a wɔ ma, k'a hɩnka, a ʊ, a b'a dam ma a meer ba dɔ y. A n gɔɔta bəətir.
Kʊ Zakarii a zi bɩ ba an a nya, a dɔmɩm n a ku bɩ, a a hʊr an doo.
K'a yɩ poore bɩ kur bɩ, a lʊ Elizabɛtɩ jɩsɩ si. A n a mɩŋŋa nyaakʊm da mom soor, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
«Ba hɔ kʊ Zuuba Woso a ba mɔɔ m bɩ n na. A dɩga mɔɔ ma, an mɔɔ bɔ nyannɩ ʊ gʊɔɔ bire ʊ.»
Elizabɛtɩ jɩsɩ mom sɔrdɩ hɔ ma bɩ, Woso malɛɛka Gabrɩyɛl nyɔɔ Galilee tara nɔ kʊ n n'a birm Nazarɛtɩ b'ʊ,
nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ deem zi. A ler n y'a bɔ gʊaa m. A jaan bɩ tɔ m Zozɛf. Cir Davɩd do gʊaa m. Nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ tɔ m Maarii.
Malɛɛka bɩ n gasʊ zi, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m Maarii, ɩbɩɩ kʊ Woso barka ka ɩ ʊ gʊta, Zuuba Woso ɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ.»
Maarii k'a meerbaa bɩ ma bɩ, a da bɔ ʊ. A n n'a hɔɔn dam yaadarɛ bɩ jɩ ma.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y Maarii, bala, ɩbɩɩ barka yɩ Woso zi.
Ɩbɩɩ jɩsɩ sim, ɩ nyɩ yɩ yar, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a birm Yeezuu.
A nyɩntam gʊaa gʊta, bɩ n y'a birm Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ. Zuuba Woso y'a yaaba Davɩd cirbəə bɩncɛ kaŋ ʊ,
a cirbəə bɩm Zakɔɔb do nɔ ʊ dɔmɩm haay, b'a cirbəə bɩ nyarɛ ba ʊ y.»
Maarii n a hɩ malɛɛka bɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɩ naa y'a bam lɔ an kʊ yɩ, kʊ mɔɔ n yar dɔ naa?»
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɛnt-Ɛspri zerle ɩbɩɩ mim ʊ, Woso k'a lɛ da haay paŋŋa y'a kure ɩbɩɩ ra, am hinni hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ y'a ka, nyɩ k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ yɩ bɩ, n y'a birm Woso Nyɩ mɩŋŋa.
Ɩbɩɩ danyɩ Elizabɛtɩ, kʊ n n'a birm cɩna b'ɩ jɩsɩ m sɔ, a mom sɔrdɩ hɔ m naa. A nyɩyar yɩm a gusimbaa nɔ ʊ.
Bala, ‹hɔ ba ʊ, Woso n a da ma y.› »
Maarii n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Zuuba zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, k'an ba mɔɔ m amba ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ m.» Malɛɛka bɩ n a hʊr, an a gʊ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Maarii wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an zaa sa, an bɔ kʊrɔ kʊ ciro n ta ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an ta Zidee kʊ deem nɔ ʊ.
A n aa gasʊ Zakarii har ʊ, an yaa da Elizabɛtɩ m.
Elizabɛtɩ k'a Maarii yaadarɛ bɩ ma bɩ, nyɩ k'a n'a nɔ ʊ bɩ heer ba. Sɛnt-Ɛspri n Elizabɛtɩ heer han.
A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Woso ɩbɩɩ barka da ʊ an lɛ da lannɔ haay ra, bɩ barka bɩ zer an nawʊm nyɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ ra.
Nka m mɔɔ nɩ, kʊ mɔɔ Zuuba da n bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma?
Bala, k'ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ bɩ gasʊ mɔɔ tʊr ʊ bɩ, nyɩ bɩ heer ba mɔɔ nɔ ʊ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka, ɩ ʊ, meerbaa kʊ n y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ kʊ yɩm.»
Bɩ, Maarii a hɩ, a ʊ:
«Mɔɔ nyi y'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ Zuuba Woso ʊ.
Bɩ, heernyɔɔ mɔɔ heer han,
bala Woso m mɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa.
Bala, a zerga an dɩga a zibəəzaa cicirzaa bɩ ma.
Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, do haay y'a hɩm mɔɔ ma mimbirenyɩntazaa.
Paŋŋazaa Woso minno gʊtɔ-gʊtɔɔ ba mɔɔ minto.
A tɔ bɩ, tɔ mɩŋŋa m.
A cicirzɛrɛ ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyi bam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ mim ʊ dɔmɩm haay.
A zibəəro gʊtɔɔ ba a wɔ paŋŋa m.
A gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa busum nɔ wɔɔ hɩsɩga.
A paŋŋazannɔ bra a cirbəəduuro ra an ŋ dundo.
A n gʊɔɔ ŋʊazannɔ wɔɔ busu brama.
A gan wʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ nɔ nɩ ŋ zɛm nɔ wɔɔ ma,
an arzakazannɔ da zaa ra a wɔ n tu.
A b'a da a zibəənyɩ Israyɛl han,
an a cicirzɛrɛ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Ler k'a bɔ Abraham m, kan a yaŋŋɔɔ kɩ m
a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ minto.»
Maarii gɔɔta kan Elizabɛtɩ kɩ an a zɔ mom kaakʊ ma, an bɔkarɛ, an doo.
Elizabɛtɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ a ku. A nyɩ bɩ yɩ yar.
A cɩsɔnnɔ kan a dogʊɔɔ kɩ a ma ŋ ʊ, Zuuba a cicir zɛ, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ, ŋn'a heer nyɔɔm.
Nyɩ bɩ k'a dɔmɩm sinnyə ba bɩ, ŋ bʊr k'a b'a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ. Ŋ y'a ŋʊa k'a tɔ ka Zakarii, am a zɩ bɩ hɔ bɩ m.
A da bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ayy…, a tɔ m Zaan.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ do bɩ nɔ ʊ, gʊaa ba ʊ, n n a tɔ ka ncɩnaaʊ y.»
Ŋ n makra ba a wɔ m, ŋn'a zɩ bɩ lar, kʊ n y'a birm lʊnlɔ gɛ?
Zakarii n warga yɛ, an gʊrsɩrarɔ nɔɔn duro ba ma: «A tɔ m Zaan.» Ŋ haay n zɛ kədə.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Zakarii lɛ a gʊ, a nɛɛm n a bɔ kʊ zi, an nɩ meer barɛ, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
Nyibəə gasʊ a cɩsɔnnɔ wɔɔ ʊ haay, an ta kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cigəəzi rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, Zidee gʊrga haay jilli, sʊʊra n'a bam mim naa do ma.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mim naa do ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larm, ŋ ʊ: «Nyɩ naa do zɛm bɩ nyɩnta lɔ?» Sɩra m, Zuuba Woso wɔ nyɩnta nyɩ bɩ ra.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta an nyɩ bɩ zɩ Zakarii heer han, an nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsora meer barɛ, a ʊ:
«Zuuba, Israyɛl Woso n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, bala, a bɩ dɩga a do ma, an a bʊmbɔ.
A bɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa paŋŋazaa m wɔɔ minto, a zibəənyɩ Davɩd do nɔ ʊ.
Naa a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ m biisi.
A ʊ, a wɔɔ bɔm wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔ ʊ,
kan gʊaa haay k'a sɔ wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
A wɔɔ yaabɔɔ cicir zɛ, a a gʊaasɩbabaa mɩŋŋa tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
A lerbɔrɛ k'a bɔ wɔɔ yaaba Abraham m bɩ ba n nɩ:
K'a wɔɔ bʊmbɔ jɩnnɔ wɔ ʊ an nya, a zaa kam wɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ a zi ba kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ,
mɩŋŋabaa kan tɩrgabaa kɩ nɔ ʊ, Woso taa dɔmɩm haay kan ʊ mɩsɩrbaa nyarɛ kɩ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, m nyɩnnɩ, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ birm Woso k'a lɛ da haay lɛsinnɩsorazaa.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ kam Zuuba lɛɛ k'ɩ zaarɔ banka,
k'ɩ ka, k'a dogʊɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ dɔ, ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur karɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, wɔɔ Woso bɩ cicirzɛrɛ gʊta.
Naa minto bɩ, lɛɛgure y'a tom brama, an gu wɔɔ m, amba woso haanrɛ hɔ bɩ m,
k'a bɩ lɛɛ gu gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ monsigə ʊ, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam zɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m,
k'a bɩ laafɩɩ zaa hɩnka wɔɔ m.»
Kʊ nyɩ bɩ nɩ, a ɩ mam, a heerkoodəbaa n'a dam la. A gɔɔta zaŋŋa ʊ, an ta an dɔmɩm k'a a hɩnka ʊ Israyɛl zamaa lɛɛ bɩ dɔmɩm ku.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, cir Ogisti bɩ lɛ ka, a ʊ, n n durnya haay gʊɔɔ lɛ sa.
Lɛɛkarɛ lɛsarɛ n naa, an ba Kiriniyusi k'a nyɩnta Siirii kʊzaa bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ.
Gʊaa haay ta, kʊ n n'a lɛ sa, gʊaa biyəə lɛ sa n nawʊrɛ a kʊ ʊ.
Zozɛf wuti sɔ Galilee kʊ Nazarɛtɩ ʊ, an ta Zidee gʊrga deem kʊ n n'a birm Betelehɛm ʊ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do cir Davɩd yɩ ʊ. Bala a mɩŋŋa naa, cir Davɩd do gʊaa m.
Ta a ʊ k'a yaa lɛsarɛ bɩ wʊ kan a jaan Maarii kɩ. Bɩ ma bɩ, Maarii ɩ jɩsɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ bɩ, Maarii nyɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm a ku.
A a dʊndɔmbaa nyɩ yɩ yar, an pɛɛra burgu ma, an a wʊta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʊ. Bala, ŋ n toore yɩ saanɔɔ cɛ ʊ b'ʊ y.
Gʊrga bɩ do poo ʊ bɩ, dundonno nɩ b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ a hɔbɩsɩrɔ ma gunuu ʊ.
Zuuba malɛɛka n a hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Zuuba lɛɛgure n yɔ ŋ nɩ. Nyibəə gʊta n ŋ nyasʊ.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, bala, zɛ mɔɔ nawʊm lemim nyɩnta m kʊ m b'a hɩ awɔɔ m. A nyɩntam heernyɔɔ gʊta do bɩ haay minto.
Bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ yɩ her Davɩd tara ra awɔɔ tɔ ma. A m Krista, Zuuba.
Makra k'a n'a kam awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: awɔɔ yaa nyɩhure yɩ, n n pɛɛra burgu ma, n n a wʊta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʊ.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, arzana malɛɛkarɔ cir gʊta bʊr, ŋ n b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan malɛɛka bɩ kɩ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, ŋ ʊ:
«Woso n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ brama,
kʊ gʊɔɔ k'a nɔ yɩ ŋ la tara burə ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m mɛnyɔɔ yɩ.»
Kʊ malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ a gʊ ŋ ma ŋnɩ der brama bɩ, dundonno wɔɔ gɔɔta ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ʊ ta Betelehɛm ʊ, k'ʊ aa hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ, Zuuba n a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ.»
Ŋ n ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ, ŋn'aa Maarii yɩ kan Zozɛf kɩ, kan nyɩhure bɩ kɩ, n n a wʊta hɔbɩsɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ mɔr ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ malɛɛka b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ nyɩ naa do minto bɩ dɩnda.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a tʊr ka dundonno wɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma haay rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ zɛ kədə.
Bɩ, Maarii minno nɔɔn duro da a heer ʊ, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma.
Dundonno wɔɔ n a wusigə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, ŋn'a daŋ ʊ, hɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋn'a yɩ sɔ bɩ minto. Bala, hɔ haay ba amba malɛɛka b'a hɩ bɩ m.
Dɔmɩm sinnyə k'a ku bɩ, n nyɩ bɩ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ. N n a tɔ ka Yeezuu, tɔ kʊ malɛɛka bɩ nyɩnta an a ka, bɩ ma bɩ, a da n a jɩsɩ sa bɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ hubɔrɛ dɔmɩnnɔ a ku amba Moyiisi lɛ ka bɩ m bɩ, Zozɛf kan Maarii kɩ nyɩ bɩ busu, ŋnɩ ta m Zerizalɛm ʊ, k'a yaa ka Woso ʊ,
amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Zuuba lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ m: ‹Nyɩyar haay k'an a da nyɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ, Zuuba hɔ m.›
N n ‹pʊnnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ gɛɛ cirpʊʊrɛ nyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ› ka, kʊ n n mannɩ ba m, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Zuuba Wosoci ʊ bɩ m.
Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm ʊ, a tɔ m Sɩmɩnyɔɔ. Gʊaa tɩrga m, an nɩ zum Woso ʊ mɩŋŋa. Nyɩnta a ʊ, an nɩ Israyɛl bʊmbɔrɛzaa mɩm dam. *Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta kan kɩ.
Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri nyɩnta an a hɩnka m, a ʊ, awɔɔ bɩ gam, k'a n Krista, kʊ Zuuba n n'a nyɔɔm bɩ yɩ y.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka, an ta Wosocɛ ʊ. Bɩ ma bɩ, a Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ a nyɩ bɩ m k'a b'a ka Woso ʊ amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba bɩ m,
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ nyɩ bɩ si a wɔ ʊ, an barka da Woso m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
«Naa ma bɩ, Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ lerbɔrɛ bɩ kʊ yɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ ɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ to
an cem kan laafɩɩ kɩ
amba ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ yɩ,
ɩbɩɩ n a banka doro haay lɛɛ.
Ɩbɩɩ do Israyɛl lɛbɔʊrɛ m.
Lɛɛgure m, an n'ɩbɩɩ hɩnkam doro haay m.»
K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, nyɩ bɩ zɩ kan a da kɩ zɛ kədə.
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ n ŋ barka da ʊ, an a hɩ nyɩ bɩ da Maarii m, a ʊ: «Nyɩ naa do, bʊr a ʊ k'a bɩ gʊɔɔ gʊta do, k'a gʊɔɔ gʊta wuti Israyɛl nɔ ʊ sɔ. A nyɩntam Woso makra, bɩ gʊɔɔ bɩsɩ kam ma.
A gʊɔɔ gʊta hɔɔndarɛrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a nyaakʊm da rɔ wɔɔ hɩnkam lɛɛgure ʊ. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, kargʊ n n'ɩbɩɩ heer hɔnm.»
Lʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, a tɔ m Annɩ. Nyɩnta a ʊ Fanɩyɛl nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ, Asɛɛr do m. A gusi gʊta. A nyɩnta kan a zim k'a sa a poombaa ma bɩ kɩ dɔɔraa saanhɩna.
A gɔɔta zoro, a dɔɔraa businnyə a yaa si ku. A n nɩ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ Woso daŋ ʊ sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ. A n n'a lɛ kʊsɩm, an nɩ yaa dam sɔ.
A mɩŋŋa bʊr dɔmɩm kʊ n nɩ nyɩ bɩ kam Woso ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ barka dam Woso m, an nɩ nyɩ bɩ mim dɩndam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔm ma kʊ Woso n bʊr Zerizalɛm bʊmbɔrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m.
Kʊ Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Zuuba lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ ba ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ ta Galilee kʊ Nazarɛtɩ ʊ.
Nyɩ bɩ n nɩ marɛ, a paŋŋa n n'a dam la. A mindɔrɛ nyɩnta ʊ gʊta, Woso barka nɩ kan kɩ.
Dɔɔraa haay, Yeezuu zɩrɔ wɔɔ tɩr ta Zerizalɛm ʊ *pakkɩ cibsa ma.
Kʊ Yeezuu dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya kʊ bɩ, ŋ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ cibsa bɩ ma, amba ŋn'a bam dɔɔraa haay bɩ m.
Kʊ cibsa bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ cem bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə, ŋnɩ doore. Nyukumbueere Yeezuu bɩ gɔɔta Zerizalɛm ʊ, b'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ y.
Ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, zaasənno an nɩ kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ tarɛ bɩ yɩ dɔmɩm deem, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'a kam ma a yɩrɛrɔ kan a dɔrɛrɔ kɩ bire ʊ.
Bɩ, ŋ n a yɩ y. Ŋ n'a wusigə, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, a kama jɩ ʊ.
A dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, ŋ yaa a yɩ Wosocɛ ʊ, an nɩ nyɩntam karɩnsaambɔɔ bire ʊ, an n'a tʊr karɛ ŋ meerbaa ma, an nɩ ŋ larm sɔ.
Gʊaa haay k'a n'a tʊr kam ma bɩ, zɛ a nawʊm kədə a hɔɔntaʊrɛ meerbaa nyɩbɔʊrɛ tɔ ma.
K'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ a yɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, a da bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «M nyɩnnɩ, bɔ m ɩbɩɩ m naa do ba wɔɔ nɩ? Dɩga a, ɩ zɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ da bɔ ʊ, ʊ n'ʊ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ma.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Bɔ m an n'a kam mɔɔ ma? Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ m ga m, m bɩr m Zɩ har ʊ ra?»
Bɩ, hɔ k'a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋ n a jɩ ma y.
Yeezuu n a wusigə kan ŋ kɩ Nazarɛtɩ ʊ. A n nɩ ŋ lɛ sire. A da bɩ minno nɔɔn duro da a heer ʊ.
Yeezuu nɩ marɛ, a mindɔrɛ n'a dam la. A Woso nɔ yɩ, an gʊɔɔ nɔ yɩ sɔ.

Rɔm cir Tibɛɛr cirbəə bɩrɛ dɔɔraa bueeresoor hɔ ma bɩ, Pɔns Pɩlatɩ nyɩnta an a so Zidee gʊrga ʊ, cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a so Galilee ʊ, a danyɩ cir Filipi n a so Itiree kʊ ʊ kan Trakonitɩ kʊ kɩ, cir Lizaniyas n a so Abɩlɛnnɩ kʊ ʊ.
Hannɩ kan *Kayiifʊ k'ɩ nyɩnta wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Woso a lemim ka Zakarii nyɩ Zaan ʊ poohɔɔn ʊ.
Bɩ Zaan ta Zʊrdɛn gʊrga haay ʊ, an nɩ heerlʊrlɛ kan batɛm kɩ mim pa dam gʊɔɔ m, ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto,
amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci nɔ ʊ bɩ m:
Gʊaa leer nɩ bɔm poohɔɔn ʊ:
K'a Zuuba zaa banka, k'a zaafɔɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩmbanka kʊ ŋ nɩ yɩ tɩrga.
K'a hɔ zar toko haay ʊ, k'a ciro kan dimbirlɔ kɩ zɛ a wʊta, k'a zaarɔ kʊ ŋ y'a tʊntɔ rɔ wɔɔ hʊnhʊr, bɔɔ ɩ bɩ mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, k'a ŋ banka a ŋ lʊnlɔ.
Bʊmbɔrɛzaa k'a a to Woso zi bɩ, a gʊɔɔ bʊmbɔm do haay nɔ ʊ.
Zamaa gʊta nɩ zɛm Zaan zi, k'a bɩ batɛm si. A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ naa, cɩrka do n'awɔɔ m. Nka y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a ʊ, a a si a bɔ lɛm Woso heerbusu k'a nɩ zɛm booti m bɩ lɛɛ?

K'a zi mɩŋŋa ba amba gɔ nɩ nyɩ dam bɩ m, k'an zu kʊ ʊ kan awɔɔ heerlʊrlɛ bɩ kɩ, b'a b'a hɔɔn da a ʊ, awɔɔ yaaba m Abraham nɩ y. Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, Woso a da ma, an jaarɔ nɔɔn duro wusigə an ŋ ba Abraham nyɩnɔ.
Bala, n sɩga banka an nɩ cɩntam k'an gɔrɔ zɩnzɛ ra ŋ məsi ma. Gɔ niŋŋə k'a bɩr nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam bɩ, n y'a zɛm la, n a da sɛ ʊ.»
Zamaa bɩ barla gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n laaka da, ŋ ʊ: «K'a maam, k'ʊ a ba lɔ?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ɩ huu m hɩɩya, k'an a jir kan gʊaa k'a ba m bɩ kɩ. Gʊaa k'an ta hɔbɩrɛ m bɩ, k'an a ba maam sɔ.»
Yawʊrsinno n bʊr sɔ k'a bɩ batɛm si, ŋnɩ laaka da Zaan han, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, bɔ wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ a ba?»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A bɩ busoo si an lɛ da lɛ kʊ n y'a ka bɩ ra y.»
Yarbənno n a lar sɔ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɩ wɔɔ, bɔ wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ a ba?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «A bɩ paŋŋa ba gʊaa ma y, b'a bɩ ŋʊaar ba a ka gʊaa lɛ m k'a busoo yɩ y. Bɩ k'a zerga a yawʊra bɩ rɛ.»
Zamaa bɩ nɩ dɔm hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ bɩ ma. N n'a hɔɔn dam. N nɩ laaka darɛ a mɩŋŋa han a heer ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Krista bɛɛ m Zaan bɩ m na?»
Zaan n a hɩ ŋ haay m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ naa, batɛm mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ hi ʊ. Bɩ, gʊaa ɩ zɛm, a paŋŋa n lɛ da mɔɔ ra, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʊsɔrɔ bar tɔkkɛ hʊr y. A batɛm karɛ awɔɔ ʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m kan sɛ kɩ m.
A gʊr sa a wɔ ʊ, k'a tʊyaa kʊnkɔ m, k'a hɔyaa zo m. A hɔyaa bɩ zarlɛ a sɩ ʊ, a sɛ k'a bɩr lihim bɩ nyam puur b'ʊ.»
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Zaan a ya, an minno gɔsɩnnɔ hɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩm Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zaan nyaa ba kan cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ kɩ, a cɛmba lʊ Hɩrɔdɩyaadɩ k'a yɔm, kan a hɔbaa bʊnyaarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ minto.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ya, an mimbʊnyaa ba an a na ma: a a ka n nɩ Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ zamaa bɩ haay nɩ batɛm siŋ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu batɛm si sɔ. K'a nɩ yaa dam bɩ, brama a gʊ,
*Sɛnt-Ɛspri n cirpʊʊrɛ mɛ sa, an zer a mim ʊ. Leer n a to brama an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʊa gʊta, mɔɔ nɔ yɩ ɩbɩɩ ra.»
Yeezuu dɔɔraa bɩ, a ga kʊ ʊ a ba kan bukərku kɩ, an bɔkarɛ an a zibəə sa. Ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʊ Zozɛf nyɩ m.
Zozɛf zɩ m Helii m,
Helii zɩ m Mataat m,
Mataat zɩ m Levii m,
Levii zɩ m Mɛlkii m,
Mɛlkii zɩ m Yanayɩ m,
Yanayɩ zɩ m Zozɛf m,
Zozɛf zɩ m Matatɩyas m,
Matatɩyas zɩ m Amɔs m,
Amɔs zɩ m Nahum m,
Nahum zɩ m Hɛslii m,
Hɛslii zɩ m Nagayɩ m,
Nagayɩ zɩ m Maatɩ m,
Maatɩ zɩ m Matatɩyas m,
Matatɩyas zɩ m Semeyini m,
Semeyini zɩ m Yosɛkɩ m,
Yosɛkɩ zɩ m Yooda m,
Yooda zɩ m Yohanam m,
Yohanam zɩ m Reeza m,
Reeza zɩ m Zorobabɛl m,
Zorobabɛl zɩ m Salatɩyɛl m,
Salatɩyɛl zɩ m Neerii m,
Neerii zɩ m Mɛlkii m,
Mɛlkii zɩ m Adii m,
Adii zɩ m Kozam m,
Kozam zɩ m Ɛlmadam m,
Ɛlmadam zɩ m Ɛɛr m,
Ɛɛr zɩ m Yeezuu m,
Yeezuu zɩ m Eliyezɛɛr m,
Eliyezɛɛr zɩ m Yoorim m,
Yoorim zɩ m Mataat m,
Mataat zɩ m Levii m,
Levii zɩ m Sɩmɩnyɔɔ m,
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ zɩ m Ziida m,
Ziida zɩ m Zozɛf m,
Zozɛf zɩ m Yoonam m,
Yoonam zɩ m Eliyakim m,
Eliyakim zɩ m Meleyaa m,
Meleyaa zɩ m Menaa m,
Menaa zɩ m Matataa m,
Matataa zɩ m Natan m,
Natan zɩ m Davɩd m,
Davɩd zɩ m Yesee m,
Yesee zɩ m Yobɛdɩ m,
Yobɛdɩ zɩ m Boozɩ m,
Boozɩ zɩ m Salaa m,
Salaa zɩ m Naasɔɔn m,
Naasɔɔn zɩ m Aminadaab m,
Aminadaab zɩ m Admɩnɩ m,
Admɩnɩ zɩ m Arnii m,
Arnii zɩ m Ɛsrɔm m,
Ɛsrɔm zɩ m Farɛɛs m,
Farɛɛs zɩ m Ziida m,
Ziida zɩ m Zakɔɔb m,
Zakɔɔb zɩ m Izakkɩ m,
Izakkɩ zɩ m Abraham m,
Abraham zɩ m Taaraa m,
Taaraa zɩ m Nahɔɔr m,
Nahɔɔr zɩ m Seruki m,
Seruki zɩ m Ragoo m,
Ragoo zɩ m Falɛkɩ m,
Falɛkɩ zɩ m Ebɛɛr m,
Ebɛɛr zɩ m Salaa m,
Salaa zɩ m Kayɩnam m,
Kayɩnam zɩ m Arfasatɩ m,
Arfasatɩ zɩ m Sɛm m,
Sɛm zɩ m Nowee m,
Nowee zɩ m Lamɛk m,
Lamɛk zɩ m Matusalam m,
Matusalam zɩ m Enɔk m,
Enɔk zɩ m Yarɛtɩ m,
Yarɛtɩ zɩ m Maleleyɛl m,
Maleleyɛl zɩ m Kayɩnam m,
Kayɩnam zɩ m Enɔs m,
Enɔs zɩ m Sɛt m,
Sɛt zɩ m Adam m,
Adam zɩ m Woso m.
Yeezuu kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a han bɩ, a a to Zʊrdɛn kɔ lɛ ra b'ʊ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ka, an ta poohɔɔn ʊ.
B'ʊ bɩ, Sʊtaana a makra ba dɔmɩm busi. A n hɔsɩ bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʊ y. Bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro kʊ ŋ cem bɩ, nɔ a nyasʊ.
Sʊtaana bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ka kʊ jaa naa do n a ba bur.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «N y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: Gʊaa b'a dam ma an mɩsɩrbaa ba hɔbɩrɛ m bala y.»
Sʊtaana bɩ n ta m brama, an tara burə cirbəəro haay hɩnka m lɛɛm.
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ cirbəəro nɔɔn duro paŋŋa kan a arzaka kɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, ɩ ɩ so ʊ. Bala, mɔɔ hɔɔ m. Mɔɔ m da ma m a ka gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ ŋʊa ʊ.
Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ yɛ ɩ kukurə zɛ mɔɔ taa ɩ mɔɔ da ʊ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ haay.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «N y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: Ɩ ɩ Zuuba Woso da ʊ, bɩ, deem bala ɩbɩɩ n nɩ yaa dam nɩ.»
Sʊtaana bɩ n a gaa, an ta m Zerizalɛm ʊ, an aa a jɩm Wosocɛ bɩ mim ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ hɩr naa ʊ, ɩ ɩ da tara ʊ:
Bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: Woso lɛ karɛ a malɛɛkarɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔ ɩbɩɩ ma,
bɩ, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʊ: Ŋ y'a wɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ taa k'ɩ b'ɩ gəm zɛ jaa ma y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «N y'a hɩ: ɩ bɩ da Zuuba ɩ Woso lɛ ʊ y.»
Kʊ Sʊtaana bɩ Yeezuu makra ba kan makrarɔ do haay kɩ an a nya bɩ, a a gʊ ma an cem, an n'a kam toore vanta ma.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, Yeezuu a bɔ an bʊr Galilee ʊ. A tɔ n bɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ.
A n nɩ hɔ dɩndam sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ, gʊaa haay n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ.
Yeezuu ta Nazarɛtɩ ʊ, kʊ kʊ n y'a tʊr ʊ b'ʊ. A n gasʊ sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ hoonsire hinni kʊ n n'a birm *sabaa bɩ hinni ʊ, amba a tɩr a ba biisi bɩ m. A n wuti k'a Wosoci karɩnda ba.
N nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci ka ʊ. K'a ci bɩ hʊr bɩ, a a zɛ bɩncɛ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ ma:
Zuuba mɔɔ bɔ ʊ, a a Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra,
kʊ m lemim nyɩnta pa da cicirzannɔ m,
[kʊ m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ heer a zar lɔ wɔɔ heer wʊta.]
A mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʊ m b'a hɩ lɔnnɔ m, ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ku, kʊ m a hɩ bʊʊrɔ m, ŋ mɩm lɛɛ yɩm.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʊ sɔ, kʊ m ba hɩ gʊɔɔ m,
Zuuba barka dɔ ɩ gʊ ra.
A n ci bɩ huŋŋu, an a ka sokʊmacɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ b'ʊ, an nyɩnta. Ŋ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ cɛ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam Yeezuu ma.
A n a sa ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Wosoci meerbaa k'awɔɔ ma dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa naa ʊ bɩ kʊ yɩ her.»
Ŋ haay n yɛ Yeezuu ma y, bɩ ŋ zɛ kədə barka meerbaa nyɩnta k'a n'a bam bɩ tɔ ma. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zozɛf nyɩ bɩ bɛɛ m naa ra?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ bɔɔr naa do zɛm mɔɔ ma: Lɔɔtɔr, lɛɛ ka ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa waa. Wɔɔ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ba Kapɛrnawum ʊ bɩ ma. Bɩ ba ɩ kʊ ʊ naa ʊ.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, n bɩr wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa sɩ sim mɩŋŋa a kʊ ʊ y.
Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, biisi bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa *Elii dɔmɩm ʊ, la a gʊsɩ barɛ ma dɔɔraa kaakʊ kan mom kɩ sɔrdɩ, nɔ gʊta n a da tara bɩ ra haay. Zonno nyɩnta ʊ gʊta Israyɛl ʊ bɩ ma.
Bɩ, Woso n Elii nyɔɔ ŋ gʊaa deem zi y, kʊ bɩ m, zoro deem k'a nyɩnta ʊ Sarɛptaa ʊ, Sidɔn
gʊrga ʊ bɩ m.
Kusimoo nyɩnta ʊ sɔ gʊta Israyɛl ʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Elizee dɔmɩm ʊ. Bɩ ŋ gʊaa deem taan… n a waa, kʊ saana k'a a to Siirii ʊ, n n'a birm Naaman bɩ bɛɛ y.»
Kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ haay nɔ ma ʊ gʊta sokʊmacɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Ŋ nɩ wuti, ŋn'a nyʊnnyɔɔta, ŋnɩ bɔ m tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ ta m a kʊ ci mim ʊ k'a yaa nyɔɔta a bɩra a da tara ʊ.
Yeezuu n bɔ ŋ bireyaa ʊ, an cem.
Yeezuu ta Galilee gʊrga deem Kapɛrnawum ʊ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m *sabaa hinni ʊ.
Ŋ zɛ kədə a hɔdɩndarɛ tɔ ma, bala, a meer bɩ ba an nawʊm lɛ k'an ta m bɩ m.
Gʊaa deem ɩ nyɩnta sokʊmacɛ ʊ b'ʊ, zinə nɩ kan kɩ. A n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ a ʊ:
«Hey! Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu, ɩbɩɩ bɔ nɩ wɔɔ zi? Bʊr ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ bɩ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ gɛ? Kʊ nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, gʊaa mɩŋŋa kʊ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m.»
Yeezuu n zinə bɩ da jɩm ʊ a meerbaa m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Zɛ hi, k'ɩ bɔ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ.» Zinə bɩ n gʊaa bɩ do tara ʊ zamaa bɩ lɛɛ, an bɔ a mɛ ʊ, b'a n yaaba da ma y.
Ŋ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ meerbaa m naa! A n nɩ lɛ kam zinəro ʊ kan paŋŋa kɩ ŋn'ɩ bɔrɛ!»
N nɩ Yeezuu mim dɩndam lɛɛ haay ʊ, gʊrga bɩ do nɔ ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a bɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a ta gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn har ʊ. A n aa dɩga a, Sɩmɔɔn dində ɩ yaaba m. Ŋ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an a waa.
Yeezuu n a zɔ ma, an zerga a burə ʊ, an həən si yaaba bɩ ma, an bɔ a mɛ ʊ. A n wuti lɛɛm an nyasʊ ŋ nɩ.
Kʊ woso lɛ a da bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ m, ŋnɩ yaaba do haay m bɩ, ŋ bʊr ŋ nɩ Yeezuu zi. Bɩ n a wɔ ka ŋ gʊaa deem-deem la, an ŋ waa.
Zinəro bɔ yaabazannɔ gʊta mɛ ʊ, kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m!» Bɩ, Yeezuu ɩ həən sire ŋ ma, a bɩr yɛm kʊ ŋ nɩ meer ba y. Bala, zinəro wɔɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʊ Krista m.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Yeezuu bɔ, an ta poohɔɔn ʊ, gʊɔɔ gʊta n'a kam ma. Kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʊa kʊ Yeezuu n gɔɔta kan a kɩ.
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Pakra m, kʊ m aa Woso cirbəə bɩ pa da tara gɔsɩnnɔ ra, bala, mɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʊ bɩ minto.»
A n nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m Zidee sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ.
Hindeem ʊ, Yeezuu ɩ jɩnɩm *Zenezarɛtɩ higʊta lɛ ra, zamaa bɩ nɩ kʊ nyʊnnyɔɔtam a jɩr ʊ k'a tʊr ka Woso lemim ma.
A kɔɔlʊʊ yɩ hɩɩya higʊta bɩ lɛ ra. Zɔbənno wɔɔ n bra, ŋn'a zaŋŋarɔ sʊrgɔm.
Yeezuu n da kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ deem ʊ. Nyɩnta a ʊ Sɩmɔɔn hɔ. A n a yɛ han k'an a gaa higʊta bɩ lɛ ma poore. Yeezuu n nyɩnta, an a to kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam zamaa bɩ m.
K'a meer bɩ ba an a nya bɩ, a a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʊ: «Ɩ zɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'a a zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zo, k'a zɔ gʊr.»
Sɩmɔɔn n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ zi ba gunuu ʊ tee… bɩ wɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyasʊ y. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ hɩ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ zom.»
Kʊ ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zo bɩ, ŋ zɔ gʊr gʊta, ŋ zaŋŋarɔ wɔɔ nɩ kɩnkaansʊrɛ.
Ŋ n a to, ŋn'a wɔ zo a zibəəkɔɔnrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kɔɔlʊʊ deem bɩ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, kʊ ŋ nɩ b'a da a han. Brɔɔ n bʊr, ŋnɩ b'a da ŋ han ŋn'a waa ʊ, ŋn'a zar kɔɔlʊʊrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an a han, ŋn'a yo k'a nyoo ba.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩ ba mɔɔ ma laatʊ, bala, mimbʊnyaabər m mɔɔ m.»
Dabɔʊ gʊta y'a nyasʊ kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ, zɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ y'a gʊr bɩ tɔ ma.
Dabɔʊ Zebedee nyɩnɔ Zakkɩ kan Zaan kɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ Sɩmɔɔn zibəəkɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ sɔ. Yeezuu n a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʊ: «Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ zɔnɔ gʊr biisi, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam gʊɔɔkamazaa kɛɛrɛ.»
Ŋ n a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʊr kɔɔlʊʊrɔ wɔɔ m higʊta lɛ ra b'ʊ, ŋnɩ hɔ haay bɩ to, ŋnɩ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ.

Yeezuu k'a yaa lee ku tara deem la bɩ, gʊaa nɩ b'ʊ kusiməbaa n ta ma jilli. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a sʊnta, an a meer zuutə tara ʊ, an yaa da m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, k'ɩ lɛ taa ma, ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ mɔɔ waa, k'ɩ dintim gʊ mɔɔ ma.»
Yeezuu n a wɔ hʊr, an a da ma, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ lɛ taa, ɩ waa.» Lɛɛm bɩ, a kusiməbaa bɩ nya ma.

Yeezuu n lɛ ka ʊ, a ʊ, a b'a hɩ gʊaa nɩ y. Bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ta ɩ yaa n'ɩ hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbər m, k'ɩ ganwʊrɛ ka amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Moyiisi lɛ ka bɩ m, ɩ dintim gʊ ɩ ma minto, k'an nyɩnta kasɛtɩ gʊaa haay lɛɛ.»
Bɩ y'a ka Yeezuu tɔ n bɔ an n'a dam la. Zamaa gʊta n tɩr a zɛm kʊ ra, k'a tʊr ka a lemim ma, k'a ka kʊ Yeezuu n a waa a yaabarɔ minto.
Bɩ, kʊ Yeezuu nɩ, ta a tɩr a ʊ a deem bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʊ, an bɩr yaa darɛ.

Hindeem ʊ, Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ. A to ŋ y'a ʊ Galilee kan Zidee kɩ Zerizalɛm kɩ kʊrɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr. Zuuba paŋŋa nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ, an a ka, an nɩ yaabazannɔ waam.
Gʊɔɔ n lee ku mɛgarɛzaa m wʊtarahɔ ʊ, ŋn'a kam ma k'a gasʊ m har ʊ b'ʊ, a wʊta Yeezuu taa.
Zamaa bɩ minto bɩ ŋ n a dɔ kʊ gasʊ awɔɔ n nawʊm nɩ lʊnlɔ y. Ŋ nɩ der cɛ bɩ ra, ŋnɩ cɛ bɩ mim hɔn ra, ŋn'a nyɔɔ, ŋn'a zer kan a wʊtarahɔ bɩ kɩ Yeezuu taa zamaa bɩ lɛɛ.
Yeezuu k'a ŋ sɩrakarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ yaabazaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa, ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a mɩŋŋa larm a heer ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa bɩ kara n naa, an nɩ Woso sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ? Nka y'a da ma an mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka kʊ Woso deem bɛɛ?»
Bɩ Yeezuu k'a ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ncɩnaaʊ?
Kara n naanaa? M a hɩ, m ʊ: Ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ bɩ m gɛ, ɩ wuti ɩ ta bɩ nɩ?»
Bɩ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, Gʊaanyɩ b'ɩ lɛ m k'a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka tara burə ʊ bɩ, an a hɩ mɛgarɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ y'a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, wuti, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ sa ɩ doo.»
Bɩ n wuti lɛɛm, ŋ mɩnyaa m, an a wʊtarahɔ bɩ sa, an doo, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
Ŋ haay zɛ kədə, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ. Dabɔʊ n ŋ nyasʊ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ mim daa yɩ her.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, a bɔ an yawʊrsir yɩ, a tɔ m Levii, an nɩ nyɩntarɛ a zibəə bɩncɛ ʊ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ.»
Levii n wuti, an a gʊ hɔ haay ma, an zu Yeezuu ʊ.
Levii n cibsa gʊta ba a har ʊ, an hɔbɩrɛ ba Yeezuu minto. Yawʊrsinno gʊta bʊr, kan gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ b'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan a wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ n bʊr, ŋn'ɩ kukur bam karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto, awɔɔ n nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim kan yawʊrsinno kɩ, mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩzannɔ bɩr a kam lɔɔtɔr ma y, yaabazannɔ n n'a kam ma.
Mɔɔ n bʊr kʊ m bɩ gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bir y, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ mimbʊnyaabənno minto, kʊ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa lʊr.»
Gʊɔɔ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Gallɛm gʊta Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ y'a lɛ kʊsɩm, ɩbɩɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩrɛ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mire?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a ka lʊ daa zim gʊaasɩbɔɔ n a lɛ kʊsɩ, kʊ lʊ daa bɩ zim b'ɩ kan ŋ kɩ ra?
Dɔmɩm zɛm, n nɩ zɛm bɩ lʊ daa zim bɩ bɔ ŋ bire ʊ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ kʊsɩm.»

A n a ya, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom vanta da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ pɛɛra daa kur sam, an a sɩnsar kan huu gusire kɩ y. Bala, pɛɛra daa bɩ b'a gam kʊ ʊ kan a gusire bɩ kɩ y. Pɛɛra daa bɩ y'a gusire bɩ kaansʊm.
Gʊaa b'a dam ma, an dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ gusinno ʊ y, kʊ bɩ bɛɛ nɩ, dɩvɛn bɩ yɩ ŋ hɩnhaanm, an a lo, bɩ hibɔɔnrɔ wɔɔ nyɩntam bɔm.
Bɩ, a ga a wʊm, ŋnɩ dɩvɛn daa tɔ hibɔɔnrɔ daarɔ ʊ.
Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ dɩvɛn gusire mim bɩ, a lɛ baa dɩvɛn daa ma y. Bala, a hɩ a nawʊrɛ, a ʊ, dɩvɛn gusire bɩ m mɩŋŋa.»
Hindeem ʊ, *sabaa hinni ʊ, Yeezuu bra hɔsɩrarɔ ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m hɔyaa bɩ yɩnyar, ŋn'a tiŋŋə, ŋn'a sʊrɛ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto, awɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ? Bɩ n n lɛ ka kʊ n naa ba sabaa hinni ʊ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Nɔ k'a Davɩd nyasʊ kan a muno kɩ an hɔ niŋŋə ba bɩ,
an gasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ, an bur kʊ n y'a ka Woso ʊ bɩ sa, an a bɩ kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ, bɩ n nɩ lɛ ka kʊ n a bɩ kʊ wosocɛmannɩbənno bɛɛ bala bɩ, awɔɔ n a karɩnda ba ra?»
A n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaanyɩ bɩ m sabaa hinni bɩ minzaa.»
Sabaa hinni vanta ʊ, Yeezuu gasʊ sokʊmacɛ ʊ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam. Gʊaa nɩ b'ʊ, a bɩsɩ ra wɔ n ga.
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dundom Yeezuu zi, k'a dɩga a, a yaabazaa bɩ waam sabaa hinni ʊ gɛ, k'a ku a mim ka ra.
Bɩ, Yeezuu ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ dɔ. A n a hɩ wɔgərzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti ɩ jɩm naa ʊ, zamaa bɩ bire ʊ.» Gʊaa bɩ n wuti an jɩm b'ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ kʊ m awɔɔ lar: zaa ta ʊ sabaa hinni ʊ, kʊ n nɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba gɛɛ, kʊ n nɩ zi bʊnyaa ba? Zaa ta ʊ kʊ n nɩ gʊaa meeyaa bʊmbɔ gɛɛ, kʊ n n'a zar?»
A n dɩga ŋ ma a jɩr ʊ, an a hɩ gʊaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ wɔ hʊr.» Gʊaa bɩ n a wɔ hʊr, a wɔ bɩ n a waa.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ, k'a mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ma ʊ gʊta, ŋn'a dɩndam kan kʊ kɩ, k'a dɩga hɔ k'a n'a bam Yeezuu m bɩ ma.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu ta ci mim ʊ, k'a yaa yaa da. B'a yaa bɩ da Woso m gunuu ʊ b'ʊ kan dɔmɩrɛ kɩ.
Dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ bir, an ŋ bɔ ʊ bueerehɩɩya, an tɔ ka ŋ ʊ, kristazibəəzannɔ.
Sɩmɔɔn k'a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr, a danzaa Andɩr, Zakkɩ, Zaan, Filipi, Bartelemii,
Matiyee, Toma, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ, Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n n'a birm *Zelɔtɩ,
Zakkɩ nyɩ Zidas, kan Iskarɩyɔtɩ Zidas k'a a ba zambʊzaa bɩ kɩ.

Yeezuu a to ci mim ʊ kan ŋ kɩ, an zer, an aa jɩm bɩncɛ fapɩda ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ gʊta gɔɔta b'ʊ. Zamaa gʊta nyɩnta b'ʊ sɔ. A to ŋ y'a ʊ Zidee ʊ, Zerizalɛm ʊ, kan kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ higʊta lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʊ, Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ jir ʊ.
Bʊr ŋ y'a ʊ, k'a b'a tʊr ka ma, k'an a waa a yaabarɔ minto. Gʊɔɔ kʊ zinəro nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a waam sɔ.
Zamaa bɩ haay y'a kam ma k'a a wɔ da ma. Bala, paŋŋa nyɩnta an nɩ bɔrɛ a mɛ ʊ, an nɩ ŋ haay waarɛ.
Yeezuu n dɩga a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kɛɛrɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a m ŋʊazannɔ,
Woso cirbəə bɩ, awɔɔ y'a so ʊ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʊ nɔ n'awɔɔ zɛm naa ma,
hɔbɩrɛ y'awɔɔ bɔm.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ baa dam naa ma,
awɔɔ yaa wʊm.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, kʊ n sɔ awɔɔ m, kʊ n kaanm awɔɔ m, kʊ n y'awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊ, ŋn'a bʊnyaa hɩ awɔɔ ma Gʊaanyɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a heernyɔɔ gʊta ba hinni bɩ do ʊ. Bala, Woso ɩ ganwʊrɛ gʊta bankam awɔɔ minto arzana ʊ. Ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ, nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ, ŋn'a ba ncɩnaaʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ m biisi.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ arzakazannɔ.
Bala, awɔɔ a heernyɔɔ yɩ biisi.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a hɔ bɩ an a ka her bɩ,
nɔ y'awɔɔ zɛm.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ yaa wʊm naa ma bɩ,
awɔɔ heer y'a zarm, a baa da.
Awɔɔ kʊ gʊaa haay n n'awɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa hɩm bɩ, a pakra barɛ awɔɔ m. Ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ, a ba ŋ y'a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ biisi lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ŋʊaarzannɔ wɔɔ m.»
«B'awɔɔ k'a n'a tʊr kam mɔɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʊa, k'a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɔ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ m.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ler bʊnyaa bɔrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a brɔɔ barka da ʊ. K'a yaa da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ŋʊaar ba ŋn'a karɛ awɔɔ lɛ m nɔ wɔɔ minto.
Kʊ gʊaa a wɔ ta ɩ paasɩ deem lɛ, k'ɩ deem bɩ ka ʊ k'an a tarɛ. Kʊ gʊaa ɩ gɔbga yɔ ɩ m, k'ɩ to k'an ɩ huuduama sa.
Kʊ gʊaa hɔ yɛ ɩ han, k'ɩ ka ʊ. Gʊaa k'a ɩbɩɩ hɔ sa bɩ, ɩ b'a laaka da han y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a ba awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a ba ŋ nɩ maam sɔ.
K'awɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʊam bala, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka? Bala mimbʊnyaabənno wɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ ŋʊam.
K'awɔɔ ɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a barɛ awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka? Mimbʊnyaabənno wɔɔ y'a bam maam sɔ.
K'awɔɔ zɩm sa gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, ŋ y'a karɛ awɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka? Bala, mimbʊnyaabənno wɔɔ ɩ zɩm sam kʊ m, k'a b'a si a lɛ ma.

Bɩ, k'a a jɩnnɔ ŋʊa, k'a zi mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ, k'a zɩm sa ŋ nɩ, b'a b'a hɔɔn da a sire ma y. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ ganwʊrɛ yɩm gʊta, awɔɔ nyɩntam Woso k'a lɛ da haay nyɩnɔ. Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n barka darɛ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ kan gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
K'a cicirzɛrɛ zi ba, amba awɔɔ Zɩ m cicirzɛrɛzaa bɩ m.
A b'a muno dʊdɔ ka y. Maam bɩ, Woso b'awɔɔ dʊdɔ karɛ y. A b'a muno dʊdɔ yar y. Maam bɩ, Woso b'awɔɔ dʊdɔ yarlɛ y. K'a sugur ka a muno ʊ, maam bɩ, Woso sugur karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.

K'a hɔ ka a muno ʊ. Maam bɩ, Woso y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ sɔ. N hɔgammɔr mɩŋŋa sam, n nɩ hɔ zar m awɔɔ mɔr ʊ, an a han, n n'a yɩga-yɩga zɛ, an bɩr a lom. Bala, hɔgammɔr k'awɔɔ n ta m gʊɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ n nɩ nyɩntam hɔgammɔr awɔɔ minto sɔ.»
Yeezuu n a ya, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bʊʊ y'a dam ma an bʊʊ gaa ra? Ŋ hɩɩya haay b'a zarm yaa deem ʊ ra?
Karɩndanyɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba ra y, bɩ karɩndanyɩ haay, k'a bankarɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, a nyɩntam am a karɩnsaamba hɔ bɩ m.
Bɔ nɩ, ɩ nɩ bur k'a n'ɩ mim mɩnyaa ʊ bɩ yɩrɛ, an bɔkarɛ kusə k'a n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʊ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr a yɩrɛ?

Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ ɩ hɩ ɩ danyɩ m, ɩ ʊ: Jɩm kʊ m bur bɔ ɩ mɩm ʊ, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr kusə k'a n'ɩbɩɩ mɩm ʊ bɩ yɩrɛ? Zambʊzaa, kusə bɩ bɔ ɩ mɩm ʊ cɩna, kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɩm lɛɛ yɩm, k'ɩ bur bɩ bɔ ɩ mim bɩ mɩm ʊ.»
«Gɔ mɩŋŋa ba ʊ, an nɩ nyɩ bʊnyaa darɛ y, gɔ bʊnyaa ba ʊ, an nɩ nyɩ mɩŋŋa dam sɔ y.
N gɔ biyəə dɔ kan a nyɩ kɩ. N bɩr sɔɔn nyɩ nɔm laa gɔ ra y. N bɩr tʊgɔ nyɩ nɔm laazankʊrɛ ra y.
Gʊaa mɩŋŋa k'a n'a mɩŋŋabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʊm mim mɩŋŋa m a heer ʊ sɔ. Gʊaa bʊnyaa k'a n'a bʊnyaabaa m bɩ, bɔ an nawʊm mim bʊnyaa m a heer ʊ. Bala, hɔ k'a ɩbɩɩ heer han bɩ, b'ɩ lɛ n'a hɩm.»
«Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ birm Zuuba, Zuuba, b'awɔɔ bɩr hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ barɛ?
Gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi, an n'a tʊr kam mɔɔ meerbaa ma, an nɩ zi bam nɩ bɩ, kʊ m a bɔkʊrɛ hɩnka a m.
Bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ cɛ dɔm, an yaa hɔn zukudə, an a jɩr bɩ cɩnta ci burə ʊ bɩ kɩ. La gʊta bʊr, hi n yar kan hɩnhɛr kɩ an a mom cɛ b'ʊ, b'a n a da ma, an a wurgə y, bala a dɔrɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa.

Gʊaa k'a n'a mam, b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a cɛ dɔ tara ʊ, b'a na jɩr cɩnta y. La gʊta bʊr, hi n yar kan hɩnhɛr kɩ an a mom cɛ b'ʊ, an wurgə lɛɛm. Bɩ cɛ bɩ wurgəre kur, a hɔsɩ n gɔɔta y.»
Yeezuu k'a meer bɩ ba kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ an a nya bɩ, a wuti an ta Kapɛrnawum ʊ.
Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ cir deem n ta lɔ m, an a ŋʊa maam-maam, an yaaba zɛ, an a zɔ zɛ ma.
K'a Yeezuu mim ma bɩ, a zɩɩfʊrɔ *gʊɔɔgusinno nyɔɔ zi, kʊ ŋ n'aa a yɛ han, k'an b'a lɔ bɩ waa.
Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ han, ŋnɩ so ra, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do a ga m k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da han,
bala, a wɔɔ do bɩ ŋʊa, a sokʊmacɛ dɔ an a ka wɔɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n ta kan ŋ kɩ. Kʊ ŋ y'a zɔ har bɩ ma bɩ, sʊrdaa zɔrɔ cir b'a gʊaasɩbɔɔ nyɔɔ, ŋn'a hɩm, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa da kɔrɛ ma, bala, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ n gasʊ mɔɔ har ʊ y.
Mɔɔ m hɔɔn da mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ poore kʊ m bʊr ɩbɩɩ zi, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ meer ba deem bala, mɔɔ lɔ bɩ y'a waam.
Lɛɛzannɔ y'a so mɔɔ mɩŋŋa ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ m so sʊrdaarɔ ʊ. Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ deem m, an ta, a tam. Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ a vanta m, an bʊr, a zɛm. Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ zibəənyɩ m, an naa ba, a y'a bam.»
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a zɛ kədə sʊrdaa zɔrɔ cir bɩ tɔ ma, an a bɔ an dɩga zamaa k'a zu a jɛ ʊ bɩ ma, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, baa Israyɛl nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ n sɩrakarɛ yɩ ncɩnaaʊ y.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ doo sʊrdaa zɔrɔ cir bɩ har ʊ bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a lɔ b'a waa.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu ta tara deem kʊ n n'a birm Nayin bɩ nɔ ʊ. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ kan zamaa gʊta kɩ.
K'a n'a zɔm tara bɩ lɛ ma bɩ, n gər busu, n nɩ tam nɩ yaa ra. Zoro nyɩ m, b'a m nyɩyar a deem a da han. Tara bɩ gʊɔɔ gʊta lʊ bɩ da zaa ʊ.
Zuuba k'a lʊ bɩ yɩ bɩ, lʊ bɩ cicir gasʊ ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ b'ɩ ya ɩ nyi ka y.»
A n a zɔ, an a wɔ da gʊraŋŋa bɩ ma. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a busu rɔ wɔɔ n jɩm. Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Nyukumbueere, mɔɔ lɛ ka, wuti.»
Gər bɩ n wuti an nyɩnta, an nɩ meer bam. Yeezuu n nyɩ bɩ gaa, an a ka a da ʊ.
Dabɔʊ gʊta ŋ haay nyasʊ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa gʊta a hɩnka wɔɔ bire ʊ. Bɩ Woso bɩ dɩga a do ma.»
Hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba bɩ ta Zidee haay ʊ kan a gʊrgarɔ kɩ ʊ.
Zaan-Batiisi karɩndanyɩnɔ yaa hɔ haay k'a ba bɩ hɩ m. Zaan nɩ ŋ gʊaa hɩɩya bir,
an ŋ nyɔɔ Zuuba zi kʊ ŋ n'aa a lar: «Ɩbɩɩ n nɩ dɔrɛ ɩ zɛrɛ ma bɩ gɛɛ, gʊaa vanta nɩ?»
Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Zaan-Batiisi ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma, k'ʊ bɩ laaka da ɩbɩɩ han: ɩbɩɩ n gʊaa k'a a ga m an bʊr bɩ gɛɛ, gʊaa vanta nɩ?»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu yaabazannɔ waa gʊta, an gʊɔɔ waa a yaabarɔ do haay nɔ ʊ, kan zinərozannɔ kɩ, a bʊʊrɔ mɩm gʊ sɔ.

A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ Zaan-Batiisi ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a ta, a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ yɩ, a ma sɔ bɩ hɩ Zaan m: bʊʊrɔ mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm, lʊgɔrɔ ɩ tam, kusimoo laafɩɩ yɩ, tikkiro tʊr a gʊ, gəəno a mɩm bɔ ʊ, lemim nyɩnta ɩ hɩm cicirzannɔ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʊaa k'a n a sɩrakarɛ to mɔɔ minto bɩ m.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ Zaan-Batiisi ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a hʊr bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a poohɔɔn ʊ? Hɩnhɛr awɔɔ yɩ an nɩ niigəgɔ yəŋŋəm gɛ?
Bɔ awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a paan…? Gʊaa m, an huu wɩsɩ da a ra gɛ? Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ huu wɩsɩrɔ da a ra, ŋn'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam mɩŋŋa bɩ, cinno har brɔɔ n ta ʊ.
Nka awɔɔ ta a yaa dɩga a? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gɛ? Ɩɩn… mɔɔ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, a lɛ da wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa ra.
Bala, Zaan bɩ mim n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ bɩ, n ʊ: ‹Ba mɔɔ nɩ m zibəəzaa nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, k'a n'ɩbɩɩ zaarɔ bɩmbanka na.›
Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, lannɔ nyɩnɔ bire ʊ, gʊaa ba ʊ an lɛ da Zaan-Batiisi ra y. Bɩ gʊaa k'an poore Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ bɩ, a lɛ da m.»
Zamaa bɩ haay kan yawʊrsinno wɔɔ kɩ a tʊr ka Zaan ma, ŋn'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ Woso tɩrga, ŋn'a ka an batɛm ka a ʊ.
Bɩ farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ kaanm hɔ kʊ Woso lɛ n taa ŋ minto bɩ m, kaanm kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ Zaan batɛm bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ m her gʊɔɔ nɔɔn makra ba kan bɔ kɩ? Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan bɔ kɩ?
Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ yaa nyɩnta daasɩ ʊ, ŋn'a to ŋn'ɩ kʊ bimbirm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: Wɔɔ hir hɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n sar ba y! Wɔɔ zɛ laa lɔ b'awɔɔ n nyi ka y?
Bala, Zaan-Batiisi bʊr, a bɩr bur bɩrɛ y, a bɩr dɩvɛn mire y, awɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Zinə nɩ kan kɩ.
Bɩ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bʊr, an nɩ hɔ bɩm, an nɩ hɔ mim, awɔɔ ʊ: Naa do naa, nɔzaa m bɩ dɩvɛnmir m sɔ, yawʊrsinno kan mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ hannyɩ m.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yɛm Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ ŋ ʊ, Woso Mindɔrɛ bɩ tɩrga.»
Farizɛn deem Yeezuu bir k'an bɩ hɔ bɩ kan a kɩ. Yeezuu n gasʊ a har ʊ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋnɩ hɔ bɩrɛ.
Lʊ n nɩ tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, mimbʊnyaabər m. A n a ma ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu ɩ hɔ bɩm farizɛn har ʊ b'ʊ. A n bʊr gedre m, n n'a ba albatɩr jaa m, tidəər n a han,
an bɩ sʊnta a kur a gannɔ ma, an nɩ nyi karɛ. A mɩm hi n bɔ, an n'a lom Yeezuu gannɔ ra. A n a minkə gaa, an a nʊnnɔ ma, an a wɔ barka ŋ la, an tidəər bɩ sa, an a lo ŋ la.
Farizɛn k'a Yeezuu bir bɩ k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʊ: «Kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m gʊaa naa do nɩ, a lʊ k'a n'a wɔ nɔrɛ awɔɔ ma naa dɔm, kʊ nka m sɔ: mimbʊnyaabər naa.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩmɔɔn, mɔɔ ɩ mim m kʊ m a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m.» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Meer ba, karɩnsaamba.»
«Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, gʊaa hɩɩya n n'a zɩm m. Deem nɩ dɔmɩm zɔrsoor zibəə busoo m, deem bɩ n ta dɔmɩm busoor zibəə busoo m.
Kʊ ŋ ba busoo m k'a zɩm bɩ kam bɩ, busoo bɩ zaa b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ŋn'a to. Nka nɩ busoozaa bɩ ŋʊarɛ an lɛ da?»
Sɩmɔɔn n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ y'a hɩm, mɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa k'a zɩm lɛ da a mim la bɩ m.» Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ sɩra hɩ.»
Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga lʊ bɩ ma, an a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ lʊ naa do yɩ ra? Mɔɔ gasʊ ɩbɩɩ har ʊ, ɩbɩɩ n hi lo mɔɔ gannɔ ra y, bɩ, a nyi ka, a mɩm hi n a lo mɔɔ gannɔ ra, an a gʊngʊ ma a minkə m.
Ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ nyaasɩ ka kan daʊrɛ kɩ y. Bɩ lʊ bɩ mɔɔ nyaasɩ ka an a wɔ barka mɔɔ gannɔ ra, b'a bɩr a tore y.
Ɩbɩɩ n nyɔɔ nɔ mɔɔ mim ma y, bɩ, a tidəər nɔ mɔɔ gannɔ ma.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ: a a mimbʊnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba gʊta rɔ wɔɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ tɔ ma m, an ŋʊarɛ gʊta zi naa ba. Gʊaa k'a mimbʊnyaa m poore n nɩ sugur ka ʊ bɩ, a ɩ ŋʊarɛ m poore sɔ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ lʊ bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a heer ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Nka m gʊaa naa do nɩ? A n yɛ an nɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur karɛ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ lʊ bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʊmbɔ. Ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu zaa sa an bɔ kʊrɔ gʊtɔɔ kan kʊrɔ poorero kɩ nɔ ʊ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa darɛ. Karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta kan kɩ,
kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ k'a ŋ waa zinəro kan yaabarɔ kɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ kɩ: Magdalaa Maarii kʊ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʊ saanhɩna,
Hɩrɔɔdɩ har dɩgamazaa Kuzaa lʊ Zannɩ kɩ, Sʊzannɩ kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ gʊta, kʊ ŋ y'a da ŋ han a hɔnyɩrɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zamaa a to kʊrɔ haay ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr Yeezuu zi. Kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra bɩ, Yeezuu hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da.
«Gʊaa ɩ bɔ k'a hɔ duu. K'a n'a duum bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʊm. A yaa gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo zaa bire ʊ. N n tʊntɔ ra, brama bɛnnɔ n a bɩ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo jaarɔ ra. Ŋ haan, ŋnɩ gɩnga kʊ taa butur ba ʊ bɩ minto.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a zar laa ʊ. Ŋ bɔ, laa bɩ n a ta ŋ mee, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʊ. Ŋ bɔ, ŋnɩ nyɩ da zɔrɔ-zɔrɔ.» Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, an so ra kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a tʊr n ta ʊ, k'an a ma!»
Yeezuu karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do jɩ ma.
A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Woso zaa ka awɔɔ n hɔ k'a nyaakʊm da Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ bɩ dɔ, bɩ, bɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom n n'a darɛ ŋ nɩ, kʊ ‹ŋnɩ dɩga, bɩ ŋ b'a yɩ y, kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr ka, bɩ ŋ b'a ma y.› »
«Ba hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom bɩ jɩ n na. Hɔduure bɩ, Woso lemim m.
Bɔɔ nɩ zaa bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m, ŋn'a mam, Sʊtaana k'a lee ku bɩ, an nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ ŋ heer ʊ bɩ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, kʊ ŋ b'a da ma, ŋn'a si, ŋnɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ nɩ y.
Bɔɔ nɩ jaarɔ burə ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m, kʊ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ ma, a si ŋ nawʊm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ŋ məsi ba ʊ y. A si ŋ nawʊm, bɩ k'a yɩ poore, makra dɔmɩm ʊ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa.
Bɔɔ y'a zar laa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m, ŋn'a mam, bɩ kan hɔɔndarɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, durnya arzakarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, durnya heernyɔɔrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔɔta ŋ nawʊm jɛ ʊ, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ nyɩ da mɩŋŋa y.
Bɔɔ y'a lo lɛɛ mɩŋŋa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m, ŋn'a tʊr kam lemim bɩ ma, ŋn'a sim mɩŋŋa kan heer tɩrgabaa kɩ. Ŋ bɩr a tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʊ y, ŋ bɩr a tom sɔ y, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ nyɩ dam.»
«Gʊaa bɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʊ, an mɔr sa an a ku ma, gɛɛ an a sa, an a nyɔɔ gargʊ ta y. A cɩnta n nawʊrɛ a bɩncɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gasʊm nɔ wɔɔ n bɩr lɛɛ gure bɩ yɩm.
Bala, mim haay kʊ gʊɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋn'a dɔ naa ma bɩ, ŋ zɛm b'a dɔ. Mim ba ʊ n n a nyaakʊm da a dɔ n mɩ y.
K'a dundo a zi kan a tʊr k'awɔɔ n'a kam ma lʊnlɔ bɩ kɩ. Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ m bɩ, n y'a dam la. Bɔ ɩ bɩ hɔsɩ n bɩ, a hɔɔn k'a a da a ʊ, a ta m poore bɩ, n y'a yɔm nɩ.»
Yeezuu da kan a danyɩnɔ kɩ bʊr zi, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a zɔ ma y, zamaa minto.
N n'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ da kan ɩ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ garga ra, ŋ lɛ n taa ɩbɩɩ ma.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ da kan mɔɔ danyɩnɔ kɩ m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam Woso lemim ma, ŋn'a zi bam nɔ wɔɔ m.»
Hindeem ʊ, Yeezuu da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ʊ ta higʊta bɩ gəm deem bɩ ra», ŋnɩ cem.
Kʊ ŋ y'a hʊr, ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, Yeezuu hinceem ba. Hɩnhɛr gʊta n yar higʊta bɩ ra. Hi n'a tɔm kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, an n'a ŋʊam k'a nyoo zɛ.
Ŋ n'a zɔ, ŋn'a gu, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, karɩnsaamba, ʊ ɩ gɩngam!» A n wuti, an həən si hɩnhɛr bɩ ma kan hikurero wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a da zenyy…, lɛɛ n zɛ sɩɩ…
