A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ b'ɩ ka?» Dabɔʊ nɩ ŋ nyasʊ, ŋ n zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Nka m gʊaa naa do nɩ? A n nɩ lɛ kam hɩnhɛr ʊ kan hi kɩ, ŋn'a lɛ sire!»
Ŋ yaa lee ku Gergezaa zannɔ kʊ ʊ. Kʊ bɩ, a nya a ʊ Galilee kʊ bɩ rɛ.
Yeezuu k'a zer tara ʊ bɩ, tara bɩ gʊaa deem a zɛ ʊ, zinəro nɩ kan kɩ. A dɔmɩm laatʊ, a n a ya, an nɩ huu darɛ a ra y, b'a n a ya, an nɩ wʊtam har ʊ y. Wʊta a nawʊm gəənoyaarɔ nɔ ʊ.

Gallɛm gʊta zinə bɩ tɩr gasʊ gʊaa b'ʊ an maasɩrɛ ba. N n a wɔrɔ sur baŋŋarɔ m, n n pɔyaarɔ da a gam ʊ k'a dɔ ma. Bɩ, a tɩr ŋ yɩnyar, zinə bɩ n a gaa, an ta m zaŋŋa ʊ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka zinə b'ʊ k'an bɔ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a zee da, an sʊnta a taa, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ, Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩ bɩ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma y.»

Gallɛm gʊta zinə bɩ tɩr gasʊ gʊaa b'ʊ an maasɩrɛ ba. N n a wɔrɔ sur baŋŋarɔ m, n n pɔyaarɔ da a gam ʊ k'a dɔ ma. Bɩ, a tɩr ŋ yɩnyar, zinə bɩ n a gaa, an ta m zaŋŋa ʊ. Yeezuu n lɛ ka zinə b'ʊ k'an bɔ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ. K'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a zee da, an sʊnta a taa, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ, Yeezuu, Woso k'a lɛ da haay Nyɩ? Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ɩ bɩ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma y.»
Yeezuu n a lar, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ tɔ m bɔ?» A ʊ: «Leziyɔn» A jɩ k'a hɩ, a ʊ: Gʊta maam-maam, bala, zinəro gʊta ɩ gasʊ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ.
Zinəro wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'a bɩ lɛ ka a ʊ, k'a gasʊ yaa gʊta ʊ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ y.
Kurkuuro ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ gʊta, ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm ci bɩ ra. Zinəro wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han, k'an zaa ka a ʊ, k'a gasʊ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʊ. A n zaa ka ŋ ʊ.
Zinəro wɔɔ n bɔ gʊaa bɩ mɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ gasʊ kurkuuro wɔɔ ʊ. Kurkuuro wɔɔ n bra si ci bɩ mim ʊ, ŋnɩ zer, ŋn'a zar higʊta b'ʊ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Kurkuuro dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ bra si, ŋn'aa hɩ tara nɔ ʊ, kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n bʊr k'a bɩ dɩga hɔ k'a ba bɩ ma. Ŋ lee ku Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ gʊaa kʊ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʊ bɩ yɩ, an nɩ nyɩntam Yeezuu jɩr ʊ, an huu da a ra, an a ba gʊaa mɩŋŋa, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da n bɔ ʊ.
Bɔɔ ɩ hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ zinəro zaa bɩ waarɛ jɩ dɩnda gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr lɔ wɔɔ m.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Gergezaa zannɔ wɔɔ n a yɛ Yeezuu han k'an a hʊr a tara ra. Bala, nyibəə gʊta gasʊ ŋ ʊ. Yeezuu n a bɔ, an da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, an a wusigə.
Gʊaa kʊ zinəro bɔ a mɛ ʊ b'a yɛ Yeezuu han k'a zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ. Yeezuu n a da zaa ra, a ʊ:
«Doo ɩ har ʊ, k'ɩ yaa hɔ kʊ Woso a ba ɩbɩɩ minto bɩ hɩ.» Gʊaa bɩ n a hʊr, an aa hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba a m bɩ hɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʊ jilli.
Yeezuu k'a a bɔ, an bɩ lee ku bɩ, zamaa bɩ b'a zɛ ʊ, ŋn'a si. Bala, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dɔm ma.
Gʊaa n bʊr b'ʊ, a tɔ m Zayirus, sokʊmacɛ cir m. A n bɩ sʊnta Yeezuu taa, an a yɛ han, k'an bʊr a har ʊ,
bala, a nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ n ta ʊ deem bala, a dɔɔraa a zɔ bueerehɩɩya ma, an n'a bam k'a ga. Kʊ Yeezuu nɩ tam bɩ, zamaa b'a so ʊ.
Lʊ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ma n'a dam zi dɔɔraa bueerehɩɩya. [A n a hɔnyɩ zar lɔɔtɔɔrɔ zi,] bɩ, gʊaa ba ʊ an a da ma, an a waa y.
A n a zɔ Yeezuu ma a kur, an a wɔ da a huu lɛ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, a ma b'a da jɩm ʊ.
Yeezuu n laaka da, a ʊ: «Nka y'a wɔ da mɔɔ ma?» Ŋ haay n bɩsɩ ka. Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a so ɩbɩɩ ʊ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ nyʊnnyɔɔtam nɔ wɔɔ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa a wɔ da mɔɔ ma, bala paŋŋa bɔ mɔɔ mɛ ʊ, mɔɔ n a dɔ.»
Lʊ bɩ k'a a dɔ a ʊ, ŋ sʊr a ra bɩ, a bʊr kan mɛhinkə kɩ, an bɩ kukurə zɛ Yeezuu taa. Hɔ niŋŋə k'a ka, an a wɔ da ma, an a waa lɛɛm bɩ, an a jɩ sa, an a dɩnda m zamaa bɩ haay taa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «M nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʊmbɔ. Ta kan laafɩɩ kɩ.»
Kʊ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʊaa a to sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ har ʊ, an b'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ ga. Ɩ b'ɩ ya, ɩ karɩnsaamba da kɔrɛ ma y.»
Bɩ Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, an a hɩ Zayirus m, a ʊ: «Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. Sɩra ka bala, a y'a waam.»
Kʊ Yeezuu lee ku har ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a n zaa ka gɔsɩ ʊ k'an gasʊ y. Pɩyɛɛr a gaa bala, kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, kan nyɩ bɩ zɩ kɩ, a da kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ haay nɩ baa dam, ŋnɩ heerzar nɔ ʊ nyɩ bɩ minto. Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «A bɩ baa da y. A n ga y, hinceem an n'a bam.»
Ŋ nɩ yaa wʊm Yeezuu ma, bala, ŋ sɩra ka, a ga.
Yeezuu n nyɩ bɩ sa a wɔ ma, an a bir, a ʊ: «M nyɩnnɩ, wuti!»
A n a mɩm bɔ ʊ, an wuti lɛɛm. Yeezuu n zaa ka, a ʊ, ŋnɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʊ.
A zɩrɔ wɔɔ n zɛ kədə, bɩ Yeezuu lɛ ka, a ʊ, ŋ bɩ hɔ k'a ba naa hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.
Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, a paŋŋa kan lɛ kɩ ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ la zinəro ra, kʊ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ waa.
A n ŋ nyɔɔ, kʊ ŋ n'aa Woso cirbəə bɩ pa da, kʊ ŋ nɩ yaabazannɔ waa.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A bɩ hɔsɩ sa a wɔ ʊ k'a zaa bɩ sa nɩ y. A bɩ bara sa, gɛɛ hɛra, gɛɛ bur, gɛɛ busoo y. A b'a ka gʊaa deem m huuro gʊr hɩɩya y.
Har niŋŋə kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ siŋ ʊ bɩ, k'a gɔɔta b'ʊ, an ta, an awɔɔ hʊrlɛ dɔmɩm ku.
Kʊ ŋ n awɔɔ si kʊ bɩ do nɔ ʊ y, k'a bʊr an n'a hʊrm, k'a kʊ bɩ taanyisi bɩ gʊngʊm a gannɔ ma, kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, a kʊrɔ ma.»
Ŋ n'a hʊr ŋnɩ ta kʊrɔ haay ʊ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam, ŋn'ɩ yaabazannɔ waam bɩncɛ haay ʊ.
Cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ hɔ haay kʊ Yeezuu a ba naa ma. A n a dɔ k'a hɔɔn an n'a dam lɔ y. Bala, nawɔnnɔ ʊ Zaan y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.
Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ *Elii y'a hɩnka. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ʊ biisi rɔ wɔɔ deem y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ ʊ: «Mɔɔ ka ŋnɩ Zaan mim gʊ ma. Bɩ, nka ŋn'a mim dɩndam mɔɔ n'a mam naa?» A n n'a kam ma k'a yɩ.
Zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a wusigə bɩ, ŋ yaa hɔ haay kʊ ŋ yaa ba bɩ hɩ Yeezuu m. A n ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ toore ma, tara kʊ n n'a birm Bɛtsayɩdaa bɩ zeezi.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a dɔ bɩ, ŋ zu ŋ jɛ ʊ. Yeezuu nɩ ŋ si, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa laafɩɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ waarɛ.

Gum k'a bʊr an nɩ dam bɩ, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra, kʊ ŋ nɩ ta kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ jɩnjɛɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'aa a ka wʊtajɩrɔ ma kan hɔbɩrɛ kɩ ma ŋn'a bɩ. Bala, bɩncɛ kʊ wɔɔ n ta ʊ naa, laatʊ hadrɔ ma.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʊ ŋn'a bɩ a zim.» Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Bur soor taan… ɩ gɔɔta wɔɔ ʊ kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya, kʊ bɩ bɛɛ y, k'ʊ ta ʊ aa hɔbɩrɛ si, ʊ b'a ka zamaa b'ʊ.»
Gʊɔɔ yaarɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ tisi soor ku. Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a ka kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n nyɩnta busoor-busoor.»
Ŋ n'a ba maam, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɩnta haay.
Yeezuu n bur soor bɩ sa kan zɔ hɩɩya bɩ kɩ, an a mɩm busu brama, an ŋ barka da ʊ, an a zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a ka zamaa b'ʊ.
Ŋ n'a bɩ, an ŋ ka haay. A kuurero kʊ ŋ gɔɔta bɩ, ŋn'a gʊr kasɩ lɛ ma bueerehɩɩya.
Hindeem ʊ, Yeezuu bɔ toore ma, an nɩ yaa dam, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ kan kɩ. A n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Zamaa bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ, Zaan-Batiisi m. Nawɔnnɔ ʊ, Elii m. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ, biisizannɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ?» Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Krista kʊ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m.»
Yeezuu ŋ lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ŋ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ y.»

A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Pakra m kʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n fɩr yɩ gʊta, kʊ gʊɔɔgusinno n kaanm m kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a zɛ an ga, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʊ dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ.»
Yeezuu n bɔkarɛ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ haay, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a zu mɔɔ ʊ, k'an a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ to haay, dɔmɩm haay, k'an a gɔdarkʊra busu, an zu mɔɔ ʊ.
Kʊ sɩra nɩ, gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a a meeyaa bʊmbɔ, bɩ zaa n nɩ kʊrɔm ma. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ minto bɩ, bɩ zaa ɩ bɩ kʊrɔm a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ ma y.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa durnya naa arzaka yɩ haay, a zaa n bɔkarɛ an a mɩŋŋa nyaam, gɛɛ, an a mɩŋŋa zar, a nyɔɔdʊ ɩ ka?
Bala, kʊ gʊaa ɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, an nɩ nyannɩ zɛm mɔɔ meerbaa tɔ ma, kʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bʊr a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ kan a Zɩ hɔ kɩ malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ kɩ, a b'a zaa nyannɩ zɛrɛ y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla, gɔsɩnnɔ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩm, a mɩsɩrbaa dɔmɩm ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a meer bɩ ba bɩ, a dɔmɩm a zɔ sinnyə ma. A Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, an der ci ra k'a yaa da.
K'a nɩ yaa bɩ dam bɩ, a meer a lʊr, a huu n a ba fu fɩtɩtɩ, an nɩ nyakɩ bɔm.
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ bʊr, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan kɩ; Moyiisi kan Elii kɩ y'a hɩnka Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ,
ŋn'ɩ zibəə kʊ Yeezuu n n'a nyambʊrlɛ a zɛ m, Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ mim dɩndam kan kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr ɩ hinceem barɛ a ra kan a muno wɔɔ kɩ. Hinceem bɩ n bɩ ku ŋ la. Kʊ ŋ gu bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ yɩ kan gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a gʊm Yeezuu ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ naa ʊ a mɩŋŋa. Ʊ bur ba kaakʊ: Ɩbɩɩ hɔ deem, Moyiisi hɔ deem, Elii hɔ deem.» A n hɔ k'an a hɩm bɩ dɔ y.
K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, warkʊ bʊr an b'a ku ŋ la. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ warkʊ bɩ yɩ an n'a kure a ra bɩ, ŋ da bɔ ʊ gʊta.
Meerbaa n a to warkʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Nyɩ m naa, mɔɔ n'a bɔ ʊ. K'a a tʊr ka ma.»
Meerbaa bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n gɔsɩ yɩ, kʊ Yeezuu deem bɛɛ y. Ŋ n hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ hɩ gɔsɩ m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ y, ŋ zɛ pi.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, ŋ zer ci bɩ ra, zamaa n bʊr, an bɩ Yeezuu zɛ ʊ.
Gʊaa deem nɩ zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, an zee da, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, dɩga mɔɔ nyɩyar bɩ mim ma, an mɔɔ nyɩ a deem bala.
Zinə deem ɩ gasʊ ʊ, an tɩr a da zeedarɛ ma, an a hinkə. A n bɩr lihihur tarɛ a lɛ rɛ, an bɩr a dam kɔrɛ ma, a bɩr bɔrɛ a mɛ ʊ naanaa y.
Mɔɔ yɛ ɩbɩɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʊ ŋ nɩ la ra, bɩ ŋ n a da ma y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩrakarɛ warzannɔ kan gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kɩ do n'awɔɔ m. Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m dɔmɩm karɔ ba, kʊ m bʊraama zi ba kan awɔɔ kɩ? Bʊr ɩ nyɩ bɩ m naa ʊ.»
Nyɩ bɩ k'a bʊr an n'a zɔm bɩ, zinə b'a zɛ an a zo tara ʊ, an a hinkə. Yeezuu n həən si zinə bɩ ma, an nyɩ bɩ waa, an a ka a zɩ ʊ.
Ŋ haay n zɛ kədə Woso gʊtabaa bɩ minto.
Hɔ haay kʊ Yeezuu a ba bɩ a ka gʊaa biyəə heer n nyɩnta. A a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ:
«K'a tʊr ka hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ ma mɩŋŋa: N Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊm, n n'a da gʊɔɔ wɔ ʊ.»
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bɩr a meerbaa bɩ jɩ marɛ y. A jɩ b'a nyaakʊm da ŋ nɩ, kʊ ŋ b'a da ma, ŋn'a dɔ y, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam Yeezuu larlɛ m mim naa do minto.
Laakadarɛ deem bʊr ŋ hɔɔn ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ kam kʊ ma, ŋ ʊ: nka y'a da ma an yɩ jɩtaarɛ a bire ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a ŋ laaka bɩ darɛ jɩ dɔ bɩ, a nyɩ gaa, an a jɩm a jɩr ʊ,
an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a nyɩ naa do si mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ a yɩ m si. Gʊaa k'a mɔɔ si bɩ, gʊaa k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a a si. Bala, gʊaa k'an poore awɔɔ haay barla bɩ, bɩ n'awɔɔ jɩtaarɛ.»
Zaan meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ gʊaa yɩ an nɩ lam zinəro ra ɩbɩɩ tɔ m, wɔɔ n a gʊ ma, k'a ba kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «A b'a gʊ ma y, bala, gʊaa k'a bɩ bʊnyaa kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ gʊaa m.»
Dɔmɩm k'a a ga m kʊ Woso n Yeezuu bɔ durnya ʊ bɩ k'a n'a zɔm bɩ, a a cɩnta k'a ta Zerizalɛm ʊ.
A gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka a m. Brɔɔ n zaa sa, ŋn'aa gasʊ Samarii kʊ deem ʊ, k'a leekure bɩ banka.
Bɩ, ŋ n a si y, k'a zaa sa an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ Zaan kan Zakkɩ kɩ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ʊ lɛ ka, kʊ sɛ n a to brama an zer, an nawɔnnɔ bɩ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga ŋ ma, an nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ, [a ʊ: «Nyi k'an ta awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ n a dɔ y. Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n bʊr k'a bɩ gʊɔɔ zɩnzɛ y, bʊr a ʊ k'a bɩ ŋ bʊmbɔ.»]
Ŋ n'a hʊr, ŋnɩ ta tara vanta ra.
Kʊ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, gʊaa deem a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ zum kʊ ʊ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, m ta bɩncɛ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ taŋ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɛɛʊnrɔ yaarɔ ta ʊ, bɩ bɛnnɔ y'a cɛrɔ m. Bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ ba bɩncɛ m k'a mim cɩnta ʊ y.»
A n a hɩ gʊaa vanta m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ.» Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, zaa ka m ʊ, kʊ m dɔ m zɩ birle ma.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Gəəno wɔɔ to kʊ ŋ n a gəəno bir. B'ɩbɩɩ, ta ɩ yaa Woso cirbəə pa da.»
Gʊaa vanta n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ zure ɩbɩɩ ʊ karɩnsaamba, bɩ zaa ka m ʊ, kʊ m m leer so m harzannɔ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa donokaan sa k'a dam wʊ, an a bɔ an nɩ dɩgarɛ a kur, a zaa b'a dam ma an Woso cirbəə zi ba y.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Zuuba karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bɔ ʊ busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩya, an ŋ nyɔɔ hɩɩya-hɩɩya, kʊrɔ kan bɩncɛ haay k'a a ga m an ta ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ lɛɛ ka a lɛɛ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔdarɛ bɩ gʊta, b'a darɛzannɔ ba ʊ gʊta y. K'a yaa da wutu zaa bɩ m, k'a yɛ han, k'an zibənno nyɔɔ hɔdarɛ bɩ minto.
K'a ta! Awɔɔ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʊm am sinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ m tamparɔ bire ʊ.
A bɩ busoo sa y, a bɩ hɛra sa y, a bɩ kʊsɔ sa sɔ y. A bɩ jɩm a yaa da gʊaa m zaa ra y.
K'a lɛɛ ka a hɩ har k'awɔɔ n nɩ gasʊŋ ʊ b'ʊ, a ʊ: Kʊ laafɩɩ n bɩr har naa do mim la.
Kʊ laafɩɩ zaa ɩ b'ʊ deem, awɔɔ laafɩɩ bɩ zerm la. Kʊ bɩ bɛɛ y, a y'a bɔm an bʊr awɔɔ zi.
K'a gɔɔta har bɩ do ʊ. Hɔ kʊ n n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, a bɩr a bɩrɛ, a bɩr a mire. Bala, zibəəzaa b'a ga a busoo m. A bɩ har lʊnlʊr y.
K'awɔɔ yaa gasʊ tara niŋŋə nɔ ʊ, n n'awɔɔ si, k'a hɔ kʊ n y'a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ bɩ.
K'a yaabazannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ waa. K'a hɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ awɔɔ ma.
K'awɔɔ yaa gasʊ kʊ niŋŋə ʊ, bɩ ŋ n awɔɔ si, k'a bɔ a hɩ gʊɔɔ gaa ʊ, a ʊ:
Baa k'awɔɔ kʊ bɩ taanyisi k'a naasʊ wɔɔ gannɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ y'a gʊngʊm ma, ʊ a to awɔɔ m. Bɩ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ awɔɔ ma.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, Sodɔm hʊnhʊrlɛ bɩ nyɩntam gʊta, an kʊ bɩ do ku y.»

«A nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma bʊnyaa, Korazɛn zannɔ! A nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma bʊnyaa, Bɛtsayɩdaa zannɔ! Bala, hoserlo kʊ ŋ ba awɔɔ bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ ba ŋ y'a ʊ Tiir ʊ kan Sidɔn kɩ, ncɩnaaʊ naa ŋ yɔrgɔrɔ da a ra, ŋnɩ suu lo a mim la, k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a a mɩsɩrbaa lʊr, a dɔmɩm laatʊ.
Bɩ minto bɩ, dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, Tiir kan Sidɔn kɩ hʊnhʊrlɛ bɩ nyɩntam gʊta, an awɔɔ hɔ bɩ ku y.
B'ɩbɩɩ Kapɛrnawum, ɩ hɔɔn ɩbɩɩ n n'a darɛ ɩ ʊ, n y'ɩbɩɩ busum ɩ ta arzana ʊ ra? N y'ɩbɩɩ zerm yaa gʊta ʊ, fɩryɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔzaa n n'a tʊr karɛ awɔɔ ma bɩ, a tʊr an n'a kam mɔɔ ma. Bɔzaa ɩ kaanm awɔɔ m bɩ, kaanm a ʊ mɔɔ m sɔ. Bɩ bɔzaa ɩ kaanm mɔɔ m bɩ, kaanm a ʊ gʊaa k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ m.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ busaanhɩna a yaa hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a wusigə, ŋnɩ bʊr kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, baa zinəro wɔɔ lɛ si ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Sʊtaana yɩ, an a to brama an a da, am brama nyakɩ hɔ bɩ m.
Ba n nɩ: mɔɔ paŋŋa ka awɔɔ ʊ k'a tɔ mɩnnɔ ra kan bɔɔrɔrɔ kɩ kan jɩnnɔ paŋŋa kɩ haay, bɩ hɔsɩ bɩ barɛ awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ, a b'a hɔɔn nyɔɔ zinəro kʊ ŋ y'awɔɔ lɛ si rɔ wɔɔ minto y. K'a heer nyɔɔ, kʊ Woso awɔɔ tɔrɔ gʊrsɩra ba arzana ʊ bɩ minto.»

Lɛɛm bɩ, *Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka heernyɔɔ gʊta n gasʊ Yeezuu ʊ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, brama kan tara kɩ Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ mim naa do nyaakʊm da hɔɔnzannɔ, kan hɔdonno kɩ m, ɩ b'a hɩnka gʊɔɔ poorero m. Sɩra m, m Zɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'a ŋʊa k'an nyɩnta ncɩnaaʊ.»
«Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔ haay sa, an a ka mɔɔ ʊ, bɩ gʊaa ba ʊ an Nyɩ bɩ dɔ kʊ Zɩ bɩ bɛɛ bala y. Bɩ, gʊaa ba ʊ an Zɩ bɩ dɔ kʊ Nyɩ bɩ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ Nyɩ bɩ lɛ n taa k'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɛɛ bala y.»
A n a bɔ, an dɩga karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ a minto, a ʊ: «Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm nɔ wɔɔ yɩm.
Bala, Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʊta kan cinno kɩ a ŋʊa k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ yɩ, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a mam bɩ ma, bɩ ŋ n a ma y.»
Wosocikarɩnsaamba deem wuti an laaka da Yeezuu han, k'a nyasʊ meerbaa nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, bɔ mɔɔ m ga m m a ba, kʊ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Moyiisi lɛ ci bɩ nɔ ʊ, bɔ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba? Ɩbɩɩ y'a karɩnda bam lɔ?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «K'ɩ Zuuba ɩ Woso ŋʊa kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, kan ɩ nyi kɩ haay, kan ɩ paŋŋa kɩ haay, kan ɩ hɔɔndarɛ kɩ haay. K'ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ nyɩ bɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa. A ba ncɩnaaʊ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm.»
Bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a gumə ka a mɩŋŋa ʊ bɩ, a Yeezuu lar, a ʊ: «Nka m mɔɔ mim nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta an a to Zerizalɛm ʊ, an nɩ tam Zeriko ʊ. Konno n aa da ma, ŋn'a huuro yɔ m, ŋn'a zɛ bannɔ m, ŋnɩ yaaba da ma, ŋn'a gʊ ma, an n'a bam k'a ga.
Wosocɛmannɩbər deem a to b'ʊ sɔ, an bʊr an nɩ cenim zaa bɩ do ra. A n gʊaa bɩ yɩ, an bɩr ma, an cem.
Wosocɛ zibəəzaa deem a to Zerizalɛm ʊ sɔ, an nɩ cenim b'ʊ. Levii do gʊaa m. A n gʊaa bɩ yɩ, an bɩr ma, an cem.
Bɩ, Samarii gʊaa deem y'a to zaa ra, an bɩ lee ku gʊaa bɩ zi. K'a a yɩ bɩ, a cicir a nyasʊ.
A n a zɔ ma, an a nyinno wɔɔ sʊrgɔ dɩvɛn m, an nyɔɔ nɔ ŋ ma, an pɛɛra burgu ma, an a busu, an a da a sisi ʊ, an ta m zaasənnocɛ ʊ, an aa nyɩsɩ ba m.
Dɔ k'a mɩ bɩ, a busoo bɔ ʊ bɔɔlʊgʊ hɩɩya, n n a ba wanzur m, an a ka zaasənnocɛ zaa b'ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: Dɩga a mim ma, bɩ k'ɩ busoo zar a kur, kʊ mɔɔ m wusigə, kʊ m b'a sompi a yaa ʊ.
Ɩbɩɩ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ, gʊaa kaakʊ naa bireyaa ʊ, nka m gʊaa kʊ konno a zɛ bɩ mim nɩ?»
Wosocikarɩnsaamba bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩ mɩŋŋabaa ba kan kɩ bɩ m.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «B'ɩbɩɩ sɔ, ta, ɩ ba maam sɔ.»
Kʊ Yeezuu kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa gasʊ kʊ deem ʊ. Lʊ kʊ n n'a birm Martɩ bɩ ŋ si a har ʊ.
A dam n ta ʊ, a tɔ m Maarii, b'ɩ nyɩnta Zuuba bɩ taa, an n'a tʊr karɛ a meerbaa ma.

Martɩ nyɩnta an n'a tʊntɔŋ ʊ kan hɔbɩrɛ barɛ kɩ, zibəə gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ sɔ. A n bʊr, an b'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ dam bɩ k'a mɔɔ to m deem, m nɩ ziro wɔɔ bam bɩ, a bɩr hɔsɩ barɛ ɩbɩɩ n na? A hɩ m k'an b'a da m han.»
Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Martɩ, Martɩ, hɔ gʊta y'ɩbɩɩ hɔɔn ʊ, an n'ɩbɩɩ kɔm.
Deem bala m pakra. Maarii hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ bɔ ʊ, bɩ, gʊaa b'a yɔm nɩ y.»
Hindeem ʊ, Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ yaa dam bɩncɛ niŋŋə ʊ. K'a yaa bɩ da an a nya bɩ, karɩndanyɩ deem a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, yaadarɛ dɩnda ʊ m, amba Zaan a dɩnda a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m bɩ m.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ɩ yaa dam, k'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Zɩ,
a ka kʊ n n'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa dɔ Woso a deem,
k'ɩ cirbəə n bʊr.
Wɔɔ dɔmɩm biyəə hɔbɩrɛ ka wɔɔ ʊ,
k'ɩ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʊ, amba wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ y'a sugur kam bɔɔ ɩ kʊrɔma kan wɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Ɩ b'a ka, ʊ ʊ do makra nɔ ʊ y.»
Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa bɩ kara hannyɩ n ta ʊ, an ta an aa hɩ m dibsir ma, a ʊ: ‹M hannyɩ, bur zɩm sa m m kaakʊ,
mɔɔ hannyɩ deem y'a to zaa ra an bʊr mɔɔ zi, bɩ hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ka ʊ y.›
Bɔ n nɩ cɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: ‹Ɩ bɩ mɔɔ kɔ y. Mɔɔ cɛ lɛ ta. Mɔɔ kan m nyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ wʊtam. Mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m wuti, m bur ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ y.›
Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: baa k'a b'a dam ma, an wuti an a ka ʊ a hannyɩbaa bɩ minto, a wutire an hɔ haay k'a lɛ n taa bɩ ka ʊ, k'a lɛ baa k'an a kɔ bɩ tɔ ma.»
«Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: K'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ. K'a ka, awɔɔ y'a yɩm. K'a cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʊrɛ awɔɔ m.
Bala, gʊaa k'a hɔ yɛ, n y'a kaŋ ʊ, gʊaa k'a ka, a y'a yɩm, gʊaa k'a cɛlɛ zɛ, n y'a gʊrɛ a zaa m.
Zɩ bɩ kara n n'awɔɔ bire ʊ naa ʊ, a nyɩ n zɔ yɛ han an mɩm sa an a ka ʊ?
Gɛɛ a n a ya, an jir yɛ, bɩ n bɔɔrɔ sa an a ka ʊ?
K'awɔɔ n gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ hɔ mɩŋŋa ka a nyɩnɔ ʊ dɔ. Bɩ Zɩ Woso k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ, a bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a yɛm han rɔ wɔɔ ʊ an lɛ da ra?»
Yeezuu ɩ lam zinə k'a gʊaa ba bəətir bɩ la. Bɩ, zinə bɩ k'a bɔ bɩ, bəətir b'ɩ meer bam, zamaa bɩ n zɛ kədə.
Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ, ŋ ʊ, la Yeezuu n nawʊm zinəro wɔɔ ra, zinəro cir Bɛlzebul paŋŋa m.
Gɔsɩnnɔ lɛ n taa k'a Yeezuu makra ba a dɩga a, ŋn'a yɛm han k'an a ka kʊ makra n a to arzana ʊ k'a yɩ.
Bɩ Yeezuu ŋ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ yɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ cirbəə deem zannɔ wuti ŋn'ɩ yar bam kan kʊ kɩ, a da an nawʊm, a cɛrɔ wɔɔ n a dɩnda kʊ ra sɔ.
K'awɔɔ ʊ, Bɛlzebul paŋŋa minto y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra bɩ, kʊ Sʊtaana a bɔ an nɩ yar bam kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ sɔ, a cirbəə bɩ nyɩntam lɔ?
Kʊ Bɛlzebul minto y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ lam zinəro ra, awɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ, la ŋ nawʊrɛ ŋ la, nka tɔ ma? Awɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n n'awɔɔ dʊdɔ yarm.
Bɩ kʊ la mɔɔ nawʊm zinəro wɔɔ ra kan Woso wɔ paŋŋa kɩ, k'a dɔ a ʊ: Woso cirbəə b'ɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi.
Kʊ gʊaa paŋŋazaa ɩ dɔrɛ a har ma kan a yarbaa mɔrlɔ kɩ, hɔsɩ bɩ bam hɔ k'an ta m bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ kʊ paŋŋazaa vanta bʊr a paŋŋa n lɛ da ra, an b'a nyasʊ an a da ra, an a yarbaa mɔrlɔ k'a ŋ ka a ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ nɩ, hɔ k'an ta m bɩ gʊr an nawʊm an a jir.
Gʊaa k'a ba kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ jɩm m. Gʊaa k'a bɩr a dam mɔɔ han an a so kʊ ma bɩ, a hɩsɩga an nawʊm.»
«Kʊ zinə bɔ gʊaa mɛ ʊ, bɩmbɩr an nawʊm zaŋŋa ʊ an n'a kam mɛnyɔɔ darɛ bɩncɛ ma. K'a n a yɩ y, a y'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʊ: Mɔɔ yɩ m wusigəm, m ta m har gusire ʊ, bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ m bɔ ʊ bɩ.
K'a a wusigə bɩ, a yaa dɩga a, n y'a waa, n n'a banka mɩŋŋa.
A n a bɔ an ta, an aa zinəro gaa saanhɩna, ŋ bʊnyaabaa n lɛ da ra, ŋnɩ bɩ gasʊ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ. Bɩ gʊaa bɩ do bʊnyaabaa lɛ da m biisi ra.»
Yeezuu k'a meer ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, lʊ deem a leer busu an meer ba zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, a ʊ: «Mimbirenyɩntazaa m lʊ k'a ɩbɩɩ yɩ durnya ʊ, an nyɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ m.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam Woso lemim ma, ŋn'a lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ m.»
Zamaa bɩ k'a a so kʊ ma bɩ, Yeezuu y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Her naa ʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ m, makra ŋn'a kam ma. Bɩ kʊ makra bɩ nɩ, ŋ bɩ makra vanta yɩm kʊ Zonas makra bɩ bɛɛ y.
Bala, Zonas k'a nyɩnta makra Niniivɩ gʊɔɔ mɩm ʊ bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyɩntam makra sɔ her naa ʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ minto.

Woso dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, lʊcir k'a a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ ʊ bɩ wutim kan her naa ʊ gʊɔɔ nɔɔ m kɩ an ŋ dʊdɔ yar, bala, a to a ʊ durnya lɛ cɩnta jɛ ʊ, k'a b'a tʊr ka mindor Salomɔɔn lemim ma. Bɩ, bɔ ɩ lɛ da Salomɔɔn m b'ɩ naa ʊ.
Dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, Niniivɩ gʊɔɔ wutim kan her gʊɔɔ nɔɔ m kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yar, bala, kʊ ŋ y'a tʊr ka hɔ kʊ Zonas a hɩ bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a taam. Bɔ ɩ lɛ da Zonas ra b'ɩ naa ʊ.»
«Gʊaa ba ʊ an nɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʊ, an a nyaakʊm da y, gɛɛ, an a nyɔɔ kasɩ taa y. A cɩnta n nawʊm hɔ burə ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gasʊm nɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛgure bɩ yɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ mɛsim fɩtɩrɛ bɩ, mɩnyaa m. K'ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ mɛsim bɩ haay b'ɩ lɛɛgure ʊ. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa bɩ mɩŋŋa y, ɩbɩɩ mɛsim b'ɩ monsigə ʊ sɔ.
Dundo ɩ zi kan lɛɛgure k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ kɩ, ɩ b'a ka, an a ba monsigə y.
K'ɩbɩɩ mɛsim haay ɩ lɛɛgure ʊ, bɩ monsigə poore ba ʊ tɔkkɛ, a haay nyɩntam lɛɛgure ʊ amba fɩtɩrɛ k'a nɩ lɛɛ bɔrɛ a ʊ, an nɩ lɛɛgure kam bɩ m.»
Yeezuu k'a nɩ meer bam bɩ, farizɛn deem a bir a har ʊ k'an bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. A n gasʊ, k'a hɔ bɩ.
Farizɛn bɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'a n a wɔ hir amba n tɩr a ba bɩ, a zɛ kədə.
Zuuba bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɩga, awɔɔ farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ, hɛ kan laaga kɩ kur awɔɔ n'a sʊrgɔm, koorbaa n bɔkarɛ an awɔɔ heer han kan kʊsɩrabaa kɩ.
Hɔɔnwarzannɔ n'awɔɔ m! Gʊaa k'a kur bɩ ba bɩ, a bɛɛ y'a nɔ bɩ ba sɔ ra?
Bɩ, k'a hɔ ka cicirzannɔ ʊ, awɔɔ n n'a bam kɛɛrɛ bɩ haay yɩm mɩŋŋa awɔɔ ma.

A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, farizɛɛnrɔ ra! Bala, ganwʊrɛ bu hɔ awɔɔ n'a kam kan mantɩ, poobur kɩ, kan hɔ haay k'a nɩ haanm brikəro ʊ bɩ kɩ. A bɔkarɛ a kaanm Woso tɩrgabaa bɩ m kan a ŋʊarɛ bɩ kɩ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a ba, a bɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ ba sɔ.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, farizɛɛnrɔ ra! Awɔɔ ɩ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ, awɔɔ gʊɔɔ yaadarɛrɔ ŋʊa daasɩrɔ ʊ.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gəənoyaarɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tɔrɛ ŋ la, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dɔrɛ y.»
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ deem a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, wɔɔ sʊnsɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a wʊm sɔ.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ sɔ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ ra, a pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ mɔrlɔ gorezannɔ kam gʊɔɔ ra, b'awɔɔ bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr a nyʊkʊr deem taan… dam mɔrlɔ wɔɔ duro ma y.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ k'a nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ yaarɔ dɔm bɩ minto, b'awɔɔ zɩrɔ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ a ʊ, awɔɔ yɛ ŋ zibəə bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ yɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, awɔɔ m bʊr an nɩ ŋ yaarɔ bɩmbankam.
Bɩ y'a ka Woso n a hɩ a mindɔrɛ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan m zibəəzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛrɛ ŋ barla, ŋnɩ zibəə bʊnyaa ba gɔsɩnnɔ m.
Bɩ minto bɩ, ŋ her gʊɔɔ wɔɔ hʊnhʊrm, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ haay kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ hallɩ durnya darɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma lore minto.
A n a sa Abɛl ma lore ma, an ta m Zakarii k'a ga Wosocɛ ʊ, mannɩjaa bɩ kan bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ bire ʊ. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ her naa ʊ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro hʊnhʊrm minno nɔɔn duro minto.
A pakra barɛ awɔɔ m, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ ra, awɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ cɛlɛnyɩ sa a nyaakʊm da. Awɔɔ n gasʊ a zim y, a bɔkarɛ an n'a nyam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ taa k'a gasʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu k'a bɔ b'ʊ bɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ wuti ŋn'ɩ tatʊr bam kan nɔmaa kɩ, ŋn'ɩ laakarɔ do haay dɩndam han.
Ŋ n'ɩ dundom zi k'a ku a nyasʊ, a meerbaa deem nɔ ʊ.

Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ dɔrɛ ba ʊ a zɛ kʊ ra, hallɩ ŋn'ɩ tʊntɔm kʊ ra. Yeezuu n a sa, an n'a dɩndam a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʊ: «A n lɛ da haay bɩ, k'a dundo a zi kan farizɛɛnrɔ nyʊnyɔɔ kʊ zambʊ m bɩ kɩ.
Hɔ ba ʊ, an a nyaakʊm da, n b'a yɩrɛ y. Mim ba ʊ, an a nyaakʊm da, n b'a dɔrɛ y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ monsigə ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a mam lɛɛgure ʊ. Awɔɔ n a hɩ tʊr ʊ cɛ ʊ bɩ, n bɔm garga ra ŋn'a hɩ.»
«A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, m hannyɩnɔ: A bɩ nyi ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɛsim zɛm gər, bɩ, ŋ b'a dam hɔsɩ ma ŋn'a ba bɩ jɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ a ga m a nyi ba m bɩ, kʊ m a hɩnka a m: K'a nyi ba Woso k'a a da ma an gər zɛ, bɩ jɛ ʊ an a da ma, an ɩ gasʊ sɛhar ʊ bɩ m. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a nyi ba m.
N bɩr bɛnnɔ nyɩnɔ hɛɛnm soor, k'a tanka hɩɩya yɩ ra? Bɩ deem taan… tɔ bɩr bɔm Woso nɔ ʊ y.
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ minkə bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ sa haay. A da bɩ bɔ y, awɔɔ jɩra bɛnnɔ nyɩnɔ m jilli.»
«A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʊ gʊaa kasɛtɩ ka gʊɔɔ taa, a ʊ, mɔɔ gʊaa n'a mɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ y'a kasɛtɩ kam Woso malɛɛkarɔ taa sɔ.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ ma gʊɔɔ taa, mɔɔ bɩsɩ kam ma Woso malɛɛkarɔ taa sɔ.
Gʊaa k'a meerbaa bʊnyaa ba Gʊaanyɩ bɩ ma, a y'a sugur yɩm. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a meerbaa bʊnyaa ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma, a b'a sugur yɩrɛ y.
Kʊ ŋ bʊr, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m yaadarɛcɛrɔ ʊ, gɛɛ cinno taa, gɛɛ taralɛɛzannɔ taa, a b'a heer kɔ kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a hɩm k'a mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔm bɩ kɩ y.
Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a hɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ.»
Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, a hɩ mɔɔ danyɩ bɩ m k'an wɔɔ zɩ arzaka niŋŋə k'a a to bɩ jir kan mɔɔ kɩ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Nka ɩ lɛ ka kʊ mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ dʊdɔkarɛzaa gɛɛ awɔɔ hɔjirlezaa?»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi kan arzaka ŋʊarɛ kɩ. Bala, gʊaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ bɩr zum kʊ ʊ kan a arzaka kɩ y, baa kʊ arzakazaa m.»
A n hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a hɔsɩra n hɔ ba mɩŋŋa.
A n n'a hɔɔn darɛ a heer ʊ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ? Bala, bɩncɛ ba mɔɔ ʊ, m nɩ m hɔyaa bɩ zarŋ ʊ y.
A n n'a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʊ: Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ba n nɩ: kʊ m m sɩrɔ wɔɔ zɔ haay, m ŋ banka m ŋ dɔ gʊta-gʊta, m m hɔyaa bɩ zar ʊ kan m arzaka bɩ kɩ.
Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m mɩŋŋa m, mɔɔ ʊ: Ba ɩ n nɩ arzaka gʊta m na, dɔɔraa hɔka-hɔka minto. Mɛnyɔɔ da, hɔ bɩ, ɩ hɔ mi, k'ɩ heer nyɔɔ.
Bɩ, Woso a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Hɔɔnwarzaa ra, ɩbɩɩ gam gum naa ʊ. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ banka haay bɩ, nka n n'a sarɛ?›
Ncɩnaaʊ m kan gʊaa k'a arzaka gʊr an n'a kuntəre a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ hɔntazaa bɛɛ m Woso mɩm ʊ y.»
Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʊ: «Naa minto y'a ka mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a b'a heer kɔ kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bɩm k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba bɩ mim kɩ y, a b'a heer kɔ kan huu k'awɔɔ n n'a dure a ma bɩ mim kɩ sɔ y.
Bala, mɩsɩrbaa lɛ da hɔbɩrɛ m, mɛsim n lɛ da huu m.
K'a dɩga kaakaarɔ ma, ŋ bɩr hɔ duure y, bɩ ŋ bɩr a darɛ y. Ŋ ba hɔbɩrɛ kuntəjɩ nɩ y, ŋ ba sɩ m sɔ y. Bɩ Woso yɩ ŋ tʊrm. Awɔɔ jɩra bɛnnɔ m gallɛm hɔka!
Gʊaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʊ, an n'a dam ma, an a mɩsɩrbaa nyɔɔ lɛɛ poore a heerkɔrɛ minto?
K'awɔɔ b'a dam a poore bɩ barɛ ma bɩ, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n n'a heer kɔm kan bɔ ɩ gɔɔta haay bɩ kɩ?
K'a dɩga burvuro kʊ ŋ nɩ haanm hɔsɩra ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ bɩr lannɩ nɔɔrɛ, ŋ bɩr huu barɛ y, bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Salomɔɔn kan a cirbəə bɩ kɩ, a n huuro gʊɛrɛrɔ yɩ an burvuro nɔɔn duro deem nɩ y.
Kʊ Woso ɩ bur gʊɛrɛ dam ma ncɩnaaʊ her, booti m kʊ sɛ n a bɩ, a bɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ mim ma gʊta an lɛ da ra, sɩrakarɛ poore zannɔ ra?
B'awɔɔ, a b'a mɩŋŋa da kɔrɛ ma a a ka hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a bɩm, kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a mim bɩ kɩ ma y.
Naa haay naa, durnya gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yaa dam nɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ma. B'awɔɔ Zɩ Woso a dɔ a ʊ, a zibəə ta awɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, k'a ka Woso cirbəə bɩ ma. A n nɩ bɔ ɩ gɔɔta bɩ darɛ awɔɔ m la.»
«Awɔɔ k'a bɔ kʊ ʊ kan hɔbɩsɩ cir poore kɩ bɩ, a da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. Bala, a awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ nɔ yɩ, k'a a cirbəə bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.»

«K'a hɔ k'an ta awɔɔ ʊ bɩ hɛɛ, a ka cicirzannɔ ʊ. K'a a ka busoohɛra k'a bɩr zarm bɩ ma, kan arzaka k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ arzana ʊ bɩ kɩ. B'ʊ bɩ, ŋ nyaanlɛ ba ʊ y. Konno b'a dam ma ŋn'a sa, bɛɛ b'a dam ma an a bɩ y.
Bala, bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ arzaka bɩ n ta ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ heer bɩ, b'an ta ʊ sɔ.»
«K'a hɔsoaʊ sa, a so a ʊ, k'a sɛ da a fɩtɩrɛ ʊ.
K'a a ba amba zibəənyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɔm a harzaa k'a ta harcɩntarɛ cibsa ma rɔ wɔɔ m. Kʊ harzaa b'a bɔ an nɩ zɛrɛ, k'a bɩ lee ku an cɛlɛ zɛ, k'a gʊ m.

Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m zibəənyɩnɔ nɔɔn duro m, kʊ ŋ harzaa bɩ bʊr, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ n hinceem ba y. Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a y'a hɔsoaʊ sarɛ, an a so a ʊ an ŋ nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, an hɔbɩrɛ sa a zim an b'a ka ŋ ʊ.
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, k'a bɔ an bʊr dibsir ma gɛɛ dɔmɩrɛ m, a n a ya, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ n hinceem ba y.
K'a mim naa do jɩ ma mɩŋŋa. Kʊ harzaa bɩ, kʊ koor zɛrɛ dɔmɩm a dɔ, a b'a tom an gasʊ a cɛ ʊ y.
Awɔɔ sɔ, k'a a banka mɩŋŋa. Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'awɔɔ bɩr a hɔɔn dam ma b'ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a lar, a ʊ: «Zuuba, wɔɔ minto ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do dam gɛɛ, gʊaa haay minto nɩ?»
Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Nka m zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa, a hɔɔn n ta ʊ? Bɔ harzaa lɛ ka ʊ k'an dɩga a har bɩ mim ma, k'an hɔbɩrɛ ka a muno wɔɔ ʊ dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a a ga m b'ʊ bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m zibəənyɩ bɩ do m, kʊ harzaa a wusigə, an bʊr a har ʊ, an bɩ dɩga a a y'a zibəə lɛ ra.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, harzaa bɩ y'a dɔm a arzaka bɩ haay ma.
Bɩ kʊ zibəənyɩ bɩ do a hɩ a heer ʊ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ harzaa bɩ bɩr zɛm zɔɔ y, an wuti an n'a zibəənyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ zɛrɛ, kan zibəənyɩlʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ hɔ bɩrɛ an nɩ hɔ mire a mɩm nɩ durgəre.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ do harzaa bɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr hin niŋŋə k'a n a hɔɔn da ma b'ʊ, kan wakatɩ k'a n a dɔ a ʊ a zɛm bɩ kɩ ʊ. A lam la, an fɩr ka ma mɩŋŋa, an a da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr zum Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla.
Zibəənyɩ k'a hɔ k'a harzaa lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ bɩ, b'a bɩr a mɩŋŋa bankam, b'a bɩr bɩ hɔɔnhɔ barɛ, a zɛrɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa.

Bɩ bɔ ɩ nɩ hɔ k'a harzaa lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ an bɔkarɛ an nɩ zi k'a a ga zɛrɛ m bam bɩ, a bɩ zɛrɛ yɩm gʊta y. Bɩ bɔ n y'a ka ʊ gʊta bɩ, n y'a laaka dam han gʊta. Bɔ n y'a ka ʊ gʊta k'an dɔ ma bɩ, n y'a sim han gʊta sɔ.»
«Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ sɛ m tara burə ʊ. A ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm paan… k'an yɔ.
Fɩryɩrɛ n ta ʊ an nɩ mɔɔ yɩm. A gore ta ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ, b'a mɔɔ ku an nya.
A hɔɔn awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʊ laafɩɩ mɔɔ bʊr m tara burə ʊ ra? Ayy…, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ gʊngʊ kʊ ma m.
Bala, naa ma kɛɛrɛ naa, kʊ gʊaa soor ɩ har deem ʊ, ŋ y'a gʊngʊm kʊ ma, gʊaa kaakʊ y'a gʊm gʊaa hɩɩya ma, gʊaa hɩɩya n a gʊ gʊaa kaakʊ ma.
Zɩ y'a gʊrɛ a nyɩ ma, nyɩ n a gʊ a zɩ ma. Da y'a gʊrɛ a nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ ma, nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ n a gʊ a da ma. Da y'a gʊrɛ a nyar ma, nyar y'a gʊrɛ a da ma.»
A n a ya, an a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ warkʊ yɩ an jɩm meer ʊ, b'awɔɔ hɩ lɛɛm a ʊ: la n nɩ zɛm, b'a kʊ yɩm maam.
K'awɔɔ hɩnhɛr yɩ an a to jɩsadɔpaasɩ an nɩ hɔnrɛ, b'awɔɔ ʊ lɛɛ ma m, b'a kʊ yɩm maam.
Zambʊzannɔ ra, awɔɔ ba lɔ a brama kan tara kɩ minno dɔ, a bɔkarɛ a n dɔmɩm k'an ta ʊ dɩɩtaa naa mim dɔ?»
«Bɔ m sɔ b'awɔɔ bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ dʊdɔ karɛ a zim nɩ y?
K'ɩbɩɩ jɩm ɩ tarɛ ɩ m dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ tɔ ʊ a kʊ ma zaa ra, k'a bɩ ta ɩ m dʊdɔkər taa y, kʊ dʊdɔkər bɩ b'ɩbɩɩ ka lɔnnɔdɔmazannɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: N b'ɩbɩɩ bɔm lɔnnɔcɛ b'ʊ k'ɩbɩɩ n zɩm bɩ ka haay ɩ nya y. Baa tanka deem bɩ gɔɔtarɛ y.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ Galilee gʊɔɔ kʊ Pɩlatɩ a ka ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ ŋ mannɩbarɛ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ mim hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, Galilee zannɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ naa mimbʊnyaabənno gʊtɔɔ m ŋnɩ lɛ da Galilee gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?
Ayy…, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam y, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, gʊaa bueeresinnyə kʊ Silowee cɛjintə a da ŋ la, an ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, mimbʊnyaabənno m an lɛ da Zerizalɛm gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?
Ayy…, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam y, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʊm haay am brɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a sɔɔn n ta ʊ a dɩvɛnsɩra ʊ. A n bʊr k'a b'a bɔ, b'a n bɩ hɔsɩ yɩ y.
A n a hɩ hɔsɩra zibəəzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: A dɔɔraa kaakʊ hɔ m naa, mɔɔ n tɩr bʊr kʊ m b'a bɔ, bɩ mɔɔ n tɩr a nyɩ yɩ y. A da! Bɔ m an tara si an a so ʊ b'a zibəə ba ʊ y?
Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: Karɩnsaamba, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ to dɔɔraa deem, kʊ m yaa hɔn, m a bɩr ma, kʊ m buundi da ma.
A a da ma, an bɩ nyɩ da dɔɔraa m, k'a bʊr a n nyɩ da y, k'ɩ ka kʊ n n'a da.»
Yeezuu nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ dɩndam sokʊmacɛ ʊ *sabaa hinni ʊ.
Lʊ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ zinə n a ka, an a huŋŋu a dɔɔraa bueeresinnyə hɔ m naa. A b'a dam ma an jɩm brama tɩrga y.
Yeezuu k'a a yɩ bɩ, a a bir, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Lʊ, ɩ ɩ waa, ɩ yaaba bɩ nya.»
A n a wɔ ka a mim la. Lɛɛm bɩ, lʊ b'a ba tɩrga, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.

Sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ k'a a yɩ Yeezuu n lʊ bɩ waa sabaa hinni ʊ bɩ, a nɔ ma ʊ. A meerbaa bɩ si, an a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ n ta ʊ, gʊɔɔ n a da ma, ŋnɩ zi ba. Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro awɔɔ a ga m, a bʊr, ŋn'a waa, sabaa hinni ʊ bɛɛ y.»
Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zambʊzannɔ ra! Awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə bɩr a der zarm, gɛɛ, a bra, k'a yaa ka hi ma sabaa hinni ʊ ra?
Bɩ lʊ naa do Abraham yaŋŋa m, zinə n yaaba da ma a dɔɔraa bueeresinnyə hɔ m naa, sabaa hinni bɛɛ a a ga m, n n a bɔ bar ma ra?»
K'a naa hɩ bɩ, nyannɩ a jɩnnɔ wɔɔ haay nyasʊ. Zamaa bɩ n'a heer nyɔɔm kan zibəə gʊtɔɔ haay k'a n'a bam bɩ kɩ.
A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan bɔ kɩ? A makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan bɔ kɩ?
Bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan mutardɩ yaa kʊ gʊaa n'a sam, an n'a duum a brikə ʊ bɩ kɩ. A n haan, an a ba gɔ gʊta, bɛnnɔ nɩ cɛ kɩnkarɛ a vəŋŋəro ma.»
A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan bɔ kɩ?
A makra mɔɔ n'a bam kan nyʊnyɔɔ kʊ lʊ n'a sam, an n'a warm kʊ ma kan koŋŋo kaakʊ nyisi kɩ, an nɩ derm haay.»
Yeezuu bɔ kʊrɔ ʊ kan bɔlɛɛmarɔ kɩ ʊ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam, an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm zeezi.
Gʊaa deem n a lar, a ʊ: «Zuuba, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gʊta nɩ?»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a a tɔ ʊ k'a gasʊ hallɛ poore bɩ m. Bala, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊɔɔ gʊta y'a kam ma k'a gasʊ m, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma y.
Kʊ harzaa bɩ bɩ wuti, an hallɛ bɩ ta, awɔɔ gɔɔtam garga ra, awɔɔ ba n bɩr cɛlɛ zɛrɛ, a bɩr a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Zuuba, cɛlɛ gʊ wɔɔ m. A y'a nyɩ bɔrɛ awɔɔ nʊ, a ʊ: Awɔɔ, mɔɔ n awɔɔ tojɩ dɔ y.
Awɔɔ y'a hɩm nɩ, a ʊ: Wɔɔ hɔ bɩ, ʊ hɔ mi kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Ɩbɩɩ hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m, ʊ daasɩrɔ ʊ.
B'a y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, a ʊ: Mɔɔ n awɔɔ tojɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ, k'a a gaa mɔɔ ma, awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ bam bɩ.
K'awɔɔ bɩ Abraham kan Izakkɩ, Zakɔɔb kɩ yɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ, kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ awɔɔ n nɩ garga ra, a nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma baadarɛ kan sɔ sʊrɛ kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ y'a tom dɔjɩr kan meer kɩ ʊ, jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩ nyɩnta ŋnɩ hɔ bɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, jɛzannɔ nyɩntam lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, lɛɛkarɛzannɔ n nyɩnta jɛzannɔ.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ b'a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ta bɩncɛ vanta ʊ. Hɩrɔɔdɩ y'a kam ma k'a ɩbɩɩ zɛ.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a yaa hɩ pooji naa do m: mɔɔ ɩ lam zinəro ra, m nɩ gʊɔɔ waam, her kan booti kɩ zizer kɩ, an nya.
Bɩ pakra m kʊ m ta lɛɛ her, kan booti kɩ zizer kɩ. Bala wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa b'a dam ma an ga bɩncɛ vanta ʊ kʊ Zerizalɛm nɔ bɛɛ y.»

«Zerizalɛm, Zerizalɛm, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ zɩnzɛm, ɩ nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ bɩmbam jaarɔ m bɩ. Gallɛm karɔ, mɔɔ ŋʊa kʊ m ɩ nyɩnɔ so kʊ ma, amba kʊr tɩr a nyɩnɔ so kʊ ma a za taa bɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ n yɛ?
Dɩga! Woso y'a bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y, an ta an dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ.› »
Yeezuu gasʊ farizɛɛnrɔ jɩtaarɛ deem har ʊ, *sabaa hinni ʊ, k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ nɩ dundom zi.
Gʊaa deem ɩ bɩ jɩm Yeezuu lɛɛ, a mɛ n hɩnhanrɛ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ m kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʊ: «Zaa ta ʊ k'ʊ yaabazaa waa sabaa hinni ʊ gɛɛ, zaa ba ʊ y?»
Ŋ nɩ zɛ pi. Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Yeezuu n yaabazaa bɩ gaa, an a waa, an a da zaa ra.
Bɩ kur bɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʊ naa ʊ, a nyɩ, gɛɛ, a der n a da hiyəə ʊ sabaa hinni ʊ, a bɩ bra sire, an a bɔ ʊ lɛɛm nɩ?»
Bɩ ŋ n a da ma ŋn'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ y.
Yeezuu k'a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ bir hɔbɩrɛ ma rɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ bʊmbɔŋ ʊ bɩ, a hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Kʊ gʊaa ɩbɩɩ bir harcɩntarɛ cibsa ma, ɩ b'aa nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ y. Bala, a a da ma, a gʊaa vanta bir, an lɛ da ɩbɩɩ ra.
Gʊaa k'awɔɔ bir bɩ, a b'a ka, an b'a hɩ awɔɔ gʊaa hɩɩya bɩ m, a ʊ: toore ka ɩ mim b'ʊ y. Ɩbɩɩ zɛm bɩ wuti kan nyannɩ kɩ, ɩ ta jɛ bɩncɛ ʊ.

Bɩ kʊ n y'ɩbɩɩ bir hɔbɩrɛ ma, k'ɩ yaa nyɩnta jɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, gʊaa k'a ɩbɩɩ bir bɩ, k'a bɩ bʊr, a y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, a ʊ: M hannyɩ, ɩ zɔ lɛɛ bɩncɛ b'ʊ. A nyɩntarɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ busure gʊaa haay kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ bɩrɛ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ rɔ kɩ lɛɛ.
Bala, gʊaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa busum bɩ, n y'a zerm, bɔ n'a mɩŋŋa zerm bɩ, n y'a busum.»
A n a hɩ gʊaa k'a a bir bɩ m sɔ, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ sinuu hɔbɩrɛ ba gɛɛ gunuu hɔ, ɩ b'ɩ hannyɩnɔ, gɛɛ, ɩ dogʊɔɔ, gɛɛ ɩ cɩsɔnnɔ arzakazannɔ kɩ bir y. Kʊ n bɛɛ, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ birm sɔ a zɩm ma, ŋn'a so a yaa ʊ.
Bɩ, k'ɩ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ ba, k'ɩ cicirzannɔ, paŋŋawarzannɔ, lʊgɔrɔ, bʊʊrɔ kɩ bir,
b'a nyɩntam mimbirenyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bala, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋ n a ba, ŋ n a so a yaa ʊ y. Bala, Woso naa sompire ɩbɩɩ m, gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ.»
Gʊaa deem k'a nyɩnta b'ʊ an naa haay ma bɩ, a a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ bɩ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa deem ɩ nyɩnta an cibsa gʊta hɔbɩrɛ ba. A n zamaa bir gʊta kʊ ŋ nɩ b'a bɩ.
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, a a zibəənyɩ nyɔɔ gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ bir hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ zi, a ʊ: K'a bʊr kɛɛrɛ, n hɔ haay banka, an nya.
Ŋ haay n a lɛ ba deem, ŋ ʊ: a b'a dam ma y. Lɛɛkarɛ zaa bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ m, a ʊ: hɔsɩra mɔɔ si, pakra m kʊ m ta, m aa dɩga a. Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ sugur ba m ma.
A vanta n a hɩ, a ʊ: Dono mɔɔ n si bu, kʊ m aa nɩ ŋ makra ba ŋ dɩga a. Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han k'ɩ sugur ba m ma.
A vanta n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: lʊ mɔɔ sa daa, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m bʊr y.

Zibəənyɩ bɩ k'a a wusigə bɩ, a yaa naa hɩ a harzaa bɩ m. Harzaa bɩ nɔ n ma ʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ta zɔɔ-zɔɔ kʊ bɩ daasɩrɔ ʊ, kan kʊ bɩ zaa bire rɔ kɩ, ɩ cicirzannɔ gaa kan paŋŋawarzannɔ kɩ, lʊgɔrɔ kɩ, bʊʊrɔ kɩ ɩ bʊr ŋ nɩ naa ʊ.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n ta an a bɔ an bʊr an b'a hɩ, a ʊ: harzaa, ʊ lɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ ba, bɩ lɛ gɔɔta.
Harzaa bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩ bɩ m, a ʊ: ta zaa poorero wɔɔ ra kan brikəro kɩ, ɩ ɩ ka gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma ɩ gasʊ ŋ nɩ, kʊ lɛ bɩ gɔɔta mɔɔ har b'ʊ y.
Bala, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ n bir lɔ wɔɔ, gʊaa deem taan… ba ʊ an nɩ mɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ darɛ a lɛ ʊ y.»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ cir gʊta zu Yeezuu ʊ. A n a bɔ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Kʊ gʊaa bʊr mɔɔ zi, a n mɔɔ ŋʊa an lɛ da a zɩ ra, kan a da kɩ, a lʊ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a cɛmbɔɔ kɩ, a danlʊrɔ kɩ, baa kan a mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa kɩ, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.
Gʊaa k'a bɩr a gɔdarkʊra busure an nɩ zum mɔɔ jɛ ʊ, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.
Kʊ sɩra nɩ, gʊaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʊ a lɛ n taa k'a cɛ gʊta dɔ, a n lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta, an busoo k'a n'a bɩm bɩ lɛ zɛ, an a dɔ, k'a cɛ bɩ dɔm gɛ ra?
Kʊ bɩ bɛɛ, k'a lɛɛ ka an a jɩr cɩnta b'a b'a dam ma an a nyambʊr y, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ n'a yɩm bɩ, ŋ yaa wʊm ma,
ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: Ba gʊaa cɛ dɔrɛ sɩŋŋɩda sa na, b'a n a nyambʊr na.
Gɛɛ cir bɔ n ta ʊ, k'a ɩ tam k'a yaa yar ba kan cir vanta kɩ, a n lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta an dɩga, k'a y'a dam ma kan gʊaa tisi bu kɩ, a yar ba kan gʊaa k'a nɩ gʊaa m tisi buhɩra bɩ kɩ gɛ?
Kʊ bɩ bɛɛ, cir deem bɩ k'a gɔɔta an laatʊ bɩ, a gʊaa deem nyɔɔ n zi, an aa laafɩɩ mim dɩnda kan kɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ sɔ bɩ, awɔɔ bire ʊ kʊ gʊaa lɛ baa k'a wɔ saa hɔ k'an ta m bɩ ma, a b'a dam ma an nyɩnta mɔɔ karɩndanyɩ y.»
«Sɩra m, yɛ k'an naa, hɔ mɩŋŋa m. Bɩ kʊ yɛ nyɩntabaa bɩ bɔ, bɔ n'a yarɛ an bʊr a nyɩntabaa bɩ nɩ?
A bɩ mɩŋŋa tara minto, b'a bɩ yɩm buundi sɔ y. A lo n nawʊm garga ra. Gʊaa k'a nɩ tʊr m k'an a ma.»
Yawʊrsinno kan mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ haay a zɔ Yeezuu ma, k'a a tʊr ka ma.
Farizɛɛnrɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ nɩ kukur barɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do ɩ mimbʊnyaabənno sim, an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ.»
Bɩ Yeezuu hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Gʊaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʊ, a seero n ta ʊ zɔrɔ, deem n nyaam, a bɩ bunɛɛhʊ a yaa n nɛɛhʊ rɔ wɔɔ tom a hɔbɩjɩ ʊ, an ta an aa a ka deem bɩ ma, an tolle ba an a yɩ?
Bɩ, k'a a yɩ, a busu an nawʊm kan heernyɩnta kɩ a kɔɔn ra.
K'a lee ku har ʊ, an a hannyɩnɔ so kʊ ma kan a cɩsɔnnɔ kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: k'a heer nyɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bala mɔɔ m ser k'a nyaam bɩ yɩ.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, heernyɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʊ gʊta arzana ʊ, mimbʊnyaabər deem k'a a bɔ a taam bɩ tɔ ma, an lɛ da gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bunɛɛhʊ a yaa nɛɛhʊ rɔ wɔɔ kʊ heerlʊrlɛ zibəə ba ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.»
«Gɛɛ lʊ bɩ kara n ta ʊ, a wanzurfu m bu, deem n nyaam, a bɩ sɛ dam fɩtɩrɛ ʊ, an cɛ bɩ waa, an a ka ma mɩŋŋa an tolle ba an a yɩ?
Bɩ k'a a yɩ, a y'a hannyɩnɔ som kʊ ma, kan a cɩsɔnnɔ kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: K'a heernyɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bala mɔɔ m wanzurfu k'a nyaam bɩ yɩ.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, heernyɔɔ ta ʊ Woso malɛɛkarɔ zi mimbʊnyaabər deem k'a n'a bɔrɛ a taam tɔ ma.»
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a nyɩnɔ hɩɩya.
A poore bɩ n a hɩ a zɩ m, a ʊ: M zɩ, arzaka k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ, a jir, k'ɩ m hɔ ka m ʊ. Ŋ zɩ bɩ n arzaka k'an ta m bɩ jir ŋ nɩ.
A dɔmɩm k'a yɩ poore bɩ, nyɩ poore b'a hɔ bɩ gʊr an a hɛɛ, an ta zaa ra, kʊ laatʊrɛ ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, a yaa a arzaka bɩ zar zibəəro bʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ.
K'a a zar an a nya bɩ, nɔ gʊta a da kʊ b'ʊ, cicir n a nyasʊ.
A n ta, an nɩ zi bam kan tara bɩ gʊaa deem kɩ, bɩ n a nyɔɔ kurkuuro dɔ ma ʊ a hɔsɩra ʊ.
A mɩŋŋa a ŋʊa k'a hɔbɩrɛ kʊ kurkuuro wɔɔ n'a bɩm bɩ bɩ, k'an a ka. Bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a kaŋ ʊ y.
A n bɩ, an nyɩnta an a hɔɔn da, a ʊ: Mɔɔ zɩ zibəəzannɔ gʊta, ŋn'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ a mɩsɩ nɩ gɔɔtam, mɔɔ n bʊr kɛɛrɛ, m nɩ gam nɔ ma naa ʊ.
Mɔɔ tarɛ m zɩ zi, m aa a hɩ m, mɔɔ m zar Woso kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ma.
Mɔɔ n m ga m, ɩbɩɩ n ɩ ya, ɩ mɔɔ bir ɩ nyɩ y. Mɔɔ ba am ɩ zibəəzannɔ gʊaa deem hɔ bɩ m.
A n a bɔ an nɩ doore a zɩ bɩ zi. K'a gɔɔta an laatʊ bɩ, a zɩ bɩ n a to an a yɩ, a cicir n a nyasʊ. A n bra si, an aa a wɔ burgu ma, an a lɛ dɔrɛ.
A nyɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: M zɩ, mɔɔ mim zar Woso kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ma, mɔɔ n m ga m, k'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ mɔɔ bir ɩ nyɩ y.
B'a zɩ b'a hɩ a zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: K'a ba zɔɔ, a bʊr huu k'a gʊɛrɛ lɛ da bɩ m, a b'a du ma. K'a bʊr tolleŋŋa m a da a nyʊkʊm ma, k'a kʊsɔrɔ da a gam ʊ.
K'a bʊr dinnyɛɛm ka mɛ ka bɩ m, a zɛ k'ʊ a bɩ, k'ʊ ʊ heer nyɔɔ,
bala, mɔɔ nyɩ k'a nyɩnta an ga bɩ, a a mɩm bɔ ʊ, a nyɩnta an nyaam, ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ a yɩ. Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ cibsa barɛ.
A nyɩ jɩtaarɛ bɩ nyɩnta pooyaa ʊ. K'a a bɔ, an nɩ zɛm an a zɔ har ma bɩ, a bɩ kɔnnɩrɔ kan bintiiro kɩ nyi ma, kan sarbaa kɩ.
A n zibəənyɩ deem bir an laaka da a jɩ ma.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: Ɩbɩɩ dam bɩ y'a bɔ an bʊr, ɩbɩɩ zɩ bɩ n dinnyɛɛm k'ʊ wɔɔ tʊr bɩ zɛ, k'a a nyɩ bɩ yɩ kan laafɩɩ kɩ bɩ minto.
Nyɩ jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɔ n ma ʊ, a ʊ: A bɩ gasʊm har ʊ y. A zɩ bɩ n bɔ k'a yaa bir k'an bɩ gasʊ.
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: Dɩga a, a dɔɔraa gʊta mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ zi bam, mɔɔ n kaanm ɩbɩɩ lɛ m deem nɩ y. B'ɩbɩɩ n binnyɛɛm ka mɔɔ ʊ cɩna m a zɛ, m cibsa ba m kan m hannyɩnɔ kɩ y.
B'ɩbɩɩ nyɩ k'a ɩbɩɩ arzaka gʊr, an aa a zar kan lannɔmɩŋŋaheenno kɩ an a bɔ an bʊr naa, ɩbɩɩ dinnyɛɛm k'a mɛ ka bɩ zɛ a minto.
A zɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: M nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay, hɔ haay k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ so ʊ.
Bala, a a ga m k'ʊ cibsa ba, k'ʊ ʊ heer nyɔɔ. Ɩbɩɩ dam bɩ k'a nyɩnta an ga, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ minto. Nyaam a ʊ, ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ a yɩ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a zibəənyɩ n ta ʊ, an nɩ dɩgarɛ a hɔnyɩ mim ma. Gʊɔɔ n b'a hɩ arzakazaa bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: Awɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ y'awɔɔ arzaka bɩ zarm.
A n a bir, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: bɔ minto m n n'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndam mɔɔ m, ncɩnaaʊ? Ɩ hɔcɩntarɛ ciro ka m ʊ, bala ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ, ɩ mɔɔ zi bɩ ba y.
Zibəənyɩ bɩ n'a mɩŋŋa larm, a ʊ: Kʊ m a ba lɔ? Kʊ mɔɔ zuuba mɔɔ bɔ zibəə b'ʊ bɩ? Mɔɔ paŋŋa ba ʊ kʊ m dam wʊ ra? Hɔyɩnyɛrɛ nyannɩ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ mɔɔ dɔ, kʊ m bɩ bɔ zibəə b'ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n m si a har ʊ.
A n gʊɔɔ kʊ zuuba bɩ zɩnnɔ ta ŋ lɛ rɔ wɔɔ bir deem-deem, an lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ lar, a ʊ: Ɩbɩɩ ta mɔɔ zuuba bɩ zɩm m karɔ?
Bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: Nyɔɔ gər zɔrɔ. A n'a hɩ bɩ m, a ʊ: Ba ɩ sɩraci m na, a si, ɩ nyɩnta zɔɔ-zɔɔ ɩ gʊrsɩra ba busoor.
A n a ya, an a vanta lar, a ʊ: B'ɩbɩɩ, ɩ ta m karɔ? A ʊ: Hɔyaa yɔrgɔ zɔrɔ. Zibəənyɩ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: Ba ɩbɩɩ sɩraci n na, a gʊrsɩra ba businnyə.
Zuuba bɩ n a lɛ bɔ zibəənyɩ b'ʊ, zi k'a ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ tɔ ma. Her naa ʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn ka kan kʊ kɩ, an lɛ da lɛɛgurezannɔ wɔɔ ra.»
«Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a durnya arzaka bɩ sa a gʊaasɩbabaa da m gʊɔɔ ma. Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a bʊr a b'awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, Woso y'awɔɔ sire a har ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a sɩra ba kan hɔ poore kɩ, a sɩra barɛ a gʊta m sɔ. Bɩ gʊaa k'a n sɩra ba hɔ poore m, a bɩ sɩra bam hɔ gʊta m sɔ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ba kan durnya naa arzakarɔ kɩ y, nka nɩ hɔnyɩ paan… bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ?
Bɩ k'awɔɔ n sɩra ba gʊaa hɔ m, nka n n'awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ?
Zibəənyɩ ba ʊ a n n'a dam ma, an zuubɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ zi ba y. A deem ŋʊarɛ, an sɔ deem m. Gɛɛ an bɩr kan deem kɩ, an kaanm deem m. Awɔɔ b'a dam ma a Woso ŋʊa, a busoo ŋʊa sɔ y.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ busoo ŋuənno wɔɔ y'a tʊr kam naa haay ma, ŋn'ɩ yaa wʊrɛ a meerbaa bɩ ma.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A ka awɔɔ nawʊm ma k'a bɩr tɩrga gʊɔɔ mɩm ʊ. Bɩ Woso awɔɔ heer dɔ, bala, hɔ niŋŋə kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ bɩ, hɔ vəm m bɩ Woso mɩm ʊ.
Lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ ta an Zaan dɔmɩm ku. N y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ, n nɩ Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta pa dam, gʊaa haay n'a tɔŋ ʊ k'a gasʊ ʊ kan paŋŋa kɩ.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenle naanaa an lɛ da lɛ minnyɩ deem taan… k'a nɩ gɔɔtam bɩ ra.
Bɩ y'a ka, gʊaa biyəə k'a nɩ larɛ a lʊ ra, an n'a vanta sam bɩ, jaandər m. Bɩ gʊaa k'a lʊ k'a zim la ra bɩ sa, jaandər m sɔ.»
«Arzakazaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, an nɩ huu wɩsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ ŋ kʊsɩ dure a ma, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ mɩŋŋa bɩrɛ dɔmɩm haay, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta bam.
Cicirzaa deem k'a tɔ m Lazaar bɩ nɩ wʊtam arzakazaa bɩ cɛlɛ ma, a mɛ haay bɩ, nyinno m.
A ɩ hɔbɩrɛ kuuro kʊ ŋ n'a lom arzakazaa bɩ hɔbɩrɛ gɔ bɩ ra bɩ ŋʊam k'a bɩ, b'a bɩr a yɩrɛ y. Kan naa kɩ haay, jino bʊr ŋn'a nyinno mɩmmɛɛsʊm.
Cicirzaa bɩ n bɩ ga. Malɛɛkarɔ n a busu ŋnɩ ta m Abraham jɩr ʊ. Arzakazaa bɩ m bɩ ga sɔ, n n a bir.
Gəəno bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, arzakazaa b'ɩ fɩr yɩm gʊta. A n a mɩm busu brama an a to an Abraham yɩ laatʊ, Lazaar n'a jɩr ʊ.
A n zee da, a ʊ: M zɩ Abraham, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, k'ɩ Lazaar nyɔɔ k'an a nyʊkʊm nyɔɔ hi ma k'an b'a tɔkʊ m nɛɛm la, k'an bɩsa, bala, mɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm gʊta sɛ naa do nɔ ʊ.
Abraham n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: M nyɩnnɩ, a tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta mɩŋŋa ɩ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, Lazaar n a bʊnyaa yɩ. Naa ma bɩ, a heernyɔɔ yɩ naa ʊ, ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, yaa gʊta y'awɔɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ bire ʊ kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tom wɔɔ zeezi naa ʊ k'a ta awɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ cem y, awɔɔ zeezi sɔ, kʊ ŋ b'a da ma ŋnɩ bʊr naa ʊ y.
Arzakazaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: M zɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ Lazaar nyɔɔ mɔɔ zɩ har ʊ,
bala, mɔɔ danzannɔ ta ʊ soor, k'an aa a hɩ ŋ nɩ, kʊ brɔɔ bɩ bʊr fɩr yɩrɛ bɩncɛ naa do ʊ sɔ y.
Abraham n a hɩ m, a ʊ: Ŋ yɩ Moyiisi ciro m kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ hɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a tʊr ka ŋ lemim ma.
Arzakazaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: Ayy…, m zɩ Abraham, kʊ gʊaa a to gəəno zi naa ʊ an ta b'ʊ, ŋ y'a bɔrɛ a taam.
Abraham n a hɩ, a ʊ: Kʊ ŋ n a tʊr ka Moyiisi ma kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, baa kʊ gʊaa a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, ŋ b'a sire y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Mim k'a a da ma an gʊaa do bɩ b'a dam ma, a n nyɩnta ʊ y. Bɩ, a pakra bam gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ m.
Kʊ n bar da jɛnlajaa ma, n n'a da a wer, n n'a da higʊta ʊ jɩra, nyɩnɔ poorero nɔɔn duro deem k'a n'a dam mim ʊ bɩ m.
K'a dundo a zi mɩŋŋa! K'ɩ danyɩ a zar ɩ ma, k'ɩ dʊndɔ, k'a a bɔ a taam, k'ɩ sugur ka ʊ.
Bɩ k'a zar ɩbɩɩ ma gallɛm saanhɩna hindeem ʊ, an tɩr a bɔ an bʊr ɩbɩɩ zi an b'a hɩ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ m bɔ m taam, sugur ka m ʊ, k'ɩ sugur ka ʊ.»
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Zuuba m, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ da ra.»
Zuuba n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ, kʊ mutardɩ yaa a ku, awɔɔ y'a hɩm gɔ naa do m, a ʊ: Ɩ bɔɔta, ɩ yaa ɩ sɔɔn higʊta ʊ, b'a y'awɔɔ lɛ sim.»
«Gʊaa bɩ kara n'awɔɔ bire ʊ naa ʊ, a zibəənyɩ n ta ʊ, an nɩ dam wʊm, gɛɛ, an nɩ dɔm hɔbɩsɩ ma. K'a a to poo ʊ, an bʊr, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: A ba zɔɔ ɩ bʊr, ɩ nyɩnta ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ?
A hɩ bɛɛ an nawʊrɛ, a ʊ: Hɔbɩrɛ ba gum naa ʊ, k'ɩ huuro da ɩ ra, ɩ sa ɩ ba ka m ʊ kʊ m a bɩ, kʊ m a mi, k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ bɩ, ɩ mi ra?
A yaa dam zibəənyɩ bɩ m barka ra? K'a a lɛ si an a zi bɩ ba bɩ minto ra? Mɔɔ n a si a yaa dam nɩ barka y.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ hɔ haay kʊ Woso lɛ ka awɔɔ ʊ k'a ba bɩ ba, k'a hɩ, a ʊ: Zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bala, wɔɔ ʊ zibəə k'a a ga m bɩ ba.»
Kʊ Yeezuu zaa sa an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm zeezi bɩ, bɔ a ʊ Galilee kan Samarii kɩ bire ʊ.
K'a nɩ gasʊm tara deem ʊ bɩ, kusiməro bu b'a zɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ jɩm laatʊ,
ŋn'a leer busu, ŋ ʊ: «Yeezuu, karɩnsaamba! Wɔɔ cicir zɛ!»
Yeezuu k'a ŋ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a yaa a hɩnka wosocɛmannɩbənno m.» Kʊ ŋ y'a hʊr ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa a waa zaa ra, dintim n gʊ ŋ ma.
Ŋ gʊaa deem k'a yɩ a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ, a a wusigə an bʊr, an a leer busu, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
A n sʊnta Yeezuu taa, an a meer zuutə tara ʊ, an nɩ barka dam nɩ. Gʊaa bɩ, Samarii gʊaa m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa bu haay bɛɛ y'a waa dintim n gʊ ŋ ma ra? Bɩ nɛɛhʊ rɔ wɔɔ be?
Gɔsɩ n a bɔ ŋ bire ʊ k'a b'a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ, kʊ saana naa do bɛɛ y.»
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti ɩ ta, ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʊmbɔ.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n Yeezuu lar, ŋ ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛ an nawʊm brɔ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Woso cirbəə bɩ bɩr zɛrɛ, an nɩ yɩrɛ y.
N b'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: Woso cirbəə bɩ ba n nɩ, gɛɛ, a ɩ naa ʊ y!» A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ kɛɛrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a dɩga a, Woso cirbəə bɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʊ.»
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʊ: «Dɔmɩnnɔ ta ʊ ŋn'ɩ zɛm, awɔɔ n n'a ŋʊam k'a Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩ hindeem ʊ bala, b'awɔɔ ba yɩrɛ y.
N y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: A ba n nɩ, gɛɛ, a ɩ naa ʊ! A bɩ ta y, a b'a si a ta y.
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm bɩ, zɛ an nawʊm amba brama tɩr nyakɩ bɔ dɔjɩr ʊ an ta meer ʊ bɩ m.
Bɩ, a lɛɛkarɛ an fɩr yɩ gʊta, her gʊɔɔ nɔɔn n kaanm m.
Hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba Nowee dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, a zɛm bɩ nyɩnta maam Gʊaanyɩ bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ:
Ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ lʊ sam, ŋn'ɩ zim sam an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ Nowee gasʊ ʊ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ bɩ ku. Bɩ, Woso a ka la gʊta n ba an ŋ bɩ haay.
Gɛɛ, am hɔ k'a nyɩnta an ba Lɔttɩ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ hɔ bɩ m: Ŋ yɩ hɔ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ mim, ŋn'ɩ hɔ sim, ŋn'ɩ hɔ hɛɛnm, ŋn'ɩ hɔ duum, ŋn'ɩ cɛ dɔm.
Bɩ, dɔmɩm kʊ Lɔttɩ bɔ ʊ Sodɔm ʊ bɩ, Woso a ka sɛ n a to brama, an ba am la hɔ bɩ m, an ŋ zɩnzɛ haay.
Gʊaanyɩ bɩ hɩnkarɛ hinni ʊ, a nyɩntam maam sɔ.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ cɛ mim ʊ a mɔdrɔ nɩ cɛ ʊ bɩ, a bɩ zer an gasʊ an ŋ gʊr y. A maam sɔ kan gʊaa k'a ta poo ʊ bɩ kɩ, a b'a bɔ an bʊr har ʊ y.
K'a Lɔttɩ lʊ bɩ mim tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa k'a a meeyaa bʊmbɔ bɩ, a b'a yɩrɛ y. Bɩ gʊaa k'a yɛ zɛ ma mɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a y'a meeyaa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, gum bɩ do ʊ, gʊaa hɩɩya y'a zɛm kʊ ra, ŋnɩ wʊta gargʊ deem la. N deem gaarɛ, n n deem to.
Lannɔ y'a zɛm kʊ ra hɩɩya, ŋn'ɩ bɩr jaa lɔm. N deem gaarɛ, n n deem to.» [
Kʊ gʊaa hɩɩya ɩ hɔsɩra ʊ: N deem gaam, n nɩ deem to.]
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, a nyɩntam ka?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Bɩncɛ kʊ sim n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ bɩ, bɩncɛ bɩ do gɔbɩrgʊrɔ n n'a som kʊ ma ʊ.»
Yeezuu hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a a ga m kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa da dɔmɩm haay, bɩ ŋ bɩ kɔ kan yaadarɛ bɩ kɩ y.
A a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Dʊdɔkər ɩ nyɩnta tara deem nɔ ʊ, a bɩr nyi bam Woso nɩ y, a bɩr gʊɔɔ daŋ ʊ sɔ y.
Zoro nɩ tara bɩ do nɔ ʊ, an nɩ zɛm tee… an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Gumə ka m ʊ mim kʊ mɔɔ jɩm bɩ n ta m kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Dʊdɔkər bɩ n a gu, gallɛm hɔka. Bɩ kur bɩ, a n n'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʊ: Baa kʊ mɔɔ bɩr nyi bam Woso m, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr gʊɔɔ daŋ ʊ sɔ,
lʊ naa do k'a bʊr an nɩ mɔɔ kɔm bɩ, mɔɔ y'a dʊdɔ bɩ karɛ, m gumə ka ʊ, k'a bɩ bʊr mɔɔ zi dɔ dɔmɩm haay, an bɩr mɔɔ kɔrɛ y.»
Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a tʊr ka, hɔ kʊ dʊdɔkər bʊnyaa b'a hɩ bɩ ma mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ, Woso b'a darɛ a gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ nyʊkɔ ʊ ŋn'ɩ zee dam zi sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ han ra? A maasɩrɛ bam, an bɔkarɛ an a da ŋ han ra?
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, a y'a darɛ ŋ han zɔɔ-zɔɔ. Bɩ kʊ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bɩ bʊr, a zɛm bɩ sɩrakarɛ yɩ tara burə ʊ ra?»
Yeezuu hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a mɩ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a muno bɔŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ:
«Gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ gasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ k'a yaa da. Gʊaa deem bɩ farizɛn m, deem bɩ yawʊrsirezaa m.
Farizɛn bɩ n jɩm brama an nɩ yaa darɛ a heer ʊ ncɩnaaʊ: Woso, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m barka kʊ mɔɔ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ konno, mimbʊnyaabənno, jaandənno, gɛɛ yawʊrsir naa do kɩ minto.
Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ kʊsɩm gallɛm hɩɩya dɔmɩm saanhɩna nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ hɔnyɩ haay nɔ ʊ mɔɔ y'a bu hɔ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ.
Yawʊrsir bɩ n jɩm laatʊ, a lɛ baa k'a a mɩm busu brama y, an n'a cɩ zɛrɛ k'a a heerzar hɩnka, a ʊ: Woso, mɔɔ cicir zɛ, bala, mimbʊnyaabər m mɔɔ m.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, a tɩrgabaa yɩ Woso mɩm ʊ, an a bɔ an doo, deem bɩ n a yɩ y. Bala, gʊaa k'a n'a busum bɩ, n y'a zerm tara ʊ, bɩ gʊaa k'a a mɩŋŋa zer bɩ n y'a busum.»
Gʊɔɔ bʊr nyɩnɔ poorero m Yeezuu zi k'an a wɔ ka ŋ mim la. Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ.
Yeezuu n a ka ŋnɩ bʊr nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ to ŋnɩ bʊr mɔɔ zi, a b'a ta ŋ nɩ toore y, bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a so Woso cirbəə b'ʊ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a n Woso cirbəə bɩ si am nyɩ poore hɔ bɩ m bɩ, a bɩ gasʊŋ ʊ y.»
Cir deem Yeezuu lar, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba mɩŋŋa, bɔ mɔɔ n'a barɛ kʊ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ birm mɩŋŋa? Gʊaa mɩŋŋa ba ʊ kʊ Woso y'a deem bɛɛ y.
Ɩbɩɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ ra? Ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɩ ŋʊaar kasɛtɩ ka y, ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʊ.»
Gʊaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ naa haay ba m nyɩbaa ma tee….»
Yeezuu k'a naa ma bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ deem ɩ gɔɔta ɩbɩɩ ma k'ɩ ba: Hɔ k'a n'ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ hɛɛ haay ɩ jinjir ŋʊazannɔ m, k'ɩ bʊr ɩ zu mɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ arzaka yɩm arzana ʊ.»
Kʊ gʊaa bɩ naa ma bɩ, a heer a zar, bala, a arzaka bɩ gʊta.
Yeezuu k'a a heerzarlɛ bɩ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Arzakazannɔ Woso cirbəə gasʊʊrɛ yɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
Sɩra m, yoonde huuka yaa gasʊʊrɛ nyɩntam naanaa, an lɛ da arzakazaa Woso cirbəə gasʊʊrɛ m.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam ma rɔ wɔɔ a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, nka m nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Hɔ kʊ gʊaa b'a dam ma an a ba bɩ, a naanaa Woso ma.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Dɩga, wɔɔ hɔ haay to, ʊ zu ɩbɩɩ ʊ.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a a har to, kan a lʊ kɩ, a danyɩnɔ kɩ, a zɩrɔ kɩ, a nyɩnɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə minto,
a naa haay yɩm gʊta an lɛ da durnya naa do nɔ ʊ, b'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩm durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʊ sɔ.»
Yeezuu bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ bir, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ba wɔɔ nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʊ na, bɩ, hɔ haay kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a gʊrsɩra ba Gʊaanyɩ bɩ minto bɩ kʊ yɩm.
N y'a nyasʊm, n n'a ka kɩfɩɩrɔ ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa wʊ ma, kʊ ŋ n'a sʊnsɔ wʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ lihi dɩnda ma,
kʊ ŋ n'a zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a zɛ gər, b'a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ.»
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n hɔsɩ jɩ ma y. Mim naa do a nyaakʊm da ŋ nɩ, ŋ n hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
K'a ta, an n'a zɔm Zeriko ma bɩ, bʊʊ deem ɩ nyɩnta zaa lezi b'ʊ, an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm.
Zamaa k'a bʊr an nɩ cenim an a ma bɩ, a laaka da kʊ bɔ m gɛ.
N n a hɩ m, n ʊ: «Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu nɩ cenim.»
A n zee da, a ʊ: «*Davɩd Nyɩ, Yeezuu, m cicir zɛ!»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyaa bam kan kɩ ŋ ʊ, an zɛ pi. A n a banka an zee da an lɛ da biisi ra, a ʊ: «Davɩd Nyɩ, mɔɔ cicir zɛ!»
Yeezuu n jɩm, an lɛ ka kʊ ŋ n'a gaa, ŋn'ɩ bʊr m. K'a a zɔ bɩ, Yeezuu a lar, a ʊ:
«Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ kʊ mɔɔ n a ba ɩbɩɩ minto?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, a ka kʊ m mɩm n a ya an lɛɛ yɩ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'ɩ mɩm n a ya an lɛɛ yɩ! Ɩ sɩrakarɛ ɩ bʊmbɔ.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, a mɩm a gʊ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm, an zu Yeezuu jɛ ʊ, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ. Zamaa bɩ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ sɔ.
Yeezuu gasʊ Zeriko ʊ, an nɩ kʊ bɩ zɛm la.
Gʊaa nɩ b'ʊ a tɔ m Zasee, yawʊrsinno cir m, arzakazaa m sɔ.
A n n'a kam Yeezuu ma k'a yɩ, kʊ nka m, k'a a dɔ. Zamaa bɩ minto, kʊ gʊaa kutiim m bɩ, a b'a dam ma, a n a yɩ y.
A n bra si an ta lɛɛ, an aa der gɔ ra, kʊ Yeezuu bʊr an nɩ cenim b'ʊ, k'a yɩ.
Kʊ Yeezuu lee ku bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, a a bɔɔta an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zasee, a ba zɔɔ ɩ zer, bala, mɔɔ cɩnta kʊ m zer ɩbɩɩ har ʊ her.»
Zasee n zer zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an a si kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Kʊ zamaa bɩ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋn'ɩ kukur barɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zer a ʊ mimbʊnyaabər har ʊ.»
Zasee n a zɔ Zuuba ma an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɩga, Zuuba, mɔɔ yɩ m arzaka bɩ haay, zɛkumbir sam, m a ka cicirzannɔ ʊ, bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ mim zu ʊ gʊaa ma, mɔɔ y'a sompim nʊ gallɛm si.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Bʊmbɔrɛ gasʊ har naa do ʊ her, bala, gʊaa naa do Abraham yaŋŋa m sɔ.
Bala, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ bʊr a ʊ, an b'a ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ ma, an ŋ bʊmbɔ.»
Kʊ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'a tʊr kam a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ. Bala, a a zɔ Zerizalɛm ma. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʊ, Woso cirbəə bɩ y'a hɩnkarɛ a m b'ʊ lɛɛm.
Bɩ y'a ka Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Cir nyɩ deem ɩ ta kʊ laatʊ ʊ k'a yaa cirbəə bɩ, k'a bɔ a bʊr.
A n a zibəənyɩnɔ bir bu, an busoo jir ŋ nɩ minnɩ
deem-deem, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: ‹K'a zi ba m, k'an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre dɔmɩm ku.›
B'a gʊrgazannɔ wɔɔ sɔ m, ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ a jɛ ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a a hɩ cirbəə karɛzaa bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: ‹Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'an a so wɔɔ ʊ y.›
K'a yaa cirbəə bɩ bɩ an bʊr bɩ, a a ka ŋnɩ zibəənyɩnɔ k'a busoo jinjir ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ bir a taa, k'a dɩga a kʊ bɔ zi ŋ y'a ba m gɛ.
Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n bʊr, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, minnɩ deem k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, minnɩ bu y'a da ra.›
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa n'ɩbɩɩ m, bala, ɩbɩɩ noonhubaa hɩnka hɔ poorero nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ cirbəə karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ so tara bu ʊ.›
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n b'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ nyɩ da minnɩ soor.
A n a hɩ bɩ m sɔ, a ʊ: Ɩ so tara soor ʊ.›
A vanta n bʊr, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, ba ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ n na, pɛɛra mɔɔ burgu ma, m a nyaakʊm da.›
Mɔɔ ɩ nyi barɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ heer kʊsɩrabaa bɩ minto. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n a cɩnta bɩ ɩbɩɩ n n'a sam. Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n a duu bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n n'a dam.
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa meerbaa bɩ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ dʊdɔ yarm ma, zibəənyɩ bʊnyaa. ‹Ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʊ: gʊaa kʊsɩ m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ nɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n a cɩnta bɩ sam, m nɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n a duu bɩ dam.
Bɔ minto, ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ busoo bɩ cɩnta busoo cɛ ʊ y? Kʊ mɔɔ m bɔ, m bʊr kʊ m bɩ nyɔɔdʊ yɩ?›
A n a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹K'a busoo bɩ yɔ m, a ka gʊaa k'an ta m bu b'ʊ.›
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: ‹Zuuba, a lɛɛ ka an a yɩ bu.›
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa biyəə k'an ta hɔ m bɩ, n y'a kaŋ ʊ, gʊaa k'a ba m bɩ, baa k'a ta m poore bɩ, n y'a yɔm nɩ.
Mɔɔ jɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ ŋʊa kan cirbəə kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a bʊr ŋ nɩ mɔɔ taa naa ʊ, a ŋ zɩnzɛ.»
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, a ka ŋ lɛɛ an nɩ tam Zerizalɛm ʊ.
K'a ta an n'a zɔm Bɛtfazee ma kan Betanii kɩ, Oliviyee ci bɩ zeezi bɩ, a a karɩndanyɩnɔ nyɔɔ hɩɩya.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta kʊ k'a nɩ lɛɛ naa ʊ. K'awɔɔ ta an nɩ gasʊm, awɔɔ brapoo yɩm n n'a kʊsɩ, bɩ gɔsɩ n da ʊ cɩna y. K'a hʊr a bʊr m.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa awɔɔ lar, a ʊ: Bɔ m awɔɔ n'a hʊrlɛ? K'a hɩ m, a ʊ: Zuuba lɛ n taa.»
Gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ ŋ ta bɩ, ŋ yaa hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ m.
Kʊ ŋn'ɩ brapoo bɩ hʊrm bɩ, a zannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n'a hʊrlɛ?»
Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba lɛ n taa.»
Ŋ n brapoo bɩ gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Yeezuu zi, ŋn'a huuro ka ra, ŋn'a ka Yeezuu n da ʊ.
K'a nɩ tam bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n'a huuro kam zaa bɩ ra.
K'a a zɔ Oliviyee ci bɩ zerjɩ bɩ ma bɩ, heernyɔɔ gasʊ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, zamaa bɩ haay, ŋn'a leer busu, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ hoserlo haay kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ minto.
Ŋ ʊ:
«Cir k'a nɩ zɛm Zuuba Woso tɔ ma bɩ n barka yɩ.
Kʊ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta arzana ʊ,
kʊ lɛbɔʊrɛ n nyɩnta brama.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ Yeezuu m zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, a ka k'ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zɛ pi.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m: Kʊ ŋ zɛ pi, jaarɔ n nɩ zee dam.»
K'a a zɔ Zerizalɛm kʊnɔ bɩ ma, an a to an a yɩ bɩ, a nyi ka a minto.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ sɔ, k'a dɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ her, kʊ nka n nɩ laafɩɩ karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ! Bɩ naa ma bɩ, a a nyaakʊm da ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma, ɩ yɩ y.
Sɩra m, dɔmɩnnɔ ɩ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ minto, ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ tee kɩnkarɛ ɩbɩɩ pəŋŋə bɩ ma, ŋ bɩrlɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, k'a ɩbɩɩ da, ŋn'a so bɩncɛ haay ʊ.
Ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ wurgəm haay, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ zamaa kɩ. Ŋ bɩ jaa deem taan… tore, an bɩr a mim burə ʊ y, bala, ɩbɩɩ n dɔmɩm kʊ Woso bʊr k'a b'a da ɩ han bɩ dɔ y.»
Yeezuu gasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ, an nɩ lam hɔheenno wɔɔ ra.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «N y'a gʊrsɩra ba, ŋ ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ cɛ bɩ nyɩntam yaadarɛ cɛ.› B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ sa a ba konno bɩncɛ.»
Yeezuu ɩ hɔ dɩndam dɔmɩm haay Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, tara cinno kɩ y'a karɛ a zɛrɛ zaa ma.
Bɩ hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a cɩnta k'a ba bɩ, ŋn'a zaa yɩ y, bala, zamaa bɩ haay y'a tʊr karɛ a meerbaa ma kan bʊraama gʊta kɩ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ hindeem ʊ, Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam zamaa bɩ m Wosocɛ ʊ, an nɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa dam bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ, kan *gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ bʊr zi.
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Lɛ kara ɩbɩɩ n ta m ɩ nɩ naa bam nɩ, gɛɛ, bɔ a ʊ, nka lɛ ʊ, k'ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ, mɔɔ laaka darɛ awɔɔ han, k'a hɩ mɔɔ m:
Zaan batɛm bɩ, a to a ʊ brama gɛɛ gʊɔɔ zi?»
Ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ: A to a ʊ brama, a y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Bɔ minto m awɔɔ n a mim si gɛ?
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ: A to a ʊ gʊɔɔ zi, zamaa bɩ haay wɔɔ gʊngʊɛɛnm jaarɔ m, bala, ŋ sɩra ka, ŋ ʊ Zaan bɩ nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa.»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a to a ʊ ka y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ b'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ nka ɩ lɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ naa barɛ y.»
A n nɩ hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do dam zamaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ dɩvɛnsɩra da ʊ, an a ka a zibənno ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a zi ba, an ta zaa jintə ra.
K'a dɔmɩm a ku bɩ, a a zibəənyɩ deem nyɔɔ dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ zi, k'an aa a hɔ si an b'a ka a ʊ. Bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ a nyasʊ ŋn'a zɛ, ŋn'a ka an doo a wɔ m tu.
A n a ya, an a zibəənyɩ vanta nyɔɔ, ŋn'aa bɩ nyasʊ ŋn'a zɛ sɔ, ŋn'a sʊnsɔ wʊ, ŋn'a ka an doo a wɔ m tu.
A n a ya, an a vanta nyɔɔ a kaakʊ hɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩ zɛ, ŋnɩ yaaba da ma, ŋnɩ la ra.
Dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ n a hɩ a mɩŋŋa m, a ʊ: Kʊ m a ba lɔ? Mɔɔ yɩ m nyɩ ŋʊarɛ bɩ nyɔɔm. Ŋ bɩ daŋ ʊ barɛm.
Kʊ ŋ y'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ n a dɩnda kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: Naa do n nɩ zɛm b'a so ʊ. Ʊ a nyasʊ ʊ a zɛ gər k'ʊ ʊ so arzaka b'ʊ.
Ŋ n a nyasʊ, ŋnɩ bɔ m dɩvɛnsɩra ʊ b'ʊ toore ma, ŋn'a zɛ gər. Bɔ dɩvɛnsɩrazaa bɩ n n'a barɛ ŋ nɩ?
A zɛm bɩ bʊr, an b'a ka ŋnɩ dɩvɛnsɩra zibənno wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, an dɩvɛnsɩra bɩ ka a vantɔɔ ʊ.» Kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ayy…, kʊ naa bɩ ba y!»
Yeezuu n a nya ŋ lɛ an dɩga ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Wosoci bɩ gʊrsɩra naa do jɩ m bɔ nɩ?
Jaa kʊ cɛdonno a bɔ ʊ ŋn'a zo bɩ, bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jaa wɩsɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa a do jaa bɩ do ra, hɩsɩga a zaa nawʊm. Bɩ, kʊ jaa bɩ do a da gʊaa ra, a hɔɔnsɩ an nawʊm.»
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kɩ y'a karɛ a nyasʊrɛ ma b'ʊ lɛɛm, bɩ ŋ yɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m. Ŋ y'a jɩ ma mɩŋŋa, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da a ʊ awɔɔ tɔ ma.
Ŋ nɩ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ dundom Yeezuu zi, ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ zi, ŋnɩ tɩrgabaa ka a ra. K'a ku a nyasʊ a meerbaa nɔ ʊ, a ka tara lɛɛzannɔ ʊ kan kʊzaa bɩ kɩ ʊ.
Ŋ laaka naa do da han: «Karɩnsaamba, wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ meer bam, ɩ nɩ hɔ dɩndam kan sɩra kɩ, ɩ bɩr nyi bam gɔsɩ nɩ y, ɩ nɩ Woso zaa hɔ dɩndam kan a sɩra kɩ.
A a ga m k'ʊ Rɔm cir yawʊr ka gɛɛ, a n a ga nɩ?»
Yeezuu k'a ŋ zambʊ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a ʊ:
«K'a busoo ka m ʊ deem naa ʊ. Nka meer kan a tɔ kɩ nɩ busoo bɩ burə ʊ naa?» Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Rɔm cir hɔ m.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a Rɔm cir tɔ hɔ ka ʊ, k'a hɔ kʊ Woso a so ʊ bɩ ka ʊ sɔ.»
Ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ Yeezuu nyasʊ a meerbaa nɔ ʊ zamaa bɩ lɛɛ y. A nyɩbɔʊrɛ bɩ k'a a ka ŋ n zɛ kədə bɩ, ŋ zɛ pi.
Sadisɛɛnrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ma bɩ, ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ a zɔ Yeezuu ma, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ:
«Karɩnsaamba, Moyiisi a gʊrsɩra ba wɔɔ minto, a ʊ: ‹Kʊ gʊaa ga an a gʊ a lʊ ma b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y, k'a danyɩ n a si an nyɩnɔ yɩ kan kɩ a minto.›
Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta, a nyɩnɔ saanhɩna: Lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ n lʊ sa an ga an a gʊ ma b'a n nyɩ yɩ kan kɩ y.
A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n lʊ bɩ si,
a kaakʊ hɔ bɩ maam sɔ, an ta an nyɩnɔ saanhɩna rɔ wɔɔ ku. Ŋ haay gɩnga bɩ ŋ nɩ nyɩ yɩ kan lʊ bɩ kɩ y.
A nyarɛ ma bɩ, lʊ bɩ ga sɔ.
Bɩ, lʊ naa do, gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, nka hɔ m lʊ bɩ nɩ? Kʊ ŋ haay lʊ bɩ si bɩ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zamaa naa do gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ sam.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ga mɩmbɔʊrɛ m Woso mɩm ʊ, ŋnɩ zɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba durnya k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ lʊ gɛɛ yar sam b'ʊ y.
Ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ ga dɔ y, bala, ŋ bɔm kʊ ʊ kan malɛɛkarɔ kɩ. Woso nyɩnɔ m, kʊ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ minto.
Moyiisi gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ hɩnka mɩŋŋa, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʊ Wosoci nɩ tutugu mim dɩndaŋ ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ Zuuba Woso birm Abraham Woso, Izakkɩ Woso, Zakɔɔb Woso.
Bɩ Woso bɩ, gəəno Woso bɛɛ y, mɩsɩɩrɔ Woso m, bala, hɔ haay mɩsɩr a minto.»
Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ meerbaa bɩ si, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, ɩ meer ba mɩŋŋa.»
Ŋ bɩr yɛm dɔ k'a laaka da han mim sɩ ma y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ: ‹Krista bɩ, *Davɩd Nyɩ› nɩ?
Kʊ Davɩd mɩŋŋa n'a hɩm laarɔ ci nɔ ʊ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m:
nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʊ,
an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bam gankarahɔ,
k'ɩ gam ka ŋ la bɩ ku.
Naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Davɩd y'a birm ‹Zuuba›. A nyɩnnɩ m lʊnlɔ kɛɛrɛ?»
Kʊ zamaa bɩ haay n'a tʊr kam bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ:
«K'a dundo a zi kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩmbɩr zabarɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ gʊɔɔ yaadarɛ ŋʊa daasɩrɔ bire ʊ. Ŋ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ ŋʊa yaadarɛcɛrɔ ʊ, ŋ lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛrɔ ŋʊa sɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Ŋ nɩ zonno hɔ yɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'ɩ yaa jintoo dam, kʊ ŋ n'a yɩ. N yɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yarm, ŋnɩ hʊnhʊrlɛ yɩ gʊta an lɛ da.»
Yeezuu k'a a mɩm busu bɩ, a arzakazannɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ busoo dam ganwʊrɛ mɔr ʊ.
A n zoro yɩ sɔ cicirzaa m, an tamma hɩɩya da ʊ.
A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zoro cicirzaa naa do a da ʊ an lɛ da ŋ nɩ haay.
Bala, nawɔnnɔ haay busoo k'an ta ŋ ʊ gʊta bɩ ŋ y'a bɔ ʊ ŋn'a da ganwʊrɛ mɔr b'ʊ, bɩ zoro bɩ busoo k'a n'a wɔ ʊ b'a ka haay.»
Gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ bɩ mim dɩndam, ŋn'a lɛ bɔrɛ a gʊɛrɛ ʊ, a jaarɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa ʊ, kan ganwʊrɛ kʊ ŋ y'a bankam bɩ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Dɔmɩm ta ʊ an nɩ zɛm, hɔ k'awɔɔ n n'a yɩm naa, jaarɔ wɔɔ bɩ gɔɔtam kʊ burə ʊ y, ŋ haay wurgəm.»
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, naa zɛm brɔ? Bɩ makra kara n nɩ naa dɔmɩm hɩnkarɛ?»
A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka ŋnɩ braba a nɩ y, bala, gʊɔɔ gʊta zɛm b'a hɩ mɔɔ tɔ m, ŋ ʊ: Awɔɔ m Krista, gɛɛ: Dɔmɩm a ku. A bɩ zu ŋ ʊ y.
K'awɔɔ bɩ yar barɛ mim ma, tara gʊɔɔ n wuti kan a cinno kɩ, a da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. Bala, pakra m kʊ bɩ n lɛɛ ka an bʊr, b'a nyarɛ bɛɛ m bɩ lɛɛm y.»
A a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Tararɔ wutim kan kʊ kɩ yar m, tara cinno n wuti kan kʊ kɩ.
Tara hinkəre gʊta zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ, yaaba bʊnyaarɔ kan nɔ kɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ bɩncɛ-bɩncɛ. Hɔɔrɔ bam ŋnɩ nyibəə gʊta da gʊɔɔ ma, kan makrarɔ gʊtɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to brama kɩ.»
«Bɩ, an nɩ lɛɛ kam naa haay lɛɛ bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gʊrm, n nɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma, n y'a karɛ, n n'awɔɔ dʊdɔ ka sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ, n n'awɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, n tarɛ awɔɔ m cinno kan lɛɛzannɔ kɩ taa mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bɩ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ dɔmɩm mɔɔ minto.
Bɩ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a a hɔɔn da minno nɔɔn duro nyɩbɔʊrɛ ma y.
Bala, mɔɔ meerbaa dɔrɛ kan hɔɔn kɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ, b'awɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem b'a dam ma an awɔɔ meerbaa nyɩ bɔ ʊ, gɛɛ, an bɩsɩ ka ma y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ zɩrɔ kan a dɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ danyɩnɔ kɩ, awɔɔ dogʊɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ gʊaasɩbɔɔ kɩ, n n'awɔɔ nyasʊrɛ, bɩ, ŋ y'awɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛm.
Gʊaa haay sɔrɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, awɔɔ minkə deem taan… bɩ nyaanɩm awɔɔ mim ʊ y.
Awɔɔ tʊntɔʊrɛ n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.»
«K'awɔɔ bɩ Zerizalɛm yɩ yarbənno n bɩr ma, k'a dɔ a ʊ, a wurgəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n a si, ŋnɩ ta ciro ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ tara nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n bɔ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gasʊ tara nɔ ʊ y!
Woso heerbusu dɔmɩm m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro m, bɩ hɔ haay kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ bɩ n nɩ kʊ yɩŋ ʊ.
A pakra bam lannɔ jɩsɩzannɔ kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɔ karɛ a nyɩnɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, bala, cicir gʊta y'a dam tara bɩ ra kan heerbusu gʊta kɩ zamaa bɩ minto.
N gʊɔɔ gʊta zɩnzɛm kargʊrɔ m, ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ gʊrm lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ do haay bire ʊ, do vantɔɔ tʊntɔm Zerizalɛm la an ta an do vantɔɔ wɔɔ dɔmɩm bɩ nyarɛ ku.»
«Makrarɔ nyɩntaŋ ʊ woso kan mom kɩ monyaarɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ. Tara burə ʊ, do haay gʊɔɔ nyɩntam kɔrɛ nɔ ʊ, ŋ b'a banjɩ dɔrɛ y, higʊta paŋŋa kan a kurəro tatʊr kɩ tɔ ma.
Gʊɔɔ n'a mom, hoonsi n ta ŋ lɛ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm tara burə ʊ bɩ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ. Bala, n brama paŋŋazannɔ hinkəm.
Bɩ kur bɩ, ŋ Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩrɛ an bɩr zɛm warkʊ nɔ ʊ kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ, cirbəə kɩ.»
«Kʊ minno nɔɔn duro haay bʊr ŋn'ɩ barɛ, k'a a bɔɔta a dɩga brama, awɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ a zɔ.»
A n hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom da ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a dɩga sɔɔn kan gɔrɔ haay kɩ ma.
K'awɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ lɛɛ daa darɛ, awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, siire a zɔ.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ bɩ naa yɩ an nɩ zɛrɛ, k'a dɔ a ʊ: Woso cirbəə b'a zɔ.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zamaana naa do bɩ cenim kʊ nawɔnnɔ haay bɛɛ ba y.
Brama kan tara kɩ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ bɩ cenle y.»
«K'a dundo a zi, a b'a heer gore da ʊ kan bɛɛ mire waasɩ kɩ, hɔ bɩ gʊta kɩ, kan durnya minno hɔɔndarɛrɔ kɩ y, kʊ dɔmɩm naa do bɩ daata zɛ awɔɔ ra y,
amba zaŋŋa hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, a y'a kum gʊaa haay k'a nɩ tara burə ʊ ra.
A b'a zuu ʊ y, k'a yaa da dɔmɩm haay, k'a a da ma, a bɔ lɛm hɔ haay k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ma, k'a jɩm brama, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ lɛɛ.»
Dɔmɩm haay Yeezuu tɩr ta an aa hɔ dɩnda Zerizalɛm Wosocɛ ʊ. Bɩ, yirbəə haay a tɩr bɔ, an ta ci kʊ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ ra, dɔ n tɩr mɩ m b'ʊ.
Bɩ wutigʊta nɩ, zamaa bɩ tɩr ta zi Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'aa a tʊr ka ma.
Bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma *cibsa kʊ n a birm pakkɩ bɩ y'a zɔm.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ y'a kam zaa k'a n'a sam k'a a ku a zɛ bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi bam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ, Sʊtaana gasʊ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem heer ʊ. Zidas m, gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Iskarɩyɔtɩ bɩ m.
A n ta, an aa a dɩnda kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cinno wɔɔ kɩ, hɔ k'a n'a bam k'a Yeezuu nyasʊ a ka ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ ŋ heer nyɔɔ gʊta ŋn'a dɩnda kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: k'a busoo ka ʊ.
Bɩ, Zidas yɛ sɔ, an n'a kam dɔmɩm k'a n'a dam ma, an Yeezuu nyasʊ a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ ma, kʊ zamaa bɩ b'a dɔ y.
Bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma cibsa, n nɩ pakkɩ sinnyɛɛm mannɩ bam ma bɩ dɔmɩm a zɔ.
Yeezuu n Pɩyɛɛr nyɔɔ kan Zaan kɩ an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ta, a yaa pakkɩ cibsa hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka k'ʊ b'a bɩ.»
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ʊ aa hɔbɩrɛ bɩ banka ka?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ n'ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a dɩga a, k'awɔɔ gasʊ tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, awɔɔ gʊaayar deem zɛŋ ʊ, an gər busu kan hi kɩ, k'a zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ, a gasʊ har k'a nɩ gasʊŋ ʊ b'ʊ.
K'a hɩ har bɩ zaa m, a ʊ: Karɩnsaamba y'ɩbɩɩ larm: saanɔɔcɛ ɩ ka, kʊ m bɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kan m karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ?
A cɛ gʊta hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ m mim ʊ, n nɩ mɔrlɔ wɔɔ banka haay, bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ, awɔɔ n nɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bankaŋ ʊ.»
Ŋ n ta, ŋn'a hɔ haay k'a a hɩ bɩ yɩ, ŋnɩ pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba.
Wakatɩ bɩ k'a a ku bɩ, Yeezuu yaa nyɩnta kan a zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ŋʊa gʊta kʊ m pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ naa do bɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, kʊ m bɔkarɛ m fɩr yɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m hɔbɩrɛ naa do bɩ fɩɩga y, k'a mim m tolle ba an kʊ yɩ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ.»
A n hɔmire sa, an yaa da Woso m barka, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a si a a mi kan kʊ kɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: a nya her mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m dɩvɛn mi dʊntɔ y, an ta an Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ku.»
A n bɔkarɛ an bur sa, k'a yaa da Woso m barka an a nya bɩ, a a zɩnzɛ ra an a ka ŋ ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ mɛ m naa, [mɔɔ n a ka awɔɔ minto. K'a naa ba mɔɔ tɔdaanɔʊ minto.»
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kur bɩ, a hɔmihɔ sa an a ba maam sɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔmire naa do gʊaasɩbabaa daa hɔmire m. Mɔɔ ma m, an a lo awɔɔ minto.]»
«K'a tʊr ka, gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʊm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ, a ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ naa ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Sɩra m, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ zɛm bɩ ga, amba Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, kʊsɩ ɩ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nyasʊm k'a mɔɔ ka bɩ kɩ.»
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda sa ŋn'ɩ kʊ larm: «Wɔɔ bireyaa ʊ naa ʊ, nka n nɩ mim naa do barɛ?»
Ŋ wuti bɩsɩkarɛ vanta m kan kʊ kɩ, k'a a dɔ nka m jɩtaarɛ gɛ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Do vantɔɔ cinno ɩ cirbəə bɩm ŋn'a so a tarazannɔ ʊ, bɩ cinno wɔɔ y'a kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ birm: mimmɩŋŋabənno.
B'awɔɔ kan kʊ kɩ, a b'a ba maam y. Bɔ n jɩtaarɛ awɔɔ bireyaa ʊ bɩ, k'an a ba awɔɔ dam poore. Bɔ y'a so awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, k'an a ba awɔɔ zibəənyɩ.
Nka m jɩtaarɛ paan…? Bɔ ɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ m gɛɛ, bɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ sa an n'a kam bɩ nɩ? Mɔɔ ʊ: bɔ ɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm bɩ m. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bireyaa ʊ am zibəənyɩ hɔ bɩ m.»
Awɔɔ, awɔɔ gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay m cicir nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ bankam awɔɔ minto, amba mɔɔ Zɩ a banka mɔɔ minto bɩ m.
K'a a da ma, a b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan mɔɔ kɩ a hɔ bɩ, a hɔ mi mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ nɔ ʊ. K'a a da ma sɔ a nyɩnta cirbəəduuro ra, a Israyɛl do bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yar.
Bɩ, Zuuba a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩmɔɔn, Sɩmɔɔn, Sʊtaana a yɛ k'awɔɔ daŋŋa am hɔyaa hɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ mɔɔ yaa da ɩbɩɩ minto k'ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ b'a da jɩm ʊ y. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ bʊr mɔɔ zi, k'ɩ danyɩnɔ heer ba kookoo.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ yɛ kʊ m ta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ. Baa kʊ zɛ m sɔ, mɔɔ yɛrɛ m ga kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ.»
Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʊ: «Pɩyɛɛr, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam gum naa ʊ, ɩ ʊ: ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y, gallɛm kaakʊ, koo n bɔkarɛ an baa da.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ awɔɔ nyɔɔ, awɔɔ n busoohɛra sa y kan bɔɔn kɩ, kʊsɔrɔ kɩ bɩ, bɔ ɩ kʊrɔ awɔɔ ʊ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Hɔsɩ.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ busoohɛra m bɩ, k'an a sa; Gʊaa k'a nɩ bɔɔn m bɩ, k'an a sa sɔ. Gʊaa k'a ba kargʊ m bɩ, k'an a huu hɛɛ an a si m.
Bala, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: mim niŋŋə kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ mɔɔ minto bɩ kʊ yɩm: ‹N y'a lɛ sa n a da mimbʊnyaabənno barla.› Bɩ sɩra m, hɔ niŋŋə kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba mɔɔ minto bɩ kʊ yɩm.»
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, kargʊrɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ba n na.» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «A bʊrbɔ.»
Yeezuu bɔ an ta Oliviyee ci mim ʊ, amba a tɩr a bam bɩ m. A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ.
K'a lee ku bɩncɛ b'ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a yaa da, a yaa n a do makra nɔ ʊ.»
A n a jɛ bɔ ŋ ma, an ta lɛɛ poore, an a kukurə zɛ, an nɩ yaa darɛ, a ʊ:
«M Zɩ, k'ɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ fɩr naa do gʊ mɔɔ ma, kan bɩ kɩ haay ɩ bɩ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y, ɩ hɔ ba!» [
Bɩ ma bɩ, malɛɛka y'a to arzana ʊ, an b'a hɩnka m, an a paŋŋa da ra.
Yeezuu nɩ zoo kaŋŋɩda bam a heer ʊ, an n'a tʊntɔŋ ʊ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, a lɛɛmaa n'a ba am macina hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ surm tara ʊ.]
K'a yaa bɩ da bɩ, a wuti, an bʊr a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ zi, an bɩ dɩga a ŋ hinceem ba heerzarlɛ nɔ ʊ.
A n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ hinceem barɛ? K'a wuti, a yaa da k'a b'a do makra nɔ ʊ y!»
Kʊ Yeezuu gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, gʊaa cir gʊta bʊr. Iskarɩyɔtɩ Zidas bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem b'ɩ nyɩnta gʊaa cir gʊta bɩ lɛɛ, an a zɔ Yeezuu ma k'a yaa da m.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zidas, yaa ɩ n'a dam Gʊaanyɩ bɩ m kan daʊrɛ kɩ, k'ɩ zambʊ ba ma gɛ?»
Bɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔ k'a n'a bam k'a nyɩnta ʊ bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, ʊ ŋ zɛ kargʊ m gɛ?»
Bɩ ŋ gʊaa deem wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ zibəənyɩ sakʊ an a bɩsɩ tʊr gʊ ma.
Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a to maam.» A n bɔkarɛ an a wɔ da gʊaa bɩ tʊr bɩ ma, an a waa.

Yeezuu n a bɔ, an a hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m, kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cinno kɩ, kan gʊɔɔgusinno kʊ ŋ bʊr k'a b'a nyasʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ bʊr kan kargʊrɔ kɩ, bannɔ kɩ, ɩ ʊ, ta awɔɔ nawʊm koor nyasʊ jɩ ʊ.
Bɩ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay Wosocɛ ʊ, b'awɔɔ n a wɔ da mɔɔ ma y. Naa ma bɩ, awɔɔ wakatɩ m kan monsigə cir bɩ hɔ kɩ.»
Kʊ ŋ Yeezuu nyasʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʊ. Pɩyɛɛr n zu a jɛ ʊ laatʊ, an ta.
N nɩ sɛ hɛ hallu bireyaa ʊ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ. Pɩyɛɛr n ta, an aa nyɩnta ŋ bireyaa ʊ sɔ.
Zibəənyɩlʊ k'a a yɩ an nɩ nyɩntam sɛ bɩ lɛ ma b'ʊ bɩ, a dɩga a sɩɩ…, a ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do nyɩnta kan kɩ sɔ!»
Bɩ Pɩyɛɛr bɩsɩ ka, a ʊ: «Lʊ, mɔɔ n a dɔ y.»
K'a yɩ poore bɩ, gʊaa vanta n a yɩ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «ɩbɩɩ sɔ, ŋ gʊaa deem n'ɩbɩɩ m!» Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ gʊaa bɩ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ayy…, ŋ gʊaa deem bɛɛ n mɔɔ nɩ y!»
K'a maasɩrɛ ba an wakatɩ deem ku bɩ, gʊaa vanta a ya, an a hɩ, an so ra, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, gʊaa naa do nyɩnta kan kɩ! Galilee gʊaa m.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ hɩ y!» Lɛɛm bɩ, k'a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam bɩ, koo n baa da.
Zuuba n a bɔ, an dɩga Pɩyɛɛr ma. Pɩyɛɛr n mim niŋŋə kʊ Zuuba a hɩ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ: ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma her gallɛm kaakʊ, ɩ ʊ: ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ dɔ y, koo n bɔkarɛ an baa da.
A n bɔ garga ra, an nyi ka kan heerzarlɛ kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔm Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa wʊm ma, ŋn'a zɛm.
Ŋ n pɛɛra sa, ŋn'a ku a meer la, ŋn'a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n'ɩ mɩ. Nka y'ɩbɩɩ zɛ, a hɩ?»
Ŋ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ sʊnsɔ do haay wʊ Yeezuu ma.
Woso k'a haan bɩ, tara bɩ jɩtannɔ kan wosocɛmannɩbənno kɩ, wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ a so kʊ ma, ŋnɩ Yeezuu gaa, ŋnɩ bʊr m a dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ Krista n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ hɩ ʊ m!» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ b'a sim mɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ laaka da awɔɔ han sɔ, awɔɔ b'a nyɩ bɔm mɔɔ nʊ y.
Bɩ, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Gʊaanyɩ bɩ y'aa nyɩnta Woso paŋŋazaa bɩsɩ ʊ.»
Ŋ haay n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɩ minto bɩ, Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m na?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ hɩ, a m mɔɔ m.»
Bɩ, ŋ haay a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Kasɛtɩzannɔ zibəə ta wɔɔ ma ra! Wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a lɛ mim bɩ ma.»
Bɩ sokʊma zannɔ wɔɔ wuti, ŋnɩ Yeezuu gaa, ŋnɩ ta m *Pɩlatɩ taa.

Ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋnɩ mim ka ra, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ sʊr gʊaa naa do ra, an nɩ wɔɔ tara gʊɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ, an n'a tarɛ ŋ nɩ tolle, a ʊ: ŋ bɩ Rɔm cir yawʊr ka y. A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Awɔɔ m Krista, cir n'awɔɔ m.»
Pɩlatɩ n a lar, a ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m nɩ?» Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ.»
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m kan zamaa bɩ kɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n gʊaa naa do kʊrɔma yɩ y.»
Bɩ, ŋ so ra, ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A mɩŋŋa nɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ a hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ. A sɩŋŋɩda a sa Galilee ʊ, an bɔ Zidee ʊ, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku naa ʊ.»
Pɩlatɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a laaka da, a ʊ: «Gʊaa bɩ Galilee gʊaa m gɛ?»
K'a a dɔ a ʊ, *Hɩrɔɔdɩ gʊrga gʊaa m bɩ, a a nyɔɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ zi. Bɩ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm ʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ k'a Yeezuu yɩ bɩ, a heer nyɔɔ gʊta, bala, a a ŋʊa k'a yɩ a dɔmɩm laatʊ. Bala, a a mim ma, an n'a hɔɔn dam k'an hoser ba k'a yɩ.
A hɔ gʊta laaka da han, bɩ Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ y.
Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋʊaar ba, ŋn'a karɛ a lɛ m kan a paŋŋa jire kɩ.
Bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a zɛ kʊ ra kan a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ, ŋnɩ yaa wʊ ma, ŋnɩ cicir ka ma, ŋnɩ cinno huu du ma. Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a ka, ŋn'a wusigəm ŋnɩ ta m Pɩlatɩ zi.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Pɩlatɩ kan Hɩrɔɔdɩ kɩ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta kʊ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gʊaasɩbabaa da kʊ ma.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Pɩlatɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir, kan cinno vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ gʊaa naa do gaa a b'a ka mɔɔ ʊ, a ʊ: gʊɔɔ an nɩ ŋ nyʊnnyɔɔm. Bɩ mɔɔ lar awɔɔ taa naa ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ, an a ba, an bʊnyaa amba awɔɔ hɩ bɩ nɩ y.
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n hɔsɩ yɩ sɔ y, an a wusigə mɔɔ zi. Gʊaa bɩ n hɔsɩ ba an a ga zɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ k'a yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, mɔɔ y'a kam ŋn'a hʊnhʊr mɩŋŋa, m bɔkarɛ, m a to.» [
Pakkɩ cibsa haay, pakra m kʊ Pɩlatɩ n ŋ hɔɔnhɔ lɔ deem bɔ an a ka ŋ ʊ.]
Bɩ y'a ka, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a zɛ kʊ ra haay, ŋn'ɩ zee dam: «K'a gʊaa naa do zɛ, k'a Barabas bɔ a ka wɔɔ ʊ.»
Barabas bɩ nyasʊ ŋ y'a ʊ, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, nyaa k'a zɛ an a da tara nɔ ʊ, an gər zɛ bɩ minto.
Pɩlatɩ n a ya, an meer ba kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ k'a Yeezuu to.
Ŋ haay n zee da, ŋ ʊ: «K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma! K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!»
Pɩlatɩ a ya, an ŋ lar a gallɛm kaakʊ hɔ ma, a ʊ: «Bɔ a ba an bʊnyaa? Kʊ mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ an a ba, an a ga zɛ nɩ y. K'a maam nɩ, mɔɔ y'a kam, ŋn'a hʊnhʊr, m bɔkarɛ m a to.»
Ŋ n a gu, ŋn'a hɩ ŋn'ɩ som la kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!» Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ bʊgʊr bɩ n maam-maam bɩ, ŋ bʊr Pɩlatɩ la.
Pɩlatɩ n dʊdɔ bɩ yar amba ŋ lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Bɩ, a gʊaa niŋŋə k'a yar ba, an gər zɛ, ŋn'a nyasʊ, ŋn'a du bɩ to, amba ŋ y'a yɛ bɩ m. A n bɔkarɛ an Yeezuu to yarbənno m, kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔnmim ba m.
Kʊ yarbənno wɔɔ Yeezuu nyasʊ, ŋn'ɩ tam nɩ bɩ, ŋ Sirɛnnɩ gʊaa deem kʊ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ zɛ ʊ, an a to poo ʊ an nɩ zɛm, ŋn'a nyasʊ, ŋn'a da gɔdarkʊra bɩ busure ʊ k'an zu Yeezuu jɛ ʊ.
Zamaa gʊta zu a jɛ ʊ kan lannɔ kɩ. Lannɔ wɔɔ n zɛnyi da ʊ Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Yeezuu n a bɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zerizalɛm lannɔ, a bɩ nyi ka mɔɔ tɔ ma y. K'a nyi ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma an lɛ da, kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ.
Bala, dɔmɩm ta ʊ an nɩ zɛm, n nɩ zɛm b'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m lannɔ kʊ cɩnarɔ m, kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr nyɩnɔ yɩm cɩna rɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, kan bɔɔ ɩ nɩ nyɔ ka nyɩnɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, n y'a hɩm ciro m: K'a da wɔɔ ra, ŋn'a hɩ dimbirlɔ m: K'a ku wɔɔ ra.
Bala, kʊ n y'a bam gɔ butur m ncɩnaaʊ, a zɛm bɩ nyɩnta gɔ gər ma lɔ?»
Ŋ bibiiro gaa hɩɩya k'a yaa nɩ ŋ zɛ kan kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma: ‹Minkorgo› bɩ, yarbənno yaa a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma b'ʊ kan bibiiro hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Deem a bɩsɩ, deem a jɩsa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, sugur ka ŋ ʊ, bala hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bam bɩ, ŋ n a jɩ dɔ y.» Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, ŋ n pʊɛɛga da a huuro wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ jir kan kʊ kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ n jɩm b'ʊ, an nɩ dɩgam. Tara cinno wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʊm ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A gɔsɩnnɔ bʊmbɔ. Kʊ Krista kʊ Woso a bɔ ʊ bɩ n'awɔɔ nɩ, k'an a mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ a zim.»
Yarbənno wɔɔ nɩ yaa wʊm ma sɔ. Ŋ y'a zɔ, ŋnɩ bɛɛ hɛɛnr ka ʊ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ:
«Kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ ɩ zim.»
Ŋ nɩ warga deem zeŋŋə a mim la, ŋn'a gʊrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir m naa.»
Bibii deem k'a nɩ zeŋŋəm gɔdarkʊra ma kan kɩ bɩ y'a sʊnsɔ wʊm, a ʊ: «Krista bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m na? Ɩ mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ, k'ɩ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ sɔ.»
