Deem bɩ n nyaa ba kan kɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyi bam Woso m na? Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hʊnhʊrlɛ nɔ ʊ am a hɔ bɩ m.
Kʊ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ, a a ga m, k'ʊ hʊnhʊrlɛ yɩ an a ga wɔɔ mim barɛ m, bɩ kʊ naa zaa nɩ, a mim ba ʊ y.»
A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Yeezuu, k'ɩ yaa lee ku ɩ cirbəə bɩncɛ ʊ, k'ɩ mɔɔ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: her naa ʊ, ɩbɩɩ nyɩntam kan mɔɔ kɩ arzana ʊ.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ sinsebir da, monsigə gʊta n zɛ tara burə ʊ jilli, woso n ter, lɛɛ n'a ba bimm… an ta an wakatɩ kaakʊ ku. Wosocɛ pɛɛra bɩ n kaansʊ a bire ʊ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ sinsebir da, monsigə gʊta n zɛ tara burə ʊ jilli, woso n ter, lɛɛ n'a ba bimm… an ta an wakatɩ kaakʊ ku. Wosocɛ pɛɛra bɩ n kaansʊ a bire ʊ.
Yeezuu n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m nyi darɛ ɩbɩɩ wɔ ʊ.» K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a ga.
Yarbənno zɔrɔ cir bɩ k'a hɔ k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, a y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, gʊaa naa do nyɩnta gʊaa tɩrga.»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊr k'a bɩ dɩga a bɩ, kʊ ŋ hɔ haay k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə ŋn'ɩ doom kan heerzar kɩ.
Bɩ Yeezuu dɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ haay, kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ hallɩ Galilee ʊ saa… rɔ wɔɔ haay jɩm laatʊ ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ.

Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a tɔ m Zozɛf. Zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ deem kʊ n n'a birm Arimatee kʊ bɩ gʊaa m. Gʊaa bɩ do nyɩnta mɩŋŋa, a nyɩnta gʊaa tɩrga. A nyɩnta, an nɩ dɔm Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ ma. A nyɩnta dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ gʊaa deem, b'a n yɛ hɔ kʊ dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ a cɩnta, ŋn'a ba naa ma y.

Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, a tɔ m Zozɛf. Zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ deem kʊ n n'a birm Arimatee kʊ bɩ gʊaa m. Gʊaa bɩ do nyɩnta mɩŋŋa, a nyɩnta gʊaa tɩrga. A nyɩnta, an nɩ dɔm Woso cirbəə bɩ zɛrɛ ma. A nyɩnta dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ gʊaa deem, b'a n yɛ hɔ kʊ dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ a cɩnta, ŋn'a ba naa ma y.
A n ta Pɩlatɩ zi, an aa Yeezuu gər bɩ yɛ han.
A n a zer gɔdarkʊra bɩ ma, an pɛɛra mɩŋŋa ku ra, an aa wʊta yaa deem kʊ n y'a hɔn ci ʊ, bɩ n nɩ gər bir ʊ cɩna bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Pakkɩ cibsa hinni m, bɩ *sabaa y'a bam k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa sɔ.
Lannɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to Galilee ʊ ŋnɩ bʊr kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ Zozɛf da zaa ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩ dɩga yaa bɩ ma, kʊ ŋ Yeezuu bir lʊnlɔ gɛ.
Ŋ n a wusigə k'a yaa tidəər hi banka kan nyɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, kan bɩ kɩ, sabaa hinni ʊ bɩ, ŋ hoon si amba Woso lɛ ka bɩ m.
Hatʊ hinni ʊ wutigʊta m, lannɔ wɔɔ ta yaa ra b'ʊ kan tidəər nyɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a banka bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a jaa kʊ ŋ y'a ta yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ bɩ, n y'a gərgu n n a gʊ rɛ, n n ta m laatʊ, n n yaa bɩ lɛ bɩ to.
Gasʊ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ bɩ, ŋ n Yeezuu gər bɩ yɩ y.
Ŋ n a dɔ k'a hɔɔn an n'a dam lɔ mim naa do ma y. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊɔɔyaarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ y'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ, ŋ huuro nɩ yɔm.
Ŋ da bɔ ʊ, ŋn'a meer zuutə. Yaarɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ minto awɔɔ n'a kam gʊaa k'an mɩsɩr bɩ ma gəəno bire ʊ?
A ba naa ʊ y. A a mɩm bɔ ʊ. K'a hɔ niŋŋə k'a hɩ awɔɔ m, an bɩr Galilee ʊ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.»
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Pakra m, kʊ n n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ nyasʊ n a ka mimbʊnyaabənno ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, bɩ k'an a mɩm bɔ ʊ dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, lannɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu mim bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Lannɔ wɔɔ n a hʊr yaa ra b'ʊ, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋn'aa naa haay hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ m kan gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ m.
Nyɩnta a ʊ: Magdalaa Maarii, kan Zannɩ kɩ, kan Zakkɩ da Maarii kɩ. Lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ mim naa do hɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ.
Bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a tʊr ka lannɔ wɔɔ mim bɩ ma, ŋ n a si y, ŋ ʊ: «Para-para ŋ n'a dɩndam.»
Pɩyɛɛr n wuti an bra si, an ta yaa ra b'ʊ. Bɩ, k'a yaa zerga an dɩga yaa bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, pɛɛra b'a a yɩ, an nɩ cɩntam. A n a wusigə, an doo. A n zɛ kədə hɔ k'a ba bɩ tɔ ma.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ, karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ ɩ tam kʊ kʊ n n'a birm Emayuus b'ʊ. Tara bɩ, a ga kʊ ʊ a ba cilo bueeredeem kan Zerizalɛm kɩ.
Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ mim k'a ba bɩ dɩndam kan kʊ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ nɩ mim bɩ dɩndam, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kʊ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu bɩ ŋ ku, an nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ.
Bɔ a kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ: Hɔ y'a ka ŋ mɩm la, ŋ n a dɔ kʊ nka nɩ y.
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ bɩsɩ awɔɔ ka an nɩ tarɛ?» Ŋ n a gaa, ŋnɩ jɩm kan heerzarlɛ kɩ.
Ŋ gʊaa deem kʊ n n'a birm Kleopas b'a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ deem ɩ gɔɔta Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ naa ʊ, ɩbɩɩ n mim k'a ba dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro ʊ bɩ dɔ ra?»
Yeezuu n ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩ ba?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, a zibəə paŋŋa nyɩnta ʊ kan a meerbaa kɩ Woso taa bɩ, kan gʊaa haay kɩ taa sɔ bɩ,
wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan wɔɔ cinno kɩ y'a nyasʊ, ŋn'a dʊdɔ ka, ŋ ʊ: A a ga zɛ m. Ŋ n a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Wɔɔ y'ʊ hɔɔn dam, ʊ ʊ: A n nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ Israyɛl bʊmbɔ. Bɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, minno nɔɔn duro ba ŋ y'a ʊ, a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hɔ m her.
Sɩra m, lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ barla rɔ wɔɔ a ka wɔɔ n zɛ kədə. Ta ŋ y'a ʊ yaa ra b'ʊ wutigʊta m,
Ŋ n aa a gər bɩ yɩ y, ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: Malɛɛkarɔ y'a hɩnka awɔɔ m, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu mɩsɩr.
Wɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta yaa ra b'ʊ, ŋn'a hɔ haay bɩ yɩ amba lannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ m, bɩ ŋ n a mɩŋŋa yɩ y.»
Bɩ Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔɔn poore zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ bɩr yɛm an nɩ hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a hɩ awɔɔ m haay bɩ mim sim zɔɔ y.
Pakra m kan Krista kɩ, k'an fɩr yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, k'an bɔkarɛ an gasʊ a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.»
A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ hɔ kʊ Wosoci a hɩ a minto bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ. A n a sa Moyiisi ma kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a mim gʊrsɩra ba rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a zɔ tara kʊ ŋ nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu n a hɔ ba ɩ ʊ, a hɩ a ʊ k'a cem ŋ han.
Ŋ n yu ra, ŋ ʊ: «Gɔɔta kan wɔɔ kɩ, woso lɛ y'a zom.» Yeezuu n gasʊ k'a gɔɔta kan ŋ kɩ.
K'a nyɩnta an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ bɩ, a bur sa an a barka da ʊ an bɔkarɛ an a zɩnzɛ ra, an a ka ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ mɩm zer, ŋnɩ Yeezuu dɔ, bɩ Yeezuu nyaam ŋ lɛɛ.
Ŋ n'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Sɩra m, dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'a nyɩnta an nɩ Wosoci bʊmbɔm wɔɔ m kʊ zi, ʊ nɩ tam bɩ, wɔɔ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʊta.»
Ŋ n a bɔ lɛɛm, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, ŋn'a karɩndanyɩnɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'a so kʊ ma kan a muno kɩ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ duro n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Sɩra m, Zuuba a mɩm bɔ ʊ! A a hɩnka Sɩmɔɔn m.»
Gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ n hɔ k'a ba zaa bire ʊ bɩ hɩ, ŋn'a hɩ sɔ, ŋ ʊ: «Yeezuu k'a bʊr an nɩ bur bɩ zɩnzɛm la bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ wɔɔ b'a dɔ ma, ʊ ʊ, a mɩŋŋa m.»
Kʊ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan kʊ kɩ bɩ, Yeezuu bʊr ŋ bire ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.»
Ŋ da n bɔ ʊ, nyibəə gʊta n gasʊ ŋ ʊ. Ŋ hɔɔn ʊ bɩ, zinə awɔɔ yɩ naa.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ da bɔ ʊ n ta awɔɔ nɩ? Bɔ hɔɔndarɛ n ta awɔɔ heer ʊ?
K'a dɩga mɔɔ wɔrɔ ma kan mɔɔ gannɔ kɩ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m bala! K'a wɔ da mɔɔ ma, a dɩga a. Zinə mɛsim ba ʊ, b'a yaa ba ʊ, amba awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩ mɔɔ m ta m naa nɩ y.»
K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a a wɔrɔ hɩnka kan a gannɔ kɩ.
Heernyɔɔ gʊta nyɩnta ŋ ʊ, ŋ n zɛ kədə. Bɩ y'a ka ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a si y. Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ: «Hɔbɩrɛ y'awɔɔ ʊ naa ʊ ra?»
Ŋ n zɔdɩsɛɛrɛ sa, ŋn'a ka ʊ.
A n a si, an a sʊ ŋ mɩnyaa m.

A n bɔkarɛ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n na: Pakra m kʊ hɔ haay kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba mɔɔ minto, Moyiisi lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʊ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro kɩ nɔ ʊ, kan laarɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ n kʊ yɩ.»
Bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu n ŋ hɔɔn gu, kʊ ŋ nɩ Wosoci bɩ jɩ dɔ.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ba hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba bɩ n na: Pakra m kʊ Krista n fɩr yɩ, k'an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ.
Bɩ, a tɔ ma bɩ, a a ga m kʊ n n'a pa da durnya gʊɔɔ m, kʊ n n'a mɩsɩrbaa lʊr, kʊ n n'a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ a sɩŋŋɩda an n'a sam Zerizalɛm ma.
Mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ ganwʊrɛ kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ a ler bɔ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ m. B'awɔɔ, k'a gɔɔta tara nɔ ʊ naa ʊ, an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ paŋŋa k'a n'a tom brama, an zer awɔɔ mim ʊ bɩ ku.»
Bɩ Yeezuu ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʊ, an ta ŋ nɩ Betanii zeezi. B'ʊ bɩ, a a wɔ busu, an ŋ barka da ʊ.
K'a nɩ ŋ barka daŋ ʊ bɩ, a a gʊ ŋ ma, an der arzana ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n Yeezuu da ʊ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʊ kan heernyɔɔ gʊta kɩ.
Bɩ ŋ tɩr ta Wosocɛ ʊ dɔmɩm haay ŋnɩ bɩr a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
John: A sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ, Lemim bɩ lɛɛ ka an nyɩnta ʊ. Lemim bɩ nyɩnta a ʊ kan Woso kɩ, bɩ Lemim bɩ, Woso m.
A sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ, a nyɩnta ʊ kan Woso kɩ.
Hɔ haay bɩ, a y'a da. Hɔ ba ʊ an ba, an nyɩnta a nɔ ʊ y.
*Mɩsɩrbaa bɩ, nyɩnta a ʊ a mɩŋŋa ʊ, bɩ Mɩsɩrbaa bɩ nyɩnta gʊɔɔ Lɛɛgure.
Lɛɛgure bɩ nɩ yɔm monsigə nɔ ʊ, bɩ monsigə bɩ n a si y.
Gʊaa deem ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, Woso n a nyɔɔ. A tɔ m Zaan.
Bʊr a ʊ kasɛtɩ m, k'a bɩ Lɛɛgure kasɛtɩ ka, kʊ gʊaa haay n a si, a kasɛtɩ bɩ minto.
A bɛɛ m Lɛɛgure y. Bʊr a ʊ, k'a bɩ Lɛɛgure kasɛtɩ ka.
Lɛɛgure paan…, Lemim bɩ m, an bʊr durnya nɔ ʊ k'a bɩ lɛɛ gu gʊaa haay m.
A nyɩnta durnya nɔ ʊ, a ɩ durnya da, bɩ, kʊ nka m a mɩŋŋa nɩ, durnyazannɔ n a dɔ y.
Bʊr a ʊ a dogʊɔɔ bire ʊ, b'a dogʊɔɔ n a si y.
Bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ sɩra ka a tɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a paŋŋa ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a ba Woso nyɩnɔ.
Brɔɔ n yɩ ma nɔ ʊ, kan mɛsim lɛtaama kɩ, kan gʊaa hɔɔnhɔ kɩ y. Yɩ ŋ y'a ʊ Woso nɔ ʊ.
Lemim b'a ba gʊaa, an bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ bire ʊ, mɩŋŋabaa n a heer han kan sɩra kɩ. Wɔɔ cirbəə yɩ, cirbəə niŋŋə kʊ Zɩ b'a ka Nyɩ k'a vanta ba ʊ b'ʊ.
Zaan a kasɛtɩ ka, an n'a pa darɛ, a ʊ: «Ba gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ma bɩ n na. A lɛ da mɔɔ m, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʊ, bala, dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n nyɩnta ʊ bɩ, a ta ʊ.»
Woso hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ haay k'a nɩ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ŋ yɩ barka k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
*Moyiisi ɩ bʊr *lɛrɔ m, bɩ, Yeezuu *Krista ɩ bʊr barka m kan sɩra kɩ.
Gʊaa ba ʊ, an Woso yɩ y. Woso Nyɩ a deem, k'a m Woso, an n'a Zɩ jɩr ʊ bɩ, a a hɩnka wɔɔ m.
Ba Zaan kasɛtɩ k'a ka bɩ n na. Dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ *wosocɛmannɩbənno kan a daahanzannɔ kɩ nyɔɔ ʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'aa laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʊ: «Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ?»
A n bɩsɩ ka a nyɩbɔʊrɛ ma y, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «*Krista (kʊ Woso a ler bɔ k'a nyɔɔ bɩ) bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.»
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ? *Elii n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Elii bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.» «Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ayy…»
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ? Kʊ aa a nyɩbɔʊrɛ ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ wɔɔ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ. K'ɩbɩɩ m, nka n'ɩbɩɩ m paan…?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, amba *wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ bɩ m: « ‹Leer k'a nɩ bɔm *poohɔɔn ʊ bɩ› m mɔɔ m, ‹k'a Zuuba zaa zɛ a wʊta.› »
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, farizɛɛnrɔ m.
Ŋ n gɔɔta, ŋn'a larlɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ *Krista, gɛɛ *Elii, gɛɛ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, bɔ minto ɩbɩɩ nɩ *batɛm karɛ?»
Zaan a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ naa, batɛm mɔɔ n'a kam hi nɔ ʊ. Gʊaa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʊ.
A ɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʊsɔrɔ bar hʊr y.»
Ba naa ʊ Betanii ʊ, kɔ kʊ n n'a birm Zʊrdɛn bɩ lɛ ra zeezi, bɩncɛ kʊ Zaan nɩ batɛm kaŋ ʊ b'ʊ.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Zaan Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ zɛm zi, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ba *Woso sinnyɛɛm k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaa k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʊ bɩ gʊm ma bɩ n na.
A mɩŋŋa mɔɔ hɩ ma, mɔɔ ʊ: A lɛ da mɔɔ m, an nɩ zɛm mɔɔ jɛ ʊ, bala, a lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m, an ta ʊ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ n nyɩnta m a dɔ y, kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ *Israyɛl ʊ bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ *batɛm kam hi ʊ.»
Zaan a kasɛtɩ ka, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩ, an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan cirpʊʊrɛ kɩ, an a to brama, an bɩ zer a mim ʊ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta m a dɔ y. Bɩ, Woso ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: kʊ m bɩ batɛm ka hi ʊ. Gʊaa niŋŋə kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n nɩ zerle a mim la bɩ n nɩ zɛm bɩ batɛm ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ, m n'a kasɛtɩ kam, mɔɔ ʊ, a m Woso Nyɩ.»
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Zaan a ya, an ta bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ kan a *karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ hɩɩya.
K'a Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ cenim bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Woso sinnyɛɛm bɩ ba n nɩ.»
Kʊ karɩndanyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ a ma, an n'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ŋ zu Yeezuu ʊ.
Yeezuu n a bɔ an dɩga a kur, k'a ŋ yɩ ŋn'ɩ zure a jɛ ʊ bɩ, a ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ awɔɔ n'a kam ma?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Rabi, - a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: karɩnsaamba - ɩbɩɩ har ɩ ka?»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a bʊr a dɩga a.» Ŋ n ta, ŋnɩ bɩncɛ bɩ dɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta kan kɩ hinni bɩ do ʊ. Nyɩnta a ʊ yirbəə wakatɩ si ma.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr danzaa Andɩr nyɩnta ŋ gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem, ŋn'a tʊr ka Zaan meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋnɩ zu Yeezuu ʊ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, a ta, an aa a danyɩ Sɩmɔɔn bɩ yɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Wɔɔ *Mesii bɩ yɩ!» - Bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: *Krista. -
A n a gaa, an ta m Yeezuu zi. Yeezuu n dɩga a sɩɩ… an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ m Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m; n y'ɩbɩɩ birm Sefas.» Bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: Pɩyɛɛr.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a ʊ, k'a ta Galilee ʊ. A n aa Filipi yɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ.»
Filipi bɩ, Bɛtsayɩdaa gʊaa m, Andɩr kan Pɩyɛɛr kɩ kʊ ʊ.
Filipi n aa Natanayɛl yɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ n y'a mim dɩnda *Moyiisi ciro nɔ ʊ kan *wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔ kɩ m bɩ, wɔɔ yɩ. Zozɛf nyɩ Yeezuu, Nazarɛtɩ gʊaa bɩ m.»
Natanayɛl n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ mɩŋŋa do bɔm Nazarɛtɩ ʊ ra?» Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bʊr ɩ dɩga a.»
Yeezuu n Natanayɛl yɩ, an nɩ zɛm zi, an a mim dɩnda, a ʊ: «Ba Israyɛl gʊaa paan… n na, a zambʊ ba ʊ y.»
Natanayɛl n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ dɔ ka?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Nyɩnta k'ɩbɩɩ ʊ sɔɔn bɩ taa bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Filipi n ɩbɩɩ bir y.»
Natanayɛl n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, Woso Nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ m *Israyɛl cir.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ, mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ sɔɔn bɩ taa bɩ, bɩ y'a ka, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka ra? Ɩbɩɩ hɔ gʊta yɩrɛ, an lɛ da naa m.»
A n a ya, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: awɔɔ brama yɩrɛ an a gʊ, Woso malɛɛkarɔ n bɩr derm, ŋn'ɩ bɩr zerm *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ burə ʊ.»
A dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ bɩ, lʊsarɛ cibsa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ Galilee kʊ Kanaa ʊ. Yeezuu da nyɩnta b'ʊ.
N Yeezuu bir lʊsarɛ cibsa bɩ ma sɔ kan a *karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.
Dɩvɛn bɩ k'a bɩ nya bɩ, Yeezuu da a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɩvɛn ba ŋ ʊ dɔ y.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «M naa, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku? Mɔɔ wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y.»
A da bɩ n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a hɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m haay bɩ ba.»
Sipiro ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ sɔrdɩ, ŋnɩ tɩr hi tʊntɔŋ ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ *hubɔrɛ minto, amba ŋ tɩr a ba a Woso zaa zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ m. Bɩ sipi deem a da ma, an gər si si.
Yeezuu n a hɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a hi tʊntɔ sipiro nɔɔn duro ʊ, k'an ŋ hɩnhan.» Ŋ n hi bɩ tʊntɔ ŋ ʊ, an ŋ hɩnhan kan a lɛ kɩ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a kusi kɛɛrɛ, a ka hɔjirlezaa b'ʊ.» Ŋ n a kusi, ŋn'aa a ka ʊ.
K'a hi k'a lʊr dɩvɛn bɩ da a lɛ ma bɩ, a n a dɔ k'a to a ʊ ka y. Bɩ, zibəənyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ y'a kusi rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ. A lʊ bɩ zim bɩ bir,
an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa biyəə naa, dɩvɛn nyɩnta a tɩr lɛɛ ka, an a ka gʊɔɔ ʊ. Kʊ ŋ b'a mi, an ŋ ka, an bɔkarɛ, an bɔ ɩ bɩ nyɩnta bɩ ka ŋ ʊ. Ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ ɩ dɩvɛn nyɩnta bɩ to, an wakatɩ naa do ku!»
Yeezuu lɛɛkarɛ hoser n naa, an a ba Kanaa ʊ, Galilee kʊ ʊ. A a cirbəə bɩ hɩnka, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a ta Kapɛrnawum ʊ kan a da kɩ, a danyɩnɔ kɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ. Ŋ yaa nyɩnta b'ʊ, bɩ, ŋ n maasɩrɛ ba y.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ *pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ, Yeezuu n ta Zerizalɛm ʊ.
A n aa dɩga a, ŋ yɩ ŋʊannɔ hɛɛnm *Wosocɛ hallu ʊ b'ʊ, kan seero kɩ, cirpʊnnɔ kɩ, busoolʊrlɛzannɔ nyɩnta b'ʊ sɔ.
A n bar sa, an a ba madɩr, an la ŋ la haay Wosocɛ hallu ʊ b'ʊ kan seero wɔɔ kɩ, dono wɔɔ kɩ. A busoolʊrlɛzannɔ wɔɔ bɔɔlʊgʊ bɩ hɩsɩga, an ŋ mɔdrɔkuntərehɔɔ wɔɔ hɩnhɩsɩga.
A n a hɩ cirpʊnnɔ hɛɛrɛ zannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a bɔ nawɔnnɔ haay m naa ʊ, a bɩ mɔɔ Zɩ cɛ bɩ sa a ba daasɩ y.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ har bɩ ŋʊarɛ a so mɔɔ ʊ haay.›
Zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n meerbaa bɩ sa, ŋ ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ naa, bɔ *makra ɩbɩɩ n n'a hɩnkam wɔɔ nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «K'a Wosocɛ naa do wurgə, mɔɔ yɩ m bɔrɛ m a dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʊ nɔ ʊ.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Dɔɔraa busi a yaa sɔrdɩ wɔɔ Wosocɛ naa do dɔ, ʊ a nya ma. Ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ, ɩ ʊ, k'ɩ dɔ dɔmɩm kaakʊ nɔ ʊ?»
Bala, Wosocɛ k'a n'a mim hɩm bɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɛ m.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, Yeezuu k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ, a nyɩnta an a hɩ ncɩnaaʊ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka *Wosoci bɩ lemim ʊ kan meerbaa k'a ba bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ *pakkɩ cibsa dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ gʊta sɩra ka Yeezuu tɔ ʊ makrarɔ k'a ŋ ba ŋn'a yɩ rɔ wɔɔ minto.
Bɩ, Yeezuu n yɛ, an sɩra ka ŋ ʊ y. Bala, a ŋ dɔ haay,
a lɛ baa kʊ n n gʊaa kasɛtɩ ka ʊ y. Bala, a hɔ k'a nɩ gʊaa heer ʊ bɩ dɔ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtaarɛ deem ɩ nyɩnta farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ barla, a tɔ m Nikodɛm.

A n bʊr gunuu Yeezuu zi, an b'a hɩ m, a ʊ: «*Rabi, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ karɩnsaamba n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ ɩ to Woso zi. Bala, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an makrarɔ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ nɔɔn ba, kʊ Woso ba kan a zaa kɩ y.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: kʊ gʊaa n a bɔ an yɩ, a bɩ *Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩrɛ y.»
Nikodɛm n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa gusi, a y'a bam lɔ k'a a ya, a yɩ gɛ? A y'a bɔrɛ, an gasʊ a da nɔ ʊ a hɩɩya hɔ ma k'a yɩ ra?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m: Kʊ gʊaa n yɩ hi nɔ ʊ kan *Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ, a b'a dam ma, an gasʊ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ y.
Hɔ k'a yɩ mɛsim nɔ ʊ bɩ, mɛsim m. Hɔ k'a yɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ bɩ, ɛspri m.
Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ, ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ so ɩ ra ɩ yɩ bɩ, ɩ bɩ zɛ kədə y.
Hɩnhɛr bɩ, hɔ an nawʊm bɩncɛ k'a ŋʊa ʊ, ɩbɩɩ n'a bʊgʊr marɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ k'a to a ʊ ka, an nɩ tam ka y. A maam sɔ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ yɩm Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ.»
Nikodɛm n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Naa y'a dam ma, an ba lɔ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Israyɛl karɩnsaamba n'ɩbɩɩ m, b'ɩbɩɩ n hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɔ y!
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ wɔɔ n n'a hɩm, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ yɩ bɩ wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ kam, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ bɩr wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ sire y.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ tara burə minno hɩrɛ b'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ sire, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ brama mim hɩ, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a si?
Bala, gɔsɩ n ta arzana ʊ y, kʊ n maam *Gʊaanyɩ k'a a to arzana ʊ, an bʊr bɩ m.
Amba *Moyiisi k'a mɩm busu brama poohɔɔn ʊ bɩ, pakra m kʊ n n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ busu sɔ.
Kʊ gʊaa k'a sɩra ka ʊ bɩ n *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ.
Sɩra m, Woso durnya ŋʊa paan…, hallɩ an a Nyɩ deem bɩ sa an a ka, kʊ gʊaa k'a nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʊ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa b'a zar y, k'an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ.
Bala, Woso n a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ durnya ʊ k'an bɩ durnya dʊdɔ ka y. A nyɔɔ a ʊ, k'an bɩ durnya bʊmbɔ.
N bɩ gʊaa k'a sɩra ka ʊ bɩ dʊdɔ karɛ y. Bɔ ɩ nɩ sɩra ka ʊ bɩ, n lɛɛ ka, n n a dʊdɔ ka. Bala, a n sɩra ka Woso Nyɩ a deem b'ʊ y.
Ba dʊdɔ bɩ n na: lɛɛgure bʊr durnya ʊ, gʊɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ monsigə ŋʊa an lɛ da lɛɛgure m, bala, ŋ zibəəro wɔɔ nyɩnta bʊnyaa.
Gʊaa k'a n'a bʊnyaa bam bɩ, a sɔ lɛɛgure m, an nɩ nyi barɛ, a lɛ baa k'a bʊr lɛɛgure ʊ y, a zibəəro bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ y'a n a hɩnka.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ sɩra zi bam bɩ, zɛ bɩ nawʊm lɛɛgure ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a zibəəro wɔɔ dɔ, bala, ŋ ba a ʊ Woso tɔ ma.»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu ta kan a *karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ Zidee kʊ ʊ. A gɔɔta b'ʊ kan ŋ kɩ, an nɩ *batɛm kam.
Zaan ɩ batɛm kam sɔ Enɔɔn kʊ ʊ, Salim kʊ jɩr ʊ. Bala, hi ɩ b'ʊ gʊta. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n bʊr, ŋn'ɩ batɛm sire.
Bɩ ma bɩ, n n Zaan du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ y.
Bɩsɩkarɛ wuti Zaan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ kan zɩɩfʊ deem kɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ *hubɔrɛ minto.
Ŋ n bʊr Zaan zi, ŋnɩ b'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, gʊaa k'a nyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ Zʊrdɛn kɔ zeezi bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n a kasɛtɩ ka bɩ, a ɩ batɛm kam kɛɛrɛ sɔ, gʊaa haay nɩ tam zi.»
Zaan n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa b'a dam ma, an hɔ yɩ, kʊ Woso bɛɛ y'a ka ʊ y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ kan hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ kɩ: mɔɔ ʊ *Krista bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ n yɩ m nyɔɔ kʊ m lɛɛ ka a lɛɛ.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ lʊ bɩ m bɩ, bɩ n a zim. Lʊzaa bɩ gʊaasɩba bɩ, jɩm an nawʊm b'ʊ, an n'a tʊr karɛ. Heernyɔɔ n a heer han lʊzaa bɩ leer k'a n'a mam bɩ minto. Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n naa, a mɩŋŋa paan….
Pakra m k'a wɩsɩrabaa n bɩr a dam la, kʊ mɔɔ n bɩr m bɔm lɛ.»
Gʊaa k'a a to brama an bʊr bɩ lɛ da hɔ haay ra. Bɔ y'a to tara ʊ bɩ, tara burə gʊaa m, an nɩ tara burə mim dɩndam. Gʊaa k'a a to brama bɩ,
hɔ k'a yɩ, an a ma sɔ bɩ kasɛtɩ an n'a kam. Bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a kasɛtɩ bɩ sire y.
Gʊaa k'a n'a kasɛtɩ bɩ sim bɩ, a sɩra ka an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Woso bɩ sɩrazaa m.
Sɩra m, gʊaa kʊ Woso a nyɔɔ bɩ, Woso lemim an n'a hɩm. Bala, Woso *Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka ʊ, b'a jire ba ʊ y.
Zɩ Woso a Nyɩ ŋʊa, an hɔ haay sa, an a zar a wɔ ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ sɩra kam Nyɩ b'ʊ, a ɩ *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m. Gʊaa k'a kaanm Nyɩ bɩ nɩ, a bɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩrɛ y, bɩ Woso heerbusu gɔɔtarɛ a mim ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu b'a dɔ a ʊ, farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ a ma, ŋn'a dɩndarɛ ŋ ʊ, a ɩ *karɩndanyɩnɔ yɩm gʊta, an nɩ *batɛm karɛ an lɛ da Zaan ra bɩ,
a a hʊr Zidee kʊ ʊ, an a bɔ, an ta Galilee kʊ ʊ. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa bɩr batɛm karɛ y, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'a kam.
a a hʊr Zidee kʊ ʊ, an a bɔ, an ta Galilee kʊ ʊ. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa bɩr batɛm karɛ y, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'a kam.
Bɩ pakra m, k'an aa bɔ Samarii ʊ.
A yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, ŋn'aa lee ku Samarii kʊ deem kʊ n n'a birm Sikaar bɩ nɔ ʊ. A bɩ laatʊ tara kʊ Zakɔɔb a ka a nyɩ Zozɛf ʊ biisi bɩ ma y.
Bɩncɛ bɩ do Zakɔɔb hiyəə bɩ n ta ʊ. Yeezuu k'a ta, an kɔ bɩ, a nyɩnta hiyəə bɩ lɛ ra. Nyɩnta a ʊ sinsebir ʊ.
Samarii kʊ lʊ deem n bʊr k'a bɩ hi kusi. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hi bɩ kusi, ɩ ka m ʊ, kʊ m a mi!»
Bɩ ma bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ta tara nɔ ʊ, k'a yaa hɔbɩrɛ si.
Samarii kʊ lʊ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «A ba a ʊ lɔ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m zɩɩfʊ, ɩbɩɩ nɩ hi yɛm mɔɔ han k'ɩ mi, bɩ Samarii kʊ lʊ n mɔɔ nɩ?» Kʊ sɩra nɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ bɩr kʊ mam kan Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ Woso ganwʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ dɔ, kan gʊaa k'a n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, a ʊ: ɩ hi kusi, ɩ ka m ʊ kʊ m a mi naa kɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m, ɩ yɛ han, an hi k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam bɩ ka ɩ ʊ.»
Lʊ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «M Zuuba, poko ba ɩbɩɩ ʊ, ɩ n bɩ hi bɩ kusim nɩ y. Bɩ hiyəə bɩ nɔ ta sɔ. Ɩbɩɩ ɩ hi mɩŋŋa bɩ do m ka?
Lɛ ɩbɩɩ da wɔɔ yaaba Zakɔɔb k'a hiyəə naa do ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ n na? A mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y'a mi kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, a hɔbɩsɩrɔ kɩ ra?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a nɩ hi naa do mire, mɩsɩ y'a yarɛ an a zɛ.

Bɩ, gʊaa niŋŋə k'a nɩ hi kʊ mɔɔ n n'a kaŋ ʊ bɩ mim bɩ, mɩsɩ b'a yarɛ an gʊaa bɩ do zɛ fɩɩga y. Hi kʊ mɔɔ n n'a kaŋ ʊ bɩ y'a bam hi mɩnyaa a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, an bɩr surm, an *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ ka ʊ.»
Lʊ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, hi bɩ do ka m ʊ, kʊ mɩsɩ b'a ya, an m zɛ y, kʊ m bɩ m ya, m bɩ hi kusi naa ʊ y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ta ɩ yaa ɩ zim bɩ bir, k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ bʊr naa ʊ.»
Lʊ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ zim ba ʊ y.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ gumə ta ʊ, ɩ ʊ, ɩ zim ba ʊ y. Ɩbɩɩ zino nyɩnta ʊ soor, bɩ gʊaa k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ kan kɩ naa ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ zim bɛɛ y. Bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, ɩ sɩra hɩ.»
Lʊ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ, mɔɔ ʊ: *wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m.
Wɔɔ yaabɔɔ Woso da ʊ ci naa do mim ʊ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ a hɩ, a ʊ, Woso daʊrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ m Zerizalɛm m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, lʊ, wakatɩ ɩ zɛm, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a Zɩ Woso da ʊ ci naa do mim ʊ, bɩ Zerizalɛm nɩ y.
Hɔ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ b'awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʊ. Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ wɔɔ n'a daŋ ʊ. Bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, a to an nawʊm zɩɩfʊrɔ barla.
Bɩ dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ. Zɩ Woso daʊrɛ zannɔ paan…rɔ wɔɔ Zɩ bɩ daŋ ʊ a heer ʊ kan sɩra kɩ. Gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛ n taa ŋ ma.
Woso naa, Ɛspri m, bɩ minto y'a ka, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a daŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋn'a da ʊ a heer ʊ kan sɩra kɩ.»
Lʊ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, *Mesii kʊ n n'a birm *Krista bɩ zɛm. K'a bɩ bʊr, a hɔ haay hɩm wɔɔ m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «A m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ naa.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lee ku. Ŋ n zɛ kədə, kʊ ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ meer bam kan lʊ kɩ bɩ minto. Bɩ, gɔsɩ n a lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩ n'ɩ kam ma gɛ?» gɛɛ «Bɔ minto ɩ nɩ meer bam kan kɩ gɛ?»
Lʊ bɩ n a gʊ a gər bɩ ma, an ta tara nɔ ʊ, an aa a hɩ gʊɔɔ m, a ʊ:
«K'a bʊr a dɩga gʊaa k'a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ba haay bɩ hɩ mɔɔ m. *Krista bɛɛ m barɛm na?»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n bɔ tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ ta zi.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ mam ma, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔbɩrɛ niŋŋə n ta ʊ mɔɔ nɩ m ga m, m a bɩ, b'awɔɔ n a dɔ y.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa ɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʊ, an a bɩ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʊ m b'a hɔɔnhɔ ba, kan a zibəə kɩ, m a nya.
Awɔɔ n a hɩ a zim a ʊ, a gɔɔta mom si mɔsa n n'a kum na? Bɩ mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'a a bɔɔta a dɩga: Wuturo wɔɔ a ba fu mɔsa minto.
Zibəəzaa b'a zibəə nyɔɔdʊ yɩ, an n'a hɔnyɩ bɩ som kʊ ma *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ minto. Bɩ y'a ka, gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ duum kan gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ som kʊ ma bɩ kɩ y'a heer nyɔɔm kan kʊ kɩ.
Bɩ y'a ka, hɔ kʊ bɔɔr naa do a hɩ bɩ sɩra m, a ʊ: gʊaa deem ɩ hɔ duure, gʊaa vanta n nɩ zɛm b'a da.
Mɔɔ awɔɔ nyɔɔ k'a yaa hɔ k'awɔɔ n a zi ba bɩ da. Gɔsɩnnɔ kɔrɛ yɩ a nɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ n bʊr an n'a nyɔɔdʊ bɩrɛ.»
Kʊ bɩ do nɔ ʊ, Samarii gʊɔɔ gʊta sɩra ka ʊ, lʊ bɩ kasɛtɩkarɛ naa do minto. «A hɔ haay kʊ mɔɔ ba bɩ hɩ mɔɔ m.»
Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku zi sɔ bɩ, Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a yɛ han k'an gɔɔta kan a kɩ. A n gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔmɩm hɩɩya.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ya, ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʊ a mɩŋŋa meerbaa bɩ minto bɩ, ŋ gʊta ŋnɩ lɛ da biisi ra.
Ŋ n'a hɩm lʊ bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: ɩbɩɩ n a hɩ bɩ minto bala bɛɛ y'a ka wɔɔ n sɩra ka ʊ y. Wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a lɛ meerbaa ma, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ sɔ, sɩra m, durnya bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ m.
Dɔmɩm hɩɩya k'a cem bɩ, Yeezuu a hʊr bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ, an ta Galilee ʊ.
Bala, a mɩŋŋa nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʊ, *wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩr daʊrɛ yɩm mɩŋŋa a kʊ ʊ y.
Bɩ, k'a lee ku Galilee ʊ bɩ, Galilee zannɔ wɔɔ a si mɩŋŋa. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ cibsa bɩ minto. Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba haay bɩ yɩ sɔ.
Yeezuu n a bɔ, an bʊr Kanaa ʊ Galilee kʊ ʊ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do a hi ba ʊ dɩvɛn bɩ. *Rɔm cir zibəəzaa jɩtaarɛ deem ɩ nyɩnta Kapɛrnawum ʊ, a nyɩ bɩ laafɩɩ y.
K'a a ma, ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu a to Zidee ʊ, an bʊr Galilee ʊ bɩ, a bʊr an b'a yɩ, an a yɛ han, k'an b'a nyɩ k'a n'a bam k'a ga bɩ waa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ n *makrarɔ yɩ kan hoserlo kɩ, awɔɔ bɩ sɩra kam fɩɩga ra!»
Zibəəzaa jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, bʊr kʊ n bɛɛ m, mɔɔ nyɩ bɩ gam.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ta, ɩ nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩr.» Gʊaa bɩ do sɩra ka Yeezuu meerbaa b'ʊ, an a wusigə.
K'a nɩ doom bɩ, a zibəənyɩnɔ b'a zɛ ʊ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩ nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩr!»
A n ŋ lar, a ʊ, wakatɩ kara a waa ma gɛ? Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Jim sinuu wakatɩ deem ma mɛmarɛ bɩ zer ma.»
Nyɩ bɩ zɩ bɩ dɩga a sɔ wakatɩ bɩ do Yeezuu a hɩ a m, a ʊ: «Ɩ nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩr.» Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ma, a sɩra ka Yeezuu ʊ, a mɩŋŋa kan a har gʊɔɔ kɩ haay.
Yeezuu hoser k'a ba a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a to k'a ʊ Zidee ʊ an ta Galilee ʊ bɩ n naa do.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ cibsa deem ma.
Zerizalɛm ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, lɛɛ nɩ b'ʊ hi m ta ʊ, seero cɛ lɛ jɩr ʊ, ŋn'a birm *ebree lemim m Bɛtzata. A gasʊjɩrɔ soor gʊta-gʊta, n n a dɔ jaarɔ m.
Bɩncɛ bɩ do gʊɔɔ yaabazannɔ nɩ wʊtarɛ a taa, bʊʊrɔ, lʊgɔrɔ kan mɛgarɛzannɔ kɩ. [
Bala, Zuuba Malɛɛka deem ɩ tɩr zer dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʊ hi b'ʊ, an heer ba ma. Yaabazaa k'a lɛɛ ka, an gasʊ hi bɩ heerbarɛ jɛ ʊ bɩ, laafɩɩ an n'a yɩrɛ, baa k'a yaaba bɩ lʊnlɔ.]
Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ, an nɩ yaaba m, a yaaba bɩ dɔɔraa bukərku a yaa sinnyə.
Yeezuu n a yɩ, an nɩ wʊtam, bɩ k'a a ma ŋ ʊ, a yaaba bɩ maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, a a lar, a ʊ: «Ɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ waa gɛ?»
Yaabazaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ ba gʊaa m, an nɩ mɔɔ gasʊm hi b'ʊ, a heer barɛ dɔmɩm ʊ y. Kʊ mɔɔ kʊ m gasʊ, gʊaa nɩ lɛɛ kam mɔɔ lɛɛ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ sa, ɩ ta.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊaa b'a waa, an a wʊtarahɔ bɩ sa, an nɩ tarɛ.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, *sabaa hinni m.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ gʊaa k'a waa bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Sabaa hinni m, a n a ga m, ɩbɩɩ n ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ busu y.»
Gʊaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a laafɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ y'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ sa, ɩ ta.»
Ŋ n a lar, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa bɩ kara ɩ naa hɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ, a ʊ, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ sa, ɩ ta?»
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ n a dɔ kʊ nka ɩ laafɩɩ bɩ ka a ʊ y. Bala, Yeezuu a gʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma laatʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu b'a yɩ *Wosocɛ ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ba ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ yɩ kɛɛrɛ na. Ɩ b'ɩ ya, ɩ mimbʊnyaa ba y, mim y'a ɩ yɩ, an lɛ da biisi hɔ naa ra.»
Gʊaa bɩ n ta an aa a dɩnda zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ, Yeezuu y'awɔɔ waa bɩ.
Bɩ y'a ka, jɩtannɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyaa m kan Yeezuu kɩ k'a naa ba sabaa hinni b'ʊ bɩ minto.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Zɩ gɔɔta an nɩ zi bam, mɔɔ y'a bam sɔ.»
Bɩ y'a ka, brɔɔ n'a kam ma, k'a zɛ gər, k'a nɩ zi bam sabaa hinni ʊ bɩ bɛɛ bala y, k'a nɩ Woso birm a Zɩ, an a mɩŋŋa sa, an a ga kʊ ʊ kan kɩ bɩ minto m sɔ.

Yeezuu meerbaa bɩ sa, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: Woso Nyɩ bɩ b'a dam ma, an hɔsɩ ba a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. K'a Zɩ Woso bɩ yɩ, an hɔ niŋŋə ba, b'a ba. Bala, hɔ kʊ Zɩ n'a bam bɩ, bɩ Nyɩ n'a bam sɔ.
Kʊ Zɩ a Nyɩ ŋʊa bɩ, a hɔ k'a n'a bam bɩ hɩnkam nɩ haay. A zibəə gʊta hɩnkam nɩ, an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra, awɔɔ m zɛ kədə.
Kʊ Zɩ bɩ nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʊ an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ ŋ ʊ bɩ, Nyɩ bɩ, gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa b'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kaŋ ʊ sɔ.
Zɩ bɩ bɩr gʊaa dʊdɔ karɛ y. A dʊdɔkarɛ haay sa an a ka a Nyɩ b'ʊ,
kʊ gʊaa haay n a da ma, an Nyɩ bɩ da ʊ amba ŋn'ɩ Zɩ bɩ daŋ ʊ bɩ m. Gʊaa k'a bɩr Nyɩ bɩ daŋ ʊ bɩ, a bɩr Zɩ k'a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ bɩ daŋ ʊ sɔ y.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a n'a tʊr kam mɔɔ lemim ma, an nɩ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ mim sire, a ɩ *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m. Ŋ b'a dʊdɔ karɛ y. Bɔ a ʊ zɛ nɔ ʊ, an ta mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, wakatɩ ɩ zɛm, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ Woso Nyɩ bɩ leer mam, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.
Bala, kʊ Zɩ b'a so mɩsɩrbaa ʊ bɩ, a a ka, k'a Nyɩ bɩ n nyɩnta mɩsɩrbaasoʊrezaa sɔ.
Woso paŋŋa ka ʊ k'an dʊdɔ ka, k'a m *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ minto.
A bɩ zɛ kədə naa haay tɔ ma y! Wakatɩ ɩ zɛm gəəno wɔɔ y'a leer mam.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ba rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a bʊnyaa ba rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ dʊdɔ ka.
Mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m hɔsɩ ba, m mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a mam bɩ mɔɔ n'a dʊdɔ kam, bɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔkarɛ bɩ tɩrga, bala, mɔɔ bɩr m karɛ m mɩŋŋa hɔɔnhɔ ma y. Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ mɔɔ n nɩ m kam ma.
Kʊ m mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ mɔɔ n'a karɛ, n bɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ sire y.
Woso nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ kasɛtɩ niŋŋə k'a n'a kam mɔɔ minto bɩ, sɩra m.
Awɔɔ gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ Zaan zi, b'a sɩra kasɛtɩ ka.
Mɔɔ bɩr m kam gʊaa kasɛtɩ ma y. Meer bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊm ncɩnaaʊ, k'a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Zaan nyɩnta amba fɩtɩrɛ kʊ n nɩ sɛ nyaŋ ʊ, an nɩ yɔm bɩ m. Bɩ, awɔɔ ŋʊa mɩŋŋa k'a a heer nyɔɔ dɔmɩm poore ʊ, a lɛɛgure b'ʊ.
Mɔɔ ɩ kasɛtɩ m, a gʊtabaa n lɛ da Zaan hɔ bɩ ra. Zibəəro kʊ Zɩ a ka mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ m. Mɔɔ yɩ ŋ bam, bɩ brɔɔ nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ, ŋ ʊ, Zɩ b'ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam. B'awɔɔ n a leer ma, b'awɔɔ n a meer yɩ sɔ y.
Woso lemim bɩr gɔɔtarɛ awɔɔ heer ʊ y, bala, awɔɔ n sɩra ka gʊaa k'a nyɔɔ b'ʊ y.
*Wosoci karɩnda awɔɔ n'a bam, an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʊ, bɩ nɔ awɔɔ n nɩ *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩŋ ʊ. Bɩ, bɩ nɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam.
Awɔɔ lɛ baa k'a bʊr mɔɔ zi k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ y.
Mɔɔ bɩr m kam lɛbɔʊrɛ ma gʊɔɔ zi y.
Bɩ mɔɔ awɔɔ dɔ, awɔɔ n Woso ŋʊa y.
Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ, m Zɩ tɔ ma, b'awɔɔ kaanm mɔɔ m. Kʊ gʊaa vanta ɩ bʊr a mɩŋŋa tɔ ra, awɔɔ y'a sim.
Awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ a si, awɔɔ k'a n'a kam daʊrɛ ma a muno zi, a bɩr a kam daʊrɛ k'a a to Woso y'a deem bɩ zi bɩ ma?
A b'a hɔɔn da, a ʊ, mɔɔ n nɩ mim karɛ awɔɔ ra m Zɩ taa y. Hɔ k'a nɩ mim karɛ awɔɔ ra bɩ Moyiisi *lɛrɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ yure ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
Kʊ nyɩnta awɔɔ ʊ a Moyiisi mim si, awɔɔ mɔɔ mim sim sɔ. Bala, a gʊrsɩra ba a ʊ mɔɔ minto.
K'awɔɔ n hɔ k'a gʊrsɩra ba bɩ si, awɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ si?»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu bra Galilee higʊta kʊ n n'a birm sɔ Tiberiyaadɩ higʊta bɩ gəm deem la.
Gʊaa cir gʊta zu a jɛ ʊ, bala, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ hoserlo k'a nɩ ŋ bam, an nɩ yaabazannɔ waam nɔ wɔɔ yɩ.
Gʊaa cir bɩ minto y'a ka, Yeezuu n der ci ra, an nyɩnta b'ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, *pakkɩ k'a m zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ cibsa b'a zɔ.
Kʊ Yeezuu a bɔɔta an dɩga bɩ, a gʊaa cir gʊta yɩ, an nɩ zɛm zi. A n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʊ: «K'ʊ bur yɩ ka, ʊ a si, kʊ ŋ n'a bɩ?»
Meer bɩ ba a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ k'a dɩga a. Hɔ k'a mɩŋŋa ʊ k'a ba bɩ, a a dɔ.
Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ bur si *deniyee zɔɔhɩra nɩ, a bɩ bʊr bɔrɛ y, bala, gʊaa biyəə b'a kur yɩm poore y.»
A *karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ deem Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr danzaa Andɩr a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Nyɩyar ɩ naa ʊ, an nɩ bur m soor, kan zɔnɔ kɩ hɩɩya. Bɩ, bɔ naa n n'a bam gʊaa cir naa nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ka kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɩnta.» Lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, bur m jilli. Ŋ n nyɩnta. Gʊɔɔ cir bɩ gʊɔɔyaarɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ tisi soor ma.
Yeezuu n bur bɩ si, an a barka da ʊ, an a ka gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ. A n a ba maam sɔ zɔnɔ wɔɔ m. A n a ka ŋ ʊ amba ŋ lɛ taa bɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ y'a bɩ, an ŋ ka bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a kuuro kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, a b'a ka deem m nyaam nɩ y.»
Ŋ n bur soor kʊ ŋ y'a bɩ rɔ wɔɔ kuuro so kʊ ma, ŋn'a zar kasɩ ʊ bueerehɩɩya.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ hoser k'a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «*Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa paan… k'a a ga m, an bʊr durnya ʊ bɩ m naa.»
Bɩ, Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʊ, n zɛm b'a nyasʊ, n n'a ba cir bɩ, a a hʊr a deem, an ta ci ra.
Yirbəə k'a da bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ta higʊta lɛ ra.
Ŋ n da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ tam Kapɛrnawum zeezi, gəm deem bɩ ra. Bɩ ma bɩ, gum da, bɩ Yeezuu n ŋ ku cɩna y.
Hɩnhɛr gʊta nɩ hɔnm, an nɩ hi bɩ wunwusigəm.
Kʊ ŋ ta, cilo soor gɛɛ sɔrdɩ bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu yɩ, an nɩ tam hi burə ʊ, an n'a zɔm kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ ma. Nyibəə n gasʊ ŋ ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, mɔɔ m!»
Ŋ y'a ŋʊa k'a busu kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ m. Lɛɛm bɩ, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bɩncɛ kʊ ŋ nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ gəm ku.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta kɔ bɩ lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ kɔɔlʊʊ deem yɩ b'ʊ. Bɩ, Yeezuu n zu kʊ ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ ŋ kɔɔlʊʊ deem bɩ nɔ ʊ y. Ta brɔɔ ʊ a minto.
Kɔɔlʊʊrɔ y'a to Tiberiyaadɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr bɩncɛ kʊ Yeezuu bur bɩ barka da ʊ, ŋn'a bɩ bɩ jɩr ʊ.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ a yɩ Yeezuu ba b'ʊ, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ba b'ʊ sɔ bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da kɔɔlʊʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Kapɛrnawum ʊ k'a yaa a ka Yeezuu ma.
Kʊ ŋ yaa yɩ higʊta bɩ gəm deem la bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, ɩbɩɩ lee ku naa ʊ brɔ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, awɔɔ bɩr a kam mɔɔ ma k'awɔɔ hoserlo yɩ bɩ minto y, k'awɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ an a ka bɩ minto m.

A bɩ zi ba hɔbɩrɛ k'a n'a zarm bɩ minto y, k'a zi ba, a a ka hɔbɩrɛ k'a nɩ gɔɔtam an nɩ *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ kam bɩ minto. Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ do, *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a ka awɔɔ ʊ, bala, a mɩŋŋa Zɩ k'a m Woso b'a mɩŋŋa jɩ da ʊ.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ wɔɔ n'a bam, k'ʊ Woso zi ba?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Woso zibəə bɩ, k'ɩ sɩra ka gʊaa k'a nyɔɔ b'ʊ.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hoser kara ɩbɩɩ n'a bam ʊ a yɩ, k'ʊ sɩra ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ? Ɩbɩɩ zibəə bɩ n kara?
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ hɔbɩrɛ kʊ n'a birm *mann bɩ bɩ poohɔɔn ʊ, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba bɩ m: ‹Bur a to arzana ʊ, an a ka ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a bɩ.› »
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, *Moyiisi bɛɛ arzana bur bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ ɩ arzana bur paan… bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso bur bɩ m gʊaa k'a a to arzana ʊ an bʊr, an nɩ *mɩsɩrbaa kam durnya ʊ bɩ m.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, bur bɩ do ka wɔɔ ʊ dɔmɩm haay!»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa bur bɩ. Gʊaa k'a bʊr mɔɔ zi, nɔ b'a zaa zɛrɛ y. Gʊaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, mɩsɩ b'a yarɛ an a zaa zɛ y.
Bɩ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m: Awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩ, b'awɔɔ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ y.
Gʊaa haay kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ n'a kam mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, ŋ zɛm mɔɔ zi, bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm mɔɔ zi bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ kaanm nɩ y.
Bala, m to mɔɔ ʊ arzana ʊ kʊ m bɩ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba, mɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩ, a lɛ baa kʊ gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ deem m nyaam nɩ y, kʊ m ŋ mɩm bɔ ʊ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ.
Mɔɔ Zɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩ n naa: Gʊaa haay k'a Nyɩ bɩ yɩ, an sɩra ka ʊ bɩ, k'an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩ. Bɩ mɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ.»
Bɩ tɛkka ma, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a sa ma, ŋn'ɩ kukur barɛ a minto. K'a a hɩ, a ʊ, a mɩŋŋa m bur k'a a to arzana ʊ a bʊr bɩ minto m.
Ŋ n a ya, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Yeezuu bɛɛ ra, Zozɛf nyɩ bɩ? Wɔɔ n a zɩ dɔ kan a da kɩ ra? A a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, an a hɩ, a ʊ, a to a ʊ arzana ʊ?»
Yeezuu n a bɔ, an meerbaa bɩ sa, a ʊ: «K'a kukur barɛ bɩ to kan kʊ kɩ!
Gʊaa b'a dam ma, an bʊr mɔɔ zi kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ n a gaa y. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ.
N y'a gʊrsɩra ba *wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Ŋ haay hɔdɩndarɛ yɩm Woso zi.› Gʊaa niŋŋə k'a Woso lemim ma, an n'a hɔdɩndarɛ sim bɩ, zɛ an nawʊm mɔɔ zi.
Gʊaa ba ʊ an Zɩ yɩ y. Gʊaa k'a a to Woso zi an bʊr bɩ y'a yɩ bala.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a nɩ sɩra kam bɩ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ n bur k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam.
Awɔɔ zɩrɔ *mann bɩ poohɔɔn ʊ, bɩ ŋ gɩnga.
Bur k'a a to arzana ʊ bɩ n naa. Gʊaa k'a bɩ a bɩ garɛ y.
Mɔɔ m bur mɩsɩr, m m to arzana ʊ. Gʊaa k'a bur bɩ do bɩ bɩ, a zaa bɩ gam fɩɩga y. Bur kʊ mɔɔ n n'a kam bɩ, m mɩŋŋa mɛsim m, m n n'a kam kʊ durnya n mɩsɩrbaa yɩ.»
Naa do y'a ka, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ ŋ wuti bʊgʊr m kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Naa y'a bam lɔ k'a mɛsim ka wɔɔ ʊ, k'ʊ a sʊ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ sim sʊ, k'awɔɔ n a ma mi, awɔɔ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩrɛ y.
Gʊaa k'a mɔɔ sim sʊ, an mɔɔ ma mi b'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ.
Bala, mɔɔ mɛsim bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ paan… m, mɔɔ ma bɩ, hɔmire paan… m sɔ.
Gʊaa k'a mɔɔ sim sʊ, an mɔɔ ma mi, a zaa ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan a zaa kɩ.
Kʊ Zɩ k'an mɩsɩr bɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba mɔɔ nawʊm Zɩ bɩ minto bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ bɩm bɩ, mɔɔ y'a kam an mɩsɩrbaa ba sɔ.
Bur k'a a to arzana ʊ bɩ n naa. A bɩ hɔdeem kan awɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a bɩ bɩ kɩ y. Ŋ gɩnga, bɩ gʊaa k'a bur naa do bɩ, a zaa bɩ garɛ y.»
Minno nɔɔn duro Yeezuu a dɩnda gʊɔɔ m Kapɛrnawum sokʊmacɛ ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Meerbaa naa do kaŋŋɩda! Nka n'a dam ma, an a si?»
Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a zim, a ʊ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ kukur bam mim naa do minto bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Busu a ʊ awɔɔ ma ra?
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɔkarɛ a bɩ *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an nɩ tam bɩncɛ k'a nyɩnta ʊ biisi b'ʊ?
*Ɛspri nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam, mɛsim bɩ zibəə ba ʊ y. Meerbaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ, Ɛspri m kan *mɩsɩrbaa kɩ.
Bɩ gʊɔɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʊ, ŋ n sɩra ka y.» Yeezuu lɛɛ ka, an gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ dɔ, kan gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm b'a nyasʊ an a ka bɩ kɩ.
A a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an bʊr mɔɔ zi kʊ Zɩ bɛɛ y'a bir y.»
Dɔmɩm bɩ do tɛkka ma bɩ, *karɩndanyɩnɔ gʊta a bɔ a jɛ ʊ, ŋ n a ya, ŋn'ɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan kɩ y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ b'a gʊm mɔɔ ma sɔ ra?»
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, k'ʊ ta nka zi? Ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ meerbaarɔ m.
Bɩ wɔɔ si, ʊ a dɔ sɔ, ʊ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ m Krista, Woso Nyɩ mɩŋŋa.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ bɛɛ y'awɔɔ gʊaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ bɔ ʊ ra? Bɩ, Sʊtaana y'a so awɔɔ gʊaa deem ʊ!»
Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʊ gʊaa Sɩmɔɔn nyɩ Zidas b'a n'a hɩm ma. Bala, a m bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem, an nɩ Yeezuu nyasʊrɛ, an a ka.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu cem, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm Galilee kʊ ʊ, a n a ŋʊa k'a ta Zidee ʊ y, bala, zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər.
Bɩ ma bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ cibsa kʊ n n'a birm *buuro cibsa b'a zɔ.
A danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ta Zidee ʊ, k'ɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'ɩ zibəəro k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ yɩ sɔ.
Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa kʊ n n'a dɔ, a bɩr a zibəə bɩ nyaakʊm darɛ y. K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zibəəro barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ɩ hɩnka durnyazannɔ m.»
Yeezuu danyɩnɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n sɩra ka ʊ y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y. B'awɔɔ wakatɩ m dɔmɩm haay m.
Durnya bɩ sɔrɛ awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ, a ɩ sɔm mɔɔ m, bala, kʊ mɔɔ n'a zibəə bɩ kasɛtɩ kam, mɔɔ ʊ, a bʊnyaa bɩ minto.
K'a ta cibsa bɩ ma, mɔɔ bɩ tarɛ y. Bala, mɔɔ wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y.»
K'a meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a gɔɔta Galilee ʊ.
K'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ta cibsa bɩ ma bɩ, a zaa sa sɔ, an a nyaakʊm da, an nɩ tam, a lɛ baa kʊ n a dɔ y.
Cibsa bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ y'a kam Yeezuu ma, ŋnɩ laaka da, ŋ ʊ: «A ɩ ka?»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, ŋ y'a mim dɩndarɛ: Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa mɩŋŋa m.» Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: «Ŋʊaarzaa m, bra an n'a bam gʊɔɔ m.»
Bɩ, gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ yɛrɛ, an n'a mim hɩm garga ra y. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi barɛ a jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m.
Kʊ *buuro cibsa bɩ bireyaa a ku bɩ, Yeezuu ta *Wosocɛ ʊ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A a ba lɔ an hɔ dɔ, b'a n karɩnda ba?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ n a to mɔɔ zi y. A to a ʊ Woso k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi.
Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba, a y'a dɔm kʊ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do, k'a to a ʊ Woso zi, gɛɛ kʊ m mɩŋŋa mim mɔɔ n'a dɩndarɛ.
Gʊaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa mim dɩndam bɩ, a ka an nawʊrɛ a mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʊrɛ ma. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a n'a kam a gʊaa k'a a nyɔɔ bɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ ma bɩ, bɩ bala n sɩrazaa. Zambʊ b'a nɔ ʊ y.
Moyiisi bɛɛ *lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka awɔɔ ra? B'awɔɔ gʊaa deem ba ʊ, an nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ y. Bɔ minto, an n'a kam mɔɔ garɛ ma?»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Zinə nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Nka y'a hɩ, a ʊ, k'a ɩbɩɩ zɛ?»
Yeezuu a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zibəə deem mɔɔ ba *sabaa hinni ʊ, awɔɔ n zɛ kədə haay!
Moyiisi *lɛ ka awɔɔ ʊ, k'a gʊɔɔ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ. A to a ʊ awɔɔ yaabɔɔ zi Moyiisi mɩŋŋa bɛɛ bʊr nɩ y. Bɩ, k'a a da sabaa hinni ma, awɔɔ y'a bam.
Bɩ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ gʊaa gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ sabaa hinni ʊ, an bɔ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ la nɩ, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ heer nɩ busum kan mɔɔ kɩ gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ waa haay sabaa hinni ʊ bɩ ma?
A bɩ hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm mɩm ʊ bɩ dʊdɔ ka bala y, k'a dʊdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ.»
Zerizalɛm gʊɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a mee bɔ ʊ bɩ bɛɛ m naa ra?
Ba an nɩ meer bam ŋn'a mam na, bɩ ŋ bɩr hɔsɩ hɩm nɩ y! Wɔɔ tara bɩ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ, a dɔ ŋ y'a ʊ paan…, ŋ ʊ, *Krista m gɛ?
Wɔɔ gʊaa naa do tojɩ dɔ, kʊ *Krista bɩ bʊr, gɔsɩ b'a tojɩ dɔrɛ y.»
Yeezuu k'a nɩ hɔ dɩndam Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ b'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ! Awɔɔ mɔɔ tojɩ dɔ. Bɩ, mɔɔ n bʊr m zi nɩ y. Sɩrazaa m Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ m. B'awɔɔ n bɩ zaa dɔ y.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a dɔ, m to mɔɔ ʊ zi, a ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.»
Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a nyasʊ, bɩ gʊaa ba ʊ, an a wɔ da ma y. Bala, a wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y.
Gʊɔɔ nyɩnta zamaa bɩ bire ʊ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʊ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ *Krista bɩ bʊr, a hoserlo barɛ an lɛ da naa n a ba rɔ wɔɔ ra gɛ?»
Kukur kʊ n n'a bam Yeezuu minto gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ, *farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ a ma. A m bɩ, *wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ n Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ nyɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'aa a nyasʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ gɔɔtam kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɩ m bɔ, m ta Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi.
Awɔɔ zɛm b'a ka mɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ bɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ y. Bala, bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a bʊr b'ʊ y.»

Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ta awɔɔ nawʊm ka, wɔɔ b'ʊ yarɛ ʊ a yɩ? Ta awɔɔ nawʊm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɩsɩga da ŋn'a war kʊ ma kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ zi ra? Gɛɛ, ta an nawʊm k'a yaa hɔ dɩnda grɛkkɩrɔ m na?
Hɔ k'a hɩ naa jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ lɔ: Awɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ bɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ y, bɩ bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a bʊr ʊ y?»
Cibsa bɩ nyarɛ ma bɩ, dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'an dɔmɩm gʊta bɩ, Yeezuu jɩm brama, an a leer busu, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ mɩsɩ n'a zɛm k'an bʊr mɔɔ zi, an bɩ hi mi.
Gʊaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa hi kɔyaarɔ y'a tom zi, amba *Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m.»
*Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ mim an n'a hɩm. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu k'a n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ cɩna bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n bʊr cɩna y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'a tʊr ka Yeezuu meerbaa bɩ ma gʊɔɔ cir bɩ bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Sɩra m, ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n na.»
Gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «*Krista bɩ n naa.» Gɔsɩnnɔ a ya, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Krista y'a dam ma, an a to Galilee kʊ ʊ ra?
Wosoci n a hɩ, a ʊ, ‹bɔ an nawʊm Davɩd do nɔ ʊ›, b'a to an nawʊm tara poore kʊ Davɩd yɩ ʊ, ŋn'a birm Betelehɛm b'ʊ ra?»
Naa do y'a ka, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a gʊngʊ a minto.
Ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a ŋʊa k'a nyasʊ, bɩ gɔsɩ n a wɔ da ma y.
Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʊr wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi kan *farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ nɩ ŋ lar, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m awɔɔ n bʊr nɩ?»
Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa ba ʊ an meer kʊ gʊaa naa do a ba bɩ lɔɔ ba y.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A to awɔɔ ʊ, an awɔɔ hɔɔn da a zi ra?
Jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ barla bɩ, gʊaa deem taan… ta ʊ, an a mim si ra?
Bɩ, gʊaa cir naa do n *lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ y. Ŋ barka ba ʊ y!»
Nikodɛm k'a nyɩnta an ta Yeezuu zi bɩ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an a hɩ, a ʊ:
«N n gʊaa dʊdɔ yar bɩ n n'a meerbaa ma kan hɔ k'a ba bɩ kɩ y. Wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ hɩ ra?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʊ Galilee ʊ sɔ ra? Bɩ, ɩ ka mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ *wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa yɩrɛ an bɩr Galilee gʊaa y.»
Ŋ haay n a hʊr, ŋnɩ dundoo a harlɔ ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hʊr an ta Oliviyee ci mim ʊ.
Dɔ k'a bʊr an nɩ mɛm bɩ, a a bɔ an bʊr *Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, gʊaa haay nɩ zɛm zi, an nyɩnta, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
*Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ kan *farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ bʊr lʊ m b'ʊ, ŋn'a da gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ. Sʊr n y'a ʊ ra, an nɩ jaan darɛ.
Ŋ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, lʊ naa do, sʊr n y'a ʊ ra, an nɩ jaan darɛ.
*Lɛrɔ nɔ ʊ, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʊ, n n lannɔ nɔɔn duro zɛ jaarɔ m. B'ɩbɩɩ, ɩbɩɩ ʊ lɔ?»
A hɩ ŋ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ k'a nyasʊ meerbaa nɔ ʊ, k'a ku a mim ka ra. Yeezuu a zuutə, an n'a nyʊkʊm wʊnwɔsɩm tara ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'a larm bɩ, Yeezuu a bɔɔta, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a n'awɔɔ bire ʊ, b'a n mimbʊnyaa ba cɩna bɩ n lɛɛ ka, an a gʊɛɛn.»
A n a ya, an a zuutə, an n'a nyʊkʊm bɩ wʊnwɔsɩm tara ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ meerbaa naa do ma bɩ, ŋ cem deem-deem. Gʊɔɔ marɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ cem, a poorero wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʊ. Yeezuu n gɔɔta a deem. Kʊ lʊ bɩ gɔɔta an nɩ b'ʊ bɩ,
Yeezuu a bɔɔta, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ŋ bee, lʊ ra? Gɔsɩ n'ɩbɩɩ dʊdɔ yar la?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ayy…, Zuuba, gɔsɩ.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ b'ɩbɩɩ dʊdɔ yarlɛ y. Ta, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ya, ɩ mimbʊnyaa ba y.»]
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Durnya lɛɛgure m mɔɔ m. Gʊaa k'a nɩ zum mɔɔ ʊ bɩ bɩ tam monsigə ʊ y. A mɩsɩrbaa lɛɛgure yɩm.»
*Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩ mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ ɩ n'a kam na? Ɩbɩɩ kasɛtɩ bɩ, ŋʊaar m.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, m mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ mɔɔ n'a kam. Bɩ, mɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m, bala, mɔɔ m tojɩ dɔ, m m tajɩ dɔ. B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ m to mɔɔ ʊ ka m nɩ tam ka y.
Dʊdɔ awɔɔ n'a karɛ am gʊɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Mɔɔ bɩr gʊaa dʊdɔ karɛ y.
Baa kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m dʊdɔ ka, a ka mɔɔ nawʊm kan sɩra kɩ, bala, mɔɔ bɩ m deem nɩ y. Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ ta ʊ sɔ.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ *lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ, gʊaa hɩɩya kasɛtɩ bɩ, sɩra m.
M mɩŋŋa kasɛtɩ mɔɔ n'a kam, bɩ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'ɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam sɔ.»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ Zɩ b'ɩ ka?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n mɔɔ dɔ y, b'awɔɔ n mɔɔ Zɩ dɔ sɔ y. Kʊ mɔɔ dɔ awɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ dɔm sɔ.»
Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba Yeezuu ʊ bɩncɛ kʊ n nɩ busoo zarŋ ʊ b'ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, a ɩ hɔ dɩndam Wosocɛ ʊ, gɔsɩ n a wɔ da ma y, bala, a wakatɩ n a ku cɩna y.
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Cem mɔɔ n nawʊm, awɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ ma, bɩ, gɩnga awɔɔ nawʊm a mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ. Bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a ta b'ʊ y.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A ŋʊa an nawʊm k'a mɩŋŋa zɛ gɛ? K'a a hɩ, a ʊ: bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a ta b'ʊ bɩ minto.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Tara burə naa gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, m to mɔɔ ʊ brama. Durnya naa gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, durnya naa do gʊaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ gɩngarɛ a mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ. K'awɔɔ n a si, a ʊ: A n ta ʊ bɩ m mɔɔ m,
awɔɔ gɩngarɛ a mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ.»
Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n'a mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m tee… bɩ m.
Awɔɔ minno ta ʊ gʊta, kʊ m ŋ hɩ awɔɔ m, kʊ m ŋ dʊdɔ ka. Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, sɩrazaa m, bɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ma zi bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ n'a hɩm durnya m.»
Ŋ n a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu bɩ, Zɩ Woso mim a a hɩ a nɩ y.

Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Dɔmɩm niŋŋə k'awɔɔ nɩ *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ busuŋ ʊ bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do awɔɔ n n'a dɔrɛ, a ʊ: A n ta ʊ bɩ m mɔɔ m. Bɩ mɔɔ bɩr zi bam ŋ mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ a dɩnda mɔɔ m bɩ mɔɔ n'a hɩm.
Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ. A n mɔɔ to m deem nɩ y, bala, hɔ k'a ŋʊa bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam dɔmɩm haay.»
K'a nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ gʊta sɩra ka ʊ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ gɔɔta mɔɔ lemim bɩ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ paan…rɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Awɔɔ sɩra dɔm, bɩ sɩra bɩ y'awɔɔ bam soamɩŋŋaʊzannɔ.»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n wɔɔ m, bɩ gʊaa n wɔɔ ba a lɔnnɔ cɩna y. Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ, ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʊ: wɔɔ nyɩntam soamɩŋŋaʊzannɔ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaa barɛ, mimbʊnyaa lɔmbaa nɔ an ta ʊ.
Lɔ bɩ, har nɔ bɛɛ an ta ʊ dɔmɩm haay y. Har nyɩ b'ɩ har ʊ dɔmɩm haay.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, kʊ Nyɩ b'awɔɔ bɔ lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ nyɩntam soamɩŋŋaʊzannɔ.
Mɔɔ dɔ *Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Kʊ mɔɔ lemim bɩ bɩr gasʊrɛ awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ n'a kam mɔɔ meeyaa ma.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ. B'awɔɔ, hɔ k'awɔɔ ma a zɩ zi b'awɔɔ n'a bam!»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ zɩ m Abraham m.» Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ Abraham nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, k'a Abraham zi ba.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ sɩra kʊ mɔɔ ma Woso zi bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto. Abraham n naa ba y.
B'awɔɔ, a zɩ zibəə awɔɔ n'a bam.» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Jaandarɛnyɩnɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y! Wɔɔ Zɩ deem bala, a m Woso m.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ Zɩ m Woso nɩ, awɔɔ mɔɔ ŋʊam, bala, m to mɔɔ ʊ Woso zi, m bʊr. Mɔɔ n bʊr m mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y. A ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Bɔ minto m, awɔɔ bɩr mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ marɛ? Bala, awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a a tʊr ka mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma y.

Awɔɔ zɩ bɩ n Sʊtaana m. B'awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a zɩ bɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba. Gərzer m tee… a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ. A n gɔɔta sɩra nɔ ʊ y, kʊ sɩra ba a nɔ ʊ bɩ minto. K'a ɩ ŋʊaar barɛ, meerbaa k'a n'a nɔ ʊ b'a n'a bam, bala, ŋʊaarzaa m, bɩ ŋʊaar zɩ m sɔ.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ sɩra hɩm bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ bɩr sɩra kam mɔɔ ʊ y.
Awɔɔ bire ʊ, nka y'a da ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: mɔɔ mimbʊnyaa ba? Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ ɩ sɩra hɩrɛ, bɔ m, awɔɔ bɩr a sire?
Gʊaa k'an Woso gʊaa bɩ, Woso lemim an n'a tʊr kam ma. Kʊ Woso gʊɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, awɔɔ bɩr a tʊr kam mɔɔ ma y.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ, Samarii gʊaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, bɩ zinə nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ gumə ba ʊ ra?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zinə ba kan mɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m Zɩ daŋ ʊ, awɔɔ n bɔkarɛ an nɩ mɔɔ bɔŋ ʊ!
Mɔɔ bɩr m karɛ m mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʊrɛ ma y. Bɩ, gʊaa ta ʊ, an nɩ mɔɔ daŋ ʊ, an nɩ dʊdɔ karɛ.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ gʊaa mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si, a bɩ gam fɩɩga y.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ʊ ʊ, zinə nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Abraham ga kan *wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ sɔ, ɩbɩɩ n bʊr ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʊ: Kʊ gʊaa mɔɔ mim si, a bɩ gam fɩɩga y.
Lɛ ɩbɩɩ da wɔɔ yaaba Abraham k'a ga bɩ ra ra? Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gɩnga sɔ! Ɩ mɩŋŋa sa ɩbɩɩ ʊ nka?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ m lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʊ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ jɩ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ n'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ n'a hɩm ma, a Woso bɩ.
Awɔɔ n a dɔ y, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ. Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ n a dɔ, m ba mɔɔ nawʊm ŋʊaarzaa a n'awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ mɔɔ dɔ, m n'a meerbaa sim.
Awɔɔ yaaba Abraham b'a heer nyɔɔ, an a ka mɔɔ dɔmɩm bɩ yɩrɛ ma. B'a a yɩ, a heer nyɔɔ.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ dɔɔraa n busoor ku y, ɩbɩɩ n bɔkarɛ ɩ Abraham yɩ!»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: dɔmɩm kʊ Abraham n nyɩnta ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ ta ʊ.»
Ŋ n jaarɔ gʊr k'a gʊngʊɛɛn. Yeezuu n a nyaakʊm da, an bɔ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Yeezuu k'a nɩ cenim bɩ, a gʊaa yɩ, an yɩ kan bʊʊbaa kɩ.
A *karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, nka ɩ mimbʊnyaa ba an yɩ kan bʊʊbaa kɩ? A y'a ba gɛɛ, a zɩrɔ nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y, b'a zɩrɔ bɛɛ sɔ y. Bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ, kʊ Woso zibəə bɩ n a hɩnka a gʊr zi!
A a ga m, k'ʊ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi ba, kʊ woso lɛ n gɔɔta an bɩr ta ʊ. Kʊ gum da, gʊaa b'a dam ma an zi ba y.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ durnya nɔ ʊ bɩ, durnya lɛɛgure m mɔɔ m.»
Kʊ Yeezuu meer ba maam bɩ, a lihi da tara ʊ, an taa bɩ yɔɔ lihi bɩ m, an a gʊr, an a nɔ bʊʊ bɩ mɩnyaa bɩ ma,
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ta ɩ yaa hi da ɩ meer ʊ Silowee bɔrkɔ ʊ.» Tɔ naa do lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: nyɔɔdarɛ. Bʊʊ bɩ n ta, an aa hi bɩ da a meer ʊ. K'a wusigə an nɩ doom bɩ, a mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm.
A cɩsɔnnɔ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a yɩ biisi an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Naa bɛɛ tɩr nyɩnta an bɩr hɔ yɩnyɛm bɩ ra?»
Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «A mɩŋŋa m!» Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: «A bɛɛ y, a bɔkʊʊrɛzaa m.» Bʊʊ bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ mɩnyaa b'a ba lɔ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩrɛ?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Yeezuu b'ɩ taa yɔɔ, an a nɔ mɔɔ mɩnyaa bɩ ma, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: Ta ɩ yaa hi da ɩ meer ʊ Silowee bɔrkɔ ʊ. Mɔɔ n ta, m aa hi da m meer ʊ, mɔɔ mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa b'ɩ ka?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n a dɔ y.»
Ŋ n gʊaa k'a nyɩnta bʊʊ bɩ gaa, ŋnɩ ta m *farizɛɛnrɔ zi.
Yeezuu k'a taa bɩ yɔɔ an a mɩm bɩ gʊm bɩ, a ba a ʊ *sabaa hinni ʊ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a lar sɔ, k'a ba a ʊ lɔ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm gɛ? A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Taa a yɔɔ, an a nɔ mɔɔ mɩm ma, mɔɔ m hi da m meer ʊ, m nɩ lɛɛ yɩm.»

Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ barla gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do, Woso gʊaa bɛɛ y, a bɩr zum sabaa hinni lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ y.» Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: «Gʊaa mimbʊnyaabər y'a bam lɔ an bɩr hoserlo barɛ ncɩnaaʊ?» Mim naa do farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ gʊngʊ kʊ ma.
Ŋ n a ya, ŋn'a hɩ bʊʊ bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm gʊaa k'a ɩbɩɩ waa bɩ jɛ ʊ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «*Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa m.»
Bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a si ŋ ʊ, a nyɩnta bʊʊ, an mɩm n bɔkarɛ an gʊ y. Pakra m kʊ ŋ n'a zɩrɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋnɩ laaka da ŋ han.
Ŋ n laaka naa do da ŋ han, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ nyɩ m gʊaa naa do m, awɔɔ n a dɔ, a ʊ, yɩ a ʊ kan bʊʊbaa kɩ gɛ? Bɩ, a a ba lɔ, an nɩ lɛɛ yɩm kɛɛrɛ?»
A zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ, «Wɔɔ dɔ paan… ʊ ʊ, wɔɔ nyɩ m, bɩ yɩ a ʊ bʊʊ.
Bɩ, wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a ba a ʊ lɔ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm kɛɛrɛ y. Kʊ nka y'a mɩm bɩ gʊ, wɔɔ n bɩ zaa dɔ sɔ y. K'a lar, nyɩ bɛɛ m dɔ y. A a da ma, an a mim dɩnda a zim!»
A zɩrɔ wɔɔ ɩ nyi bam zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, ŋnɩ meer ba ncɩnaaʊ. Bala, jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kʊ ma, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ, a ʊ: Yeezuu bɩ, *Krista m, k'a bɔ a zi.
Bɩ y'a ka, a zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Nyɩ bɛɛ m dɔ y, k'a lar.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ gʊaa k'a yɩ bʊʊbaa nɔ ʊ bɩ bir a hɩɩya hɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Nyi ba Woso m, ɩ sɩra hɩ! Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa naa do mimbʊnyaabər m.»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ mimbʊnyaabər nɩ y. Hɔ deem mɔɔ dɔ, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnta bʊʊ, bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ yɩm kɛɛrɛ.»
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ a a ba ɩbɩɩ nɩ? A ba a ʊ lɔ an ɩbɩɩ mɩm bɩ gʊ?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka, m a dɩnda awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a tʊr ka ma y, gɛɛ lɔ? Bɔ minto m, a a ya, an nɩ mɔɔ larlɛ? A hɩ awɔɔ ʊ k'a ba a karɩndanyɩnɔ sɔ ra?»
Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'a sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ n a karɩndanyɩ! *Moyiisi karɩndanyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
Wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʊ, Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ, bɩ naa do naa, wɔɔ n a dɔ k'a to a ʊ ka y.»
Gʊaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zɛkədə mim n naa! Awɔɔ n a tojɩ dɔ, b'a a ka mɔɔ mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm la!
Wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʊ, Woso bɩr a tʊr kam mimbʊnyaabənno ma y. Bɩ kʊ gʊaa ɩ Woso daŋ ʊ, an n'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ, Woso y'a tʊr kam bɩ zaa ma.
Gʊaa n a ma cɩna, ŋ ʊ, gʊaa ɩ gʊaa k'a yɩ kan bʊʊbaa kɩ bɩ mɩm gʊ y.
Gʊaa naa do, kʊ Woso gʊaa ɩ bɛɛ, a b'a dam ma, an hɔsɩ ba y.»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Yɩ ɩbɩɩ ʊ mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ, ɩ bʊr, ɩ nɩ karɩnda dɩndam wɔɔ m na?» Ŋ n la ra an bɔ, ŋn'a bɔ a zi.
Yeezuu k'a a ma a ʊ, ŋ la ra bɩ, a bʊr zi an b'a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ɩ sɩra kam *Gʊaanyɩ b'ʊ ra?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Nka nɩ, Zuuba, kʊ m sɩra ka ʊ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ yɩ, an nɩ meer bam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ naa.»
Gʊaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ sɩra ka ɩ ʊ, Zuuba.» A n kukurə zɛ a taa.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ durnya naa nɔ ʊ dʊdɔ minto, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mɩm bɩr lɛɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ yɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n a ba bʊʊrɔ.»
Farizɛɛnrɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, bʊʊrɔ m wɔɔ m sɔ gɛ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ bʊʊrɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ mimbʊnyaa bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ y. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, k'awɔɔ ʊ, a mɩm ɩ lɛɛ yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ mimbʊnyaa bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʊ.»
«Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a n gasʊ seero bakʊ lɛ nɩ y, an bɔkarɛ an bɔɔra m, an gasʊ, bɩ zaa bɩ, koor m, hɔyɔrɛzaa m sɔ.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a gasʊ bakʊ bɩ lɛ m bɩ, bɩ zaa m seero wɔɔ dundor.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ dɔm cɛlɛ ma bɩ n'a gʊm dundor bɩ m, seero wɔɔ n a tʊr ka a leer ma. A n a seero wɔɔ bir deem-deem ŋ tɔ ma, an bɔ ŋ nɩ garga ra.
K'a bɔ ŋ nɩ haay, ka an nawʊrɛ ŋ lɛɛ, seero wɔɔ n zu a jɛ ʊ, kʊ ŋ y'a leer dɔ bɩ minto.
Ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ, ŋnɩ zu saana jɛ ʊ y. A si ŋ nawʊm, ŋn'a gʊ saana bɩ ma, bala, ŋ n saanarɔ leer dɔ y.»
Yeezuu n *hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom naa do da ŋ nɩ, bɩ ŋ n hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ m bakʊ bɩ lɛ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ lɛɛ ŋnɩ bʊr lɔ wɔɔ, konno m, hɔyɔrɛzannɔ m sɔ. Bɩ, seero wɔɔ n a tʊr ka ŋ ma y.
Mɔɔ m bakʊ bɩ lɛ. Kʊ gʊaa gasʊ mɔɔ m, a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm. A gasʊrɛ, an bɔ, an bʊr, an hɔbɩrɛ yɩ an a bɩ.
Koor bɩr zɛm k'a hɩ bɛɛ a ʊ, k'a koor ba, k'a gər zɛ, k'a hɔ zar y. Bʊr mɔɔ ʊ kʊ gʊɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa yɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a yɩ an bʊr bɔ.»
«Mɔɔ m dundor mɩŋŋa. Bɩ dundor mɩŋŋa bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa an n'a kam a seero wɔɔ minto.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ zi bam busoo minto bɩ, seero wɔɔ dundor bɛɛ nɩ y, bɩ ŋ zaa bɛɛ sɔ y. K'a tampa yɩ an nɩ zɛrɛ, a si an nawʊrɛ, an n'a gʊm seero wɔɔ ma. Tampa bɩ n a da ŋ bir, ŋn'a hɩsɩga.
Kʊ gʊaa bɩ, a ka an nawʊm busoo ma bɩ, a leer ba seero wɔɔ mim ma y.
Dundor mɩŋŋa m mɔɔ m. Mɔɔ m seero wɔɔ dɔ, bɩ mɔɔ seero wɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ,
amba mɔɔ Zɩ mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ nɩ m Zɩ dɔ bɩ m. Bɩ, m mɩsɩrbaa mɔɔ n'a karɛ m seero wɔɔ minto.
Seero gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʊ, ŋ ba bakʊ naa do ʊ y, bɩ mɔɔ brɔɔ gaam, m bʊr ŋ nɩ. Ŋ zɛm b'a tʊr ka mɔɔ leer ma. Bɩ, seero bakʊ nyɩntam deem a dundor deem.
Mɔɔ Zɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ, bala, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩsɩrbaa karɛ, kʊ m m ya, m b'a si.
Gʊaa bɛɛ nɩ mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ sire y, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa n'a kam. Mɔɔ m da ma, m a ka, mɔɔ m da ma, m a si. Mɔɔ Zɩ ɩ lɛ naa do ka mɔɔ ʊ.»
Minno nɔɔn duro a ya, an zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ gʊngʊ kʊ ma.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta yɩ ŋ barla, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zinə nɩ kan kɩ, hɔɔzaa m, bɔ minto m, a n'a tʊr karɛ a meerbaa ma?»
Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ zinə n nɩ kan kɩ meerbaarɔ bɛɛ m naa y. Zinə y'a dam ma, an bʊʊ mɩm gʊ ra?»
N ɩ Zerizalɛm *Wosocɛ bankarɛ tɔdaanɔʊ cibsa bam. Nyɩnta a ʊ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm.
Yeezuu nɩ bɩmbɩrm Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ Salomɔɔn laŋŋa gʊta kʊ n y'a dɔ jaa m bɩ taa b'ʊ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ bɩr ma, ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ *Krista n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ wɔɔ tore ʊ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ, an ta, an dɔmɩm kara ku? A hɩ wɔɔ m paan…!»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n a si y, ziro kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ barɛ m Zɩ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ bɩr a sire y, kʊ mɔɔ seero bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Mɔɔ seero wɔɔ y'a tʊr kam mɔɔ leer ma, bɩ mɔɔ ŋ dɔ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ zum mɔɔ jɛ ʊ.
Bɩ mɔɔ *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ karɛ ŋ ʊ. Ŋ bɩ gam fɩɩga y. Bɩ, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an ŋ bɔ mɔɔ wɔ ʊ y.
Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ lɛ da hɔ haay ra, bɩ gʊaa ba ʊ an b'a dam ma, an hɔ bɔ Zɩ bɩ wɔ ʊ y.
Mɔɔ kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ, wɔɔ deem.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ jaarɔ gʊr k'a gʊngʊɛɛn.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ka awɔɔ m zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to Zɩ zi rɔ wɔɔ yɩ. Brɔɔ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ k'a mɔɔ gʊngʊɛɛn ra?»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Zibəə mɩŋŋa barɛ minto bɛɛ y'a ka, wɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ gʊngʊɛɛnrɛ y, sʊnsɔ k'ɩbɩɩ wʊ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m gʊaa, ɩ bɔkarɛ, ɩ n'ɩ mɩŋŋa bam Woso bɩ minto m.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ŋ n a gʊrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʊ awɔɔ *lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʊ ra? ‹Mɔɔ hɩ: wosoro n'awɔɔ m.›

Wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba *Wosoci nɔ ʊ bɩ zar y. Woso gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a lemim ma rɔ wɔɔ bir wosoro. Awɔɔ y'a hɩm gʊaa kʊ Zɩ b'a nyɔɔ bɩ ma, a ʊ, sʊnsɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a wʊrɛ, kʊ mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʊ Woso Nyɩ m mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Gʊaa kʊ Zɩ b'a bɔ ʊ, an a nyɔɔ durnya ʊ, b'awɔɔ ʊ, Woso sʊnsɔ an n'a wʊrɛ. Bala, kʊ mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʊ Woso Nyɩ mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ m Zɩ zi ba, a bɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ y.
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ y'a barɛ, baa k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, k'a sɩra ka a zibəə bɩ minto, k'a bɔkarɛ a dɔ mɩŋŋa, a ʊ, Zɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan Zɩ kɩ.»
Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋn'a ŋʊam k'a nyasʊ. Yeezuu n a yɔ ŋ nɩ.
Yeezuu n a wusigə an ta Zʊrdɛn kɔ lɛ ra zeezi, bɩncɛ kʊ Zaan a sɩŋŋɩda ba ʊ, an nɩ *batɛm kaŋ ʊ b'ʊ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta n bʊr zi, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Zaan n hoser deem taan… ba y, bɩ hɔ haay k'a hɩ gʊaa naa do minto bɩ, sɩra m.»
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ gʊta sɩra ka ʊ b'ʊ.
Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, an nɩ yaaba m. A tɔ m Lazaar. Betanii gʊaa m. Maarii kan a cɛmba Martɩ kɩ kʊ m bɩ.
Maarii bɩ do ɩ tidəər nɔ Zuuba ma, an a minkə gaa, an a nʊnnɔ a gannɔ ma bɩ. A dakumboor Lazaar ɩ bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ.
A danlʊrɔ wɔɔ n nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa a hɩ Yeezuu m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa k'ɩbɩɩ ŋʊa bɩ bɩ laafɩɩ y.»
Kʊ Yeezuu a ma bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Yaaba naa do, zɛ yaaba bɛɛ y, zɛ an nawʊm Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ m. A minto n'a kam Woso Nyɩ bɩ n daʊrɛ yɩ.»
Yeezuu nyɩnta an Martɩ ŋʊa kan a danzaa bɩ kɩ, Lazaar kɩ.
Baa k'a a dɔ a ʊ, Lazaar bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ, a gɔɔta bɩncɛ k'an ta ʊ b'ʊ dɔmɩm hɩɩya.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ a karɩndanyɩnɔ m, a ʊ: «Ʊ ʊ bɔ, ʊ ta Zidee ʊ.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, zɩɩfʊrɔ a ka ma dɩɩtaa k'a ɩbɩɩ gʊngʊɛɛn jaarɔ m, ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa k'ɩ ɩ ya, ɩ ɩ bɔ, ɩ ta b'ʊ ra?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A n a sa dɔgta m an ta yirbəə ra lɛɛgure bɛɛ m ta ʊ wakatɩ bueerehɩɩya ra? Kʊ gʊaa ɩ tam lɛɛgure ʊ a bɩr a gəm zɛrɛ y, bala, a ɩ durnya naa do lɛɛgure yɩm.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa ɩ tam gunuu ʊ, a y'a gəm zɛm, bala, a mɩm bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y.»
K'a meer naa do ba an a nya bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Wɔɔ gʊaasɩba Lazaar hinceem ba, bɩ mɔɔ tam, m aa a gu.»
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, kʊ hinceem a ba, a laafɩɩ yɩrɛ.»
Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu bɩ, a ŋʊa a ʊ, k'a hɩ a ʊ, Lazaar ga. Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʊ, hinceem paan… mim an n'a dɩndarɛ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ paan…, a ʊ: «Lazaar ga.
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ n nyɩnta b'ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma, a sɩra ka. K'a wuti, k'ʊ ta zi.»
Toma kʊ n n'a birm Didim
b'a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Ʊ ta, kan kɩ, ʊ aa gɩnga sɔ.»
Yeezuu k'a lee ku bɩ, a yaa dɩga a n Lazaar bir. A birle dɔmɩm si lɛɛm.
Bɩ kʊ Betanii bɩ laatʊ Zerizalɛm ma bɩ, a ga kʊ a ba cilo kaakʊ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ bʊr gʊta k'a bɩ yaa da Martɩ m kan Maarii kɩ, ŋ dakumboor bɩ garɛ minto.
Kʊ Martɩ a ma, n ʊ, Yeezuu ɩ zɛm bɩ, a ta, an aa a zɛ ʊ, Maarii n gɔɔta har ʊ, an nɩ nyɩntam.
Martɩ n a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, kʊ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʊ naa ʊ, mɔɔ dakumboor bɩ bɩ garɛ y.
Bɩ, an gɔɔta naa, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ n n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ, a y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ dakumboor bɩ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.»
Martɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ dɔ, a y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ durnya nyarɛ ma.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ m mɩmbɔʊrɛ, mɔɔ m *mɩsɩrbaa. Gʊaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, baa k'a zaa ga, a mɩsɩrbaa yɩrɛ.
Bɩ gʊaa k'an mɩsɩr, an nɩ sɩra kam mɔɔ ʊ, a bɩ gam fɩɩga y. Ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka naa ʊ ra?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩɩn… Zuuba, mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ m *Krista, Woso Nyɩ k'a a ga m an bʊr durnya ʊ bɩ.»
K'a meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a a hʊr, an aa a danzaa Maarii bɩ bir, an a hɩ m sɩnsɛɛrɛ m, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba bʊr, an n'ɩbɩɩ birm.»
Maarii k'a naa ma bɩ, a wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ, an ta zi.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Yeezuu n gasʊ kʊ b'ʊ cɩna y. A gɔɔta an nɩ bɩncɛ kʊ Martɩ a zɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta kan Maarii kɩ har ʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ bra bam nɩ. Kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ an wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ an bɔ bɩ, ŋ zu a jɛ ʊ, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʊ, ta an nawʊm yaa ra b'ʊ k'a yaa nyi ka.
Maarii k'a yaa lee ku bɩncɛ kʊ Yeezuu n ta ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, k'a a yɩ lɛɛm bɩ, a sʊnta a taa an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, kʊ nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʊ naa ʊ, mɔɔ dakumboor bɩ bɩ garɛ y.»
Yeezuu k'a yɩ, an nɩ nyi kam kan zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ yaa a da zaa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a heer a zɛ kʊ ma.
A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «A bir awɔɔ ʊ ka?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, bʊr ɩ dɩga a.»
Yeezuu n nyi ka.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «K'a dɩga a, a a ŋʊa gʊta!»
Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ barla, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a bʊʊ k'a yɩ kan bʊʊbaa kɩ mɩm gʊ bɩ, a b'a dam ma, an a ka Lazaar bɩ gam na?»
Yeezuu heer n a ya, an a zɛ kʊ ma, an a hʊr an ta yaa ra b'ʊ. Nyɩnta a ʊ ci yaa, ŋ n jaa ta a lɛ bɩ rɛ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a jaa bɩ gʊ rɛ.» Gər bɩ danlʊ Martɩ bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, a ji nyɩntaŋ ʊ, a dɔmɩm si hɔ n naa.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ ʊ, k'ɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, ɩ Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩm na?»
Ŋ n jaa bɩ gʊ rɛ. Yeezuu n a bɔɔta, an dɩga brama, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, mɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ si bɩ minto.
Mɔɔ dɔ, mɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ sim dɔmɩm haay, bɩ meer bɩ ba mɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr mɔɔ ma naa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto, kʊ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a si, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.»
K'a meer ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a həən si kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Lazaar, bɔ!»
Gər bɩ n bɔ, a gannɔ kan a wɔrɔ kɩ nɩ kʊsɩm kan pɛɛrarɔ kɩ, pɛɛra nɩ burgure a meer ma. Yeezuu n a hɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «K'a pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ hʊnhʊr ma, k'a to k'an ta!»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ duro gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta kan Maarii kɩ jɩr ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba bɩ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ, gʊta sɩra ka ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta, ŋn'aa *farizɛɛnrɔ yɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
*Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ a so kʊ ma, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ wɔɔ n n'a barɛ? Gʊaa naa do ɩ hoserlo bam gʊta.
Kʊ wɔɔ to an n'a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ gʊaa haay sɩra kaŋ ʊ, *Rɔm zannɔ zɛm, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ *Wosocɛ bɩ da, kan wɔɔ do bɩ kɩ.»
Ŋ gʊaa deem k'a tɔ m *Kayiifʊ b'ɩ nyɩnta wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ dɔɔraa bɩ do ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ marɛ y.
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, a jɩra kʊ gʊaa deem n ga, gʊaa haay minto kʊ wɔɔ do bɩ b'a zar haay ra?»
A mɩŋŋa hɔɔndarɛ bɛɛ m meerbaa naa do nɩ y, kʊ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m dɔɔraa bɩ do ʊ bɩ, Woso lemim naa do da a lɛ ʊ, a ʊ: Pakra m kʊ Yeezuu m ga do bɩ minto,
bɩ do bɩ minto bɛɛ m bala y, k'a Woso nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ y'a hɩsɩga bɩ so kʊ ma lɛɛ deem ʊ.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ, ŋ y'a cɩnta ŋ ʊ, k'a zɛ gər.

Bɩ minto y'a ka, Yeezuu n a ya, an nɩ bɩmbɩrm paan… zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ y. A ta bɩncɛ niŋŋə k'an jɩnjɛɛm poohɔɔn ma b'ʊ, kʊ niŋŋə kʊ n n'a birm Efrayim ʊ b'ʊ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, *pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ. Pakkɩ bɩ k'a gɔɔta booti m bɩ yirbəə m gʊɔɔ gʊta a to bɔlɛɛmarɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ mɩŋŋa *hubɔrɛ zibəə minto.
Ŋ n'a kam Yeezuu ma, bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ yɩ Wosocɛ ʊ, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʊ lɔ? A bɩ zɛm cibsa bɩ ma ra!»
*Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan *farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛ ka, ŋ ʊ: Gʊaa k'a bɩncɛ dɔ kan a hɩ k'a ku a nyasʊ.
*Pakkɩ cibsa k'a gɔɔta dɔmɩm sɔrdɩ bɩ, Yeezuu ta Betanii ʊ, kʊ kʊ Lazaar n ta ʊ b'ʊ. Kʊ bɩ do a Lazaar mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ.
N yirbəə hɔbɩrɛ ba b'ʊ, n n a ka Yeezuu ʊ. Martɩ nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ jirm, bɩ ma bɩ, Lazaar ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ barla.
Maarii n tidəər nyɔɔ kʊ n y'a ba naar paan… m a lɛ n kʊsɩ bɩ sa gedre ʊ, an a nɔ Yeezuu gannɔ ma, an a minkə gaa an a nʊnnɔ ma, tidəər ji bɩ n sʊr har bɩ ma haay.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʊ gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ Yeezuu nyasʊ a ka b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
«Bɔ minto, n n tidəər naa do sa, n n a hɛɛ *deniyee zɔɔkarkʊ, n n a ka cicirzannɔ ʊ?»
K'a hɩ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam cicirzannɔ ma y. Bala, a mɩŋŋa koor m, k'a y'a so busoo bɩ zibəə b'ʊ bɩ, a ɩ hɔ kʊ n n'a cɩntam bɩ kʊnam.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a to! Naa do ba an nawʊm mɔɔ birle dɔmɩm minto.
Cicirzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay, bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay y.»
Bɩ ma bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ cir gʊta a ma, ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu bʊr b'ʊ. Ŋ n bʊr zi, bɩ ŋ n bʊr a minto bala y, bʊr ŋ y'a ʊ k'a bɩ Lazaar k'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ yɩ.
*Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta k'a Lazaar zɛ gər sɔ,
bala, a minto y'a ka, zɩɩfʊrɔ gʊɔɔ gʊta n'a gʊrɛ ŋ ma, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu mim sim.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, gʊɔɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ bʊr cibsa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu ɩ zɛm Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ,
ŋ bɛ gɔ lɛɛ yɩnyar, ŋnɩ ta k'a yaa a zɛ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«*Hozaana! Gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm Woso tɔ ma,
*Israyɛl cir bɩ n barka yɩ.»
Yeezuu brapoo yɩ, an da ʊ, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba bɩ m:
*Siyɔn zannɔ, a da bɩ bɔ ʊ y.
Ba awɔɔ cir nɩ zɛm n na.
Da a ʊ brapoo ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm naa jɩ dɔ hɔɔ y. Bɩ, kʊ ŋ Yeezuu lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gʊrsɩra ba a minto bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, bɩ naa ba ŋ y'a ʊ a minto.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta kan Yeezuu kɩ dɔmɩm k'a Lazaar bir yaa ʊ an bɔ, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a kasɛtɩ ka.
Bɩ gʊɔɔ gʊta bʊr zi. Kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʊ, a hoser naa do ba bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ bʊr k'a b'a zɛ ʊ.
*Farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ yɩ, a dɔ a ʊ, a b'a dam ma, a hɔsɩ ba y. K'a dɩga gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ zure a jɛ ʊ!»
Cibsa k'a n ta ʊ bɩ minto, grɛkkɩrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ der k'a Woso da ʊ.
Ŋ n a hɩ Galilee kʊ Bɛtsayɩdaa gʊaa Filipi m, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ harzaa, wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʊ Yeezuu yɩ.»
Filipi n ta, an aa hɩ Andɩr m, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋn'a hɩ Yeezuu m.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Wakatɩ a ku kʊ *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m: kʊ hɔyaa a zo tara ʊ, a n ga y, gɔɔta an nawʊrɛ a deem. Bɩ, k'a ga, nyɩ an n'a dam gʊta.
Gʊaa k'a a mɩsɩrbaa ŋʊa, a b'a yɩrɛ y. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a kaanm a mɩsɩrbaa m durnya naa do nɔ ʊ, a mɩsɩrbaa yɩm *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a mɔɔ zi ba k'an zu mɔɔ ʊ, bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ n ta ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ zibəənyɩ bɩ nyɩntam b'ʊ sɔ. Gʊaa k'a mɔɔ zi ba, Zɩ y'a daŋ ʊ.
Naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ heer a zɛ kʊ ma, bɩ, kʊ m a hɩ mɔɔ ʊ lɔ? Kʊ m a hɩ, mɔɔ ʊ: M Zɩ, mɔɔ bʊmbɔ wakatɩ naa do ma gɛɛ? Bɩ, wakatɩ naa do minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n bʊr.
Zɩ, ɩ lɛ bɔ ɩ tɔ ʊ.»
Leer n a to brama, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n lɛ bɔ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m m lɛ bɔ ʊ.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋnɩ leer bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ, brama ɩ həən si. Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ, malɛɛka ɩ meer ba kan kɩ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Leer naa do n bɔ mɔɔ minto y, bɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ minto.
Durnya naa do dʊdɔ karɛ n naa kɛɛrɛ, bɩ, n lam durnya naa do cir bɩ ra, an bɔ garga ra.
Bɩ kʊ n mɔɔ busu brama durnya burə ʊ, mɔɔ gʊɔɔ haay gaarɛ m zi.»
Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba Yeezuu ʊ, k'a a zɛ zaa hɩnka.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «*Lɛrɔ ci b'a dɩnda wɔɔ m, a ʊ: *Krista gɔɔtam dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ. Ɩbɩɩ ba lɔ, ɩ n'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʊ, n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ busum brama? Gʊaanyɩ naa do, nka nɩ?»

Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Lɛɛgure gɔɔta awɔɔ minto dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ. Bala, lɛɛgure k'a gɔɔta an ta ʊ bɩ, k'a ta a nɔ ʊ, a b'a ka monsigə bɩ n zɛ awɔɔ ra y. Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ tam monsigə ʊ bɩ n a dɔ kʊ ta an nawʊm ka y.
Kʊ lɛɛgure bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʊ bɩ, k'a sɩra ka lɛɛgure b'ʊ, k'a a ba lɛɛgure nyɩnɔ.»
Yeezuu k'a meer ba kan ŋ kɩ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a a hʊr an a nyaakʊm da ŋ lɛɛ.
Baa kan hoserlo k'a ŋ ba ŋ mɩm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, ŋ n sɩra ka ʊ y,
kʊ hɔ kʊ *wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ n bɩ n kʊ yɩ: ‹Zuuba, nka ɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ hɩ bɩ si? Nka Zuuba a paŋŋa hɩnka nɩ?›
Ezayii deem-deem b'a hɩ kʊ bɔ minto y'a ka, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a si y:
‹A ŋ mɩm ta, an ŋ heer ka, kʊ ŋ mɩm b'a da ma an lɛɛ yɩ, kʊ ŋ heer b'a da ma an a jɩ ma y, kʊ ŋ b'a bɔ a taam, kʊ m ŋ waa y.›
Ezayii naa do hɩ, bala, a Yeezuu lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ yɩ, an a mim dɩnda.
Kan bɩ kɩ haay, jɩtannɔ wɔɔ barla, gʊta a mim si. Bɩ, *farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ minto, ŋ bɩr a kasɛtɩ karɛ y. Bala, ŋ yɩ nyi bam, ŋ y'a la a ra *sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ ŋ n'a ŋʊarɛ, ŋ bɩr a kam Woso hɔ ma y.
Yeezuu n a leer busu, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, sɩra bɛɛ a ka mɔɔ ʊ y, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a sɩra ka ʊ.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'a n'a yɩrɛ.
Mɔɔ m lɛɛgure, m bʊr durnya ʊ, kʊ gʊaa k'a nɩ sɩra kam mɔɔ ʊ bɩ bɩ gɔɔta monsigə ʊ y.
Kʊ gʊaa mɔɔ lemim ma, b'a n a si y, mɔɔ bɛɛ n n'a dʊdɔ karɛ y. Bala, mɔɔ n bʊr kʊ m bɩ durnya dʊdɔ ka y, bʊr mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m bɩ durnya bʊmbɔ.
Gʊaa k'a kaanm mɔɔ m, a n mɔɔ lemim bɩ si, a zaa dʊdɔkər ta ʊ. Lemim kʊ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ y'a dʊdɔ kam durnya nyarɛ hinni ʊ.
Mɔɔ n m mɩŋŋa mim dɩnda y, Mɔɔ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ b'ɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ m ga m, m a hɩ bɩ hɩ mɔɔ m, kʊ m a hɩ.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, a lɛ bɩ, *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m. Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, a hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ amba mɔɔ Zɩ a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.»
*Pakkɩ cibsa k'a n a ku cɩna bɩ, Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʊ a wakatɩ a ku bɩ, k'a bɔ durnya nɔ ʊ a a wusigə a Zɩ zi bɩ, a a mɩŋŋa gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ durnya ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa kan ŋʊarɛ gʊta kɩ.
A bʊr an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, bɩ ma bɩ, Sʊtaana hɔɔndarɛ da Sɩmɔɔn nyɩ Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʊ gʊaa bɩ heer ʊ, k'an a nyasʊ an a ka.
K'a a dɔ a ʊ, Zɩ bɩ hɔ haay zar a wɔ ʊ bɩ, b'a to a ʊ Woso zi, a a bɔ an nɩ tam zi bɩ,
Yeezuu wuti hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ra, an a zaba bɩ bɔ a ra, an a cɩnta, an pɛɛra sa an a so a ʊ.
A n hi tɔ mɔr ʊ, an a sɩŋŋɩda ba an n'a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gannɔ sʊrgɔm, an nɩ pɛɛra k'a so a ʊ bɩ nʊnnɔrɛ ŋ ma.
A n aa lee ku Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr zi. Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «A n a ga m, k'ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ gannɔ sʊrgɔ y, Zuuba!»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ n hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ jɩ dɔ cɩna y, b'ɩbɩɩ zɛm b'a dɔ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩ mɔɔ gannɔ sʊrgɔm fɩɩga y!» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ n ɩbɩɩ gannɔ sʊrgɔ, mɔɔ gʊaa bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ y.»
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩ bɩ mɔɔ gannɔ sʊrgɔ bala y, mɔɔ wɔrɔ sʊrgɔ sɔ kan mɔɔ mim kɩ!»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a a zʊr bɩ lɛ baa zʊrlɛ ma dɔ y, bala, a hu bɔ jilli. B'awɔɔ, dintim b'awɔɔ ma dɔ y. Bɩ, awɔɔ haay bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ a ma y.»
Bala, a gʊaa k'a n'a nyasʊm k'a ka bɩ dɔ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ haay hu bɛɛ bɔ y.»
Yeezuu ka ŋ gannɔ sʊrgɔ an a nya bɩ, a a huu bɩ sa, an a da a ra, an nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ m bɩ jɩ dɔ ra?
Awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ birm, Karɩnsaamba gɛɛ Zuuba, a maam karɛ, bala, a m mɔɔ m.
K'awɔɔ Zuuba kan a karɩnsaamba kɩ m mɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n awɔɔ gannɔ sʊrgɔ, b'awɔɔ a ga m sɔ a kʊ gannɔ sʊrgɔ.
Bala, makra mɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ minto bɩ, k'a ba sɔ.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, zibəənyɩ n lɛ da a karɩnsaamba nɩ y, bɩ zibəəzaa kʊ n y'a nyɔɔ n lɛ da gʊaa k'a nyɔɔ bɩ nɩ y.
K'awɔɔ naa haay dɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ ba maam, mimbirenyɩntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ bɩr meer bɩ barɛ awɔɔ haay minto y. Mɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ dɔ. Kʊ *Wosoci bɩ meerbaa naa do n kʊ yɩ: ‹Gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ bɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ b'a ba mɔɔ jɩm.›
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ, kʊ mim bɩ n lee ku cɩna bɩ minto, k'a bɩ bʊr, k'a sɩra ka, a ʊ: A n ta ʊ bɩ m mɔɔ m.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ mɔɔ gʊaa nyɔɔ, n n a si, mɔɔ n yɩ m si, bɩ kʊ n mɔɔ si, Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ n y'a si.»
Kʊ Yeezuu meer ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a heer a zɛ kʊ ma, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ gʊaa deem mɔɔ nyasʊrɛ an mɔɔ ka.»
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam kʊ ma, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larlɛ kʊ nka mim an n'a hɩm gɛ.
Karɩndanyɩ deem kʊ Yeezuu nyɩnta an a ŋʊa bɩ nyɩnta a jɩr ʊ.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n kʊtɩ zɛ m, a ʊ, an laaka da han: «Nka an n'a hɩm ma gɛ?»
Karɩndanyɩ bɩ n zerga Yeezuu cɩ ra, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, nka nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ nɩ bur nyɔɔm taanm ʊ m a ka ʊ bɩ, bɩ m.» K'a bur kur bɩ nɔ ma bɩ, a a ka Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʊ gʊaa Sɩmɔɔn nyɩ Zidas ʊ.
Zidas k'a bur kur bɩ si bɩ, Sʊtaana gasʊ ʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ. Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ k'ɩ ʊ k'ɩ ba bɩ, a ba zɔɔ.»
Ŋ haay kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem n a dɔ kʊ bɔ minto, an naa hɩ y.
Kʊ Zidas n ta busoo bɩ m bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʊ, a hɩ Yeezuu ʊ k'an aa cibsa bɩ mɔdrɔ si, gɛɛ, an aa hɔ niŋŋə ka cicirzannɔ ʊ.
Zidas k'a bur bɩ kur bɩ si bɩ, a bɔ lɛɛm: Bɩ ma bɩ, gum da.
Zidas k'a bɔ bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ, a ʊ: «Naa ma bɩ, *Gʊaanyɩ bɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, bɩ Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ a tɔ ma.
Woso y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ a zi, bɩ k'a yɩ poore Woso y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ.
M nyɩnɔ, dɔmɩm gɔɔta poore kʊ mɔɔ n gɔɔta kan awɔɔ kɩ. Awɔɔ y'a kam mɔɔ ma. Amba mɔɔ hɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ m bɩ m, bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ bɩ lee kum b'ʊ y. A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ sɔ.
Lɛ daa mɔɔ n n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ: k'a kʊ ŋʊa. Amba mɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ, k'a kʊ ŋʊa maam sɔ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊaa haay y'a dɔrɛ, a ʊ, mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ ɩ kʊ ŋʊarɛ.»
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ta ɩbɩɩ n nawʊm ka?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ zu mɔɔ ʊ ɩ ta bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ taŋ ʊ b'ʊ cɩna y, bɩ k'a yɩ poore, ɩ zɛm bɩ zu mɔɔ ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, bɔ minto mɔɔ bɩ m dam ma, m zu ɩbɩɩ ʊ dɩɩtaa? Mɔɔ yɩ m mɩŋŋa meeyaa karɛ ɩbɩɩ minto!»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'ɩ mɩŋŋa meeyaa ka mɔɔ minto nɩ? Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, ɩbɩɩ bɩsɩ kam mɔɔ ma gallɛm kaakʊ, koo n bɔkarɛ, an baa da.»
«A b'a heer zar y. K'a sɩra ka Woso ʊ, k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ sɔ.
Cɛrɔ ta ʊ gʊta mɔɔ Zɩ har ʊ. Kʊ n bɛɛ mɔɔ b'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ m aa bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ bɩ banka y.
Kʊ mɔɔ bɩ ta, m aa a banka awɔɔ minto, mɔɔ yɩ m bɔrɛ, m b'awɔɔ gaa, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʊ mɔɔ m ta ʊ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n bɩr b'ʊ sɔ.
Awɔɔ bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ taŋ ʊ bɩ zaa dɔ.»
Toma n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, wɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ ta ɩbɩɩ nawʊm ka y. Wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ, k'ʊ zaa bɩ dɔ?»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n zaa, kan sɩra kɩ, *mɩsɩrbaa kɩ. Gʊaa b'a dam ma, an ta Zɩ zi kʊ mɔɔ minto bɛɛ y.
Kʊ nyɩnta awɔɔ ʊ a mɔɔ dɔ, awɔɔ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ dɔm sɔ. Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ dɔ, a yɩ sɔ.»
Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, Zɩ bɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m, bɩ wɔɔ bɔ.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ laatʊ, ɩbɩɩ n gɔɔta, ɩ n mɔɔ dɔ ra, Filipi! Gʊaa k'a mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a Zɩ bɩ yɩ sɔ. Bɔ minto ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, n n Zɩ hɩnka ɩ nɩ?
Ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ kan Zɩ kɩ, Zɩ bɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ ra? Meerbaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ bɩr ŋ barɛ, m mɩŋŋa paŋŋa nɩ y! Zɩ k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ n'a mɩŋŋa zi barɛ.
K'a mɔɔ mim si a ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ kan Zɩ kɩ, Zɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɩ, k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si, k'a si zibəəro nɔɔn duro minto.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, gʊaa k'a sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, a zibəəro kʊ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ barɛ. A zibəəro bam gʊta, ŋnɩ lɛ da nawɔnnɔ m, bala, ta mɔɔ nawʊm Zɩ zi.
Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ n n'a yɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ y'a barɛ, kʊ Zɩ m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ Nyɩ bɩ zi.
K'awɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə yɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma, mɔɔ y'a barɛ.
K'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ, k'a mɔɔ lɛrɔ si, a zu ŋ ʊ.
Mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ m Zɩ han k'an Daahanzaa vanta ka a ʊ, k'an gɔɔta kan awɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm haay.
A m sɩra *Ɛspri, durnya b'a dam ma an a si y. Bala, n bɩr a yɩrɛ, bɩ n n a dɔ sɔ y. B'awɔɔ dɔ, bala, a ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, an n'awɔɔ heer ʊ.
Mɔɔ b'awɔɔ tom sʊnnɔ y, mɔɔ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi.
A gɔɔta poore, durnya b'a yarɛ an mɔɔ yɩ y. B'awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩm mɩsɩr, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam sɔ.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ kan Zɩ kɩ, awɔɔ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ zure ŋ ʊ bɩ, a zaa ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊam. Gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ, mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ y'a ŋʊam sɔ, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ y'a ŋʊarɛ, m m hɩnka m.»
Ziidi, Zidas Iskarɩyɔtɩ kʊ gʊaa bɩ bɛɛ y, bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ ɩ ɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m, b'ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ hɩnkam durnya nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ, a zum mɔɔ lemim ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ Zɩ y'a ŋʊarɛ. Wɔɔ zɛm zi, ʊ bɩ gɔɔta kan kɩ.
Gʊaa k'a n mɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ bɩr zum mɔɔ lemim ʊ y. Bɩ lemim k'awɔɔ n'a mam naa, mɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y, a to a ʊ Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi.
Nawɔnnɔ hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m kʊ mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ minto.
Daahanzaa Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʊ Zɩ n n'a nyɔɔm mɔɔ tɔ minto bɩ hɔ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m, a hɔ haay kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ laafɩɩ to awɔɔ m, m nɩ m laafɩɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ. Mɔɔ bɩr a karɛ amba durnya n'a kam bɩ nɩ y. A b'a ka a heer n a zar gɛɛ, a da n bɔ ʊ y.
Awɔɔ ma mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ cenim, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m bɔrɛ, m bʊr awɔɔ zi. K'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ, awɔɔ y'a heer nyɔɔm kʊ mɔɔ nɩ tam Zɩ zi bɩ minto. Bala, Zɩ bɩ lɛ da mɔɔ ra.
Minno nɔɔn duro hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m naa ma, bɩ ŋ n a ku cɩna y. Kʊ ŋ b'a ku, k'a ŋ si.
Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ, m meer gʊta ba kan awɔɔ kɩ y. Bala, durnya cir b'ɩ zɛrɛ. B'a hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ gʊr zi y.
Bɩ, kʊ durnya n a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ yɩ m Zɩ ŋʊarɛ, m nɩ zi barɛ amba Zɩ lɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ m. K'a wuti, k'ʊ cem.»
«*Dɩvɛn gɔ paan… m mɔɔ m, bɩ wutuzaa m mɔɔ Zɩ m.
Mɔɔ vəŋŋə haay k'a bɩr nyɩ dam bɩ, n y'a zɛm la, n n a zo. Bɩ, mɔɔ vəŋŋə haay k'a nyɩ da bɩ, n y'a bankarɛ, k'an nyɩ da an lɛ da biisi ra.
Awɔɔ lɛɛ ka, a bankarɛ yɩ kan lemim kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.
K'a gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ amba mɔɔ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ m. Bala, kʊ dɩvɛn gɔ vəŋŋə bɩ n gɔɔta kan kɩ, a b'a dam ma, an nyɩ da a zim y. B'a hɔdeem k'an awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ n a naasʊ mɔɔ ma y.»
«Mɔɔ m *dɩvɛn gɔ, awɔɔ n'a vəŋŋoo. Gʊaa k'a a naasʊ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ nɩ m naasʊ ma sɔ, a zaa nyɩ dam gʊta, bala, kʊ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔsɩ ba y.
Kʊ gʊaa n a naasʊ mɔɔ ma, n y'a zom garga ra, amba gɔvəŋŋə kʊ n y'a zɛ ra hɔ bɩ m, an ga, n n'a gʊr n n'a da sɛ rɛ, an a bɩ.
K'awɔɔ a naasʊ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ lemim bɩ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, awɔɔ n hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ yɛ, a y'a yɩrɛ.
K'awɔɔ nyɩ da gʊta, bɩ n nɩ nyɩntam mɔɔ Zɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ, b'awɔɔ gɔɔtam mɔɔ karɩndanyɩnɔ.»
«Kʊ Zɩ mɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʊa sɔ. K'a gɔɔta mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
K'awɔɔ zu mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ gɔɔta mɔɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, amba mɔɔ nɩ zum m Zɩ lɛrɔ ʊ, m gɔɔta a ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ nɩ, kʊ mɔɔ heernyɔɔ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ heernyɔɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋa paan….»
«Ba mɔɔ lɛ bɩ n na: k'a kʊ ŋʊa, amba mɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ m.
Gʊaa ŋʊarɛ ba ʊ an lɛ da gʊaa k'a mɩsɩrbaa ka zɛ ma gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ ŋʊa rɔ wɔɔ minto y.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ, k'awɔɔ ba, mɔɔ gʊaasɩbɔɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m awɔɔ bir, m zibəənyɩnɔ y, bala, zibəənyɩ bɩ n hɔ k'a zuuba n'a bam bɩ dɔ y. Awɔɔ bir mɔɔ nawʊrɛ, m gʊaasɩbɔɔ, bala, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ma m Zɩ zi bɩ, mɔɔ ka awɔɔ n a dɔ.
Awɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ y, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bɔ ʊ, m zibəə ka awɔɔ ʊ, k'a ta, k'a nyɩ da, k'awɔɔ nyɩ bɩ nya y. Bɩ y'a ka, k'awɔɔ hɔ haay yɛ mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ han mɔɔ tɔ ma, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm k'awɔɔ n a ba bɩ, k'a kʊ ŋʊa.»
«Kʊ durnya sɔ awɔɔ m, k'a dɔ a ʊ, lɛɛ a ka an sɔ mɔɔ m.
Kʊ durnya bɩ zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, durnya bɩ hɔ k'a so ʊ bɩ ŋʊam. Bɩ durnya bɩ zannɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bɔ ʊ durnya nɔ ʊ a hɔ, bɩ y'a ka, durnya n sɔ awɔɔ m.
K'a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ: zibəənyɩ n lɛ da a zuuba ra y. Kʊ ŋ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma, ŋ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ. Kʊ ŋ zu mɔɔ lemim b'ʊ, ŋ zure awɔɔ hɔ ʊ sɔ.
Ŋ naa haay barɛ awɔɔ m mɔɔ tɔ ma, bala, ŋ n Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ dɔ y.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ nɩ bʊr ŋ bire ʊ, m bɩ hɔ k'an ta ʊ hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ mimbʊnyaa bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ y. Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ mimbʊnyaa bɩ sugur ba ʊ y.
Gʊaa k'a sɔ mɔɔ m, sɔ a ʊ mɔɔ Zɩ m sɔ.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ nɩ zibəəro nɔɔn duro kʊ gʊaa n a ba rɔ nɔɔm ba ŋ bire ʊ, ŋ mimbʊnyaa bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ y. Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ yɩ ŋ yɩ, ŋn'a gu, ŋn'ɩ sɔm wɔɔ m, mɔɔ kan m Zɩ kɩ.
A lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʊ, lemim kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba ŋ *lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʊ bɩ kʊ yɩ. ‹N sɔ mɔɔ m, b'a jɩ ba ʊ y.› »
«Kʊ mɔɔ ta m Zɩ zi, mɔɔ Daahanzaa bɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ m. Sɩra *Ɛspri k'a n'a tore m Zɩ zi bɩ, a mɔɔ kasɛtɩ karɛ a zim.
Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam, bala, awɔɔ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ.»
«Naa haay hɩ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ b'a gəm zɛ y.
Ŋ larɛ awɔɔ ra *sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ. Dɔmɩm ta ʊ an nɩ zɛm, gʊaa k'a n'awɔɔ zɛm gər bɩ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, mannɩ a ba, a ka Woso ʊ.
Ŋ y'a barɛ awɔɔ m ncɩnaaʊ, bala, ŋ n Zɩ dɔ, ŋ n mɔɔ dɔ sɔ y.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ m, kʊ wakatɩ bɩ bɩ bʊr, k'a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.»
«Mɔɔ n lɛɛ ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ y, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ naa ma bɩ, ta mɔɔ nawʊm Zɩ k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ zi, b'awɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ, gʊaa ba ʊ, an nɩ mɔɔ larm, a ʊ: ta ɩ nawʊm ka?
Kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ heer n a zar.
Sɩra mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m. Awɔɔ daahan minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ tarɛ. Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ n doo, Daahanzaa bɩ bɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi y. Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ doo, mɔɔ y'a nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ m.
