K'a mɩŋŋa bɩ bʊr, a mimbʊnyaa, tɩrgabaa kan dʊdɔkarɛ kɩ, kʊ ŋ lʊnlɔ, a y'a hɩnkam durnyazannɔ m.
Mimbʊnyaa bɩncɛ ʊ, ŋ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ y.
Tɩrgabaa bɩncɛ ʊ, ta mɔɔ nawʊrɛ m Zɩ zi, b'awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ y.
Dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, n durnya cir bɩ dʊdɔ ka.»
«Hɔ gʊta ta ʊ mɔɔ n n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ b'a dam ma, a ŋ si naa ma y.
Kʊ sɩra *Ɛspri bɩ bɩ bʊr, a y'awɔɔ dam sɩra haay zaa ra, bala, a bɛɛ n n'a mɩŋŋa meer barɛ y, bɩ, a hɔ k'a n'a mam bɩ hɩrɛ, a hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m.
A y'a lɛ bɔm mɔɔ ʊ, bala, a hɔ k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ sire, an a hɩ awɔɔ m.
Hɔ haay kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ n tam bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n a hɩ, mɔɔ ʊ, a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a hɩm bɩ hɩrɛ awɔɔ m.»
«A gɔɔta poore, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ mɩm ʊ y, bɩ k'a yɩ poore sɔ, awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩm.»
A karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ a a ŋʊa k'a hɩ wɔɔ nɩ? A gɔɔta poore awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm ʊ y, b'a gɔɔta poore awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩrɛ, gɛɛ, ta mɔɔ nawʊrɛ, m Zɩ zi?»
Ŋ n a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Poore naa do jɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ lɔ? Wɔɔ bɩr hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ dɔrɛ y!»
Yeezuu k'a a dɔ a ʊ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a lar bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Laaka awɔɔ n'a dam kʊ han k'a mɔɔ mim bɩ jɩ dɔ ra? A gɔɔta poore awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm ʊ y, poore awɔɔ mɔɔ yɩrɛ.
Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nyi karɛ, a zee da, durnyazannɔ n bɩr a heer nyɔɔm. Awɔɔ heer y'a zarm, b'awɔɔ heerzar y'a bam heernyɔɔ.
Kʊ lʊ ɩ nyɩ yɩrɛ, a ɩ busum ma, a dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ minto. Bɩ k'a nyɩ bɩ yɩ, a fɩr yɩrɛ bɩ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ. Heernyɔɔ gʊta ɩ kan kɩ k'a nyɩ yɩ durnya ʊ bɩ minto.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, awɔɔ nɩ heerzar nɔ ʊ naa ma, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m awɔɔ yɩ heernyɔɔ nɔ ʊ, bɩ, heernyɔɔ bɩ do, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an a zar y.
Ncɩnaaʊ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ lar hɔsɩ minto y. Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ hɔ yɛ mɔɔ Zɩ han mɔɔ tɔ ma, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.
A n ta, an dɩɩtaa ku, awɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma y. K'a hɔ yɛ, a y'a yɩrɛ, k'awɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa paan….»
«Naa haay hɩ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ m *hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom m, bɩ wakatɩ ɩ zɛm mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ, m meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ ncɩnaaʊ y. Mɔɔ Zɩ bɩ mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m paan….
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ hɔ yɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n a hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ yaa dam Zɩ m awɔɔ tɔ ma y.
Bala, Zɩ b'awɔɔ ŋʊa. K'awɔɔ mɔɔ ŋʊa, a si sɔ, a ʊ, m to mɔɔ ʊ Woso zi bɩ minto.
M to mɔɔ ʊ Zɩ zi, m bʊr durnya ʊ. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, bɔ mɔɔ nawʊm durnya ʊ, m n nɩ tam Zɩ zi.»
A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ba ɩbɩɩ nɩ meer bam paan… kɛɛrɛ ɩ wɔ saa hɔbɔkʊrɛnoom darɛ haay ma na.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ ɩbɩɩ hɔ haay dɔ, ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa kʊ gʊaa n ɩ lar y. Bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n a dɔ mɩŋŋa wɔɔ ʊ, ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʊ Woso zi.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Dɩɩtaa awɔɔ bɔkarɛ an n'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, awɔɔ sɩra ka kɛɛrɛ ra?
Ba wakatɩ n nɩ zɛm na, b'a lee ku kɛɛrɛ, awɔɔ hɩsɩga dam, gʊaa biyəə n bɩr tarɛ a lɛ a lɛ, a mɔɔ to m deem. Bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m deem nɩ y, Zɩ ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ m k'a laafɩɩ yɩ mɔɔ zi. Awɔɔ ɩ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ durnya naa do nɔ ʊ. Bɩ k'a heer ba kookoo, mɔɔ bʊr durnya ra.»
Kʊ Yeezuu meer ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a a bɔɔta an dɩga brama, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «M Zɩ, wakatɩ a ku, ɩ Nyɩ bɩ tɔ busu, k'ɩ Nyɩ bɩ n a da ma, an ɩ tɔ busu sɔ.
Paŋŋa k'ɩbɩɩ ka ʊ gʊaa haay burə ʊ bɩ, a *mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ kam gʊɔɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ, kʊ ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ dɔ bɩ m, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m Woso a deem paan… kan gʊaa k'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔ Yeezuu *Krista bɩ kɩ.
Mɔɔ m lɛ bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ tara burə ʊ. Zibəə k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ kʊ ma ba bɩ, mɔɔ ba, m a nya.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zɩ, mɔɔ da ʊ ɩ zi, cirbəə niŋŋə kʊ mɔɔ n ta m ɩ zi, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n nyɩnta ʊ bɩ m.»
«Gʊɔɔ niŋŋoo k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ bɔ ʊ durnya nɔ ʊ, ɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ tɔ hɩnka ŋ nɩ. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ, ɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ, bɩ ŋ zu ɩbɩɩ lemim b'ʊ.
Ŋ y'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ŋ ʊ, hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, a to a ʊ ɩbɩɩ zi.
Lemim kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ m. Ŋ y'a si, ŋn'a dɔ sɩra paan… ŋ ʊ, bɔ mɔɔ ʊ ɩbɩɩ zi, ŋn'a si, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ŋ minto. Mɔɔ bɩr yaa dam durnya minto y, yaa mɔɔ n'a dam gʊɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto. Ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ m.
Bɩ, hɔ haay k'an mɔɔ hɔ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ m sɔ, amba hɔ haay k'a n'ɩbɩɩ hɔ bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ m. Mɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ ŋ gʊr zi.
Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ maasɩrɛ bam durnya nɔ ʊ dɔ y, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ ŋ n bɩr durnya nɔ ʊ. Zɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. M Zɩ mɩŋŋa, dɔ ŋ ma ɩ tɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr deem, amba wɔɔ n deem bɩ m.
Kʊ mɔɔ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ bɩ, dɔ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ŋ ma ɩbɩɩ tɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto. Mɔɔ ku ŋ la, bɩ ŋ gʊaa deem n nyaam nɩ y, kʊ n bɩ m, nyaanlɛzaa bɩ m, kʊ *Wosoci meerbaarɔ wɔɔ n kʊ yɩ.»
«Zɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi kɛɛrɛ, bɩ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba mɔɔ nawʊm durnya nɔ ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩ haay.
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ lemim bɩ ka ŋ ʊ, durnya n sɔ ŋ nɩ, kʊ durnya hɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ, amba durnya hɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Mɔɔ n a yɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ ŋ bɔ durnya ʊ y, bɩ, k'ɩ dɔ ŋ ma Sʊtaana minto.
Durnya hɔɔ bɛɛ y, amba durnya hɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ m.
A ka k'ɩ sɩra bɩ n ŋ ba a hɔ. Ɩbɩɩ lemim bɩ sɩra m.
Amba ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ durnya nɔ ʊ bɩ, ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʊm durnya nɔ ʊ sɔ.
Ŋ minto, mɔɔ yɩ m mɩŋŋa kam, kʊ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka sɩra minto.»
«Yaa bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a darɛ ŋ minto bala y. Yaa mɔɔ n'a dam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ minto sɔ.
Zɩ, kʊ ŋ haay n bɩr deem amba ɩbɩɩ n nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ m. Kʊ ŋ n nyɩnta kan wɔɔ kɩ sɔ, kʊ durnya n a si, a ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Bɩ mɔɔ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr deem amba wɔɔ n deem bɩ m.
Kʊ mɔɔ n bɩr kan ŋ kɩ amba ɩbɩɩ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ m. Kʊ ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra deem kʊ durnya n a dɔ a ʊ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ, ɩ ŋ ŋʊa amba ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ m.»
«Zɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa bɩncɛ kʊ mɔɔ n ta ʊ bɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩ nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ b'ʊ sɔ, kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ bɩ yɩ, bala, ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ ka ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n nyɩnta ʊ y.
M Zɩ k'an tɩrga, durnya k'a n ɩbɩɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ dɔ. Bɩ, nawɔnnɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ.
Mɔɔ ka ŋn'ɩbɩɩ dɔ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m a ka ŋn'ɩ dɔ, kʊ ŋʊarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ ŋʊam bɩ m nyɩnta ŋ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n bɩr kan ŋ kɩ.»
Kʊ Yeezuu meer bɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a a hʊr kan a *karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an bra Sedrɔn bɔrkɔ bɩ ma. Gɔsɩra nɩ b'ʊ, an gasʊ ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zidas k'a n'a nyasʊm k'a ka bɩ bɩncɛ bɩ dɔ, bala, Yeezuu tɩr ta b'ʊ kan a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zidas ka *Rɔm sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ kʊ *wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ŋ ka rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan *farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʊr gɔsɩra ʊ b'ʊ kan yar mɔr kɩ, fɩtɩrɛrɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ sɛ gungu.
Yeezuu k'a hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a a zɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Nka awɔɔ n'a kam ma?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu.» A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «A m mɔɔ m.» Bɩ, Zidas k'a n'a nyasʊm k'a ka bɩ yɩ ŋ barla.
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a kur m, ŋn'a dundo.
Yeezuu n a ya, an ŋ lar, a ʊ: «Nka awɔɔ n'a kam ma?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu.»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ ʊ, a m mɔɔ m. K'a ka awɔɔ nawʊm mɔɔ ma, k'a nawɔnnɔ to, ŋnɩ cem.»
Meerbaa kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ bɩ, kʊ an n'a yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ: «Gʊɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ n deem to, an nyaam y.»
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr nyɩnta kargʊ m, an a gaa ʊ, an wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ zɛ an a bɩsɩ tʊr gʊ ma. Zibəənyɩ bɩ do tɔ m Malkus.
Yeezuu n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Ɩ bɔ, ɩ ɩ kargʊ bɩ du a caan ʊ. Mɔɔ bɩ fɩryɩrɛ niŋŋə kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ yɩm na?»
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ kan a cir bɩ kɩ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ Yeezuu nyasʊ, ŋn'a wɔrɔ sur.
Lɛɛ ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ ta m Hannɩ zi. Bɩ, Hannɩ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ zim m *Kayiifʊ m. Kayiifʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m dɔɔraa bɩ do ʊ.
Kayiifʊ deem-deem bɩ do ɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ dʊndɔ, a ʊ: kʊ gʊaa deem ga gʊaa haay minto, a jɩra bɩ.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr kan karɩndanyɩ vanta kɩ zu Yeezuu jɛ ʊ. Bɩ, kʊ wosocɛmannɩbər bɩ karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ dɔ bɩ, a gasʊ kan Yeezuu kɩ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ har ʊ b'ʊ.
Pɩyɛɛr n jɩm garga ra, hallɛ ma, karɩndanyɩ deem kʊ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ b'a dɔ bɩ bɔ, an meer ba kan lʊ k'a nɩ dɔm har bɩ lɛ ma bɩ kɩ, an Pɩyɛɛr gaa, an gasʊ m.
Zibəənyɩlʊ k'a nɩ dɔm hallɛ ma bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ ra?» Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ayy…, a bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.»
Zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɛ hɛ, ŋn'ɩ nyɩ kam ma, bala, nyɛɛm ɩ barɛ. Pɩyɛɛr nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an nɩ nyɩ kam ma sɔ.
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ nɩ Yeezuu larm a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kan a hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ kɩ.
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ pa da gʊaa haay m, mɔɔ hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m dɔmɩm haay *sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ kan *Wosocɛ ʊ kɩ, bɩncɛ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ haay n'a som kʊ ma ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyaakʊm da, m a hɩ y.
Bɔ minto m, ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ larlɛ? Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a tʊr ka mɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ lar. Ŋ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.»
Yeezuu k'a naa hɩ bɩ, Wosocɛ dɔmazaa deem k'a nyɩnta b'ʊ b'a wɔ ta rɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto m, ɩbɩɩ n'a nyɩ bɔm wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m ncɩnaaʊ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ ŋʊaar mɔɔ ba, k'ɩ hɩ m m. Bɩ kʊ sɩra mɔɔ hɩ, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ mɔɔ zɛrɛ?»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Hannɩ a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu sur, ŋnɩ ta m wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ *Kayiifʊ zi.
Bɩ ma bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr ɩ nyɩ kam sɛ ma. N n a hɩ m, n ʊ: «A karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m na?» Pɩyɛɛr n bɩsɩ ka, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ bɛɛ y!»
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zibəənyɩ kʊ Pɩyɛɛr a tʊr gʊ ma bɩ danyɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n ɩbɩɩ yɩ gɔsɩra ʊ b'ʊ kan kɩ ra?»
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an bɩsɩ ka. Lɛɛm bɩ, koo n baa da.
Ŋ bɔ Yeezuu m Kayiifʊ har ʊ, ŋnɩ ta m dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ. Bɩ ma bɩ, wutigʊta m. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ta m nɔ wɔɔ n gasʊ dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ y, a y'a *dintim ka a ma, a n a da ma a *pakkɩ cibsa bɩ bɩ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, *Pɩlatɩ n bɔ an ta ŋ zi garga ra b'ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Bɔ mim awɔɔ n'a kam gʊaa naa do ra?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa naa do, kʊ zibʊnyaa bɛɛ a a ba, wɔɔ y'a nyasʊrɛ ʊ a ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ ra?»
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a gaa a dʊdɔ ka a zim amba awɔɔ *lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ m.» Zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «N n lɛ ka wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ gər zɛ y!»
Meerbaa kʊ Yeezuu a ba, a zɛ zaa minto bɩ, yɩ an nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, an kʊ yɩ.
Pɩlatɩ n gasʊ dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an Yeezuu bir an a lar, a ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ cir n'ɩbɩɩ m nɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ nɩ naa hɩrɛ ɩ zim gɛ? Gɛɛ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ mɔɔ mim hɩ ɩbɩɩ nɩ?»
Pɩlatɩ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Ɩbɩɩ dogʊɔɔ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ y'ɩbɩɩ nyasʊ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ! Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ba?»

Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ, durnya naa do hɔ bɛɛ y. Kʊ mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ durnya naa do hɔ nɩ, mɔɔ dɔmazannɔ yar bam kʊ ŋ bɩ mɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ ka zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ʊ y. Bɩ mɔɔ cirbəə bɩ, durnya naa do hɔ bɛɛ y.»

Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'a maam cir n'ɩbɩɩ m wa?» Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩ, ɩ zim, cir m mɔɔ m. Yɩ mɔɔ ʊ m bʊr durnya ʊ, kʊ m bɩ sɩra kasɛtɩ ka. Gʊaa k'a sɩra ŋʊa bɩ, a y'a tʊr kam mɔɔ leer ma.»
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ m sɩra?»
K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a a ya, an ta garga ra b'ʊ, an aa zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ yɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n mim kʊ gʊaa naa do a zar bɩ yɩ y.
K'a mim ka awɔɔ m, kʊ pakkɩ cibsa a zɔ, kʊ m gʊaa bɔ, m wɔ saa bɩ, awɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ m zɩɩfʊrɔ cir bɩ bɔ, m wɔ saa gɛ?»
Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Naa do bɛɛ y, k'a Barabas bɔ!» A n bɔkarɛ, Barabas bɩ do, gərzer m.
*Pɩlatɩ n a ka, ŋnɩ Yeezuu zɛ madɩɩrɔ m.
Rɔm sʊrdaarɔ n laa waa, ŋn'a ku a mim ma, ŋnɩ cinno huu kʊ n y'a ba pɛɛra piinə m sa, ŋn'a da ra,
ŋn'a zɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, zɩɩfʊrɔ cir!» Ŋ n'a wɔ tɩntam lɛ.
Pɩlatɩ n a bɔ, an bɔ garga ra, an a hɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ yɩ ra, mɔɔ y'a gaarɛ, m bɔ m garga ra naa ʊ. Awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʊ, mɔɔ n mim k'a a zar bɩ yɩ y.»
Yeezuu n bɔ garga ra b'ʊ, kan laa bɩ kɩ, cinno huu bɩ kɩ a ra. Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ba gʊaa bɩ n na.»

Kʊ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a sɩŋŋɩda ba, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ: «K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, k'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!» Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a gaa a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma a zim. Bala, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ yɩ, an a ba, an bʊnyaa y.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ɩ lɛ m, bɩ kan wɔɔ lɛ bɩ kɩ, a a ga zɛ m, bala, a a mɩŋŋa sa, an a ba Woso Nyɩ!»
Kʊ Pɩlatɩ mim naa do ma bɩ, dabɔʊ a nyasʊ an lɛ da biisi m.
A n a bɔ, an ta dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Ɩ to ɩbɩɩ ʊ ka?» Yeezuu n hɔsɩ nyɩ bɔ nʊ y.
Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ bɩr a nyɩ bɔm mɔɔ nʊ ra? Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ m da ma, m wɔ saa ɩbɩɩ ma ra, gɛɛ, mɔɔ m da ma, m a ka, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma ra?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ dam ma ɩ hɔsɩ ba mɔɔ m k'a a to bɛɛ n y'a ʊ brama, n n lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ y. Bɩ minto y'a ka sɔ, gʊaa k'a mɔɔ nyasʊ an mɔɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ, mimbʊnyaa gandaara a a ba!»
Bɩ tɛkka ma, Pɩlatɩ y'a kam ma k'a wɔ saa ma, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ nɩ zee darɛ ŋ ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ wɔ saa ma, *Rɔm cir gʊaasɩba bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m dɔ y! Bala, gʊaa k'a mɩŋŋa ba cir bɩ, cir bɩ jɩm m.»
Pɩlatɩ k'a naa ma bɩ, a a ka, ŋnɩ bɔ Yeezuu m. Pɩlatɩ n nyɩnta dʊdɔkarɛ gɔ bɩ ra, bɩncɛ kʊ n'a birm *ebree lemim m Gabata b'ʊ.
Pakkɩ cibsa *bankarɛ hinni m, sinuu ʊ. Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ cir bɩ ba n nɩ!»

Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ: «K'a zɛ gər! K'a zɛ gər! K'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma!» Pɩlatɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «M awɔɔ cir bɩ wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma ra?» Wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ba cir vanta m kʊ Rɔm cir bɛɛ y.»
Pɩlatɩ n Yeezuu ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu nyasʊ.
Yeezuu n a gɔdarkʊra busu a zim, an bɔ, an ta bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a birm Minkorgo, n n'a hɩm ma ebree lemim m Golgotaa b'ʊ.
Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ, ŋ y'a wɔ ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma kan gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kɩ, deem jɩsa, deem bɩsɩ, Yeezuu nɩ ŋ bire ʊ.
*Pɩlatɩ n gʊrsɩra ba warga ma, an a wɔ gɔdarkʊra b'ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Yeezuu Nazarɛtɩ gʊaa, zɩɩfʊrɔ cir.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ gʊɔɔ gʊta warga bɩ karɩnda ba, bala, bɩncɛ kʊ ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ bɩ laatʊ tara nɔ bɩ ma y. B'a gʊrsɩra ba n y'a ʊ ebree lemim m, grɛkkɩ lemim m, kan latɛn lemim kɩ m.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ *wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ Pɩlatɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩ b'a gʊrsɩra ba zɩɩfʊrɔ cir y, a gʊrsɩra ba: A a hɩ, a ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ cir n a mɩ.»
Pɩlatɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ gʊrsɩra ba bɩ, a ba mɔɔ ʊ.»
Kʊ Rɔm sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a huuro gʊr, ŋn'a jir lɛ si. Gʊaa biyəə a yɩ deem. Zaba b'ɩ gɔɔta. A ba n y'a ʊ deem jilli.

Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ʊ b'a kaansʊ y, ʊ pʊɛɛga da ma, ʊ dɩga a, kʊ nka n n'a yɩrɛ.» Kʊ *Wosoci bɩ meerbaa naa do n kʊ yɩ: ‹Ŋ mɔɔ huuro jinjir kan kʊ kɩ, ŋnɩ pʊɛɛga da mɔɔ zaba ma.› Hɔ kʊ sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ a ba bɩ n naa.
Yeezuu gɔdarkʊra bɩ jɩr ʊ bɩ, a da ɩ jɩnɩm b'ʊ kan a da bɩ dam kɩ, Klopas lʊ Maarii kɩ, kan Magdalaa kʊ Maarii kɩ.
K'a a da bɩ yɩ kan a karɩndanyɩ k'a ŋʊa bɩ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ a da bɩ m, a ʊ: «M naa, ba ɩ nyɩ n na!»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, an a hɩ a karɩndanyɩ bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ba ɩ da n na!» Wakatɩ bɩ do ma, karɩndanyɩ b'a da bɩ gaa, an doo m.
Yeezuu k'a a dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʊ, hɔ haay ba an nya, kʊ *Wosoci meerbaarɔ wɔɔ n kʊ yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɩsɩ nɩ mɔɔ zɛm.»
Gər ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ bɛɛ hɛɛnr n a han. Ŋ n *hizɔp gɔ sa ŋnɩ hɔ k'an mafʊ-mafʊ kʊsɩ ma, ŋn'a nyɔɔ bɛɛ hɛɛnr ma, ŋn'a ka Yeezuu ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu bɩ mi bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔ haay ba an nya.» A n a mim zuutə, an ga.

Kʊ pakkɩ cibsa *bankarɛ hinni m bɩ, nyibəə gasʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋ lɛ baa kʊ gəəno wɔɔ n gɔɔta gɔdarkʊrarɔ wɔɔ ma *sabaa hinni ʊ b'ʊ y. Sabaa bɩ do, cibsa gʊta m. Ŋ y'a yɛ *Pɩlatɩ han, k'a ŋ gannɔ yɩnyar, k'a ŋ zer gɔdarkʊrarɔ wɔɔ ma.
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma kan Yeezuu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ gannɔ yɩnyar: lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ kan a nyaʊrɛzaa bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku Yeezuu zi bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a, a ga kara, bɩ ŋ n a gannɔ yɩnyar y.
Bɩ sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem a hɔn sɔɔn m a boon ma, ma n bɔ kan hi kɩ.
Gʊaa k'a yɩ b'a kasɛtɩ ka, b'a kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m. B'a dɔ, a ʊ, sɩra an n'a hɩm, k'awɔɔ n a si sɩra sɔ.
Sɩra m, ba naa haay ʊ, kʊ *Wosoci meerbaa naa do n kʊ yɩ: ‹A yaarɔ wɔɔ haay deem taan… bɩ yarlɛ y.›
Wosoci bɩ bɩncɛ niŋŋə ta ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Ŋ zɛm bɩ gʊaa kʊ ŋ y'a hɔn bɩ yɩ.›

Minno nɔɔn duro kʊ ŋ cem bɩ, Arimatee kʊ gʊaa Zozɛf k'a nyɩnta Yeezuu karɩndanyɩ sɛɛrɛ, nyi k'a n'a bam zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto. A bɩ zaa yɛ *Pɩlatɩ han k'a Yeezuu gər bɩ sa. Pɩlatɩ n zaa ka, an bʊr an b'a gər bɩ sa.
Nikodɛm bʊr sɔ. A ɩ nyɩnta an ta Yeezuu zi gunuu ʊ bɩ. A *mɩɩr war kʊ ma kan tidəər kʊ n n'a birm alʊɛsɩ kɩ, n a a zɔ a cilo bukərku ma.
Ŋ n Yeezuu gər bɩ sa, ŋnɩ pɛɛrarɔ bumburgu ma kan tidəər kɩ amba zɩɩfʊrɔ gər birle m.
Brikə nɩ bɩncɛ kʊ ŋ Yeezuu wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma ʊ b'ʊ, brikə bɩ do nɔ ʊ, yaa daa nɩ b'ʊ, n n gər bir ʊ cɩna y.
Bɩ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n'a bankarɛ *sabaa k'a n'a bam k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa minto bɩ, bɩ yaa bɩ do k'an jɩnjɛɛm sɔ bɩ, ŋ Yeezuu bir ʊ.
*Hatʊ hinni b'ʊ wutigʊta m, bɩ ma bɩ dɔ n mɛ y, Magdalaa Maarii ta yaa ra b'ʊ, a yaa dɩga a, n jaa bɩ gʊ yaa bɩ lɛ rɛ.
A n bra si, an aa Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr yɩ, kan karɩndanyɩ deem kʊ Yeezuu a ŋʊa bɩ kɩ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «N Zuuba bɔ yaa b'ʊ, bɩ wɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ ta n y'a ʊ m ka y.»
Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ kan karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ kɩ, ŋnɩ ta yaa ra b'ʊ.
Ŋ hɩɩya haay bra si, karɩndanyɩ deem bɩ bra si, an cem Pɩyɛɛr han, an lɛɛ ka yaa ra b'ʊ.
A n zerga an pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ kuntəm b'ʊ. Bɩ, a n gasʊ y.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a zu a jɛ ʊ bɩ, a lee ku sɔ. A n gasʊ yaa bɩ nɔ ʊ, an pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ kuntəm b'ʊ,
kan pɛɛra kʊ n y'a burgu a mim ma bɩ kɩ. Bɩ, bɩ n nyɩnta kan pɛɛrarɔ wɔɔ kɩ y. A huŋŋu n y'a ʊ, n n a cɩnta bɩncɛ vanta ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩ k'a lɛɛ ka an lee ku bɩ gasʊ yaa ʊ b'ʊ kɛɛrɛ. A n a yɩ, an sɩra ka.
Bɩ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋ n *Wosoci bɩ jɩ ma y. Bala, a a hɩ, a ʊ, Yeezuu y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a wusigə, ŋnɩ doo.
Maarii gɔɔta garga ra yaa bɩ jɩr ʊ, an nɩ nyi kam. K'a nɩ nyi bɩ kam bɩ, a zerga, an dɩga yaa b'ʊ,
an malɛɛkarɔ yɩ hɩɩya, ŋn'ɩ huu furo m a ma, ŋnɩ nyɩnta bɩncɛ kʊ ŋ Yeezuu gər bɩ wʊta ʊ b'ʊ. Deem n'a mim ma, deem n'a gannɔ ma.
Ŋ n a hɩ lʊ bɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ nyi ɩbɩɩ n'a karɛ?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Zuuba n y'a busu, bɩ kʊ ta n y'a ʊ m ka, mɔɔ n a dɔ y.»
K'a nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, a a bɔ an dɩga, an Yeezuu yɩ an nɩ jɩnɩm b'ʊ, b'a n a dɔ, a ʊ, Yeezuu nɩ y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Lʊ, bɔ minto ɩ nɩ nyi karɛ? Nka ɩbɩɩ nɩ kam ma?» Lʊ bɩ hɔɔn ʊ bɩ, brikə bɩ dɔmazaa m, a ʊ: «Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ y'a busu, k'ɩ bɩncɛ hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ yaa busu.»
Yeezuu n a hɩm, a ʊ: «Maarii». A n a wusigə, an a hɩ m *ebree lemim m, a ʊ: «Rabuni» bɩ lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ mɔɔ da jɩm ʊ y, mɔɔ n ta m Zɩ zi cɩna y. Bɩ, ta ɩ yaa hɩ mɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ tarɛ m Zɩ k'a n'awɔɔ Zɩ bɩ zi, mɔɔ Woso k'a n'awɔɔ Woso bɩ zi.»
Magdalaa kʊ Maarii bɩ n b'a hɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Zuuba yɩ, hɔ k'a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ!»

Hinni bɩ do yirbəə m, k'a nyɩnta *hatʊ hinni bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ cɛlɛrɔ tɩnta a ma nyi kʊ ŋ n'a bam zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto. Yeezuu n bʊr, an bɩ jɩm ŋ bire ʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.»
K'a nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, a a wɔrɔ wɔɔ hɩnka ŋ nɩ kan a boon bɩ kɩ. Kʊ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ Zuuba yɩ bɩ, ŋ haay heer nyɔɔ.
Yeezuu n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ. Kʊ mɔɔ Zɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ nyɔɔm sɔ.»
K'a meer ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a hoon si ŋ ma, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a *Sɛnt-Ɛspri si.
Gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ n nɩ ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sugur yɩrɛ. Gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ sugur yɩrɛ y.»
Bɩ ma bɩ, bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem Toma kʊ n n'a birm Didim bɩ n nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ Yeezuu hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm b'ʊ y.

Karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ Zuuba yɩ!» A n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ n karɔ wɔɔ yaarɔ yɩ a wɔrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n m nyʊkʊm nyɔɔ ka yaa deem ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n m wɔ du a boon b'ʊ, mɔɔ b'a sire y.»
Dɔmɩm sinnyə kur bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ya, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra har ʊ b'ʊ, Toma nɩ kan ŋ kɩ. Yeezuu n bʊr, bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩnta, an bɩ jɩm ŋ bire ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, an a hɩ Toma m, a ʊ: «Ɩ zɔ, ɩ ɩ nyʊkʊm nyɔɔ naa ʊ, k'ɩ dɩga mɔɔ wɔrɔ ma, ɩ wɔ bɩ da mɔɔ mɛ ma, k'ɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ boon ʊ, k'ɩ sɩra ka kɛɛrɛ, k'ɩ ba sɩrakarɛzaa.»
Toma n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Zuuba, mɔɔ Woso.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ y'a ka, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ. Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n a yɩ, bɩ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ m.»
Yeezuu hoserlo ba gʊta karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʊ bɩ n n a gʊrsɩra ba ci naa do nɔ ʊ y.
Nawɔnnɔ gʊrsɩra ba n y'a ʊ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka, a ʊ, Yeezuu m *Krista, a m Woso Nyɩ. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ sɩra ka, k'a *mɩsɩrbaa yɩ a tɔ ma.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a ya, an a hɩnka a karɩndanyɩnɔ m Tiberiyaadɩ kɔ lɛ ra. A hɩnkarɛ bɩ ba n nɩ.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr kan Toma kʊ n n'a birm Didim bɩ kɩ, Galilee kʊ Kanaa gʊaa Natanayɛl kɩ, Zebedee nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ hɩɩya, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra.
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Ta mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ m aa zɔnɔ ba.» Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ tam kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ.» Ŋ n bɔ, ŋnɩ gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, bɩ gum bɩ do ʊ, ŋ n hɔsɩ nyasʊ y.
Bɩ ma bɩ, dɔ mɛ. Yeezuu n jɩm kɔ lɛ ra b'ʊ, bɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu nɩ y.
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Hey! Nyɩnɔ, zɔnɔ b'awɔɔ ʊ ra?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Ayy…»
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a zaŋŋa bɩ zo kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bɩsɩ ra, awɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ.» Ŋ n zaŋŋa bɩ zo, an zɔ gʊr gʊta, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a gaa y.
Karɩndanyɩ kʊ Yeezuu a ŋʊa bɩ n a hɩ Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Zuuba m!» Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr k'a a ma, n ʊ, Zuuba m bɩ, a huu sa, an a du a ma, nyɩnta a ʊ dɩgɩ, an a da hi b'ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ a bɔ, ŋnɩ bʊr kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ m, ŋn'ɩ zaŋŋa bɩ gaam, zɔnɔ n a han, ŋ bɩ laatʊ kɔ bɩ lezi ma y. A gakʊ ʊ a ba kan mɛtɩr zɔrɔ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ zer tara ʊ bɩ, ŋ sɛcɩna yɩ zɔ n ta ra kan bur kɩ.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a bʊr zɔnɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ gʊr dɩɩtaa rɔ wɔɔ m.»
Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr n a bɔ, an gasʊ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, an zaŋŋa bɩ gaa tara ʊ, zɔ gʊta-gʊta n a han zɔrɔ busoor yaa kaakʊ, bɩ kan bɩ kɩ haay zaŋŋa bɩ n kaansʊ y.
Yeezuu n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a bʊr a hɔ bɩ.» Bɩ karɩndanyɩ deem taan… n laaka da han, a ʊ: «Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m gɛ y?» Ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋ ʊ, Zuuba m.
Yeezuu n a zɔ kɛɛrɛ, an bur bɩ sa, an a ka ŋ ʊ. A n a ba zɔ bɩ m maam sɔ.
Yeezuu k'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ, a gallɛm kaakʊ hɔ a hɩnka a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ m naa.

Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kur bɩ, Yeezuu a hɩ Sɩmɔɔn Pɩyɛɛr m, a ʊ: «Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ ŋʊa an lɛ da nawɔnnɔ ra ra?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩɩn… Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʊarɛ.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɔ mɔɔ sinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ ma.»
Yeezuu n a hɩ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʊ: «Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊam na?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩɩn… Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʊarɛ.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɔ mɔɔ seero ma.»

A kaakʊ hɔ ma bɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩmɔɔn, Zaan nyɩnnɩ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊam na?» Pɩyɛɛr heer a zar kan hɔ kʊ Yeezuu a hɩ m a kaakʊ hɔ ma bɩ kɩ. «Ɩ ɩ mɔɔ ŋʊam na?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ haay dɔ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ ŋʊarɛ.» Yeezuu n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Dɔ mɔɔ seero ma.

Sɩra paan… mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta nyukumbueere bɩ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bankam, ɩ nɩ tarɛ ɩ hɔɔnhɔ bɩncɛ ʊ. K'ɩbɩɩ bɩ gusi, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ zarɔ hʊrm, gʊaa vanta n n'ɩbɩɩ banka, an ɩbɩɩ gaa, an ta ɩbɩɩ m bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa ʊ b'ʊ.»
Yeezuu bɩ meer naa do ba a ʊ k'a zɛ niŋŋə k'a nɩ Pɩyɛɛr zɛm, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ bɩ hɩnka. K'a meer naa do ba bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Zu mɔɔ ʊ.»
Pɩyɛɛr k'a a bɔ, an dɩga bɩ, a karɩndanyɩ kʊ Yeezuu a ŋʊa bɩ yɩ a jɛ ʊ. A ɩ nyɩnta hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, an zerga Yeezuu cɩ ra, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, nka n n'ɩbɩɩ nyasʊm, k'a ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ?»
Pɩyɛɛr k'a yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ Yeezuu m, a ʊ: «Bɩ naa, Zuuba, bɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ naa yɩ?»
Yeezuu n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ ʊ k'an gɔɔta an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre ku, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku? Ɩbɩɩ, zu mɔɔ ʊ.»

Meerbaa naa do minto y'a ka, n n so ra danyɩnɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ ʊ, karɩndanyɩ naa do bɩ garɛ y. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Yeezuu n a hɩ, a ʊ, a bɩ garɛ y. A a hɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ mɔɔ lɛ taa k'an gɔɔta, an ta an mɔɔ wusigəre ku, kara y'ɩbɩɩ ku?»
Karɩndanyɩ bɩ do nɩ minno nɔɔn duro kasɛtɩ kam, an nɩ ŋ gʊrsɩra barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʊ, a kasɛtɩ bɩ sɩra m.
Yeezuu a ya, an hɔɔ gʊtɔɔ ba. K'a gʊrsɩra n n'a bam deem-deem, mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ, durnya haay b'a dam ma, an ciro kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ gʊrsɩra bam nɔ wɔɔ si y.
Acts: Teofil, m lɛɛkarɛ ci bɩ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ Yeezuu zibəə haay k'a ba kan hɔ haay k'a dɩnda bɩ da ʊ, an a sa a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ,
an ta, an hinni k'a zibəəzannɔ bɔ ʊ, an a lɛrɔ ka ŋ ʊ, kan *Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, an ta an a dɔmɩm k'a der ʊ arzana ʊ bɩ ku.

Brɔɔ a a hɩnka ŋ nɩ mɩsɩr a zɛ bɩ kur, kan makrarɔ gʊtɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ ba ʊ kɩ, a ʊ: a a mɩm bɔ ʊ, a m mɩsɩr. A kasɛtɩ nyɩnta ʊ gʊta. Dɔmɩm busi nɔ ʊ, a a hɩnka ŋ nɩ, an nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
A nyɩnta an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩm kan ŋ kɩ hindeem ʊ, an lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, a ʊ: ŋ bɩ bɔ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ y, bɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta ŋnɩ dɔ Zɩ Woso lerbɔrɛ bɩ ma. «Hɔ niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n a hɩ m lɛ m bɩ.
Zaan hi batɛm ka denter, b'awɔɔ, naa kan dɔmɩm poore kɩ, awɔɔ batɛm sim Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ.»
Ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋnɩ laaka naa do da han, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba, naa ma ɩbɩɩ n nɩ Israyɛl cirbəə bɩ bankaŋ ʊ gɛ?»
A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ n a ga m k'a dɔmɩnnɔ kan wakatɩrɔ kɩ kʊ Zɩ Woso a cɩnta a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa m bɩ dɔ y.
Bɩ, awɔɔ paŋŋa yɩrɛ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔ m, an nɩ zɛm bɩ zer awɔɔ mim ʊ, a paŋŋa karɛ awɔɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ nyɩntam mɔɔ kasɛtɩzannɔ Zerizalɛm ʊ, Zidee haay kan Samarii kɩ haay, kan tara lɛ cɩnta jɩ kɩ.»
Kʊ Yeezuu minno nɔɔn duro hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, a der ŋ mɩnyaa m, warkʊ bʊr an b'a nyaam ŋ lɛɛ.
Kʊ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ dɩgam brama ma bɩ, gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ bʊr ŋnɩ huu fu du a ma, ŋnɩ bɩ jɩm ŋ jɩr ʊ.
Ŋ n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Galilee gʊɔɔ ra, bɔ minto m, awɔɔ n gɔɔta an nɩ dɩgam brama ncɩnaaʊ? Yeezuu naa do kʊ n y'a bɔ awɔɔ bire ʊ an der brama bɩ y'a bɔrɛ an bʊr maam, amba awɔɔ yɩ an der brama bɩ m.»
Kʊ ŋ zer ci kʊ n n'a birm Oliviyee ci bɩ ra bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ. Bɩ ci bɩ do, a ga a ʊ *sabaa dɔmɩm tarɛ m, amba n lɛ ka bɩ m.

Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku bɩ, ŋ der cɛ k'a nɩ mim ʊ b'ʊ, amba ŋ tɩr a ba biisi bɩ m. Bɩncɛ bɩ do, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ, Zakkɩ kɩ, Andɩr kɩ, Filipi kan Toma kɩ, Bartelemii kan Matiyee kɩ, Alfee nyɩ Zakkɩ kan Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n n'a birm *Zelɔtɩ bɩ kɩ, kan Zakkɩ nyɩ Ziidi kɩ tɩr kʊ zɛ ʊ.
Ŋ haay a zɛ kʊ ra lɛ deem ŋn'a tɔŋ ʊ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, kan lannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ Yeezuu da Maarii kɩ, kan Yeezuu danyɩnɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ, gʊɔɔ a so kʊ ma b'ʊ, ŋ lɛ n a zɔ zɔrɔ buhɩra ma. Pɩyɛɛr n wuti a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ:
«M danyɩnɔ, a ga a wʊm kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri mim k'a hɩ Davɩd lɛ m Wosoci nɔ ʊ Zidas k'a ka lɛɛ, ŋnɩ Yeezuu nyasʊ bɩ minto bɩ n kʊ yɩ.
A nyɩnta wɔɔ bire ʊ, an a hɔ jirle hɔ yɩ, wɔɔ zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, gʊaa bɩ do, zibəə bʊnyaa k'a a ba bɩ, a bɩ busoo bɩ sa, an tara si m. A do a ʊ a nɔ ra, a nɔ bɩ n haan, a nɔbaarɔ haay n bɔ, ŋnɩ sur tara ʊ.
Zerizalɛm gʊɔɔ haay a dɔ. Bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ tara bɩ birm a lemim m Hakɛldamaa, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: Ma tara.
Sɩra m, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba ncɩnaaʊ laarɔ ci nɔ ʊ:
K'a har n gɔɔta zer, kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʊ y.
Bɩ, a a ya an a hɩ, a ʊ:
Kʊ gʊaa vanta n a zibəə bɩ sa.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ wɔɔ da zaa ʊ lɛɛ haay ʊ dɔmɩm kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩsɩrbaa ba ʊ wɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ,
an a sa Yeezuu batɛm k'a a si Zaan zi bɩ ma, an ta an dɔmɩm k'a der ʊ arzana ʊ bɩ ku bɩ, a a ga m, kʊ ŋ gʊaa deem n a ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a mɩmbɔʊrɛ kasɛtɩzaa.»
N ŋ hɩnka hɩɩya, Zozɛf kʊ n n'a birm Barsabas, n nɩ so ra, n n'a tɔ ka Zistus bɩ m kan Matɩyas kɩ.
Ŋ n yaa da ncɩnaaʊ: «Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ gʊaa haay heer dɔ, dɩga gʊaa hɩɩya naa bire ʊ ɩ gʊaa k'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʊ bɩ hɩnka wɔɔ m,
k'an nyɩnta lemim nyɩnta zibəəzaa, bɩncɛ kʊ Zidas a to an ta a bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ.»
Ŋ n pʊɛɛga da, an jɩm Matɩyas mim ʊ. Bɩ y'a da kristazibəəzannɔ bueeredeenno wɔɔ barla.
Pantɩkɔtɩ dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a so kʊ ma haay bɩncɛ deem ʊ.
Lɛɛm bɩ, ŋ bʊgʊr ma am hɩnhɛr gʊta hɔ bɩ m, an a to brama, an bɩ har kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ bɩ han haay.
Ŋ n hɔ yɩ an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan sɛ nɛɛm kɩ, an a jinjir, an a cɩnta gʊaa biyəə mim ʊ.
*Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ ŋ haay han, ŋn'a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ lemim vantɔɔ hɩm amba Sɛnt-Ɛspri a ka ŋ ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩ bɩ m.
Bala, zɩɩfʊrɔ wosohɔɔnhɔbarɛzannɔ y'a to durnya kʊrɔ haay ʊ, ŋnɩ bʊr, ŋn'ɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ.
Bʊgʊr bɩ k'a ba bɩ, zamaa b'a so kʊ ma, bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə, bala, gʊaa biyəə nyɩnta an nɩ ŋ mam, ŋn'ɩ meer barɛ a do lemim m.
Hɔ k'a nɩ bam b'a ka ŋnɩ zɛ kədə, gʊaa biyəə n a lɛ gu, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay kʊ ŋ nɩ meer bam naa, Galilee gʊɔɔ bɛɛ ra?
Bɩ, a ba a ʊ lɔ, wɔɔ gʊaa biyəə nɩ ŋ marɛ a do lemim nɩ?
Partɩ zannɔ kan Mɛɛdɩ zannɔ kɩ, Elamitɩ kan Mezopotamii zannɔ kɩ, Zidee zannɔ kan Kapadɔs zannɔ kɩ, Pɔn zannɔ kan Azii zannɔ kɩ,
Frizii zannɔ kan Panfilii zannɔ kɩ, Eziptɩ zannɔ kan Libii Sirɛnnɩ zannɔ kɩ, kan Rɔm zannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ m Zɩɩfʊrɔ, kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zum zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Krɛtɩ zannɔ kan Araabɩrɔ kɩ, wɔɔ y'a mam, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso zibəə mɩŋŋa b'ʊ, wɔɔ do lemim m.»
Mim naa do k'a ba bɩ cem ŋ han haay, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kʊ ma, ŋn'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Naa lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʊ lɔ?»
Gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ yaa wʊrɛ ŋ ma, ŋ ʊ: «Bɛɛ yɩ ŋ ka.»

Pɩyɛɛr n wuti meerbaa m bueeredeenno kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ: «Zidee zannɔ, kan awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ naa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a hɔ k'a nɩ bam bɩ jɩ ma mɩŋŋa, k'a tʊr gʊ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ ma.
Ayy…, gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro n bɛɛ mi amba awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ nɩ y. Dɔ k'a mɛ naa, wakatɩ kaakʊ wɔɔ n ta ma cɩna.
Bɩ naa do naa, hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Zowɛl a hɩ bɩ n naa:
Ba hɔ kʊ Woso a hɩ bɩ n na:
Dɔmɩnnɔ jɛzannɔ nɔ ʊ,
mɔɔ yɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri zerm gʊaa haay mim ʊ,
awɔɔ gʊɔɔ yaarɔ kan lannɔ kɩ Woso lɛ sire ŋnɩ so ra,
awɔɔ gʊɔɔ pooro hɔhɩnkarɛrɔ yɩm,
awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gusinno hɔɔ yɩrɛ nɩnnarɛrɔ nɔ ʊ.
Sɩra m, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nɔ ʊ,
yaarɔ kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ,
mɔɔ yɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ zerle ŋ la, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛ si ŋnɩ so ra.
Mɔɔ hɔɔ gʊtɔɔ bam brama,
m makrarɔ ba tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, ma kan sɛ kɩ, siŋŋə kɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ.
Woso gure y'a lʊrm an a ba am monsigə hɔ bɩ m,
mom n a lʊr am ma hɔ bɩ m,
kʊ Zuuba dɔmɩm gʊta kan a cirbəə kɩ bɩ n bɔkarɛ, an lee ku.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ Zuuba birm yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ n nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.»

«Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a tʊr ka mɔɔ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ma: Amba awɔɔ dɔ bɩ nɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ, gʊaa bɩ do Woso a kasɛtɩ ka ʊ awɔɔ zi, an nɩ hoserlo bam, kan hɔ k'awɔɔ n a yɩ cɩna bɩ kɩ, kan makrarɔ kɩ awɔɔ bire ʊ.
Gʊaa bɩ do, awɔɔ nyasʊ a da gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔ ʊ, ŋn'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, amba Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta a zim a hɔdɔrɛ nɔ ʊ k'an ba bɩ m.
Bɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ, an a bʊmbɔ zɛ kaʊdabaa ma, bala, zɛ b'a dam ma an gɔɔta m a cirbəə nɔ ʊ y.
Sɩra m, Davɩd a hɩ a minto, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ ɩ Zuuba yɩrɛ m lɛɛ dɔmɩm haay, bala, a ɩ mɔɔ bɩsɩ ra,
kʊ mɔɔ bɩ m da ma, m m do y.
Mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ sɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛm nɩ heernyɩnta laa lɔm,
mɔɔ mɛ nɩ mɛnyɔɔ dam taaheerlɛ nɔ ʊ an lɛ da.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ ɩbɩɩ bɩ mɔɔ nyi to m *gəəno bɩncɛ ʊ y.
Ɩbɩɩ gʊaa paan… m mɔɔ m,
ɩ bɩ mɔɔ tore m vɔn y.
Ɩbɩɩ mɩsɩrbaa zaa hɩnka mɔɔ m,
ɩbɩɩ y'a kam mɔɔ m heernyɔɔ yɩ ɩ zi.»
«M danyɩnɔ, zaa ta ʊ kʊ m a hɩ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, m a bɔ kʊ zi: Wɔɔ yaaba Davɩd ga, n n a bir, a yaa gɔɔta an nɩ wɔɔ zi naa ʊ her.
B'a nyɩnta wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, an a dɔ, a ʊ: Woso a wer si m, a do gʊaa bɔrɛ, an nyɩnta a cirbəəduu ra.
A lɛɛ ka an Krista mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ yɩ, bɩ, a minto y'a ka an a hɩ, a ʊ: N n a to gəəno bɩncɛ ʊ y, b'a mɛsim n vɔnrɛ dɔ y.
Woso Yeezuu bɩ do mɩm bɔ ʊ, wɔɔ haay, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m.
Woso a busu a bɩsɩ ʊ a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ. Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Zɩ a ler bɔm bɩ, a a yɩ, an a jir, amba awɔɔ n'a yɩm, an n'a mam sɔ bɩ m.
Bala, Davɩd k'an der paan… arzana ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ mɩŋŋa, a ʊ:
Zuuba Woso a hɩ mɔɔ Zuuba m:
nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ʊ
an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ bam
ɩ gankarahɔ bɩ ku.»
«Kʊ Israyɛl do haay n a dɔ mɩŋŋa: Yeezuu niŋŋə k'awɔɔ wɔ gɔ ma bɩ, bɩ Woso a ba Zuuba kan Krista kɩ.»
Kʊ ŋ heer a zɛ kʊ ma kan minno nɔɔn duro marɛ kɩ bɩ, ŋ Pɩyɛɛr lar kan kristazibəəzannɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ a ba lɔ, ʊ danyɩnɔ?»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a a bɔ a mimbʊnyaarɔ ʊ, kʊ gʊaa biyəə m batɛm si Yeezuu tɔ ma a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto. B'awɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩm ganwʊrɛ.
Lerbɔrɛ naa do, awɔɔ hɔ m kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ laatʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ Zuuba wɔɔ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ kɩ.»
Pɩyɛɛr meer ba gʊta, an n'a kasɛtɩ kam, an nɩ ŋ heer bam kookoo, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a a gʊ her gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ nɔɔn ma.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ si rɔ wɔɔ ŋ batɛm si. Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ lɛ a zɔ tisi kaakʊ ma.
Ŋ yɛ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ karɩnda bɩ ma, ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ dɔmɩm haay, ŋn'a zɛm kʊ ra, ŋn'ɩ Zuuba zɛkʊra hɔbɩrɛ bɩm, ŋn'ɩ yaa darɛ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hoserlo bam gʊta kan makrarɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ haay zɛ kədə.
Gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ haay a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋn'a hɔ haay zɛm kʊ ra.
Ŋ y'a wɔhɔɔ hɛɛrɛ kan a arzakarɔ kɩ, k'a bɩ ŋ jir kan kʊ kɩ amba gʊaa biyəə lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Dɔmɩm haay, ŋ y'a zɛm kʊ ra Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'a zɛm kʊ ra a harlɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu zɛkʊra hɔ bɩrɛ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, noonhubaa kɩ.
Ŋ n'ɩ Woso daŋ ʊ, do bɩ haay n a lɛ bɔrɛ ŋ ʊ. Dɔmɩm biyəə, Zuuba a ka gʊɔɔ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ, sokʊmagʊɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la.
Yirbəə deem m wakatɩ kaakʊ hɔ ma bɩ, yaadarɛ wakatɩ m bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ ta Wosocɛ ʊ.
Gʊaa n nɩ b'ʊ, an yɩ lʊgɔ, n n tɩr a busu dɔmɩm haay, n n aa nyɩnta Wosocɛ lɛ kʊ n n'a birm «cɛlɛ gʊɛrɛ-gʊɛrɛ» bɩ ma, k'an hɔ yɩnyɛ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gasʊm Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ han.
K'a Pɩyɛɛr yɩ kan Zaan kɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam k'a gasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a hɔ yɛ ŋ han.
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n dɩga a sɩɩ… ŋn'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Dɩga wɔɔ ma!»
Gʊaa bɩ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma, bala, dɔ an nawʊrɛ ŋ ma kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ ka a ʊ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ba sarma m gɛɛ wanzur nɩ y. Bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ: Yeezuu Krista, Nazarɛtɩ gʊaa bɩ tɔ ma, wuti ɩ ta!»
A n a sa a bɩsɩ wɔ ma, an a ka an wuti. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊaa bɩ gannɔ kan a gankʊyɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ a bɔ kʊ zi.
A n wuti brama vugur, an nɩ tam. A n gasʊ kan ŋ kɩ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ tam, an nɩ hinherm, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
Zamaa bɩ haay n a yɩ an nɩ tam, an n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
N y'a dɔ: A mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta Wosocɛ lɛ gʊɛrɛ-gʊɛrɛ bɩ lɛ ma an nɩ hɔ yɩnyɛm bɩ. Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋ da n bɔ ʊ, hɔ k'a ba gʊaa bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma.
Gʊaa bɩ n a ya, an n'a gʊm Pɩyɛɛr ma kan Zaan kɩ y. Zamaa bɩ haay n a si ŋnɩ ta ŋ zi laŋŋa kʊ n n'a birm «Salomɔɔn laŋŋa» bɩ taa. Hɔ k'a ba b'a ka ŋnɩ zɛ kədə.

Pɩyɛɛr k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a hɩ zamaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Israyɛl zannɔ, bɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ zɛm kədə hɔ k'a ba naa ma? Gɛɛ bɔ minto m, awɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʊ, gʊaa naa k'a nɩ tam bɩ, wɔɔ paŋŋa gɛɛ wɔɔ mɩŋŋabaa y'a ka, an nɩ tarɛ?
Abraham, Izakkɩ, kan Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso k'a m wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso bɩ y'a lɛ bɔ a Zibəənyɩ Yeezuu b'ʊ. Bɩ, awɔɔ nyɩnta a nyasʊ a ka Pɩlatɩ ʊ, an a ŋʊa k'a wɔ saa, awɔɔ n a gu bɩ.
Awɔɔ, Gʊaa mɩŋŋa k'an tɩrga bɩ, awɔɔ kaanm bɩ m, a yɛ kʊ n nɩ wɔ saa gərzer bɩ ma.
Mɩsɩrbaa cir b'awɔɔ zɛ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m.
Sɩrakarɛ minto y'a ka Yeezuu tɔ ma, wɔɔ n tɔ naa do hɩ, ʊ yaabazaa k'awɔɔ n nɩ dɩgam ma a dɔ sɔ naa waa. Bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a a to Yeezuu zi bɩ y'a ka gʊaa naa n a waa awɔɔ haay bire ʊ.»
«Sɩra m, m danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ badɔ y'a ka awɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʊ haay, awɔɔ kan a cinno wɔɔ kɩ.
Woso mɩŋŋa lɛɛ ka an a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m, a ʊ: A Krista bɩ fɩr yɩrɛ, b'a kʊ yɩ maam sɔ.
K'a a bɔ a mimbʊnyaarɔ ʊ, k'a a bɔ a bʊr Woso zi, k'a a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ.
Zuuba Woso mɛnyɔɔ dɔmɩnnɔ kam, an Yeezuu bʊmbɔrɛzaa niŋŋə k'a banka wɔɔ minto bɩ nyɔɔ.
K'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ, nyɩnta an nawʊm b'ʊ, an dɔ hɔ haay bankarɛ dɔmɩm ma, dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʊ Woso a hɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ m biisi bɩ m.
Moyiisi lɛɛ ka an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba Woso y'a lɛsinnɩsorazaa bɔŋ ʊ awɔɔ danyɩnɔ bire ʊ awɔɔ minto, amba mɔɔ m. K'a tʊr ka hɔ haay k'a n'a hɩm bɩ ma.
Gʊaa k'a n a tʊr ka wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ do lemim ma, kʊ n n a bɔ do barla, n n'a zɛ gər.›
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ haay, an a sa Sanwɛl ma kan a jɛzannɔ kɩ dɔmɩnnɔ kʊ wɔɔ n ta ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nɔɔn mim hɩ.
Awɔɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kan gʊaasɩbabaa kʊ Woso a cɩnta kan awɔɔ zɩrɔ kɩ bɩ hɔyɩrɛzannɔ, dɔmɩm k'a hɩ ʊ Abraham m, a ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ yaŋŋɔɔ minto, do haay k'a nɩ tara burə ʊ barka yɩm.›
Woso k'a Zibəənyɩ bɩ bɔ ʊ bɩ lɛɛ ka an a nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi an a barka zer awɔɔ mim ʊ, an n'a kam awɔɔ gʊaa haay n'a mimbʊnyaarɔ tore.»
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan zamaa bɩ kɩ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno kan Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cir bɩ kɩ, kan Sadisɛɛnrɔ kɩ bʊr ŋ zi.
Ŋ heer busu kan ŋ kɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ karɩnda dɩndam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu mim hɩm gʊɔɔ m kan gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ kɩ bɩ minto.
Ŋ nɩ ŋ gʊr, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, bala, gum da, ŋn'a to dɔ n mɛ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, gʊta a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ. Ŋ lɛ wuti an a zɔ tisi soor ma.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, cinno kʊ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ kan tara bɩ gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a zɛ kʊ ra.
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Hannɩ nyɩnta ʊ kan *Kayiifʊ kɩ, Zaan kan Alɛsandɩr kɩ, kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ dogʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay.
Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ Pɩyɛɛr gaa kan Zaan kɩ, ŋnɩ bʊr ŋ nɩ a taa, ŋn'ɩ ŋ larlɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ paŋŋa m, gɛɛ nka tɔ awɔɔ yu ma an nɩ naa barɛ?»
*Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Pɩyɛɛr han bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Kʊ lɛɛzannɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ, her naa ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ lar awɔɔ nawʊm hɔ mɩŋŋa kʊ wɔɔ ba lʊgɔ naa do m bɩ minto. Kʊ a hɩ, k'a ba wɔɔ ʊ lɔ gʊaa naa do n a waa gɛ?

K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, awɔɔ haay kan Israyɛl do haay kɩ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu Krista tɔ minto m. Awɔɔ y'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma, Woso n a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, a minto y'a ka gʊaa naa do n a waa, an n'awɔɔ lɛɛ naa ʊ.
Amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m, ‹jaa k'awɔɔ cɛdonno, wɔɔ a bɔ ʊ a zo bɩ, a y'a ba cɛjɩr jaa.›
Bʊmbɔrɛzaa vanta ba ʊ bɩncɛ vanta ʊ k'a bɛɛ y. Tɔ vanta ba ʊ durnya nɔ ʊ n n a ka gʊɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ ʊ da ma ʊ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ k'a bɛɛ y.»
Kʊ ŋ Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ heerkoodəbaa bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, ŋ n karɩnda ba y, targarɔ m bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə. Ŋ y'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, ŋ ʊ Yeezuu zukuuzannɔ m,
ŋn'ɩ dɩgam gʊaa k'a waa bɩ ma a jɩr ʊ, ŋ n hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ dɔ y.
Ŋ n lɛ ka, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta k'a dɩga ŋ mim ma.
Ŋ n'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'ʊ a ba gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro n lɔ? Kʊ sɩra nɩ, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, ŋ hoser ba, bɩ wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ bɩsɩ ka ma y.
Ʊ ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʊ, k'a bɩ lee ku lɛɛ haay ʊ y. Ʊ bɔ ŋ lɛɛ, kʊ ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ meer ba kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ naa do minto y.»
Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ bir, ŋnɩ lɛ ka ŋ ʊ, kʊ ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ Yeezuu tɔ hɩ, gɛɛ, ŋn'a mim dɩnda y.
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Bɔ m mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʊ? Ʊ ʊ tʊr ka awɔɔ ma gɛɛ, ʊ ʊ tʊr ka Woso ma? K'a a hɔɔn da ma, a dɩga a.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ yɩ, ʊ a ma bɩ hɩrɛ to y.»
Kʊ ŋ nɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ ba ŋ nɩ y. Ŋ n a ya, ŋnɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ to. Bala, gʊaa haay y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ hɔ k'a ba bɩ minto.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a waarɛ yɩ hoser naa do barɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, a dɔɔraa lɛ da busi m.
Kʊ ŋ wɔ saa ŋ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ ta a muno wɔɔ zi, ŋn'aa hɔ kʊ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan tara gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ a hɩ bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
N n a tʊr ka ŋ ma. Ŋ haay n a zɛ kʊ ra deem, ŋn'a hɩ Woso m, ŋ ʊ: «Karɩnsaamba, ɩbɩɩ ‹brama da kan tara kɩ, hi kɩ, kan hɔ haay k'an a nɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ.›
Ɩbɩɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa da ɩ zibəənyɩ Davɩd wɔɔ yaaba bɩ lɛ ʊ, minno nɔɔn duro minto:
Bɔ minto kʊrɔ nɩ həən sire ncɩnaaʊ,
zamaa n'a hɔɔn dam,
hɔɔndarɛ vam-vam nɩ?
Durnya cinno n a zɔ kʊ ma,
kʊrɔ cinno n a so kʊ ma k'a yar ba kan Zuuba Woso kɩ,
a Krista kɩ.
Sɩra m, Hɩrɔɔdɩ kan Pɔns Pɩlatɩ kɩ a zɛ kʊ ra tara naa do nɔ ʊ, kan do vantɔɔ kɩ Israyɛl zannɔ kɩ, k'a yar ba kan Yeezuu ɩbɩɩ zibəəzaa mɩŋŋa k'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Naa ba ŋ y'a ʊ, k'ɩbɩɩ paŋŋa, ɩ hɔɔnhɔ k'ɩbɩɩ lɛɛ ka ɩ cɩnta bɩ n kʊ yɩ.
Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Zuuba, ɩ tʊr ka ŋ nyaabarɛ meerbaa bɩ ma, k'ɩ ka k'ɩ zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ n'ɩ lemim bɩ hɩ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
Ɩ wɔ hʊr, ɩ ka kʊ yaabazannɔ m waarɛ yɩ, kʊ makrarɔ m ba, kan hoserlo kɩ ɩbɩɩ Zibəənyɩ mɩŋŋa Yeezuu tɔ ma.»
Kʊ ŋ yaa bɩ da ŋn'a nya bɩ, bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ bɩ hinkə. Sɛnt-Ɛspri gasʊ ŋ ʊ an ŋ han haay. Ŋ nɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa dam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
Zamaa bɩ kʊ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ heer a ba deem, nyi deem, gʊaa ba ʊ an nɩ hɔ m, a ʊ, awɔɔ y'a so ʊ y. Hɔ haay bɩ zɛ ŋ nawʊm kʊ ra deem.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩmbɔʊrɛ kasɛtɩ karɛ kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ. Ŋ haay nɩ zi bam Woso barka gʊta kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m.
Gʊaa ba ʊ ŋ bire ʊ an cicirzaa y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ tararɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, gɛɛ, ŋ nɩ harlɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ hɛɛ ŋ nawʊrɛ, ŋn'ɩ zɛrɛ a busoo kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ m,
ŋnɩ b'a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʊ. Gʊaa biyəə k'a lɛ taa daahan ma bɩ, a y'a yɩrɛ amba a lɛ taa bɩ m.
Amba Zozɛf kʊ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a tɔ ka Barnabas bɩ, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ a ʊ «muno heeryurezaa» bɩ n nɩ hɔsɩra m. Levii do gʊaa m, an a to Siipɩr ʊ.
A n a hɔsɩra bɩ hɛɛ, an a busoo bɩ sa, an b'a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Gʊaa deem n ta ʊ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas, an kʊ ma kan a lʊ Safɩɩra kɩ ŋn'a tara hɛɛ.
A n kʊ ma kan a lʊ bɩ kɩ, an busoo bɩ bɔ ʊ an a cɩnta, an a mɩsɩ bɩ sa an aa a ka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ananɩyas, bɔ m Sʊtaana n'ɩbɩɩ heer han? Ɩbɩɩ ŋʊaar ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, ɩ tara k'ɩbɩɩ hɛɛ bɩ busoo bɩ bɔ ʊ.
Ɩbɩɩ n ɩ da ma ɩ tara bɩ hɛɛrɛ to, ɩ ba ɩ hɔ ra? Gɛɛ, k'ɩ hɛɛ, ɩ busoo bɩ sa ɩ hɔ k'ɩ lɛ n taa bɩ bam na? A ba ɩbɩɩ ʊ lɔ, ɩ naa da ɩ heer ʊ? Ŋʊaar bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ ba gʊɔɔ nɩ y, a ba ɩbɩɩ ʊ Woso m.»
Ananɩyas k'a naa ma bɩ, an a do, an ga. Nyibəə gʊta gasʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ minno nɔɔn duro ma rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ pooro n bʊr, ŋnɩ b'a gər bɩ sa, ŋnɩ pɛɛra burgu ma, ŋn'aa a bir.
A maasɩrɛ ba, an a zɔ wakatɩ kaakʊ ma, a lʊ bɩ n bɩ gasʊ, an a dɔ kʊ bɔ ɩ ba y.
Pɩyɛɛr n a lar, a ʊ: «Tara bɩ k'awɔɔ hɛɛ bɩ, a lɛ paan… m naa ra?» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩɩn…, a lɛ n bɩ bala.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an a lar, a ʊ: «A ba awɔɔ lɔ a a lɛ ba deem k'a Zuuba Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ makra ba? Ɩ tʊr ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yaa ɩbɩɩ zim bɩ bir lɔ wɔɔ gam heer ma hallɛ ma, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ busum sɔ.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, Safɩɩra a do Pɩyɛɛr jɩr ʊ, an ga. Kʊ gʊɔɔ pooro wɔɔ bʊr bɩ, ŋ bɩ dɩga a a ga, ŋn'a busu k'a yaa bir a zim bɩ jɩr ʊ.
Dabɔʊ gʊta sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ haay, kan gʊaa haay k'a minno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ kɩ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ ɩ makrarɔ kan hoserlo kɩ bam gʊta zamaa bɩ bire ʊ. Ŋ haay a zɛ kʊ ra deem Salomɔɔn laŋŋa taa b'ʊ.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a n sɩra ka Woso ʊ paan… bɩ bɩr yɛm an n'a zɛm kʊ ra kan ŋ kɩ y. Kan bɩ kɩ, zamaa bɩ n n'a lɛ bɔrɛ ŋ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ cir gʊta, yaarɔ kan lannɔ kɩ ɩ sɩra kam Zuuba ʊ, ŋn'a zarlɛ ŋ la.
N n bʊr yaabazannɔ m zaarɔ bire ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ wʊta gargʊrɔ ʊ gɛɛ gʊraŋŋarɔ ʊ, kʊ Pɩyɛɛr bʊr an nɩ cenim b'ʊ gɛɛ a hinni y'a kam niŋŋoo ra gɛ.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta n a to yaabazannɔ m Zerizalɛm gʊrgarɔ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ zinəro nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʊr ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a waa haay.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kan a jɛzannɔ kɩ, Sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ, wuti kan jɩmbaa heerbusu kɩ.
Ŋ n a ka, ŋnɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ gʊr gʊɔɔ mɩm m, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ.
Gunuu ʊ bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka bʊr, an bɩ lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ lɛ rɔ wɔɔ gʊngʊ, an ŋ bɔ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«K'a ta a yaa jɩm Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, a mɩsɩrbaa daa naa do minno nɔɔn duro haay hɩ zamaa bɩ m.»

Kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, ŋ ta Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ k'a yaa dɩnda gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n lee ku kan a jɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ. A n a ka ŋnɩ dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ bir haay, Israyɛl gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ haay, an nyɔɔ da kʊ n aa kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, n nɩ bʊr ŋ nɩ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ ta bɩ, kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ n ŋ yɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'ʊ y. Ŋ n a wusigə ŋn'aa a hɩ, ŋ ʊ:
«Wɔɔ yaa lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ yɩ ŋn'a ta mɩŋŋa, a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ n nɩ jɩnɩm cɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma. Kʊ wɔɔ gʊ bɩ, wɔɔ n gɔsɩ yɩ a nɔ ʊ y.»
Wosocɛ dɔmazannɔ cir bɩ k'a naa ma kan wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ zɛ kədə kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ minto, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa larm naa k'a ba ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a jɩ nyɩntam lɔ?
Gʊaa n bʊr an b'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ n gʊr a ŋ du rɔ wɔɔ ɩ Wosocɛ ʊ ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m.»
Wosocɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n ta kan a zibəəzannɔ kɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, an aa ŋ gaa an bʊr ŋ nɩ. Ŋ n paŋŋa ba ŋ ma y, bala, ŋ y'ɩ nyi bam zamaa bɩ m, ŋ y'a a gʊngʊɛɛn jaarɔ m.
Ŋ n ŋ gaa, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ hɩnka dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ m. Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n ŋ lar, a ʊ:
«Wɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, ʊ ʊ: A b'a ya, a tɔ naa do hɩ a karɩnda nɔ ʊ y, awɔɔ karɩnda bɩ n bɔkarɛ an Zerizalɛm han, a lɛ n taa k'a gʊaa naa do ma bɩ ka wɔɔ mim la.»
Pɩyɛɛr kan kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «A a ga m, k'ɩ Woso lɛ si, k'ɩ gʊɔɔ to.
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso, Yeezuu k'awɔɔ zeŋŋə gɔ ma a zɛ gər bɩ, mɩm bɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, Woso a busu a bɩsɩ ʊ arzana ʊ, an cirbəə ka ʊ, an a ba bʊmbɔrɛzaa, k'an a ka kʊ Israyɛl gʊɔɔ n a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ ŋ sugur yɩ.
Minno nɔɔn duro kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ kan *Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʊ Woso a ka gʊɔɔ kʊ n n'a lɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ ʊ kɩ.»
Minno nɔɔn duro ŋ heer busu, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ zɩnzɛrɛ ma.
Gʊaa deem n wuti dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʊ. Farizɛn m, a tɔ m Gamalɩyɛl, wosocikarɩnsaamba m, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n'a daŋ ʊ. A n lɛ ka kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m cɩna,
an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a dundo a zi mɩŋŋa kan hɔ k'awɔɔ k'a ba gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro m bɩ kɩ.

Dɔɔraarɔ kʊ ŋ cem dɩɩtaa rɔ nɔɔn nɔ ʊ, Tedas a hɩnka wɔɔ m, a ʊ: Gʊaa gʊta n'awɔɔ m. A n gʊɔɔ gaa, an ŋ so kʊ ma, ŋ lɛ n a zɔ zɔrsi ma. Ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa zɛ, a karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay hɩsɩga da. Gɔsɩ n gɔɔta y.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ, lɛsarɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, Galilee gʊaa Zidas a hɩnka wɔɔ m. Gʊɔɔ gʊta nɩ zure a jɛ ʊ. Bɩ mɩŋŋa ga sɔ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zure a jɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n hɩsɩga da.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ, k'a gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro to kʊ ŋ nɩ cem, a bɩ hɔsɩ ba ŋ nɩ y. Meerbaa naa do kan zibəə naa do kɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ hɔɔ nɩ, ŋ nyaanlɛ a zim.
Bɩ kʊ Woso hɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a ka, ŋ n nyaam nɩ y. K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka, a bɩ yar ba kan Woso kɩ y.»
Ŋ yɛ Gamalɩyɛl meerbaa bɩ ma.
Ŋ nɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ bir, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ madɩɩrɔ m, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ, ŋ b'a ya, ŋnɩ Yeezuu tɔ hɩ y, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n bɔ dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, kʊ Woso yɛ ŋn'a ga fɩryɩrɛ m Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ minto.
Dɔmɩm biyəə, amba Wosocɛ ʊ gɛɛ har ʊ, ŋ bɩr Yeezuu Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ dɩndarɛ kan a padarɛ kɩ tore y.

Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ y'a dam la, zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ grɛkkɩ lemim hɩm nɔ wɔɔ n wuti kukur barɛ m kan kʊ bɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, ŋ dɔmɩm haay hɔ jirle bɩ, ŋ bɩr a karɛ ŋ zonno wɔɔ ʊ y.
Bueerehɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ n zamaa sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A n a ga m k'ʊ wɔ saa Woso lemim nyɩnta pa darɛ ma, k'ʊ hɔbɩrɛ jir y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a ka gʊɔɔ yaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma a bire ʊ saanhɩna, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n ŋ heer han kan mindɔrɛ kɩ, k'ʊ zibəə naa do ka ŋ ʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ba n bɩr ʊ tɔŋ ʊ kan yaadarɛ kɩ, ʊ bɩr Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam.»

Zamaa bɩ haay yɛ meerbaa naa do ma: ŋ n Etɩyɛnnɩ bɔ ʊ, gʊaa m, sɩrakarɛ n a heer han kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri kɩ, kan Filipi kɩ, Prokɔɔr kɩ, Nikanɔɔr kɩ, Timɔn kan Parmenas kɩ, kan Antɩyɔs gʊaa Nikola k'a nɩ zum zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Ŋ nɩ ŋ hɩnka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋnɩ yaa da, ŋn'a wɔ ka ŋ mim la.
Woso lemim bɩ padarɛ n'a dam la, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la gʊta Zerizalɛm ʊ. Wosocɛmannɩbənno gʊta nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ zum sɩrakarɛ zaa b'ʊ.
Barka kan paŋŋa kɩ kʊ ŋ Etɩyɛnnɩ han bɩ, a nyɩnta an nɩ hoserlo kan makrarɔ gʊtɔɔ kɩ bam zamaa bɩ bire ʊ.

Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n wuti meerbaa m kan Etɩyɛnnɩ kɩ: Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ lɔnnɔ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma, ŋ sokʊmacɛ bɩ n a hɔ. Sirɛnnɩ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ nyɩnta ŋ barla kan Alɛsandrii zannɔ kɩ, Silisii zannɔ kɩ, Azii zannɔ kɩ. Ŋ n a sɩŋŋɩda sa ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Etɩyɛnnɩ kɩ,
Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a a ka Etɩyɛnnɩ nɩ meer bam kan mindɔrɛ kɩ bɩ, ŋ bɩr a dam ma ŋn'a meerbaa bɩ nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ y.
Ŋ n zambʊ ba, ŋn'a ka gʊɔɔ ma kʊ ŋ n'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ma, an nɩ Woso sʊnsɔ wʊm kan Moyiisi kɩ.»
Nyɩnta a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, ŋnɩ zamaa bɩ, gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ, kan wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ nyʊnnyɔɔta ŋnɩ bɩ daata zɛ Etɩyɛnnɩ la, ŋn'a nyasʊ ŋnɩ ta m dʊdɔkənno taa.
Bɩ ŋ yaa kasɛtɩ ŋʊaarzannɔ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do bɩr wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ kan lɛrɔ wɔɔ kɩ sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ tore y.
Wɔɔ ʊ ya, ʊ a ma an n'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu naa do n nɩ zɛm bɩ bɩncɛ naa do wurgə, an Moyiisi lɛrɔ k'a ŋ ka wɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ lʊr.»
Gʊaa haay k'a nɩ nyɩntam dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, dɩga ŋ nawʊm ma, ŋn'a meer yɩ an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan malɛɛka hɔ kɩ.
Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n a lar, a ʊ: «Sɩra m naa gɛ?»
Etɩyɛnnɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a a tʊr ka, m danyɩnɔ kan ŋ zɩrɔ kɩ. Woso k'a a so cirbəə ʊ b'a hɩnka wɔɔ yaaba Abraham m, dɔmɩm k'a nyɩnta ʊ Mezopotamii ʊ, an bɔkarɛ an ta Haaran ʊ b'ʊ.
A n a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Ɩ gʊ ɩ kʊ bɩ ma, kan ɩ harzannɔ kɩ, ɩ ta tara kʊ mɔɔ n n'a hɩnkarɛ ɩbɩɩ m b'ʊ.›
Abraham n a gʊ Kalde zannɔ kʊ bɩ ma, k'a yaa nyɩnta Haaran ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, a zɩ garɛ kur bɩ, Woso n a bɔ kʊ bɩ do nɔ ʊ, an bɩ nyɩnta kʊ k'awɔɔ n ta ʊ heer naa ʊ.
A n tara ka ʊ k'an a so ʊ kʊ bɩ do ʊ y, b'a gam cɩnta jɩ ba ʊ y. B'a a ler bɔ m k'a ka ʊ k'an a so ʊ kan a yaŋŋarɔ kɩ, baa k'a n nyɩ yɩ bɩ kɩ.
Woso n a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹A dogʊɔɔ nyɩntam do vanta tara ra, bɩ ŋ gasʊm lɔmbaa ʊ, ŋ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma dɔɔraa zɔrsi.›
Woso n a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Do niŋŋə k'a ŋ ba lɔnnɔrɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m dʊdɔ kam. Bɩ kur kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ŋ bɔm, ŋnɩ yaa da mɔɔ m bɩncɛ naa do ʊ.›

A n gʊaasɩbabaa da kan kɩ baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ minto y'a ka, Abraham k'a Izakkɩ yɩ bɩ, an a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ a yɩrɛ dɔmɩm sinnyə hɔ ma, Izakkɩ n a ba maam sɔ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ. Zakɔɔb n a ba a nyɩnɔ bueerehɩɩyɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ m maam sɔ.»
«Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ sɔ Zozɛf m, ŋn'a hɛɛ. N n a gaa n nɩ ta m Eziptɩ ʊ. Bɩ, Woso nyɩnta kan kɩ.
A n a bɔ a fɩr do haay nɔ ʊ, an hɔɔn ka ʊ kan barka kɩ Eziptɩ cir Farawɔn taa. Bɩ m Zozɛf ba Eziptɩ lɛɛzaa, an a so Eziptɩ ʊ kan a har kɩ haay.
Nɔ gʊta n b'a da Eziptɩ kʊ ʊ haay ʊ, kan Kanaan kʊ kɩ ʊ. Fɩryɩrɛ bɩ paŋŋa nyɩnta ʊ, wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n hɔbɩrɛ yɩ ŋn'a bɩrɛ y.
Kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʊ hɔbɩrɛ ɩ Eziptɩ tara ra bɩ, Zakɔɔb a nyɩnɔ, wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ nyɔɔ ŋ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ ma.
A hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, Zozɛf a hɩnka a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ Farawɔn a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dɔ ma ʊ.
Bɩ m, Zozɛf n nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa a zɩ Zakɔɔb gaa kan a dogʊɔɔ kɩ. Ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra haay gʊaa busaanhɩna a yaa soor.
Zakɔɔb n ta Eziptɩ ʊ, an aa ga b'ʊ kan wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Ŋ n ŋ gʊr, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ Sikɛm ʊ ŋn'aa ŋ bir yaa kʊ Abraham a si busoo m Emɔɔr nyɩnɔ zi, Sikɛm tara ra b'ʊ.»
«Woso lerbɔrɛ k'a ba kan Abraham kɩ kan kʊ yɩ bɩ dɔmɩm k'a n'a zɔm bɩ, zamaa bɩ lɛ a da ra, ŋn'a ba gʊta Eziptɩ tara ra,
an ta an Eziptɩ cir vanta k'a bɩ cirbəə bɩ, b'a n Zozɛf dɔ bɩ ku.
Cir bɩ do nyɩnta bʊnyaa, an zambʊ ba wɔɔ do bɩ ma. A paŋŋa ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ ma, an a ka ŋn'a a nyɩnɔ poorero gʊr, ŋn'aa ŋ lo kʊ ŋ nɩ gɩnga.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do Moyiisi yɩ ʊ. A gʊɛrɛ nyɩnta ʊ Woso mɩm ʊ. A tʊr n y'a ʊ mom kaakʊ a zɩ har ʊ.
Bɩ kʊ ŋ y'a zo bɩ, Farawɔn nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ bɩ y'a busu an a tʊr, an a ba a nyɩ.
Moyiisi n Eziptɩ zannɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn dɩnda haay, a meerbaarɔ kan a zibəəro kɩ paŋŋa nyɩnta ʊ.»
«K'a dɔɔraa busi ku bɩ, a a hɔɔn da a ʊ, k'a dɩga a danyɩnɔ Israyɛl zannɔ wɔɔ ma.
K'a deem yɩ Eziptɩ gʊaa nɩ fɩr kam ma bɩ, k'a ʊ k'a a da a danyɩ k'a nɩ fɩr yɩm bɩ han a bʊmbɔ bɩ, an Eziptɩ gʊaa bɩ zɛ, an ga.
A hɔɔn a da a ʊ a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʊ, Woso y'a bɔ ʊ k'a bɩ ŋ bʊmbɔ, bɩ ŋ n a jɩ ma y.
A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a a danyɩnɔ hɩɩyɔɔ yɩ ŋnɩ kʊ zɛm, an a zɔ k'a ŋ bʊmbɔ kʊ ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹M hannyɩnɔ, danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m kan kʊ kɩ, bɔ minto, awɔɔ nɩ kʊ zɛrɛ?›
Bɔzaa nɩ fɩr karɛ a mim bɩ ma bɩ n a wɔ nya Moyiisi cɩ ʊ, an kaanm m, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Nka y'ɩbɩɩ ba wɔɔ cir, k'ɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ dʊdɔkarɛzaa?
Ɩbɩɩ lɛ n taa k'ɩ mɔɔ zɛ amba ɩbɩɩ Eziptɩ zannɔ gʊaa bɩ zɛ jim bɩ m na?›
Moyiisi k'a naa ma bɩ, an a si, an aa a nyaakʊm da kʊ vanta ʊ, Madɩyan tara ra. B'a nyɩnɔ yɩ ʊ hɩɩya.»
«Dɔɔraa busi kur bɩ, malɛɛka a hɩnka m Sinayii ci poohɔɔn ʊ tutugu ʊ, sɛ nɔ ʊ.
Moyiisi k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a zɛ kədə, an a zɔ k'a dɩga a. A Zuuba Woso leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
‹Ɩbɩɩ zɩrɔ Abraham kan Izakkɩ kɩ Zakɔɔb kɩ Woso m mɔɔ m.› Moyiisi da n bɔ ʊ, a mɛ nɩ nyiŋŋəm, a n yɛ k'a a ya, a a mɩm busu a dɩga y.
Zuuba n a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Ɩ kʊsɔrɔ bɔ ɩ gam ʊ, bala, bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n nɩ jɩnɩŋ ʊ naa, bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa m, bala mɔɔ ɩ naa ʊ.
Mɔɔ m gʊɔɔ wɔɔ cicir yɩ Eziptɩ tara ra, mɔɔ ŋ zeedarɛ ma, mɔɔ n zer kʊ m ŋ bʊmbɔ. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m ɩ nyɔɔ Eziptɩ kʊ ʊ.› »
«Moyiisi bɩ do ŋ kaanm m ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: ‹Nka y'ɩbɩɩ ba cir, dʊdɔkarɛzaa sɔ?› Bɩ, Woso a nyɔɔ k'an bɩr cir, bʊmbɔrɛzaa sɔ kan malɛɛka k'a hɩnka m tutugu nɔ ʊ bɩ daahan kɩ.
Bɩ yɩ ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ kan hoserlo barɛ kɩ, makrarɔ kɩ Eziptɩ tara ra, higʊta piinə bɩncɛ ʊ, poohɔɔn ʊ, dɔɔraa busi.
Moyiisi mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ Israyɛl zannɔ m, a ʊ: ‹Woso y'a lɛsinnɩsorazaa bɔŋ ʊ awɔɔ danyɩnɔ bire ʊ, amba mɔɔ m, an a ka awɔɔ ʊ.›
A mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta kan Israyɛl zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ poohɔɔn ʊ, malɛɛka n meer ba kan kɩ Sinayii ci mim ʊ. A n mɩsɩrbaa lemim si an a ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n yɛ k'a lɛ si y. Ŋ kaanm m, ŋn'a ŋʊa k'a a bɔ a ta Eziptɩ tara ra.»
«Ŋ n a hɩ Aarɔn m, ŋ ʊ: ‹wosoro ba ɩ ŋ ka wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr ʊ lɛɛ. Bala, Moyiisi naa do k'a wɔɔ gaa an bɔ wɔɔ m Eziptɩ ʊ naa, wɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ bɔ ɩ ba nɩ y.›
Ŋ n hɔ ba an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan dinnyɛɛm kɩ, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, ŋnɩ mannɩ ba ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ba bɩ cibsa ba kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Woso n kaanm ŋ nɩ, an ŋ to ŋn'ɩ brama monyaarɔ daŋ ʊ, amba ŋ y'a gʊrsɩra ba wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ci ʊ bɩ m:
Israyɛl zannɔ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ganwʊrɛ gɛɛ mannɩhɔ ka m ʊ
dɔɔraa busi nɔ ʊ, poohɔɔn ʊ ra?
Awɔɔ wosobaawɔm Molok cɛ kʊ n y'a ba huu m bɩ busu
kan awɔɔ woso Refan monyaa kɩ,
hɔɔbarɛrɔ, awɔɔ ŋ ba, k'a bɩr ŋ daŋ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ tarɛ awɔɔ m
lɔmbaa ʊ laatʊ *Babɩlɔnnɩ ma.»
«Wɔɔ zɩrɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta poohɔɔn ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ nyɩnta Woso taʊrɛ kasɛtɩ cɛ m. Ba a ʊ, amba Woso meer ba kan Moyiisi kɩ an a hɩ m bɩ m. A ʊ: ‹A ba amba hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ m.›
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a si bɩ, ŋ gasʊ m tara kʊ Zoziye ka ŋ lɛɛ, ŋnɩ yar ba ʊ Woso m la do vantɔɔ ra ŋn'a so ʊ naa ʊ. Bɩ, a gɔɔta ʊ, an ta, an Davɩd dɔmɩm ku.
Davɩd barka yɩ Woso taa, Zakɔɔb Woso bɩ, an zaa yɛ han k'a cɛ dɔ a ka ʊ.
Salomɔɔn ɩ cɛ bɩ dɔ an a ka ʊ.
Bɩ Woso k'a lɛ da haay bɩ bɩr nyɩntam cɛrɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ ŋ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ y. Amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa a da a ci nɔ ʊ bɩ m:
Zuuba Woso a hɩ:
Mɔɔ nyɩntajɩ bɩncɛ m arzana m,
tara m mɔɔ gankarahɔ.
Cɛ kara awɔɔ k'a dɔ a ka mɔɔ ʊ?
Mɔɔ mɛnyɔɔdarɛ bɩncɛ m kara?
Mɔɔ wɔ bɛɛ hɔ haay naa ba ra?»
«Tʊrgarɛ zannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ heer kan awɔɔ tʊr kɩ bɩr Woso mim sire y. Awɔɔ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma dɔmɩm haay. Awɔɔ kan a zɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ hɔdeem.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ kara ɩ nyɩnta ʊ awɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ n fɩr ka ma? Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ Gʊaa tɩrga bɩ zɛrɛ bɩ hɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, gʊaa bɩ do awɔɔ zambʊ ba ma, a zɛ.
Woso malɛɛkarɔ nyɔɔ ŋnɩ bɩ Woso lɛrɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ n zu ʊ y.»
Minno nɔɔn duro ŋ heer busu, ŋn'a sɔ sʊrɛ Etɩyɛnnɩ minto.
Bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a Etɩyɛnnɩ han bɩ, an a bɔɔta, an dɩga brama, an Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, Yeezuu nɩ jɩnɩm Woso bɩsɩ ʊ.
A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ba mɔɔ arzana yɩ an a gʊ, mɔɔ n Gʊaanyɩ bɩ yɩ an nɩ jɩnɩm Woso bɩsɩ ʊ na.»
Ŋ n zee da, ŋn'a wɔ tɩnta a tʊʊrɔ rɛ. Ŋ haay wuti, ŋnɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ nyasʊ,
ŋnɩ bɔ m tara bɩ nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a gʊngʊɛɛnm jaa m. Kasɛtɩzannɔ wɔɔ, a huuro wɔɔ kuntə ŋ y'a ʊ gʊaa poo kʊ n n'a birm Sol bɩ jɩr ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ nɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ gʊngʊɛɛnm bɩ, a ɩ yaa darɛ an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Zuuba Yeezuu mɔɔ nyi si!»
A n sʊnta, an zee gʊta da, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ɩ bɩ ŋ mimbʊnyaa naa do taar ka ŋ ʊ y.» Naa k'a hɩ bɩ, an ga.
Sol y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, Etɩyɛnnɩ garɛ bɩ mɩŋŋa.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ fɩr ka Zerizalɛm sokʊma bɩ ma. Sokʊmagʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay hɩsɩga da ŋnɩ ta Zidee kan Samarii kɩ gʊrgarɔ ʊ, kʊ bɩ m, kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m bala.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʊ paan… rɔ wɔɔ ɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ busu ŋn'a bir, ŋnɩ nyi ka gʊta a minto.
Sol bɩ, sokʊma bɩ wurgə an nawʊm, an nɩ gasʊm harlɔ ʊ, an nɩ yaarɔ gʊrm kan lannɔ kɩ, an nɩ ŋ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ.
Bɔɔ y'a hɩsɩga rɔ wɔɔ ɩ tam kʊrɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam.
Filipi ta Samarii kʊ deem nɔ ʊ, an nɩ Krista pa dam.
Zamaa bɩ haay n a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋn'a tʊr kam Filipi meerbaa bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ y'a hoserlo k'a nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ mam, ŋn'a yɩrɛ.
Zinəro gʊta ɩ bɔm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gasʊ ŋ ʊ rɔ mɛ ʊ kan zee gʊta darɛ kɩ. Lʊgɔrɔ kan paŋŋawarzannɔ kɩ a waa.
Heernyɔɔ nyɩnta ʊ gʊta tara bɩ do nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta kʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn, nyɩsɩzaa m, an nɩ nyibəə dam Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ ma. A y'a hɩrɛ a zi m, a ʊ gʊaa gʊta naa a mɩ.
Gʊaa haay nɩ tam zi, gʊɔɔ gʊtɔɔ kan gʊɔɔ poorero kɩ. Ŋ n a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa bɩ do, Woso paŋŋa kʊ n n'a birm paŋŋa gʊta bɩ m.»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ y'a tʊr karɛ a lemim ma, bala, a ka k'a ʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ zɛm kədə a nyɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a dɔmɩm laatʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ ŋ Filipi Woso cirbəə lemim nyɩnta padarɛ bɩ si kan Yeezuu Krista tɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ batɛm si, lannɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, Sɩmɔɔn mɩŋŋa n a ba sɩrakarɛzaa sɔ, an batɛm si, an nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan Filipi kɩ. Hoserlo kan makrarɔ kɩ k'a nɩ ŋ yɩm bɩ, a n zɛ kədə.
Kʊ ŋ y'a ma ŋ ʊ Samarii zannɔ Woso lemim bɩ si bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ Pɩyɛɛr nyɔɔ kan Zaan kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ yaa da Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ minto kʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer, kʊ ŋ n a da ma ŋn'a si.
Sɩra m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer ŋ gʊaa deem taan… ra cɩna y. Batɛm ŋ y'a si Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma bala.
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ n'a wɔ kam Samarii zannɔ wɔɔ ra, ŋn'ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sim.
Sɩmɔɔn k'a yɩ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ kam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ mim la, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri sim bɩ, a a cɩnta k'a busoo ka ŋ ʊ.
A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a paŋŋa naa do ka m ʊ sɔ, gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm, kʊ m bɩ m wɔ ka ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ ŋ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si.»
Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ busoo bɩ n a zar kan ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa kɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ɩ hɔɔn da ɩ ʊ, n y'a dam ma, ŋnɩ Woso ganwʊrɛ si busoo m bɩ minto.
Hɔ k'a nɩ bam naa ʊ naa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ a nɔ ʊ y, bala, ɩbɩɩ heer bɩ tɩrga Woso taa y.
Ɩ bɔ ɩ taam ɩ kʊsɩrabaa bɩ minto, k'ɩ yaa da Zuuba m. Hɔɔndarɛ k'a bʊr ɩbɩɩ heer ʊ bɩ, n y'a sugur karɛ ɩ ʊ barɛm.
Sɩra m, mɔɔ yɩ, jɩmbaa heerbusu kan mimbʊnyaa lɔmbaa kɩ nɔ ɩbɩɩ n ta ʊ.»
Sɩmɔɔn n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a yaa da Zuuba m mɔɔ minto, hɔ k'awɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ, kʊ hɔsɩ bɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y.»
Pɩyɛɛr kan Zaan kɩ kʊ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ ka, ŋnɩ Zuuba lemim bɩ pa da bɩ, ŋ y'a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʊ, ŋn'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam Samarii gʊrgarɔ ʊ gʊta.
Zuuba malɛɛka deem meer ba kan Filipi kɩ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Wuti ɩ ta jɩsa zeezi, ɩ zaa k'a bɔ Zerizalɛm ʊ an nɩ tam Gazaa ʊ bɩ sa. Zaa bɩ do, poohɔɔn m.»
Filipi n wuti lɛɛm an ta. Bala, Etiyopii gʊaa deem, lannɔdɔmazaa, k'a m Etiyopii zannɔ lʊcir Kandasɩ arzaka dɔmazaa bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, an aa yaa da,
an a bɔ an nɩ doom. Nyɩnta a ʊ a tɛrkʊ nɔ ʊ, an nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci karɩnda bam.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʊ: «Ta zɔɔ, ɩ tɛrkʊ bɩ ku.»
Filipi n bra si, an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii ci karɩnda barɛ ma Etiyopii gʊaa bɩ lɛ ʊ, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a karɩnda bam naa, ɩbɩɩ y'a jɩ mam paan… ra?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Kʊ m a ba lɔ m a jɩ ma, kʊ gʊaa ba ʊ an n'a jɩ dɩndam mɔɔ nɩ?» A n Filipi bir, a ʊ, an bɩ nyɩnta a jɩr ʊ.
Wosoci bɩ bɩncɛ naa do an n'a karɩnda barɛ:
Amba, serda kʊ n bʊr m k'a b'a bʊkɔ bɔ ʊ,
amba, sinnyɛɛm bəətir kʊ n n'a ka zɩnzɛm la,
ncɩnaaʊ a bɩr meer barɛ y.
Kʊ n y'a da nyannɩ ʊ bɩ,
a n gumə yɩ dʊdɔkənno zi y.
Nka n nɩ naa do mim dɩndarɛ?
Bala, n y'a mɩsɩrbaa bɔ durnya ʊ.
Etiyopii gʊaa bɩ n a hɩ Filipi m, a ʊ: «Nka wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ n n'a mim dɩndarɛ? K'ɩ hɩ m m. A hɔ an n'a dɩndam gɛɛ, gʊaa vanta hɔ nɩ?»
Filipi n a lɛ gʊ, an zu Wosoci bɩ meerbaa b'ʊ, an Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩ m.
Kʊ ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ yaa hi ku, Etiyopii gʊaa bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ba hi m na. Bɔ n n'a tam mɔɔ m tolle kʊ m bɩ batɛm si?» [
Filipi n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «K'ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma ɩ batɛm si.» Gʊaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ n'ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ sɩra ka, mɔɔ ʊ: Yeezuu Krista bɩ, Woso Nyɩ m.»]
A n lɛ ka, n nɩ tɛrkʊ bɩ da jɩm ʊ. Filipi kan Etiyopii gʊaa bɩ kɩ, ŋ hɩɩya haay gasʊ hi b'ʊ, Filipi n batɛm ka ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ bɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri Filipi gaa an cenim, Etiyopii gʊaa bɩ n a ya, an n'a yɩrɛ y, an a zaa sa kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Kʊ Filipi nɩ, a yɩ n yaa ʊ Azɔttɩ kʊ ʊ, an nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam kʊrɔ haay ʊ an nɩ cenim, an nɩ tam Sezaree kʊ ʊ.
Sol k'a gɔɔta an nɩ fɩr kam Zuuba karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, a lɛ n taa k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ bɩ, a ta wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ zi,
an aa yɛ han, k'an ciro ba Damas zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛrɔ wɔɔ minto, k'a yaa gʊɔɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ zum zaa daa b'ʊ, kʊ lʊ m gɛɛ yar nɩ, k'a nyasʊ a sur, a bʊr m Zerizalɛm ʊ.
A zaa sa, an nɩ tarɛ, an aa a zɔ Damas ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, lɛɛgure a to mim ʊ, an yɔ, an a ku ra.
A n a do tara ʊ, an a to, an leer ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Sol, Sol, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma?»
A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?» «Mɔɔ m Yeezuu, gʊaa k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr kam ma bɩ.
Bɩ, wuti, ɩ gasʊ tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ ba bɩ hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ jɩm, dabɔʊ bɩ n a ka, ŋ n a dɔ kʊ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y. Ŋ yɩ leer bɩ mam, bɩ ŋ bɩr gɔsɩ yɩrɛ y.
Sol n wuti tara ʊ b'ʊ, baa kan a mɩnyaa gaa ra bɩ kɩ haay, a bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y. A zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ n a gaa a wɔ ma, ŋnɩ gasʊ m Damas ʊ.
A n gɔɔta b'ʊ kan mɩm war bɩ kɩ dɔmɩm kaakʊ, a n hɔsɩ bɩ, b'a n hi mi sɔ y.
Karɩndanyɩ deem ɩ nyɩnta Damas ʊ b'ʊ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas. Zuuba n a bir hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʊ: «Ananɩyas!» A n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, ba mɔɔ n na!»
Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ zaa kʊ n n'a birm ‹Zaa tɩrga› bɩ sa, ɩ ta Zidas har ʊ, ɩ gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Sol bɩ laaka da. Tarsɩ gʊaa m. A ɩ b'ʊ, an nɩ yaa dam,
a gʊaa k'a tɔ m Ananɩyas bɩ yɩ hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʊ, an gasʊ, an a wɔ ka ra k'a mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ.»
Ananɩyas n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Zuuba, mɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, gʊɔɔ nɩ gʊaa naa do mim dɩndam, ŋn'a zibəəro bʊnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m bɩ mim dɩndam sɔ Zerizalɛm nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zaa ka ʊ an bʊr naa ʊ, k'a bɩ gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ sur.»
Bɩ, Zuuba a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ta bala, gʊaa naa do makra hɔ m, mɔɔ n a bɔ ʊ k'an mɔɔ tɔ hɩ kɩfɩɩrɔ kan cinno kɩ, Israyɛl zannɔ kɩ bire ʊ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa fɩryɩrɛ do haay k'a n'a yɩm mɔɔ tɔ minto bɩ hɩnkam nɩ.»

Ananɩyas n ta, an aa gasʊ har ʊ b'ʊ, an a wɔrɔ ka ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «M danyɩ Sol, Zuuba Yeezuu niŋŋə k'a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ zaa sa, ɩ nɩ zɛm b'ɩ mɔɔ nyɔɔ, kʊ m b'a ka k'ɩ mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ, kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'ɩbɩɩ heer han.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ zɔ kapra y'a to a mɩm ʊ an sur tara ʊ, a mɩm nɩ lɛɛ yɩm. A n wuti, an batɛm si.
Bɩ, Sol k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, a a ya, an paŋŋa yɩ.
A gɔɔta an dɔmɩnnɔ ba kan karɩndanyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Damas nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ poore,
bɩ, a a hɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ lɛɛm, a ʊ Yeezuu bɩ Woso Nyɩ m.

Gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam ma rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do bɛɛ nyɩnta an nɩ fɩr kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa dam tɔ naa do minto Zerizalɛm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ ra? Bʊr bɛɛ a ʊ tɔkkɛ k'a bɩ ŋ gʊr, a ŋ sur a ta ŋ nɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ zi ra?»
Bɩ, Sol paŋŋa y'a dam la, an nɩ bʊr m zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Damas ʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ra kan a meerbaa bɩ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Yeezuu bɩ, a m *Krista.
K'a maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ duro a dɩnda kan kʊ kɩ, k'a Sol zɛ k'an ga.
Sol n hɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ k'a ba bɩ dɔ. Ŋ nɩ dɔ tara bɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ ma sinuu ʊ kan gunuu ʊ kɩ, k'a a da ma, a ku a zɛ.
Bɩ, gunuu deem ʊ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a da kasɩ ʊ, ŋn'a busu, ŋn'a zer bar m pəŋŋə bɩ kur.
Sol k'a lee ku Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, a a ŋʊa k'a a zɛ kʊ ra kan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, ŋ haay ɩ nyi bam nɩ, bala ŋ n yɛ, ŋn'a si paan… karɩndanyɩ y.
Barnabas n a gaa, an ta m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ zi, an Zuuba k'a hɩnka m hɔ niŋŋə zaa bire ʊ bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, kan meerbaa niŋŋə k'a ba bɩ kɩ. A Yeezuu tɔ dɩnda Damas ʊ kan sɩra kɩ.
Bɩ kur kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Sol ɩ minkarɛ ŋ nɩ, an nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ, an nɩ Zuuba tɔ hɩm kan nyɛɛsʊm kɩ.
A tɩr kan zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ grɛkkɩ lemim hɩm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ bɩr bɩsɩ kam kan kʊ kɩ. Brɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər.
Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Sezaree ʊ, b'ʊ bɩ ŋ y'a ka, an ta Tarsɩ ʊ.
Sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʊ kan Galilee kɩ, Samarii kɩ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan laafɩɩ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ paŋŋa yɩm, ŋn'ɩ tam kan Zuuba nyibəə kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa minto y'a ka, ŋ lɛ n n'a dam la.
Pɩyɛɛr k'a nɩ bɩrm lɛɛ haay ʊ bɩ, a ta wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Lida ʊ rɔ wɔɔ zi.
A n aa gʊaa yɩ b'ʊ a tɔ m Enee. Yɩnyar a ʊ an nɩ wʊtam kan mɛgarɛ kɩ a gargʊ burə ʊ dɔɔraa sinnyə.
Pɩyɛɛr n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Enee, Yeezuu Krista y'ɩ waam. Wuti, ɩ ɩ wʊtarahɔ bɩ gʊr ɩ zi m.» A n wuti lɛɛm sɔ.
Lida gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay kan Sarɔɔn kʊ bɩncɛ fapɩda zannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ kʊ ŋ naa yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ zu Zuuba ʊ.
Lʊ ɩ nyɩnta ʊ Zoppee ʊ, karɩndanyɩ m, a tɔ m Tabɩta, a lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Dɔrkas› grɛkkɩ lemim m. (A jɩ k'a hɩ a ʊ: ‹Mee›). A ziro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba gʊta, an n'a dam cicirzannɔ han sɔ.
Bala, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, a yaaba zɛ, an ga. Kʊ ŋ y'a gər bɩ zʊr, ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ yaa a wʊta cɛ nɔ k'a nɩ mim ʊ b'ʊ.
Lida k'an jɩnjɛɛm Zoppee ma bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ma ŋ ʊ, Pɩyɛɛr ta b'ʊ. Ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ yaarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ nyɔɔ ma kʊ ŋ n'aa a bir ncɩnaaʊ: «Ɩ tɔ ʊ ɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʊ dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa.»

Lɛɛm bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr wuti, an zu kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ. K'a yaa lee ku bɩ, ŋ y'a ka an ta cɛ k'a nɩ mim ʊ b'ʊ, zonno wɔɔ haay n jɩm a lɛɛ, ŋn'ɩ nyi karɛ. Ŋ nɩ huuro kan gɔbgarɔ kɩ kʊ Dɔrkas nyɩnta an nɩ bam dɔmɩm k'a nyɩnta ʊ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ hɩnka m.
Pɩyɛɛr n a ka gʊaa haay n bɔ, an sʊnta, an yaa da. A n a wusigə an a nya gər bɩ rɛ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Tabɩta, wuti!» A n a mɩm gʊ, k'a Pɩyɛɛr yɩ bɩ, a wuti an nyɩnta.
Pɩyɛɛr n a wɔ dɔ rɛ, an wuti an jɩm. A n wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ bir kan zonno wɔɔ kɩ, an a hɩnka ŋ nɩ mɩsɩr.
Zoppee zannɔ haay a ma, gʊɔɔ gʊta n sɩra ka Zuuba ʊ.
Pɩyɛɛr gɔɔta an maasɩrɛ ba Zoppee ʊ, zappa kʊ n n'a birm Sɩmɔɔn bɩ har ʊ.
Gʊaa ɩ nyɩnta Sezaree ʊ, a tɔ m Kɔrnɛy. Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa m. Sʊrdaarɔ zɔrsɔddɩ zɛkʊra kʊ n n'a birm «Italik» bɩ barla an ta ʊ.
Gʊaa m an sɩra ka Woso ʊ paan…, an nɩ nyi bam Woso m kan a har zannɔ kɩ haay. A y'a dam zɩɩfʊrɔ cicirzannɔ gʊtɔɔ han, an nɩ yaa dam Woso m dɔmɩm haay.
Hindeem ʊ, wakatɩ kaakʊ zeezi yirbəə n bɩ, a Woso malɛɛka yɩ paan… Makra nɔ ʊ, an gasʊ a har ʊ, an n'a birm, a ʊ: «Kɔrnɛy!»
Kɔrnɛy n dɩga ma sɩɩ…, dabɔʊ n a nyasʊ, an a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A lɔ, Zuuba?» Malɛɛka bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛrɔ kan ɩ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ba rɔ wɔɔ kɩ minto, Woso a hɔɔn da ɩbɩɩ ma.
Bɩ, naa ma bɩ, gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ Zoppee ʊ kʊ ŋ n'aa Sɩmɔɔn, gʊaa niŋŋə kʊ n so ra, n n'a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ gaa ŋnɩ bʊr m.
Zer a ʊ Sɩmɔɔn vanta k'an zappa bɩ har ʊ higʊta lɛ ra.»
Malɛɛka k'a meer ba kan kɩ bɩ k'a nyaam bɩ, Kɔrnɛy a zibəənyɩnɔ bir hɩɩya kan a sʊrdaarɔ gʊaa deem k'a sɩra ka Woso ʊ paan… bɩ kɩ,
an mim haay k'a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, an ŋ nyɔɔ Zoppee ʊ.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kʊ ŋ zaa sa ŋn'ɩ tam bɩ, ŋ y'a zɔ kʊ bɩ ma. Bɩ ma bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr der cɛ bɩ bɛŋŋʊ ra k'a yaa da. Nyɩnta a ʊ sinuu zeezi.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ, nɔ a nyasʊ, an nyɩnta an a ŋʊa k'a hɔbɩrɛ bɩ. N nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bam k'a ka ʊ. Lɛɛm bɩ, a hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ.
A n brama yɩ an a gʊ, hɔ niŋŋə n a to brama, an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan pɛɛra gʊta kɩ, n n a bɔ kʊ ʊ, an b'a cɩnta tara ʊ.
A nɔ ʊ bɩ, hɔmɩsɩr do haay n ta ʊ: hɔ gam si, bɔɔ n n'a gaatam tara ʊ, kan bɔɔ n nɩ werm brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Leer n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Pɩyɛɛr, aya, ŋ zɩnzɛ, ɩ ŋ bɩ!» Pɩyɛɛr n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ:
«Ayo Zuuba, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ n hɔ bʊnyaa kan dintim hɔ kɩ bɩ cɩna y. Wɔɔ do sɩhɔ m.»
Leer n a ya, an a hɩ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʊ: «Hɔ kʊ Woso dintim gʊ ma bɩ, ɩ b'a bir dintim hɔ y.»
Naa do ba gallɛm kaakʊ, hɔ bɩ n a bɔ, an ta brama lɛɛm.
Pɩyɛɛr n a mɩŋŋa lar a hɔɔn ʊ gallɛm hɔka hɔhɩnkarɛ naa do jɩ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, Kɔrnɛy zibəəzannɔ kʊ ŋ laaka da jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ Sɩmɔɔn har ma rɔ wɔɔ lee ku hallɛ ma.
Ŋ nɩ bir darɛ, k'a a dɔ kʊ Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ, zer a ʊ har bɩ do ʊ gɛ.
Pɩyɛɛr n gɔɔta an n'a hɔɔn dam hɔhɩnkarɛ k'a a yɩ bɩ ma. Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ba gʊɔɔ kaakʊrɔ n n'a karɛ ɩ ma na.
Zer zɔɔ-zɔɔ ɩ zaa sa kan ŋ kɩ, ɩ bɩ bɩsɩ ka y. Bala, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ nyɔɔ.»
Pɩyɛɛr n zer, an gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ ʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ba n nɩ. Mɔɔ awɔɔ n'a karɛ m ma bɩ. Bɔ minto y'a ka awɔɔ n bʊr naa ʊ?»

Ŋ n'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa Kɔrnɛy k'an gʊaa tɩrga, an nɩ nyi bam Woso m, a tɔ n nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩm zɩɩfʊrɔ do barla bɩ, Woso malɛɛka a hɩnka m, a ʊ, an a ka, k'ɩbɩɩ m bʊr a har ʊ, k'a b'a tʊr ka ɩ ma.»
Pɩyɛɛr n ŋ si, an a ka ŋnɩ gasʊ, an wʊtaʊrɛcɛ ka ŋ ʊ. Bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a cem kan ŋ kɩ, kan Zoppee danyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ.
Ŋ lee ku Sezaree ʊ, dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʊ. Kɔrnɛy n a banka, an nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma. A a do gʊɔɔ bir kan a gʊaasɩbɔɔ paan…rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Pɩyɛɛr lee ku ma bɩ, Kɔrnɛy wuti, an a zɛ ʊ, an sʊnta a taa, an a da ʊ.
Pɩyɛɛr n a wɔ dɔrɛ, an a busu brama, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Wuti! Gʊaa m mɔɔ m sɔ.»
Ŋ n sʊʊra ba kan kʊ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ gasʊm. K'a bɩ sʊr gʊɔɔ ma, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra gʊta bɩ,
a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ a cisə ba kan zɩɩfʊ kɩ k'an a zɛ kʊ ra kan saana kɩ, gɛɛ an gasʊ a har ʊ ra! Bɩ, Woso a hɩnka mɔɔ m, a ʊ, mɔɔ n m ga m, kʊ m dɩga gɔsɩ ma, m a ba hɔ bʊnyaa gɛɛ dintim zaa y.
Bɩ y'a ka, k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ bir bɩ, mɔɔ n bɩsɩ ka zɛrɛ ma y. Bɩ naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m m birle bɩ jɩ dɔ.»
Kɔrnɛy n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A dɔmɩm kaakʊ her, ncɩnaaʊ nyi m, mɔɔ n nɩ yaa darɛ m har ʊ yirbəə wakatɩ kaakʊ ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊaa n a hɩnka mɔɔ lɛɛ, a huuro n nɩ gum,
an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: Kɔrnɛy, n y'ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ si, bɩ Woso ɩbɩɩ ganwʊrɛrɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ka cicirzannɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ minto bɩ, gʊaa nyɔɔ Zoppee ʊ k'an aa gʊaa k'a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn n nɩ so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ bir, k'an bʊr naa ʊ. Zer a ʊ Zoppee zappa k'a tɔ m Sɩmɔɔn bɩ har ʊ, higʊta lɛ ra.
Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n nyɔɔ da lɛɛm kʊ n n'ɩbɩɩ bir, ɩbɩɩ yɛ sɔ, k'ɩ bʊr wɔɔ zi. Ba wɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ taa naa ʊ haay na, k'ʊ ʊ tʊr ka hɔ haay kʊ Zuuba a hɩ ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.»
Pɩyɛɛr n bɔkarɛ, an a lɛ gʊ, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Sɩra m, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ʊ, Woso bɩr gʊɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Bɩ do haay nɔ ʊ, gʊaa k'a nɩ nyi bam nɩ, an nɩ tɩrgabaa zi bam bɩ, a y'a sire a jɩr ʊ.
Woso a mɩŋŋa lemim nyɔɔ Israyɛl zannɔ ma, an Yeezuu Krista k'an gʊɔɔ haay Zuuba bɩ laafɩɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ hɩ.
Awɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə k'a ba Zidee kʊ haay ʊ bɩ dɔ. A sɩŋŋɩda a sa Galilee ʊ Zaan batɛm lemim hɩrɛ bɩ jɛ ʊ.

Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ do, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, bɩ Woso a bɔ ʊ, an Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan a paŋŋa kɩ zer a mim ʊ. A bɔ lɛɛ haay ʊ, an mɩŋŋabaa zi ba, an nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Sʊtaana lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ waam, bala, Woso ɩ kan kɩ.
A zibəə haay k'a a ba zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ʊ, kan Zerizalɛm kɩ ʊ bɩ, a kasɛtɩzannɔ m wɔɔ m. Ŋ y'a zeŋŋə gɔ ma, ŋn'a zɛ gər.
Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hɔ ma, an lɛ ka ʊ k'an a taʊrɛ hɩnka.
Gʊaa haay bɛɛ a a hɩnka nɩ y, a hɩnka a ʊ kasɛtɩzannɔ kʊ Woso lɛɛ ka an ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, wɔɔ k'ʊ hɔ bɩ, ʊ hɔ mi kan kɩ a mɩmbɔʊrɛ kur gəəno bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ.
A lɛ ka wɔɔ ʊ kɛɛrɛ k'ʊ a hɩ do bɩ m, k'ʊ a kasɛtɩ naa do ka, ʊ ʊ: A mɩŋŋa Woso a bɔ ʊ kan nyɩnta mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʊdɔkər.
A mɩŋŋa wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ n'a kasɛtɩ kam, ŋ ʊ: Gʊaa haay k'a sɩra ka ʊ bɩ y'a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ, a tɔ ma.»
Kʊ Pɩyɛɛr gɔɔta an nɩ meer bɩ bam bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ zer gʊaa haay k'a nyɩnta an n'a tʊr kam meerbaa bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ Pɩyɛɛr da zaa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ zɛ kədə, kʊ ŋ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛ yɩ an zer do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ gʊta ra sɔ bɩ minto.
Ŋ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro ma, ŋn'ɩ meer bam do y'a hʊnhɔ lemim m, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ. Pɩyɛɛr n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ:
«Gʊaa y'a dam ma, an a ta tolle, a ʊ, ŋ bɩ batɛm ka hi m gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʊ ra? Ŋ y'a ba, am wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri yɩ ra!»
A n lɛ ka, kʊ n nɩ batɛm ka ŋ ʊ Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, ŋn'a yɛ han k'a n a ya, an gɔɔta kan a kɩ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta Zidee ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a ma ŋ ʊ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ Woso lemim bɩ si kɛɛrɛ.
Kʊ Pɩyɛɛr a bɔ an ta Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ a sɩŋŋɩda sa, ŋn'ɩ bɩsɩ kam kan kɩ, ŋ ʊ:
«Ɩbɩɩ gasʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ zi, ɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ kan ŋ kɩ!»
Pɩyɛɛr n a bɔ, an mim bɩ sa a jɩ ma deem-deem, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«Nyɩnta mɔɔ ʊ Zoppee kʊ nɔ ʊ, m nɩ yaa dam, mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ. Hɔ niŋŋə y'a to brama, an nɩ zerm, an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan pɛɛra gʊta kɩ, n n a bɔ kʊ ʊ, an bɩ lee ku mɔɔ zi.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ… bɩ, mɔɔ tara burə hɔɔ yɩ, ŋ gam n si-si, poohɔɔ, bɔɔ n'a gaatam nɔ, kan bɔɔ nɩ werm brama rɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ leer ma, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m, a ʊ: Pɩyɛɛr, wuti, ɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ, ɩ ŋ sʊ.
Mɔɔ n a hɩ, mɔɔ ʊ: Fɩɩgaa Zuuba, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, hɔ bʊnyaa gɛɛ dintim hɔ n gasʊ mɔɔ lɛ ʊ y.
Leer bɩ n a ya, an a to brama, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m a hɩɩya hɔ ma, a ʊ: Hɔ kʊ Woso dintim gʊ ma bɩ, ɩ b'a bir dintim hɔ y.
Naa do ba gallɛm kaakʊ, a haay n a bɔ, an ta brama.
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊaa kaakʊ a hɩnka har kʊ wɔɔ n ta ʊ b'ʊ. Ŋ bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ Sezaree ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ, m ta kan ŋ kɩ, bɩ, m bɩ bɩsɩ ka y. Danyɩnɔ sɔrdɩrɔ nɔɔn duro mɔɔ da zaa ʊ, wɔɔ n aa gasʊ gʊaa kʊ n y'a hɩ ma bɩ har ʊ.
A n malɛɛka bɩ k'a a hɩnka hɔ niŋŋə a har ʊ bɩ sa, an a dɩnda wɔɔ m, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: Gʊaa nyɔɔ Zoppee ʊ k'an a ka kʊ Sɩmɔɔn kʊ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Pɩyɛɛr bɩ n bʊr.
A minno kʊ ŋ n'a kam ɩbɩɩ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ kan ɩ har gʊɔɔ kɩ bɩ dɩndarɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
Kʊ mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ sa bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer ŋ la, amb'a a ba wɔɔ m a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ hɔ kʊ Zuuba a hɩ bɩ tɔ da m nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: Zaan hi batɛm ka denter, b'awɔɔ, awɔɔ batɛm sim Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ Woso ganwʊrɛ deem ka gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʊ ncɩnaaʊ amb'a a ka wɔɔ ʊ, dɔmɩm kʊ wɔɔ sɩra ka Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ʊ bɩ, nka m mɔɔ m kʊ m m ta Woso m tolle k'a b'a zi ba?»
Naa k'a a hɩ bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ heer a da, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Woso heerlʊrlɛ k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam bɩ ka do vantɔɔ haay ʊ sɔ.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ hɩsɩga da fɩr kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ Etɩyɛnnɩ garɛ kur bɩ, ŋ ta Fenisii ʊ kan Siipɩr kɩ, Antɩyɔs kɩ ʊ. Ŋ bɩr Woso lemim bɩ pa dam gɔsɩ vanta m, kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ bala y.
Bɩ, Siipɩr zannɔ kan Sirɛnnɩ zannɔ kɩ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ ŋ barla, kʊ ŋ lee ku Antɩyɔs ʊ, ŋnɩ Zuuba Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da grɛkkɩ zannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ.
Zuuba paŋŋa nyɩnta an nɩ kan ŋ kɩ, hallɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ zu Zuuba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ n'a dam la gʊta.
Zerizalɛm sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ mim naa do dɩndarɛ ma, n n Barnabas nyɔɔ Antɩyɔs ʊ.
K'a lee ku, an Woso barka bɩ yɩ, an nɩ zi bam bɩ, a heer yɩ nyɩnta, an ŋ dʊndɔ haay, kʊ ŋ heer n gɔɔta an bɩr kan Zuuba kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Nyɩnta a ʊ gʊaa tɩrga, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a han kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ. Gʊɔɔ gʊta n zu Zuuba zaa ʊ.
Barnabas ta Tarsɩ ʊ k'a yaa a ka Sol ma.
A n aa a yɩ, an a gaa, an bʊr m Antɩyɔs ʊ. Ŋ nɩ dɔɔraa deem ba kan kʊ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zi bam sokʊma bɩ do ʊ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ gʊta m. Antɩyɔs ʊ n lɛɛ ka ʊ, n nɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ bir kristagʊɔɔ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a to Zerizalɛm ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʊ.
Ŋ gʊaa deem kʊ n n'a birm Agabus bɩ wuti, an a hɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m, a ʊ: nɔ gʊta n'a dam tara burə ʊ jilli. A nyɩnta ʊ denter, cir Kloodɩ dɔmɩm ʊ.
Karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a cɩnta kan kʊ kɩ, gʊaa biyəə kan a wɔhɔ kɩ, k'a nyɔɔ a danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʊ rɔ wɔɔ daahan minto.
Bɩ ŋ y'a ba, ŋnɩ Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ nyɔɔ gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ ma kan daahan bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ ma bɩ, cir *Hɩrɔɔdɩ a ka, ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zum Yeezuu ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gʊr, k'a fɩr ka ŋ ma.
A a ka, n n Zaan danyɩ Zakkɩ bɩ zɛ kargʊ m.
K'a dɩga a zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ heer nyɔɔ mim naa do ma bɩ, a a ya, an a ka, ŋnɩ Pɩyɛɛr nyasʊ. Nyɩnta a ʊ, bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma *cibsa dɔmɩm ʊ.
K'a a ka, ŋn'a nyasʊ, ŋn'a du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ bɩ, a a ka sʊrdaarɔ n dɔ ma gʊaa bueeresɔrdɩ, ŋn'a sinsim kʊ m si-si, k'a b'a dʊdɔ ka pakkɩ cenle kur gʊɔɔ lɛɛ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Pɩyɛɛr nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ bɩ, sokʊma bɩ y'a tɔŋ ʊ kan Woso yaadarɛ kɩ kʊsɩ-kʊsɩ a minto.
N Pɩyɛɛr kʊsɩ baŋŋarɔ m hɩɩya. A dɔ k'a nɩ mɛm kʊ Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a bɔ bɩ, gum bɩ do ʊ, Pɩyɛɛr ɩ hinceem bam sʊrdaa hɩɩya bire ʊ, sʊrdaarɔ nɩ dɔm lɔnnɔcɛ bɩ lɛ ma.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka sʊr zɛ, lɛɛgure n cɛ bɩ han haay. Malɛɛka bɩ n Pɩyɛɛr zɛ pa-pa a boon ma, an a gu, a ʊ: «Wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ!» Baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ n a hʊnhʊr Pɩyɛɛr wɔrɔ wɔɔ ma.
Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ hɔsoaʊ bɩ sa, ɩ so ɩ ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ kʊsɔrɔ wɔɔ da ʊ!» A n a ba maam. Malɛɛka bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ zaba bɩ sa, ɩ da ɩ ra, k'ɩ zu mɔɔ ʊ!»
Pɩyɛɛr n bɔ, an zu a jɛ ʊ. B'a n a dɔ a ʊ, hɔ kʊ malɛɛka b'a ba bɩ, sɩra nɩ y, a ɩ dɩgam ma a ʊ makra awɔɔ yɩ.

Ŋ n lɛɛ ka, ŋnɩ cem lɛɛkarɛ bɩncɛ bɩ han kan a dɔmazannɔ kɩ, ŋn'a ya, ŋnɩ cem a hɩɩya hɔ bɩ han, ŋn'a lee ku pɔyaa cɛlɛ k'a nya kʊ bɩ rɛ bɩ ma. A n a gʊ a zim ŋ lɛɛ. Kʊ ŋ bɔ garga ra bɩ, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'aa zada bɩ ku, lɛɛm bɩ, malɛɛka b'a gʊ Pɩyɛɛr ma.
Pɩyɛɛr hɔɔn n zer kɛɛrɛ. A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ. Sɩra m, Zuuba a malɛɛka nyɔɔ, an bɩ mɔɔ bɔ Hɩrɔɔdɩ wɔ ʊ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ kɩ, kan hɔ haay kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta k'a ba mɔɔ m bɩ kɩ.»
K'a hɔɔn bɩ zer bɩ, a a hʊr, an ta Zaan kʊ n so ra, n n a tɔ ka Markɩ bɩ da Maarii har ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ gʊta nyɩnta b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam.
K'a cɛlɛ bɩ zɛ bɩ, Zibəənyɩlʊ k'a tɔ m Rode bɩ bʊr k'a bɩ dɩga a.
A Pɩyɛɛr leer dɔ, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, cɛlɛ bɩ gʊrɛ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ, an a wusigə an bra si, k'a yaa hɩ a ʊ, Pɩyɛɛr bʊr, an nɩ cɛlɛ ma.
Ŋ n a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ mim y'a wusigə ra?» A n gɔɔta, an n'a hɔ bɩ ra, a ʊ sɩra m. Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: A malɛɛka bɛɛ ra?
Pɩyɛɛr n gɔɔta, an nɩ cɛlɛ bɩ zɛm. Ŋ n kɔ ŋn'a gʊ, kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ bɩ, ŋ n zɛ kədə.

A n meer ba a wɔ m, a ʊ, ŋnɩ zɛ pi. Hɔ kʊ Zuuba a ba, an a bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ bɩ, a bɩ jɩsa an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ, an b'a nyambʊr, a ʊ: «K'a ta, a yaa hɩ *Zakkɩ m kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.» A n bɔ, an ta bɩncɛ vanta ʊ.
Dɔmɩrɛ ma bɩ, tatʊr gʊta nyɩnta ʊ sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ. Ŋ n a dɔ kʊ Pɩyɛɛr a ba lɔ y?
Hɩrɔɔdɩ n a ka, ŋn'a ka ma, bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y. A n a ka, ŋnɩ sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ lar, an lɛ ka a ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ. Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr a to Zidee ʊ, an ta Sezaree ʊ, an aa gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ.

Hɩrɔɔdɩ heer wuti kan Tiir zannɔ kɩ, Sidɔn zannɔ kɩ. Brɔɔ n a lɛ ba deem, ŋnɩ bʊr k'a b'a yɩ. Ŋ n gʊaasɩbabaa da cirhar dɩgamazaa Blastus ma, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋnɩ bʊr k'a bɩ kʊ ma. Bala, ŋ kʊ bɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, bɔ a nawʊm cir bɩ kʊ b'ʊ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ ŋ y'a bɔ ʊ bɩ k'a a ku bɩ, Hɩrɔɔdɩ a cirbəəhuu da a ra, an nyɩnta duu burə ʊ, an nɩ gʊtabaa meer bam kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ,
ŋn'ɩ zee dam Hɩrɔɔdɩ mim ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Woso leer n naa, gʊaa hɔ bɛɛ y!»
Lɛɛm bɩ, Zuuba malɛɛka Hɩrɔɔdɩ zɛ, k'a n a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ bɩ minto. Mukuno n a bɩ, an ga.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ, Woso lemim y'a dam la, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ lɛ n n'a zum la.
Barnabas kan Sol kɩ kʊ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, a zi bɩ ba an nya Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ ŋn'ɩ tam Antɩyɔs ʊ. Ŋ Zaan kʊ n so ra ŋn'a tɔ ka Markɩ bɩ gaa kan a kɩ, ŋnɩ ta m.

Sokʊma kʊ n y'a cɩnta Antɩyɔs ʊ bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ kan karɩnsaambɔɔ kɩ: Barnabas, Sɩmɩnyɔɔ kʊ n n'a birm Nizɛɛr bɩ kɩ, Sirɛnnɩ Lusiyus kɩ, kan cir Hɩrɔɔdɩ Antipas nyɩbaa zukuuzaa Manayɛn kɩ, Sol kɩ.
Hindeem ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa dam Zuuba m, ŋn'a lɛ kʊsɩm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bɔ ʊ a hɔ, zibəə kʊ mɔɔ ŋ bir ma bɩ minto.»
Kʊ ŋ y'a lɛ kʊsɩ, ŋnɩ yaa da ŋn'a nya bɩ, ŋ y'a wɔ ka ŋ la, ŋnɩ ŋ da zaa ra.
Kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ŋ nyɔɔ bɩ, Barnabas kan Sol kɩ zer Selesii ʊ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ ta Siipɩr ʊ, kʊ m bɩ, hi m bɩr ma.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku Salamin ʊ bɩ, ŋ Woso lemim pa da zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ. Zaan nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ, an n'a darɛ ŋ han.
Kʊ ŋ y'a da tara kʊ hi bɩr ma haay bɩ zi, ŋnɩ lee ku Pafɔs ʊ bɩ, ŋ yaa nyɩsɩzaa deem zɛ ʊ. Ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazaa m, zɩɩfʊ m, ŋn'a birm Bar-Yeezuu.
A nyɩnta tara bɩ do lɛɛzaa Sɛrziyus Polus, k'a nyɩnta gʊaa hɔɔnzaa bɩ jɩrmazannɔ wɔɔ barla. Tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ m Barnabas kan Sol kɩ bir, bala, a nyɩnta an a ŋʊa k'a Woso lemim bɩ ma.
Nyɩsɩzaa bɩ do kʊ n n'a birm Elimas, grɛkkɩ lemim bʊʊrɔzaa, bɩ n yɛ ŋ nɩ y, an n'a kam ma k'a a ka kʊ tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ bɩ sɩra ka y.
Sol kʊ n n'a birm Pol bɩ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a han b'ɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ…,
an n'a hɩm nɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔɔn bʊnyaa ka, kan ŋʊaarbaa kɩ bɩ, Sʊtaana nyɩ ra, sɩra jɩm naa, ɩbɩɩ bɩ Zuuba zaa tɩrga bɩ zarlɛ tom na?
Ba Zuuba wɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ ra na: ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ bam bʊʊ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ b'ɩ yarɛ ɩ woso gure yɩ y.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, monsigə kan gunuu kɩ a ku ra, an n'a bɩrm lɛɛ haay ʊ, an n'a kam gʊaa ma k'an a gaa.
Tara bɩ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a naa yɩ bɩ, a a ba sɩrakarɛzaa, bala, Zuuba karɩnda bɩ gasʊ a hɔɔn ʊ paan….
Pol kan a zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a hʊr Pafɔs ʊ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Panfilii kʊ Pɛrzee ʊ. Bɩ, Zaan a gʊ ŋ ma, an a wusigə Zerizalɛm ʊ.
Ŋ n a hʊr Pɛrzee ʊ, ŋn'a zaa sa, ŋn'aa lee ku Pisidii Antɩyɔs ʊ. Ŋ n gasʊ sokʊmacɛ ʊ *sabaa hinni ʊ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta.
Kʊ ŋ lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kɩ ciro karɩnda ba, ŋn'a nya bɩ, sokʊmacɛ cinno wɔɔ a ka, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ʊ danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ ɩ dʊndɔ m k'a ka gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m, zaa ta ʊ!»
Pol n wuti, an a wɔ busu, a ʊ: «Israyɛl zannɔ kan awɔɔ k'a nɩ nyi bam Woso m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a tʊr ka mɔɔ ma.
Wɔɔ do Israyɛl Woso bɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ bɔ ʊ. Do k'a nyɩnta Eziptɩ ʊ bɩ, a a da ra gʊta, bɩ, kan a wɔ paŋŋa kɩ, a a ka ŋnɩ bɔ,
a hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʊ poohɔɔn ʊ dɔɔraa busi nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a do saanhɩna zɩnzɛ Kanaan kʊ ʊ, an a ka, ŋna so ŋ tararɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
A ga kʊ ʊ naa haay a ba kan dɔɔraa zɔrsi busoor kɩ.
Bɩ kur bɩ, a dʊdɔkənno ka ŋ ʊ an ta, an wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Sanwɛl ku.
Ŋ n cir yɛ, Woso n Bɛnzamɛn do gʊaa Kis nyɩ Sol ka ŋ ʊ. A cirbəə bɩrɛ dɔɔraa busi ku.
Woso n wɔ saa bɩ ma, an Davɩd bɔ ʊ, an a ka ŋ ʊ k'an yɩ cir. A n a kasɛtɩ ka b'ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ Zesee nyɩ Davɩd yɩ, mɔɔ heer gʊaa m, an nɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa haay bɩ bam.›
Amba Woso k'a ler bɔ bɩ, a Yeezuu bɔ Davɩd do nɔ ʊ k'an yɩ Israyɛl bʊmbɔrɛzaa.
K'a n bʊr cɩna bɩ, Zaan lɛɛ ka an bɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ tore batɛm pa da Israyɛl zannɔ m haay.
Zaan zibəə k'a bʊr an nɩ nyam bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: Awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam a ʊ, nka m mɔɔ nɩ? Gʊaa k'awɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma bɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, gʊaa ɩ zɛm mɔɔ kur, bɩ mɔɔ n m ga m, m a kʊsɔrɔ bar hʊr y.»
«M danyɩnɔ, Abraham donyɩnɔ, kan bɔɔ nɩ nyi bam Woso m awɔɔ bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, bʊmbɔrɛ lemim naa do nyɔɔ n y'a ʊ wɔɔ minto.

Zerizalɛm zannɔ kan a cinno kɩ n Yeezuu dɔ y. Ŋ n wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lemim kʊ n n'a karɩnda bam sabaa biyəə hinni ʊ bɩ jɩ ma sɔ y. Bɩ, kʊ ŋ y'a nyasʊ, ŋn'a ka zɛ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a ka wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lemim bɩ n kʊ yɩ.
Kʊ ŋ n mim yɩ a gʊr zi an a ga zɛ m bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ Pɩlatɩ han k'an a ka kʊ n n'a zɛ gər.
Bɩ, kʊ ŋ hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba a minto bɩ ba an nya bɩ, gʊɔɔ a zer gɔ bɩ ma, ŋn'a da yaa ʊ.
Bɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.
Bɩ, a a hɩnka dɔmɩm gʊta nɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ Galilee ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, brɔɔ m kasɛtɩzannɔ kɛɛrɛ gʊɔɔ lɛɛ.»
«Bɩ wɔɔ sɔ, lemim nyɩnta naa do, wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m, lerbɔrɛ kʊ Woso a bɔ wɔɔ zɩrɔ m bɩ,
Woso a ba wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ minto, wɔɔ k'ʊ nɩ ŋ nyɩnɔ bɩ minto, a Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʊ amb'a n y'a gʊrsɩra ba laarɔ ci ʊ, laa hɩɩya hɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ m:
Mɔɔ nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m,
her naa, mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ.
Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, k'a b'a da ma, an vɔn y, a mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ Davɩd hɔɔmɩŋŋɔɔ
kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ paan… rɔ wɔɔ
karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.
