Bɩ minto y'a ka, an n'a hɩm lɛɛ vanta ʊ laarɔ ci ʊ:
A b'a gʊaa mɩŋŋa bɩ tore, an vɔn y.
Bala, Davɩd k'a Woso zi bɩ ba a dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, a bɩ ga, ŋn'a bir a zɩrɔ zi, a mɛsim n vɔn.
Bɩ gʊaa kʊ Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ, a mɛsim n vɔn y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, gʊaa bɩ do minto y'a ka mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur pa n nɩ dam awɔɔ bire ʊ.
A mɩŋŋa minto, gʊaa biyəə k'a nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʊ bɩ, a y'a mimbʊnyaarɔ haay sugur yɩrɛ, bɩ lɛ kʊ Moyiisi a ka bɩ b'a dam ma an a ka awɔɔ ʊ y.
K'a dundo a zi, kʊ hɔsɩ bɩ ba awɔɔ m amba hɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a hɩ bɩ nɩ y. Ŋ y'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ:
K'a dɩga a, sɔ gʊɔɔ m zannɔ,
k'a zɛ kədə, k'a nyaam!
Mɔɔ zi bam awɔɔ dɔmɩm ʊ,
zibəə m, awɔɔ n nɩ bɩsɩ kam ma,
baa kʊ gʊaa a dɩnda awɔɔ m.»
Pol kan Barnabas kɩ kʊ ŋ bʊr ŋn'ɩ bɔm bɩ, ŋ y'a yɛ ŋ han gʊta, kʊ ŋ nɩ so minno nɔɔn duro ra sabaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ma.

Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɩsɩga da bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ gʊta kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zum zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Pol kan Barnabas kɩ da zaa ʊ. Sʊʊra kʊ ŋ n'a bam bɩ, ŋ yɩ ŋ dʊndɔm, kʊ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta Woso barka nɔ ʊ.
Sabaa k'a nya ʊ bɩ k'a ku bɩ, tara bɩ zannɔ haay a zɛ kʊ ra k'a a tʊr ka Woso lemim ma.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ gʊta ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, jɩmbaa ŋ heer han, ŋn'ɩ Pol meerbaarɔ wɔɔ nyɩ bʊmbɔŋ ʊ, ŋn'a sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ.

Pol kan Barnabas kɩ a heer ba kookoo, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Awɔɔ Woso lemim b'a ga m, an lɛɛ ka, an hɩ awɔɔ m! K'awɔɔ kaanm Woso lemim bɩ m bɩ, awɔɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ dʊdɔ yar kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ kɩ, a hɩnka a ʊ: awɔɔ lɛ baa k'a yɩ y. Kɛɛrɛ naa, ʊ wusigə wɔɔ nawʊm do vantɔɔ zi.
Bala, lɛ kʊ Zuuba a ka wɔɔ bɩ n naa:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʊ
k'ɩ yɩ lɛɛgure do gʊta minto,
k'ɩ bʊmbɔrɛ ganwʊrɛ bɩ sa,
ɩ ta m durnya lɛ cɩnta jɩ ʊ.»
Kʊ ŋ minno nɔɔn duro ma bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔm Zuuba Woso lemim ʊ. Bɩ, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ sɩra ka.
Zuuba lemim bɩ lee ku lɛɛ haay ʊ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ lannɔ tɔzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʊ paan… rɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔta kan tara gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ k'a fɩr ka Pol ma kan Barnabas kɩ, k'a la ŋ la, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔ a tara bɩ ra.
Brɔɔ n taanyisi gʊngʊ a gannɔ ma ŋ minto, ŋnɩ ta Ikonɩyɔm ʊ.
Kʊ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan heernyɔɔ kɩ ŋ heer han.
Ikonɩyɔm ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a ba am biisi hɔ bɩ m. Pol ta kan Barnabas kɩ, ŋn'aa gasʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ. Ŋ meerbaa b'a ka, gʊɔɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ n a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ.
Bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ niŋŋoo kʊ ŋ n yɛ sɩrakarɛ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔta, ŋ heer nɩ busum kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Pol kan Barnabas kɩ gɔɔta b'ʊ tee…, ŋn'ɩ meer bam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ Zuuba minto. Zuuba a kasɛtɩ ka ŋ ʊ. Bala, a mɩŋŋa yɩ ŋ meerbaa sɩra hɩnka, an a ka, ŋn'a da ma, ŋn'ɩ hoserlo bam kan makrarɔ kɩ.
Tara nɔ zannɔ wɔɔ n a jir lɛ hɩɩya: gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ kan kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a cinno kɩ, lɛ sa k'a zibəə bʊnyaa ba kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m, k'a ŋ gʊngʊɛɛn jaarɔ m.
Kʊ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ hɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ k'a ba bɩ dɔ bɩ, ŋ y'a si, ŋnɩ ta Likawonii kʊrɔ ʊ, Listɩr kan Derbe kɩ, kan ŋ bɔlɛɛmarɔ kɩ.
B'ʊ sɔ bɩ, ŋ y'ɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ.
Listɩr kʊ gʊaa deem n ta ʊ, a b'a dam ma an jɩm a gannɔ ra y. Yɩ a ʊ lʊgɔbaa bɩ m, a n ta fɩɩgaa y.
Hindeem ʊ, an nyɩnta an n'a tʊr kam Pol meerbaa ma. Pol nɩ dɩgam ma sɩɩ…. K'a yɩ a nɩ sɩrakarɛ m k'a laafɩɩ yɩ bɩ,
a a hɩ kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Wuti ɩ jɩm, ɩ gannɔ ra!» Gʊaa bɩ n wuti lɛ deem, an nɩ tam.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔ kʊ Pol a ba bɩ yɩ bɩ, ŋ y'a leer busu brama, ŋn'a hɩm Likawonii lemim m, ŋ ʊ: «Wosoro y'a ba gʊɔɔ, ŋnɩ zer wɔɔ bire ʊ.»
Ŋ n'ɩ Barnabas birm ‹*Zes›, ŋn'ɩ Pol birm ‹*Hermɛs›, bala, a ɩ nyɩnta meerbaazaa.

Zes yaadarɛcɛ bɩ, pəŋŋə kʊ n y'a bɩr kʊ bɩ ma bɩ lɛ ma n ta ʊ. A mannɩbər b'a ka ŋnɩ ta ŋʊannɔ m, ŋnɩ lɛɛrɔ waa, ŋn'a dɩnda ŋ wer, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ kʊ bɩ lɛ ma. A n a zɛ kʊ ra kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a mannɩ ba.
Kristazibəəzannɔ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ kʊ ŋ mim naa do ma bɩ, ŋ heer a zar gʊta, ŋn'a huuro kɩnkaansʊm, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋn'ɩ tam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zi kan zee kɩ.

Ŋ ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ ra, bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam naa? Wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m wɔɔ m sɔ am awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m! Lemim nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m naa, k'a wɔ saa hɔbaarɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ nɔɔn duro ma, k'a zu Woso k'an mɩsɩr, an brama da kan tara kɩ, higʊta kɩ kan hɔ haay k'an a nɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ b'ʊ.
Kʊ biisi bɩ nɩ, a do haay to, ŋn'ɩ zure a zaarɔ ʊ,
b'a hɔ mɩŋŋa ba awɔɔ m, bala, a lahi ka awɔɔ ʊ, kan mɔsa kɩ, a hɔbɩrɛ ka awɔɔ ʊ, an n'awɔɔ heer nyɔɔm.»
Meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro bʊraama ka gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ. B'a n nyɩnta naanaa k'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʊ kʊ ŋ bɩ mannɩ bɩ ba y.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ y'a to Antɩyɔs ʊ kan Ikonɩyɔm kɩ, ŋnɩ bɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔta. Ŋ n Pol gʊngʊɛɛn jaarɔ m, ŋn'a gɩngaata, ŋnɩ bɔ m tara nɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ dɩgam ma, ŋ ʊ, ga a ʊ.
Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋnɩ bɩr ma bɩ, a wuti, an gasʊ tara nɔ ʊ. Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a a hʊr kan Barnabas kɩ, ŋnɩ ta Derbe ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da Derbe ʊ ŋnɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ yɩ gʊta bɩ, ŋ y'a bɔ, ŋnɩ bɔ Listɩr ʊ, Ikonɩyɔm kan Pisidii Antɩyɔs kɩ ʊ.
Ŋ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ heer yo, ŋnɩ ŋ dʊndɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta a sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «A a ga m, wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ gʊta, k'ʊ bɔkarɛ, ʊ gasʊ Woso cirbəə nɔ ʊ.»
Ŋ lɛɛzannɔ bɔ ʊ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma biyəə nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ yaarɔ da ŋn'a lɛ kʊsɩ, ŋnɩ yaa da lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ da Zuuba kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ʊ bɩ wɔ ʊ.
Ŋ bɔ Pisidii ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Panfilii ʊ,
ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da Pɛrzee ʊ, ŋnɩ cem, ŋnɩ ta Atalɩyaa ʊ.
Ŋ n a to b'ʊ, ŋnɩ da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʊ, tara niŋŋə kʊ ŋ y'a yɛ ʊ Woso han, k'a nɩ ŋ barka da ʊ zibəə kʊ ŋ y'a ba naa minto b'ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku bɩ, ŋ sokʊma bɩ bir, ŋnɩ hɔ haay kʊ Woso a da ŋ han ŋn'a ba bɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, hɔ kʊ Woso a ba, do vantɔɔ ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ bɩ.
Ŋ maasɩrɛ ba b'ʊ kan karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a to Zidee ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩ karɩnda ba danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'awɔɔ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ b'ʊ, a zu Moyiisi yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə b'ʊ, awɔɔ bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ y.»

Mim naa do wuti bʊgʊr gʊta m kan bɩsɩkarɛ kɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kan Pol kɩ Barnabas kɩ bire ʊ. Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a cɩnta kʊ Pol kan Barnabas kɩ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ n ta Zerizalɛm ʊ kʊ ŋ n'aa kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ yɩ kan kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim naa do minto.
Antɩyɔs kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ n dɩga ŋ zaa sarɛ mim ma. Ŋ bɔ Fenisii ʊ kan Samarii kɩ, ŋn'ɩ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ heerlʊrlɛ mim dɩndam, b'a yɩ heernyɔɔ gʊta kan ʊ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, sokʊma a nya ŋ zi, an ŋ si, kristazibəəzannɔ kan kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Woso a da ŋ han ŋn'a ba bɩ sa, ŋn'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ.
Farizɛɛnrɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wuti ŋn'a hɩ ŋ ʊ, a a ga m kʊ ŋ nɩ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛ ka, kʊ ŋ nɩ zu Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a so kʊ ma, k'a dɩga mim naa do ma.
Kʊ ŋ bɩsɩ bɩ ka tee… bɩ, Pɩyɛɛr wuti an a hɩ, a ʊ: «M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ, Woso mɔɔ bɔ ʊ awɔɔ bire ʊ, kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma mɔɔ lɛ m, kʊ ŋ n'a si.
Woso k'a heerlɔ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ, a kasɛtɩ ka ŋ ʊ, an Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ka ŋ ʊ, amba a a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Woso n ŋ gʊ wɔɔ ma poore tɔkkɛ y, sɩrakarɛ minto y'a ka an ŋ heerlɔ wɔɔ sʊrgɔ.
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, bɔ minto y'a ka, an nɩ Woso makra barɛ? A n nɩ mɔr gorezaa bɩ kam karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ra, bɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ kan wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ n a da ma, ʊ n'a busure?
Bɩ, wɔɔ si wɔɔ ʊ, Zuuba Yeezuu barka minto y'a ka wɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.»
Ŋ haay n zɛ pi, ŋn'a tʊr kam Pol kan Barnabas kɩ ma, brɔɔ nɩ hoserlo kan makrarɔ kɩ kʊ Woso a ka ŋ nɩ ba haay do vantɔɔ kʊ ʊ bɩ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a nya bɩ, Zakkɩ meerbaa bɩ si, a ʊ: «M danyɩnɔ, k'a tʊr ka mɔɔ ma.
Sɩmɩnyɔɔ hɔ kʊ Woso a ba a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ, k'a dɩga a do ma, a bɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ba zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ tɔ da wɔɔ nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ yɛ bɩ ma sɔ, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ zɛm bɩ Davɩd har k'a a da bɩ banka m a dɔ,
zeero kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ,
mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ, m ŋ dɔ,
m ŋ jɩm brama.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ
n a ka Zuuba ma,
kan do vantɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ mɛm mɔɔ tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Zuuba ɩ naa hɩ, a y'a ka ŋnɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɔ biisi hɔɔ tee….
Bɩ minto y'a ka mɔɔ m hɔɔn da, mɔɔ ʊ, a n a ga m, wɔɔ n fɩr ka do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɛ Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ ma y.
Ʊ ci ba ŋ ma, ʊ a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ʊ ʊ, ŋ bɩ *wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʊ y, ŋ bɩ jaan da y, ŋ bɩ hɔ gər sim sʊ, kan ma kɩ sɔ y.
Sɩra m, a dɔɔraa laatʊ, gʊɔɔ ɩ tara nɔ biyəə ʊ, ŋnɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ karɩnda bam *sabaa hinni haay ʊ ŋ sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ.»

Kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, sokʊma bɩ kɩ, a cɩnta k'a gʊɔɔ bɔ ʊ a barla a ŋ nyɔɔ kan Pol kɩ Barnabas kɩ Antɩyɔs ʊ. Nyɩnta a ʊ Ziidi kʊ n n'a birm Barsabas, kan Silas kɩ, gʊɔɔ m, ŋ nɩ daʊrɛ m danyɩnɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ.
Ŋ n ci naa do ka ŋ ʊ:
«Kristazibəəzannɔ kan kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, ʊ danyɩnɔ kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a danyɩnɔ do vantɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Antɩyɔs ʊ kan Siirii kɩ, Silisii kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Wɔɔ ma ŋ ʊ, wɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ b'awɔɔ wʊnwar kʊ ma, ŋn'awɔɔ heer zar, ŋnɩ dabɔʊ da awɔɔ ma kan a meerbaarɔ kɩ, bɩ wɔɔ n ŋ nyɔɔ y.
Wɔɔ ʊ lɛ ba deem, ʊ a cɩnta k'ʊ gʊɔɔ bɔ ʊ, ʊ ŋ nyɔɔ kan ʊ gʊaasɩbɔɔ paan…rɔ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ m, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa ka zɛ ma, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, wɔɔ n nɩ Ziidi kan Silas kɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ ma, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ minno nɔɔn duro hɩ awɔɔ m a lɛ m.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri kan wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ʊ hɔɔn da, ʊ ʊ, a n a ga m, k'ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ mɔr gorezaa vanta ka awɔɔ ra, kʊ mim pakrarɔ nɔɔn duro bɛɛ y:
A bɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʊ y, kan ma kɩ, hɔɔ gəəro kɩ, b'a bɩ jaan da sɔ y. K'awɔɔ zu naa haay ʊ, awɔɔ ba mɩŋŋa. Woso y'a darɛ a han.»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a leer so, ŋn'a hʊr, ŋnɩ ta Antɩyɔs ʊ, ŋn'aa gʊɔɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, ŋnɩ ci bɩ ka ŋ ʊ.
Ci bɩ karɩnda bɩ barɛ ŋ heer nyɔɔ, kʊ ŋ dʊndɔrɛ ncɩnaaʊ yɩ bɩ minto.
Ziidi kan Silas kɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ, ŋ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dʊndɔ kan meerbaarɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ paŋŋa da ra.
Ŋ gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔmɩm poore, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n bɩ zaa ka ŋ ʊ, ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ ta gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi.
Kʊ Barnabas kan Pol kɩ nɩ, ŋ gɔɔta Antɩyɔs ʊ, ŋn'ɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ, ŋn'ɩ Zuuba lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam kan gʊɔɔ gʊta kɩ sɔ.
K'a yɩ poore bɩ kur bɩ, Pol a hɩ Barnabas m, a ʊ: «Ʊ ʊ wusigə, ʊ aa dɩga ʊ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma kʊ biyəə kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba lemim nyɩnta pa da ʊ b'ʊ. K'ʊ dɩga a kʊ ŋ y'a bam lɔ gɛ.»
Barnabas n a ŋʊa k'a Zaan kʊ n n'a birm Markɩ bɩ gaa a ta m.
Bɩ, Pol n yɛ k'a gaa y, bala, a nyɩnta an nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ, an a gʊ ŋ ma Panfilii ʊ, a n a ya, an zi ba kan ŋ kɩ y.
Ŋ bɩsɩ ka kan kʊ kɩ maam-maam, bɩsɩ bɩ n bɩ ŋ gʊngʊ kʊ ma gʊaa biyəə n ta a lɛ, a lɛ. Barnabas Markɩ gaa, an da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ an ta Siipɩr ʊ.
Pol n Silas gaa, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n yaa da, kʊ Zuuba n a barka ka ŋ ʊ. Ŋ n cem.
Pol bɔ Siirii kan Silisii kɩ kʊrɔ ʊ, an nɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la.
Pol kan Silas kɩ ta ŋn'aa lee ku Derbe ʊ, ŋnɩ cem ŋnɩ ta Listɩr ʊ. Karɩndanyɩ deem n nɩ b'ʊ, a tɔ m Timote, a da bɩ zɩɩfʊ m, an a ba sɩrakarɛzaa, a zɩ bɩ grɛkkɩ m.
A danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Listɩr ʊ kan Ikonɩyɔm kɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ a tɔ ʊ.
Pol n a ŋʊa k'a gaa. A n a gaa, an a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto, bala, ŋ haay a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, a zɩ bɩ grɛkkɩ m.
Tara nɔ rɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ yɩ lɛrɔ kʊ Zerizalɛm kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta kan kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋn'a yɛrɛ ŋ han kʊ ŋ nɩ zu ŋ ʊ mɩŋŋa.
Kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa n'a dam la, ŋ lɛ n'a dam la dɔmɩm biyəə.
Pol kan Silas kɩ bɔ Frizii ʊ kan Galasii kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ta ŋ nɩ tolle, kʊ ŋ bɩ lemim bɩ pa da Azii ʊ y.
Kʊ ŋ lee ku Mizii jireyaa ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʊa k'a ta Bitinii ʊ, bɩ, Yeezuu Ɛspri bɩ ŋ da jɩm ʊ.
Ŋ n cem, ŋnɩ bra Mizii ʊ, ŋn'aa lee ku Trowas ʊ.
Gum deem ʊ, Pol Woso hɔhɩnkarɛ yɩ: Masedʊan gʊaa deem y'a hɩnka m, an jɩm brama, an n'a wɔ zɩnzɛm nɩ, a ʊ: «Bʊr Masedʊan ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da wɔɔ han!»
Pol hɔhɩnkarɛ bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ wuti zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'ʊ ta Masedʊan ʊ, bala, wɔɔ si wɔɔ ʊ Woso n nɩ wɔɔ birm kʊ aa lemim nyɩnta pa da b'ʊ.
Da kʊ wɔɔ ʊ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ Trowas ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ ta tɩrga kan Samotrasɩ kɩ. A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ta Neyapolis ʊ.
Ʊ ʊ to b'ʊ, ʊ ta Filipii ʊ, ʊ gam ma, Masedʊan kʊrɔ haay tara nɔ gʊta m bɩ. A gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a so a mɩŋŋa ʊ am Rɔm zannɔ paan…rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. Wɔɔ dɔmɩm poore ba tara nɔ bɩ do ʊ.
*Sabaa hinni ʊ, wɔɔ bɔ tara nɔ ʊ, ʊ ta bɔrkɔ lɛ ra. Bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ hɔɔn da, ʊ ʊ, yaadarɛ bɩncɛ nyɩntam b'ʊ. Kʊ wɔɔ nyɩnta bɩ, wɔɔ Yeezuu mim dɩnda kan lannɔ kʊ ŋ y'a so kʊ ma b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Ŋ gʊaa deem k'a tɔ m Lidii, garhuuro hɛɛrɛzaa m, bɩ nyɩnta, an n'a tʊr kam wɔɔ ma. Tɩyatɩɩr kʊ nyɩ m, an nɩ Woso daŋ ʊ. Zuuba a heer gʊ k'an bʊr a ma, an a tʊr ka Pol meerbaa bɩ ma.
K'a batɛm si bɩ, a mɩŋŋa kan a har gʊɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a yɛ wɔɔ han, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ zum Zuuba ʊ, k'a bʊr, a bɩ wʊta mɔɔ har ʊ.» A n ma wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ n kɔ ʊ yɛ.
Hindeem ʊ, wɔɔ nɩ tam yaadarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, lʊpoo n bɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʊ, lɔ m, bʊʊrɔzaa m. A wɔ bɩ kure ɩ busoo karɛ a zuubɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
A n nɩ zum wɔɔ jɛ ʊ, Pol kan wɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ zee darɛ, a ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro Woso k'a lɛ da haay zibəənyɩnɔ m. Bʊmbɔrɛ zaa ŋ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m.»
A ba a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ dɔmɩm gʊta nɔ ʊ. Pol n bɩ kɔ, an a bɔ, an a hɩ zinə bɩ m, a ʊ: «Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, mɔɔ lɛ ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ: bɔ lʊ naa do mɛ ʊ!» Lɛɛm bɩ, a bɔ a mɛ ʊ.
A zuubɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ a busoo bɩ yɩrɛ n a zɛ ra bɩ, ŋ Pol nyasʊ kan Silas kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ gɩngaata, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ daasɩ ʊ, jɩtannɔ taa.
Brɔɔ n ŋ gaa, ŋn'aa ŋ hɩnka dʊdɔkənno m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ wɔɔ kʊ naa nyankʊrɛ. Zɩɩfʊrɔ m.
Ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a bɩr zum wɔɔ Rɔm zannɔ lɛrɔ ʊ bɩ dɩndam.»
Zamaa n wuti nyaa m kan Pol rɔ kɩ. Dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ n lɛ ka, ŋnɩ ŋ huuro bʊmbɔ ŋ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ madɩɩrɔ m.
Ŋ zɛ kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ gʊta bɩ, ŋ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ. Ŋ n lɛ ka lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa b'ʊ kan dɩga ŋ ma mɩŋŋa.
Gʊaa kʊ ŋ lɛ naa do ka ʊ bɩ, a yɩ ŋ du cɛnɔzaa b'ʊ, an ŋ da gɔ ʊ.
Dibsir k'a da bɩ, Pol kan Silas kɩ ɩ yaa dam, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ laa lɔm, lɔnnɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ n'a tʊr karɛ ŋ ma.
Tara n nyiŋŋə lɛ deem, a nyiŋŋəre bɩ paŋŋa n cɛ jɩr bɩ yinyi. Cɛ bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay n gʊngʊ lɛɛm, lɔnnɔ wɔɔ haay baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ n sur pəŋŋə bɩ ma.
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n wuti hinceem ma, a lɔnnɔcɛ lɛrɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋn'ɩ gʊm, a hɔɔn ʊ bɩ lɔnnɔ wɔɔ a si ŋ y'a ʊ. A n a kargʊ gaa ʊ, k'a a mɩŋŋa zɛ m.
Pol n zee da kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ hɔsɩ ba ɩ mɩŋŋa nɩ y. Wɔɔ haay ta ʊ.»
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n sɛ yɛ, an bra si, an gasʊ, an aa sʊnta Pol kan Silas kɩ taa mɛhinkə m.
A n ŋ gaa, an bɔ ŋ nɩ garga ra, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ ra, mɔɔ y'a bam lɔ kʊ m bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ?»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Sɩra ka Zuuba Yeezuu ʊ, ɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm, ɩbɩɩ kan ɩ har gʊɔɔ kɩ.»
Ŋ n Zuuba lemim bɩ dɩnda m, kan gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ n'a har ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n ŋ gaa gunuu ʊ b'ʊ lɛɛm, k'a yaa ŋ nyinno sʊrgɔ. Wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ sɔ bɩ, a batɛm si kan a har gʊɔɔ kɩ haay.
A n ŋ gaa, an ta ŋ nɩ a cɛ ʊ, an hɔbɩrɛ ka ŋ ʊ, an n'a heer nyɔɔm kan a har gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a sɩra ka Woso ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ a dɔmazannɔ nyɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'aa a hɩ lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ m, kan wɔ saa gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma.
Lɔnnɔcɛ dɔmazaa bɩ n mim naa do hɩ Pol m, a ʊ: «Dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ nyɔɔ da, ŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa awɔɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, k'a bɔ a doo kan laafɩɩ kɩ.»

Bɩ Pol a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ŋ y'a ka, ŋnɩ wɔɔ zɛ zamaa bire ʊ, bɩ ŋ n wɔɔ dʊdɔ ka y, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ n Rɔm zannɔ, ŋn'a ka, ŋnɩ wɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ. Ŋ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a ŋʊam k'a a kʊna, a wɔɔ bɔ. Bɩ bɩ kʊ yɩrɛ y. Ŋ n bʊr a zim, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ bɔ.»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a wusigə, ŋn'aa naa haay hɩ dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ m, nyibəə n gasʊ ŋ ʊ, kʊ y'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ Rɔm zannɔ n a mɩ bɩ minto.
Ŋ n bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ sugur yɛ ŋ han, ŋnɩ ŋ bɔ, ŋn'a yɛ ŋ han, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɔ tara bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, Pol kan Silas kɩ ta, ŋn'aa Lidii yɩ, ŋnɩ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋnɩ ŋ heer ba kookoo, ŋnɩ cem.
Ŋ bɔ Anfipolis ʊ kan Apolonii kɩ, ŋn'aa lee ku Tesaloniki ʊ. Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ sokʊmacɛ n nɩ b'ʊ.
Amb'a tɩr a ba biisi bɩ, Pol ta, an aa ŋ yɩ, an sʊʊra ba kan ŋ kɩ *sabaa hinni ʊ, an a ta kʊ rɛ gallɛm kaakʊ, an nɩ Wosoci bɩ
bɔrɛ ŋ nɩ kʊ zi, a ʊ Krista a ga m, an fɩr yɩ, an ga, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ. A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Krista kʊ mɔɔ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m bɩ, Yeezuu m.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɛ, ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra kan Pol kɩ Silas kɩ, kan grɛkkɩrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ gʊta, kan lannɔ tɔzannɔ kɩ gʊta.

Zɩɩfʊrɔ wuti kan jɩmbaa heerbusu kɩ, ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ gaa zaa bire ʊ, ŋn'a ka tara bɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n yar, ŋnɩ taranɔ bɩ nya kʊ rɛ. Ŋ n ta Zasɔn har ʊ, ŋn'a kam Pol ma kan Silas kɩ, k'a ŋ gaa a ta ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ taa.
Kʊ ŋ n ŋ yɩ bɩ, ŋ Zasɔn gaa kan danyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ dʊdɔkənno taa, ŋn'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ durnya bɩ dam, ŋnɩ cem ŋnɩ bʊr naa ʊ kɛɛrɛ,
Zasɔn n ŋ si a har ʊ. Ŋ haay kaanm Rɔm cir lɛ m, ŋ ʊ, cir vanta n ta ʊ, a tɔ m Yeezuu.»
Zeero nɔɔn duro gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da bɔ ʊ, kan dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ,
ŋnɩ busoo si Zasɔn kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ han, ŋn'a cɩnta, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ wɔ saa ŋ ma.
Lɛɛm bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ a ka Pol kan Silas kɩ n cem kan Beree kʊ kɩ gunuu ʊ. Kʊ ŋ lee ku bɩ, ŋ ta zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa, an lɛ da Tesaloniki zannɔ wɔɔ ra. Ŋ lemim bɩ si kan a heer kɩ haay. Dɔmɩm haay, ŋ yɩ dɩgam Wosoci b'ʊ, k'a dɩga a hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩm bɩ sɩra m gɛ.
Gʊta a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ ŋ bire ʊ kan grɛkkɩ lannɔ tɔzannɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔyaarɔ kɩ gʊta.
Tesaloniki zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ma, ŋ ʊ, Pol ɩ Beree ʊ an nɩ Woso lemim pa dam bɩ, ŋ lee ku b'ʊ, k'a a ya, a gʊɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔta.
Danyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a ba zɔɔ, ŋnɩ Pol da zaa ra an ta kan higʊta bɩ lɛ ra kɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Silas kan Timote kɩ gɔɔta b'ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Pol da zaa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a gaa ŋnɩ ta m Atɛnnɩ ʊ, ŋn'a wusigə kan Pol lɛ kɩ, kʊ Silas kan Timote kɩ n a jɩ sa zɔɔ-zɔɔ.
Pol k'a nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma Atɛnnɩ ʊ bɩ, a heer a zar kan *wosobaawɔnnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ tara bɩ nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ daŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ minto.
A n gasʊ sokʊmacɛ deem ʊ, an nɩ meer bam kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso daŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm haay daasɩrɔ ʊ, a y'a bam kan gʊaa haay k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ.
Hɔɔnkamazannɔ, Epikiriyɛɛnrɔ kan Stoyisɛɛnrɔ
kɩ, nyɩnta b'ʊ ŋn'ɩ sʊʊra bam kan kɩ. Gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Para-paradarɛzaa naa do ʊ lɔ?» Gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ: «Wosoro daarɔ an nɩ ŋ pa darɛ!» Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Pol ɩ Yeezuu pa dam, kan a mɩmbɔʊrɛ kɩ.
Ŋ n a nyasʊ k'a ta m ci kʊ n n'a birm Arewopaazɩ bɩ mim ʊ. Ŋ n a hɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ karɩnda daa k'ɩbɩɩ n'a bam naa jɩ dɩnda wɔɔ n na?
Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ minno daarɔ dɩndam wɔɔ m, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʊ ŋ jɩ dɔ.»
Atɛnnɩ zannɔ wɔɔ kan saanarɔ kɩ bɩr hɔsɩ bam, kʊ minno daarɔ dɩndarɛ kan a tʊr ka ma kɩ bɛɛ y.
Pol n jɩm brama Arewopaazɩ ʊ b'ʊ, a ʊ: «Atɛnnɩ zannɔ, dɩga kʊ mɔɔ nawʊm awɔɔ ma naa, sɩrakarɛzannɔ gʊtɔɔ n'awɔɔ m.

Kʊ mɔɔ m da awɔɔ kʊ bɩ zi bɩ, hɔ haay k'a n'awɔɔ yaadarɛ mɔr bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ. Mɔɔ yɩ, n n a gʊrsɩra ba mannɩduu niŋŋə ma ncɩnaaʊ: ‹Woso kʊ gʊaa n a dɔ minto.› Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʊ, b'awɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ bʊr kʊ m b'a pa da awɔɔ m naa.
Woso k'a durnya da, kan hɔ haay k'a n'a nɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ, a m brama kan tara kɩ Zuuba. A bɩr gasʊm wosocɛrɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ a dɔ a wɔ m nɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y.
Hɔsɩ zibəə ba ma y. A bɩr a kam ma kʊ gʊaa n a da a han hɔ niŋŋə ma y. Bala, a n nɩ mɩsɩrbaa, hoonsi, kan hɔ haay kɩ kam gʊaa haay ʊ.
K'an gʊaa deem mɛ kɩ, a do haay da kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr tara burə lɛɛ haay ʊ. A dɔmɩnnɔ bɔ kʊ zi gʊɔɔ minto, kan ŋ tararɔ jirə kɩ,
kʊ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a wɔ dɩnda, ŋn'a ka Woso ma, gɛɛ ŋ y'a yɩm gɛ, an bɔkarɛ a bɩ laatʊ wɔɔ gʊaa biyəə ma y.
Bala,
A mɩŋŋa zi wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa n ta ʊ, ʊ nɩ tarɛ, ʊ nɩ meeyaa m.
Amba awɔɔ gʊrsɩrabənno gɔsɩnnɔ a hɩ bɩ m: ‹A dogʊɔɔ m wɔɔ m.›
Kʊ Woso dogʊɔɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ, wɔɔ n ʊ ga m, ʊ ʊ hɔɔn da, ʊ ʊ, Woso bɩ sarma nɩ, gɛɛ wanzurfu, gɛɛ jaa kʊ gʊaa a banka, an a bɔ ʊ a hɔɔn ʊ bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ, Woso n a ya, an nɩ dɩgam dɔmɩm kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ badɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ ma y. A y'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ kɛɛrɛ, kʊ ŋ haay n a bɔ a mimbʊnyaarɔ ʊ bɩncɛ haay ʊ.
A dɔmɩm deem bɔ ʊ, an a cɩnta, kʊ gʊaa k'a bɔ ʊ bɩ n bɩ durnya dʊdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ. Bɩ, a a kasɛtɩ hɩnka gʊɔɔ haay m, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.»
Gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ mim kʊ ŋ b'a ma bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ yaa wʊm Pol ma, niŋŋoo n n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «K'ʊ mim naa do minto m, wɔɔ y'ʊ yarɛ, ʊ tʊr ka ɩbɩɩ ma dɔmɩm vanta ʊ.»
A yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, Pol n a gʊ ŋ ma.
Gɔsɩnnɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋnɩ yɛ a meerbaa bɩ ma, ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ. Arewopaazɩzaa Denii nyɩnta ʊ, kan lʊ deem kʊ n n'a birm Damariisi bɩ kɩ, kan gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ sɔ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, Pol a hʊr Atɛnnɩ ʊ, an ta Korɛntɩ ʊ.
B'ʊ bɩ, a zɩɩfʊ deem zɛ ʊ, a tɔ m Akilas. Pɔn kʊ gʊaa m, an a to Italii ʊ lɛɛm an bʊr kan a lʊ Prisil kɩ. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, cir Kloodɩ lɛ ka, kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ haay n bɔ *Rɔm ʊ. Pol n kʊ ma kan ŋ kɩ,
bɩ, kʊ wɔzibəə deem ŋ n'a bam bɩ, (zappabaa m,) a zer ŋ har ʊ, ŋn'ɩ zi bɩ bam kan kʊ kɩ. Huucɛrɔ pɛɛrarɔ
ŋn'ɩ ŋ barɛ.
*Sabaa hinni haay, a ɩ karɩnda dɩndam zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ b'ʊ, an n'a tɔŋ ʊ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ grɛkkɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a si.
Silas kan Timote kɩ kʊ ŋ y'a to Masedʊan ʊ, ŋnɩ lee ku bɩ, ŋ bɩ dɩga a Pol ɩ karɩnda bam, an n'a hɩm zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ Krista bɩ, Yeezuu m.

Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ka kan Pol kɩ, ŋnɩ meerbaa bʊnyaa ba. Pol n a huuro zɛ fər, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, a taar y'awɔɔ mim ʊ. Mɔɔ mim bɛɛ m bɩ dɔ y. Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ta mɔɔ nawʊm do vantɔɔ zi.»
A n a hʊr bɩncɛ bɩ do ʊ, an ta gʊaa kʊ n n'a birm Titiyus Zistus bɩ har ʊ. Woso daʊrɛzaa m, a har bɩ n jɩnjɛɛm sokʊmacɛ bɩ ma.
Krispus k'a m sokʊmacɛ bɩ cir b'a ba sɩrakarɛzaa kan a har gʊɔɔ kɩ haay. Korɛntɩ zannɔ gʊtɔɔ, kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam Pol ma rɔ wɔɔ, a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ sɔ, ŋnɩ batɛm si.
Gum deem ʊ, Zuuba a hɩ Pol m, a hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, ɩ bɩr a hɩm, ɩ bɩ zɛ pi y.
Kʊ sɩra nɩ, mɔɔ ɩ kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ, bɩ gʊaa ba ʊ, an n'ɩbɩɩ nyasʊm k'a fɩr ka ɩ ma y, bala, mɔɔ gʊɔɔ ta ʊ gʊta tara naa do nɔ ʊ.»
Pol dɔɔraa ba b'ʊ deem kan a kur kɩ, an nɩ Woso lemim dɩndarɛ ŋ bire ʊ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Galɩyɔn nyɩnta ʊ Akayii tara lɛɛzaa bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a lɛ ba deem, ŋnɩ wuti jɩmbaa m kan Pol kɩ, ŋn'a gaa, ŋnɩ ta m Galɩyɔn dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«Gʊaa naa do, karɩnda an n'a bam gʊɔɔ m, a ʊ, gʊɔɔ n yaa da Woso m kan yaadarɛ k'a n a gaakʊmba kan wɔɔ lɛrɔ kɩ.»
Pol ʊ k'a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, Galɩyɔn n a nyɩ bɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Zɩɩfʊrɔ ra, kʊ zi niŋŋə a ba a bɩ tɩrga, gɛɛ zibəə bʊnyaa a ba, mɔɔ yɩ m tʊr karɛ awɔɔ ma, bala, a a yɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ bɩ, meerbaa m, gɛɛ tɔrɔ m, gɛɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛrɔ m bɩ, pakra a ba awɔɔ m. Mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m nyɩnta minno nɔɔn duro dʊdɔkər y.»
A n la ŋ la dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Ŋ haay n Sɔstɛn, sokʊmacɛ cir bɩ nyasʊ, ŋn'a zɛ dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, bɩ, Galɩyɔn n a war hɔbaa naa do ma y.
Pol a ya, an maasɩrɛ ba Korɛntɩ ʊ. Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a a gʊ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, an da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, k'a ta Siirii ʊ. Akilas kan Prisil kɩ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ. Pol a mim zɩnzɛra Sɛnkrɛs ʊ, bala, a ler bɔ Woso m.
Ŋ lee ku Efɛɛzɩ ʊ. B'ʊ bɩ, Pol a gʊ a zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ ma. A ta, an aa gasʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ sokʊmacɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan ŋ kɩ.
Brɔɔ n a yɛ han kan a dɔmɩm bɩ zu ra, an a gu,
an a gʊ ŋ ma, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ zɛm bɩ bʊr awɔɔ zi dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʊ, kʊ Woso yɛ.» A n da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, Efɛɛzɩ ʊ.
K'a lee ku Sezaree ʊ an bɔ kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a cem an ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, an aa yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, an cem an ta Antɩyɔs ʊ,
an aa maasɩrɛ ba b'ʊ poore. A n cem, an ta Galasii kan Frizii kɩ gʊrgarɔ haay ʊ, an nɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay heer bam kookoo.
Zɩɩfʊ deem kʊ n n'a birm Apolɔs, an yɩ Alɛsandrii ʊ bɩ lee ku Efɛɛzɩ ʊ. Hɔɔn zaa m, an mim dɔ. A n Wosoci bɩ dɔ sɔ.

Zuuba zaa b'a dɩnda zʊr-zʊr, a y'a pa darɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, an nɩ karɩnda dɩndam gʊɔɔ m, an nɩ hɔ haay k'a ba Yeezuu minto bɩ dɩndam, an nɩ zure a zaa ʊ. Bɩ, batɛm kʊ Zaan nyɩnta an a kam b'a dɔ bala.
A n nɩ meer bam kan wɩsɩrabaa kɩ sokʊmacɛ ʊ b'ʊ. Prisil kan Akilas kɩ kʊ ŋ y'a meerbaa ma bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ Woso zaa bɩ dɩnda m zʊr-zʊr, ŋn'a paŋŋa da ra.

K'a nyɩnta, an n'a ŋʊam k'a ta Akayii ʊ bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ ʊ: A a ga m. Ŋ n ci ba karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ ma, kʊ ŋ n'a si mɩŋŋa. K'a lee ku b'ʊ bɩ, a daahan gʊta ka gɔsɩnnɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso barka minto ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʊ rɔ wɔɔ.
Bala, a meerbaa bɩ paŋŋa bʊr zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ ra gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, a ɩ Wosoci bɩ jɩ hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ sɩrɩɩ-sɩrɩɩ, a ʊ: Krista bɩ, Yeezuu m.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Apolɔs nyɩnta ʊ Korɛntɩ ʊ bɩ, Pol bɔ kʊ bɩ gʊrgarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cigaarɔ wɔɔ ʊ, an ta Efɛɛzɩ ʊ, an karɩndanyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ b'ʊ,
an ŋ lar, a ʊ: «K'awɔɔ a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ bɩ, awɔɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si ra?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ n Sɛnt-Ɛspri mim ma cɩna y.»
Pol n laaka da, a ʊ: «Batɛm kara awɔɔ si kɛɛrɛ?» Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Zaan batɛm bɩ m.»
Pol n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Zaan nyɩnta, an nɩ heerlʊrlɛ batɛm kam, an n'a hɩm gʊɔɔ m kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr awɔɔ jɛ ʊ b'ʊ. A lɛ taa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: Yeezuu.»
Kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ batɛm si Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Pol n a wɔrɔ ka ŋ la, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer ŋ la, ŋn'ɩ meer bam leminno vantɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ Woso lɛ si ŋn'ɩ som la.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ a zɔ bueerehɩɩya ma.
Pol tɩr ta sokʊmacɛ ʊ, an bɩr Woso cirbəə bɩ mim dɩndam kan wɩsɩrabaa kɩ, an ta an mom kaakʊ ku. Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam nɔ wɔɔ n a si sɩra.

Gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ heer ka, ŋ bɩr yɛm k'a si bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋn'ɩ Yeezuu zaa bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊm gʊɔɔ bire ʊ. Pol n bɔ ŋ bire ʊ, an karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ gaa a hɔ, an ta ŋ nɩ Tiranɔsɩ karɩndacɛ ʊ, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ dɔmɩm haay.
A ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ an ta, an dɔɔraa hɩɩya ku, bɩ minto y'a ka Azii zannɔ, zɩɩfʊrɔ, kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ n a ku, ŋnɩ Zuuba lemim bɩ ma.
Woso n nɩ hoserlo kʊ ŋ lɔɔ ba ʊ bam kan Pol kɩ.
Baa kʊ n pɛɛra gɛɛ huu a nɔ a mɛ ma, n a nɔ yaabazannɔ ma, ŋ yɩ laafɩɩ yɩrɛ, zinəro wɔɔ nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ mɛ ʊ.

Zɩɩfʊrɔ gʊɔɔ n ta ʊ ŋnɩ bɩmbɩrm, ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'ɩ lam zinəro ra. Hindeem ʊ ŋ n'a ŋʊa k'a la zinəro ra gʊɔɔ mɛ ʊ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ m. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m Yeezuu kʊ Pol n n'a pa dam bɩ tɔ ma, k'a bɔ!»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ deem kʊ n n'a birm Seva b'ɩ nyɩnɔ m saanhɩna, ŋn'ɩ zibəə naa do barɛ.
Zinə n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Yeezuu dɔ, kʊ nka m Pol m, mɔɔ dɔ. B'awɔɔ, nkɔɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ?»
Gʊaa kʊ zinə n a mɛ ʊ bɩ n der ŋ ma haay, an a da ŋ ma, an fɩr ka ŋ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ bɔ har ʊ b'ʊ dɩgɩ, kan nyinno kɩ.
Efɛɛzɩ kʊ jilli, zɩɩfʊrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ haay mim naa do ma. Nyibəə n gasʊ ŋ haay ʊ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla, gʊta bʊr, ŋn'a leer busu brama, ŋn'a minno bɔrɛ a lɛ ma.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ gɔɔta, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa ka wɔkure ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a ciro wɔɔ gʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ ŋ so kʊ ra, ŋnɩ sɛ nya ŋ ʊ, gʊaa haay taa. Ciro wɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a busoo lɛ zɛ bɩ, a wanzurfu busoo ma waa busoor.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kan Zuuba paŋŋa kɩ, lemim bɩ nɩ tam lɛɛ, a paŋŋa n'a dam la.
Minno nɔɔn duro kʊ ŋ cem bɩ, Pol a cɩnta a hɔɔn ʊ, k'a bɔ Masedʊan ʊ kan Akayii kɩ ʊ, a ta Zerizalɛm ʊ. A n n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «K'a lee ku b'ʊ, k'a cem a ta Rɔm ʊ.»
A a daahanzannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ Timote kan Erastɩ kɩ nyɔɔ Masedʊan ʊ, a mɩŋŋa n gɔɔta Azii ʊ an maasɩrɛ ba poore.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ, nyaarɔ gʊtɔɔ bɩ wuti ŋnɩ ba Zuuba zaa bɩ minto.
Nyɔkka deem n nɩ b'ʊ a tɔ m Demetrus, an nɩ Artemis yaadarɛcɛ nyʊgɔrɔ bam wanzurfu m kan nyɔkkarɔ vantɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ busoo yɩm gʊta.
A nyɔkkarɔ wɔɔ duro so kʊ ma kan tar deem zibəəzannɔ kɩ, a ʊ: «M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ wɔzibəə naa do nɩ hɔbɩrɛ kam wɔɔ ʊ.
B'awɔɔ yɩ, an n'a mam: Efɛɛzɩ nɔ bɛɛ m bala y, Azii ʊ haay Pol naa do n'a dɩndam gʊɔɔ haay m, a ʊ, wosoro kʊ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ barɛ ʊ wɔ m nɔɔn duro, wosoro bɛɛ y. Gʊɔɔ gʊta ŋn'ɩ zure a hɔ b'ʊ.
Wɔɔ zibəə bɩ zarlɛ minto bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ nyi bam nɩ bala y, wɔɔ wosolʊ gʊta Artemis cɛ bɩ bɔʊrɛ m. Bala, Artemis kʊ Azii zannɔ kan durnya naa haay kɩ n'a daŋ ʊ bɩ, a bɩ daʊrɛ yɩm dɔ y.»
Kʊ ŋ naa ma bɩ, ŋ heer busu, ŋnɩ zee da, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ Artemis n gʊta!»
Mim naa do a kərgu kʊnɔ bɩ haay ra, an a zɛ kʊ ma, ŋnɩ bra si, ŋnɩ ta sarbarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ Masedʊan zannɔ Gayus kan Aristarkɩ kɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ Pol zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋnɩ ta ŋ nɩ.
Pol n a cɩnta, k'a ta sokʊma bɩ bɩncɛ ʊ. Bɩ, karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ n a to an ta y.
Azii cinno gɔsɩnnɔ k'a gʊaasɩbɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ nyɔɔ da kʊ n n'a hɩ m, ŋ ʊ: a b'a ka a mim ma, a ʊ, ta a ʊ sarbarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ y.
Lɛɛ bɩ n a ba bʊrgʊ. Gʊaa biyəə n'a hɔɔnhɔ hɩm, tatʊr ŋ n'a bam bala, gʊɔɔ gʊta n a dɔ kʊ bɔ minto m, a a so kʊ ma y.
Gʊɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta sokʊma bɩ bire ʊ, ŋnɩ mim bɩ dɩnda Alɛsandɩr kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a bɔ ʊ n a ka lɛɛ bɩ m. Alɛsandɩr n a wɔ busu, k'a meer ba kan zamaa bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ y'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ zɩɩfʊ m bɩ, ŋ haay a lɛ ba deem, ŋn'ɩ zee dam. Ŋ zee bɩ darɛ wakatɩ hɩɩya ku. Ŋ ʊ: «Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ Artemis n gʊta!»
Gʊrsɩrabər b'a gu an a da ma, an gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da bar ʊ, a ʊ: «Efɛɛzɩ zannɔ, gʊaa ta ʊ, a n a dɔ, a ʊ, Efɛɛzɩ kʊ zannɔ nɩ dɔm Artemis gʊta cɛ bɩ ma, kan a jaa k'a a to brama an a da bɩ kɩ ra?
Kʊ ŋ n bɩsɩ ka hɔ naa do ma bɩ, a a ga m, awɔɔ m bʊr a ma, a b'a ka, a ba zɔɔ-zɔɔ y.
Awɔɔ bʊr gʊɔɔ m naa ʊ, ŋ n mim zu ʊ wɔɔ wosolʊ bɩ ma y, ŋ n a sʊnsɔ wʊ sɔ y.
Kʊ Demetrus kan zibənno wɔɔ kɩ ɩ mim m kan gʊaa kɩ, dʊdɔkarɛ dɔmɩm ta ʊ. Taralɛɛzannɔ ta ʊ. K'a ta kʊ m dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Kʊ minno gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʊ kʊ kʊ bɩ gʊɔɔ a so kʊ ma, ŋ dɩgam minno wɔɔ duro ma.
Her naa, mim b'a da ma, an yɩ bʊnyaa kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bala, n y'a da ma, n nɩ mim ka wɔɔ ra sokʊma naa do minto. Sokʊma naa do jɩ ba ʊ y, kʊ n wɔɔ lar wɔɔ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩm ʊ a hɩ y.»
Bɩ, naa k'a hɩ bɩ, a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra.
Bʊgʊr bɩ k'a b'a da bar ʊ bɩ, Pol karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma, a nɩ ŋ dʊndɔ. Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a a leer so ŋ nɩ, an Masedʊan zaa sa.
A a da a gʊrgarɔ zi, an danyɩnɔ wɔɔ dʊndɔ gʊta, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku Grɛsɩ
ʊ,
an aa nyɩnta b'ʊ mom kaakʊ. Dɔmɩm k'a nɩ daŋ ʊ kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ k'a ta Siirii ʊ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ kʊ ma k'a nyasʊ bɩ, a a hɔɔn da, an a bɔ an bɔ Masedʊan ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, Beree kʊ gʊaa Piirus nyɩ Sopatrɔs kan Tesaloniki kʊ gʊɔɔ Aristarkɩ kan Sekundus kɩ, Derbe kʊ gʊaa Gayus kɩ, kan Timote kɩ, kan Azii kʊ gʊɔɔ Tisikkɩ kɩ, Trofim kɩ sɔ.
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro lɛɛ ka lɛɛ, ŋnɩ ta, ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma Trowas ʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ʊ hʊr Filipii ʊ, bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma bɩ dɔmɩnnɔ kur, ʊ da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ k'ʊ aa n ŋ ku. Dɔmɩm soor jɛ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ lee ku Trowas ʊ. Wɔɔ n gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔmɩm saanhɩna.
Hatʊ hinni ʊ, wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra, k'ʊ bur zɩnzɛ ra. A dɔ k'a nɩ mɛm kʊ Pol n a hʊr bɩ, a meerbaa sa, an n'a bam kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, meerbaa bɩ maasɩrɛ ba, an ta an a zɔ dibsir zeezi ma.
Fɩtɩrɛrɔ nyɩnta ʊ gʊta cɛmim kaakʊ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ so kʊ ma ʊ b'ʊ.

Nyukumbueere deem k'a tɔ m Etikɩ bɩ nyɩnta cɛ bɩ tokoro lɛ ra, hinceem gʊta n a nyasʊ. Bɩ ma bɩ, Pol meerbaa bɩ n nya y. Hinceem bɩ k'a a nyasʊ gʊta bɩ, a bra cɛmim kaakʊ hɔ b'ʊ, an a da tara ʊ. Kʊ ŋ bʊr k'a b'a busu bɩ, ŋ yaa dɩga a a ga.
Pol n zer, an bra si an ta zi, an aa a busu a za ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «A da bɩ bɔ ʊ y. A mɩsɩr!»
Pol k'a a bɔ an der bɩ, a bur bɩ zɛ ra, an a bɩ. Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a meerbaa bɩ maasɩrɛ ba an ta an wutigʊta ku. Bɩ kur bɩ, a cem.
Bɩ, nyukumbueere k'a mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a gaa, ŋnɩ doo m. B'a yɩ heernyɔɔ gʊta, ŋ haay minto.
Wɔɔ kɔɔlʊʊ sa, ʊ lɛɛ ka lɛɛ, k'ʊ aa zer Asɔs ʊ, kʊ aa Pol k'a zaa sa a gam ma bɩ zɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ʊ a busu, amba a cɩnta bɩ m.
K'a wɔɔ zɛ ʊ Asɔs ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ busu kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ k'ʊ ta Mitilɛnnɩ ʊ.
B'ʊ bɩ, dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, ʊ ʊ zɔ Kiyo ma. A dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʊ, wɔɔ bɔ Samɔs ʊ, bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ jɩm poore Trogiliyɔn ʊ, ʊ cem, ʊ lee ku Milɛ ʊ.
Pol a cɩnta k'a bɩ jɩm Efɛɛzɩ ʊ y, k'a lɛ baa k'a maasɩrɛ ba Azii ʊ bɩ minto. Nyɩnta a ʊ, an n'a bam zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'a a da ma, k'a lee ku Zerizalɛm ʊ, Pantɩkɔtɩ dɔmɩm bɩ minto.
Pol a to Milɛ ʊ, an Efɛɛzɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ bir.
Kʊ ŋ b'a zɛ ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kʊ mɔɔ ba dɔmɩm haay, mɔɔ leekure sɩŋŋɩda ʊ Azii ʊ bɩ dɔ.
Mɔɔ Zuuba zi ba kan mɩŋŋa zerle kɩ, kan nyifeer kɩ, kan fɩryɩrɛ do haay kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ a cɩnta k'a mɔɔ nyasʊ, a mɔɔ zɛ bɩ kɩ.
Mɔɔ n hɔsɩ k'a zibəə m ta awɔɔ ma bɩ nyaakʊm da awɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta pa da, m hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m gʊɔɔ bire ʊ, amba harlɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ kasɛtɩ ka, m zɩɩfʊrɔ kan grɛkkɩrɔ kɩ bir, kʊ ŋ n'a bɔ a taam ŋnɩ zu Woso ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu ʊ.
Bɩ naa ma bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɔɔ ba a lɔ, kʊ m zaa sa, m ta Zerizalɛm ʊ. Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ bɔ n n'aa ba mɔɔ m b'ʊ y.
Kan bɩ kɩ haay, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ mɔɔ m, kʊ haay kʊ mɔɔ nɩ bɔŋ ʊ, a ʊ, baŋŋarɔ kan fɩryɩrɛ kɩ ɩ dɔm mɔɔ ma.
Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr kɔm sɩ ma, m mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa minto y. Mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, kʊ m zu m zaa ʊ mɩŋŋa, kan zibəə kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ. Kʊ m Woso barka lemim nyɩnta bɩ kasɛtɩ ka.»
«Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa kɛɛrɛ, mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ meer yɩ y, awɔɔ haay, awɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ bɔ, m Woso cirbəə pa da a m nɔ wɔɔ.
Mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ awɔɔ taa her: Awɔɔ gɔsɩ taar ba mɔɔ mim ʊ y.
Mɔɔ n hɔsɩ nyaakʊm da awɔɔ m fɩɩga y. A n lɛ da bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ kʊ Woso a cɩnta haay k'a ba bɩ hɩ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a dundo a mɩŋŋɔɔ zi, kan bakʊ bɩ haay kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri awɔɔ ba a dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a nyɩnta Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊma k'a cɩnta kan a mɩŋŋa ma kɩ bɩ dundonno.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ hʊrlɛ jɛ ʊ, poojino bʊnyaarɔ gasʊrɛ awɔɔ zi, ŋnɩ bakʊ bɩ zar.
Baa gʊɔɔ bɔrɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ barla, ŋnɩ karɩndanyɩnɔ wɔɔ hɔɔn lʊr kan meerbaa bʊnyaarɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ ŋ da a tar la.
Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ: Dɔɔraa kaakʊ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə dʊndɔ gunuu ʊ kan a sinuu ʊ kɩ, m nyifeer nɔ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ n mɛnyɔɔ da y.
Bɩ naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ awɔɔ ka Woso ʊ kan a meerbaa barka k'a paŋŋa n ta ʊ, an n'a dam ma, an awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ da ra, k'a b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ hɔjirle nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ hɔɔn n a ka gɔsɩ wanzurfu zi, gɛɛ sarma, gɛɛ huu y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a dɔ a ʊ, m wɔ naa mɔɔ zi ba m, m a yɩ, an a ga mɔɔ m kan m zukuuzannɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ hɔ haay hɩnka awɔɔ m, k'ɩ zi ba ncɩnaaʊ, ɩ hɔ yɩrɛ, ɩ ɩ dam paŋŋawarzannɔ han, k'a Zuuba Yeezuu minno k'a ŋ hɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ sɔ: Hɔ ka gʊaa ʊ jɩra gʊaa n'a ka ɩ ʊ m.»
K'a minno nɔɔn duro hɩ bɩ, a sʊnta kan ŋ kɩ haay an yaa da.
Ŋ haay n zɛ nyi da ʊ, ŋn'a burgu Pol wer ma.
K'a hɩ, a ʊ, awɔɔ b'a yarɛ a mɔɔ meer yɩ bɩ, yɩ ŋ heer zar an lɛ da. Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, ŋnɩ zu kʊ ʊ kan kɩ, ŋn'aa a da zaa ʊ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ jir ʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ gʊ ŋ ma bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, ʊ ta tɩrga kan Kɔɔs kɩ. Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ta Rodɛs ʊ, ʊ ʊ to b'ʊ, ʊ ta Pataraa ʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ kɔɔlʊʊ yɩ an nɩ tam Fenisii ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ da ʊ, ʊ cem.
Kʊ wɔɔ ta, ʊ n'ʊ zɔm Siipɩr ma bɩ, wɔɔ da, ʊ jɩsa ʊ, ʊ ta Siirii ʊ, ʊ aa zer Tiir ʊ bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʊ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ n'a mɔr bɩ zerŋ ʊ b'ʊ.
Wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔmɩm saanhɩna, bala, wɔɔ sʊr karɩndanyɩnɔ ma b'ʊ. Kan Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ, brɔɔ a hɩ Pol m, ŋ ʊ, a bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ y.
Wɔɔ cenle dɔmɩm k'a ku bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ wusigə. K'ʊ wɔɔ nɩ tam bɩ, ŋ haay wɔɔ da zaa ʊ, lannɔ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔ tara nɔ b'ʊ. Wɔɔ n sʊnta hi bɩ lɛ ra, ʊ yaa da.
Ʊ ʊ leer so kʊ m kɛɛrɛ, ʊ da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋnɩ doo.
Kʊ wɔɔ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ sa Tiir ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku Potolemayiisi ʊ. Kʊ wɔɔ yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m, ʊ a nya bɩ, wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʊ kan ŋ kɩ dɔmɩm deem.
A dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ hʊr, ʊ ta Sezaree ʊ, ʊ aa zer lemim nyɩnta padarɛzaa Filipi har ʊ. Saanhɩnarɔ
kʊ n nyɩnta n nɩ ŋ bɔ ʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem m. Wɔɔ n gɔɔta kan kɩ b'ʊ.
A nyɩmbɔnnɔ si, ŋ n yar dɔ y. Ŋ n'ɩ wosolɛ sire ŋn'ɩ som la.
Kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʊ an maasɩrɛ ba bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa deem bɩ lee ku, Zidee kʊ gʊaa m, a tɔ m Agabus.

K'a bɩ wɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a Pol hɔsoaʊ bɩ sa, an a gannɔ sur m kan a wɔrɔ kɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm bɩ ba n nɩ. Ba hɔ kʊ n n'a bam hɔsoaʊ naa do zaa bɩ m Zerizalɛm ʊ na: Zɩɩfʊrɔ y'a nyasʊm, ŋn'a sur, ŋn'a da do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔ ʊ!»
Wɔɔ kan kʊ bɩ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ yɛ Pol han k'a bɩ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ b'ʊ y.
A n a nyɩ bɔ wɔɔ nʊ, a ʊ: «Bɔ minto awɔɔ nɩ nyi karɛ, an nɩ mɔɔ heer zarlɛ? Mɔɔ surle bɛɛ mɔɔ yɛ ma bala y. Baa kʊ garɛ m Zerizalɛm ʊ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma, mɔɔ yɛ.»
K'a bɩr yɛm kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊr a la bɩ, wɔɔ n yɛ, ʊ ta mim bɩ m laatʊ y, ʊ n n'a hɩrɛ, ʊ ʊ: «Kʊ Zuuba hɔɔnhɔ n ba!»
Dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ duro nyarɛ ma bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ banka ʊ nya bɩ, wɔɔ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ.
Sezaree karɩndanyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ tam k'a yaa wɔɔ da zaa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ta wɔɔ m ʊ aa zer Siipɩr gʊaa Mɩnasɔɔn har ʊ. Karɩndanyɩ m, a dɔmɩm laatʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ lee ku Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, danyɩnɔ wɔɔ wɔɔ si kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Pol ta kan wɔɔ kɩ Zakkɩ har ʊ. Bɩncɛ bɩ do kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋn'a so kʊ ma ʊ sɔ.
Pol k'a yaa da ŋ nɩ bɩ, a hɔ haay kʊ Woso a ka, an a ba do vantɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ jɩ sa deem-deem, an n'a dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam Pol ma rɔ wɔɔ, y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, ŋn'a hɩm nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Ʊ danyɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ tisi-tisi a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ, bɩ ŋ haay lɛrɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Bɩ, ŋ y'a ma ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndam, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ dɩndam zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ do vantɔɔ bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, kʊ ŋ nɩ wɔ saa Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, kʊ ŋ b'a ya, ŋn'a nyɩnɔ gasʊ baŋŋʊ y, kʊ ŋ nɩ yɩnnɩbayɩ bɩ to.
Kʊ a ba lɔ? Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ y'a marɛ, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ bʊr.
Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m bɩ ba. Wɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔyaarɔ m si, ŋnɩ ler bɔ Woso m.

Ŋ gaa, ɩ dintim gʊ ɩ ma kan ŋ kɩ, k'ɩ da ŋ han kan busoo kɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a lerbɔrɛ nyambʊr m, ŋn'a a da ma, ŋn'a mim bɔ. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊaa haay y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʊ, hɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a ma ɩbɩɩ minto bɩ, ŋʊaar m, b'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ɩ nɩ ŋ sim mɩŋŋa.
Kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ba sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ cɩnta bɩ ci ba ŋ ma: ‹Ŋ bɩ *wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩbarɛ sim sʊ y, kan ma kɩ, kan hɔ gər sim kɩ, bɩ ŋ bɩ jaan da y.› »

Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Pol gʊɔɔ wɔɔ gaa, an dintim gʊ a ma sɩŋŋɩda sa hɔdeem kan ŋ kɩ. A n ta Wosocɛ ʊ, k'a dintim gʊ a ma bɩ nyarɛ dɔmɩm cɩnta, k'an yɩ hindeem ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yaa ler bɔ Woso m nɔ wɔɔ ganwʊrɛ karɛ kɩ.
Kʊ dɔmɩm saanhɩna b'a zɔ nyarɛ ma bɩ, Azii zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ka a hɔɔn zi ŋn'a yɩ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, ŋ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ, ŋnɩ Pol nyasʊ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ.

Ŋ n'ɩ zee darɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Israyɛl zannɔ, k'a bʊr a da wɔɔ han! Ba gʊaa k'a bɩmbɩr lɛɛ haay ʊ, an n'a dɩndam zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ, ŋn'ɩ kaanm a do m kan lɛrɔ kɩ, Wosocɛ naa do kɩ bɩ n na. A bɔɔla m, an gasʊ grɛkkɩrɔ m Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ dintim kam bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa naa do ma ncɩnaaʊ.»
Bala, ŋ nyɩnta, ŋnɩ Efɛɛzɩ kʊ gʊaa Trofim yɩ tara nɔ ʊ b'ʊ kan Pol kɩ. Ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ, ŋ ʊ Pol bɩ, a gaa a ʊ, an gasʊ m Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Tara bɩ n yar jilli, gʊɔɔ n bra si, ŋnɩ bʊr yuu…. Ŋ n Pol nyasʊ, ŋnɩ bɔ m Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋnɩ cɛlɛrɔ wɔɔ tɩnta lɛɛm.
Ŋ n'a kam ma k'a zɛ gər, sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n mim naa do ma, ŋ ʊ: «Zerizalɛm haay a zɛ kʊ ma.»
A n sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ bir lɛɛm, an ŋ so kʊ ma kan sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an a ka ŋnɩ la gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ra ŋnɩ bɔ. Kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ yɩ kan a sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ Pol zɛrɛ to.
Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a zɔ, an Pol nyasʊ, an lɛ ka, a ʊ, ŋn'a sur baŋŋa m hɩɩya. A n a lar a ʊ, kʊ nka n'awɔɔ m, bɩ, kʊ bɔ a ba sɔ.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, gʊaa biyəə nɩ zee darɛ, ŋ bɩr mim zaa deem hɩrɛ y. Kʊ sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ bɩr hɔsɩ jɩ mam paan… bʊgʊr bɩ minto bɩ, a lɛ ka a ʊ, ŋnɩ Pol gaa ŋnɩ ta m sʊrdaarɔ wʊtajɩ ʊ b'ʊ.
Kʊ Pol yaa lee ku derlɛ bɩncɛ bɩ ra bɩ, sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ a busu, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tɔŋ ʊ k'a ku bɩ minto.
Bala, zamaa bɩ haay ɩ zure a jɛ ʊ kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «K'a zɛ gər.»
Dɔmɩm kʊ ŋ ʊ, k'a gasʊ m sʊrdaarɔ wʊtajɩ ʊ bɩ, Pol a hɩ sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n da ma, m meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ ra?» Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ ɩ grɛkkɩ lemim mam na?

Ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m Eziptɩ gʊaa niŋŋə k'a gʊɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ zannɔ gaa dɔmɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ cem dɩɩtaa-dɩɩtaa rɔ nɔɔn nɔ ʊ, gʊaa tisi si, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ poohɔɔn ʊ bɩ ra?» Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ gɛɛ? Zɩɩfʊ n mɔɔ m, m to mɔɔ ʊ Silisii kʊ Tarsɩ ʊ. Tara gʊta nyɩ n mɔɔ m.
K'ɩ sugur ba, ɩ zaa ka m ʊ, kʊ m meer ba kan zamaa bɩ kɩ.»
A n zaa ka ʊ, Pol n wuti an jɩm brama zerjɩ bɩ ra, an a wɔ busu zamaa bɩ m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ…, an meerbaa bɩ sa ebree lemim m, an n'a hɩrɛ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ:
«M danyɩnɔ, kan m zɩrɔ kɩ, k'a tʊr ka, kʊ m m gumə mim dɩnda awɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ.»
Kʊ ŋ Pol ma an ebree lemim sa k'a hɩ bɩ, ŋ bʊgʊr bɩ to haay.

«Zɩɩfʊ n mɔɔ m, yɩ mɔɔ Silisii kʊ Tarsɩ ʊ, bɩ tʊr mɔɔ ʊ naa ʊ, tara naa do nɔ ʊ. Gamalɩyɛl ɩ wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɩnda mɔɔ m zʊr-zʊr. Mɔɔ nyɩnta m Woso zuure nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ, amba awɔɔ haay m her naa m.
Mɔɔ nyɩnta, m fɩr ka gʊɔɔ ma karɩnda naa do zuure ma, m gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ, m gɔsɩnnɔ sur, m ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, lannɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ.

Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kan do bɩ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a da ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka. Ciro mɔɔ ŋ si ŋ han wɔɔ danyɩnɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Damas ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto. Bɩ mɔɔ ɩ tam Damas ʊ, kʊ m aa sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ sur, m bʊr ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ fɩr ka ŋ ma.
Mɔɔ m zaa sa, m nɩ tarɛ, m m zɔ Damas ma. Lɛɛm bɩ, sinuu zeezi, lɛɛgure gʊta n a to brama an b'a ku mɔɔ ra.
Mɔɔ n m do tara ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ leer marɛ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Sol, Sol, bɔ minto ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma?›
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?› Leer bɩ n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ fɩr karɛ m ma.›
Mɔɔ zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ lɛɛgure bɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa, bɩ ŋ bɩr leer k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ marɛ y.
Mɔɔ n laaka da: ‹Bɔ mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba Zuuba?› Zuuba n a nyɩ bɔ mɔɔ nʊ, a ʊ: ‹Wuti, ɩ ta Damas ʊ. K'ɩ lee ku b'ʊ, hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ ba bɩ, n y'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m deem-deem.›
Bɩ, kʊ lɛɛgure naa do mɔɔ mɩm bɩ ta bɩ, mɔɔ zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ a wɔ dɔ mɔɔ rɛ, mɔɔ n lee ku Damas ʊ.
Gʊaa niŋŋə n nɩ b'ʊ, a tɔ m Ananɩyas. A nyɩnta gʊaa mɩŋŋa, an nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa, zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ.
A n bʊr, an bɩ mɔɔ yɩ, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹M danyɩ Sol, k'ɩ mɩm n lɛɛ yɩ!› Lɛɛm bɩ, mɔɔ mɩm a gʊ, m a yɩ.
A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso ɩ bɔ ʊ, k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ dɔ, k'ɩ Gʊaa tɩrga bɩ yɩ, k'ɩ mɩŋŋa lɛ meerbaa ma.
Sɩra m, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ bɩr kasɛtɩzaa a minto gʊaa haay taa kan hɔ haay k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ, ɩ ma sɔ bɩ kɩ.
Bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ sɩnsɩm karɛ? Aya! Wuti ɩ batɛm si, k'ɩ tɔ bir, ɩ ɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ dintim gʊ ɩ ma.›
Kʊ mɔɔ m wusigə Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, hindeem ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ yaa dam Wosocɛ ʊ,
mɔɔ n Zuuba yɩ hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹A ba zɔɔ, ɩ ɩ hʊr Zerizalɛm ʊ, bala, ŋ bɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a kam bɩ sire y.›
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Zuuba, ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ nyɩnta, m nɩ tam sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ, m nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gʊrm, m a ka, ŋn'ɩ ŋ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ ŋ zɛm madɩɩrɔ m.
Ɩbɩɩ kasɛtɩzaa Etɩyɛnnɩ ma k'a bra tara ra bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nyɩnta b'ʊ sɔ, m m zɛ kʊ ra kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a zɛm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, m dɔ ŋ huuro ma.›
A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: ‹Ta, ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʊm do vantɔɔ kʊrɔ ʊ.› »
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a tʊr ka Pol ma, an ta an meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ku bɩ, ŋ wuti, ŋn'ɩ zee dam, ŋ ʊ: «K'a gʊaa ncɩnaaʊ bɩ bɔ durnya ʊ! A n a ga m, an bɩr mɩsɩr y.»
Kʊ ŋ nɩ zee dam bɩ, ŋ y'a huuro bɔ a ra, ŋnɩ taa gʊr, ŋn'a nyɔɔm brama,
sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n lɛ ka, kʊ ŋ nɩ gasʊ Pol m, sʊrdaarɔ wʊtajɩ b'ʊ, ŋn'a zɛ, k'a laaka da han a dɔ, kʊ bɔ minto m zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ nɩ zee darɛ awɔɔ ma gɛ.
Kʊ ŋ n'a bankam k'a Pol wʊta k'a zɛ bɩ, a a hɩ sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a nɩ zibəə ʊ b'ʊ bɩ m, a ʊ: «Rɔm zannɔ gʊaa kʊ ŋ n'a dʊdɔ ka bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a zɛ madɩr m na?»
Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a naa ma bɩ, a ta an aa hɩ sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ ba naa? Gʊaa bɩ, Rɔm zannɔ gʊaa m!»
Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a bɔ, an bɩ Pol lar, a ʊ: «Rɔm zannɔ gʊaa n'ɩbɩɩ m paan… ra, k'ɩ hɩ m m?» Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Ɩɩn…»
Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ busoo bɔ gʊta kʊ m bɔkarɛ, m m ba Rɔm zannɔ gʊaa.» Pol n a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ naa, yɩ mɔɔ a nɔ ʊ.»
Lɛɛm bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta k'a Pol zɛ rɔ wɔɔ a to. Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a a dɔ a ʊ, Rɔm zannɔ gʊaa m Pol m, awɔɔ n a sur bɩ, dabɔʊ a nyasʊ.

Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a lɛ n taa k'a a dɔ paan… kʊ bɔ minto m, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ nɩ mim kam Pol ra bɩ, a a ka, ŋnɩ baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ ma. A n a ka, ŋnɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir kan dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ, an ŋ so kʊ ma, an a ka Pol n bʊr ŋ taa.
Pol n dɩga dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ ma sɩɩ…, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan noom fu kɩ Woso mɩm ʊ, an ta, an her naa ku.»
Bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Ananɩyas lɛ ka a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a jɩr ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, a ʊ, ŋn'a zɛ a lɛ ma. Pol n a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Ɩbɩɩ Woso n n'ɩ zɛm, noonkundəzaa ra! Nyɩnta ɩbɩɩ ʊ naa ʊ, ɩ zu lɛrɔ ʊ, k'ɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔ ka, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ kaanm lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ lɛ ka kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zɛ ra?»
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n həən si ma, ŋ ʊ: «Wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ b'ɩbɩɩ n'a sʊnsɔ wʊm naa ra?» Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ:
«Mɔɔ n a dɔ mɔɔ ʊ wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ nɩ y, m danyɩnɔ. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: ‹Ɩ b'ɩ do cir sʊnsɔ wʊ y.› »

Pol k'a b'a dɔ, a ʊ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sadisɛɛnrɔ m kan farizɛɛnrɔ kɩ bɩ, a a leer busu brama dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ bire ʊ, a ʊ: «Farizɛn m mɔɔ m, m danyɩnɔ, farizɛɛnrɔ nyɩ m mɔɔ m. Kʊ mɔɔ si mɔɔ ʊ gəəno y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔ kam.»
K'a meer naa do ba an a nya bɩ, nyaa wuti farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ kan sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Zamaa bɩ n a gʊngʊ.
Sadisɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ y, malɛɛka ba ʊ, nyi ba ʊ sɔ y. Farizɛɛnrɔ n bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a sim, ŋ ʊ, ŋ ta ʊ.
Bʊgʊr paan… nyɩnta ʊ. Wosocikarɩnsaambɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wuti farizɛɛnrɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ ŋnɩ meer ba kan heerbusu kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ n gʊaa naa do kʊrɔ ma yɩ y. Kʊ nyi ɩ meer ba kan kɩ, gɛɛ malɛɛka, wɔɔ n a dɔ y.»
Kʊ nyaa bɩ nɩ paŋŋa yɩm bɩ, sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa b'ɩ nyi bam, ŋ y'a Pol kɩnkaansʊ. A lɛ ka kʊ gʊɔɔ n a bɔ bire ʊ, ŋnɩ ta m sʊrdaarɔ wʊtajɩ ʊ b'ʊ.
Gunuu bɩ do ʊ, Zuuba a hɩnka Pol m, a ʊ: «Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ, amba ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ ka Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam Rɔm ʊ maam sɔ.»
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a dɩnda ŋn'a zɛ kan kʊ kɩ, ŋn'a wer si k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ, a hɔ mi k'a n Pol zɛ gər y.
Kutim-kutim naa do nɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ lɛ da busi ra, ŋn'a wer bɩ si.
Ŋ n ta, ŋn'aa wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ yɩ kan jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ nɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ʊ wer si, ʊ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n Pol zɛ gər y, wɔɔ bɩ hɔ bɩrɛ y.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ kan dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ kɩ, k'a kʊ yɩ, k'a hɩ sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ m k'an a gaa, an a ka a ʊ, ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a b'a banka a lar. Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n n'a bam, ʊ a ku, ʊ a zɛ b'a n lee ku bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ bɩ dɔ.»
Pol danlʊ nyɩ n minno nɔɔn duro ma. A n ta sʊrdaarɔ wʊtajɩ ʊ, an aa gasʊ, an a hɩ Pol m.
Pol n sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa deem bir, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Nyukumbueere naa gaa, ɩ ta m sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ zi, a lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan kɩ.»

Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ n a gaa, an ta m sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ zi, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Lɔ Pol b'ɩ mɔɔ bir, an a yɛ mɔɔ han, kʊ m nyukumbueere naa do gaa, m bʊr m ɩbɩɩ zi. A lɛ n taa k'a meer ba kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ.»
Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n a gaa a wɔ ma, an bɔ m toore ma, an a lar, a ʊ: «Bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ k'ɩ hɩ mɔɔ nɩ?» Nyukumbueere bɩ n a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a dɩnda ŋn'a zɛ kan kʊ kɩ, k'a yɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ Pol gaa ɩ bʊrm booti m dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ taa, ɩ ʊ, ŋ lɛ n taa k'a banka a lar a mim bɩ jɩ ma mɩŋŋa k'a a dɔ.
Ɩ bɩ ŋ meerbaa bɩ si y. Ŋ lɛ dam gʊaa busi ra, ŋnɩ kunku ma. Ŋ y'a wer si k'a bɩ hɔsɩ bɩ, a bɩ hi mi k'awɔɔ n Pol zɛ gər y. Ŋ y'a banka, ŋnɩ nya, ŋn'ɩ dɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zaakarɛ ma.»
Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n nyukumbueere bɩ da zaa ra, an a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩ b'a hɩ gɔsɩ nɩ, ɩ ʊ, ɩ hɔ naa do hɩ mɔɔ nɩ y.»
Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa bɩ n sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzannɔ bir hɩɩya, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a a banka, k'a ta Sezaree ʊ yirbəə wakatɩ nɛɛhʊ ma, sʊrdaarɔ zɔɔhɩra, siirozannɔ busaanhɩna, kannɩzannɔ zɔɔhɩra.
K'a siiro banka, kʊ Pol n da ŋ ʊ an lee ku kan laafɩɩ kɩ tara lɛɛzaa Feligsi zi.»
A n ci ba, an a hɩ ncɩnaaʊ:
«Mɔɔ Klodiyus Liziyas nɩ yaa dam tara lɛɛzaa mɩŋŋa Feligsi m.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ ɩ gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi naa nyasʊ ŋn'a ŋʊam k'a zɛ. Kʊ mɔɔ b'a ma ŋ ʊ Rɔm gʊaa m bɩ, mɔɔ ta kan m sʊrdaarɔ kɩ, m aa yɔ.
Kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m mim kʊ ŋ y'a ka ra bɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ ka ŋnɩ ta m ŋ dʊdɔkənno taa.
Mɔɔ bɩ dɩga a, bɩsɩ ŋ n'a kam, a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ mim ka ra. B'a n hɔsɩ ba, an a ga zɛ m, gɛɛ ŋn'a sur baŋŋarɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ ma ŋ ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ ɩ dundom zi k'a zɛ bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi zɔɔ-zɔɔ. Mɔɔ hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊr ɩbɩɩ zi, ŋnɩ b'a gumə lemim hɩ.»
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n lɛ kʊ n y'a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ si, ŋnɩ Pol gaa, ŋnɩ ta m gunuu ʊ Antipatris ʊ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kannɩzannɔ wɔɔ m Pol to siirozannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'a wusigə, ŋnɩ bʊr sʊrdaarɔ wʊtajɩ ʊ b'ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ yaa lee ku Sezaree ʊ bɩ, siirozannɔ wɔɔ ci bɩ ka tara lɛɛzaa b'ʊ, ŋnɩ Pol hɩnka m sɔ.
Tara lɛɛzaa bɩ n ci bɩ karɩnda ba, an laaka da kʊ Pol bɩ, a to a ʊ gʊrga kara ʊ gɛ. K'a a dɔ a ʊ, a to a ʊ Silisii ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ m, a ʊ:
«Gʊɔɔ k'ʊ ŋ mim ka ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ, kʊ ŋ bʊr, mɔɔ yɩ m tʊr karɛ ɩbɩɩ meerbaa ma.» A n lɛ ka, a ʊ, ŋnɩ dɔ ma naa ʊ, hargʊta kʊ Hɩrɔɔdɩ a dɔ b'ʊ.
Dɔmɩm soor jɛ ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ Ananɩyas kan jɩtannɔ kɩ, meerbaa dɔrɛzaa deem Tɛrtulus kɩ bʊr. Ŋ n ta Pol mim bɩ m tara lɛɛzaa Feligsi taa.
Bɩ m Pol bir, Tɛrtulus n a sɩŋŋɩda sa, an nɩ mim karɛ a lɛ m, a ʊ: «Feligsi mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ minto y'a ka wɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ gʊta, lʊnlʊrlɛrɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba wɔɔ bire ʊ wɔɔ do naa minto, bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm haay, lɛɛ haay ʊ, Feligsi mɩŋŋa, wɔɔ ɩ barka darɛ ɩbɩɩ m zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ nɔɔn duro minto.

Kʊ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m ɩbɩɩ kɔ gʊta bɩ, meerbaa bɩ bɩ gʊta y. Meerbaa nyɩntam poore, bɩ mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, kʊ bamɩŋŋazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ, wɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʊr kam ma kan bʊraama k'ɩbɩɩ n tam wɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ kɩ.
Wɔɔ yɩ gʊaa naa do, minzaa m. A nyaa zɛ an n'a dam durnya naa zɩɩfʊrɔ haay bire ʊ. Nazarɛtɩ gʊngʊrɛzannɔ wɔɔ karɩnda jɩtaarɛ deem m.
A a ŋʊa k'a wɔɔ Wosocɛ bɩ zar, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ n a nyasʊ. [
Wɔɔ ʊ kʊ a dʊdɔ ka, ʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ. Sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa Liziyas n a ma, an b'a bɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ, an lɛ ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mim ka ra rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊr ɩbɩɩ zi.]
Ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ lar ɩ zim: Ɩbɩɩ hɔ niŋŋə k'a ka wɔɔ nɩ mim kam la bɩ jɩ dɔm.»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n yo meerbaa naa do ra, ŋ ʊ, sɩra m.
Tara lɛɛzaa b'a wɔ busu, an zaa ka Pol ʊ, k'an meer ba. Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ so gʊrga naa do dʊdɔ karɛ ʊ a dɔɔraa laatʊ, mɔɔ heer nyɩnta sɔ, kʊ m m meer ba.
K'ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ laaka da. Ta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, a dɔmɩm n lɛ da bueerehɩɩya ra y, mɔɔ ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ m aa yaa da.
Gɔsɩ n mɔɔ yɩ m nɩ bɩsɩ kam Wosocɛ ʊ kan gʊaa kɩ, gɛɛ, m nyaa zɛ m a da sokʊmacɛ ʊ, gɛɛ, lɛɛ vanta ʊ tara nɔ ʊ y.
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ hɔsɩ yɩ ŋn'a ka mɔɔ ra, ŋ ʊ sɩra nɩ y.

Ba hɔ kʊ mɔɔ dɔ bɩ n na: Wɔɔ zɩrɔ Woso zi mɔɔ n'a bam, m nɩ zum Zuuba Yeezuu zaa kʊ ŋ ʊ gʊngʊrɛzaa m b'ʊ. Kʊ zaa bɩ do nɩ, mɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba lɛrɔ ci nɔ ʊ bɩ sim kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro kɩ.
Mɔɔ ta Woso taafeerle naa do m, mɔɔ ʊ: Gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kan gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kɩ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ. Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ maam sɔ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ m tɔŋ ʊ dɔmɩm haay kʊ m bɩ mim zu ʊ Woso ma kan gʊɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ, naa minto bɩ, dabɔʊ ba mɔɔ ma y.
Mɔɔ bɔrɛ dɔɔraa laatʊ, m m bɔ, m bʊr kɛɛrɛ, kʊ m bɩ daahan ka m dogʊɔɔ cicirzannɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɩ mannɩ ba sɔ.
Bɩ, ŋ bɩ mɔɔ yɩ Wosocɛ ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, mɔɔ dintim gʊ m ma. Gʊaa cir n nyɩnta ʊ y, bɩ bʊgʊr n nyɩnta ʊ sɔ y,
kʊ Azii zɩɩfʊrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ bɛɛ nyɩnta b'ʊ y. Brɔɔ y'a ga m, ŋn'a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ taa, ŋnɩ mim yɩ ŋn'a ka mɔɔ ra, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ba bɩ minto.
Gɛɛ k'a bɛɛ m bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ba, ŋnɩ ta mɔɔ m dʊdɔkənno wɔɔ taa bɩ hɩ.
Hɔ deem naa mɔɔ jɩm brama, m zee da, m a hɩ ŋ bire ʊ: Gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ minto y'a ka, ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔ karɛ awɔɔ taa her.»
Bala, Feligsi Zuuba Yeezuu zaa bɩ mim dɔ. N gʊɔɔ wɔɔ da zaa ra, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Kʊ sʊrdaa tisi lɛɛzaa Liziyas bɩ bʊr naa ʊ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim bɩ dʊdɔ karɛ.»
A n lɛ ka sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa b'ʊ, a ʊ, an dɔ Pol ma, b'a b'a du y. A b'a ta a gʊaasɩba sɩ m tolle, a nyasʊm minto y.
Dɔmɩm k'a cem poore bɩ, Feligsi nyɩnta kan Drusil a lʊ kʊ zɩɩfʊ m bɩ kɩ. A n a ka, ŋnɩ Pol bir k'an Krista sɩrakarɛ mim dɩnda a m.

Bɩ, Pol k'a nɩ meer bɩ bam an nɩ tam tɩrgabaa, bʊraama, dʊdɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ, Feligsi da bɔ ʊ, an Pol meerbaa bɩ zɛ ra, a ʊ: «Naa ma bɩ, ɩ wusigə, ɩ ta ɩ bɩncɛ ʊ. Mɔɔ zɛm b'ɩ bir dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʊ.»
Feligsi nyɩnta an n'a hɔɔn darɛ, a ʊ, Pol busoo karɛ a ʊ. Bɩ y'a ka an tɩr nyɔɔ da, ŋn'aa bir hallɩ gallɛm gʊta k'a bɩ sʊʊra ba.
Dɔɔraa hɩɩya k'a cem bɩ, Pɔrsiyus Fɛstus ɩ Feligsi bɩncɛ sa. Feligsi k'a lɛ n taa k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʊ bɩ, a Pol to lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Bala, Fɛstus k'a lee ku a gʊrga ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a dɔmɩm kaakʊ kur bɩ, a a hʊr Sezaree ʊ, an ta Zerizalɛm ʊ.
B'ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ gʊɔɔ gʊtɔɔ kɩ bʊr k'a mim ka Pol ra a taa. Ŋ n a yɛ Fɛstus han, k'an sugur ba a m,
an zaa ka, kʊ n nɩ ta Pol m Zerizalɛm ʊ. Bala, ŋ y'a dɩnda, ŋn'a zɛ kan kʊ kɩ a minto, k'a bɩ daata zɛ ra, a ku a zɛ gər zaa ra.
Fɛstus n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ, Pol gɔɔtam Sezaree lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ. Bɩ, kan bɩ kɩ haay, k'a yɩ poore, a y'a bɔrɛ a ta b'ʊ.
«A a ya, an a hɩ a ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mim bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa, awɔɔ bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ zu kʊ ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ, k'ʊ ta Sezaree ʊ, kʊ hɔ niŋŋə ta an ta ʊ gʊaa naa do minto, kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊr ŋnɩ mim ka ra.»
Fɛstus n maasɩrɛ ba ŋ bire ʊ y, a n lɛ da dɔmɩm sinnyə m gɛɛ bu nɩ y. K'a lee ku Sezaree ʊ bɩ, a dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, a yaa nyɩnta a dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, an a ka n n bʊr Pol m.
Bɩ k'a lee ku b'ʊ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to Zerizalɛm ʊ ŋnɩ bʊr lɔ wɔɔ bɩr ma, ŋnɩ ŋʊaar gʊta ba, ŋ n'a kam la kan minno gʊtɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ŋ b'a dam ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka y.
Pol n a gumə mim hɩ sɔ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ n mim zu ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ lɛrɔ ma, gɛɛ ŋ Wosocɛ, gɛɛ Rɔm cir ma y.»
Kʊ Fɛstus lɛ n taa k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a a hɩ Pol m, «Ɩbɩɩ lɛ taa kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ɩbɩɩ m Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ m aa ɩ dʊdɔ ka gɛɛ?»
Pol n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Rɔm cir dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ mɔɔ n ta ʊ naa, naa ʊ ŋn'ɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔ kaŋ ʊ. Ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa a dɔ paan…, ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ n mim zu ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ ma y.

Kʊ mim mɔɔ zu ʊ paan…, an a ga mɔɔ zɛ m, mɔɔ bɩ m bɔrɛ m kur y. Bɩ, kʊ minno kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro a ba, n n'a kam mɔɔ ra b'a jɩ ba ʊ rɔ nɔɔn nɩ, gʊaa ba lɛ m, an n'a dam ma, a n mɔɔ ka ŋ ʊ y. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ m ta Rɔm cir taa.»
Fɛstus kʊ ma kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ an a hɩ Pol m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ yɛ k'ɩ ta Rɔm cir taa, ta ɩbɩɩ n nɩ zɛm b'a ʊ b'ʊ.»
Dɔmɩm k'a cem poore bɩ, cir Agripaa kan a danlʊ Berenisi kɩ ta Sezaree ʊ, ŋnɩ ta k'a yaa yaa da Fɛstus m.
Kʊ ŋn'ɩ maasɩrɛ bam b'ʊ poore bɩ, Fɛstus Pol mim bɩ sa, an a dɩnda cir bɩ m, a ʊ: «Gʊaa n nɩ naa ʊ, Feligsi n a to lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ ta ʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ kɩ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ mim ka ra, ŋn'a zɛrɛ yɛrɛ.
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ŋ nʊ, mɔɔ ʊ, Rɔm zannɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə bɛɛ k'a gʊaa bɔ a ka kʊ ŋ n'a zɛ gər, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mim kam la rɔ wɔɔ ba ʊ, k'an aa a gumə mim dɩnda kan mim kʊ ŋ y'a ka ra bɩ kɩ y.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ bʊr naa ʊ, mɔɔ n m ya, m dɔ hɔsɩ ma y, a dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta, m dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, m a ka, ŋnɩ bʊr gʊaa bɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ bʊr dʊdɔ bɩ ma bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mim kam la rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n mim sɩ gurezaa yɩ, ŋn'a ka ra, amba mɔɔ m hɔɔn da ma bɩ nɩ y.
Ŋ Woso zaa zuure minnɔ m bala, kan gʊaa deem kʊ n n'a birm Yeezuu k'a ga Pol n'a hɩm a ʊ, a mɩsɩr bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ mɔɔ n hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a bam bɩ dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ yɛ han, k'a lɛ taa k'a ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ m aa mim bɩ dʊdɔ ka b'ʊ.
Bɩ kʊ Pol a hɩ a ʊ, a lɛ n taa k'a gɔɔta lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, an ta an dɔmɩm kʊ cir gʊta n n'a mim bɩ dʊdɔ kam ma bɩ ku bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ ka, kʊ ŋ nɩ dɔ ma, an ta, an dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔŋ ʊ Rɔm cir zi bɩ ku.»
Agripaa n a hɩ Fɛstus m, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ n gʊaa naa do meerbaa ma sɔ.» Fɛstus n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «Booti m bala, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʊr karɛ a meerbaa ma.»
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, Agripaa kan Berenisi kɩ lee ku dʊdɔkarɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ kan cirbəə gʊta kɩ, sʊrdaarɔ jɩtannɔ yɩ ŋ da zaa ʊ kan tara bɩ gʊɔɔ gʊtɔɔ kɩ. Fɛstus n lɛ ka, ŋnɩ bʊr Pol m.

Fɛstus n meerbaa sa, a ʊ: «Cir Agripaa kan awɔɔ haay woo…, k'a nɩ naa ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ gʊaa naa do yɩrɛ. Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ haay bɩ mɔɔ yɩ a minto Zerizalɛm ʊ, an ta an lee ku naa ʊ kan zee kɩ, ŋ ʊ, ŋ b'a ya, ŋn'a to mɩsɩr y.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n zibəə bʊnyaa yɩ, an a ba, an a ga a zɛ nɩ y. Bɩ, k'a ʊ, k'a lee ku Rɔm cir zi bɩ, mɔɔ cɩnta, kʊ m a nyɔɔ b'ʊ.

Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ ba meerbaa m paan…, kʊ m a gʊrsɩra ba cir gʊta ma k'an Pol mim bɩ dɔ bɩ, bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ n a ka, an bʊr awɔɔ taa, an lɛ da ɩbɩɩ taa naa ʊ cir Agripaa, kʊ wɔɔ lar, naa jɛ ʊ, mɔɔ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ, m a gʊrsɩra ba Rɔm cir ma.
Kʊ mɔɔ lɔ nyɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ, bɩ mɔɔ n a kʊrɔma k'an a mim ʊ bɩ yɩ, yarmabaa zibəə m.»
Agripaa n a hɩ Pol m, a ʊ: «Zaa ta ʊ k'ɩ meer ba kɛɛrɛ, ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔ.» Pol n a wɔ busu, an a gumə lemim hɩ, a ʊ:
«Mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ, cir Agripaa, kʊ mɔɔ zaa yɩ kʊ m meer ba ɩbɩɩ taa her, kʊ m m gumə mim dɩnda, mim haay kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ mɔɔ a ka wɔɔ ra bɩ minto.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ minkə ŋ bɩsɩkarɛ gʊta m kan ŋ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəə kɩ. Bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, k'ɩ tʊr ka mɔɔ meerbaa ma kan bʊraama kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɩnta hɔ niŋŋə, m nyɩbaa ma, kan nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ hɔ niŋŋə, m dogʊɔɔ bire ʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ kɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ haay a dɔ.
Kʊ ŋ lɛ taa, ŋ y'a da ma, ŋn'a kasɛtɩ ka, ŋ y'a dɔ a dɔɔraa laatʊ, ŋ ʊ, farizɛn m mɔɔ m. Gʊɔɔ niŋŋoo kʊ ŋ nɩ yɛm wɔɔ Woso zaa zuure ma paan…, an lɛ da ŋ haay ra rɔ wɔɔ.
Bɩ her naa, kʊ mɔɔ Woso lerbɔrɛ k'a ba wɔɔ zɩrɔ m bɩ si bɩ, bɩ y'a ba mɔɔ dʊdɔ her.

Wɔɔ do haryaa bueerehɩɩya b'ɩ yaa dam Woso m sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ, ŋ bɩr a tore y. Kʊ ŋn'ɩ dɔm lerbɔrɛ bɩ do ma bɩ minto. Kʊ mɔɔ lerbɔrɛ naa do ta m heer lɛ bɩ y'a ka, m cir Agripaa, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ nɩ mim kam mɔɔ ra.
Bɔ minto m, b'awɔɔ n a si a ʊ, Woso ɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʊ?
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta m a si mɩŋŋa mɔɔ ʊ lɛ m, kʊ m yar ba kan Nazarɛtɩ Yeezuu bɩ tɔ bɩ kɩ, paŋŋa do haay m.
Bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ ba Zerizalɛm ʊ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ ɩ lɛ naa do ka mɔɔ ʊ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa sɩrakarɛzannɔ gʊr gʊta, m m du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ hɩ mɔɔ ʊ, a a ga m.
Gallɛm gʊta, mɔɔ ta sokʊmacɛrɔ ʊ, m fɩr ka ŋ ma, m paŋŋa ba ŋ ma, kʊ ŋ nɩ Yeezuu sʊnsɔ wʊ. Bɩ, kan jɩmbaa heerbusu gʊta kɩ, mɔɔ yɩ ŋ jɩ bɔm tararɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ra, m nɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, hindeem ʊ, wosocɛmannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ n zaa ka mɔɔ ʊ kan paŋŋa haay kɩ, kʊ m ta Damas ʊ mim naa do minto.
Cir, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ tam bɩ, kʊ sinuu b'a zɔ bɩ, mɔɔ lɛɛgure yɩ, an a to brama, a gure n lɛ da wosogure ra, an b'a ku mɔɔ ra kan m zukuuzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ ʊ dundo tara ʊ, mɔɔ n leer ma, an n'a hɩm mɔɔ m ebree lemim m, a ʊ: Sol, Sol, bɔ minto, ɩ nɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma? A ba ɩbɩɩ nawʊrɛ, ɩ mɩŋŋa m!
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ʊ: ‹Nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, Zuuba?› Zuuba n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Yeezuu m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ n nɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.

Bɩ, wuti ɩ jɩm! Ba hɔ k'a ka mɔɔ n m hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m bɩ n na: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ bɔ ʊ k'ɩ nyɩnta mɔɔ zibəənyɩ, mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa kan hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ mɔɔ yɩ ʊ naa kɩ, kan a vantɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ m hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ lɛɛ kam m ɩbɩɩ bʊmbɔ ɩ do kan do vantɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'ɩbɩɩ nyɔɔrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ wɔ ʊ,

k'ɩ yaa nɩ ŋ mɩm gʊ, k'ɩ ŋ bɔ monsigə nɔ ʊ, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ lɛɛgure ʊ, k'ɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ Sʊtaana lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ, ɩ ta ŋ nɩ Woso zi, kʊ ŋ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, bɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔjirle yɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.›
Bɩ tɛkka ma, cir Agripaa, mɔɔ n bɩsɩ ka hɔ kʊ Zuuba a hɩ mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ naa do nɔ ʊ bɩ ma y.

A sa mɔɔ ʊ Damas zannɔ ma kan Zerizalɛm zannɔ kɩ, an lɛ da, Zidee jilli kʊ zannɔ kɩ, bɩ jɛ ʊ kan do vantɔɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ kɩ, m a dɩnda kʊ ŋ n'a bɔ a taam, ŋnɩ yɛ Woso ma, kʊ ŋ n'a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba, k'an zu kʊ ʊ kan ŋ heerlʊrlɛ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ Wosocɛ ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n bɩ mɔɔ nyasʊ, ŋn'a gɩnga k'a mɔɔ mee bɔ ʊ.

Woso n ku mɔɔ ra mɩŋŋa, an ta an dɔmɩm naa do ku. Mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ kasɛtɩ kam gʊɔɔ poorero kan gʊɔɔ gʊtɔɔ kɩ taa. Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kan Moyiisi kɩ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ hɩ. Mɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ vanta hɩrɛ, an lɛ da bɩ ra y.
Ŋ ʊ: ‹Krista fɩr yɩrɛ, b'a lɛɛ kam an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, an nɩ lɛɛgure pa dam zɩɩfʊrɔ m kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kɩ.› »
Pol k'a lee ku bɩncɛ naa do ʊ a meerbaa nɔ ʊ bɩ, Fɛstus a leer busu, an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔɔzaa n'ɩbɩɩ naa Pol! Ɩbɩɩ hɔdɔrɛ maam-maam bɩ y'ɩbɩɩ bam hɔɔzaa!»
Pol n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Hɔɔzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y, Fɛstus mɩŋŋa, sɩra meerbaa mɔɔ n'a bam, hɔɔntaʊrɛ m.

Cir Agripaa bɩ minno nɔɔn duro dɔ mɩŋŋa haay, bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ m dam ma, m meer ba a lɛɛ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ. Mɔɔ si mɔɔ ʊ, hɔsɩ n ba a mɩm ma sɛɛrɛ y. Bala, minno nɔɔn duro n ba gʊrga k'a nyaakʊm da ʊ y.
Cir Agripaa, ɩbɩɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ mim si ra? Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ŋ mim si»
Agripaa n a hɩ Pol m, a ʊ: «Kan ɩbɩɩ meerbaa bɩ kɩ, gɔɔta a ʊ poore, k'ɩbɩɩ n mɔɔ ba kristagʊaa ra?»

Pol n a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a a ŋʊa, an gɔɔta poore gɛɛ gʊta, mɔɔ ŋʊa, kʊ Woso yɛ, a bɩ nyɩntarɛ ɩbɩɩ bala y, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam mɔɔ meerbaa ma her lɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ y'a bam amba mɔɔ m, bɩ baŋŋarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ wɔ ma rɔ nɔɔn duro bɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ wɔ ma y.»
Cir bɩ n wuti kan tara lɛɛzaa bɩ kɩ, Berenisi kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋn'a hʊrm bɩ, ŋ sʊʊra ba kan kʊ kɩ ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do n hɔsɩ ba, an a ga zɛ m gɛɛ baŋŋarɔ nɩ y.»
Agripaa n a hɩ Fɛstus m, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa naa do bɛɛ y'a ŋʊa k'a ta mim bɩ m Rɔm cir taa, a a ga m, ŋnɩ wɔ saa.»
Kʊ ŋ y'a cɩnta kʊ wɔɔ n da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ, ʊ ta Italii ʊ bɩ, ŋ Pol kan lɔnnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ da sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa k'a tɔ m Zuliyus bɩ wɔ ʊ, sʊrdaarɔ zɔrsɔddɩ zɛkʊra kʊ n n'a birm Ogista zɛkʊra, bɩ y'a so ʊ.
Wɔɔ da kɔɔlʊʊ ʊ k'a a to Adramitɩyɔm an nɩ tam Azii kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hi lɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ ʊ. Aristarkɩ ɩ nyɩnta kan wɔɔ kɩ. Masedʊan kʊ Tesaloniki gʊaa m.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, wɔɔ lee ku Sidɔn ʊ, bɩ kʊ jɩnlɛ poore m bɩ, Zuliyus a ba Pol m mɩŋŋa. A zaa ka ʊ, k'an aa dɩga a gʊaasɩbarɔ ma, brɔɔ n nyasʊ m.
Kʊ wɔɔ bɔ b'ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ, ʊ bɔ Siipɩr jɩr ʊ, k'a n'a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ k'a nya wɔɔ rɛ bɩ minto.
A m bɩ, wɔɔ n higʊta k'a nɩ Silisii kan Panfilii kɩ jɩr ʊ bɩ zɛ ra, ʊ aa lee ku Lisii kʊ Miir ʊ.
Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a Alɛsandrii kɔɔlʊʊ yɩ b'ʊ an nɩ tam Italii ʊ bɩ, a a ka wɔɔ n da ʊ.

Kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ n ta poore-poore dɔmɩm gʊta nɔ ʊ, ʊ aa lee ku kan kɔrɛ kɩ Kinɩdɩ ʊ. Hɩnhɛr bɩ k'a nya wɔɔ rɛ bɩ, wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ ta tɩrga bɩ, wɔɔ bɔ Salmonɛ jɩr ʊ, ʊ aa bɔ Krɛtɩ jɩr ʊ, k'a n'a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ minto.
Wɔɔ fɩr yɩ kan kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ kɩ, ʊ bɔkarɛ ʊ aa lee ku bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a birm Jɩnjɩ-Mɩŋŋa b'ʊ, Lazaya kʊ jɩr ʊ.
Dɔmɩnnɔ cem gʊta, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ tarɛ nyibəə n ta ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, lɛkʊsɩrɛ dɔmɩm cem. Pol n ŋ dʊndɔ, a ʊ:
«M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ tarɛ naa do hɔ zarm gʊta, a nyaanɩm gʊɔɔ gʊta m, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bɛɛ bala kan mɔr bɩ kɩ y, wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ sɔ.»
Sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ, a tʊr an n'a kam gʊaa k'a nɩ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bram bɩ ma kan kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ zaa hɔnyɩ kɩ ma, an lɛ da Pol meerbaa bɩ ra.

Bɩncɛ niŋŋə kʊ wɔɔ jɩm ʊ bɩ, k'a bɩ bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, ŋ gʊɔɔ gʊta a zɛ kʊ ra, ŋn'a lɛ ba deem k'a zu zaa ʊ, kʊ dɩga a, k'ʊ lee kum jɩnjɩ k'a nɩ Krɛtɩ kʊ Fenigsi ʊ b'ʊ, k'an a ta wɔɔ m nyɛɛm hɩnhɛr minto. K'ʊ nyɩnta b'ʊ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʊ.
Hɩnhɛr poore wuti jɩsa, bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'a hɔɔn da, ŋ ʊ, a y'a dam ma, a zaa sa. Ŋ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ hʊr, ŋn'a na Krɛtɩ gəm b'ʊ, ŋn'ɩ tam.
K'a yɩ poore bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʊta kʊ n n'a birm Erakilɔn
bɩ wuti tara bɩ zeezi, an bʊr kan paŋŋa kɩ, an b'a ku ŋ la.
A n kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ gaa an cenim, wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ a bɔ y. Wɔɔ n a to an a gaa, an nɩ tam nɩ, kʊ lɛɛ ka m, ʊ n a dɔ y.

K'a nɩ tam zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku tara poore k'a nɩ hi bire ʊ, n n'a birm Koda bɩ jɩr ʊ, an a ta wɔɔ m hɩnhɛr bɩ minto. Wɔɔ ʊ tɔ ʊ kan kɔrɛ gʊta kɩ, ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ kɔɔlʊʊ poore bɩ gaa, ʊ a bɔ hi b'ʊ, ʊ a da kɔɔlʊʊ gʊta b'ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ kɔɔlʊʊ poore bɩ gaa ŋn'a da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ an nya bɩ, ŋ bar sunso kɔɔlʊʊ gʊta b'ʊ kɛɛrɛ.
Kʊ ŋ nɩ nyi bam kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ yaa wɔ Sɩrtɩ nyɩntaa b'ʊ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊsɩ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ jɛ ma, ŋn'a da hi b'ʊ, k'a n'a tarɛ bɩ bɔrɛ, ŋn'a to an nɩ tarɛ a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, hɩnhɛr gʊta bɩ k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma tee… bɩ, ŋ mɔrlɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ da kɔɔlʊʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ waa ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ zar higʊta b'ʊ.
A dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ bɩ, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ zar hi b'ʊ a zim.
Woso kan monyaarɔ kɩ n a hɩnka dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y, bɩ hɩnhɛr bɩ hɔnrɛ bʊnyaabaa gɔɔta an nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma. Wɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ wɔɔ bɔrɛ y.

A dɔmɩm laatʊ, ŋ n hɔbɩrɛ bɩ y. Pol n wuti an jɩm brama ŋ bire ʊ, an a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ yɩ ra, gʊɔɔ, kʊ mɔɔ dʊndɔrɛ b'awɔɔ si, ʊ n ʊ hʊr Krɛtɩ ʊ, fɩr kʊ wɔɔ yɩ naa kan mɔr k'a zar naa kɩ bɩ wɔɔ yɩrɛ y.
Bɩ naa ma bɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han, k'a heer ba kookoo. Awɔɔ gʊaa deem taan… bɩ garɛ y, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ y'a deem n n'a zarm bala.
Woso k'a a so mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ n'a zi bam bɩ malɛɛka a hɩnka mɔɔ m gum naa ʊ bala, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ:
Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, Pol. A a ga m, ɩbɩɩ m ta Rɔm cir taa, bɩ Woso gʊɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ meeyaa da ɩbɩɩ wɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, yaarɔ, k'a heer ba kookoo! Mɔɔ sɩra ka Woso ʊ, a bam amba a a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.
Wɔɔ yaa nʊ lo tara niŋŋə k'a nɩ hi bire ʊ bɩ ra.»
A gunuu bueeresi hɔ, wɔɔ nyaam ʊ higʊta bɩ burə ʊ. Dibsir k'a a zɔ bɩ, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a dɔ a hɔɔn ʊ, ŋ ʊ, wɔɔ ʊ zɔ tara ma.
Ŋ n higʊta bɩ nɔ makra ba mɛtɩr busi, kʊ ŋ ta lɛɛ poore bɩ, ŋ y'a ya, ŋn'a makra ba ŋn'a yɩ mɛtɩr bukərku.
Kʊ ŋn'ɩ nyi bam kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ yaa a zɛ ci ma bɩ, ŋ pɔyaa gorezannɔ zo si, ŋn'a kʊsɩ baŋŋarɔ m jɛ ʊ, ŋn'a yɛm kʊ dɔ n mɛ zɔɔ.
Kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ zibəəzannɔ hɔ ba ɩ ʊ, a hɩ ŋ y'a ʊ k'a baŋŋarɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zo hi bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'an kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nyasʊ, ŋn'a nyaakʊm da k'a bra si kan kɔɔlʊʊ poore bɩ kɩ.
Pol n a hɩ, sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ m kan sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro n gɔɔta kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩ bɔrɛ y.»
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n kɔɔlʊʊ poore bɩ barlɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ ra, ŋn'a to an ta an cem.
Kʊ ŋn'ɩ dɔm dɔmɩrɛ ma bɩ, Pol gʊaa haay bir, an a yɛ ŋ han, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Awɔɔ dɔmɩm bueeresi her, awɔɔ n hɔ bɩ y. A n nɩ dɔm ma kʊ hɩnhɛr bɩ n a da jɩm ʊ.
Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han k'a hɔ bɩ, awɔɔ laafɩɩ minto m. Bala, minkə deem taan… bɩ nyaanɩm gʊaa mim ʊ naa ʊ y.»
K'a naa hɩ bɩ, a bur sa, an barka da Woso m gʊaa haay mɩm m, an a zɛ ra, an n'a sʊrɛ.
Ŋ haay heer n ka bɩ jɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ.
Wɔɔ haay wuti, gʊaa zɔɔhɩra busaanhɩna yaa sɔrdɩ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ŋ ka bɩ, ŋ hɔyaa bɩ waa kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a zar hi b'ʊ, k'a gore bɩ n a bɔrɛ.
Dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ n a ya, ŋnɩ tara bɩ dɔ y. Bɩncɛ ŋ y'a yɩ hi bɩ lɛ ra, an zerle bɩncɛ. Ŋ lɛ n taa k'a a da ma, k'a kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ da jɩm ʊ b'ʊ.

Ŋ n baŋŋarɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋnɩ pɔyaarɔ wɔɔ to hi b'ʊ, kʊ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ n a da ma, an ta. Ŋ n kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bɩrlɛ hɔ bɩ ba yɔhɔ-yɔhɔ, ŋnɩ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ pɛɛra poore bɩ busu, ŋnɩ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ to, an nɩ tam bɩncɛ gər zeezi.
Kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ n aa der nyɩntaa dimbir la, lɛɛ bɩ n wɔ, a b'a dam ma a n bɔ y. Bɩ ma bɩ, hikurero wɔɔ b'a jɛ bɩ zɛ, an a kɩnkaansʊ.
Sʊrdaarɔ wɔɔ n a ŋʊa k'a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, kʊ ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ darɛ dɔ ŋ yaa a si hi bɩ burə ʊ.
Bɩ, sʊrdaa zɔrɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ k'a ŋʊa k'a Pol bʊmbɔ bɩ, a n yɛ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ y. A lɛ ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ darɛ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka, ŋn'a da hi b'ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'aa tara gər bɩ ku.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ dam gɔrɔ ʊ gɛɛ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ kəəro wɔɔ ʊ. A yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, ŋ haay n lee ku tara ʊ kan laafɩɩ kɩ.
Kʊ wɔɔ bɔ mim pakra bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ ma ŋ ʊ, tara k'a nɩ hi bire ʊ bɩ tɔ m Maltɩ.
Tara bɩ zannɔ wɔɔ wɔɔ si kan daʊrɛ gʊta kɩ. Ŋ sɛ gʊta hɛ, ŋnɩ wɔɔ gaa, ŋnɩ wɔɔ zɔ ma, bala, la a sɩŋŋɩda ba, an nɩ barɛ, nyɛɛm n ta ʊ.
Pol n nyʊkɔ gər gʊr a zangʊrga ʊ, an b'a da sɛ bɩ rɛ. Kʊ sɛ bɩ nɩ nyʊkɔ bɩ bɩm bɩ, cɩrka bɔ sɛ b'ʊ, an a sɔ wɔ Pol wɔ ʊ.
Tara bɩ zannɔ kʊ ŋ cɩrka bɩ yɩ, an nɩ zeŋŋəm Pol wɔ ma bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩm kʊ m, ŋ ʊ: «Gʊaa naa do nyɩntam gərzer paan… A bɔ hi bɩ nɔ ʊ kan laafɩɩ kɩ, bɩ Woso tɩrgabaazaa lɛ baa a mɩsɩrbaa ma y.»
Pol n a wɔ vɩga zɛ, cɩrka bɩ n a da sɛ b'ʊ, b'a n busu ma y.
Ŋ n jɩm, ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ a wɔ bɩ ma, a hanrɛ gɛɛ, a y'a dore, an ga lɛɛ nɩ? Bɩ, kʊ ŋ dɩgarɛ bɩ maasɩrɛ ba, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ yɩ an ba bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔndarɛ bɩ lʊr, ŋ ʊ: «Woso m!»
Lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, tararɔ nyɩnta ʊ, lɛɛkarɛ dʊdɔkər Publiyus y'a so ŋ ʊ. A wɔɔ si, an nyasʊ wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa dɔmɩm kaakʊ.
A zɩ nyɩnta an nɩ wʊtam kan mɛmarɛ kɩ, yoor kɩ. Pol n ta, an aa dɩga a, an aa a wɔ busu, an a ka ra, an yaa da, an a waa.
Naa do minto bɩ, tara bɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ wɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ yaaba m nɔ wɔɔ ɩ zɛm zi, ŋ n'a waam sɔ.
Wɔɔ daʊrɛ yɩ gʊta, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ bɔ, ʊ n nɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ hɔ haay k'a zibəə n ta wɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Mom kaakʊ jɛ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ da kɔɔlʊʊ k'a gɔɔta tara bɩ do ra b'ʊ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʊ. Alɛsandrii kɔɔlʊʊ m, a tɔ m Diyoskiir.
Wɔɔ zer Sirakɩɩzɩ ʊ k'ʊ hoon si dɔmɩm kaakʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ cem b'ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ da higʊta bɩ lezi, ʊ aa lee ku Regiyo ʊ. Bɩ dɔ k'a mɛ bɩ, hɩnhɛr wuti jɩsa, dɔmɩm hɩɩya hinni ʊ, wɔɔ yaa lee ku Puzɔl ʊ.
Wɔɔ ʊ danyɩnɔ yɩ b'ʊ, ŋn'a yɛ wɔɔ han k'ʊ gɔɔta kan a kɩ dɔmɩm saanhɩna. Nyɩnta a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, ʊ bɔkarɛ, ʊ lee ku Rɔm ʊ.
Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ wɔɔ zɛrɛ bɩ ma bɩ, ŋ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ wɔɔ zɛ ʊ bɩncɛ kʊ n n'a birm Apiyus-Daasɩ kan Tavɛrnɩ-Kaakʊ kɩ ʊ. Pol k'a ŋ yɩ bɩ, a barka da Woso m, a heer paŋŋa n a da ra.
Kʊ wɔɔ lee ku Rɔm ʊ bɩ, n zaa ka Pol ʊ, k'an a ka a mɩŋŋa har ma, kʊ sʊrdaa deem n bɩr dɔm ma.

Dɔmɩm kaakʊ k'a cem bɩ, a Rɔm zɩɩfʊrɔ jɩtannɔ wɔɔ bir, kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊ zɛ ʊ. Kʊ ŋ y'a so kʊ ma bɩ, a a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ ba m dogʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, mɔɔ n wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩ zibəəro zar sɔ y. Ŋ mɔɔ ba lɔ Zerizalɛm ʊ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ da Rɔm zannɔ wɔ ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ laaka dɩnda ŋ nɩ mim bɩ jɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ŋ y'a ŋʊa k'a wɔ saa mɔɔ ma, bala, ŋ n hɔsɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʊr zi an a ga zɛ nɩ y.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ, a bɩ yɛm bɩ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n a yɛ kʊ Rɔm cir n mɔɔ dʊdɔ ka. Mɔɔ bɛɛ y'a hɩ, kʊ m mim ka m do ra y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n a yɛ kʊ m awɔɔ yɩ, kʊ m sʊʊra ba kan awɔɔ kɩ. Kʊ sɩra nɩ, Israyɛl taaheerlɛ minto y'a ka, mɔɔ nɩ baŋŋarɔ nɔɔn duro m.»
Ŋ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, ŋ ʊ: «Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ n ci sɩ yɩ, an a to Zidee ʊ, an n'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩndarɛ y, bɩ, wɔɔ danyɩ sɩ n a to an b'ɩbɩɩ mim dɩnda, gɛɛ tɔbɔrɛ bʊnyaa y.
Wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ɩbɩɩ n hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ hɔɔn dam ma bɩ hɩ k'ʊ a ma, bala, lɛɛ haay ʊ, wɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa ŋ bɩr yɛm gʊngʊrɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ zuŋ ʊ naa ʊ y.»

Ŋ n dɔmɩm cɩnta kan kʊ kɩ, ŋnɩ bʊr gʊta, ŋnɩ b'a yɩ a har ʊ. Pol sʊʊra ba kan ŋ kɩ dɔgta m an ta an yirbəə ku. Woso cirbəə bɩ mim a sa an a dɩnda, an Moyiisi lɛrɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim dɩnda ŋ nɩ, k'a a da ma, kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋ ʊ, Krista bɩ Yeezuu m.
Gɔsɩnnɔ hɔ k'a dɩnda bɩ si, niŋŋoo n a si y.
Kʊ ŋ bʊr ŋn'ɩ cenim bɩ, ŋ n kʊ ma y: Pol n mim deem hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «Sɛnt-Ɛspri meer k'a ba kan Ezayii kɩ awɔɔ zɩrɔ minto bɩ, sɩra m. A a hɩ, a ʊ:
Ta ɩ yaa do naa do yɩ,
ɩ hɩ m, ɩ ʊ:
Awɔɔ y'a tʊr kam mɩŋŋa,
b'awɔɔ b'a jɩ marɛ y.
Awɔɔ dɩgam mɩŋŋa,
b'awɔɔ b'a yɩrɛ y.
Bala, do naa do heer b'ɩ monsigə ʊ,
ŋ tʊr ga, ŋ lɛ baa k'a lɛɛ yɩ a mɩm nɩ y,
ŋ lɛ baa k'a tʊr n mim ma y,
ŋ lɛ baa k'a heer n a jɩ dɔ y,
ŋ lɛ baa k'a a bɔ a taam k'a zu mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n ŋ waa y.
Woso n a hɩ bɩ n naa.
K'a dɔ kɛɛrɛ, a ʊ, Woso bʊmbɔrɛ naa do nyɔɔ n y'a ʊ do vantɔɔ ma, bɩ ŋ y'a sim.» [
Pol k'a meer naa do ba bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a hʊr ŋnɩ bɩsɩ kam gʊta kan kʊ kɩ.]
Pol mɩsɩrbaa ba ncɩnaaʊ dɔɔraa hɩɩya tɔr b'ʊ, an a mɩŋŋa busoo bɔ, an n'a mɩsɩrbaa ba n nɩ. Gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm zi rɔ wɔɔ, a yɩ ŋ sim mɩŋŋa,
an nɩ Woso cirbəə pa darɛ, an nɩ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mim dɩndam kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, bɩ gɔsɩ bɩr a tam nɩ tolle y.
Romans: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, Pol, Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do ba awɔɔ ma. Woso mɔɔ bir kʊ m m ba a zibəəzaa, a mɔɔ bɔ ʊ m hɔ, k'a mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʊ m aa lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do Woso nyɩnta an a ler bɔ tee… Wosoci nɔ ʊ, a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m bɩ.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do bɩ, a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista, wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ mim an n'a dɩndam. K'a mɛsim nɔ ʊ nɩ, Davɩd do gʊaa m.
Bɩ, kʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə nɩ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, hɔ bɩ do n a hɩnka a ʊ, Woso Nyɩ m an nɩ paŋŋa m.
Yeezuu Krista minto m mɔɔ n barka yɩ, m m ba a zibəəzaa, kʊ m a ka kʊ do haay gʊɔɔ m sɩra ka ʊ, ŋnɩ zu ʊ.
Awɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, bala, Yeezuu Krista y'awɔɔ bir k'a so awɔɔ ʊ.
Awɔɔ haay kʊ sɩrakarɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, an nɩ Rɔm ʊ, Woso awɔɔ ŋʊa, an awɔɔ bir k'a nyɩnta a gʊɔɔ barla. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
A n lɛɛ ka bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso kʊ mɔɔ n'a zi bam bɩ m barka, Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ haay minto, bala, durnya nɔ ʊ jilli n y'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mim dɩndam.
Woso zi mɔɔ n'a barɛ kan m heer kɩ haay, a Nyɩ bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʊ, a m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, a a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ dɔmɩm haay yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʊ,
m n'a yɛm han, k'a hɔɔnhɔ m, kʊ m kɔ, m zaa yɩ, m bʊr awɔɔ zi.
Mɔɔ lɛ taa paan… kʊ m awɔɔ yɩ, kʊ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛrɔ jir kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'awɔɔ paŋŋa n a da ra gʊta,
gɛɛ, k'ʊ kʊ paŋŋa da ra, awɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, sɩrakarɛ deem kʊ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ nɔ ʊ.

M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ gɩnga gallɛm hɔka kʊ m bʊr awɔɔ zi, bɩ, an ta an her ku naa, mɔɔ n m da ma y. A ŋʊa mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, kʊ m zibəə n nyɩ da, amba a a da kʊrɔ vantɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Hɔɔngʊrɛzannɔ kan bahɔɔngʊrɛzannɔ kɩ mim pakra ba mɔɔ ma, mindonno kan bamindonno kɩ mim pakra ba mɔɔ ma sɔ.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ lɛ n taa paan… kʊ m lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m sɔ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ Rɔm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Nyannɩ bɩr mɔɔ zɛm lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma y, bala, Woso paŋŋa m, an nɩ gʊaa haay k'a sɩra ka bʊmbɔm. Zɩɩfʊrɔ a lɛɛ ka ŋ ma, an bɔkarɛ an lee ku do vantɔɔ wɔɔ zi.

Wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ denter, lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʊ Woso tɩrgabaa n'a hɩnkaŋ ʊ, Woso ɩ gʊaa k'a sɩra ka bɩ bam tɩrga, sɩra k'a a ka Woso ʊ bɩ minto bala, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Gʊaa k'an tɩrga sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam.›
Woso a to brama an a heerbusu hɩnka, kʊ gʊɔɔ bɩr a daŋ ʊ, mimbʊnyaarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ bam, ŋ bʊnyaabaa n a ka, sɩra bɩr dɔm dɔ sɔ y.
Denter m, hɔ k'a n'a karɛ ŋnɩ Woso dɔ n a nyaakʊm da y, Woso a hɩnka kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ mɩŋŋa.

Paŋŋa kʊ Woso n ta m b'a jirə ba ʊ bɩ, kan Woso mɩŋŋa taʊrɛ kɩ bɩ, gɔsɩ bɩr ŋ yɩrɛ y, bɩ durnya darɛ tɛkka ma, gʊaa a da ma an ŋ yɩ hɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, naa minto bɩ, gʊɔɔ bɩ gumə yɩm fɩɩga y.
Ŋ Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʊ, ŋn'a barka darɛ amba Woso a ga m bɩ nɩ y. Naa n a ka, ŋ hɔɔndarɛ n'a ba daŋŋada, ŋ n kʊrɔ hɔɔn ma, ŋn'ɩ monsigə ʊ.
Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ a ma mindɔrɛzannɔ, an bɔkarɛ taajɛmzannɔ m,

a ga kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ m, kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso k'a nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m tee… bɩ da ʊ bɩ, bɩ to ŋ y'a ʊ ŋn'ɩ *wosobaawɔnnɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ ga m kɩ, bɛnnɔ kɩ, hɔɔgansiro kɩ, tara burə hɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a gaatam nɔ kɩ daŋ ʊ.
Naa minto m, Woso n ŋ to ŋn'ɩ dintim zibəəro kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ barɛ a hɔɔnhɔ ma, ŋn'a mɛ gore bɔŋ ʊ mim k'a nyannɩ n ta ʊ barɛ nɔ ʊ kan kʊ kɩ.
Bala, ŋ Woso sɩra minno wɔɔ to ŋnɩ ŋʊaar sa, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam hɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ m, ŋn'ɩ zure ŋ ʊ, an bɔkarɛ Woso ŋ y'a ga m, ŋn'a da ʊ, a m hɔ haay darɛzaa. Woso n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
Naa minto m, Woso n ŋ to, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr a nyannɩ minno lɛtaamarɔ bam. Ŋ lannɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kam ma sɔ, k'a bɩr kan yar kɩ y, wʊta ŋ nawʊm lannɔ kan kʊ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ, naa barɛ n a ga nɩ y.

Yaarɔ wɔɔ maam sɔ, ŋ bɩr a kam ma, k'a bɩr kan lʊ kɩ y, a ŋʊa ŋ nawʊm paan…, k'a bɩr wʊtam kan a muno yaarɔ kɩ. Yaarɔ kan yaarɔ kɩ nɩ nyannɩ zi bam kan kʊ kɩ, naa n a ka sɔ, ŋn'a nyaanlɛ zibəə fɩryɩrɛ k'a a ga m yɩrɛ a mɛ ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ n a ŋʊa k'a Woso dɔ bɩ, Woso n ŋ to a hɔɔn daŋŋada bɩ nɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a n'a ga barɛ m bɩ ba.

Zibəə k'a n a ga barɛ m do haay ba ŋ nawʊm, mimbʊnyaa do haay, gʊɔɔ lɛtaama bʊnyaa do haay, bʊnyaabaa do haay, jɩmbaa n ŋ heer han, gərzɛrɛ ba n nɩ, nyaabarɛ ba n nɩ, zambʊbarɛ ba n nɩ, zibəə daŋŋada haay,
ŋn'ɩ tɔ bɔm, ŋn'ɩ gʊɔɔ tɔ zaar barɛ, ŋnɩ sɔ Woso m, ŋ bɩr gʊɔɔ daŋ ʊ y, ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busum, ŋn'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ bɔm mimbʊnyaa daarɔ barɛ m, ŋ bɩr yɛm a zɩrɔ lɛ ma y,
ŋ hɔɔn ba ʊ y, ŋ bɩr jɩnlɛ a lɛ ra y, gʊaa mim bɩr ŋ kɔrɛ y, gʊaa cicir bɩr ŋ zɛrɛ y.

A n bɔkarɛ, ŋ y'a dɔ mɩŋŋa ŋ ʊ, Woso lɛ y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, gʊaa k'a nɩ ziro nɔɔn duro barɛ a ga zɛ m. Kan naa kɩ haay ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ kan minno nɔɔn duro barɛ kɩ. A n a na ma bɩ, kʊ ŋ gʊaa yɩ sɔ, an nɩ minno nɔɔn duro barɛ, bɩ ŋ nɔ yɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, nka n'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'ɩ gʊɔɔ dʊdɔ yarlɛ? Ɩbɩɩ bɩ gumə yɩrɛ y, gʊɔɔ dʊdɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a yarm bɩ, ɩ mɩŋŋa dʊdɔ ɩ n'a yarm, bala, ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yarm, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ zi kʊ ŋ n'a bam bɩ bam sɔ.
Wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʊ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ, Woso yɩm dʊdɔ yarm sɩra m, amba ŋ zibəə bʊnyaa b'a ga m bɩ m.
Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yarm bɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a barɛ, am ŋ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, ɩ hɔɔn ɩbɩɩ da ɩ ʊ, ɩ bɔm lɛm Woso dʊdɔyarlɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ ra?

Gɛɛ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr dɩgam Woso ŋʊarɛ gʊta k'an ta m ɩbɩɩ minto, an nɩ bʊrlɛ a ma, k'a mɩŋŋa ba ɩbɩɩ m bɩ ma hɔsɩ ra? Ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʊ, a ba k'a nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ m mɩŋŋa bɩ, a hɩ a ʊ, k'ɩbɩɩ m toore yɩ, ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam la?
B'ɩbɩɩ da bɩr bɔŋ ʊ y, ɩ lɛ baa k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam y, bɩ, a ba k'ɩbɩɩ n nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ naa, hʊnhʊrlɛ gʊta ɩbɩɩ n'a bankarɛ ɩ minto, dɔmɩm kʊ Woso n n'a heerbusu hɩnkaŋ ʊ, an dʊdɔ ka kan sɩra kɩ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, a gʊaa biyəə zibəə nyɔɔdʊ kaŋ ʊ, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tɔŋ ʊ, k'a mɩŋŋa ba tee…, ka Woso nɔ yɩ, ŋn'a kam Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ ma, kan a daʊrɛ kɩ ma, kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a bɩr a zaar bam kɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ, Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ karɛ ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Woso ma, ŋ bɩr zum sɩra ʊ y, ŋn'a bʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso y'a nɔmaa kan a heerbusu kɩ hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Kʊsɩ kan fɩr kɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ yɩm, zɩɩfʊrɔ n nɩ lɛɛ kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ, daʊrɛ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ kam gʊaa haay k'a n'a mɩŋŋa bam b'ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ n nɩ lɛɛ kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ n a nya ŋ ʊ.
Bala, Woso bɩr gʊɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.

Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mimbʊnyaa bam, ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gɩngam sɔ, bɩ Moyiisi lɛrɔ bɛɛ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ dʊdɔ karɛ zaa y, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ, ŋn'a gu ŋn'ɩ mimbʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ dʊdɔ karɛ zaa.
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma bala rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ y, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zure ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.

A a da ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y, ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, nɔɔ m hɔ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ ba, bɩ ŋ n a dɔ y. A ba kʊ ŋ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ ŋ n lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ, naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, ŋ lɛ cɩnta a mɩŋŋɔɔ m.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʊ, hɔ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba a heer ʊ, ŋ heer ɩ kasɛtɩ kam, kan ba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ tɩr a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a mɩŋŋa ba gɛɛ a bʊnyaa ba bɩ kɩ.
Nyɩnta a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ, amba lemim nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m, Woso zaa kam Krista Yeezuu ʊ k'an hɔ haay k'a nyaakʊm da gʊɔɔ heer ʊ bɩ dʊdɔ ka.
Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n'a hɩrɛ ɩ ma zɩɩfʊ, ɩ nɩ yom lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ n'ɩ lɛ bɔrɛ ɩ mɩŋŋa ʊ, ɩ ʊ, ɩ Woso dɔ,
ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ dɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ k'a ga barɛ m bɩ dɔ ɩ bɔ kʊ la m.
Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ hɔɔn darɛ ɩ ʊ, zaa hɩnka bʊʊrɔ m zaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ nɩ lɛɛ gum monsigəzannɔ m,
ɩ ʊ, bahɔdonno dʊndɔrɛzaa n'ɩ mɩ, gʊɔɔ poorero karɩnsaamba, a gɩnga ɩbɩɩ nawʊm ɩ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ dɔ, ɩ sɩra dɔ mɩŋŋa lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto.
A lɔ ɩbɩɩ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m, ɩ bɩr a dɩndarɛ ɩ mɩŋŋa nɩ? Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩm gʊɔɔ m, ŋ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ nɩ koor barɛ.
Ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ n'a darɛ, ɩbɩɩ sɔ *wosobaawɔnnɔ daʊrɛ m, ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ nɩ gasʊrɛ ŋ daʊrɛ cɛrɔ ʊ, ɩ nɩ ŋ bɔm.
Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ heer nyɔɔm lɛrɔ wɔɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ dɔ bɩ tɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ ɩ Woso gore bɔŋ ʊ, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ bɩsɩ kam lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci nɔ ʊ bɩ, n ʊ: ‹Awɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ, awɔɔ y'a kam, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ Woso sʊnsɔ wʊm.›
K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, gasʊ k'ɩbɩɩ ʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɩ jɩ ta ʊ, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ gum lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure ma, baa k'ɩbɩɩ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, a bɔ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ y.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa k'a n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ ɩ hɔ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ barɛ, Woso bɩ dɩgarɛ a zaa ma ɩ ʊ, gasʊ a ʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ ra?
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ b'a n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɩ, a y'ɩbɩɩ dam nyannɩ ʊ, bala, ɩbɩɩ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, ɩ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr zure ŋ ʊ y.
Zɩɩfʊ paan… bɩ, gʊaa k'a m zɩɩfʊ gʊɔɔ mɩm ʊ bɩ bɛɛ y, mɛsim gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɛɛ m baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ paan… y.
Bɩ, zɩɩfʊ paan… bɩ, heer an ta ʊ, baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ paan… bɩ, heer hɔ bɩ m. A to a nawʊm *Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi, a bɩr a tom Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y. Zɩɩfʊ bɩ do lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩr a tom gʊɔɔ zi y, a to a nawʊm Woso zi.
Ncɩnaaʊ naa, k'ɩ zɩɩfʊ, bɔ ɩ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʊ, baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ nyɔɔdʊ m bɔ nɩ?
A nyɔɔdʊ ta ʊ gʊta denter. Bala, a lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ Woso a lemim da ŋ wɔ ʊ.
K'ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ lɔ? Ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ n sɩra ba minto b'a da ma, an a ka Woso bɩ gɔɔtarɛ a sɩrabarɛ nɔ ʊ ra?
Fɩɩga! Baa, kʊ gʊaa haay ŋʊaarzaa, Woso gɔɔta an nɩ sɩra m, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Kʊ n n'ɩ dɔ tɩrga ɩ meerbaa nɔ ʊ, bɩ k'ɩ bʊr ɩ jɩnnɔ ra dʊdɔkarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ batɩrgabaa ɩ Woso tɩrgabaa hɩnkarɛ, bɔ wɔɔ k'ʊ a hɩ? K'ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ, Woso gumə ba ʊ kan wɔɔ hʊnhʊrlɛ kɩ a nɔmaa nɔ ʊ ra? Meer naa do kʊ wɔɔ ba naa, gʊɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ meerbaa m.
A bɩ ncɩnaaʊ y, kʊ n bɛɛ m, Woso y'a bam lɔ k'a durnya dʊdɔ ka?
Gɛɛ, gʊaa a da ma, an a hɩ a ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ ŋʊaarbarɛ y'a kam Woso sɩra n'a hɩnkam paan… a lɛbɔʊrɛ minto, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ, an mɔɔ ba mimbʊnyaazaa, an nɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔ karɛ?
A lɔ wɔɔ bɩr mimbʊnyaa barɛ, k'a mɩŋŋa m nyɩnta ʊ? Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ wɔɔ tɔ bʊnyaa hɩm, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, naa wɔɔ n'a dɩndam gʊɔɔ m. Kʊ Woso bɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro dʊdɔ yar, a gumə ta ʊ.
Ʊ a nyambʊr ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ lɔ? Wɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ, lɛ wɔɔ da gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ m na? Fɩɩga! Wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʊ a hɩnka, ʊ ʊ, gʊaa haay, kʊ zɩɩfʊ m, gɛɛ zɩɩfʊ bɛɛ, ŋ yɩ mimbʊnyaa lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ.
Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ bɩ m, n ʊ:
Gʊaa tɩrga ba ʊ y,
baa deem taan… tɔkkɛ,
Woso mindor ba ʊ y,
baa deem taan… ba ʊ,
an n'a kam Woso ma y.
Ŋ haay, ŋ y'a nyʊnnyɔɔ,
ŋ haay jilli, a bʊnyaa ŋn'a bam.
Ŋ barla bɩ, a mɩŋŋabarɛzaa ba ʊ y, baa deem taan… tɔkkɛ.
Ŋ lɛ meerbaa ɩ gʊɔɔ zaar bam.
Bra ŋn'a bɩmbam gʊɔɔ m,
a lɛ meerbaa m,
ŋ nɛɛm ɩ busum am cɩrka sɛ m.
Ler kʊsɩ bɔrɛ yɩ ŋ lɛ han, kan meerbaa k'a nɩ busum gʊɔɔ ma kɩ.
Ŋ kaarɛ kan gərzɛrɛ kɩ.
Kʊ ŋ bɔ lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ,
lɛɛ zaarbarɛ kan kʊsɩ kɩ
ŋn'a tore a jɛ ʊ.
Ŋ n laafɩɩ zaa dɔ y.
Ŋ mɩm ʊ bɩ, Woso daʊrɛ jɩ ba ʊ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, hɔ haay kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ, a hɩ a nawʊm gʊɔɔ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m. Kʊ gɔsɩ b'a da ma, an gumə ka a mɩŋŋa ʊ y, kʊ durnya haay m kʊrɔ gumə ma Woso taa.
Bɩ y'a ka, ‹gɔsɩ b'a bam tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ›, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zi k'a ŋ ba minto y, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, gʊaa mimbʊnyaa ŋn'a hɩnkam nɩ bala.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso hɔ k'a a ba, an wɔɔ ba tɩrga, bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ mim b'a nɔ ʊ bɩ hɩnka, amba lɛrɔ wɔɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ ciro nyɩnta ŋn'a hɩ bɩ m.
Woso ɩ gʊɔɔ bam tɩrga, kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʊ minto, a ba a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, bala, ŋ hɔdeem, a bɩr ŋ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Ŋ haay mimbʊnyaa ba, ŋ y'a do Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ gasʊʊrɛ ma.
Bɩ, Woso ŋ ba tɩrga nɩbɩr, a cicirzɛrɛ nɔ ʊ, Krista Yeezuu k'a nɩ ŋ bʊmbɔm mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
A mɩŋŋa Woso a bɔ ʊ, k'an ga gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra kaŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ minto, k'a tɩrgabaa hɩnka, bala, a nyɩnta an bʊr a ma biisi, a n gʊɔɔ hʊnhʊr ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma y.
