Bɩ her naa, Woso ɩ zaa k'a n'a sam, an nɩ gʊɔɔ bam tɩrga bɩ hɩnkam, bala, a lɛ taa k'a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ba tɩrga, k'a gɔɔta a tɩrgabaa nɔ ʊ sɔ.
Lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ zaa ta ʊ dɔ ra? Fɩɩga! Bɔ minto? Bala, a n ta ʊ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure bɛɛ y, sɩrakarɛ m.
Sɩra m, wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, n nɩ gʊaa bam tɩrga, bɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Gɛɛ, Woso bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ Woso m bala ra? Do vantɔɔ wɔɔ Woso bɛɛ sɔ ra? Ɩɩn…, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ Woso m sɔ.
Bala, Woso deem taan… n ta ʊ, an nɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ bam tɩrga ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, an nɩ do vantɔɔ bam tɩrga sɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba a nawʊm hɔ k'a jɩ ba ʊ ra? A bɛɛ m bɩ y, lɛrɔ wɔɔ gore an n'a daŋ ʊ paan….
Kɛɛrɛ naa, bɔ mim wɔɔ n'a hɩm ʊ yaaba Abraham bɩncɛ ʊ? Bɔ hɔ a a yɩ a zi nɩ?
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Abraham ba n y'a ʊ tɩrga, a zibəə tɔ ma, a a da ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ, b'a bɩ ncɩnaaʊ y, a b'a dam ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ Woso taa y.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʊ, am naa Woso n a ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.›
Kʊ gʊaa zi ba, a yawʊra n n'a bam, yawʊra bɩ do, ganwʊrɛ bɛɛ y, hɔ k'a zaa b'a ga m bɩ m bɩ.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a n hɔsɩ zi ba y, an sɩra ka Woso k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaabər bam tɩrga b'ʊ bɩ, Woso ɩ dɩgam bɩ zaa ma tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ minto.
Davɩd ɩ gʊaa kʊ Woso dɩga a tɩrga b'a zibəə tɔ ma bɛɛ b'ɩ heernyɩnta mim hɩm sɔ, a ʊ:
Mimbirenyɩntazannɔ m gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ kʊrɔmarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʊ, an ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʊaa kʊ Woso bɩr a mimbʊnyaa darɛ a heer ʊ bɩ m.
Mimbirenyɩnta naa do zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ hɔ m a minto ra, gɛɛ do vantɔɔ wɔɔ a da ma ŋn'a yɩ sɔ ra? Wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, ʊ ʊ: ‹Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʊ, Woso n a ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ minto.›
Ba naa a ʊ brɔ dɔmɩm ʊ? Gasʊ k'a b'a ʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɩ m gɛɛ, gɛɛ a lɛɛ ka a baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ bɩ nɩ? Gasʊ k'a b'a ʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɩ dɔmɩm bɛɛ y, a lɛɛ ka, bɩ ma bɩ, a n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ y.

Dɔmɩm kʊ Abraham n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɩ, Woso a ba tɩrga, bɩ jɛ nɩ, Woso n bɔkarɛ, an a da ʊ, k'an gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ. Kʊ bɩ m nyɩnta makra, an a hɩnka a ʊ, Woso Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, Abraham n a ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra kam Woso ʊ haay yaaba, baa kʊ ŋ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ y. Kʊ Woso n brɔɔ ba tɩrga sɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ minto.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ yaaba m sɔ, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ ŋnɩ sɩra ka Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, amba Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ a n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ bɩ m.
Woso k'a durnya soʊre ler bɔ Abraham m kan a yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ, lɛrɔ zuure minto bɛɛ y, k'a Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ m.
Kʊ hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ n nawʊm lɛrɔ zuure tɔ ma, sɩrakarɛ jɩ ba ʊ dɔ y, lerbɔrɛ bɩ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ sɔ y.
Bala, lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ zɛm Woso nɔmaa m, bɩ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lɛrɔ ba ʊ y, lɛrɔ bɩsɩkama ba ʊ sɔ y.

Naa y'a ka sɩrakarɛ n nɩ hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm, k'an yɩ Woso ganwʊrɛ k'a n'a kam, kʊ lerbɔrɛ bɩ n nyɩnta Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ haay hɔ. Yaŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m a deem nɩ y, yaŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka am Abraham hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, ʊ woo…, ʊ zɩ m Abraham m.
Denter m, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ cɩnta mɔɔ ʊ, k'ɩ yɩ doro gʊta zɩ.› Wɔɔ zɩ m Abraham m, Woso k'a sɩra ka ʊ bɩ taa. Woso k'a nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, an n'a kam hɔ k'a ba ʊ nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ m.

Abraham sɩra ka an a ta a heer lɛ a ʊ, a hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm, baa kʊ hɔsɩ ba ʊ, an nɩ yom ma k'a a dɔ a ʊ, a hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm bɩ, a a gu an sɩra ka, an b'a ba doro gʊta yaaba, amba Woso a hɩ m, a ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ yaŋŋɔɔ zɛm bɩ yɩ gʊta› bɩ m.
Abraham dɔɔraa k'a bɩ ta an zɔrɔ ku, Saara n gusi sɔ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ nyɩ yɩ dɔ bɩ, Abraham sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa gɔɔta a n a bɔrɛ y.
A n sɩnsɩm ka Woso lerbɔrɛ bɩ ma y, bɩ, sɩrakarɛ bɩ paŋŋa ka ʊ, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ.
A n a nyasʊ a heer ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ a ʊ, kʊ Woso hɔ ler bɔ, a ɩ paŋŋa m sɔ, k'a ka k'an kʊ yɩ.
Naa minto m, Woso n Abraham ba tɩrga, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
Kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Woso Abraham ba tɩrga› bɩ, Abraham y'a deem tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Wɔɔ tɔ ma n sɔ, bala, n wɔɔ bam tɩrga, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ sɩra kam, Woso k'a wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʊ b'ʊ.
Woso a ka n n'a zɛ gər wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ, k'a wɔɔ ba tɩrga.
Woso wɔɔ ba tɩrga, wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ minto, wɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ kan Woso kɩ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.

Yeezuu Krista minto m, wɔɔ n b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ Woso cicirzɛrɛ yɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, cicirzɛrɛ bɩ do wɔɔ jɩm ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ, bɩ wɔɔ y'ʊ heer nyɔɔm, kʊ wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ m, ʊ ʊ, ʊ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
A n lɛ da bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʊ heer nyɔɔrɛ ʊ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ zɛm tʊntɔʊrɛ m,
tʊntɔʊrɛ n nɩ zɛm mim dama m, mim dama n nɩ zɛm taaheerlɛ m.
Taaheerlɛ naa do bɩ wɔɔ dam nyannɩ ʊ y, bala, Woso a ŋʊarɛ k'an ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ da wɔɔ heer ʊ an a han, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Sɩra m, dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a ku bɩ, wɔɔ n nɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ, ʊ b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ ʊ yɔ bɩ, Krista ga wɔɔ mimbʊnyaazannɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
A wer ta ʊ, kʊ gʊaa n yɛ, an ga gʊaa tɩrga tɔ ma. A a da ma gʊaa n yɛ, an ga gʊaa mɩŋŋa tɔ ma barɛ m.
Hɔ kʊ Woso a ba k'a wɔɔ ŋʊa k'a nawʊm bɩ hɩnka bɩ ba n nɩ: Wɔɔ nyɩnta mimbʊnyaabənno, Krista n a gu an ga wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Woso k'awɔɔ ba tɩrga, Krista k'a ga wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto bɩ, an lɛ da haay bɩ, a wɔɔ bɔ lɛ m Woso heerbusu nɔ ʊ.
Bala, nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ Woso jɩnnɔ bɩ, a zu kʊ ʊ kan a Nyɩ bɩ garɛ kɩ, an wɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan a kɩ. K'a wɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan a kɩ kɛɛrɛ bɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, a wɔɔ bʊmbɔm sɔ a Nyɩ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa m.
Naa bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y, wɔɔ y'ʊ heer nyɔɔm sɔ Woso nɔ ʊ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, a ɩ wɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan Woso kɩ.
Gʊaa deem taan… y'a ka mimbʊnyaa n gasʊ durnya ʊ, Adam m. Mimbʊnyaa bɩ do m bʊr zɛ m. Yɩ a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ, zɛ n a kərgu gʊɔɔ haay ra, bala, ŋ haay mimbʊnyaa ba.
Mimbʊnyaa lɛɛ ka an nɩ durnya ʊ, Woso n bɔkarɛ an lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka Moyiisi ʊ, bɩ, dɔmɩm kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba ʊ bɩ, Woso bɩr gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaa taar karɛ ŋ la y.
Kan bɩ kɩ, an a sa Adam dɔmɩm bɩ ma, an ta Moyiisi dɔmɩm ra bɩ, zɛ a so gʊɔɔ ʊ, baa gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Adam mimbʊnyaa bɩ lɔɔ ba rɔ wɔɔ, zɛ brɔɔ zɛ sɔ. Adam nyɩnta Krista k'a a ga m, an bʊr bɩ bɔkʊʊrɛzaa.

Bɩ, Woso ganwʊrɛ k'a n'a kam vam bɩ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan Adam kʊrɔma bɩ kɩ y. Sɩra m, gʊaa deem kʊrɔma ɩ bʊr gʊaa cir zɛ m, bɩ Woso ganwʊrɛ bɩ gʊtabaa lɛ da, Woso ganwʊrɛ bɩ do ka gʊɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa deem taan… tɔ ma, Yeezuu Krista m, bɩ tɔ ma m, Woso n barka ka gʊaa cir ʊ gʊta.

Hɔ kʊ Woso ganwʊrɛ bɩ n nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ bɩ hɔdeem kan hɔ kʊ gʊaa deem kʊrɔma n nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ kɩ y. Bala, Adam deem taan… kʊrɔma kʊ Woso a dʊdɔ yar b'a ka, gʊaa haay nɩ mimbʊnyaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʊ. A n bɔkarɛ, mimbʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba gʊta bɩ kur bɩ, Woso ganwʊrɛ bɩ ŋ ba tɩrga.

A yɩ sɩra, gʊaa deem mimbʊnyaa y'a ka, zɛ n a so gʊaa haay ʊ gʊaa deem bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ Yeezuu Krista deem tɔ ma, gʊɔɔ ɩ hɔ yɩm Woso zi gʊta, a y'a ganwʊrɛ gʊta bɩ karɛ ŋ ʊ nɩbɩr, an nɩ ŋ bam tɩrga. Krista tɔ ma, ŋ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ, ŋnɩ cirbəə bɩ.
K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, gʊaa deem kʊrɔma k'a a ka, gʊaa haay nɩ mimbʊnyaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʊaa deem tɩrgabaa zibəə gʊaa haay bʊmbɔ an ŋ ba tɩrga, kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba.
Gʊaa deem bɩsɩkarɛ k'a ka gʊɔɔ haay n a ba mimbʊnyaabənno Woso mɩm ʊ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʊaa deem k'a yɛ Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma b'a ka, gʊɔɔ gʊta n a ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ.
A n bɔkarɛ, bʊr kʊ lɛ b'ʊ bɩ, a a ka mimbʊnyaa n a ba gʊta, bɩ, lɛɛ kʊ mimbʊnyaa pasɩ ʊ bɩ, Woso barka nyɩnta ʊ gʊta an lɛ da.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, amba mimbʊnyaa a so gʊɔɔ ʊ zɛ tɔ ma bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, Woso barka y'a som gʊɔɔ ʊ tɩrgabaa tɔ ma, k'a ka, kʊ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Bɔ wɔɔ k'ʊ a hɩ kɛɛrɛ? Ʊ gɔɔta ʊ bɩr mimbʊnyaa bam, kʊ Woso cicirzɛrɛ n a da ra gɛ?
Ayy…, fɩɩga! Kʊ mimbʊnyaa mim bɩncɛ nɩ, gəəno m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ kɛɛrɛ k'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ba mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, batɛm kʊ wɔɔ si bɩ, ʊ ba wɔɔ ʊ deem kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ a garɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ ra?
Batɛm bɩ sire nɔ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ bir n y'a ʊ kan kɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ Krista a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ Zɩ paŋŋa m bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa daa ba.
Bala, ʊ ba kʊ wɔɔ ʊ deem kan kɩ a zɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʊ bam deem kan kɩ sɔ a mɩmbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Ʊ a dɔ mɩŋŋa, ʊ ʊ, mɩsɩrbaa kʊ wɔɔ n ta m biisi bɩ, n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma kan Krista kɩ. Kʊ mimbʊnyaa k'a nɩ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ paŋŋa n a da, k'ʊ bɩ nyɩnta mimbʊnyaa lɔnnɔ dɔ y.
Denter m, gʊaa k'a ga bɩ, mimbʊnyaa paŋŋa ba zi dɔ y.
Bala, kʊ wɔɔ ga kan Krista kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ sɩra ka, ʊ ʊ, ʊ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan kɩ sɔ.
Bala, Krista k'a a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ, a bɩ gam dɔ y, zɛ paŋŋa ba zi dɔ y.
Krista ga gallɛm deem, an a gʊ kʊ ma kan mimbʊnyaa kɩ, dɔmɩm haay minto. Dɩɩtaa naa, a mɩsɩr, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a nawʊm Woso tɔ ma.
Awɔɔ sɔ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ gɩnga, a a gʊ kʊ ma kan mimbʊnyaa kɩ, bɩ awɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam kɛɛrɛ Woso tɔ ma, Yeezuu Krista zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
A b'a ya, a ka kʊ mimbʊnyaa n a so a mɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ga b'ʊ y, a yaa a ka awɔɔ n zu a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ʊ.
A b'a mɛ vəŋŋəro sa, a ŋ ka mimbʊnyaa ʊ, k'an ŋ sa an ŋ ba a zibəə mɔr y. Awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ sa a ka Woso ʊ, a mɩm awɔɔ bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, k'a mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ sa, a ŋ ba zi mɩŋŋa barɛ mɔr.
Mimbʊnyaa bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʊ dɔ y, bala, awɔɔ ba lɛ nɔ ʊ y, Woso barka nɔ awɔɔ n ta ʊ.
Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Kʊ lɛ bɛɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʊ dɔ, bɩ Woso barka wɔɔ n'a nɔ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a nam bɩ lɛ m, k'ʊ mimbʊnyaa ba ra? Ayy…, fɩɩga!

Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, k'awɔɔ a mɩŋŋa sa, a ka gʊaa ʊ k'a zu a hɔɔnhɔ ʊ, gʊaa k'awɔɔ nɩ zure a hɔɔnhɔ ʊ bɩ lɔnnɔ n'awɔɔ m na? A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ mimbʊnyaa lɔnnɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, bɩ mimbʊnyaa a ka awɔɔ n gɩnga, gɛɛ kʊ Woso hɔɔnhɔ awɔɔ nɩ zuŋ ʊ, bɩ Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'an tɩrga ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, ʊ Woso barka da. Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ biisi mimbʊnyaa lɔnnɔ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ bɩ zu hɔdɩndarɛ kʊ ŋ y'a dɩnda awɔɔ m b'ʊ kan a heer kɩ haay.
Awɔɔ yɔ kʊ n y'a ʊ mimbʊnyaa wɔ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ a ba tɩrgabaa lɔnnɔ.

Makrarɔ yaargarɛrɔ mɔɔ ŋ sa meerbaa bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ n hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ ma, bala, awɔɔ bɩr a dam ma, an nɩ minno wɔɔ jɩ marɛ y. Amba awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi, a a mɩŋŋɔɔ ba dintim kan zibʊnyaa do haay kɩ zibəə lɔnnɔ, a a ba Woso bɩsɩkamazannɔ bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ba tɩrgabaa zibəə lɔnnɔ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba Woso mɩm m.
Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ mimbʊnyaa lɔnnɔ rɔ wɔɔ, tɩrgabaa zibəə mim n nyɩnta awɔɔ ma y.
Bɔ awɔɔ yɩ, zibəəro wɔɔ duro nɔ ʊ? Ŋ nyannɩ ta awɔɔ m her, bala, ŋ nyambʊrlɛ bɩ, zɛ m.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, n y'awɔɔ yɔ mimbʊnyaa wɔ ʊ, a a ba Woso lɔnnɔ, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʊ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ m, a nyambʊrlɛ bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩrɛ m.
Bala, mimbʊnyaa yawʊra bɩ, zɛ m, bɩ ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso n'a kam nɩbɩr bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a ŋʊam kʊ m a hɩ awɔɔ m naa dɔ mɩŋŋa, bala, awɔɔ lɛrɔ dɔ. Ba gʊaa gɔɔta an mɩsɩr bɩ lɛ tɩr a so ʊ. K'a zaa bɩ ga, lɛ n a so ʊ dɔ y.

Ʊ makra sa: lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, n y'a cɩnta kʊ lʊ b'a gʊ a zim ma k'a zim bɩ bɛɛ bɩ ga y, bɩ k'a zim bɩ ga, lɛ k'a so lʊ b'ʊ k'an gɔɔta an bɩr kan a zim bɩ kɩ a mɩsɩrbaa dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ n a ya, an a so lʊ b'ʊ dɔ y.
Bɩ, kʊ lʊ bɩ gʊaa vanta sa a zim bɩ nɩ meeyaa m, lʊ bɩ bir n nawʊm jaandər. Bɩ k'a zim bɩ bɩ ga, lɛ bɩ n a ya, an a so ʊ dɔ y, a a da ma an gʊaa vanta sa, bɩ n b'a dam ma n a hɩ ma jaandər y.

M danyɩnɔ, a maam sɔ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a so awɔɔ ʊ biisi. Kɛɛrɛ naa, a zɛ awɔɔ ʊ kʊ ra kan Krista k'a ga wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ kɩ, lɛ n a ya, an a so awɔɔ ʊ dɔ y, awɔɔ gɩnga sɔ. Gʊaa vanta y'a so awɔɔ ʊ kɛɛrɛ, gʊaa k'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ m, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ da ma ʊ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ ba Woso tɔ ma.
Bala, nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ biisi, ʊ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto bɩ, lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ wɔɔ mɛ jilli bɩ dam zi bʊnyaarɔ barɛ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ tam wɔɔ m zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ.

Biisi bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ba n y'a ʊ a lɔnnɔ, ŋn'a so wɔɔ ʊ, kɛɛrɛ naa, lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʊ, gɩnga wɔɔ ʊ, Woso wɔɔ bɔ ŋ wɔ ʊ. Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ ʊ da ma, ʊ Woso zi ba zaa daa nɔ ʊ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zaa m, lɛrɔ zaa gusire k'a nɩ Moyiisi ci ʊ bɩ bɛɛ dɔ y.

Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Mimbʊnyaa m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ m na? Ayy…, fɩɩga! Bɩ, kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m, mɔɔ b'a dɔm kʊ bɔ m mimbʊnyaa y. Bala, mɔɔ bɩ gʊaa hɔ lɛtaamarɔ dɔrɛ, kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y'a cɩnta, ŋ ʊ: ‹Ɩ b'a ka ɩ lɛ m bɩr gʊaa hɔ zi y.›
A m naa, mimbʊnyaa n a na lɛrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a cɩnta rɔ wɔɔ ma, an zaa yɩ mɔɔ gʊr zi, an mɔɔ lɛ ka gʊaa hɔ lɛtaama do haay zi. Bala, kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ba ʊ, mimbʊnyaa bɩ, hɔ gər m.
Biisi bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ ba ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩr. Bɩ, lɛrɔ kʊ ŋ bɩ bʊr bɩ, mimbʊnyaa n a mɩm bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ m ga.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa mim bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, lɛrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ler bɔm mɔɔ m, brɔɔ a ka mɔɔ n ga.
Bala, a na mimbʊnyaa b'ʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ m, an bra ba mɔɔ m, an a ka, lɛrɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ zɛ gər.
Bɩ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a to ŋ y'a ʊ Woso zi, lɛ biyəə mɩŋŋa, a tɩrga, hɔ mɩŋŋa m.

Bɩ, hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n ga ra? Ayy…, fɩɩga! Mimbʊnyaa ɩ mɔɔ zɛ, hɔ mɩŋŋa a a sa, an mɔɔ zɛ m gər. Yɩ a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ mimbʊnyaa bʊnyaabaa n a hɩnka. Lɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a ka, mimbʊnyaa bʊnyaabaa gʊtabaa n a hɩnka paan….
Wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ a to ŋ y'a ʊ Woso zi. Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, gʊaa m mɔɔ m bala, mimbʊnyaa n mɔɔ si, an mɔɔ ba a lɔ.
Mɔɔ bɩr m zi kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam jɩ dɔrɛ y, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m a ba bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr bɩ barɛ y, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m a ba bɩ, mɔɔ n'a bam.
Bɩ, k'a nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ baa bɩ, bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ yɛ kɛɛrɛ m ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa.
A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔ bʊnyaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ bɛɛ n'a barɛ y, mimbʊnyaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ n'a bam.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ gʊr zi, (b'ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ: mɔɔ mɛsim nɔ ʊ bɩ) hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ʊ y. Mɔɔ ɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ lɛtaama m, bɩ mɔɔ ba a barɛ paŋŋa nɩ y.
Mɔɔ bɩr zi mɩŋŋa kʊ mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam bɩ barɛ y, zi bʊnyaa kʊ mɔɔ bɩr a ŋʊam bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam.
Kʊ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ baa bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ n'a barɛ y, mimbʊnyaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ tɩr a yɩm, kʊ mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ m zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ba a paŋŋa nɩ y. Zi bʊnyaa barɛ paŋŋa mɔɔ m ta m bala.
A ɩ yɩrɛ ʊ, mɔɔ heer nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa,

bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ lɛ vanta yɩrɛ an nɩ zi bam mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, an nɩ zoo bam kan lɛrɔ niŋŋoo kʊ mɔɔ hɔɔn nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Lɛ vanta bɩ do k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ n'a kam, mɔɔ nɩ m bam mimbʊnyaa paŋŋa k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ lɔ.
Cicirzaa m mɔɔ m! Nka nɩ mɔɔ yɔm mɛ k'a nɩ tam mɔɔ m zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ wɔ ʊ?
Woso m, Yeezuu Krista wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ tɔ ma, Woso m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ!
Naa haay tɔ ma, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nɩ, mɔɔ hɔɔn mɔɔ ba Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɔ, mɔɔ mɛsim n bɔkarɛ an mɔɔ ba mimbʊnyaa lɔ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso b'a yarɛ an gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yar y.
Bala, Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʊ, lɛ kʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri a sa k'a mɩsɩrbaa ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, a mɔɔ bʊmbɔ lɛ k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaa m k'a nyɩnta k'a mɔɔ gaa a ta mɔɔ m zɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ wɔ ʊ.

Hɔ kʊ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a da ma ŋn'a ba, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a da ma ŋnɩ zu ʊ bɩ minto bɩ, Woso hɔ bɩ do ba. Woso k'a a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ mɛsim nɔ ʊ, an bʊr mimbʊnyaabənno mɛsim m k'a bɩ ŋ yɔ mimbʊnyaa wɔ ʊ bɩ, a mimbʊnyaa dʊdɔ yar.
Naa do ba Woso ʊ, kʊ tɩrgabaa kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ n kʊ yɩ, wɔɔ gʊr zi. Wɔɔ k'ʊ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa bam dɔ mɛsim nɔ ʊ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʊ m.
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɛsim mɩsɩrbaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʊ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do lɛ n taa ŋn'a kam ma, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri lɛ n taa bɩ ŋn'a kam ma.
Mɛsim hɔɔnhɔrɔ kama bɩ, ta a nawʊm gʊaa m zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔɔnhɔ kama bɩ, ta a nawʊm gʊaa m mɩsɩrbaa kan laafɩɩ kɩ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Bala, Woso jɩnnɔ m mɛsim hɔɔnhɔrɔ wɔɔ m, bala, mɛsim bɩr zum Woso lɛ ʊ y, a b'a dam ma sɔ an zu ʊ y.
Maam sɔ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yɛm mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ Woso nɔ yɩ y.
K'awɔɔ nɩ, mɛsim bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʊ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a so awɔɔ ʊ, bala, Woso Ɛspri b'ɩ y'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ. Kʊ gʊaa ba Krista Ɛspri bɩ nɩ, Krista gʊaa bɛɛ n'a zaa nɩ y.
Bɩ, Krista y'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ, sɩra m, awɔɔ mɛ bɩ zɛm bɩ ga mimbʊnyaa tɔ ma. Bɩ, kʊ n y'awɔɔ ba tɩrga minto bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɩsɩrbaa y'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ Woso k'a Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ Ɛspri y'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ, Woso bɩ do, k'a Yeezuu Krista mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ zum kʊ ʊ kan a Ɛspri bɩ kɩ, an mɩsɩrbaa ka awɔɔ mɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ga b'ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, pakra bɛɛ m, kʊ wɔɔ n zu mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ b'ʊ dɔ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a ŋʊam bɩ wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ a ba.
Bala, k'awɔɔ y'a mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ gɩngarɛ, bɩ k'awɔɔ a mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ zibəəro wɔɔ da jɩm ʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam.
Bala, gʊɔɔ haay kʊ Woso Ɛspri n nɩ karɛ ŋ lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ m Woso nyɩnɔ.
Ɛspri kʊ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ bɩr awɔɔ bam lɔnnɔ, k'awɔɔ n a ya a bɩr nyibəə nɔ ʊ y, Ɛspri bɩ do, awɔɔ ba a nawʊm Woso nyɩnɔ, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ Woso birm, ʊ ʊ: ‹Aba›, a jɩ k'a hɩ a ʊ: ‹Baaba›.
Ɛspri bɩ do n n'a kam wɔɔ n n'a dɔrɛ ʊ heer ʊ mɩŋŋa, ʊ ʊ, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
Kʊ Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ, wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'ʊ so hɔnta k'a cɩnta wɔɔ m b'ʊ, wɔɔ zɛm b'ʊ so ʊ kan Krista kɩ, bala, kʊ wɔɔ fɩr yɩ kan kɩ, wɔɔ nyɩntam kan kɩ a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ sɔ.
Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʊ, fɩr k'ʊ n'a yɩm her naa b'a dam ma fɩɩgaa, an a makra ba kan lɛbɔʊrɛ kʊ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a hɩnka wɔɔ m bɩ kɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, durnya nɩ dɔm Woso nyɩnɔ hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm ma, kan a heer kɩ haay.
Durnya bɩ haay a ba hɔ vam, a bɛɛ y'a ŋʊa maam nɩ y, Woso k'a a da vambaa ma bɩ minto m, bɩ durnya gɔɔta an n'a gɩngam k'a bɩ bɔ vambaa bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso durnya bɩ yɔm vambaa lɔmbaa bɩ wɔ ʊ sɔ k'an zɛkʊra yɩ kan Woso nyɩnɔ wɔɔ soamɩŋŋaʊ kɩ, kan ŋ lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ kɩ sɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, durnya bɩ jilli ɩ fɩr yɩm, an nɩ kɔrɛ nɔ ʊ dɩɩtaa, amba lʊ k'a nɩ nyoosi bam bɩ m.

Durnya bɩ bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y, wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm ʊ heer ʊ, dɔ kʊ wɔɔ nawʊm dɔmɩm kʊ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ wɔɔ ba a nyɩnɔ paan…rɔ, an wɔɔ mɛ bʊmbɔ bɩ ma. Woso Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʊ lɛɛkarɛ ganwʊrɛ, k'ʊ bɔkarɛ ʊ bɩ ganwʊrɛrɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ yɩ.
Bala, wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, bɩ gɩnga nɔ ʊ m. Kʊ gʊaa ɩ hɔ k'a n'a gɩngam k'a b'a yɩ bɩ yɩrɛ a mɩm m, gɩnga bɛɛ m bɩ dɔ y, nka n'a yarɛ an hɔ k'a n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m gɩnga?
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ bɩr a yɩrɛ ʊ mɩm m bɩ gɩngarɛ, dɔ wɔɔ nawʊm ma kan bʊraama kɩ.

Maam sɔ bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ zɛm sɔ, an n'a dam wɔɔ han, ʊ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ. Bala, kʊ wɔɔ n yaadarɛ dɔ an a ga kʊ ʊ ba bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri mɩŋŋa ɩ yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma, hoonsibɔɔrɛ kʊ gʊaa b'a dam ma an a jɩ hɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, Woso k'a hɔ k'a nɩ gʊaa heer ʊ dɔ bɩ, a hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ. Bala, yaa kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a dam wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a da a nawʊm amba Woso n lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Wɔɔ dɔ sɔ, ʊ ʊ, Woso n n'a kam mim haay woo… nɩ kʊ zɛŋ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ yɩm mɩŋŋa gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ ma, gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ bir amba a a cɩnta bɩ m.
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso lɛɛ ka, an ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a a cɩnta sɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan a Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, k'a Nyɩ bɩ m yɩ Nyɩ jɩtaarɛ danyɩnɔ cir bireyaa ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso lɛɛ ka an ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a ŋ bir sɔ, ŋ bir k'a ʊ bɩ, a ŋ ba tɩrga, k'a ŋ ba tɩrga bɩ, a ŋ tɔ busu a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ sɔ.
Bɔ wɔɔ n'ʊ yarɛ ʊ a hɩ? Kʊ Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, nka m nɩ bʊrm wɔɔ ra?
Woso n a mɩŋŋa Nyɩnnɩ bɩ bɔ lɛ m y, a a ka ŋn'a zɛ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma. K'a a yo an yɛ naa do ma bɩ, a hɔ haay kam wɔɔ ʊ kan a Nyɩ bɩ kɩ.
Nka m nɩ mim kam gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ra? Gɔsɩ, bala, Woso nɩ ŋ bam tɩrga.
Nka m nɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yarlɛ? Gɔsɩ, bala, Yeezuu Krista ɩ ga, an lɛ da bɩ, a a mɩm bɔ ʊ, an nɩ nyɩntam Woso bɩsɩ ʊ, an nɩ yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Nka m nɩ wɔɔ gʊm ŋʊarɛ kʊ Krista n ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ ma? Fɩryɩrɛ m gɛɛ heerzɛkʊma nɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cicir kam wɔɔ ma rɔ m gɛɛ nɔ nɩ, ta dɩgɩbaa m gɛɛ mim kʊsɩ nɩ, gɛɛ zɛ nɩ?
Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ bɩ m, n ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma m, n nɩ wɔɔ zɩnzɛm wakatɩ haay nɔ ʊ,
n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, am seero kʊ ŋ nɩ tam k'a yaa n ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ, naa haay nɔ ʊ, damazannɔ paan…rɔ m wɔɔ m, a zaa k'a wɔɔ ŋʊa bɩ tɔ ma.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, m ʊ: zɛ, gɛɛ mɩsɩrbaa, malɛɛkarɔ gɛɛ paŋŋasoʊrezannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ, hɔ k'an ta ʊ her, gɛɛ an nɩ zɛm booti m, paŋŋazannɔ haay,
mim ʊ paŋŋazannɔ, gɛɛ paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ tara ʊ, gɛɛ hɔ kʊ Woso a da haay, sɩ b'a dam ma an wɔɔ gʊ ŋʊarɛ kʊ Woso n ta m, wɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛkʊra bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ ma y.
Sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm, Krista zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ bɩr ŋʊaar barɛ y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri a zɛ kʊ ra kan mɔɔ heer kɩ, ŋnɩ mɔɔ sɩra bɩ hɩrɛ kasɛtɩ karɛ.
Mɔɔ ɩ heerzaarbarɛ gʊta m, m heer nɩ busum dɔmɩm haay.
Mɔɔ y'a ŋʊam k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Woso kaanm mɔɔ m, m bɩr laatʊ Krista ma, m danyɩnɔ, m zɩrɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ do gʊɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ, ɩ ʊ, naa yɩm ŋ bʊmbɔrɛ.
Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m Israyɛl zannɔ, Woso n ŋ bɔ ʊ k'a ŋ ba a nyɩnɔ, an a lɛbɔʊrɛ ka ŋ ʊ kan a gʊaasɩbabaa zaarɔ kɩ, a lɛrɔ kɩ, a Woso daʊrɛ zaa kɩ, lerbɔrɛrɔ kɩ.
Ŋ yaabɔɔ m Abraham m, Izakkɩ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ m. Kʊ yɩrɛ nɔ ʊ nɩ, Krista bɩ, ŋ do gʊaa m. Krista mɩŋŋa nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ. A m Woso, a tɔ m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ. Amina!
A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, jɩra Woso ʊ ler k'a bɔ bɩ ra wa, bɩ, Israyɛl yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ haay bɛɛ m Israyɛl do gʊɔɔ paan…rɔ y,
Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ haay bɛɛ n a nyɩnɔ paan…rɔ y, bala, Woso a hɩ Abraham m, a ʊ: ‹Izakkɩ n n'ɩ nyɩnɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ler bɔ ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ yɩrɛ.›
Naa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: nyɩnɔ kʊ gʊaa nɩ ŋ yɩrɛ, am gʊaa haay hɔ bɩ m bɩ, brɔɔ bɛɛ m Woso nyɩnɔ y, bɩ nyɩnɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ n nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma yaŋŋɔɔ paan…rɔ.
Ler kʊ Woso a bɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: ‹Kʊ dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ cɩnta b'a ku, mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m bʊr, Saara m nyɩyar yɩ.›
Naa bɛɛ n a deem nɩ y, cirgərenyɩnɔ kʊ Rebeka ŋ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɩ deem, wɔɔ yaaba Izakkɩ m.

A n bɔkarɛ, Woso y'a mɩŋŋa zaa m, an n'a gʊaa bɔŋ ʊ a hɔɔnhɔ ma, a bɩr dɩgam zi kʊ gʊɔɔ a ba bɩ ma y, dɩga a nawʊm a mɩŋŋa lɛtaama ma, an nɩ gʊɔɔ birm. Woso k'a lɛ n taa kʊ zaa naa do n gɔɔta an bɩr ta ʊ bɩ, an a to nyɩnɔ wɔɔ m yɩ y. Maam bɩ, ŋ n a da ma ŋnɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa, gɛɛ hɔ bʊnyaa ba y.
A n lɛɛ ka nyɩnɔ wɔɔ yɩrɛ ma bɩ, a a hɩ Rebeka m, a ʊ: ‹Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ poore bɩ n n'a som jɩtaarɛ b'ʊ.›
Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ Zakɔɔb ŋʊa, m Eso bɔ m jɛ m› bɩ m.
Bɔ wɔɔ kʊ a hɩ? Kʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ, Woso bɩr a zi bam tɩrga ra? Ayy…, fɩɩga!
Bala, Woso a hɩ Moyiisi m, a ʊ: ‹Gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ m ŋʊarɛ zi bam kan kɩ, gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ, mɔɔ n'a cicir zɛ m.›
Woso mɩŋŋabaa bɩ bɩr zum kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa hɔɔnhɔ kɩ y, b'a ba a zibəə ma sɔ y. Woso deem an ta ma, kʊ nka a lɛ n taa b'a bɩ zaa cicir zɛ.
Naa minto m Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩ Eziptɩ cir m, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ cɩnta cir kʊ m m paŋŋa bɩ hɩnka, bɩsɩ k'ɩ n'a kam mɔɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ tɔ m bɔ durnya lɛɛ haay ʊ.›
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ nka Woso lɛ n taa, b'a cicir zɛ, kʊ nka a lɛ n taa sɔ, b'a ka sɔ a zaa n a ba bɩsɩkər heerkarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Gʊaa a da ma an a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, bɔ m Woso n a ya, an nɩ həən sim gʊɔɔ ma? Bala, nka n'a dam ma an bɩsɩ ka a hɔɔnhɔ ma?»
Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m gʊaa, bɔ zaa n'ɩbɩɩ m k'ɩ bɩsɩ ka kan Woso kɩ? Taanm y'a hɩm a dɔrɛ zaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Bɔ m, ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ dɔ ncɩnaaʊ gɛ?»
Mɔrdor y'a so ji k'a nɩ zi bam nɩ b'ʊ, a a da ma, an ji deem-deem bɩ yɔɔ an mɔr dɔ m cibsa tɔ ma, an mɔr dɔ m sɔ, dɔmɩm haay zibəə tɔ ma.
Woso a ŋʊa k'a a nɔmaa hɩnka, a a ŋʊa sɔ kʊ n n'a paŋŋa dɔ, an bɔkarɛ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ga dʊdɔyarlɛ m Woso nɔ k'a ma ʊ kan ŋ kɩ bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ, Woso a gu an bʊr a mɩŋŋa ma, an ŋ dʊdɔ yar y.
K'a lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊtabaa hɩnka gʊɔɔ k'a nɩ ŋ cicir zɛm nɔ wɔɔ m. Lɛɛ a ka an brɔɔ banka k'a lɛbɔʊrɛ ka ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro m wɔɔ m, a n wɔɔ bir zɩɩfʊrɔ barla bala y, wɔɔ bir a ʊ sɔ doro vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ barla.
Naa Woso a hɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ozee ci ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ:
Do kʊ mɔɔ do bɛɛ m bɩ,
mɔɔ y'a hɩm ma, m do,
do kʊ mɔɔ bɩr a ŋʊam biisi bɩ, mɔɔ y'a hɩm ma, m ŋʊarɛ do.
Lɛɛ kʊ n y'a hɩm nɩ hɔɔ, n ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ do bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m bɩ,›
lɛɛ bɩ do n ŋ birŋ ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ nyɩnɔ.›
Ezayii Israyɛl do bɩ mim hɩ sɔ, a ʊ: ‹Baa kʊ Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ pasɩ, an higʊta lɛ ra nyɩntaayaa m bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ ŋ barla rɔ wɔɔ, bɩ yɩm gʊta y.
Bala, Zuuba hɔ k'a nyɩnta an a hɩ haay bɩ bam tara burə ʊ zɔɔ-zɔɔ.›
Amba Ezayii a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ:
Kʊ hɔ haay Zuuba bɩ bɛɛ yaŋŋɔɔ to wɔɔ m poore y,
bɔ wɔɔ nawʊm kʊ ʊ kan Sodɔm kʊ kɩ,
ʊ ʊ ba am Gomɔɔr kʊ hɔ bɩ m.
Naa jɩ m bɔ nɩ? Do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ n nyɩnta ŋ n'a ka tɩrgabaa ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ tɩrgabaa yɩ, tɩrgabaa k'a a to sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ m.
A n bɔkarɛ, Israyɛl gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a kam lɛro kʊ ŋ nɩ tɩrgabaa karɛ ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋ n zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ y.
Bɔ minto nɩ? A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Israyɛl n a ka ma k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʊ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ y, a ka a ʊ ma, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ nɔ ʊ. Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, ŋn'a gəm zɛ, gənzɛrɛ jaa bɩ ma,
amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ bɩ m, n ʊ:
K'a dɩga a, mɔɔ ɩ gənzɛrɛ jaa cɩntam *Siyɔn ʊ,
jaa m, an nɩ gʊaa dom.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa sɩra ka ʊ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.
M danyɩnɔ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa, m n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ, m ʊ, ŋ y'a tʊntɔŋ ʊ Woso kama nɔ ʊ, bɩ hɔdɔrɛ ɩ jɩra tʊntɔʊrɛ bɩ do nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ ŋ n Woso k'a nɩ gʊaa bam tɩrga bɩ zaa jɩ dɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋɔɔ m tɩrgabaa zaa ŋ y'a cɩnta, naa do a ka ŋ n zu zaa kʊ Woso nɩ gʊaa bam tɩrga b'ʊ y.
Bala, Krista hɔ kʊ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ ba haay an a nya, kɛɛrɛ naa, gʊaa haay k'a sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʊ bɩ, Woso ɩ bɩ zaa bam tɩrga.
Moyiisi tɩrgabaa k'a n'a tom lɛrɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ mim hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Gʊaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ haay ʊ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.›
Tɩrgabaa kʊ sɩrakarɛ n'a kam bɩ mim ba n nɩ: ‹Ɩ b'a hɩ ɩ heer ʊ, ɩ ʊ, nka n nɩ tam brama?› Naa do naa, a hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, k'ɩ ʊ, nka n nɩ tam brama an a ka Krista m zer?
Ɩ b'a hɩ sɔ, ɩ ʊ, ‹nka n nɩ zerm tara noom ʊ?› Ncɩnaaʊ naa, a hɩ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, k'ɩ ʊ, nka n nɩ zerm an a ka Krista m bɔ gəəno bire ʊ?
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ lɔ kɛɛrɛ? A y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: ‹Lemim bɩ y'ɩ jɩr ʊ, ɩbɩɩ lɛ kan ɩ heer kɩ an ta ʊ.› A n bɔkarɛ, sɩrakarɛ lemim bɩ do wɔɔ n n'a pa dam naa.
K'ɩbɩɩ bɔ ɩ lɛ ma gʊaa haay lɛɛ, ɩ ʊ, Yeezuu Krista m Zuuba, k'ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka ɩ heer ʊ, ɩ ʊ, Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, ɩbɩɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩrɛ.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa sɩra ka a heer ʊ, bɩ Woso a ba tɩrga. Kʊ gʊaa a sɩrakarɛ bɔ a lɛ ma gʊaa haay lɛɛ, bɩ Woso a zaa bʊmbɔ.
Bala, Wosoci a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Kʊ gʊaa sɩra ka ʊ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.›
Naa minto bɩ, zɩɩfʊ kan do vanta gʊaa kɩ b'a hʊnhɔ y, ŋ haay Zuuba deem, an nɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa dam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Bala,
gʊaa biyəə k'a nɩ Zuuba tɔ birm bɩ, a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Bɩ, ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a bir, kʊ ŋ n sɩra ka ʊ? Ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʊ, kʊ ŋ n a mim ma? Ŋ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a mim ma, kʊ gʊaa n a pa da ŋ nɩ?
Bɩ, gʊaa y'a bam lɔ k'a mim pa da, kʊ n n'a nyɔɔ? Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm k'a bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da rɔ wɔɔ leekure ɩ heernyɩnta kam.›
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay bɛɛ lemim nyɩnta bɩ si y. Amba wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa Ezayii a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, nka ɩ sɩra ka lemim kʊ wɔɔ pa da b'ʊ?›
Naa minto bɩ, bɔ sɩrakarɛ n nawʊm lemim kʊ gʊaa n'a tʊr kam ma bɩ nɔ ʊ, bɩ lemim bɩ do k'a n'a mam bɩ, Krista lemim m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ laaka dam kɛɛrɛ wa, Israyɛl do bɩ n lemim bɩ ma ra? Ŋ y'a ma sɩɩn! Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Ŋ leer lee ku tara burə haay ra, ŋ meerbaarɔ m ta durnya lɛzojɩ ʊ.›

Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m laaka da sɔ, Israyɛl do bɩ, an lemim bɩ jɩ ma ra? A lɛɛkarɛ hɔ, Moyiisi a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ y'a karɛ awɔɔ m jɩm ba do kʊ mɔɔ do paan… bɛɛ m bɩ minto, mɔɔ y'a karɛ awɔɔ nɔ n ma ʊ, do k'a hɔɔn ba ʊ tɔ ma.›
Ezayii n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr a kam mɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ yɩ, mɔɔ m hɩnka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n hɔsɩ yɛ mɔɔ han rɔ wɔɔ m.›
Kʊ Israyɛl mim nɩ, Woso a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Dɔmɩm haay, mɔɔ m wɔ nyɔɔ do k'a bɩr yɛrɛ y, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam bɩ zi.›
Kʊ m m ya, m laaka da wa, Woso bɩ a bɔ a ʊ, a do b'ʊ ra? Ayy…, fɩɩga, mɔɔ n a gɩnga y! Bala, Israyɛl gʊaa m mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m, Abraham yaŋŋa m mɔɔ m, m to mɔɔ ʊ Bɛnzamɛn do bɩ barla.
‹Woso n a bɔ a do k'a lɛɛ ka an a bɔ ʊ b'ʊ y.› Awɔɔ hɔ kʊ Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩm *Elii k'a bʊr an bɩ Israyɛl mimbʊnyaarɔ k'a ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ dɩnda Woso m bɩ dɔ.
A a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Zuuba, ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mannɩjaarɔ wɔɔ wurgə, mɔɔ ɩ gɔɔta m deem, ŋn'a kam ma k'a mɔɔ mee bɔ ʊ.›
Bɩ, bɔ Woso a hɩ nɩ? A a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ m gʊɔɔ bɔ ʊ tisi saanhɩna, m hɔ, ŋ n kukurə zɛ, ŋ n yaa da *wosobaawɔm Baal nɩ y.›
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, her dɔmɩm naa nɔ ʊ sɔ naa, gʊɔɔ ta ʊ poore, Woso n ŋ bɔ ʊ a hɔɔn n'a ŋʊa tɔ ma.
Ŋ bɔ a ʊ, a hɔɔn n'a ŋʊa tɔ ma, ŋ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, kʊ m bɛɛ m, Woso hɔɔn bɔʊrɛ bɩ bɩ yɩm hɔɔn bɔʊrɛ paan… y.
Kʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ lɔ? Hɔ kʊ Israyɛl n'a kam ma bɩ, an a yɩ y, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a yɩ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ heer karɛ ba, k'a bɩ hɔsɩ jɩ ma y.
Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Woso a ka ŋ hɔɔn n a ta, ŋ mɩm n ta ʊ, bɩ ŋ bɩr lɛɛ yɩrɛ y, ŋ tʊr n ta ʊ, bɩ ŋ bɩr mim marɛ y, an ta an her dɔmɩm ku.›
Davɩd a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ: ‹Kʊ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ n nyɩnta ŋ ma am baŋŋa k'a nɩ hɔ sam bɩ m, am zaŋŋa hɔ bɩ m, kʊ ŋ n'a dundo, ŋnɩ hʊnhʊrlɛ yɩ a n'a gakʊ ʊ kan ŋ zibəəro kɩ.
Kʊ monsigə n ka ŋ mɩm la, kʊ ŋ bɩ lɛɛ yɩ dɔ y, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr kuntəm tee….›

Mɔɔ m ya, m nɩ laaka dam, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gəm zɛ naa, a do ŋ y'a ʊ fɩɩga ra? Ayy…, fɩɩga, mɔɔ n a gɩnga y! Bɩ, ŋ kʊrɔma bɩ minto bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, kʊ bɩ n a ka kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m jɩm ba ŋ ma.
A n bɔkarɛ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, ŋ kʊrɔma a ka durnya m hɔnta yɩ, kʊ ŋ terma b'a ka do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m hɔnta yɩ, kʊ ŋ bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, bɩ bɛɛ nɩ zɛm hɔ m an lɛ da ra?
Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, m ʊ: kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, an mɔɔ nyɔɔ do vantɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma. Maam bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m zibəə bɩ tɔ busure.
A gɩnga mɔɔ nawʊm maam, kʊ m do gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m jɩm ba, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, gɔsɩnnɔ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Ŋ bɔ kʊ Woso ʊ a rɛ b'a ka durnya n a zɛ kʊ ra kan Woso kɩ, k'a a ya, an ŋ gaa, bɔ n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ? Nyɩnta a nawʊm mɩsɩrbaa, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Woso hɔ m lɛbiisi bur bɩ nɩ, bur bɩ haay Woso hɔ m sɔ. Kʊ Woso hɔ m gɔ bɩ nyim nɩ, Woso y'a so gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro haay ʊ sɔ.

Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gɔ kʊ n n'a bankam mɩŋŋa kɩ, n n'a vəŋŋəro gɔsɩnnɔ zɩnzɛ ra. Kʊ zɩɩfʊ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ kʊ rɛ kan pooyaa gɔ vəŋŋə kʊ n y'a sa, n n'a naasʊ gɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ bɩncɛ ma kɩ. Maam bɩ, gɔ kʊ n y'a banka bɩ nyinno wɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ tʊrm sɔ.
Naa minto bɩ, ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ ga m, ɩ gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ ra rɔ wɔɔ gore bɔ ʊ y. Ɩbɩɩ y'a bam lɔ k'ɩ lɛ bɔ ɩ mɩŋŋa ʊ? Ɩbɩɩ bɛɛ m ta gɔ bɩ nyinno wɔɔ nɩ y, gɔ bɩ nyinno wɔɔ m ta ɩbɩɩ m.
A a da ma, ɩbɩɩ n a hɩ mɔɔ m, ɩ ʊ: «Bɩ, gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro zɩnzɛ n y'a ʊ ra, kʊ mɔɔ n ŋ bɩncɛ sa wa.»
Sɩra m, n zɩnzɛ n y'a ʊ ra kʊ n y'a do sɩrakarɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ n ŋ bɩncɛ sa, ɩ sɩrakarɛ minto. Bɩ, dundo ɩ zi, ɩ bɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa busu y, nyi ba.
Bala, zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro paan…rɔ, bɩ Woso n ŋ to gɔ bɩ ma y, a a da ma an a ba ɩbɩɩ m maam sɔ, a b'ɩbɩɩ tore y.

Dɩga Woso ŋʊarɛ kan a nyaa kɩ zaa ma. A nyaa ta ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩrakarɛ to rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ an mɩŋŋa kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Bɩ, pakra m k'ɩbɩɩ m gɔɔta a ŋʊarɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɛɛ m, n y'ɩbɩɩ zɛm la, am vəŋŋəro wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ a bɩsɩkarɛ bɩ to, n y'a yarɛ, n nɩ ŋ cɩnta a bɩncɛ gusire b'ʊ. Bala, Woso a da ma, an a ya an ŋ cɩnta lɛɛ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ʊ hɔɔ b'ʊ.

Ɩbɩɩ kʊ zɩɩfʊ bɛɛ n'ɩbɩɩ m bɩ, bɔ ɩbɩɩ ʊ kʊ ʊ kan pooyaa gɔ vəŋŋə kʊ n y'a zɛ ra n n'a naasʊ har gɔ kʊ n n'a bankam bɩ kɩ ma, an bɔkarɛ a n a ga m y. Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ, har gɔ bɩ vəŋŋəro m, a naanaa an cem kʊ n n'a ya, n nɩ ŋ naasʊ gɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan kɩ hɔɔ bɩ ma.

M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ mim k'a nyaakʊm da naa n nyɩnta awɔɔ ma yirgu y, k'awɔɔ bɩ dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mindɔrɛzannɔ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Israyɛl gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a ba heerkarɛzannɔ, bɩ nyɩnta a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ m tolle ba ŋnɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋ zɛm bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ y'a tom Siyɔn ʊ,
a Zakɔɔb yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊrɛ ŋ ma,
gʊaasɩbabaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a darɛ ŋ ma bɩ n naa.
Dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊ ŋ ma bɩ m.
Kʊ gʊaa k'a dɩga Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gu lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma bɩ ma, a a da ma an a hɩ a ʊ, Woso jɩnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, bɩ, awɔɔ daahan m bɩ, bɩ kʊ Woso gʊaa bɔʊrɛ bɩ nɔ nɩ, Woso ŋ ŋʊa ŋ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bala, Woso bɩr hɔ k'a a ka bɩ sire y, a bɩr a hɔɔn lʊrm sɔ gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʊ y.
Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ nyɩnta bɩsɩ ka Woso ma zannɔ, bɩ her naa, Woso awɔɔ cicir zɛ, kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ bɩsɩ ka ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Her sɔ naa, brɔɔ bɩsɩ ka Woso ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ cicir kʊ n y'a zɛ bɩ jɛ ʊ, kʊ n nɩ ŋ cicir zɛ sɔ.
Bala, Woso a ka gʊɔɔ haay nɩ bɩsɩkarɛ nɔ ʊ, k'a ŋ haay cicir zɛ.
Woso hɔnta, a mindɔrɛ kan a hɔdɔrɛ kɩ nɔyaa ta ʊ gʊta maam-maam! Gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an hɔ k'a a cɩnta nɔ dɔ y, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma, an a zaarɔ jɩ dɔ y.
Wosoci y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
Nka ɩ Zuuba hɔɔndarɛ dɔ? Gɛɛ, nka ɩ nyɩnta a dʊndɔrɛzaa?
Gɛɛ, nka ɩ lɛɛ ka an hɔ ka ʊ, k'an a zɩm ka a zaa ʊ?
Bala, hɔ haay bɩ, a to a ʊ a zi, an ta ʊ a paŋŋa tɔ ma, an ta ʊ a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma. Woso m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
M danyɩnɔ, k'a yo Woso n a ŋʊarɛ zi ba kan awɔɔ kɩ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Woso ʊ, amba mannɩ k'an mɩsɩr, Woso n a so ʊ, an mɩŋŋa ma bɩ m. Daʊrɛ naa do nɩ Woso nɔ yɩm.
A bɩ zu her durnya naa mɩsɩrbaa zaarɔ ʊ y, bɩ k'a yɛ a zu Woso zaarɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ n a lʊr jilli, an awɔɔ banka. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ Woso hɔnhɔ, hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa, an a nɔ yɩ, an mɩŋŋa paan… bɩ dɔrɛ.

Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma, mɔɔ m da ma m a hɩ awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə m, m ʊ: a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ m busu a heer ʊ y. Bɩ, gʊaa biyəə n dɩga a mɩŋŋa ma, amba Woso sɩrakarɛ hɔ jir a n'a hɔ ka ʊ bɩ m. B'a b'a ka an bra ba a mɩŋŋa m y.
Gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋə bɩ deem nɩ y, ŋ gʊta, ŋn'a hʊnhɔ sɔ, wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro bɩr zi deem barɛ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ m gʊta bɩ, mɛ deem m wɔɔ m Krista zɛkʊra bɩ nɔ ʊ, ʊ nɩ zɛkʊra m kan kʊ kɩ, gʊaa biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ.
Gʊaa biyəə nɩ ganwʊrɛ do m a hʊnhɔ, an a ga kʊ ʊ kan barka kʊ Woso a ka ʊ bɩ kɩ m. Kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʊrɛ nɩ, k'a zaa m bɩr zi bam nɩ, k'an a ga kʊ ʊ kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa vanta ɩ daahan ganwʊrɛ nɩ, k'an bɩr a daahan zi bam, k'a vanta ɩ hɔdɩndarɛ ganwʊrɛ nɩ, k'an a hɔdɩndarɛ zi ba.
Kʊ gʊaa vanta ɩ dʊndɔrɛ ganwʊrɛ nɩ, k'an a zi ba. Gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ kam, k'an a ka kan a heer kɩ haay. Kʊ lɛɛzannɔ n a zi ba mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa, kʊ gʊaa cicirzɛrɛzaa n a cicirzɛrɛ zi ba kan heernyɩnta kɩ.
K'a kʊ ŋʊa sɩra m. K'a sɔ hɔ bʊnyaa m, a zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ.
K'a bɩr a kam kʊ ŋʊarɛ ma kan a heer kɩ haay, amba danyɩnɔ nɩ kʊ ŋʊam bɩ m. K'a bɩr lɛ zɛm kʊ daʊrɛ ma.
K'a yakʊ to, a Zuuba zi ba kaarɛ-kaarɛ.
K'a heernyɔɔ ba taaheerlɛ nɔ ʊ, a bʊr a ma cicir nɔ ʊ, k'a a yo ʊ yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ.
K'a da wosogʊɔɔ kʊ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han, k'a bɩ kɔ saanɔɔ sire ma y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ cicir karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ Woso han k'an hɔ mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ. K'a lɛ nyɩnta da gʊɔɔ nʊ, a b'a bʊnyaa da ŋ nʊ y.
K'a heer nyɔɔ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a heernyɔɔm nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, k'a nyi ka kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyi kam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
K'a kʊ ma mɩŋŋa, a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y. ‹A b'a gu zibəə poore barɛ ma y, a bɩ dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mindonno y.›
A bɩ zi bʊnyaa ba a sompi gʊaa nʊ y. ‹K'a a ka ma k'a mɩŋŋa ba gʊɔɔ haay mɩm ʊ.›
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ an ta a ma, k'a a yo ʊ k'a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan gʊɔɔ haay kɩ.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, a b'a zɩm bɔ a zim nɩ y, bɩ k'a to kʊ Woso n a nɔmaa zi ba, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ m Zuuba, mɔɔ nɩ zɩm bɔm, mɔɔ n nɩ gʊaa biyəə hɔ k'a a ga m kaŋ ʊ.›
N y'a ya n a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: ‹Bɩ kʊ nɔ y'ɩ jɩm zɛrɛ, k'ɩ hɔbɩrɛ ka ʊ k'an a bɩ. Kʊ mɩsɩ y'a zɛm, k'ɩ hi ka ʊ k'an a mi. Bala, a ba k'ɩbɩɩ nawʊm maam bɩ, sɛkɩna ɩbɩɩ n'a karɛ a mim la bɩ.›
Ɩ b'a to mimbʊnyaa m bʊr ɩ ra y, b'a mɩŋŋa ba k'ɩ bʊr a bʊnyaa ra.
Gʊaa haay a ga m, an zu lɛɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ dɩgam kʊ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʊ. Bala, lɛɛzaa ba ʊ, k'a a to bɛɛ ʊ Woso zi y. Kʊrɔ lɛɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ haay rɔ nɔɔm, Woso yɩ ŋ cɩncɩnta.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ gʊaa bɩsɩ ka lɛɛzannɔ ma, bɩsɩ a ka lɛ kʊ Woso a cɩnta bɩ ma. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔyarlɛ yɩrɛ.
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa bam nɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma, ŋnɩ nyi ba lɛɛzannɔ nɩ y, bɩ, a bʊnyaabənno wɔɔ nyi barɛ ŋ nɩ. K'ɩ lɛ baa k'ɩ nyi ba lɛɛzannɔ m, k'ɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩ ʊ,

bala, Woso zi ŋ n'a bam, k'a ka k'ɩbɩɩ n a mɩŋŋa ba. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ y'a bʊnyaa barɛ, k'ɩ nyi ba ŋ nɩ. Bala, paŋŋa kʊ ŋ nɩ ta m k'a gʊaa hʊnhʊr bɩ, a bɩ vam nɩ y. Woso zi ŋ n'a bam, k'a Woso nɔmaa hɩnka a bʊnyaabarɛzaa m.
Bɩ minto nɩ, gʊaa n a ga m, an zu kʊ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʊ. Kʊ Woso nɔmaa n b'a yɩ minto bɛɛ n'a deem nɩ y. Kʊ heer kɔrɛ bɩ nyɩnta ʊ sɔ y.
Naa tɔ ma m sɔ, awɔɔ n nɩ yawʊrlɔ kam, bala, a sirezannɔ wɔɔ, Woso yɩ ŋ da ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a ba mɩŋŋa.
K'a gʊaa biyəə hɔ k'awɔɔ m ta m ka ʊ. Kʊ yawʊr m, k'a ka a zaa ʊ. Kʊ hɔhɛɛrɛ gɛɛ a sire yawʊr m, k'a ka sɔ. Kʊ gʊaa k'awɔɔ a ga m a lɛ si bɩ nɩ, k'a lɛ si. A n a ga m awɔɔ n a da ʊ bɩ, k'a da ʊ.
Awɔɔ, a b'a ka kʊ gʊaa zɩm m bɩr ta awɔɔ ra y, kʊ bɩ m kʊ ŋʊarɛ m. Gʊaa k'a mim ŋʊa bɩ, a zaa hɔ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta bɩ ba haay.

Bala, lɛrɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ: ‹Ɩ bɩ jaan da y, ɩ bɩ gər zɛ y, ɩ bɩ koor ba y, ɩ b'a ka ɩ lɛ m bɩr gʊaa hɔ zi y.› Nawɔnnɔ haay kan lɛrɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a zɛ ŋ yaa ʊ kʊ ra lɛ naa do nɔ ʊ: ‹Ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʊa bɩ m.›
Gʊaa k'a n'a mim ŋʊam bɩ, a bɩr hɔsɩ bʊnyaa bam nɩ y. Bɩ y'a ka, kʊ gʊaa ɩ ŋʊarɛ m, a zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ haay.
K'awɔɔ dɔmɩm kʊ wɔɔ m ta ʊ naa mim dɔ bɩ, wakatɩ m, an a ga m k'awɔɔ n gu hinceem ma. Her naa, bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ jɩnjɛɛm wɔɔ ma, an lɛ da dɔmɩm kʊ wɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa ʊ, ʊ sɩra ka ʊ bɩ ma.
Gum da gʊta, dɔmɩrɛ a zɔ, bɩ minto bɩ, ʊ monsigə zibəəro to, ʊ lɛɛgure yarmɔr da ʊ ma.

Ʊ ta sɩra nɔ ʊ, amba a a ga m n nɩ ta sinsebir ʊ bɩ m. Ʊ b'ʊ zɛ kʊ ra k'ʊ hɔ bɩ maam-maam y, k'ʊ hɔ mi maam-maam sɔ y. Ʊ bɩ jaan da y, ʊ bɩ mɛsim zi daŋŋadɔɔ ba y, ʊ bɩ nyaa ba kan kʊ kɩ y, ʊ bɩ jɩmbaa da kʊ ma y.
K'a mɩsɩrbaa daa kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩsɩrbaa m bɩ ba, a b'a ya, a a hɔɔn da a mɩŋŋɔɔ m mɛsim mɩsɩrbaa gusire bɩ ma, k'a lɛtaamarɔ ba y.
K'a gʊaa kʊ paŋŋawarzaa m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ si, b'a ba hɔɔndarɛrɔ mim dɩnda bʊnyaa y.
Makra ba n nɩ, gʊaa deem y'a gɩngarɛ a ʊ, a a da ma a hɔ haay bɩ, deem n bɔkarɛ, a sɩrakarɛ paŋŋawar minto bɩ, dʊlɛɛrɔ an ŋ bɩrɛ.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ haay bɩm bɩ n a ga m, an gʊaa k'a bɩr a bɩm bɩ gore bɔ ʊ y, bɩ gʊaa k'a bɩr a bɩm bɩ, a bɩ gʊaa k'a n'a bɩm bɩ dʊdɔ ka y, bala, Woso a zaa si a zi.
Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ gʊaa vanta zibəənyɩ dʊdɔ ka? K'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, gɛɛ k'a do, a zuuba bɩ mim m bɩ. B'a jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɔ, bala, Zuuba ɩ paŋŋa m k'a ka k'an jɩm.
Makra vanta ba n nɩ sɔ: Gʊaa niŋŋə zi, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ lɛ da kʊ m, a vanta zi, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ hɔdeem. A a ga m kʊ gʊaa biyəə n hɔ k'an ta m a heer ʊ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.

Gʊaa k'a nɩ dɩgarɛ a ʊ, dɔmɩnnɔ wɔɔ lɛ da kʊ m bɩ, a ba a nawʊm Zuuba tɔ ma, gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ haay bɩm bɩ, Zuuba tɔ ma m sɔ, bala, a ɩ Woso barka darɛ. Gʊaa k'a bɩr hɔ haay bɩm bɩ, Zuuba tɔ ma m sɔ, an nɩ Woso barka darɛ.
Bala, wɔɔ gʊaa deem ba ʊ, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɩŋŋa minto y, bɩ gʊaa ba ʊ sɔ, an nɩ gam a mɩŋŋa minto sɔ y.
Bala, kʊ wɔɔ mɩsɩr, Zuuba tɔ ma m wɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam, kʊ wɔɔ gɩnga, gɩnga wɔɔ ʊ Zuuba tɔ ma sɔ. Kʊ wɔɔ mɩsɩr gɛɛ kʊ wɔɔ gɩnga, Zuuba ɩ gɔɔta an a so wɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, a hɩ Krista ʊ k'a nyɩnta gəəno kan mɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ Zuuba, bɩ minto m an ga an a ya an a mɩm bɔ ʊ.
B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ m ɩ n'ɩ danyɩ dʊdɔ karɛ? B'ɩbɩɩ, bɔ minto m sɔ, ɩ n n'ɩ danyɩ gore bɔŋ ʊ? Wɔɔ haay naa, Woso wɔɔ birm a dʊdɔkarɛ duu bɩ taa, k'a bɩ wɔɔ dʊdɔ ka.
Bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Amba mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zuuba m mɩsɩr denter naa m, mɔɔ y'a hɩ m ʊ:
Gʊaa haay kukurə zɛrɛ m taa, gʊaa biyəə yaa darɛ, an a leer busu an a hɩ, a ʊ, mɔɔ m Woso.
Maam bɩ, wɔɔ gʊaa biyəə y'a mɩŋŋa mim nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ Woso taa.
Ʊ b'ʊ ya, ʊ kʊ dʊdɔ yar y. Bɩ, k'a ka ma k'a bɩ hɔsɩ ba fɩɩga k'an a ka, k'a danyɩ n a do, gɛɛ an mimbʊnyaa ba y.
Zuuba Yeezuu zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m heer ʊ, m ʊ, hɔsɩ ba ʊ an dintim nɩ y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a hɔɔn da, a ʊ, hɔ naa do dintim m, a ba a nawʊm dintim a mɩŋŋa ma.
K'ɩbɩɩ ka ɩ danyɩ heer n a zar hɔbɩrɛ tɔkkɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a bɩm tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ bɩr tam ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ dɔ y. Ɩ b'a ka kʊ gʊaa kʊ Krista ga a tɔ ma bɩ m nyaam ɩ hɔ k'ɩ n'a bɩm bɩ tɔ ma y.
A b'a ka hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa awɔɔ ma bɩ m bʊr tɔ bɔrɛ m awɔɔ jɛ ʊ y.
Bala, Woso cirbəə bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ mim bɛɛ y, tɩrgabaa kan laafɩɩ kɩ, heernyɩnta kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ kɩ mim m.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ Krista zi barɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩm la, gʊɔɔ n'a ŋʊam sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʊ ʊ ka hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm laafɩɩ m kan wɔɔ haay sɩrakarɛ talɛɛ kɩ bɩ ma.
Ɩ bɩ Woso zibəə zar hɔbɩrɛ tɔ ma y. Hɔ haay mɩŋŋa, sɩra m, bɩ, kʊ gʊaa hɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm gʊaa vanta dore m bɩ bɩ, a bʊnyaa.
Hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʊ sim sʊrɛ, gɛɛ bɛɛ mire, gɛɛ hɔ vanta barɛ y'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ danyɩ n'a do, ɩ b'a ba y.
Ɩ sɩrakarɛ k'ɩ n ta m hɔ bɩ do minto bɩ to ɩ zi, Woso lɛɛ. Heernyɩntazaa m gʊaa k'a n'a ŋʊam k'a mim ba b'a heer bɩr a dʊdɔ yarm bɩ m.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ bɩm an bɔkarɛ a heer nɩ sɩnsɩm kam hɔ bɩ do ma bɩ, Woso a dʊdɔ yar, bala, a zibəə bɩ n a to heer sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ y. A n bɔkarɛ hɔ haay k'a n a to heer sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, mimbʊnyaa m.
Wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ paŋŋa m ta ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ʊ b'ʊ ka ʊ hɔɔnhɔ lɛtaama barɛ ma y. Bɩ, k'ʊ ʊ da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ba paŋŋa bɩ do m nɔ wɔɔ han a paŋŋawar bɩ nɔ ʊ.
A a ga m kʊ gʊaa biyəə n a ka ma k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa a mim tɔ ma, a daahan kan a sɩrakarɛ kɩ dara minto.
Bala, Krista n a ka hɔ k'a mɩŋŋa nɔ yɩ ma y, bɩ, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Ɩbɩɩ sʊnsɔrɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a wʊm nɔ wɔɔ a ba mɔɔ sʊnsɔrɔ.›
A n bɔkarɛ, hɔ kʊ n lɛɛ ka n n'a gʊrsɩra ba haay bɩ, a ba n y'a ʊ kʊ wɔɔ m hɔ dɔ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, bʊraama kan heerwʊtarɛ kʊ Wosoci bɩ n'a kam bɩ tɔ ma, wɔɔ ʊ da ma ʊ nyasʊ taaheerlɛ m.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ Woso k'a a so bʊraama ʊ kan heerwʊtarɛ kɩ bɩ n a ka k'awɔɔ m bɩr hɔɔndarɛ deem m kan kʊ kɩ, amba Krista Yeezuu lɛ n taa bɩ m,
k'a a da ma, a a lɛ bɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Zɩ kʊ Woso m b'ʊ, zɛkʊra deem nɔ ʊ, leer deem m.
K'a bɩr kʊ sim mɩŋŋa, amba Krista awɔɔ si bɩ m, Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ tɔ ma.
A hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m paan… Krista bɩ, a ba a ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ zibəənyɩ, k'a a da ma a ka kʊ Woso lerbɔrɛrɔ ŋ yaabɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ŋ kʊ yɩ, k'a Woso sɩra hɩnka maam.
Bʊr a ʊ sɔ, kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ, a mɩŋŋabaa tɔ ma, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ doro bire ʊ,
mɔɔ laa lɔm m ɩ tɔ da ʊ.
Wosoci b'a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ:
Doro vantɔɔ, k'a a heer nyɔɔ
kan Zuuba do bɩ kɩ.
A n a ya, an a hɩ, a ʊ:
Doro haay, k'a a lɛ bɔ Zuuba ʊ.
Kʊrɔ haay gʊɔɔ, k'a lɛ bɔ ʊ sɔ.
Ezayii ci a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Yese yaŋŋa bɩ zɛm,
a wutire an ka doro lɛɛ,
doro wɔɔ n yo ma.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ Woso k'a so taaheerlɛ ʊ bɩ n a ka, k'awɔɔ n'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka ʊ, bɩ k'a n'a ka sɔ, kʊ heernyɔɔ kan laafɩɩ kɩ n'awɔɔ han gʊta, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa tɔ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ mɩŋŋabaa m gʊta, a hɔ k'a a ga dɔrɛ m haay dɔ, an n'a dam ma a kʊ dʊndɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ, ci naa do nɔ ʊ naa, mɔɔ lɛɛ niŋŋoo gʊrsɩra ba kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ hɔɔ niŋŋoo tɔ da awɔɔ nɔ ʊ. A ba mɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, barka niŋŋə kʊ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto.

Woso a k'a mɔɔ n Krista Yeezuu zi ba, amba wosomannɩbər hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ zibəə bɩ do, lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ m. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ ɩ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ ka ŋ ʊ mannɩ ganwʊrɛ, kʊ bɩ n Woso nɔ yɩ, kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer la, k'an yɩ mɩŋŋa.
Krista Yeezuu zɛkʊra bɩ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ m da ma, m m heer nyɔɔ, Woso zi kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʊ mɔɔ kʊ m hɔ niŋŋə mim hɩ, hɔ kʊ Krista a ka mɔɔ n a ba kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m zu Woso ʊ bɩ m. Naa ba a ʊ, meerbaarɔ kan zibəəro kɩ nɔ ʊ,
hoserlo kan makrarɔ paŋŋa kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ nɔ ʊ. Yɩ a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ, mɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da lɛɛ haay ʊ mɩŋŋa, an a sa Zerizalɛm ma an ta Iliiri kʊrɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, lɛɛrɔ kʊ n nɩ Krista mim ma ʊ cɩna rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da ŋ ʊ. A ba mɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m zi ba lɛɛ kʊ gʊaa lɛɛ ka an zibəə sɩŋŋɩda sa ʊ tɔ ma.
Hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ bɩ mɔɔ ba, n ʊ:
Gʊɔɔ kʊ n n'a mim dɩnda ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'a yɩm,
gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n hɔsɩ ma a mim nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ y'a mim jɩ dɔrɛ.›
Naa do ɩ tɩr a nya mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ bɩr m dam ma m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi y.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ zibəə nya kʊrɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ.
A dɔɔraa laatʊ mɔɔ n n'a ŋʊam kʊ m bʊr awɔɔ zi.
Kʊ mɔɔ bʊr m nɩ tam Ɛspanyɩ ʊ, mɔɔ bɔm b'ʊ. A ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ m bɩ dɩga awɔɔ ma. Kʊ mɔɔ bɩ zer awɔɔ ra, m nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ m a ga m tɛkka m, k'awɔɔ m dɩga mɔɔ zaa bɩ sarɛ mim ma, kʊ m cem.
Her-her naa, ta mɔɔ nawʊm Zerizalɛm ʊ, daahan m, wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bala, Masedʊan kʊ bɩ kan Akayii kʊ bɩ kɩ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ lɛ sa, k'a busoo zɩnzɛ kʊ ra, a ka Zerizalɛm wosogʊɔɔ ŋʊazannɔ wɔɔ ʊ.

Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ lɛ bɩ sa a zim, bɩ sɩra nɔ ʊ, cicirzannɔ wɔɔ duro a ga hɔ naa do yɩrɛ m ŋ zi, bala, Krista gʊɔɔ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ n ŋ mɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a Woso dɔrɛhɔ jir kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ Krista gʊɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ a ga m ŋn'a da ŋ han kan hɔnta kʊ ŋ nɩ tam bɩ kɩ sɔ.
Kʊ mɔɔ zi naa do ba m a nya, m zɩnzɛkʊra busoo bɩ ka ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ bɔrɛ awɔɔ zi, m cem m ta Ɛspanyɩ ʊ.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ bʊr m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi, zɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kan Krista barka gʊta kɩ.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, kan ŋʊarɛ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n n'a kam bɩ kɩ minto, k'a yar ba kan mɔɔ kɩ a yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ.
K'a yaa da, kʊ basɩrakarɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zidee ʊ rɔ wɔɔ b'a da mɔɔ ma y. Bɩ, kʊ wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Zerizalɛm ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m daahan kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ tam nɩ bɩ si mɩŋŋa.
K'a n bɩr yɩrɛ ʊ, kʊ Woso yɛ sɔ, mɔɔ lee kure awɔɔ zi heernyɔɔ gʊta m, m hoon si awɔɔ bire ʊ.
Kʊ Woso k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ. Amina!
Wɔɔ danlʊ Febe k'a nɩ zi bam Sankre kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ n'a hɩ m, a kasɛtɩ mɩŋŋa.
K'a si a zi Zuuba tɔ ma, amba a a ga barɛ m wosogʊɔɔ kan kʊ kɩ bire ʊ bɩ m, k'a bʊr a lɛ n taa awɔɔ daahan ma, k'a a da han a mim haay nɔ ʊ. A mɩŋŋa a da gʊɔɔ han gʊta, a a da mɔɔ mɩŋŋa han sɔ.
K'a yaa da Priska kan Akilas kɩ m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ m Krista Yeezuu zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Ŋ y'a mɩŋŋɔɔ mee ka zɛ ma, k'a mɔɔ bɔ lɛm. Mɔɔ yɩ m deem bɛɛ nɩ ŋ barka darɛ y, do vantɔɔ wɔɔ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ haay yɩ ŋ barka dam sɔ.
K'a yaa da sɩrakarɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ n'a som kʊ ma ŋ har ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m. K'a yaa da mɔɔ gʊaasɩba Epayinɛtɩ bɩ m, a ɩ lɛɛ ka an sɩra ka Krista ʊ Azii kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
K'a yaa da Maarii k'a zi ba gʊta awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ m.
K'a yaa da Andronikus kan Zuniyas kɩ m, mɔɔ danyɩnɔ m, bɩ, n nyɩnta n nɩ ŋ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ. Kristazibəəzannɔ wɩsɩrɔ m, ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m ŋn'a ba kristagʊɔɔ.
K'a yaa da Ampliyatus m, mɔɔ ŋʊarɛzaa m Zuuba zuure nɔ ʊ.
K'a yaa da Urbɛn m, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m Krista zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ, kan mɔɔ ŋʊarɛzaa Sɩtakɩs kɩ m.
K'a yaa da Apelɛs m, a a sɩra ka Krista ʊ hɩnka hɔ gʊta nɔ ʊ. K'a yaa da Aristobul hargʊɔɔ m.
K'a yaa da Herodɩnyɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩ m. K'a yaa da Narsis hargʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Zuuba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
K'a yaa da Trifɛn kan Trifozɩ kɩ m, Zuuba zi ŋn'a bam. K'a yaa da Pɛrzidɩ m mɩŋŋa, a zi ba gʊta Zuuba tɔ ma.
K'a yaa da Rufus m, Zuuba zibəənyɩ wɩsɩ m. K'a yaa da a da bɩ m, mɔɔ da m sɔ.
K'a yaa da Asɩnkritɩ m, Flegɔn m, Hermɛs m, Patrobas m, Hermas m, kan danyɩnɔ vantɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m.
K'a yaa da Filolɔg kan Zuli kɩ m, Neere kan a danlʊ kɩ m, Olɩmpas kan wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ m haay.
K'a yaa da kʊ m mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ, kan kʊ daʊrɛ kɩ, ŋʊarɛ kɩ. Krista sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han k'a dundo a zi, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ gʊngʊ kʊ ma zi bam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ m, bɩsɩ kʊ ŋ n'a kam hɔdɩndarɛ k'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ ma. K'a gʊ ŋ ma laatʊ.
Bala, gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ, Zuuba Krista zi bɛɛ ŋ n'a barɛ y, a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɔ zi ŋn'a bam. Bra ŋ n'a bam bahɔdonno m, meerbaarɔ nyɩntɔɔ kan a ŋʊaar mindɩndarɛrɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ.

Gʊaa haay a dɔ, a ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm Zuuba ma. Mɔɔ heer nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ naa tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ m yɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nɔ ʊ. K'a yɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ mim bɩr zar darɛ ŋ ma zannɔ, mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ.
Woso k'a a so laafɩɩ ʊ bɩ Sʊtaana hɔɔnsɩrɛ awɔɔ gannɔ taa dɩɩtaa.
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu barka m bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn Timote ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩnɔ Lusiyus, Zasɔn, kan Sosipatɛɛr k'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Tɛɛrtiyus, kʊ Pol a da ci naa do barɛ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m Zuuba k'a nɩ wɔɔ zɛm kʊ ra bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Gayus k'a mɔɔ si a har ʊ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ haay n nɩ kʊ zɛŋ ʊ a har ʊ b'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Erastɩ, kʊ bɩ busoocɩntər bɩ, kan Kaartus kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a m. [
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka m nyɩnta kan awɔɔ haay kɩ. Amina!]

Woso ɩ paŋŋa m k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa da ra, amba lemim nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ n n'a pa dam bɩ n n'a hɩm bɩ m, Yeezuu Krista lemim kʊ mɔɔ n'a pa dam, Woso hɔ k'a nyaakʊm da gɔsɩ n a dɔ y, an a hɩnka wɔɔ m, ʊ a dɔ bɩ m. Hɔ bɩ do Woso nyɩnta an a nyaakʊm da biisi tee… bɩ,
kɛɛrɛ naa, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ ciro wɔɔ a hɩnka lɛɛgure nɔ ʊ gʊaa haay m, amba Woso k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ lɛ ka bɩ m, a lɛ ka kʊ n nɩ ta m doro haay zi kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka, ŋnɩ zu ʊ.
Kʊ Woso y'a deem k'an ta mindɔrɛ m bɩ m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, dɔmɩm haay! Amina!
I Corinthians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bir a hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʊ kʊ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, mɔɔ m kan wɔɔ danyɩ Sɔstɛn kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam.

A ba wɔɔ nawʊm Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊma k'a nɩ Korɛntɩ ʊ bɩ ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ a hɔ Krista Yeezuu zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, an ŋ bir kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ haay ʊ, ŋnɩ yaa dam wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa m brɔɔ Zuuba, a m wɔɔ Zuuba sɔ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka dɔmɩm haay awɔɔ tɔ ma, barka k'a ka awɔɔ ʊ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ bɩ minto.
Bala, a tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ Woso ganwʊrɛrɔ do haay yɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ lemim, kan hɔdɔrɛ kɩ ganwʊrɛrɔ m.
A n ta ʊ sɔ bɩ, Krista kasɛtɩ bɩ paŋŋa yɩ awɔɔ zi,
bɩ n a ka *Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛ sɩ n jɩra awɔɔ ma y, awɔɔ k'a nɩ dɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista hɩnkarɛ dɔmɩm ma rɔ wɔɔ.
A mɩŋŋa n nɩ paŋŋa karɛ awɔɔ ʊ k'an ta an dɔmɩnnɔ nyarɛ ku, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hinni kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ bɩ, kʊ hɔsɩ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʊr zi y.
Woso k'a awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ m zɛkʊra yɩ kan a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba m bɩ kɩ bɩ, taalɛrazaa m.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, k'a kʊ ma, a b'a ka gʊngʊrɛ n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʊ y, k'a zɛ kʊ ra a bɩr hɔɔn deem m, kan hɔɔndarɛ deem kɩ m.
Bala, m danyɩnɔ, Kolowe gʊɔɔ a dɩnda mɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ, awɔɔ bɩr kʊ marɛ y.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ: «Pol gʊaa n mɔɔ m, naa zaa a ʊ, Apolɔs gʊaa n mɔɔ m, naa ʊ, Sefas gʊaa n mɔɔ m. Naa a ya, a ʊ, Krista gʊaa n mɔɔ m.»
Krista a gʊngʊ ra? Pol n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma awɔɔ minto ra? Pol tɔ minto m n nɩ batɛm ka awɔɔ ʊ ra?
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, bala mɔɔ n batɛm ka awɔɔ gɔsɩ ʊ, kʊ Krispus kan Gayus kɩ bɛɛ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a hɩ a ʊ, mɔɔ batɛm ka a ʊ, m tɔ ra y.
Mɔɔ batɛm ka Stefanas har gʊɔɔ ʊ sɔ, kʊ naa bɛɛ y, mɔɔ n batɛm ka gʊaa vanta ʊ m a dɔ y.
Bala, Krista n mɔɔ nyɔɔ kʊ m bɩ batɛm ka y, mɔɔ nyɔɔ a ʊ kʊ m bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da. Mɔɔ n yo mindɔrɛ ma m n'a pa bɩ darɛ y. A ba mɔɔ ʊ maam kʊ Krista gɔdarkʊra bɩ bɩ bɔ vam y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ ɩ dɩgam lemim kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa dam, ʊ n'a hɩm, ʊ ʊ, Krista ga gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ ma hɔɔzaabaa lemim. Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso paŋŋa m gɔdarkʊra lemim bɩ m.
Bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: «Mɔɔ mindɔrɛzannɔ mindɔrɛ zaar bam, m hɔɔntaʊrɛzannɔ hɔɔn zaar ba.»
Mindɔrɛzaa ɩ ka? Lɛrɔ karɩnsaamba ɩ ka? Her durnya naa do meerbaawaasɩzaa ɩ ka? Woso a ka durnya mindɔrɛ n a ba hɔɔzaabaa mim.
Bala, Woso hɔɔn bɔ ʊ a mɩŋŋa mindɔrɛ nɔ ʊ, kʊ durnya b'a da ma an a dɔ durnya mindɔrɛ nɩ y, bɩ, k'a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra kam nɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ hɔɔzaabaa lemim padarɛ bɩ m.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ, a ka brɔɔ n nawʊm hoserlo ma, grɛkkɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a kam mindɔrɛ ma,
bɩ wɔɔ, Krista kʊ n y'a wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ wɔɔ n'a pa dam, zɩɩfʊrɔ ɩ dɩgam naa ma nyannɩ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔɔzaabaa.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ m, gɛɛ grɛkkɩrɔ nɩ, Krista kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa dam b'ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Woso paŋŋa m, bɩ Woso mindɔrɛ m sɔ.
Bala, hɔ k'a bɔ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, Woso hɔɔzaabaa m bɩ, hɔ bɩ do hɔɔntaʊrɛ lɛ da gʊɔɔ mindɔrɛ m, sɔ bɩ, hɔ k'a bɔ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, Woso paŋŋawar m bɩ, a paŋŋa lɛ da gʊɔɔ paŋŋa m.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa k'a dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ kʊ Woso a bir lɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ barla, gʊɔɔ ba ʊ gʊta ŋnɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ durnya mɩm ʊ y, ŋnɩ paŋŋazannɔ sɔ y, ŋnɩ har wɩsɩ gʊɔɔ y.
Bɩ, hɔ kʊ hɔɔzaabaa m durnya ʊ bɩ, Woso bɩ sa, k'a nyannɩ da mindɔrɛzannɔ ma, hɔ kʊ paŋŋawar m durnya nɔ ʊ bɩ, Woso bɩ sa, k'a nyannɩ da hɔ k'a nɩ paŋŋa m bɩ ma.
Hɔ k'a bɩ zore an yaarsɩ durnya ʊ bɩ, hɔ k'a nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ bɩ, Woso hɔ bɩ do sa, k'a nyaam hɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma hɔ bɩ m,
kʊ gɔsɩ b'a da ma an a mɩŋŋa busu Woso lɛɛ y.

Woso mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ m zɛkʊra yɩ kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, a mɩŋŋa y'a ba wɔɔ mindɔrɛ k'a a to Woso zi, a ɩ wɔɔ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Woso tɔ ma, an nɩ wɔɔ bʊmbɔm mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ bɩ n kʊ yɩ, n ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a ʊ, k'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ y, an a lɛ bɔ hɔ kʊ Zuuba a ba b'ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, bʊr kʊ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi bɩ, mɔɔ n bʊr lɛmindɔrɛ m gɛɛ mindɔrɛ m kʊ m bɩ Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ y.
Bala, mɔɔ hɔɔn bɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɩ hɔsɩ mim dɩnda awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, kʊ Yeezuu Krista mim bɛɛ y, an lɛ da bɩ a wɔ kʊ n y'a ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ mim m.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʊ, paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ, dabɔʊ nɔ ʊ, kan mɛhinkəre kɩ.
Mɔɔ meerbaa kan mɔɔ pa bɩ darɛ kɩ n nyɩnta lɛmindɔrɛ meerbaa nɔ ʊ y, bɩ nyɩnta ʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa zibəə hɩnkarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Nyɩnta a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ bɩ yo gʊɔɔ mindɔrɛ ma y, bɩ k'an yo Woso paŋŋa ma.
A n bɔkarɛ, mindɔrɛ paan… wɔɔ n'a dɩndam kristagʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩrakarɛ yaa ka rɔ wɔɔ m. Mindɔrɛ naa do n a to durnya naa do nɔ ʊ, b'a n a to durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ b'a zaar bam nɔ wɔɔ zi y.
Woso mindɔrɛ wɔɔ n'a dɩndam, hɔ k'a n dɔ biisi m, n n a nyaakʊm da, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta an a cɩnta, bɩ ma bɩ durnya ba ʊ y, kʊ wɔɔ n bɩ nyɩnta a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Durnya naa do paŋŋazannɔ gɔsɩ n nyɩnta an a dɔ y, bala, k'a dɔ ŋ y'a ʊ, ŋ bɩ Zuuba k'a a so lɛbɔʊrɛ ʊ bɩ wɔm gɔdarkʊra ma y.
Bɩ, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: «Hɔ kʊ gʊaa mɩm n a yɩ cɩna y, a tʊr n a ma cɩna y, hɔ kʊ gʊaa n a hɔɔn da ma cɩna y, hɔ bɩ do haay Woso a cɩnta gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ m.»
Denter m, wɔɔ, Woso hɔ bɩ do hɩnka wɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ. Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ hɔ haay taa zɛm, baa hɔ kʊ Woso a nyaakʊm da paan… haay, a y'a taa zɛm sɔ.
Nka m nɩ gʊɔɔ barla, an gʊɔɔ mim dɔ? K'a maam, hɔɔn k'a nɩ kan kɩ bɩ m. Maam sɔ bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ Woso gʊr zi bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a dɔ kʊ Woso Ɛspri bɛɛ y.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ n durnya ɛspri yɩ y, bɩ, Woso Ɛspri wɔɔ yɩ, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ da ma ʊ Woso barka ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ yɩ ŋ mim dɩndam, wɔɔ bɩr a dɩndam gʊaa mindɔrɛ nɩ y, bɩ, a dɩnda wɔɔ nawʊm Sɛnt-Ɛspri mindɔrɛ m, ʊ nɩ Woso hɔɔ jɩ dɩndam, Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔdɩndarɛ m.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ mɛsim hɔɔn m bala bɩ, a bɩr yɛm hɔ k'a a to Woso Ɛspri zi bɩ ma y. Hɔɔzaabaa m kan kɩ, a b'a dam ma an a jɩ ma y, bala, Woso Ɛspri n'a dam ma an a ka gʊaa n a dɔ.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso Ɛspri m bɩ, a ɩ hɔ haay dʊdɔ kam bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dʊdɔ karɛ y.
Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: «Nka ɩ Woso hɔɔndarɛ dɔ, k'a hɔ dɩnda nɩ?» A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ, Krista hɔɔndarɛ wɔɔ n ta m.

M danyɩnɔ, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ n wɔ ʊ m meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ amba n tɩr a ba kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso Ɛspri m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ nɩ y, bɩ meer bɩ ba mɔɔ ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ amba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam nɔ wɔɔ m, bala, awɔɔ gɔɔta a m banfinnirɔ Krista sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Nyonhi mɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʊ, hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɛɛ y, bala, awɔɔ b'a dam ma cɩna a hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ y. Baa kan dɩɩtaa dɔmɩm kɩ, awɔɔ b'a dam ma a hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ y.
Bala, awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam. Jɩmbaa kan nyaa kɩ y'awɔɔ bire ʊ, naa bɩr a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, awɔɔ gɔɔta an nɩ durnya mɩsɩrbaa bam, an nɩ tam am gʊaa k'an Woso dɔ m naa?
K'awɔɔ gʊaa deem tɩr a hɩ, a ʊ: «Pol gʊaa m mɔɔ m», gʊaa vanta ʊ: «Apolɔs y'a so mɔɔ ʊ», naa k'awɔɔ n'a bam naa, gʊaa k'an Woso dɔ zibəə bɛɛ awɔɔ n'a bam naa?
Nka m Apolɔs nɩ? Nka m Pol nɩ? Zibəənyɩnɔ m, Woso nɩ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʊ, n gʊaa biyəə a zi ba amba Zuuba a da ʊ bɩ m.
Apolɔs kan mɔɔ kɩ, bɔ wɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ kan danwunno kɩ. Mɔɔ ɩ Woso lemim bɩ duu, Apolɔs n hi da ra, Woso y'a ka an ma.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m gʊaa k'a n'a duum bɩ nɩ y, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m gʊaa k'a nɩ hi dam la bɩ m sɔ y, Woso k'a ka hɔ bɩ nɩ mam b'ɩ lɛ da haay.
Gʊaa k'a n'a duum kan gʊaa k'a nɩ hi dam la bɩ kɩ, ŋ hɔdeem, bɩ, gʊaa biyəə y'a yawʊra yɩm an a ga kʊ ʊ kan a mɩŋŋa zibəə kɩ.
Bala, zi wɔɔ n'a bam kan kʊ kɩ Woso zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ, b'awɔɔ m hɔsɩra kʊ Woso n'a wʊm.
Awɔɔ m cɛ kʊ Woso n n'a dɔ m.

Amba cɛdɔrɛzaa mɩŋŋa m bɩ, mɔɔ cɛ bɩ jɩr cɩnta an a ga kʊ ʊ kan ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ, gʊaa vanta m bɔkarɛ an n'a dɔm lɛ. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa biyəə n dundo a zi kan zaa k'a sa an nɩ cɛ bɩ dɔm nɩ m bɩ kɩ.
Kʊ cɛ bɩ jɩr bɩ nɩ, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an cɛjɩr vanta da fɩɩga y, cɛjɩr k'an ta ʊ hɔɔ tee… bɩ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ a bɩncɛ ʊ, cɛjɩr bɩ do, Yeezuu Krista m.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa cɛ dɔ cɛjɩr bɩ rɛ sarma mɔr m, gɛɛ wanzurfu m, gɛɛ jaa tɔzannɔ m, gɛɛ gɔ m, gɛɛ bur m, gɛɛ haaʊ m,
Woso y'a zaa zibəə makra barɛ an dɩga a dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ. Woso gʊaa biyəə zibəə makra bam sɛ m, sɛ nɩ gʊaa biyəə zibəə k'an lʊnlɔ hɩnkarɛ, bɩ gʊaa biyəə n n'a zibəə mɩŋŋabaa gɛɛ a bʊnyaabaa dɔm ma.
Gʊaa kʊ sɛ bɩ b'a zibəə bɩm bɩ, bɩ zaa y'a zibəə ganwʊrɛ yɩm.
Bɩ gʊaa kʊ sɛ bɩ n'a zibəə bɩm bɩ, a b'a zibəə ganwʊrɛ yɩrɛ y, a mɩŋŋa bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm, bɩ, bɔ a nawʊm kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, bɔ a ʊ sɛ nɔ ʊ.
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, Wosocɛ n'awɔɔ m, Woso Ɛspri bɩ nɩ kan a kɩ ra?
Kʊ gʊaa Wosocɛ bɩ zaar ba, Woso bɩ zaa zaar bam sɔ. Bala, Wosocɛ bɩ Woso hɔ m, bɩ cɛ bɩ do bɩ n'awɔɔ m.
Gɔsɩ bɩ bra ba a mɩŋŋa nɩ y. K'awɔɔ gʊaa deem ʊ, a hɔɔn ka amba durnya naa do hɔ bɩ nɩ, k'a n'a ba hɔɔzaa k'an bɔkarɛ an hɔɔn ka.
Bala, durnya naa do mindɔrɛ bɩ, hɔɔzaabaa m Woso mɩm ʊ. Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ sɔ, n ʊ: «Woso ɩ mindɔrɛzannɔ kum hɔɔnkarɛ zi kʊ ŋ n'a bam bɩ nɔ ʊ.»
N y'a ya, n n a gʊrsɩra ba sɔ, n ʊ: «Zuuba mindɔrɛzannɔ hɔɔndarɛrɔ dɔ. A a dɔ a ʊ, ŋ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ y.»
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ, gʊɔɔ tɔ ma y, bala, awɔɔ hɔ m hɔ haay m.
Kʊ Pol m, gɛɛ Apolɔs m, gɛɛ Sefas m, awɔɔ hɔɔ m, kʊ durnya m gɛɛ mɩsɩrbaa m, gɛɛ zɛ m, kʊ her-her dɔmɩm naa m, gɛɛ bootirɔ dɔmɩnnɔ m, woo… naa awɔɔ hɔ m.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, Krista y'a so awɔɔ ʊ, Woso n a so Krista ʊ.
A a ga m, kʊ gʊɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ kan Apolɔs kɩ bɩ, Krista zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m, Woso n a minno k'a ŋ nyaakʊm da biisi bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n ŋ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m.
Kʊ n hɔ da gʊaa wɔ ʊ k'a n dɩga a mim ma, hɔ kʊ n'a kam ma k'a zaa bɩ n a ba kɛɛrɛ bɩ, sɩrabarɛ m.
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m kan mɔɔ kɩ k'awɔɔ mɔɔ dʊdɔ yar, gɛɛ gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ mɔɔ dʊdɔ yar y. Mɔɔ bɩr m mɩŋŋa dʊdɔ yarlɛ m zim sɔ y.
Sɩra m, mɔɔ n kʊrɔma yɩ m heer ʊ an nɩ mɔɔ kɔrɛ y, bɩ naa bɛɛ n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, mim ba mɔɔ ma wa. Gʊaa k'a nɩ mɔɔ dʊdɔ kam bɩ, Zuuba m.

Bɩ minto bɩ, a bɩ lɛɛ ka a gɔsɩ dʊdɔ ka y, k'a to kʊ Zuuba n a bɔ an bʊr, k'a b'a bɔ an bʊr, a hɔ gaam hɔ k'a nyaakʊm da monsigə ʊ ra, an bɔ hɔ haay kʊ gʊɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ a nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m garga ra. Maam bɩ, Woso y'a lɛ bɔm gʊaa biyəə ʊ, amba a a ga m bɩ m.

M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n naa dɩnda, m makra sa Apolɔs kan mɔɔ kɩ ma, k'awɔɔ n wɔɔ hɔbaa sa, a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu a cem hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ bɩ han y. Awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ yo gʊaa vanta ma k'a a mɩŋŋa busu, a gʊaa vanta gore bɔ ʊ y.
Bala, gʊaa ra, nka y'a ka ɩbɩɩ m lɛ da ɩ muno nɩ? Bɔ ɩbɩɩ yɩ ɩ zim k'a ka bɛɛ n y'a ʊ ɩbɩɩ ʊ? Bɩ k'a ka n y'a ʊ ɩbɩɩ ʊ, bɔ m, ɩ n'ɩ mɩŋŋa busurɛ ɩ ʊ, a yɩ ɩ ʊ ɩ zim nɩ?
Ʊn'hʊʊn…, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay m kaka an bʊrbɔ, hɔnyɩzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ a ba cinno, bɩ cinno bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y. A ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ n'a ba cinno paan…rɔ, kʊ wɔɔ m nyɩnta cinno sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ.

Mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ, Woso bɩ, wɔɔ da ʊ gʊaa haay jɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma. Bɔ wɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yar n nɩ tarɛ ŋ nɩ k'a yaa ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ kɩ. Ɩ ʊ wɔɔ nyɔɔ n y'a ʊ saa, am hɔɔnɩbɩɩrɔ hɔ bɩ m durnya haay mɩm ʊ, malɛɛkarɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma, gʊɔɔ nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma sɔ.

Hɔɔzannɔ n wɔɔ m, Krista kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ minto. B'awɔɔ, mindɔrɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʊ ra kan Krista kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Paŋŋawarzannɔ n wɔɔ m, awɔɔ m paŋŋazannɔ, n y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʊ, bɩ n yɩ wɔɔ gore bɔŋ ʊ.
A n ta an wakatɩ naa do ku naa, wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ nɩ fɩr yɩm, nɔ m kan mɩsɩ kɩ m, huu jɩra wɔɔ ma, gʊɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ ba ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ har nɩ y, lɛɛ wɔɔ n'a sam tee….
Zi wɔɔ n'a bam kɔɔkɔɔ k'ʊ lɛɛmaa hɔ yɩ, ʊ a bɩ. Kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊ, bɩ wɔɔ ŋ barka da ʊ. Kʊ gʊɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ yɛ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ ma.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ y'a bʊnyaa hɩm wɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ meerbaa nyɩnta ba kan ŋ kɩ. Kan a her kɩ naa, n gɔɔta n nɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ɩ ʊ, durnya gumə m wɔɔ m, ɩ ʊ, durnya dintim m wɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ n hɔ kʊ mɔɔ gʊrsɩra ba naa ʊ naa ba, kʊ m awɔɔ da nyannɩ ʊ y. A ba mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ m awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʊ, bala, mɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, m n'awɔɔ ŋʊam.
Baa k'awɔɔ karɩnsaambɔɔ yɩ tisi-tisi Krista nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ zɩ bɩ hɔka y, a deem. Mɔɔ n'awɔɔ zɩ, bala, mɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʊ.
Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ dʊndɔ mɔɔ nawʊm, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa.

Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ hɔbaa sa, bɩ minto m, mɔɔ n Timote nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma, k'an bɩ mɩsɩrbaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam Krista zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ zaarɔ tɔ da awɔɔ nɔ ʊ, amba mɔɔ n'a dɩndam lɛɛ haay ʊ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ haay m bɩ m. K'a dɔ a ʊ, Timote bɩ mɔɔ nyɩ m am awɔɔ hɔ bɩ m sɔ, mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam, an a kʊsɩ mɔɔ ma.
Awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ bɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ y.
Bɩ, kʊ Zuuba yɛ, mɔɔ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ zɔɔ, bɩ mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ wɔɔ meerbaarɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma kʊ m a ma y, bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ m a dɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ paŋŋa m gɛ.
Bala, Woso cirbəə bɩ, meerbaarɔ mim bɛɛ y, zi paŋŋazaa k'a n'a bam bɩ mim m.
N kara awɔɔ lɛ n taa? Awɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ mɔɔ n bʊr a zi bara m m wɔ ʊ kʊ m nyaa ba kan a kɩ gɛɛ, kʊ m bʊr a zi ŋʊarɛ m kan nyɩntabaa kɩ nɩ?

Mɔɔ ma n n'a dɩndam lɛɛ kar ʊ, n ʊ, gʊaa ɩ jaan da awɔɔ barla, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ bɛɛ m nɔ wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'ɩ jaandarɛ naa do lɔɔ da y, k'an bʊnyaa maam-maam bɩ tɔ ma. A dɩnda n nawʊrɛ, n ʊ, awɔɔ gʊaa deem nɩ kan a zɩ lʊ kɩ.
A ga a wʊm k'awɔɔ heer n a zar, a nyi ka mimbʊnyaa k'an awɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ minto, a gʊaa k'a naa ba bɩ bɔ a zi, an bɔkarɛ, awɔɔ bɩ to an n'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busum.
Mɔɔ ba b'ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ heer ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, mɔɔ gʊaa k'a mim naa do ba bɩ dʊdɔ yar, ɩ ʊ b'ʊ mɔɔ n ta ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
K'awɔɔ b'a so kʊ ma k'a mim naa do dɩnda, mɔɔ heer nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ, wakatɩ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, k'a gʊaa bɩ do dʊdɔ yar Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ kan a paŋŋa kɩ m.
K'a gʊaa bɩ do da Sʊtaana wɔ ʊ, k'a mɛsim n a zaar ba, k'a nyi bɩ n a da ma an bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ hinni kʊ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ b'ʊ.
Awɔɔ n a ga m hɔɔ, a a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y. N ʊ: «Nyʊnyɔɔ poore tɔkkɛ ɩ nyisi derm haay.» Awɔɔ n bɔɔr naa do dɔ ra?

Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mimbʊnyaa haay k'ɩ ʊ nyʊnyɔɔ gusire m bɩ bɔ a bire ʊ, k'a a da ma, a yɩ mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa ɩ ʊ, nyisi daa kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma bɩ m. Bala, sɩra nɔ ʊ, Woso awɔɔ hu bɔ, Yeezuu Krista zɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Yeezuu Krista bɔ kʊ ʊ kan sinnyɛɛm kʊ n tɩr a zɛ mannɩ pakkɩ cibsa ma bɩ kɩ.

Ʊ ʊ pakkɩ cibsa bɩ bɩ, bɩ, ʊ b'a bɩ bur kʊ nyʊnyɔɔ gusire n ta ma bɩ nɩ y. Nyʊnyɔɔ gusire bɩ do bɔ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, mimbʊnyaabarɛ m kan mɩsɩrbaa bʊnyaa barɛ kɩ. Bɩ, ʊ ʊ cibsa bɩ bɩ bur kʊ n n nyʊnyɔɔ da ma m, naa k'a hɩ a ʊ, heer hu nɔ ʊ, sɩra nɔ ʊ.
Ci kʊ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a ba awɔɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m mɔɔ ʊ, a b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan jaandər kɩ y.

Durnyazannɔ kʊ jaandənno m, mɩnyɔɔzannɔ m, ŋnɩ konno, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam *wosobaawɔnnɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ ʊ a b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan ŋ kɩ y. Kʊ gʊaa ʊ, a b'a lɛ dam nawɔnnɔ ʊ, pakra m k'an bɔ durnya ʊ, kʊ n bɛɛ m a wer ta ʊ.

Ayy… durnyazannɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ ma y, bɩ gʊaa k'a ʊ danyɩ n a mɩ Krista zuure nɔ ʊ, an bɔkarɛ, jaandər m, gɛɛ mɩnyɔɔzaa, gɛɛ an nɩ yaa dam wosobaawɔnnɔ m, gɛɛ tɔzarlɛzaa, gɛɛ bɛɛmirewaasɩzaa, gɛɛ hɔyɔrɛzaa bɩ. Bɩ zaa mɔɔ hɩ ma, baa kʊ hɔbɩrɛ m, a b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ y.
Mɔɔ bɛɛ n nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yarlɛ y. B'awɔɔ a ga m, a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ sokʊma nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yar.
Kʊ durnyazannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, Woso n nɩ brɔɔ dʊdɔ yarm. K'a hɔ kʊ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ ba, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «K'a la gʊaa k'a n'a bʊnyaa bam bɩ ra a bɔ a barla.»
A a ba lɔ, k'awɔɔ gʊaa deem ɩ mim m kan a mim kɩ, ta a tɩr a ʊ durnya dʊdɔkənno zi kʊ ŋ nɩ dʊdɔ bɩ ba, a lɔ a bɩr mim bɩ dam wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a dɩnda?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ durnya dʊdɔ ka ra? Bɩ, k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ durnya dʊdɔ ka, bɔ m awɔɔ bɩr a dam ma an nɩ minno poorero nɔɔm dɩndarɛ?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ malɛɛkarɔ dʊdɔ ka ra? Bɩ, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ wɔɔ bɩ her mɩsɩrbaa naa minno dʊdɔ karɛ?
Kan naa kɩ haay, kʊ minno nɔɔn duro b'a da ʊ, b'awɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ bɩr dɩgarɛ ŋ ma hɔsɩ a sokʊma nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ sa a ŋ ba a dʊdɔkənno.
Naa do nyannɩ ba awɔɔ m na? Awɔɔ k'a m danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ gʊaa deem taan… ba ʊ, mindɔrɛzaa, k'a mim banka awɔɔ barla ra?
A n a ga m, kʊ danyɩnɔ n ta kʊ m dʊdɔkənno taa y, an lɛ da bɩ, a bɩ zore kʊ ŋ nɩ ta kʊ m basɩrakənno taa y.

Sɩra nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ kʊrɔ ma maam-maam, ta k'awɔɔ nawʊm kʊ m dʊdɔkənno taa bɩ minto. Kʊ hɔ k'a bɩ tɩrga n y'a ba awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩrɛ, a jɩra ta b'ʊ bɩ m. Kʊ hɔ n n'a yɔrɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n yɛ ma, k'a jɩra sɔ.
Bɩ, awɔɔ bɩr yɛm hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma y, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ hɔ k'a bɩ tɩrga bam, an nɩ koor bam, bɩ, naa ba awɔɔ nawʊrɛ a danyɩnɔ m.

Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ bɩ nyɩntam Woso cirbəə b'ʊ ra? A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y. K'a dɔ a ʊ, jaandənno, kan wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadənno kɩ, muno lannɔbənno, muno zinobənno, yaarɔ wʊta kan kʊ kɩ zannɔ,
konno, mɩnyɔɔzannɔ, bɛɛmirewaasɩzannɔ, gʊɔɔ tɔzarlɛzannɔ, hɔyonno, ŋ bɩncɛ bɩ nyɩntam Woso cirbəə b'ʊ y.

Awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam biisi. Bɩ, Woso awɔɔ hu bɔ, an mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro gʊ awɔɔ ma, an awɔɔ bɔ ʊ a hɔ, k'a a so awɔɔ ʊ, a awɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʊ, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʊ.

Gʊaa a da ma an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Zaa ta ʊ kʊ mɔɔ n hɔ haay woo… ba.» Sɩra m, bɩ, hɔ haay bɛɛ n mɩŋŋa gʊaa n'a bam wa. Mɔɔ m da ma, m a hɩ, m ʊ: «Zaa ta ʊ kʊ m hɔ haay ba.» Bɩ, mɔɔ b'a tom hɔ niŋŋə n mɔɔ ba a lɔ y.

Gʊaa bɩ do a da ma an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ: «Hɔbɩrɛ da n y'a ʊ gʊaa nɔ tɔ ma, n nɩ gʊaa nɔ da hɔbɩrɛ tɔ ma sɔ. Bɩ, Woso zɛm bɩ hɔbɩrɛ kan gʊaa nɔ bɩ kɩ zaar ba.» Sɩra m, bɩ, n nɩ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ da jaandarɛ minto y, wɔɔ mɛ bɩ, ta an a wʊ ʊ Zuuba hɔ, Zuuba n ta ʊ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ daahan minto.
Bɩ, Woso k'a Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ, a wɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʊ sɔ a paŋŋa bɩ m.
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ mɛrɔ wɔɔ Krista mɛ vəŋŋəro m na? Mɔɔ yɛrɛ m Krista mɛ vəŋŋə sa m a ba lʊmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa mɛ vəŋŋə ra? Ayy…, fɩɩga!
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, kʊ gʊaa a zɛ kʊ ra kan lʊmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa kɩ, a zaa bɩ kan lʊ bɩ kɩ a ba n y'a ʊ deem na? Bala, Wosoci a hɩ a ʊ: «Ŋ hɩɩya haay a ba gʊaa deem.»
Bɩ, gʊaa k'a a zɛ kʊ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ, a a ba ɛspri deem kan kɩ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a a si jaandarɛ lɛɛ. Mimbʊnyaarɔ vantɔɔ kʊ gʊaa nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ n a so a mɛ ʊ jilli y. Bɩ, jaandarɛzaa bɩ, mimbʊnyaa an n'a barɛ a mɛ bɩ m.
Gɛɛ, awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ mɛ bɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri cɛ m, Woso n a ka awɔɔ ʊ, an n'awɔɔ heer ʊ ra? Bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ dɔ ra? Woso y'a so awɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso hɔ bɔ gʊta an awɔɔ bʊmbɔ m. Bɩ minto bɩ, k'a hɔ k'a n'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ bɩ ba a mɛ bɩ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, kʊ m minno k'awɔɔ mɔɔ lɩnlar ma ci ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nyɩ bɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ ʊ: «A mɩŋŋa kʊ gʊaa b'a zɔ lʊ ma y.»
Bɩ, kʊ jaandarɛ n a ga m bɩ, gʊaa biyəə a ga m an bɩr a mɩŋŋa lʊ m, lʊ biyəə n bɩr a mɩŋŋa zim m.
Bɩ, gʊaa yar b'a ga m an hɔ k'a lʊ b'a ga m bɩ ba a lʊ bɩ m, lʊ bɩ maam sɔ, a a ga m an hɔ k'a zim b'a ga m bɩ ba a zim bɩ m.
Bala, lʊ bɩ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa mɛ b'ʊ y, a zim bɩ y'a so ʊ. Gʊaa bɩ bɛɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa mɛ b'ʊ sɔ y, a lʊ bɩ y'a so ʊ.

A b'a gu kʊ ma y, k'a maam kʊ awɔɔ ma, k'a zɛkʊra da jɩm ʊ dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ, k'a a da ma a toore yɩ a yaa da gʊta, bɩ, a b'a to dɔmɩm k'awɔɔ a zɛkʊra da jɩm ʊ bɩ n maasɩrɛ ba y. K'a a ya, a a bɔ a bɩr kan kʊ kɩ, kʊ m bɛɛ m awɔɔ bɩ zɛm b'a da ma a bʊr a ma y, bɩ Sʊtaana yom bɩ ma an awɔɔ makra ba k'awɔɔ n a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ naa, lɛ bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ y, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ a da ma, a naa ba.
Kʊ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, kʊ gʊaa haay do m mɔɔ m, bɩ, Woso gan wʊ gʊaa biyəə ma a hʊnhɔ, a a ka gʊaa niŋŋə nɩ lʊ m, an a ka gʊaa vanta n'a dam ma, an mɩsɩrbaa ba bazabaa nɔ ʊ.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lannɔ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ m, kan zonno wɔɔ kɩ m, m ʊ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta a deem maam amba mɔɔ m.
Bɩ, kʊ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ bʊr a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, kʊ yaarɔ wɔɔ n lannɔ ka cɛ ʊ, kʊ zonno wɔɔ n zino sa. Kʊ ŋ y'a ba ncɩnaaʊ a jɩra, kʊ lʊ gɛɛ zim yɩrɛ lɛtaama n a so ŋ ʊ, an bɩr bɩrɛ am sɛ hɔ bɩ m.
Lɛ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a cɩnta lannɔzannɔ wɔɔ m kan zinzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m bɩ ba n nɩ: «Lʊ b'a gʊ a zim ma y.» Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ lɛ bɩ cɩnta y, Zuuba m.
Kʊ lʊ a gʊ a zim ma, a b'a ya an zim sa y, k'a lɛ taa zim ma k'an a bɔ an aa kʊ ma kan a zim bɩ kɩ, an nyɩnta kan kɩ. Lʊ zim n a ga m sɔ an la a lʊ ra y.

Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan ŋ kɩ, Zuuba bɛɛ y, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: «Kʊ kristagʊaa ta lʊ m, bɩ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ m lʊ bɩ nɩ, lʊ bɩ m bɔkarɛ an yɛ k'a nyɩnta kan kɩ, a bɩ la lʊ bɩ ra y.»
A n ta ʊ sɔ bɩ, kʊ lʊ kʊ kristagʊaa m zim ta ʊ, bɩ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ y, an bɔkarɛ an yɛ k'a nyɩnta kan lʊ bɩ kɩ, lʊ bɩ b'a bɔ ʊ y.

Bala, zim kʊ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ b'a ba Woso hɔ a lʊ bɩ tɔ ma, lʊ kʊ sɩrakarɛzaa bɛɛ b'a ba Woso hɔ sɔ a zim bɩ tɔ ma. Kʊ ncɩnaaʊ bɛɛ, bɔ an nawʊm kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, ŋ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, dintim nyɩnɔ m Woso mɩm ʊ, an bɔkarɛ ŋ y'a ba wosogʊɔɔ.

Kʊ basɩrakarɛzaa bɩ lɛ taa k'a gʊ a mim bɩ ma, k'an a gʊ ma. Zim kʊ kristagʊaa m bɩ, gɛɛ lʊ kʊ kristagʊaa m bɩ, a so a mɩŋŋa ʊ mim naa do nɔ ʊ. A n bɔkarɛ, Woso k'a awɔɔ bir bɩ, awɔɔ bir a ʊ, k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba laafɩɩ nɔ ʊ.

Bala, lʊ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m kristagʊaa bɩ, a a da ma ɩbɩɩ n a ka ɩ zim bɩ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔm na? Gʊaa yar bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m kristagʊaa bɩ, a a da ma, ɩbɩɩ n a ka ɩ lʊ bɩ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, b'ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔm sɔ ra?

Mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m hɔ vanta naa do hɩ awɔɔ m sɔ, hɔ naa do mɔɔ n'a dɩndam kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ m lɛɛ haay ʊ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, gʊaa biyəə a ga m an mɩsɩrbaa niŋŋə kʊ Woso a ka ʊ dɔmɩm k'a a bir ma kan bɩ zu a ʊ bɩ ba.
Kʊ Woso gʊaa bir, bɩ ma bɩ a zaa gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, a b'a baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ bɩ nyaakʊm da y. Kʊ gʊaa vanta Woso a bir, bɩ ma bɩ, a zaa n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, a b'a ka ma k'a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ y.
Kʊ gʊaa gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, gɛɛ k'a n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ n bɩ y. Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure n hɔ.
Gʊaa biyəə n gɔɔta mɩsɩrbaa kʊ Woso a ka ʊ, a birle dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ m.
Kʊ nyɩnta ɩ ʊ lɔ, dɔmɩm kʊ Woso ɩ bir ʊ bɩ ma, ɩ bɩ ɩ hɔɔn kɔ a tɔ ma y, bɩ kʊ zaa ta ʊ k'ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ bɔ lɔmbaa bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'ɩ zaa bɩ do sa.
Bala, lɔ kʊ Woso a bir k'an bɩ zu Zuuba ʊ bɩ, a ba b'ʊ soamɩŋŋaʊzaa Zuuba nɔ ʊ. Bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʊzaa kʊ Woso a bir sɔ bɩ, a ba b'ʊ Krista lɔ.
Woso hɔ bɔ gʊta an awɔɔ bʊmbɔ m, a b'a ya a yɛ, a a ba gʊɔɔ lɔnnɔ y.
M danyɩnɔ, amba mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ bɩ, gʊaa biyəə a ga m, an gɔɔta an bɩr mɩsɩrbaa kʊ Woso a ka ʊ dɔmɩm k'a a bir ʊ bɩ bam Woso mɩm ʊ.
Kʊ bazanɔ wɔɔ mim nɩ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ naa, Zuuba bɛɛ y'a cɩnta a ʊ, mɔɔ n a hɩ y, m hɔɔndarɛ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ, bɩ Zuuba barka ma bɩ, gʊaa kʊ n n'a dam ma, n n a mim si sɩra bɩ m mɔɔ m.
Mɔɔ yɩ m hɔɔn dam mɔɔ ʊ, her-her dɔmɩm naa kɔrɛ minto bɩ, a mɩŋŋa kʊ baza n gɔɔta maam.
K'ɩ ɩ jaan m sɔ, ɩbɩɩ ka ma k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ʊ y, k'ɩ ba jaan m, ɩbɩɩ ka ma k'ɩ jaan zɛ y.

Bɩ, k'ɩ ɩ jaan bɩ sa, mimbʊnyaa bɛɛ ɩ ba y, kʊ nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ a jaan sa sɔ, an mimbʊnyaa ba sɔ y. Bɩ, kʊ m a hɩ a m, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lannɔ ka cɛ ʊ, kan nyɩmbɔnnɔ kʊ ŋ zino sa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩrɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ gʊta, mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n fɩr bɩ do yɩ y, bɩ minto m mɔɔ nɩ meerbaa naa do bam.
M danyɩnɔ, kʊ m a hɩ a m denter, dɔmɩm n gɔɔta wɔɔ m gʊta y. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, an a sa naa ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ n a mɩsɩrbaa ba ɩ ʊ, ŋ ba lannɔ nɩ y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyi kam nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʊ, ŋ heer n a zar y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a heer nyɔɔm nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʊ, ŋ heer n nyɔɔ y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ sim nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʊ, ŋ ba hɔsɩ nɩ y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ durnya naa hɔ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, ɩ ʊ, ŋ bɩr a yɩrɛ y. Bala, durnya naa do k'a nɩ yɩm naa, cem an nawʊm naa.
Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ hɔɔn n bɩr kɔrɛ y. Gʊaa k'a n lʊ sa bɩ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam Zuuba hɔɔnhɔrɔ ma, an n'a kam ma kʊ Zuuba nɔ n yɩ a ra.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a lʊ n ta ʊ bɩ, a hɔɔn nɩ kɔm durnya minno ma, a ka a nawʊm ma k'a laarɛ nɔ n yɩ a ra,

a hɔɔn m hɩɩya-hɩɩya. Maam sɔ bɩ, lʊ k'a ba zim nɩ y, kan nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ k'a n zim sa kɩ, a hɔɔn ŋn'a dam Zuuba hɔɔnhɔrɔ ma. Ŋ n'a kam ma kʊ Woso n a so a ʊ jilli, a mɛ, kan a nyi kɩ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ lʊ k'a zim n ta ʊ bɩ, a hɔɔn an n'a dam durnya minno ma, a ka a nawʊm ma k'a zim nɔ n yɩ a ra.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan minto. M ka bɛɛ mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ m awɔɔ hɔɔn kɔ y. A ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ m hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ ba, k'a hɔɔn bɩ nyɩnta hɩɩya-hɩɩya y, k'a kʊsɩ Zuuba ma bala.
Kʊ gʊaa jaan ta ʊ, a hɔɔn nɩ gasʊŋ ʊ gʊta, b'a bɩr a da ra a mɩŋŋa ma y, an a hɔɔn da a ʊ, a yaa a zɔ ma an yɩ mim, a a da ma, an a jaan bɩ sa. K'a naa ba, a n mimbʊnyaa ba y, kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊ sa.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a a hɔɔn da, an hɔɔn bɔ ʊ a zim, bɩ pakra bɛɛ m kan kɩ, an a da a mɩŋŋa lɛtaama ma, an a cɩnta a heer ʊ a zim, a ʊ, a bɩ lʊ sarɛ y, a a ba mɩŋŋa.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊaa k'a nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ sa bɩ, a a ba mɩŋŋa, bɩ gʊaa k'a n a sa bɩ, a a ba mɩŋŋa an lɛ da.
Kʊ lʊ zim ta ʊ, gɔɔta a nawʊm an bɩr gʊaa bɩ do lʊ tee…, gʊaa bɩ mɩsɩrbaa tɛkka ma. Bɩ, k'a zim bɩ bɩ ga, a a so a mɩŋŋa ʊ kɛɛrɛ, a a da ma, an bɔ an gʊaa vanta sa, bɩ kristagʊaa an n'a sam bala.
Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ, k'a gɔɔta a n a ya an zim sa, a heer nyɔɔrɛ an lɛ da, mɔɔ sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ, Woso Ɛspri ɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ sɔ, bɩ minto bɩ, k'a mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ si.
Ʊ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ sinno wɔɔ mim dɩnda kɛɛrɛ. Awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Ʊ haay ʊ ta hɔdɔrɛ m.» Denter m, bɩ hɔdɔrɛ ɩ gʊaa dam mɩŋŋabusure ma. A n bɔkarɛ ŋʊarɛ y'a kam gʊɔɔ sɩrakarɛ n'a dam la.
Kʊ gʊaa y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, a hɔ dɔ, k'an a dɔ a ʊ, a n hɔ dɔ amba a a ga m bɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa Woso ŋʊa, Woso bɩ zaa dɔ a gʊaa.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ ʊ ga m ʊ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sim sʊ gɛɛ? Wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, wosobaawɔm deem taan… ba ʊ an mɩsɩr durnya ʊ y, bɩ Woso vanta ba ʊ, kʊ Woso k'an ta ʊ deem bɩ bɛɛ y.
Bala, baa kʊ gʊɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ niŋŋoo kʊ ŋ nɩ brama gɛɛ tara ʊ birm wosoro, ŋnɩ ŋ ba denter sɔ wosoro kan zuubɔɔ kɩ,

a bɩ ncɩnaaʊ wɔɔ zi y, wɔɔ n a dɔ bɩ, Woso deem taan…, Zɩ bɩ m, a to hɔ haay ʊ a mɩŋŋa zi, wɔɔ n ta ʊ a tɔ ma. Bɩ Zuuba bɩ deem sɔ, Yeezuu Krista m, a mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m hɔ haay woo… n ta ʊ, a tɔ ma m sɔ wɔɔ n ta ʊ.

Bɩ, kristagʊɔɔ haay bɛɛ naa dɔ y. Gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ mim ka wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩrɔ sinno wɔɔ m bɩ, ŋ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ ŋ sʊm, ŋn'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ka n nawʊm wosoro paan…rɔ ʊ. Naa minto bɩ, kʊ ŋ sɩrakarɛ paŋŋa ba ʊ bɩ, ŋ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, a kʊrɔ ma Woso mɩm ʊ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sinno wɔɔ sʊrɛ tɔ ma.
Wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ nɩ wɔɔ zɔm Woso ma y, kʊ wɔɔ n a bɩ, a b'a dam ma an wɔɔ ba laatʊ Woso ma y, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ sɔ a bɛɛ n n'a dam ma an wɔɔ zɔ Woso ma sɔ y.
Bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, awɔɔ ɩ soamɩŋŋaʊ m k'a a hɔɔnhɔ bɩ, b'a ba ka k'awɔɔ soamɩŋŋaʊ bɩ n a ka kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ba paŋŋa m cɩna Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ y.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ dɔ bɩ, kʊ gʊaa kʊ paŋŋawarzaa m Woso zuure nɔ ʊ b'ɩbɩɩ yɩ ɩ nɩ nyɩntam wosobaawɔm cɛ ʊ, ɩ n'a mannɩ sim sʊrɛ, naa y'a dam han denter la? A bɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ sim sʊm, bɩ n a heer kɔ ra?
Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ hɔ dɔ bɩ minto, paŋŋawarzaa n a dom Woso ma, b'ɩbɩɩ danyɩ m, Krista mɩŋŋa n ga a tɔ ma.
K'awɔɔ ɩ naa bam, a bʊnyaa awɔɔ n'a barɛ a danyɩnɔ paŋŋawarzannɔ wɔɔ m, an nɩ ŋ heer warm kʊ ma, bɩ mimbʊnyaa naa do ba awɔɔ nawʊm Krista m sɔ.
Naa minto bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ danyɩ y'a dom mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a bɩm tɔ ma, k'a maam mɔɔ bɩ n yarɛ m sim sʊ fɩɩga y, kʊ m danyɩ b'a do y.
Mɔɔ n m so m mɩŋŋa ʊ ra? Kristazibəəzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ m na? Mɔɔ n wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu yɩ m mɩm m na? Zi kʊ mɔɔ ba Zuuba nɔ ʊ, bɩ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m na?
Kan gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kɩ, kʊ kristazibəəzaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m. Bala, hɔ k'a n'a hɩnkam, a ʊ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ m, Zuuba nɔ ʊ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ m nɩ m gumə dɩndam, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mim kam mɔɔ ra rɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ bɩ ba n nɩ:
Mɔɔ n m ga m, kʊ gʊɔɔ m hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ ka m ʊ, m zibəə bɩ tɔ ma ra?
Mɔɔ n m ga m, m lʊ sɩrakər sa k'an bɩr kan mɔɔ kɩ, m zaakʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, amba kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ, Zuuba dannɔ wɔɔ kan Pɩyɛɛr kɩ n'a bam bɩ m na?
Gɛɛ, mɔɔ kan Barnabas kɩ, wɔɔ y'ʊ ga m ʊ minto kʊ zi ba, ʊ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ tʊr m na?

Awɔɔ ma cɩna, n ʊ, sʊrdaa tɩr a mɩŋŋa tʊr a zim k'a bɩr sʊrdaabaa bam na? Gɛɛ kʊ gʊaa dɩvɛn gɔ sɔɔn a ba zaa m k'a dɩvɛn gɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ ra? Gɛɛ hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor b'a lɛ m k'a hɔbɩsɩrɔ k'a nɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyonhi mi ra?
A b'a hɔɔn da a ʊ, yo mɔɔ nawʊm hɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a bam tee… bɩ makrarɔ ma y. Bala, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa hɩm sɔ.
Bala, n y'a da lɛrɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, n ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ hɔ du der k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ lɛ ma y.» A hɩ awɔɔ ʊ, Woso bɩ kɔ a nawʊm dono ma,

gɛɛ meer naa do ba a ʊ wɔɔ tɔ ma ra? Sɩra m, wɔɔ minto m n nɩ hɔ naa do gʊrsɩra ba. Bala, a a ga m, kʊ gʊaa k'a nɩ dam wʊm bɩ kan gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ kɩ n bɩr a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʊ, a y'a hɔ yɩm hɔyaa bɩ jirle nɔ ʊ sɔ.
Amba danwur nɩ hɔyaa duum bɩ, wɔɔ lemim nyɩnta duu awɔɔ m. Amba gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔyaa zɔm bɩ, an n'a hɔjirle yɩm bɩ, a hɩ awɔɔ ʊ kʊ wɔɔ ɩ durnya hɔnyɩ yɩrɛ awɔɔ zi, a bʊnyaa ra?
K'awɔɔ ɩ nyasʊm gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ m, k'a a ga m bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ bɛɛ awɔɔ nɩ nyasʊm wɔɔ m an lɛ da ra?
Bɩ, kʊ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ ga m bɩ m bɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ n'ʊ ka ma k'awɔɔ m naa ba wɔɔ nɩ y. Yɛ wɔɔ ʊ kɔrɛ do haay ma, kʊ hɔsɩ b'a ta Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ m toore y.
Awɔɔ dɔ, a ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ gʊta bɩ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, hɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ bɩ nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Wosocɛ mannɩrɔ zi bam nɔ wɔɔ, mannɩhɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ hɔbɩrɛ.
Maam sɔ bɩ, Zuuba lɛ ka kʊ n nɩ nyasʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam nɔ wɔɔ m.

Bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ m ka ma kʊ gʊɔɔ n a ba m m ncɩnaaʊ y. Mɔɔ n ci naa do ba kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ ka m ʊ y. Kʊ mɔɔ ga, a jɩra mɔɔ m kʊ mɔɔ n hɔ yɛ, m zi kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam naa minto. Gɔsɩ bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʊrɛ naa do yɔm mɔɔ nɩ y.
Bala, kʊ mɔɔ m, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ bɩ, lɛbɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ hɔ bɛɛ y. Pakra m kʊ mɔɔ n a pa da, bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ n a pa da, kʊ kʊsɩ n m yɩ.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ hɔɔn bɔ ʊ m zim, kʊ m zi naa do ba, mɔɔ ba n tɩr m mɩm dam kʊ Woso m ganwʊ m ma. Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ da n y'a ʊ bɩ, zi kʊ n mɔɔ da ʊ bɩ mɔɔ n'a bam, mɔɔ bɩr dɔm hɔsɩ ma y.
Bɔ mɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a nɔ ʊ kɛɛrɛ? Lemim nyɩnta bɩ kʊ mɔɔ n n'a pa dam vam bɩ m mɔɔ hɔ. Mɔɔ bɩr m kam ma kʊ nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ m ga m ka m ʊ y.
Soamɩŋŋaʊzaa m mɔɔ m, gɔsɩ lɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, mɔɔ m mɩŋŋa ba gʊaa haay lɔ, kʊ m m da ma m a ka, kʊ gʊɔɔ gʊta n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ sɩra ka Krista ʊ nɔ ʊ.

Kʊ mɔɔ ta m nɩ zi bam zɩɩfʊrɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ mɩsɩrbaa sa, kʊ m a ka kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʊ. Baa kʊ mɔɔ bɩr zum Moyiisi lɛrɔ ʊ bɩ, m mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊm ɩ ʊ, zu mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ŋ ʊ. Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ zi bam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zure ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bireyaa ʊ, a ba mɔɔ nawʊm maam, kʊ m m da ma m bʊr ŋ nɩ Krista sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ.

Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, mɔɔ bɩr zum Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ y, kʊ m a ka kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʊ. A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ bɩr zum Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ y, mɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ ʊ, bala, mɔɔ ɩ zum Krista lɛ ʊ.

Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ paŋŋawarzannɔ m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, ɩ ʊ, paŋŋawarzaa m mɔɔ m, kʊ m a ka kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Krista ʊ. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ ŋkɔɔ m, bɩ mɔɔ m ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, kʊ m a ka, baa kʊ bɔ m, kʊ ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Naa woo… naa ba mɔɔ nawʊm lemim nyɩnta bɩ minto, kʊ m m hɔ yɩ sɔ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ ɩ bra sim brasire zaŋŋa ʊ, ŋ haay ɩ bra bɩ sim, bɩ deem taan… nɩ bra bɩ sire ganwʊrɛ yɩm. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a bra bɩ si mɩŋŋa k'a a ganwʊrɛ yɩ.
Brasinno haay y'a mɛ tʊntɔm gʊta, k'a a da ma a yɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa, a ganwʊrɛ yɩ. Bɩ, ŋ ganwʊrɛ bɩ, hɔ m an n'a zarm. Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ tʊntɔ ʊ, wɔɔ ganwʊrɛ bɩ nyɩntam hɔ k'a bɩr a zaar barɛ y.
Bɩ minto bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ bra bɩ sim, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr a sim yaarsɩ y. Mɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ, kan zoobər kɩ, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr zoo bɩ bam kan lɛɛ tu kɩ y.
Bɩ, m mɛ bɩ mɔɔ n'a tʊntɔm, m n'a dam bar ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ, bala, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m lemim nyɩnta pa da gʊɔɔ nɩ, kʊ Woso n bɔkarɛ an bɩ mɔɔ bɔ a jɛ m, m bɔ vam nɩ y.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mim k'a wɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ, wɔɔ yaabɔɔ yɩ, dɔmɩm kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ʊ poo ʊ ŋn'ɩ zum Moyiisi ʊ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Woso a ka warkʊ n dɔ ŋ ma jilli, ŋ bra higʊta ma sɔ,
a bɔ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, ŋ haay batɛm si warkʊ bɩ kan higʊta bɩ kɩ ʊ, k'a zu Moyiisi ʊ.
Ŋ haay hɔbɩrɛ k'a a to Woso zi bɩ bɩ.
Ŋ nɩ hi k'a a to Woso zi sɔ bɩ mi, bala, ci deem ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, ci bɩ do hi ŋ y'a mi. Ci bɩ, Woso y'a ka ŋ ʊ, an nɩ zure ŋ jɛ ʊ. Bɩ, ci bɩ do bɩ, Krista m.
Baa kan naa kɩ haay, ŋ gʊɔɔ nyɩnta ʊ gʊta Woso nɔ n yɩ ŋ la y, bala, ŋ gɩnga, n ŋ bir poo b'ʊ.
Ba minno nɔɔn duro ʊ, k'a hɔɔn dɩnda wɔɔ m, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ nyɩnta hɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ lɛtaama nɩ, amba ŋ nyɩntam bɩ nɩ y.
A bɩ yɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ daʊrɛzannɔ amba ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ nɩ y, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: «Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta k'a hɔ bɩ, k'a hɔ mi, ŋnɩ bɩ wuti k'a sar ba.»
Amba ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ jaan da bɩ, ʊ bɩ jaan da y. Bala, jaan bɩ darɛ a ka, ŋ gʊɔɔ bam tisi-tisi buhɩra a yaa n kaakʊ n gɩnga hindeem taan… nɔ ʊ.
Amba ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ Zuuba makra ba bɩ, ʊ bɩ Zuuba makra ba y. Bala, naa kʊ ŋ y'a ba b'a ka mɩnnɔ m sakʊ dɩnda ŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ gɩnga.
Amba ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kukur ba bɩ, ʊ bɩ kukur ba y. Bala, naa kʊ ŋ y'a ba bɩ, Woso malɛɛka k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ zɩnzɛ m bɩ, bʊr an bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ.
Minno nɔɔn duro wɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ, k'an nyɩnta makra, bɩ y'a ka n ŋ da ci ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ m hɔɔn yɩ ʊ ŋ tɔ ma, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa bam jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ.
Naa minto bɩ, gʊaa k'a n'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, a b'a barɛ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, k'an dundo a zi k'a b'a do y.
Makrarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, bɩ taalɛrazaa m Woso m, a b'a tore awɔɔ n makra yɩ k'an cem awɔɔ paŋŋa han y. Kʊ makra awɔɔ yɩ, a y'a karɛ awɔɔ m bɔ ʊ, k'a a da ma a bʊr la.
M danyɩnɔ, naa minto bɩ, k'a ba wosobaawɔnnɔ daʊrɛ ma laatʊ.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, hɔɔntaʊrɛzannɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a a hɔɔn da hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ ma a dɩga a.
