Ba wɔɔ tɩr ʊ so kʊ ma kʊ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʊ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ bɩ, wɔɔ tɩr barka hɔmire bɩ barka da ʊ, ʊ a dɔ ʊ a mi, barka hɔmire bɩ kʊ wɔɔ n'a mim bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ zɛkʊra yɩm kan Krista kɩ a ma bɩ tɔ ma. Kʊ wɔɔ bur bɩ jinjir ʊ a bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ zɛkʊra yɩm sɔ kan Krista kɩ a mɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʊ bur bɩ n deem bɩ, wɔɔ haay, mɛ deem zannɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, bala, bur deem bɩ wɔɔ ʊ da kʊ ʊ haay ʊ n'a bɩm.
K'a dɩga Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋ tɩr hɔɔ zɩnzɛ k'a mannɩ ba ŋ nɩ Woso ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro sim sʊm nɔ wɔɔ, a zɛ ŋ nawʊm kʊ ra kan Woso kɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ meerbaa bɩ jɩ n bɔ nɩ? A hɩ mɔɔ ʊ, hɔsɩ m wosobaawɔm kan a mannɩ sim kɩ n na?
Ayy…! Mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ m ʊ, basɩrakənno wɔɔ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ba ŋ nawʊm zinəro ma, a ka bɛɛ ŋ nawʊm Woso ʊ y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n'a zɛ kʊ ra kan zinəro kɩ y.
A n a ga m, k'awɔɔ n Zuuba hɔmire mi, k'a a ya, a zinəro hɔ mi y. A n a ga m sɔ, k'awɔɔ n Zuuba hɔbɩrɛ bɩ, k'a a ya, a zinəro hɔ bɩ y.
Gɛɛ, a ŋʊa wɔɔ nawʊm k'ʊ Zuuba da nɔmaa ma ra? A hɩ awɔɔ ʊ wɔɔ paŋŋa lɛ da m na?

Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ: «Zaa ta ʊ, k'ʊ hɔ haay ba.» Denter m, bɩ hɔ haay bɛɛ n'a dam wɔɔ han wa. Kʊ ŋ bɩ to ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ: «Zaa ta ʊ, k'ʊ hɔ haay ba», kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, hɔ haay bɛɛ n'a kam wɔɔ n ta lɛɛ Woso zuure nɔ ʊ wa.
Kʊ gʊaa biyəə n bɩr a kam hɔ k'a n'a dam a mim han bɩ ma, a b'a ka a mɩŋŋa daahan ma y.
Awɔɔ a da ma a hɔ haay k'a nɩ daasɩ ʊ si a bɩ, b'a bɩ laaka da a mim ma y, k'a b'a heer kɔ y.
Bala, Zuuba y'a so tara burə ʊ kan hɔ haay k'a n a nɔ ʊ kɩ ʊ.
Kʊ basɩrakakristaʊzaa awɔɔ bir a har ʊ k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ yɛ a birle ma k'a ta, k'a yaa lee ku, kʊ bɔ n y'a ka a ʊ, k'a bɩ bala, a bɩ laaka da ma y, a yaa n'a heer kɔ.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a m, a ʊ: «Sim naa do mannɩ sim m», a ba sʊ y, gʊaa k'a naa hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ minto, kʊ heer kɔrɛ bɩ yɩ ʊ y.
Bɩ, awɔɔ heer kɔrɛ bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma y, gʊaa k'a sim bɩ mim hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ heer mɔɔ n'a hɩm ma. Bala, a n a ga m, kʊ gʊaa vanta heer m mɔɔ dʊdɔ yar y.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ Woso barka darɛ m nɩ hɔ niŋŋə bɩrɛ, bɔ m gʊaa vanta nɩ mɔɔ tɔ zarlɛ an bɔkarɛ mɔɔ Woso barka da, m n'a bɩrɛ?
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ hɔ awɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ, gɛɛ hɔ awɔɔ n'a mire, baa kʊ bɔ awɔɔ n'a barɛ, k'a hɔ haay ba Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ minto.
A b'a ka, k'awɔɔ tɔ ma kʊ gʊɔɔ n a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ y. Kʊ zɩɩfʊ m, gɛɛ grɛkkɩ m, gɛɛ kristagʊɔɔ kʊ Woso y'a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, a b'a ka kʊ gɔsɩ n a do y.

Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa nɩ m yoŋ ʊ, kʊ m yɩ mɩŋŋa gʊaa haay ma, hɔ haay nɔ ʊ. A ba kʊ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr m kam m mɩŋŋa daahan ma y. M ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ gʊɔɔ cir gʊta n daahan yɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Amba mɔɔ nɩ Krista hɔbaa dɩndam bɩ, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa sɔ.
Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʊ, bala, awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʊ hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, an nɩ zum mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛrɔ haay ʊ, amba mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mim naa do dɔ: Yeezuu Krista m gʊaa yar haay lɛɛzaa, gʊaa yar m lʊ lɛɛzaa, Woso m Krista lɛɛzaa.
Gʊaa yar haay k'a hɔ ku a mim ma, k'a yaa da, gɛɛ an nɩ Woso lɛ sim k'a so ra bɩ, a lɛɛzaa kʊ Krista m bɩ an n'a bɔŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, lʊ niŋŋə k'a n hɔ ka a mim la, an bɔkarɛ a ʊ k'a yaa da, gɛɛ Woso lɛ an n'a sim k'a so ra bɩ, a lɛɛzaa an n'a gore bɔŋ ʊ, bala, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, a mim a a bɔ.
Kʊ lʊ lɛ baa k'a hɔ ka a mim la, k'a n'a minkə zɩnzɛra. Bɩ k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, nyannɩ m kʊ lʊ n a minkə zɩnzɛra gɛɛ an a mim bɔ, k'a maam, k'an hɔ ka a mim la.
Gʊaa yar bɩ n a ga m an hɔ ka a mim la y. Bala, Woso bɔkʊʊrɛzaa m, a m Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ sɔ, bɩ gʊaa yar lɛbɔʊrɛ m lʊ m.
Bala, gʊaa yar n a to lʊ mɛ ʊ y, lʊ n y'a bɔ gʊaa yar mɛ ʊ.
Bɩ, Woso n gʊaa yar da lʊ tɔ ma y, lʊ a a da gʊaa yar tɔ ma.
Naa minto nɩ, lʊ n a ga m, an hɔ ka a mim la k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a zim n'a lɛɛzaa, malɛɛkarɔ tɔ ma.
Kan naa kɩ haay, gʊaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ a ʊ, lʊ zibəə ba gʊaa yar ma y, b'a b'a dam ma sɔ an a hɩ a ʊ, gʊaa yar zibəə ba lʊ ma, Zuuba mɩm ʊ y.
Bala, k'a nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lʊ bɔ n y'a ʊ gʊaa mɛ ʊ bɩ, lʊ nɩ gʊaa yɩm. Bɩ naa haay a to a ʊ Woso zi.
K'a hɔɔn da ma a zim a dɩga a, a a ga m kʊ lʊ n yaa da Woso m b'a n hɔ ka a mim la ra?
Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, nyannɩ m kʊ gʊaa yar minkə n bɩr jintə ra? Gʊaa woo… naa dɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ kʊ lʊ minkə jintə bɩ n a lɛbɔʊrɛ, bala, minkə jintə bɩ ka n y'a ʊ lʊ ʊ, k'a mim bɩ gɔɔta vam y.
Kʊ gʊaa a ʊ, k'a bɩsɩ ka hɔdɩndarɛ naa do ma, k'an a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ kan kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n minkə hɔ vanta m kʊ yɩnnɩbayɩ naa do bɛɛ y.
Hɔ k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʊ y. Bala, k'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʊ ma k'a yaa da Woso m, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bam sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ bɩr a darɛ awɔɔ han y, awɔɔ bɔ a nawʊrɛ a jɛ m.
Mim lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ, n y'a hɩ mɔɔ m, n ʊ, k'awɔɔ a so kʊ ma, b'awɔɔ a gʊngʊ a hʊnhɔ. Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʊ, a a da ma an yɩ sɩra.
Denter sɔ, k'awɔɔ a gʊngʊ a hʊnhɔ, bɩ n n'a kam n nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ taalɛrazannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ a so kʊ ma, Zuuba hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩrɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Bala, sokʊma bɩ wakatɩ ʊ, gʊaa biyəə nɩ larɛ a mɩŋŋa hɔbɩrɛ ra, maam bɩ, nɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ zɛrɛ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n bɔkarɛ ŋn'ɩ bɛɛ mire an nɩ ŋ zɛm.

Awɔɔ har ba ʊ, awɔɔ nɩ hɔ bɩŋ ʊ, a nɩ hɔ miŋ ʊ ra? Gɛɛ a hɩ awɔɔ ʊ, k'a Krista gʊɔɔ wɔɔ gore bɔ ʊ, k'a a ya a nyannɩ da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ba hɔsɩ m nɔ wɔɔ ma ra? Bɔ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʊ ra? Fɩɩgaa! Mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʊ naa nɔ ʊ y.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ nyɩnta m a dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, a ma mɔɔ ʊ Zuuba Yeezuu zi: Gum niŋŋə kʊ n'a bam k'a Zuuba nyasʊ a ka kʊ n a zɛ bɩ, gunuu ʊ bɩ do ʊ, a mɩŋŋa bur sa,
an barka da Woso m, an bɔkarɛ an a zɩnzɛ an a jinjir, an a hɩ a ʊ: «Naa do naa, mɔɔ mɛ m, mɔɔ n a ka awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a tɩr naa ba, a mɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.»
Hɔbɩrɛ bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, a a ba maam sɔ hɔmire bɩ m, an a hɩ a ʊ: «Hɔmire naa do gʊaasɩbabaa daa k'an ta ʊ kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ma minto bɩ m. K'awɔɔ bʊr an nɩ hɔmire bɩ mim, k'a tɩr a ba, a mɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.»
Bala, wakatɩ haay, k'awɔɔ nɩ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʊ bur bɩ bɩŋ ʊ, an nɩ tɔdaanɔʊ hɔmire bɩ mim bɩ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa zɛ awɔɔ n'a pa darɛ, k'an tolle ba an bʊr.
Bɩ y'a ka gʊaa k'a nɩ Zuuba tɔdaanɔʊ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩm, gɛɛ an n'a hɔmire bɩ mim, an Zuuba bɔ ʊ bɩ, mim ɩ kan kɩ, bala, a n dɩga Zuuba mɛ bɩ kan a ma bɩ kɩ ma, hɔsɩ y.
Gʊaa biyəə a ga m, an a mɩŋŋa lar an dɩga a k'a jɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa gɛ, k'an a dɔ an bur bɩ bɩ, an hɔmire bɩ mi.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa bur bɩ bɩ, an hɔmire bɩ mi, b'a n a hɔɔn da mɩŋŋa an a dɔ a ʊ, Zuuba mɛ nɩ, a bɩ k'a ʊ, an a mi bɩ, a mɩŋŋa dʊdɔ yarlɛ a ka ma bɩ.
Naa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ barla gʊɔɔ n ta ʊ gʊta, ŋ bɩ laafɩɩ y, gɔsɩnnɔ n a ba yir, nɔɔn n gɩnga.
Kʊ wɔɔ y'ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ m heer daasɩrɛ ʊ zim, Woso bɩ wɔɔ dʊdɔ karɛ y.
Bɩ kʊ Woso wɔɔ dʊdɔ ka, a hɩ a ʊ, k'awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ nyɩnta durnya gʊɔɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yar, an ŋ da kɔrɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ a so kʊ ma k'a Zuuba tɔdaanɔʊ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, k'a dɔ kʊ ma.
Kʊ nɔ ɩ gʊaa zɛm, k'an lɛɛ ka an hɔ bɩ a har ʊ, k'a b'a so kʊ ma, a a ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ dʊdɔyarlɛ ma y.
Kʊ minno kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ bʊr, mɔɔ brɔɔ bɔm kʊ zi.
M danyɩnɔ, kʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n hɔ k'an ta a nɔ ʊ bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ basɩrakənno biisi bɩ, wosobaawɔnnɔ daʊrɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ n a da ma an n'a bɔrɛ ŋ ʊ y.

Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ mɩŋŋa, a ʊ, kʊ Woso Ɛspri a so gʊaa ʊ, a zaa nɩ meer bam, a zaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ ɩ kan Yeezuu kɩ y.» Bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma sɔ an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Zuuba m Yeezuu m,» kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɛɛ y'a ka y.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ y'a hʊnhɔ, bɩ Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ nɩ ŋ karɛ.
Zibəəro y'a hʊnhɔ n ta ʊ Zuuba nɩ gʊɔɔ darɛ ŋ barɛ ʊ, bɩ Zuuba deem-deem bɩ zibəə m.
Zibəəro zaarɔ y'a hʊnhɔ ta ʊ, bɩ Woso deem-deem bɩ n'a kam gʊɔɔ n'a dam zibəəro wɔɔ duro barɛ ma.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ zi bam kan gʊaa biyəə kɩ ganwʊrɛrɔ y'a hʊnhɔ m, bɩ naa ba an nawʊm k'a a da gʊɔɔ haay han.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ mindɔrɛ meerbaa ganwʊrɛ kam gʊaa deem ʊ. A n hɔdɔrɛ meerbaa ganwʊrɛ ka gʊaa vanta ʊ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ do ɩ sɩrakarɛ ganwʊrɛ kam gʊaa ʊ, a ɩ waarɛ ganwʊrɛrɔ kam gʊaa vanta ʊ sɔ.

A ɩ hoserlo barɛ ganwʊrɛ kam gʊaa vanta ʊ, an nɩ Wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʊrɛ kam gʊaa vanta ʊ sɔ. A ɩ ɛsprirɔ dɔ n a bɔ kʊ zi ganwʊrɛ kam gʊaa vanta ʊ, an nɩ leminno y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ kam gʊaa vanta ʊ, a ɩ leminno wɔɔ duro wusigəre ganwʊrɛ kam gʊaa vanta ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, naa woo… naa, Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ zibəə m, an nɩ ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ jinjirm gʊaa biyəə m, a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ gʊaa mɛ deem, an bɔkarɛ a vəŋŋəro m hɔka, bɩ, gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋəro k'a bɩ to an hɔka naa, mɛ deem m bala, Krista maam sɔ.

Bala, wɔɔ haay woo… naa, Zuuba batɛm ka wɔɔ ʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'ʊ yɩ mɛ deem zannɔ, kʊ zɩɩfʊ m wɔɔ m, gɛɛ do vantɔɔ m wɔɔ m, kʊ lɔnnɔ wɔɔ m, gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʊzannɔ m wɔɔ m, ʊ ʊ ba deem, Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem-deem bɩ n y'a ka wɔɔ ʊ, an wɔɔ han an bra wɔɔ ra.
Gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋə bɩ deem y, ŋ hɔka.
Kʊ gʊaa gam a hɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ wɔ bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ ba mɛ bɩ barla y,» naa do a da ma an a ka, a bɩ nyɩntam mɛ bɩ barla dɔ ra?
Kʊ gʊaa tʊr a hɩ a ʊ: «Kʊ mɩnyaa bɛɛ m mɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ ba mɛ bɩ barla y,» naa a da ma an a ka a bɩ nyɩntam mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə dɔ ra?
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, gʊaa mɛ bɩ jilli, mɩnyaa nɩ, gʊaa tʊr nyɩntam lɛɛ ka ra ʊ? Kʊ gʊaa mɛ bɩ jilli, tʊr nɩ, gʊaa meeyaa nyɩntam lɛɛ ka ra ʊ?
Bɩ sɩra nɔ ʊ, Woso gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋəro haay cɩncɩnta a bɩncɛ ʊ, a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Kʊ gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ jilli, vəŋŋə deem nɩ, mɛ bɩ nyɩntam ka?
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ hɔka bɩ mɛ deem m.
Gʊaa mɩnyaa b'a dam ma an a hɩ a wɔ m a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ zibəə ba mɔɔ ma y.» Gʊaa mim b'a dam ma an a hɩ a gannɔ m sɔ a ʊ: «Awɔɔ zibəə ba mɔɔ ma y.»
A n lɛ da bɩ, gʊaa mɛ vəŋŋəro k'ɩ ʊ, ŋ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ fɩɩgaa rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ zibəə n ta ʊ gʊta karɛ.
Wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro kʊ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma ɩ ʊ, ŋ bɩ wɩsɩ rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyasʊrɛ ŋ nɩ gʊta, niŋŋoo k'ɩ ʊ nyannɩ bɩncɛrɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ nyasʊrɛ ŋ nɩ paan….
Wɔɔ mɛ vəŋŋəro kʊ ŋ nɩ ta daʊrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ bɩr a kam nyasʊrɛ bɩ do ma y. Woso k'a gʊaa vəŋŋəro da bɩ, a zi bɩ ba a ʊ, kʊ vəŋŋəro kʊ ŋ ba daʊrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ n daʊrɛ yɩ gʊta.
A ba a ʊ maam, kʊ gʊngʊrɛ bɩ nyɩnta mɛ b'ʊ y, bɩ kʊ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ n bɩr nyasʊm kʊ m.
Kʊ mɛ vəŋŋə deem ɩ fɩr yɩm, vəŋŋəro mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ fɩr yɩm kan kɩ. Kʊ vəŋŋə deem daʊrɛ yɩ, vəŋŋəro mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ haay y'a heer nyɔɔm kan kɩ sɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ, Krista mɛ n'awɔɔ m, a mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə n'awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə m, gʊaa biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ.

Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, Woso n gʊɔɔ bɔ ʊ an zibəə ka ŋ ʊ, kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla. Lɛɛkarɛ ma bɩ, kristazibəəzannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. A hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. A kaakʊ hɔ bɩ, hɔdɩndagʊɔɔnzannɔ a ŋ cɩnta. Bɩ jɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hoserlo barɛ ganwʊrɛ m nɔ wɔɔ m, kan yaabarɔ waarɛ ganwʊrɛrɔ zannɔ kɩ, kan daahanzannɔ kɩ, kan lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ leminno y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm zannɔ kɩ.
K'awɔɔ dɩga a naa, awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, ŋ woo… bɛɛ m kristazibəəzannɔ ra? Ŋ woo… bɛɛ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ sɔ y. Ŋ woo… bɛɛ m hɔdɩndagʊɔɔnzannɔ y. Ŋ woo… bɛɛ nɩ hoserlo barɛ y.
Ŋ woo… bɛɛ nɩ yaabarɔ waarɛ ganwʊrɛrɔ nɩ y. Ŋ woo… bɛɛ nɩ leminno y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ y. Ŋ woo… bɛɛ nɩ leminno wɔɔ wusigəre y.
K'a ka ganwʊrɛrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa an lɛ da rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan a heer kɩ haay.
Bɩ, kʊ m zaa k'an mɩŋŋa an cem haay bɩ hɩnka a m kɛɛrɛ.
Baa kʊ mɔɔ ɩ leminno haay hɩm,
gʊɔɔ hɔ kan malɛɛkarɔ hɔ kɩ,
kʊ mɔɔ ba ŋʊarɛ m, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɔ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ kan lɔmbɩr k'a nyi nɩ bɔm kɩ,
gɛɛ bɔ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ, kan sɩsaka k'a nyi nɩ bɔm kɩ.
A a da ma mɔɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʊrɛ yɩ,
m bɩr hɔdɔrɛ m haay, m hɔ k'a a nyaakʊm da haay dɔ,
a a da ma mɔɔ m bɩr sɩrakarɛ m haay,
m m dam ma m n'a kam ciro n'a gaarɛ a bɩncɛrɔ ʊ,
lɛ meerbaa tɔkkɛ ma,
kʊ mɔɔ ba ŋʊarɛ m hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ y.
Kʊ mɔɔ bɩ to m m hɔnyɩ haay jir cicirzannɔ m,
m m da ma sɔ m yɛ fɩr ma, n m da sɛ rɛ,
kʊ mɔɔ ba ŋʊarɛ m, naa woo… naa, vam m.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ ŋʊarɛ m, a ɩ bʊrlɛ a ma,
a ɩ hɔ mɩŋŋa bam gʊɔɔ m,
a bɩr jɩm barɛ y,
a bɩr a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa ʊ y,
a bɩr a mɩŋŋa busure y.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ ŋʊarɛ m, a bɩr zi daŋŋada barɛ y,
a bɩr a karɛ a mɩŋŋa daahan ma y,
a nɔ bɩr maŋ ʊ zɔɔ-zɔɔ y,
a bɩr mim cɩntarɛ a heer ʊ kan gʊaa kɩ y,
kʊ gʊaa ɩ ŋʊarɛ m,
a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm zibʊnyaa barɛ ma y,
a heer a n'a nyɔɔm sɩra ma.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ ŋʊarɛ m,
a ɩ sugur bam hɔ haay nɔ ʊ,
a ɩ sɩra kam dɔmɩm haay,
a ɩ taaheerlɛ m tee…,
a ɩ yɛm kɔrɛ do haay ma.
Ŋʊarɛ nyarɛ ba ʊ y.
Wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaarɔ ganwʊrɛ nyarɛ,
leminno y'a hʊnhɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɩrɛ nyarɛ,
hɔdɔrɛ nyam sɔ.
Bala, wɔɔ n hɔ haay dɔ y,
wosolɛsinnɩsora zibəə kʊ wɔɔ n'a bam sɔ bɩ,
wɔɔ bɩr a barɛ an n'a gam kʊ ʊ haay y.
Bɩ, kʊ hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa paan… bɩ bɩ bʊr,
hɔ k'a jirə n ta ʊ bɩ nyarɛ.
Nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ nyɩ bɩ, nyɩnzɛɛmbaa meer mɔɔ n'a barɛ, m nɩ m hɔɔn darɛ am nyɩ hɔ bɩ m, m nɩ nyɩbaa hɔɔn m.
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ bɩ m ba gʊaa burgu bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩbaa zibəəro wɔɔ to.
Her-her naa, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, dɩga wɔɔ nawʊm jɛtɩga ʊ,
hɔ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ dɩgam ma bɩ bɩr yɩm fasɩ y,
bɩ dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm wɔɔ m b'a yɩm garga ra haay.
Her-her naa, mɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ jirə ta ʊ, bɩ hinni bɩ do ʊ, mɔɔ hɔ haay dɔm, amba Woso mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa bɩ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, hɔɔ kaakʊrɔ nɔɔn duro n ta ʊ, bɩ ŋ nyarɛ ba ʊ y:
Sɩrakarɛ m, bɩ taaheerlɛ m kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ,
bɩ ŋʊarɛ ɩ lɛ da ŋ nɩ haay.
K'a a ka kʊ ŋʊarɛ ma paan…, a a ka *Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ kan a heer kɩ haay, an lɛ da bɩ, k'a a ka wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʊrɛ bɩ ma.

Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm bɩ, a hɩ bɛɛ a nawʊm kan gʊɔɔ kɩ y, meer bɩ ba a nawʊm kan Woso kɩ. Gɔsɩ bɩr hɔ k'a n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y, hɔɔ kʊ n y'a nyaakʊm da, an nɩ ŋ hɩm Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, meer bɩ ba a nawʊm kan gʊɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ ŋ paŋŋa dam la, an nɩ ŋ heer yom, an nɩ ŋ heer wʊtam.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm bɩ, a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa an n'a dam la, bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, sokʊmagʊɔɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ paŋŋa dam la.

Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ haay n bɩr lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm, bɩ mɔɔ n a ŋʊa an lɛ da bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la, bɩ m jɩra. Gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la bɩ, a lɛ da gʊaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm bɩ m, k'a maam lemim bɩ wusigə a ʊ, sokʊmagʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a jɩ ma, an ŋ paŋŋa da ra.

M danyɩnɔ, k'a hɔɔn da a dɩga a. Kʊ mɔɔ bʊr awɔɔ zi, m nɩ leminno y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ, bɩ Woso n hɔ hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a jɩ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ n awɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ da ra y, bɩ mɔɔ n Woso lɛ si m so ra y, bɩ mɔɔ n hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y, ncɩnaaʊ bɩ leminno y'a hʊnhɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ nyɔɔdʊ y'awɔɔ ma ka?
A do m naa sɔ kan sarbarɛ mɔdrɔ kɩ. Kɔnnɩ gɛɛ hir, kʊ ŋ nyi bɩr bɔm mɩŋŋa, gʊaa y'a bam lɔ k'a a tʊr ka kɔnnɩ bɩ, gɛɛ hir bɩ ma?
Kʊ n huure hɛ kʊ gʊɔɔ n bɔ ŋnɩ ta yar ma, kʊ huure bɩ nyi bɩr bɔm zore, gʊɔɔ y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a bir n nawʊm yarbarɛ ma, k'a banka a ta?
A do m bɩ sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ. K'awɔɔ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩ, bɩ lemim bɩ do jɩ bɩr marɛ y, ŋ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ dɔ? A bɔ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, meer awɔɔ n'a bam vam.
Leminno ɩ durnya naa ʊ gʊta ŋn'a hʊnhɔ, bɩ ŋ woo… naa, ŋ jɩ ta ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ bɩr lemim kʊ gʊaa n'a hɩm kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ marɛ, a zaa ɩ dɩgam mɔɔ ma saana kan a kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ a zaa ma saana sɔ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ ŋʊam paan… bɩ, k'a ka ganwʊrɛrɔ kʊ ŋ n'a kam kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ n ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n ŋ yɩ gʊta.
Bɩ y'a ka, gʊaa k'a nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm b'a ga m, an a yɛ Woso han, kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n leminno wɔɔ wusigəre ganwʊrɛ ka a ʊ sɔ.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m lemim vanta m, mɔɔ heer ɩ yaa bɩ darɛ nɔ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ bɩr hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ naa, bɔ mɔɔ n n'a barɛ? Mɔɔ yaa dam lemim y'a hʊnhɔ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ yaa dam lemim kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a mam bɩ m sɔ. Mɔɔ laa lɔm lemim y'a hʊnhɔ bɩ m, bɩ mɔɔ laa lɔm lemim kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a mam bɩ m sɔ.

Bala, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka lemim y'a hʊnhɔ nɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɩntam sokʊmagʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ naa nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ y'a bam lɔ k'a hɩ a ʊ «Amina» ɩ barka yaa bɩ darɛ ma? Bala, ŋ bɩr hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm bɩ jɩ marɛ y.
A a da ma, ɩbɩɩ barka yaa bɩ darɛ bɩ m bɩr mɩŋŋa gʊta, b'a bɩr a dam gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ y, kʊ ŋ bɩr hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a hɩm bɩ mam bɩ tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ ɩ Woso barka dam, kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ leminno y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm gʊta, an cem awɔɔ haay han bɩ minto.
Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ ta m nɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma barla, kʊ mɔɔ meerbaanyɩ ba soor gʊɔɔ n a ma an a da ŋ han, a jɩra kʊ mɔɔ n meer ba yɔɔgʊ lemim vanta m.
M danyɩnɔ, a bɩ tɩr a hɔɔn da am nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, k'a tɩr a hɔɔn da am gʊɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ bɩ m. Bɩ kʊ mimbʊnyaa bɩncɛ nɩ, k'a yɩ am nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ hɔ bɩ m.
N y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʊ, n ʊ:
Do k'a nɩ lemim vanta hɩm mɔɔ n'a sarɛ,
m meer ba kan Israyɛl do bɩ kɩ, saanɔɔ mɔɔ nɩ ŋ sarɛ,
m meer ba kan ŋ kɩ, baa kan naa kɩ haay ŋ b'a tʊr kam mɔɔ ma y.

Naa minto bɩ, leminno y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ bɩ, makra a n'a hɩnkam basɩrakənno wɔɔ m, a bɩr hɔsɩ hɩnkam sɩrakənno wɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ, wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʊrɛ bɩ, makra a n'a hɩnkam sɩrakənno wɔɔ m, b'a bɩr hɔsɩ hɩnkam basɩrakənno wɔɔ nɩ y.
K'awɔɔ a so kʊ ma haay, a a da kʊ ʊ haay an nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔsɩ dɔ a nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ gɛɛ basɩrakənno bɩ gasʊ awɔɔ zi, ŋ b'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, hɔɔzannɔ n'awɔɔ m na?

Bɩ k'awɔɔ haay ɩ Woso lɛ sire an nɩ som la, kʊ basɩrakər, gɛɛ gʊaa k'a n hɔsɩ dɔ naa nɔ ʊ bɩ, gasʊ awɔɔ zi, a y'a dɔrɛ a heer ʊ a ʊ, a y'a bʊnyaa bam, hɔ k'a n'a mam bɩ y'a karɛ an a dɔ a ʊ, a kʊrɔ ma, gʊaa haay n'a dʊdɔ yarm.
Hɔ k'a n'a heer ʊ haay bɔm garga ra, bɩ n a ka an kukurə zɛ Woso taa, an Woso da ʊ, an kasɛtɩ ka, a ʊ, Woso y'awɔɔ bire ʊ, denter.

Bɔ y'a ga barɛ m kɛɛrɛ? K'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʊ ma, kʊ gʊaa ʊ k'a laa lɔ, gʊaa vanta k'a hɔ dɩnda, Woso n hɔ hɩnka gʊaa vanta m k'a n'a hɩ, kʊ gʊaa vanta ɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ m sɔ, deem nɩ lemim bɩ wusigəre nɩ, naa woo… naa, a a ga m an ba sokʊmagʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay sɩrakarɛ talɛɛ tɔ ma.
K'awɔɔ tɩr meer ba lemim y'a hʊnhɔ nɩ, kʊ gʊaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʊ bala n meer bɩ ba lemim y'a hʊnhɔ bɩ m, deem-deem, kʊ gʊaa deem n a si an bɩr a wusigəre.
Kʊ gʊaa ba ʊ an nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ bɩ wusigəm sokʊma bɩ nɔ ʊ, kʊ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩrɛ zannɔ wɔɔ n ze pi, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ a heer ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr meer bam kan Woso kɩ.
Kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʊrɛ bɩ nɩ, kʊ gʊaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʊ m Woso lɛ bɩ si, ŋnɩ so ra. Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ n a tʊr ka ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ dɩga a Woso meerbaarɔ m denter gɛ.
Kʊ Woso hɔ hɩnka gʊaa vanta m gʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla k'a n'a hɩ, kʊ gʊaa k'a lɛɛ ka an nɩ meer bam bɩ n ze pi, kʊ bɩ n a hɔ bɩ hɩ.
Awɔɔ a da ma a Woso lɛ si a so ra haay, bɩ k'a bɩr a bam deem-deem, kʊ gʊaa haay m daahan yɩ a nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ paŋŋa yɩ ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a da ma, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma,
amba kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ haay n'a bam bɩ m. Bala, Woso lɛ baa warkʊma ma y, hɔ haay n ba laafɩɩ an a ga kʊ ʊ bɩ an n'a ŋʊam.
K'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʊ ma, kʊ lannɔ wɔɔ n ze pi, ŋ ba lɛ m k'a meer ba sokʊma nɔ ʊ y, ŋnɩ nyɩnta sɩɩ… ŋnɩ bɩr a tʊr kam amba Moyiisi lɛrɔ a hɩ bɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ lɛ taa k'a laaka da hɔ niŋŋə ma k'a jɩ dɔ, kʊ ŋ n'a to ŋn'aa laaka da a zino han har ʊ. A bɩ zore kʊ lʊ m meer ba sokʊma nɔ ʊ y.
A hɩ awɔɔ ʊ Woso lemim bɩ, a to a ʊ, awɔɔ zi ra? Gɛɛ, a gɩnga awɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ n ta m a minto ra?
Kʊ gʊaa y'a gɩngarɛ a ʊ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa n a mɩ, gɛɛ a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʊ, k'a n'a dɔ a ʊ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ gʊrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma naa, Zuuba mɩŋŋa lɛ m.
Kʊ gʊaa a ʊ, a bɩ yɛm hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ naa ma, k'a dɔ a ʊ, Woso n a zaa dɔ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa barɛ zaa y.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, k'a ka wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ganwʊrɛ bɩ ma kan a heer kɩ haay, b'a b'a ta gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lemim y'a hʊnhɔ hɩm nɔ wɔɔ m toore y.
Bɩ k'a ka ma, kʊ hɔ haay woo… n ba an a ga kʊ ʊ, warkʊma bɩ yɩ ʊ y.
M danyɩnɔ, lemim nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n a si, a gɔɔta a sɩra ka ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ bɩ, mɔɔ n'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʊ.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do n'awɔɔ bʊmbɔm, k'awɔɔ nyasʊm amba mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ m. Bɩ k'awɔɔ n nyasʊm mɩŋŋa, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka bɩ bɔm vam.
Lɛɛ mɔɔ ka m hɔ kʊ n y'a dɩnda mɔɔ m bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Krista ga wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma, amba n y'a da Wosoci ʊ bɩ m.
N y'a bir, an a mɩm bɔ ʊ a dɔmɩm kaakʊ hinni ʊ, amba Wosoci a hɩ bɩ m.
A a hɩnka Sefas m, bɩ jɛ ʊ an a hɩnka bueerehɩɩyɔɔ k'a ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Dɔmɩm vanta ʊ, an a hɩnka wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kristagʊɔɔ bam zɔrsoor m lɛ deem, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro gɔsɩnnɔ gɩnga, gʊta gɔɔta ŋnɩ mɩsɩr.
Naa jɛ ʊ, a a hɩnka Zakkɩ m, an b'a hɩnka kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ m haay.
Nawɔnnɔ woo… jɛ ʊ, an b'a a hɩnka mɔɔ m sɔ, mɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan nyɩ k'a yɩ b'a dɔmɩm n a ku bɩ kɩ bɩ.
Bala, mɔɔ m kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ haay poore, mɔɔ n m ga m, kʊ n nɩ m bir kristazibəəzaa y, bala, mɔɔ fɩr ka Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊma ma.
Bɩ, m ba kʊ mɔɔ ʊ gʊaa niŋŋə her naa, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, b'a barka bɩ n bɔ vam mɔɔ gʊr zi y. Bɩ mɔɔ zi ba, m lɛ da ŋ haay ra, bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa bɛɛ y, Woso barka k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ, gɛɛ zibəəzannɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ, bɩ bɛɛ pakra ba y. Lemim deem wɔɔ n'a pa dam, bɩ lemim bɩ do awɔɔ sɩra ka ʊ bɩ.
Wɔɔ y'a pa dam ʊ ʊ, Krista a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, b'a a ba lɔ awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, gəəno b'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ?
Kʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ, k'a maam, Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʊ wa.
Bɩ k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʊ, wɔɔ pa bɩ darɛ jɩ ba ʊ wa. B'awɔɔ sɩra bɩ karɛ vam sɔ wa.
Bɩ, kʊ ncɩnaaʊ m, ŋʊaar kasɛtɩ zannɔ m wɔɔ m Woso mim bɩ nɔ ʊ. Bala, wɔɔ hɩ ʊ ʊ, Woso Krista mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, bɩ kʊ gʊɔɔ bɩr a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, k'a maam Woso n Krista mɩm bɔ ʊ y.
Kʊ gəəno bɩr a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, k'a maam Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʊ y.
Bɩ kʊ Krista n a mɩm bɔ ʊ, sɩra awɔɔ ka nɩbɩr, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ tee….
Naa k'a hɩ sɔ a ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʊ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ ɩ nyaanlɛ nɔ ʊ.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, her mɩsɩrbaa naa daahan tɔ ma m bala wɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʊ, yaanda barɛ paan… zannɔ m wɔɔ m, an cem gʊɔɔ haay han.
B'a bɩ ncɩnaaʊ y, Krista a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ paan…. Lɛɛ a ka an a mɩm bɔ ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ n b'a mɩm bɔ ʊ sɔ.
Bala, gʊaa deem y'a ka zɛ n bʊr durnya ʊ, gʊaa deem tɔ ma m sɔ, gəəno n'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.
Adam minto y'a ka gʊɔɔ n ta ʊ, bɩ y'a ka gʊɔɔ nɩ gɩngam sɔ. Bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra kan Krista kɩ rɔ wɔɔ haay y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ, Krista tɔ ma sɔ.
Bɩ, mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ bɩncɛ ʊ, yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ: Krista m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ. K'a b'a bɔ an bʊr kɛɛrɛ, gʊɔɔ k'a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.

Naa jɛ ʊ, Yeezuu Krista zinəro wɔɔ kan a cinno kɩ paŋŋa zaar bam, a paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ durnya ʊ haay paŋŋa zaar bam. K'a ŋ paŋŋa zaar ba, bɩ jɛ ʊ, durnya nyarɛ, an bɔkarɛ an cirbəə kʊ Woso a ka ʊ bɩ da Zɩ Woso wɔ ʊ.
Bala, a a ga m, k'an a so cirbəə ʊ, kʊ Woso n tolle ba, an a ka an bʊr a jɩnnɔ ra, an tʊntɔ ŋ la.
Jɩm k'a nɩ gɔɔtam jɛ ʊ, n n'a zaar bam bɩ n zɛ m.
Bala, n y'a da Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: «Woso a ka hɔ woo… n'a gannɔ taa.»
Bɩ Wosoci bɩ k'a hɩ a ʊ, hɔ haay woo… y'a taa bɩ, a ba Woso mɩŋŋa burə ʊ wa, bala, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a ka an nɩ hɔ haay woo… burə ʊ.

Bɩ, kʊ Woso b'a ka Krista nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ, Krista mɩŋŋa k'a m Woso Nyɩ bɩ y'a mɩŋŋa zerm Woso taa, bala a y'a ka an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ. Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, Woso mɩŋŋa m bɩ nyɩntam hɔ haay soʊrezaa, gʊɔɔ haay burə ʊ.
Kʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ, bɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ batɛm sim gəəno tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ n'a barɛ? Kʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ denter, bɔ tɔ ma m ŋnɩ batɛm sire ŋ minto?
Bɩ bɔ m sɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, wɔɔ nɩ yɛm wɔɔ zibəə bɩ nɩ wɔɔ dam mim kʊsɩ lɛ ʊ?
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa, dɔmɩm biyəə mɔɔ ɩ zɛ lɛ ʊ. M danyɩnɔ, naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, kʊ mɔɔ heer nɩ nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ minto Zuuba Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.

Gʊɔɔ fɩr ka mɔɔ ma Efɛɛzɩ ʊ naa ʊ, ɩ ʊ poohɔɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, mɔɔ m zoo ba kan ŋ kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ. Kʊ naa ba mɔɔ ʊ durnya naa do hɔ yɩrɛ tɔ ma, a nyɔɔdʊ m bɔ nɩ? Kʊ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ, k'a maam k'a ba amba bɔɔr naa do a hɩ bɩ m: «Ʊ ʊ da hɔbɩrɛ bɩrɛ lɛ ʊ bala, k'ʊ bɩr bɛɛ mim bala, bala, booti m, ʊ gɩngam.»
A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, n ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ɩ kan zukuuro bʊnyaarɔ kɩ, a ba a nawʊm gʊaa bʊnyaa sɔ.»
K'a a bɔ hɔɔn daŋŋada k'awɔɔ n ta m b'ʊ, k'a mimbʊnyaabarɛ to fasɩ. Awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n Woso dɔ cɩna y, awɔɔ nyannɩ n bɩ.
A a da ma gʊaa n laaka da a ʊ, gəəno y'a bam lɔ ŋn'a mɩm bɔ ʊ? Kʊ ŋ y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ, ŋ mɛ bɩ yɩm lʊnlɔ?
Hɔɔnwarzaa ra, hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a duum bɩ, k'an ga a bɔm na?
Bɩ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a duum bɩ, kʊ yɩryaa m gɛɛ hɔ vanta m, hɔ bɩ yaa ɩbɩɩ n'a duum, a gɔ bɛɛ ɩbɩɩ n'a sɔɔn wa.
Ba ɩbɩɩ duu bɩ, bɩ Woso a ka an bɔ, a do n a hɔ kan hɔyaa do vantɔɔ kɩ, amba Woso mɩŋŋa lɛ n taa bɩ m, hɔyaa do biyəə y'a hɔ.
Hɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ rɔ nɔɔm, biyəə mɛ y'a hɔ. Gʊɔɔ mɛrɔ y'a hʊnhɔ, poo kan harhɔɔ kɩ, bɛnnɔ kɩ, zɔnɔ kɩ mɛrɔ y'a hʊnhɔ sɔ.
Hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kan hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ tara burə ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a hʊnhɔ, ŋ gʊɛrɛ y'a hʊnhɔ sɔ.
Wosogure lɛɛgure y'a hɔ, mom hɔ y'a hɔ, monyaarɔ lɛɛgure y'a hʊnhɔ sɔ, monyaarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛɛgure lɛ dɩnda kʊ m.
Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ ma. Kʊ n ta k'a yaa gər bir, a do m ba n tɩr hɔyaa duu bɩ m. Gər bɩ hɔ vɔnrɛzaa m, bɩ k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʊ, a bɩ vɔnm dɔ y.
Gər ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔ nyɔɔdʊwarzaa m, paŋŋawarzaa m sɔ n n'a birm maam, an bɔkarɛ an n'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ an nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m kan paŋŋa kɩ m gʊta.
Gər birle ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, tara burə hɔ n n'a birm bala, an bɔkarɛ k'a b'a mɩm bɔ ʊ, a mɛ b'a ba arzana mɛ. K'ʊ n nɩ tara burə ʊ naa ʊ naa, kʊ mɛ ta ʊ, arzana ʊ, mɛ nyɩntaŋ ʊ sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma m, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ: «Gʊaa lɛɛkarɛzaa Adam a ba gʊaa mɩsɩr. Bɩ Krista bɔ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, Adam hɩyaazaa m, bɩ bʊr a ʊ, jɛ ʊ, b'a m Ɛspri k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa karɛ.»
Bɩ lɛɛkarɛ mɛ k'an ta ʊ bɩ, mɛ kʊ Woso Ɛspri a ka bɩ bɛɛ m bɩ, durnya hɔ m bɩ. Woso Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ, zɛ bɩ n nawʊm jɛ ʊ.
Gʊaa lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ, durnya gʊaa m bɩ, a bɔ n y'a ʊ taa ʊ. Gʊaa hɩɩyazaa bɩ, a to b'ʊ arzana ʊ.
Gʊaa kʊ durnya gʊaa m bɩ, durnya gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ bɩ rɛ, gʊaa kʊ arzana gʊaa m bɩ, arzana gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɔ bɩ rɛ sɔ.
Dɩɩtaa naa, wɔɔ bɔ durnya gʊaa bɩ rɛ, Bɩ, dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm, wɔɔ n bɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ arzana gʊaa bɩ rɛ sɔ.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ m ʊ, gʊaa b'a dam ma an gasʊ Woso cirbəə b'ʊ, a mɛsim nɩ y. Hɔ k'a nɩ vɔnm bɩ b'a dam ma an hɔ k'a bɩr vɔnm bɩ yɩ y.
K'a dɩga a, kʊ m hɔ kʊ gɔsɩ n a dɔ hɩ a m. Ʊ woo… naa, ʊ bɩ gɩngam haay y, bɩ ʊ da ʊ nawʊm kʊ ʊ haay ʊ ʊ lʊr.
Ba naa do n nawʊm, huure jɛzaa bɩ hɛrɛ ma, ʊ lʊr ʊ n nawʊm lɛɛm-lɛɛm, am mɩm nɩfɩ zɛrɛ m. Bala, kʊ n bɩ huure bɩ hɛ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ y'a mɩm bɔŋ ʊ mɛ k'a bɩ vɔnm dɔ m, wɔɔ n'ʊ lʊr.
Bala, wɔɔ k'ʊ nɩ gɩngam, ʊ nɩ vɔnm naa, pakra m kʊ wɔɔ n mɛ k'a bɩ gam fɩɩga y, b'a bɩ vɔnm sɔ sa.
Kʊ wɔɔ mɛrɔ b'a lʊr ncɩnaaʊ, hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ bɩ kʊ yɩm, n ʊ:
Zɛ ba ʊ dɔ y, n bʊr zɛ ra.
Zɛ ra, ɩ dama bii?
Ɩ paŋŋa bii?
Zɛ paŋŋa bɩ m mimbʊnyaa m, mimbʊnyaa paŋŋa bɩ m Moyiisi lɛrɔ m.
Ʊ yaa da Woso m barka, an n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ bʊrm hɔ haay ra, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a ka hɔsɩ n a da a ma y, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee… Zuuba zibəə nɔ ʊ, bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, kɔ k'awɔɔ nawʊm Zuuba zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ, a bɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ vam nɩ y.
Kʊ busoo zɩnzɛkʊra n a ka kristagʊɔɔ ʊ bɩ bɩncɛ nɩ, k'a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ Galasii kʊrɔ wɔɔ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ba sɔ.

Hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ba n nɩ: Hatʊ hinni biyəə ʊ, k'awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə n dɩga busoo k'an ta m ma an a bɔ ʊ an a cɩnta a hɔ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, k'awɔɔ b'a ya a ka ma k'a busoo zɩnzɛ kʊ ra y.
Kʊ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, mɔɔ ci bam m a ka gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ ŋ bɔŋ ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta a ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ m ŋn'aa ŋ ka Zerizalɛm kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ ta m kan busoo bɩ kɩ.
K'a bʊr an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, a a ga m kʊ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa n ta, ŋ tam kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Ta mɔɔ nawʊm Masedʊan kʊ ʊ, m a dɔ m lee ku awɔɔ zi, bra mɔɔ nawʊm b'ʊ, m bʊr awɔɔ zi.
A a da ma, mɔɔ n nyɩnta awɔɔ zi b'ʊ poore, gɛɛ m nyɩnta b'ʊ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʊ, k'awɔɔ n a da mɔɔ han, m zaa bɩ sarɛ ma, baa kʊ ta mɔɔ nawʊm ka.
Naa do ma naa, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m dɩga awɔɔ ma cenle ma y, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ m bɩ gɔɔta kan a kɩ poore, kʊ Zuuba yɛ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ gɔɔtam Efɛɛzɩ kʊ ʊ naa ʊ, an ta an pantɩkɔtɩ cibsa dɔmɩm ku.
Bala, Woso a ka mɔɔ nɩ m dam ma m zi ba naa ʊ gʊta, bɩ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ gʊta sɔ.
Kʊ Timote bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, k'a nyasʊ m mɩŋŋa, k'a heer n nyɔɔ, bala, Zuuba zi an n'a bam sɔ am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Gɔsɩ b'a gore bɔ ʊ y. K'a a da han k'an a bɔ an bʊr mɔɔ zi laafɩɩ, bala, mɔɔ y'a mɩm dam, kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Kʊ wɔɔ danyɩ Apolɔs nɩ, mɔɔ hɩ m gallɛm hɔka k'an bʊr awɔɔ zi kan ʊ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, b'a lɛ baa fɩɩgaa k'a ta awɔɔ zi b'ʊ dɩɩtaa y, k'a bɩ toore yɩ, a zɛm.
K'a dundo a zi, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, a bɩr heer koodə m, a bɩr paŋŋa m.
K'a hɔ haay woo… ba ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Stefanas kan a hargʊɔɔ kɩ ɩ lɛɛ ka ŋn'a ba sɩrakənno Akayii kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ. Ŋ y'a tʊntɔ ʊ paan… ŋn'a da kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ han Woso zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ. Mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ a m,
k'a yɛ gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zi bam, ŋn'ɩ kɔrɛ yɩm kan ŋ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ.
Mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm gʊta, Stefanas k'a nɩ naa ʊ, kan Fɔrtɩnatus kɩ, Akayikus kɩ bɩ tɔ ma, kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Bala, ŋ minto bɩ, mɔɔ heer koodə yɩ, ŋ y'awɔɔ heer ba kookoo sɔ. Gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ a ga daʊrɛ m paan….
Azii kʊrɔ wɔɔ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Akilas kan Priska kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m danyɩbaa Zuuba nɔ ʊ minto. Kristagʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a som kʊ ma ŋ har ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ.
Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. K'a yaa da kʊ m mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa kan daʊrɛ kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore naa do gʊrsɩra bam.
Kʊ gʊaa n Zuuba ŋʊa y, Woso lerbɔrɛ bʊnyaa ɩ kan a zaa kɩ. «Maranata» a jɩ k'a hɩ a ʊ, Zuuba n bʊr.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ Zuuba n'awɔɔ barka da ʊ.
Mɔɔ y'awɔɔ woo… ŋʊam Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʊ.
II Corinthians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m ba Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam, a ba wɔɔ nawʊm Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊma k'a nɩ Korɛntɩ ʊ bɩ ma. A ba wɔɔ nawʊm wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Akayii kʊrɔ vantɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma haay sɔ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ han, kʊ ŋ nɩ barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʊ.
Ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Zɩ m, an n'a mɩŋŋa bam gʊɔɔ m tee…, an nɩ ŋ heer wʊtam mim haay nɔ ʊ.
A ɩ wɔɔ heer wʊtam wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ da ma, ʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr do haay yɩm nɔ wɔɔ heer wʊta sɔ, heerwʊtarɛ kʊ wɔɔ yɩ a mɩŋŋa zi bɩ m.
Denter m, kʊ wɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm gʊta amba Krista fɩr yɩ bɩ m bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, Woso ɩ wɔɔ heer wʊtam gʊta Krista tɔ ma.
Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm, fɩr bɩ yɩ wɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ n heerwʊtarɛ yɩ, a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ. Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ heerwʊtarɛ yɩrɛ, a yɩ wɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ n a da ma a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ lɔɔrɔ nɔ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma m wɔɔ heer n kookoo awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʊ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ k'awɔɔ nɩ fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ yɩm bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ heerwʊtarɛ kʊ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ m sɔ.
Wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n'a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ fɩr yɩ gʊta Azii kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, wɔɔ fɩr yɩ maam-maam an cem wɔɔ paŋŋa han. Wɔɔ n a gɩnga, ʊ ʊ, ʊ lam fɩr naa do nɔ ʊ y.
Ɩɩn… yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ karɛ, a gɩnga wɔɔ ʊ, ʊ ʊ, wɔɔ dʊdɔ n y'a yar k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ. Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, wɔɔ n ʊ da ma dɔ, ʊ yo ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma y, wɔɔ n yo Woso ma, bala, an nɩ gəəno mɩm bɔŋ ʊ.
A wɔɔ yɔ karɛ fɩryɩrɛrɔ maam-maam kʊ ŋ y'a yo k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʊ. Wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, a ba n nɩ wɔɔ yɔm tee… ŋ wɔ ʊ.

Awɔɔ y'a dam wɔɔ han sɔ, yaa k'awɔɔ n n'a dam wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto. Yɩ an nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, wɔɔ n daahan yɩ Woso zi gʊta, gʊɔɔ cir kʊ ŋ yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ minto. Naa n'a kam sɔ gʊɔɔ gʊta n yaa da m barka.

Hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer bam nyɩnta kan ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ noom k'an fu an nɩ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ kam mɩŋŋa bɩ m. Bala, wɔɔ ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan gʊaa haay kɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ sɩra nɔ ʊ, kan ʊ heer kɩ haay. Woso y'a da wɔɔ han, a barka bɩ tɔ ma m wɔɔ n wɔ ʊ, ʊ naa ba, wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ mindɔrɛ bɛɛ y.
Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a gʊrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma biyəə bɩ, a ba wɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʊ, a karɩnda ba, a jɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa. Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam, m ʊ, awɔɔ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a hɩ naa jɩ mam mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
Dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ y'a jɩ mam poore a ʊ, wɔɔ nɩ yɩm awɔɔ heernyɔɔ, b'awɔɔ yɩm wɔɔ heernyɔɔ sɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu wusigəre hinni ʊ.
Mɔɔ naa nyasʊ m heer ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ hɔɔ, m a cɩnta kʊ m lɛɛ ka m bɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, m awɔɔ heernyɔɔ da ra gallɛm hɩɩya.
Kʊ m m to awɔɔ zi b'ʊ m ta Masedʊan ʊ, kʊ m bɩ m to Masedʊan ʊ, m bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ k'awɔɔ n b'a da m han kʊ m ta Zidee ʊ.

A hɩ awɔɔ ʊ gɩnga naa do kʊ mɔɔ wʊ bɩ, dɔ mɔɔ ka ra? Gɛɛ a hɩ awɔɔ ʊ, m gɩngarɔ wɔɔ wʊ mɔɔ nawʊm amba durnya gʊɔɔ hɔ bɩ m na? M n'a hɩm m ʊ, ɩɩn… mɔɔ naa bam, m m ya m jɩm b'ʊ, m ʊ, ayy… mɔɔ bɩ naa barɛ y.
Sɩrazaa m Woso m, a m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, meer kʊ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a n nyɩnta hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya nɔ ʊ y.
Bala, Yeezuu Krista kʊ Woso Nyɩ m bɩ lemim kʊ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ kan Silas kɩ, Timote kɩ bɩ, lemim bɩ do n nyɩnta «Ɩɩn… kan Ayy… kɩ» nɔ ʊ y. Nyɩnta a ʊ, sɩra nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Yeezuu mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, Woso n nɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ haay barɛ. Bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ «Amina» dam Yeezuu tɔ ma, ʊ n'ʊ lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ.
Woso nɩ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, awɔɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ Krista zuure nɔ ʊ. A ɩ wɔɔ bɔ ʊ, ʊ hɔ,
an a wɔjɩ da wɔɔ ʊ a Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a zɛm bɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ wɔɔ m haay ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Woso mɔɔ n'a barɛ m kasɛtɩzaa, kʊ mɔɔ ga a jɩra mɔɔ m ŋʊaarbarɛ m. Kʊ mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m awɔɔ heer kɔ bɩ y'a ka, mɔɔ n m ya m bʊr awɔɔ zi Korɛntɩ ʊ y.
Wɔɔ bɩr ʊ kam ma kʊ minno niŋŋoo dɩnda awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka ŋ ʊ paŋŋa nɩ y. Awɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩra ka Krista ʊ nɔ ʊ kara. Bɩ, ʊ da wɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han k'awɔɔ n heernyɔɔ yɩ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ cɩnta m heer ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mɔɔ bɩ n bɔrɛ m bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ heerzar nɔ ʊ y.
Kʊ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba, nka nɩ heernyɔɔ kam mɔɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ?

Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n lɛɛ ka m ci ba awɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m bʊr awɔɔ zi k'awɔɔ n mɔɔ da heerzar ma, an bɔkarɛ awɔɔ y'a ga m a mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ bɩ tɔ ma m. Bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ paan… m ʊ, awɔɔ haay, kʊ mɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m, awɔɔ heernyɔɔ m sɔ.
Ci bɩ do kʊ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma naa, a n yɩ mɔɔ ma naanaa y, a ba mɔɔ ʊ kan heerzar kɩ, m nyi ka. Mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m awɔɔ heer zar y, ci bɩ ba mɔɔ ʊ k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʊam gʊta.
K'awɔɔ gʊaa nyɩnta an bʊr heerzar nɩ, mɔɔ bɛɛ a m heer zar y, awɔɔ haay a a heer zar, gɛɛ awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ m.
A da k'awɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ a hʊnhʊr bɩ, a a zaa bɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a sugur ka ʊ, a heer wʊta, k'a heer b'a zar an bɔɔlam ba y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han k'a a ŋʊarɛ hɩnka m.
Bala, ci bɩ kʊ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma bɩ, m ka mɔɔ ʊ ma kʊ m dɩga a k'awɔɔ ɩ mim sim fasɩ-fasɩ gɛ.
K'awɔɔ sugur ka gʊaa ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ sugur karɛ a zaa ʊ sɔ. Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ sugur ka gʊaa ʊ, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ a ga a ʊ m kʊ m sugur ka ʊ, a ba mɔɔ nawʊm awɔɔ tɔ ma, Krista mɩm m.
A ba wɔɔ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, k'ʊ bɩ zaa ka Sʊtaana ʊ, k'an wɔɔ ku y. Bala, gɩngarɔ k'an ta m nɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ŋ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
Mɔɔ m hʊr m ta Trowas ʊ, kʊ m aa Krista lemim nyɩnta pa da, kʊ mɔɔ yaa lee ku bɩ, mɔɔ yaa dɩga a Zuuba zaa banka gʊta, kʊ m lemim bɩ pa da.
Bɩ, heerkɔrɛ gʊta mɔɔ nyɩnta a nɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n wɔɔ danyɩ Tiitɩ yɩ bɩ tɔ ma. A m naa, mɔɔ n zaa yɛ Trowas gʊɔɔ wɔɔ han m m len so ŋ nɩ, m m hʊr, m ta Masedʊan ʊ.
Krista a da a jɩnnɔ haay ma, an nɩ ŋ gɩngaatarɛ an nɩ yirbə sire ŋ nɩ. Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, k'a nɩ wɔɔ gaam Krista da ma naa do nɔ ʊ dɔmɩm haay, an n'a kam gʊɔɔ nɩ Krista dɔm lɛɛ haay ʊ bɩ minto.
Bala, wɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan tidəər ji nyɩnta kɩ, Krista n'a kam Woso ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ zaa ra rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'ɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ k'ɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma tidəər.

Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'ɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kan brɔɔ kɩ zɛ wɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ, ŋn'ɩ gɩngarɛ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ zaa ra rɔ wɔɔ, kan brɔɔ kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa wɔɔ nɩ zɛm nɩ, ŋn'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩm sɔ. Bɩ, kʊ Woso bɛɛ m, nka ɩ wɔ ʊ, an nɩ zi naa do barɛ?
Wɔɔ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Woso lemim bɩ sa, ŋn'ɩ ter bam nɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y. Bɩ kʊ Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ, a lemim bɩ pa wɔɔ n'a dam kan sɩra kɩ, a mɩm m, kʊ Krista zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma.

Awɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, a hɩ wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ, ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ ra? Wɔɔ bɩr ʊ kam ci ma kʊ a hɩnka gʊɔɔ m k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ kristazibəəzannɔ paan…rɔ m wɔɔ nɩ y. Wɔɔ bɩr a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han sɔ k'a ci ba a ka wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a hɩnka gʊɔɔ m, amba gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ n'a bam bɩ nɩ y.
Wɔɔ ci bɩ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ m wɔɔ ci, n n a gʊrsɩra ba wɔɔ heerlɔ ʊ. Gʊaa haay n a dɔ an n'a karɩnda bam.

Gʊaa woo… a dɔ a ʊ Krista ci k'a ba bɩ n'awɔɔ m, an a da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ k'ʊ a ka. Ci bɩ ba bɛɛ n y'a ʊ, gʊrsɩra ba hɔ nɩ y, a ba n y'a ʊ Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ Ɛspri m, n n a ba jaa wargarɔ ma sɔ y, a ba n y'a ʊ gʊɔɔ heerlɔ ma.
Wɔɔ heer k'an kookoo bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ naa hɩm, Krista barka tɔ ma, Woso taa.
Wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma, ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ, wɔɔ wɔŋ ʊ, ʊ zi naa do ba ʊ zim nɩ y. Woso n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ wɔrɛ a barɛ ʊ.
A y'a ka wɔɔ n'ʊ da ma, ʊ ʊ ba Gʊaasɩbabaa daa bɩ zibəənyɩnɔ. Gʊaasɩbabaa naa do n a to lɛrɔ ci b'ʊ y, a to a ʊ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi. Bala, lɛrɔ ci b'ɩ zɛ a nawʊm zɛ m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n'a kam.

Lɛrɔ wɔɔ gʊrsɩra n y'a ba deem-deem jaa wargarɔ ma, a gʊrsɩra bɩ barɛ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ a hɩnka, Moyiisi meer nɩ yɔm kan paŋŋa kɩ. A yɔrɛ bɩ k'an maam-maam b'a ka Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr a dam ma n n'a mɩm nyam Moyiisi rɛ y. A n bɔkarɛ pakra m, kʊ lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ do n nya. K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zibəə bɩ, zɛ a nɩ zɛm nɩ, an bɔkarɛ a ɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m ncɩnaaʊ,
k'a maam, zibəə kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a bam b'ɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m gʊta an cem haay.
Kʊ zibəə k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ dʊdɔ yarm bɩ nyɩnta lɛbɔʊrɛ m, k'a maam, zibəə k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ bam tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ b'ɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m an lɛ da.
Wɔɔ ʊ da ma ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ, lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a nyɩnta ʊ biisi bɩ b'a dam ma an a makra ba kan lɛbɔʊrɛ k'an ta ʊ her bɩ kɩ y, her hɔ bɩ lɛ da soyy….
Bala, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔ k'a nɩ cenim bɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, k'a maam hɔ k'a nɩ gɔɔtam tee… bɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩrɛ an lɛ da.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ naa do m bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ heer n kookoo.
Wɔɔ n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan Moyiisi kɩ y, bɩ nyɩnta an nɩ pɛɛra karɛ a meer ma, kʊ Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɩ dɩga Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a n'a meer ma an nɩ nyam bɩ ma y.

Israyɛl gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ʊ biisi rɔ wɔɔ n wɔ ʊ ŋnɩ hɔsɩ jɩ ma y. Israyɛl gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ her sɔ nɔɔm maam sɔ, kʊ ŋ yɩ gʊaasɩbabaa gusire ciro wɔɔ karɩnda barɛ, ŋ bɩr ŋ jɩ marɛ y. Ɩ ʊ pɛɛra n y'a ka a meer ma, am Moyiisi hɔ bɩ m, pɛɛra bɩ n gaa ŋ meer la y. Bala, sɩra ka Krista ʊ bala n'a kam pɛɛra bɩ do n gaa gʊaa meer la, a zaa n hɔ k'an ta ʊ jɩ ma.
Denter m, baa kan her kɩ, kʊ ŋ yɩ Moyiisi ciro wɔɔ karɩnda barɛ, ŋ bɩr a jɩ marɛ y, ɩ ʊ pɛɛra nɩ karɛ ŋ hɔɔn ra.
Ba gʊaa a bɔ a ta a m, an sɩra ka Zuuba ʊ bɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ pɛɛra bɩ tɩr gaa a zaa meer la.
Bɩ, Zuuba kʊ n y'a hɩ ma bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, bɩ lɛɛ kʊ Zuuba Ɛspri n ta ʊ bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʊ ɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ.

Bɩ, wɔɔ haay k'ʊ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ, pɛɛra n a ka wɔɔ meer la y, bɩ, Zuuba lɛbɔʊrɛ nɩ yɩm wɔɔ ma, a lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ nɩ wɔɔ lʊrm kʊ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan kɩ. Ncɩnaaʊ m wɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ n'a dam la tee… zi kʊ Zuuba n'a bam bɩ n naa. A m Sɛnt-Ɛspri.
Woso a ba wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, a zibəə naa do da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ bɩr ʊ heer zaar barɛ y.

Wɔɔ bɩr yɛm kutim-kutim kan nyannɩ zibəəro wɔɔ kɩ ma y. Wɔɔ bɩr bra bɩmbam gʊɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr ŋʊaar warm Woso lemim bɩ ma sɔ y. Bɩ, sɩra wɔɔ n'a hɩm garga ra Woso mɩm m, kʊ gʊaa haay n a dɔ a heer ʊ a ʊ, sɩrazannɔ m wɔɔ m.
K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lemim nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ jɩ a nyaakʊm da kan gʊɔɔ niŋŋoo kɩ, k'a maam, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ m.
Durnya naa do woso kʊ Sʊtaana m bɩ yɩ ŋ hɔɔn ta, kʊ ŋ bɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ jɩ ma, ŋ nɩ sɩra ka ʊ y. Ŋ hɔɔn a ta kʊ ŋ bɩ wɔ ʊ sɔ, ŋ nɩ Krista lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a nɩ yɔm lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ yɩ y.
K'a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ bɩr ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ mim pa darɛ y, bɩ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista wɔɔ n'a pa darɛ. Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma awɔɔ zibəənyɩnɔ Yeezuu tɔ ma.

Bala, Woso k'a hɩ a ʊ, kʊ lɛɛgure n nyɩnta monsigə nɔ ʊ bɩ, Woso bɩ do y'a ka a mɩŋŋa lɛɛgure n gu wɔɔ heerlɔ ʊ, k'a ka kʊ wɔɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ k'an ta m, an nɩ yɔm Krista meer ma bɩ yɩ. Bɩ, kʊ Woso lʊnlɔ Krista maam sɔ.

Bɩ, wɔɔ, a hɔ gʊta naa do ka wɔɔ ʊ, k'ʊ a hɩnka gʊɔɔ m, an bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gedre tɔkkɛ kɩ, ʊ nɩ hɔ gʊta naa do m ʊ gʊr zi. Ncɩnaaʊ m kʊ gʊaa woo… n a dɔ a ʊ, paŋŋa gʊta naa do n a to wɔɔ zi y, a to a ʊ Woso zi.
Wɔɔ ɩ fɩr do haay yɩm, bɩ bɩ n a da wɔɔ ma y, wɔɔ hɔɔn ɩ kɔm minno gʊtɔɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔn n a zar y.
Gʊɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma gʊta, bɩ Woso n a bɔ wɔɔ ʊ y. Ŋ yɩ wɔɔ nam tara ma, bɩ ŋ bɩr wɔŋ ʊ ŋnɩ wɔɔ zaar barɛ y.
Dɔmɩm haay, wɔɔ ɩ zɛ m ʊ mɩm la, ɩ ʊ ga wɔɔ nawʊrɛ am Yeezuu hɔ bɩ m, ncɩnaaʊ m, kʊ Yeezuu mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n a hɩnka wɔɔ gʊr zi.
Wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ m mɩsɩr, bɩ dɔmɩm haay n y'a kam ma k'a wɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ Yeezuu tɔ ma, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ gɩnga. Bɩ kan naa kɩ haay, Krista mɩsɩrbaa y'a hɩnkam wɔɔ gʊr zi.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, wɔɔ nɩ zɛ lɛ ʊ dɔmɩm haay, bɩ n a ka awɔɔ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam.
N y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ: «Sɩra mɔɔ ka, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n meer ba.» Sɩrakarɛ deem-deem naa do wɔɔ n ta m sɔ, bɩ y'a ka wɔɔ nɩ meer bam.
Wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʊ ʊ, Woso Zuuba Yeezuu mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, a wɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʊ sɔ kan kɩ. A n a ka wɔɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, ʊ nyɩnta kan kɩ lɛɛ deem ʊ.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay ba wɔɔ nawʊm awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma, kʊ gʊɔɔ cir n Woso barka bɩ nyɔɔdʊ yɩ sɔ, maam bɩ, gʊɔɔ cir gʊta Woso barka darɛ, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma m, wɔɔ bɩr ʊ heer zaar barɛ y. Bala, wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ paŋŋa y'a bɔŋ ʊ poore-poore k'a bɩ nya, wɔɔ nyi bɩ paŋŋa y'a dam la dɔmɩm haay.

Bala, fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ yɩm dɩɩtaa naa, ŋ zɛm bɩ nya, wɔɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊta yɩ, ŋ tɔ ma. Lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ do gʊta maam-maam, a nyarɛ ba ʊ sɔ y. Kʊ wɔɔ dɩga lɛbɔʊrɛ bɩ do ma, wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ hɔsɩ bɛɛ m fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ y.
Hɔ kʊ gʊaa n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ n'ʊ kam ma y, hɔ kʊ gʊaa bɩr a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ wɔɔ n'ʊ kam ma. Bala, hɔ k'a nɩ yɩm mɩm m bɩ, cenlezaa m, bɩ hɔ k'a bɩr yɩm mɩm m bɩ, a nyarɛ ba ʊ y.
Wɔɔ mɛ naa do bɔ kʊ ʊ kan pɛɛracɛ kɩ. Wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, k'a b'a zaar ba, Woso mɛ vanta kam wɔɔ ʊ arzana ʊ. Mɛ bɩ do garɛ ba ʊ y, gʊaa wɔzibəə bɛɛ m bɩ y.
Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, wɔɔ ɩ pɛn wʊm, ɩ ʊ, mɔr wɔɔ busu, bala, a ŋʊa wɔɔ nawʊm paan… k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, wɔɔ y'ʊ mɛ daa b'ʊ, mɛ kʊ Woso n b'a kam wɔɔ ʊ arzana ʊ bɩ.
Bala, kʊ wɔɔ mɛ bɩ do sa, wɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam dɩgɩ fɩɩga y.

Kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ n'ʊ mɛ naa do ʊ naa, wɔɔ ɩ pɛn wʊm, ɩ ʊ mɔr wɔɔ busu, bɩ, a ŋʊa bɛɛ wɔɔ nawʊm k'ʊ mɛ naa do to wa, wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʊ mɛ daa bɩ ka a gusire naa ra, kʊ mɛ k'a garɛ ba ʊ bɩ n nyaam mɛ k'a nɩ gam bɩ m.
Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ banka k'a bɩ naa woo… ka wɔɔ ʊ. A Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʊ, k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a zɛm bɩ hɔ k'a ler bɔ wɔɔ m naa ba.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, wɔɔ heer n kookoo dɔmɩm haay, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta, ʊ n'ʊ mɛ naa do ʊ, wɔɔ n'ʊ mɛ daa bɩ yɩ cɩna bɩ, wɔɔ ba Zuuba har ʊ b'ʊ cɩna sɔ y.
Bala, ʊ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʊm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, hɔ kʊ mɩnyaa n a yɩm bɩ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ yom ma y.
Sɩra m, wɔɔ heer kookoo, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ bɔ ʊ mɛ naa do ʊ, ʊ ta ʊ nɩ kan Zuuba kɩ, a jɩra wɔɔ m.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ y'ʊ mɛ naa do ʊ, gɛɛ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ bɔ ʊ, a bɩ mim y, ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm ma k'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ n a nɔ yɩ.

Bala, pakra m kʊ wɔɔ haay n bɩ jɩm Krista dʊdɔkarɛ duu bɩ taa, kʊ gʊaa biyəə n zi k'a nyɩnta an a ba a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ tara burə ʊ naa ʊ bɩ nyɔɔdʊ yɩ, k'a mɩŋŋa ɩ ba ɩ nyɔɔdʊ yɩ, k'a bʊnyaa nɩ a maam sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma m, kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba nyi ba m dɔ bɩ, wɔɔ n'ʊ kam ma kʊ gʊɔɔ n sɩra ka wɔɔ meerbaa ʊ, bɩ Woso wɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam sɔ m ʊ, awɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ mɩŋŋa a heerlɔ ʊ

A b'a hɩ a ʊ, a ŋʊa wɔɔ nawʊm k'ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa ʊ ko y. Ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm ma, k'awɔɔ n a heer nyɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma a mim yɩ a nyɩ bɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ mɩm m bala rɔ wɔɔ nʊ, hɔ zore ba ŋ heer ʊ y, ŋ leer ba b'ʊ y.
Kʊ hɔɔzannɔ m wɔɔ nɩ, Woso tɔ ma m, bɩ kʊ hɔɔntaʊrɛzannɔ m wɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma m.
Krista ŋʊarɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʊ. Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ hɔɔn da, ʊ ʊ, gʊaa deem kʊ Krista m ga gʊaa haay bɩncɛ ʊ, bɩ wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, k'a maam, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ woo… gɩnga sɔ.
Bɩ ga a ʊ denter gʊaa haay bɩncɛ ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ bɩncɛ sa rɔ wɔɔ b'a mɩsɩrbaa ba a mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma dɔ y, kʊ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a tɔ ma, a ɩ ga an a mɩm bɔ ʊ ŋ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩr dɩgam gɔsɩ ma gʊɔɔ dɩgarɛ m bala y, biisi bɩ, wɔɔ dɩga Krista ma ncɩnaaʊ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ bɩr dɩgam ma maam y.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a ba kristagʊaa, a ba a zaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ n nawʊm mɩsɩrbaa daa. A mɩsɩrbaa k'a n'a bam biisi bɩ cem, hɔ woo… a ba daa.
Naa haay naa, a to a ʊ Woso zi, a ɩ wɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan a kɩ Krista tɔ ma, an a ya, an gʊɔɔ zɛkʊra zibəə bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ.
Hɔ k'an ta ʊ bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta an zu kʊ ʊ kan Krista kɩ an nɩ gʊɔɔ haay zɛm kʊ ra kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ. A bɩr ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ karɛ ŋ la y, a y'a ya an gʊɔɔ zɛkʊra lemim bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ kʊ wɔɔ n a pa da.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Krista ɩ wɔɔ bɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n meer ba a bɩncɛ ʊ, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ zu kʊ ʊ kan wɔɔ meerbaa kɩ, an nɩ gʊɔɔ birm kʊ ŋ nɩ b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan a kɩ. Ʊ wɔ wɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ awɔɔ m Krista tɔ ma, k'a to kʊ Woso n awɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ.
Krista mɩŋŋa n mimbʊnyaa ba fɩɩga y, Woso n a ka an a ba ɩ ʊ mimbʊnyaa n a mɩŋŋa m wɔɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ, Krista tɔ ma.
Kʊ zi wɔɔ n'a bam kan Woso kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han, ʊ ʊ, a b'a to Woso barka k'a yɩ bɩ n ta vam y.
Bala, Woso a hɩ, a ʊ:
Dɔmɩm kʊ mɔɔ nɩ barka kam bɩ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ yaadarɛ si,
hinni k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ ŋʊaŋ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ bʊr m bɩ m da ɩ han.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Woso n'a barka kam bɩ n naa. Dɔmɩm k'a n'a bʊmbɔrɛ kam bɩ n naa sɔ.
Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'ʊ hɔsɩ ba k'an yɩ gʊaa ma bʊnyaa y, bala, wɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ gɔsɩ n wɔɔ zibəə bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊ y.
A n ta ʊ bɩ, hɔ haay kʊ wɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, a ba wɔɔ nawʊm ʊ n'a hɩnkam ʊ ʊ, Woso zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ,
wɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩr do y'a hʊnhɔ nɔ ʊ,
mim kʊsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ n'ɩ wɔɔ yɩm nɔ ʊ, cicir nɔ ʊ, dabɔʊ nɔ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ madɩr m gʊta,
ŋnɩ wɔɔ du,
ŋn'a zɛ kʊ ra ŋnɩ zee da wɔɔ ma,
wɔɔ nyɩnta kɔrɛrɔ nɔ ʊ,
hinceem bɩr bam wɔɔ nɩ y,
hɔbɩrɛ bɩr bɩm wɔɔ nɩ y.
Wɔɔ ɩ heer fu zi bam,
Woso hɔdɔrɛ zi wɔɔ n'a bam,
ʊ nɩ bʊraama zi bam.
Ʊ nɩ mɩŋŋabaa bam,
ʊ nɩ tam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m,
ʊ nɩ ŋʊarɛ zi bam noom fu m.
Ʊ nɩ sɩra lemim hɩm,
ʊ nɩ tam Woso paŋŋa nɔ ʊ,
ʊ nɩ tɩrgabaa yar mɔrlɔ sam ʊ nɩ yar barɛ ŋ nɩ,
k'ʊ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ wɔɔ daŋ ʊ,
niŋŋoo nɩ wɔɔ bɔŋ ʊ,
nɔɔrɔ y'a lɛ bɔm wɔɔ ʊ,
nɔɔm nɩ wɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊm.
N yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ŋʊaarbənno,
an bɔkarɛ sɩrazannɔ m wɔɔ m.
Gʊɔɔ ɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma,
ɩ ʊ, gɔsɩ n wɔɔ dɔ y,
an bɔkarɛ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ dɔ.
N y'a gɩngarɛ n ʊ,
gɩnga wɔɔ nawʊm,
bɩ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ m mɩsɩr,
n yɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma gʊta,
bɩ wɔɔ n gɩnga y.
N yɩ wɔɔ heer zaar barɛ,
bɩ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ nɩ heernyɔɔ m,
n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ŋʊazannɔ,
an bɔkarɛ wɔɔ y'a kam gʊɔɔ n'a bam hɔzannɔ,
n yɩ dɩgam wɔɔ ma ɩ ʊ,
hɔsɩ ba wɔɔ ʊ y,
an bɔkarɛ wɔɔ nɩ hɔ haay m.
Awɔɔ Korɛntɩ zannɔ, wɔɔ ʊ heer gʊ ʊ meer ba kan awɔɔ kɩ fasɩ, ʊ ʊ ŋʊarɛ hɩnka awɔɔ m.
Wɔɔ awɔɔ si ʊ heer ʊ, awɔɔ n wɔɔ si a heer ʊ y.
Awɔɔ ba mɔɔ ʊ m nyɩnɔ, m nɩ meer bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a a heer gʊ wɔɔ m, a wɔɔ ŋʊa sɔ, amba wɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʊam bɩ m.

A bɩ yɛ a a zɛ kʊ ra kan basɩrakənno kɩ y. A n a ga m, awɔɔ n a ba deem kan ŋ kɩ y. Hɔ tɩrga y'a dam ma an a zɛ kʊ ra kan hɔ bʊnyaa kɩ ra? Lɛɛgure y'a dam ma an a war kʊ ma kan monsigə kɩ ra? A n a ga nɩ y.
Krista y'a dam ma an kʊ ma kan Sʊtaana kɩ ra? Gɛɛ sɩrakarɛzaa y'a dam ma an a ba deem kan basɩrakarɛzaa kɩ ra?
Wosocɛ b'a dam ma an kʊ ma kan *wosobaawɔnnɔ kɩ y. Bɩ, wɔɔ m Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ cɛ, amba a mɩŋŋa a hɩ bɩ m, a a hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ŋ bire ʊ,
m bɩr kan ŋ kɩ,
mɔɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ŋ Woso,
ŋnɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʊɔɔ.»
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, Zuuba a ya, a ʊ:
K'a bɔ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, a a gʊ a hɔ.
A b'a wɔ da dintim hɔ ma y,
maam bɩ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ sire m zi.
Mɔɔ yɩrɛ awɔɔ zɩ,
awɔɔ n yɩ mɔɔ nyɩnɔ yaarɔ kan mɔɔ nyɩmbɔnnɔ kɩ,
Zuuba k'a paŋŋa jirə ba ʊ y'a hɩ.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a a yo Woso n lerbɔrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro bɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, ʊ mim haay k'a nɩ dintim kam wɔɔ mɛ kan wɔɔ nyi kɩ ma gʊ ʊ ma, ʊ ʊ tɔ ʊ gʊta k'ʊ bɩr mɩŋŋa fasɩ Woso lɛsire nɔ ʊ.
K'a yɛ a wɔɔ ŋʊa, wɔɔ n a bʊnyaa ba gɔsɩ nɩ y, wɔɔ n gɔsɩ mim zaar ba y, wɔɔ n ʊ da gʊaa bir y.
Mɔɔ bɩr meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ kʊ m awɔɔ dʊdɔ yar y, amba mɔɔ hɩ dɩɩtaa bɩ, wɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʊam gʊta, hɔsɩ b'a dam ma an wɔɔ gʊ awɔɔ ma y, baa zɛ, baa mɩsɩrbaa.
Mɔɔ sɩra ka awɔɔ ʊ gʊta, mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm awɔɔ tɔ ma gʊta. Wɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ heer koodə m gʊta, m nɩ m heer nyɔɔm paan….
Bala, lee kʊ wɔɔ ku Masedʊan ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ n hoonsire yɩ baa poore tɔkkɛ y. Jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ a n yɩ wɔɔ ma naanaa y, gʊɔɔ ɩ nyaa bam kan wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ dabɔʊ m ʊ heer ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ Woso nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔɔn kaanm a mɩŋŋa m nɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, a a ka Tiitɩ n bʊr, naa n wɔɔ paŋŋa da ra.

Bɩ, naa bɛɛ n a deem y, hɔ kʊ Tiitɩ a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ wɔɔ paŋŋa da ra sɔ, a a hɩ a ʊ, a heer koodə yɩ awɔɔ tɔ ma. A a hɩ sɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ lɛ taa paan… k'a a ya, a mɔɔ yɩ, bala, awɔɔ heer a zaar ba kan mim k'awɔɔ ba bɩ kɩ, an n'a ŋʊam paan… k'a a da mɔɔ han gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'ɩ mɔɔ tɔ zarm nɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ. Naa tɔ ma m sɔ mɔɔ heer n nyɩnta gʊta maam-maam kɛɛrɛ.
Baa kʊ ci kʊ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma biisi b'awɔɔ heer zaar ba, dɩɩtaa naa mɔɔ bɩr kʊrkʊr darɛ a tɔ ma y. K'a nyɩnta an awɔɔ heer zaar ba dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ bɩ, a a da ma mɔɔ n kʊrkʊr da.

Bɩ dɩɩtaa naa, m heer mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔm, kʊ mɔɔ awɔɔ heer zaar ba bɩ tɔ ma bɛɛ y. Kʊ heerzar b'a ka awɔɔ n a bɔ a taam bɩ tɔ ma m. Woso awɔɔ heerzar bɩ sa, an a ba awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, naa tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ n a bʊnyaa ba y.
Bala, heerzar k'a a to Woso zi bɩ zɛ a nawʊm heerlʊrlɛ m, an nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ kam, kʊrkʊrdarɛ ba a nɔ ʊ y. Bɩ, durnya naa do heerzar bɩ, zɛ bɩ n nawʊm zɛ m.
K'a dɩga a, heerzar k'a a to Woso zi b'a ka, awɔɔ n a ka ma ŋʊɩɩ… k'a mim bɩ banka, a a ka awɔɔ n sugur yɛ,
awɔɔ nɔ n ma ʊ kan a mɩŋŋɔɔ kɩ,
awɔɔ n nyi ba hɔ kʊ mim bɩ n'a bam bɩ m,
a a ka sɔ awɔɔ n n'a ŋʊam k'a a ya, a mɔɔ yɩ zɔɔ,
a n'a kam ma k'a a da mɔɔ han paan…,
a a ka sɔ awɔɔ n yɛ k'a gʊaa k'a mim bɩ ba bɩ hʊnhʊr.
A n ta ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ hɔ woo… ba k'a hɩnka a ʊ, awɔɔ ba mim bɩ nɔ ʊ y.
Mɔɔ n ci bɩ ba awɔɔ ma gʊaa k'a mim bʊnyaa bɩ ba bɩ tɔ ma y, gɛɛ gʊaa kʊ n mim bɩ ba m bɩ tɔ ma y. A ba mɔɔ ʊ k'awɔɔ n a da ma a dɔ Woso mɩm ʊ a ʊ, a wɔɔ ŋʊa paan….
Naa tɔ ma m hɔ k'awɔɔ ba bɩ n wɔɔ heer ba kookoo.
Heer koodə bɛɛ wɔɔ yɩ bala y, wɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩ sɔ gʊta. Tiitɩ k'a b'a hɩ wɔɔ m a ʊ, awɔɔ a paŋŋa da ra, a ka a heernyɔɔ yɩ bɩ tɔ ma m sɔ.
Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka hɔɔ, m m lɛ bɔ awɔɔ ʊ a mɩm m, b'awɔɔ ka an a dɔ denter a ʊ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ bɩ sɩra m. Amba wɔɔ nɩ sɩra hɩm tee… bɩ, ʊ lɛ kʊ wɔɔ bɔ awɔɔ ʊ Tiitɩ zi bɩ yɩ sɩra sɔ amba wɔɔ hɩ bɩ m.
Bʊr k'a ʊ, awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, awɔɔ n a si mɩŋŋa kan nyibəə kɩ daʊrɛ kɩ, a yɛ a lɛ ma bɩ, a y'a tɔ darɛ a nɔ ʊ, an n'awɔɔ ŋʊam gʊta an cem biisi han.
Mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm gʊta, kʊ mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ m da ma m yo awɔɔ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n barka kʊ Woso a ka Masedʊan kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ mim dɔ.

Kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ yɛ fɩr ma gʊta, kʊsɩ do y'a hʊnhɔ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ, ŋ nyɩnta heernyɔɔ gʊta m, bɩ n a ka ŋnɩ yɛ ŋnɩ hɔ k'an ta m ka gʊta maam-maam kan a heer kɩ haay busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ nɔ ʊ, an bɔkarɛ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ ɩ ŋʊazaabaa nɔ ʊ gʊta.
Mɔɔ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ, hɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ ŋ y'a ka, a ka ŋ y'a ʊ sɔ an lɛ da a paŋŋa ra a zim.
A yɛ ŋ y'a ʊ wɔɔ han ŋʊɩɩ… k'a a hɔ na busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ ma a a da m wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ han.
Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n a gɩnga bɩ ŋ y'a ba, lɛɛ ŋ y'a ka ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ ka Zuuba ʊ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ yɛ ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a hɩm bɩ bam, Woso hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, wɔɔ n ma Tiitɩ ma, k'an a bɔ an bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ an bɩ daahan zibəə k'a sɩŋŋɩda sa kan awɔɔ kɩ, busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ ba an a nyambʊr.
K'a a yo hɔntazannɔ n'awɔɔ m, sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, Woso lemim padarɛ nɔ ʊ, Woso hɔdɔrɛ nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ n'a yoŋ ʊ kan a heer kɩ haay a n nɩ wɔɔ ŋʊam sɔ bɩ, k'a a yo ʊ sɔ paan… busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ mim nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ n naa hɩ, ɩ ʊ, lɛ mɔɔ n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ y. Kʊ mɔɔ gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ tʊntɔʊrɛ mim hɩ bɩ, a hɩ mɔɔ ʊ k'awɔɔ n a hɩnka a ʊ, ŋʊarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ paan… denter.
Awɔɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka k'a n'a kam wɔɔ ʊ bɩ dɔ. Hɔntazaa n a mɩŋŋa m, an bɔkarɛ a yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ba ŋʊazaa awɔɔ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n a ba hɔntazannɔ a mɩŋŋa ŋʊazaabaa tɔ ma.

Naa kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa, m hɔɔndarɛ mɔɔ n'a hɩm. A gɩnga mɔɔ ʊ a mɩŋŋa k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta a ta lɛɛ kan zibəə k'awɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa zu ʊ bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ ɩ yɩ lɛɛkarɛzannɔ, a busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ ka, awɔɔ ɩ lɛ sa a bɔ a lɛ m sɔ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a ta lɛɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, amba awɔɔ sɩŋŋɩda sa bɩ m, a zi bɩ ba a nyambʊr, k'a busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ ka a paŋŋa tɛkka ma.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa hɔ ka Woso ʊ a zim, Woso ɩ hɔ bɩ do sim, dɩga a nawʊm hɔ k'a zaa bɩ n ta m bɩ ma, a bɩr dɩgam hɔ k'a ba m bɩ ma y.
Mɔɔ bɩr m kam ma kʊ m awɔɔ da ŋʊazaabaa ma, kʊ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n hɔ yɩ wa, a ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ gakʊʊbarɛ n nyɩnta ʊ.

Dɩɩtaa naa, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ m gʊta, bɩ minto bɩ, awɔɔ a da ma, a a da gʊɔɔ kʊ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ hɔ bʊr an bɩ jɩra awɔɔ ma sɔ, gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ a da ŋ han rɔ wɔɔ nɩ hɔ nɩ, ŋ y'a darɛ awɔɔ han sɔ. Maam bɩ gakʊʊbarɛ nyɩntaŋ ʊ.
Amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ bɩ m bɩ:
Gʊaa k'a hɔ gʊr gʊta bɩ,
a ba m an cem a bɩncɛ han y,
gʊaa k'a gʊr poore bɩ,
hɔ n jɩra bɩ zaa ma sɔ y.
Wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, kʊ Tiitɩ lɛ n taa gʊta k'a a da awɔɔ han amba wɔɔ lɛ n taa sɔ bɩ tɔ ma, Woso ɩ naa da a heer ʊ.
A yɛ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ han k'an ta awɔɔ zi b'ʊ bɩ, a yɛ, an lɛ da bɩ, a yɛ kan a heer kɩ haay, an hɔɔn bɔ ʊ a zim k'a ta awɔɔ zi b'ʊ.
Wɔɔ danyɩ vanta wɔɔ n'a nyɔɔm kan kɩ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ haay y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ, k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam mɩŋŋa bɩ tɔ ma.

A n lɛ da bɩ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ y'a bɔ ʊ, k'an wɔɔ da zaa ʊ, zɩnzɛkʊra zibəə naa do kʊ wɔɔ n'a bam Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ tɔ ma bɩ nɔ ʊ, zi naa do ba wɔɔ nawʊm sɔ k'ʊ a hɩnka, ʊ ʊ, ʊ lɛ taa k'ʊ ʊ da gʊɔɔ han.
Busoo kʊ n y'a da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ naa gʊta maam-maam, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ dundore ʊ zi, kʊ gɔsɩ b'a hɩ a ʊ, wɔɔ n nyasʊm mɩŋŋa y.
Wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʊ hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa ba Woso mɩm ʊ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʊ a ba sɔ gʊɔɔ mɩm ʊ.
Wɔɔ gʊaa vanta nyɔɔm sɔ kan ŋ kɩ, wɔɔ tɩr a ka lɛɛ ʊ dɩga a, bɩ, wɔɔ yɩ gʊaa m, an nɩ Woso zibəə bɩ ŋʊam. Dɩɩtaa sɔ naa, a y'a tɔŋ ʊ paan…, bala a sɩra ka awɔɔ ʊ gʊta.
Kʊ Tiitɩ nɩ, mɔɔ zukuu m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m sɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ nɩ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ yɩ ŋ bɔ ʊ, ŋ zibəə bɩ y'a lɛ bɔm Krista ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a ŋʊarɛ hɩnka ŋ nɩ paan…, kʊ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ ŋ ʊ, ʊ lɛ kʊ wɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ awɔɔ ŋʊarɛ gʊtabaa ʊ bɩ, sɩra m.
Pakra bɛɛ m kʊ mɔɔ nɩ m ya m ci ba awɔɔ ma, kʊ m daahan kʊ wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a ka Zidee gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ mim hɩ y.

A ŋʊa k'awɔɔ nawʊm paan… k'a a da ŋ han bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ m lɛ bɔ awɔɔ ʊ Masedʊan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ, m a hɩ ŋ nɩ, m ʊ: «Akayii kʊ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ a banka zu ʊ kara, k'a a da Zidee kʊ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ han.» Naa kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ, a a ka ŋ gʊɔɔ gʊta nɩ lɛtaama m, k'a a da Zidee gʊɔɔ wɔɔ han sɔ.

Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma rɔ nɔɔm, ŋ nyɔɔ mɔɔ ʊ k'awɔɔ n busoo k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a ka bɩ zɛ kʊ ra, amba mɔɔ hɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ m mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ a banka a nya bɩ m. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ kʊ wɔɔ bɩ lee ku, gʊaa woo… y'a dɔrɛ a ʊ, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʊ bɩ, sɩra m.

Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʊ kan Masedʊan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ʊ bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ n a banka a nya y, nyannɩ gʊta wɔɔ nyasʊm, bala, wɔɔ sɩra ka awɔɔ ʊ b'a n yɩ maam y. Bɩ, nyannɩ y'awɔɔ nyasʊm sɔ gʊta an lɛ da.

Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n a gɩnga mɔɔ ʊ, a a ga m kʊ m a yɛ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ han kʊ ŋ nɩ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m awɔɔ zi b'ʊ. K'awɔɔ n busoo k'awɔɔ ʊ k'a ka kan a heer kɩ haay bɩ zɩnzɛ kʊ ra a nya. Awɔɔ busoo bɩ do ler bɔ kara. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ mɔɔ zɛm bɩ dɩga a awɔɔ busoo bɩ zɩnzɛ kʊ ra a nya, naa y'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʊ, a ka awɔɔ nawʊm kan a heer kɩ haay, awɔɔ bɩr a kam pakra nɩ y.
K'a mim naa do tɔ da a nɔ ʊ:
Gʊaa k'a hɔ duu poore bɩ,
hɔ poore an n'a yɩm sɔ,
gʊaa k'a duu gʊta bɩ,
hɔ gʊta an n'a yɩm sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a a ga m kʊ gʊaa biyəə n hɔ k'a gɩnga k'a ka bɩ ka, a b'a ka pakra nɩ, gɛɛ paŋŋa n y'a ba a ma tɔ ma y. Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ hɔ kam kan heernyɩnta kɩ bɩ, Woso ɩ bɩ zaa ŋʊam.
Bɩ, Woso a da ma an hɔ mɩŋŋa do y'a hʊnhɔ ka awɔɔ ʊ gʊta, kʊ hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra awɔɔ ma y, bɩ kʊ hɔ n bɩr ta awɔɔ ʊ gʊta, k'a zi mɩŋŋɔɔ do haay ba m.
Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, amba n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ bɩ m, n ʊ:
A ɩ hɔ kam ŋʊazannɔ ʊ gʊta,
a ba k'a nawʊm gʊɔɔ m mɩŋŋa
bɩ nyarɛ ba ʊ y.
Woso nɩ hɔ kam hɔduurezaa ʊ an n'a duum, an nɩ hɔbɩrɛ kaŋ ʊ an n'a bɩm. Woso bɩ do nɩ hɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ gʊta amba awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ m, an a ka an pasɩ yɔɔgʊ, k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʊ a ba gʊɔɔ m mɩŋŋa gʊta.
A y'a kam awɔɔ n hɔ yɩ gʊta dɔmɩm haay, k'awɔɔ n bɩr a bam gʊɔɔ m mɩŋŋa tee…. K'a yɩ ncɩnaaʊ, gʊɔɔ cir gʊta y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, awɔɔ ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋ ʊ tɔ ma.
Bala, busoo zɩnzɛkʊra bɩ zibəə bɩ, a da bɛɛ a nawʊm wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ han bala y, a ka a nawʊm sɔ gʊɔɔ nɩ Woso barka dam gʊta maam-maam.

Zi naa do barɛ n'awɔɔ taalɛra zaa bɩ zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ hɩnkam. A a hɩnka a ʊ, awɔɔ sɩra ka Krista lemim nyɩnta b'ʊ denter, an nɩ yɛm ma karɛ. Gʊɔɔ gʊta y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ naa tɔ ma, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ sɔ k'awɔɔ n'a barɛ ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa, an n'a hɔnyɩ jirm kan ŋ kɩ kan gʊaa haay kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ŋ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, ŋ n'awɔɔ ŋʊa gʊta, kʊ Woso a barka ka awɔɔ ʊ gʊta ncɩnaaʊ bɩ minto.
Bɩ kʊ Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, a ganwʊrɛ gʊta k'a lɔɔ ba ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.

Awɔɔ y'a hɩm mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol ma, a ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʊ, nyibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, bɩ kʊ mɔɔ laatʊ bɩ mɔɔ nɩ m darɛ m nyaa ma kan awɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han Krista bʊgʊ-bʊgʊdabaa m kan a ŋʊarɛ kɩ m, m ʊ:

A b'a ka kʊ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ bire ʊ, kʊ m m da m nyaa ma wa! Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʊ, ʊ zi woo… ba wɔɔ nawʊm gʊaa hɔɔndarɛ m bala rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ mɔɔ m da ma, m m da m nyaa ma kan ŋ kɩ.
Sɩra m, wɔɔ mɛ kʊ wɔɔ n ta m ʊ n'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa bam nɩ naa, mɛsim m. Bɩ wɔɔ bɩr Woso zuure zoo bɩ bam gʊaa hɔɔndarɛ nɩ y.

Yar mɔdrɔ kʊ wɔɔ n ta m, ʊ nɩ yar bɩ barɛ ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ, durnya gʊɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y. Wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ, Woso yar mɔdrɔ paŋŋazannɔ m ŋn'a dam ma ŋnɩ bʊr jɩnnɔ gʊtɔ-gʊtɔɔ ra. Wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔndarɛrɔ daŋŋadɔɔ zaar bam.
Wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ ŋ sa mɩŋŋabusure nɔ ʊ ŋn'a ta m Woso dɔrɛ m toore rɔ wɔɔ zaar bam, wɔɔ ɩ hɔɔndarɛ haay dam jɩm ʊ, ʊ n'a karɛ a zannɔ nɩ yɛm Krista ma.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ hɩnka a ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a hɩm haay ma fasɩ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ ʊ banka ʊ a nya k'ʊ gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ bɩr yɛm nɔ wɔɔ hʊnhʊr.
Gɛɛ dɩga awɔɔ nawʊm hɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a yɩrɛ a mɩm m bɩ ma bala ra? Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ gʊaa ʊ Krista hɔ n a mɩ fasɩ, k'an a hɔɔn da an a dɔ sɔ a ʊ, Krista y'a so wɔɔ ʊ, amba a a so a zaa ʊ bɩ m.

Baa kʊ mɔɔ m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ gʊta, lɛ kʊ Krista a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a nyannɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, lɛ kʊ mɔɔ m ta m naa, a ka Woso ʊ mɔɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʊ a ta lɛɛ, a sokʊma bɩ nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ zaarbarɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n a gɩnga a ʊ, m ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ m awɔɔ da bɔ ʊ m ciro wɔɔ meerbaarɔ nɩ y.
Bala, n y'a hɩrɛ, n ʊ: «Mɔɔ ciro wɔɔ meerbaarɔ kʊsɩ, nyaa meerbaarɔ m sɔ, bɩ kʊ mɔɔ bʊr m nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, paŋŋawarzaa n mɔɔ m, bɩ mɔɔ n meerbaa dɔ sɔ y.»
Bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ naa hɩm bɩ, mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ m a hɩ m, m ʊ: Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a gʊrsɩra barɛ ʊ ciro wɔɔ ʊ kʊ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, kan hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a bam kʊ wɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, ŋ hɔdeem, ŋ jirə ba ʊ y.

Sɩra m, wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma ʊ ʊ ga kʊ ʊ gɛɛ ʊ ʊ makra ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, a lɛ da gʊɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma y. Hɔɔnwarzannɔ m brɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka ŋn'ɩ dɩgarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma k'a a makra ba kan gʊɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a makra barɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.

Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ, an cem jirə kʊ Woso a ka bɩ han y, wɔɔ y'ʊ lɛ bɔrɛ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ zibəə kʊ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a ba bɩ tɛkka ma, a ka k'a ʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ da ma ʊ lee ku awɔɔ zi bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, ta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ bɩ, cem bɛɛ wɔɔ ʊ ʊ jirə han y. Wɔɔ ɩ lɛɛ ka, ʊ bɩ Krista lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m.

Wɔɔ bɩr ʊ lɛ bɔrɛ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ zibəə tɔ ma y. Bɩ, wɔɔ ta ʊ heer lɛ k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ n a da ra, kʊ wɔɔ zibəə n paŋŋa yɩ gʊta awɔɔ barla sɔ, zibəə kʊ Woso wɔɔ da ʊ bɩ m naa, wɔɔ bɩ bɔrɛ a jirə la nɩ y.
Wɔɔ wɔŋ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ ʊ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ laatʊ awɔɔ kʊ bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ʊ, bɩ wɔɔ b'ʊ lɛ bɔrɛ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ zi kʊ gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ a ba tɔ ma y, zi kʊ Woso a ka brɔɔ ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a ba bɩ n bɩ.
Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a ʊ k'a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ y, an a lɛ bɔ hɔ kʊ Zuuba a ba b'ʊ.»
Bala, gʊaa k'a n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa ʊ a zim bɩ bɛɛ Woso nɔ nɩ yɩm ma y. Gʊaa kʊ Woso mɩŋŋa n'a lɛ bɔŋ ʊ bɩ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a yɛ ma. Ɩɩn… a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han k'a yɛ mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meerbaa bɩ ma.
Awɔɔ ŋʊa kʊ mɔɔ nawʊm bɩ, jɩmbaa n ta mɔɔ m, a to a ʊ Woso zi. Bala, awɔɔ banka mɔɔ ʊ amba nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ k'a n yar dɔ bɩ m, kʊ m a ka Krista ʊ, k'a n yɩ awɔɔ zim.
Bɩ, mɔɔ da nɩ bɔŋ ʊ, mɔɔ ʊ, a a da ma gʊɔɔ n bra ba awɔɔ m ŋʊaarlɔ m awɔɔ n a bɔ Krista zuure ʊ paan…, amba mɩm bɩ bra ba Ɛɛvɩ m ŋʊaarlɔ meerbaa m bɩ m.

Meer bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, bala, kʊ gʊaa bʊr an nɩ Yeezuu Krista vanta mim hɩrɛ, an nɩ meer bɩ bam ɛspri kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɛɛ m bɩ nɩ, an nɩ lemim vanta pa darɛ awɔɔ m, bɩ lemim nyɩnta k'awɔɔ zu ʊ biisi bɩ bɛɛ y, awɔɔ tɩr a gu a yɛ ma.
Gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma a ʊ, zibəəzannɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ da rɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam m ʊ ŋ n lɛ da mɔɔ nɩ y.
A a da ma mɔɔ bɩ wɔŋ ʊ, m meer ba wɩsɩ am ŋ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, bɩ kʊ Woso hɔdɔrɛ mim nɩ, ŋ bɩ jɩra mɔɔ nɩ y. Mɔɔ m hɔdɔrɛ bɩ hɩnka hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, mim haay nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ mɔɔ bɩ Woso lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, a pa bɩ da mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ m vam, mɔɔ n hɔsɩ si awɔɔ han y. M mɩŋŋa mɔɔ zer, kʊ m awɔɔ gore da ʊ. A hɩ awɔɔ ʊ, a ba kʊ mɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ naa, kʊrɔ mɔɔ ʊ ma ra?
Nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ bɩ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ vantɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ yawʊra ba, mɔɔ brɔɔ wɔ nya, kʊ m m da awɔɔ han.

M da kʊ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han b'ʊ bɩ, kʊ busoo mim ta mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ bɩr awɔɔ kɔm k'a hɔsɩ kaŋ ʊ y. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Masedʊan ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bʊr, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa haay bɩ ka mɔɔ ʊ. Mɔɔ n yɛ fɩɩgaa k'awɔɔ n kɔ mɔɔ mim ma y, naa mɔɔ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ m bɩr a bam.

Naa m mɔɔ goredaʊrɛ, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm Krista k'a nɩ mɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ m, mɔɔ b'awɔɔ busoo sire y, m lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʊ naa tɔ ma, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma Akayii kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ jilli an a ta mɔɔ m toore naa nɔ ʊ y.
Bɔ m mɔɔ n naa hɩ? Mɔɔ bɩr awɔɔ ŋʊam gɛ? Ayy…, Woso a dɔ a ʊ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ ŋʊam.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam naa, mɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ m bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ can, kʊ m a ka kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ, a ʊ, a ɩ zi bam, am wɔɔ hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ n a da jɩm ʊ, kʊ ŋ b'a da ma ŋnɩ naa hɩ y.
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro, zibəəzannɔ paan…rɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y, ŋʊaar ŋn'a bam gʊɔɔ m a zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʊ, Krista zibəəzannɔ m.
Bɩ naa do naa, zɛkədə mim b'a nɔ ʊ y, bala, Sʊtaana mɩŋŋa a da ma an a mɩŋŋa ba ɩ ʊ, lɛɛgure malɛɛka m.

K'a yo Sʊtaana mɩŋŋa wɔ ʊ an naa ba bɩ, k'a maam wɔɔ b'a hɩm ʊ ʊ, a zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ ɩ ʊ zibəətɩrgazannɔ n a mɩ wa. Bɩ, ŋ nyambʊrlɛ bɩ, bɔ a nawʊm kʊ ʊ kan ŋ zibəə bɩ kɩ, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma bʊnyaa.
Kʊ m m ya, m so ra, awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ dɩga mɔɔ ma ɩ ʊ, hɔɔzaa n mɔɔ nɩ y. Gɛɛ k'awɔɔ ʊ hɔɔzaa n mɔɔ nɩ, k'a maam k'a yɛ mɔɔ ma amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm hɔɔzannɔ ma bɩ m, kʊ m wɔ ʊ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ poore.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ba naa, Zuuba hɔɔnhɔ bɛɛ m kʊ mɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʊ y. Kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ naa, hɔɔzaabaa zibəə m.
K'a a yo gʊɔɔ gʊta n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ durnya minno ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʊ sɔ.
Awɔɔ kʊ mindɔrɛzannɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm hɔɔzannɔ ma naanaa.
Awɔɔ ɩ yɛm gʊɔɔ n'a sore awɔɔ ʊ am lɔnnɔ hɔ bɩ m, ŋn'ɩ hɔ yɔrɛ a m, ŋn'ɩ ŋʊaar barɛ a m, ŋn'awɔɔ gore bɔŋ ʊ, ŋn'awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊm.
Nyannɩ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, bala, wɔɔ n wɔ ʊ, ʊ naa ba awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ meer bɩ barɛ am hɔɔzaa hɔ bɩ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ hɔɔ niŋŋoo m nɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ yɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʊ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro m sɔ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ ebree gʊɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ, ebree gʊaa n mɔɔ m sɔ. Ŋ ʊ, Israyɛl gʊɔɔ n'a mɩ, mɔɔ maam sɔ. Ŋ ʊ, Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ mɔɔ maam sɔ.
Ŋ ʊ, Krista zibəənyɩnɔ n'a mɩ, ʊnhʊʊn…, mɔɔ hɔɔzaabaa meer bam fasɩ kɛɛrɛ,
Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m an lɛ da ŋ la.
Mɔɔ zi ba an lɛ da ŋ hɔ ra.
N mɔɔ du lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ an lɛ da ŋ la,
n mɔɔ zɛ mawʊr m an lɛ da ŋ la sɔ,
mɔɔ m mee ka zɛ ma gallɛm hɔka.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ lɛɛzannɔ mɔɔ nyasʊ gallɛm soor ŋnɩ mɔɔ zɛ mawʊr m, mɔɔ zɛ n tɩr a ʊ mawʊr bɩ m gallɛm bukərku a yaa n nɛɛhʊ.
Rɔm gʊɔɔ mɔɔ nyasʊ gallɛm kaakʊ ŋ nɩ mɔɔ zɛ bannɔ m,
hindeem ʊ gʊɔɔ mɔɔ bɩmba jaarɔ m k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ m yo kʊ m ga kɔɔlʊʊ nyoobarɛ nɔ ʊ gallɛm kaakʊ,
hindeem ʊ mɔɔ gɔɔta higʊta ʊ dɔmɩm deem,
dɔ n mɩ n nɩ mɔɔ bɔ lɛm.
Mɔɔ zaakʊ gʊta,
mɔɔ zaakʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ,
pɛrgʊrɔ kʊ ŋ tɩr yar lɔ wɔɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ bɩ,
dazaamazannɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ zɛ sɔ,
mɔɔ dogʊɔɔ a ŋʊa k'a mɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ sɔ.
Doro vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ a yo k'a mɔɔ zɛ gər sɔ.
Minno a yo k'a mɔɔ yɩ kʊnɔrɔ ʊ, kan poohɔɔnrɔ kɩ ʊ, higʊtɔɔ burə ʊ sɔ,
ŋʊaar kristagʊɔɔ barla sɔ.
Mɔɔ zi kʊsɩrɔ ba, m makra kʊsɩrɔ yɩ, hinceem tɩr jɩra mɔɔ ma, nɔ n tɩr mɔɔ zɛ kan mɩsɩ kɩ, m tɩr m lɛ kʊsɩ pakra m, nyɛɛm mɔɔ zɛ, huu jɩra mɔɔ ma sɔ.
Mɔɔ bɩ m kɔrɛ m minno vantɔɔ hɩ y, dɔmɩm biyəə mɔɔ heer ɩ kɔm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ mim tɔ ma.
Kʊ paŋŋawarzaa m gʊaa nɩ, b'ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ m. Kʊ gʊaa a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ b'a busu mɔɔ ma gʊta, ɩ ʊ mɔɔ m.
Kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ, m lɛ mɔɔ n n'a bɔrɛ m paŋŋawar minno ʊ.
Woso, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Zɩ bɩ, a a dɔ a ʊ, ŋʊaar bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a barɛ y. Bɩ, k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay.
Nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ Damas kʊ ʊ bɩ, kʊ bɩ dɩgamazaa kʊ cir Aretas a so ʊ b'a ka yarbənno n jɩm kʊ bɩ lɛrɔ ma, k'a mɔɔ ku a mɔɔ nyasʊ.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ mɔɔ da kasɩ ʊ, n n'a ka mɔɔ n bɔ kʊ bɩ pəŋŋə bɩ tokoro deem m, yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ kʊ bɩ dɩgamazaa bɩ n mɔɔ ku an mɔɔ nyasʊ y.
Mɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ ra? Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ a nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ hɔɔ kʊ Zuuba ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m nɩnnarɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ mim hɩm.
Mɔɔ kristagʊaa dɔ, Woso n a busu an ta m a zi arzana ʊ, a busure dɔɔraa bueeresi hɔ m naa. Mɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ ta a ʊ arzana ʊ paan…, gɛɛ hɔhɩnkarɛ a a yɩ y, Woso ɩ naa dɔ.
Denter m, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, Woso a busu an ta m arzana ʊ, a a da ma hɔhɩnkarɛ a a yɩ, a a da ma Woso a busu paan… an ta m arzana ʊ b'ʊ, Woso ɩ naa dɔ mɔɔ n a dɔ y.
Arzana ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a meerbaarɔ niŋŋoo ma, gʊaa n a ga m an so ŋ la y, bɩ, zaa ba ʊ, gʊaa n ŋ mim hɩrɛ y.
M lɛ mɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʊ, gʊaa ncɩnaaʊ bɩ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m lɛ bɔrɛ m mɩŋŋa ʊ y. Kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ, m paŋŋawar minno mɔɔ nɩ ŋ hɩm.

K'a hɩ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ, mɔɔ bɩ yɩm hɔɔzaa y, bala, mɔɔ sɩra hɩm. Bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ y, bala, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ gʊaa n a hɔɔn da mɔɔ ma an lɛ da m bɩncɛ ra, zi kʊ mɔɔ ba an n'a yɩm nɔ ʊ, gɛɛ meer kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam an n'a mam nɔ ʊ y.

Hɔɔ gʊtɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʊ Woso ŋ hɩnka mɔɔ m b'a da ma an a ka mɩŋŋabusure n a so mɔɔ ʊ. Naa tɔ ma m Woso n yaaba da mɔɔ zi an nɩ mɔɔ kɔm, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩŋŋa busu y. Yaaba bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, Sʊtaana zibəəzaa deem zibəə m, an nɩ mɔɔ zɛm, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ m mɩŋŋa busu y.
Mɔɔ yaa da Woso m gallɛm kaakʊ k'an mɔɔ yɔ fɩryɩrɛ naa do wɔ ʊ.

A n a nyɩ bɔ mɔɔ n'ʊ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ barka b'ɩbɩɩ bɔ, bala, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ barka b'a zi ba fasɩ.» Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm m m lɛ bɔ m mɩŋŋa ʊ, m paŋŋawarlɔ tɔ ma, kʊ Krista paŋŋa bɩ n nyɩnta mɔɔ gʊr zi fasɩ.
Naa y'a ka Krista tɔ ma
mɔɔ nɩ m heer nyɔɔm,
kʊ mɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawarlɔ nɔ ʊ,
kʊ gʊɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊrɛ,
kʊ minno a hʊnhɔ ɩ mɔɔ yɩrɛ,
kʊ gʊɔɔ ɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma,
kʊ minno ɩ mɔɔ heer kɔm sɔ.
Bala, kʊ mɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ,
bɩ mɔɔ paŋŋa n ta ʊ.

Mɔɔ ɩ meerbaa bɩ barɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔɔzaa m mɔɔ m, b'awɔɔ ɩ mɔɔ da ʊ paŋŋa m. Awɔɔ y'a ga m hɔɔ a mɔɔ nyaa ba. Bala, baa kʊ hɔsɩ bɛɛ m mɔɔ nɩ, gʊɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma zibəəzannɔ wɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n lɛ da mɔɔ m hɔsɩ nɔ ʊ y.
Zibəəro kʊ ŋ n'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʊ, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ziro wɔɔ duro ba mɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ bire ʊ kan bʊraama gʊta kɩ. Zibəəro wɔɔ duro, hoserlo do y'a hʊnhɔ m kan gɩngarɛ do y'a hʊnhɔ kɩ.
Bɔ n ta ʊ mɔɔ n a ba kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a ba awɔɔ nɩ? K'a maam kʊ mɔɔ n yɛ k'awɔɔ n dɩga mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa mim ma bɩ m. K'a kʊrɔma naa do sugur ka m ʊ.

Dɩɩtaa naa, mɔɔ m banka m a nya kʊ m bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, a gallɛm kaakʊ hɔ mɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'ʊ naa, bɩ kʊ mɔɔ bɩ bʊr, mɔɔ bɩ yɛm awɔɔ n dɩga mɔɔ mim ma y. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ mɔɔ nɩ m karɛ a ma, awɔɔ busoo bɛɛ y. Bala, nyɩnɔ bɛɛ n'a kam busoo ma k'a nyasʊ a zɩrɔ nɩ y, zɩrɔ wɔɔ n'a kam ma ŋn'ɩ nyasʊrɛ a nyɩnɔ m.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, heernyɔɔ m kan mɔɔ kɩ, kʊ m hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n ta m haay sa kan m mɩŋŋa kɩ, m m da m awɔɔ han. Awɔɔ ŋʊa kʊ mɔɔ nawʊm gʊta ncɩnaaʊ naa y'a ka awɔɔ bɩr mɔɔ ŋʊam na?
Awɔɔ yɛ a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ n yɛ k'awɔɔ n kɔ mɔɔ nyasʊm tɔ ma y. B'a da ma gʊaa n a hɩ a ʊ, hɔɔnkarɛ zi mɔɔ ba kʊ m awɔɔ ku m wɔ ʊ, ŋʊaarlɔ m.
Mɔɔ ŋʊaar ba awɔɔ m kʊ m hɔ yɩ awɔɔ gʊr zi ra? Mɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ gʊaa deem da ʊ k'an ŋʊaar ba awɔɔ m na?

Mɔɔ yɛ Tiitɩ han an ta awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, kan wɔɔ danyɩ kʊ mɔɔ mim hɩ awɔɔ m biisi bɩ kɩ. Awɔɔ a da ma a hɩ a ʊ, Tiitɩ ŋʊaar ba awɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ ra? A mɩŋŋa kan mɔɔ kɩ, tar deem wɔɔ sa, ʊ ʊ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba m, kan ʊ zibəə kɩ.

A hɔɔn k'awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʊ, ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ gumə ka ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ lɛɛ bɩ, a dɔmɩm laatʊ. Ayy…, ʊ meerbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʊm Woso taa amba Krista n'a ŋʊam bɩ m, bɩ, ʊ gʊaasɩbɔɔ, naa haay hɩ wɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ.

Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʊ, m ʊ, ɩ b'a ka mɔɔ n bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ m bɩ dɩga a hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a gɩngarɛ awɔɔ zi bɩ bɩ maam nɩ y, awɔɔ n a yɩ sɔ a ʊ, hɔ k'awɔɔ n'a gɩngam mɔɔ zi bɩ, a bɩ maam sɔ y. Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʊ, m ʊ, ɩ b'a ka nyaa n bɩ nyɩnta ʊ, kan jɩmbaa kɩ, nɔmaa kɩ, mɩmbɔkʊma kɩ, kan sʊnsɔwʊrɛ kɩ, gʊɔɔtɔzarlɛ kɩ, kan mɩŋŋabusure kɩ, warkʊma kɩ y.

Mɔɔ da ɩ bɔŋ ʊ sɔ, m ʊ, m ya kʊ mɔɔ ʊ m nɩ zɛrɛ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ naa, ɩ b'a ka Woso n mɔɔ da nyannɩ ʊ awɔɔ bire ʊ wa. M m ya m nyi ka gʊɔɔ gʊta kʊ ŋ mimbʊnyaa ba hɔɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'a bɔ a taam a dintim zibəəro wɔɔ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma wa, a a da ma ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'ɩ jaan dam, ŋn'a zibʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ bam.

Kʊ mɔɔ bɩ bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, a gallɛm kaakʊ hɔ m naa kɛɛrɛ. Amba Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ʊ, gʊaa vanta mim ba, pakra m kʊ mim bɩ kasɛtɩzannɔ n nyɩnta ʊ hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʊ, kʊ mim bɩ n yɩ sɩra», kʊ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku, naa wɔɔ n'a bam.

Kʊ m lɛɛ ka m a hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mimbʊnyaa ba hɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ m kan gʊɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, bʊr kʊ mɔɔ ʊ b'ʊ a hɩɩya hɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ ŋ bɔ zaa ʊ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, kʊ mɔɔ ba b'ʊ naa, mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ m ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ m ya m bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ, mɔɔ bɩ gɔsɩ tore y, mɔɔ hʊnhʊrlɛ karɛ ŋ haay ʊ.
Awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a dɔ a ʊ, Krista a meerbaa da mɔɔ lɛ ʊ mɔɔ n'a bam, gɛɛ lɔ? K'a maam awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ. Paŋŋawarzaa bɛɛ m Krista m awɔɔ gʊr zi y. A y'a paŋŋa bɩ hɩnkarɛ awɔɔ bire ʊ.

Sɩra m, a zɛ kʊ n y'a ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ, a nyɩnta paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ, bɩ, a y'a mɩsɩrbaa bam kɛɛrɛ Woso paŋŋa tɔ ma. Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ sɔ, bɩ, ʊ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʊm kan kɩ, ʊ n'ʊ zi bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ Woso paŋŋa m.

K'a bɔ a dɩga a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma a zim, awɔɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ gɛ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Yeezuu Krista y'awɔɔ bire ʊ, gɛɛ lɔ? K'awɔɔ n a dɔ, k'a maam, k'awɔɔ bɩ wɔŋ ʊ a a sɩrakarɛ zibəəro hɩnka bɩ tɔ ma m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ bɩ jɩra m sɩrakarɛ zibəəro hɩnkarɛ ra wa.

Yaa wɔɔ n'a dam Woso m, k'awɔɔ bɩ mimbʊnyaa ba y. Ʊ ka bɛɛ wɔɔ nawʊm ma, k'ʊ a hɩnka awɔɔ m, ʊ ʊ, ʊ gumə ta ʊ wa. Ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm ma k'awɔɔ n a mɩŋŋa ba, baa k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, wɔɔ bɩ gumə yɩm mim kʊ wɔɔ dɩnda naa nɔ ʊ y.
Bala, wɔɔ ba paŋŋa m k'ʊ sɩra da jɩm ʊ y. Paŋŋa wɔɔ n ta m k'ʊ a ka, kʊ sɩra n ta lɛɛ.
Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ nɩ paŋŋa m denter, wɔɔ y'ʊ heer nyɔɔm. Wɔɔ n'a yɛm Woso han bɩ n naa karɛ. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ.

Naa tɔ ma m, kʊ mɔɔ gɔɔta m m laatʊ awɔɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ nɩ naa haay gʊrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma. K'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ lee ku awɔɔ bire ʊ, m bɩ m da m nyaa ma kan awɔɔ kɩ, lɛ kʊ Zuuba a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ nɩ y. Bala, lɛ kʊ Zuuba a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, a ka a ʊ mɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ bankarɛ tɔ ma, a n a ka mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m ŋ zaar ba y.

Kɛɛrɛ naa, m danyɩnɔ, m leer mɔɔ n'a sore awɔɔ m. K'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm. A bɩr a tɔŋ ʊ k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ. K'a bɩr kʊ heer yom. A bɩr kʊ marɛ. A bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam laafɩɩ kan kʊ kɩ nɔ ʊ. Maam bɩ, kʊ ŋʊarɛzaa kan laafɩɩzaa kɩ m Woso m bɩ, a nyɩntam kan awɔɔ kɩ.
K'a yaa da kʊ m mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ. Wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka, kan Woso ŋʊarɛ kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zɛkʊra kɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Galatians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci naa do bam, kristazibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, gʊɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ y, bɩ gʊaa bɛɛ mɔɔ nyɔɔ sɔ y, Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa, kan Zɩ Woso k'a a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ k'ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ kan danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ n'awɔɔ m, an nɩ Galasii kʊrɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso han, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ han, kʊ ŋ nɩ barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Yeezuu mɩŋŋa ɩ yɛ an ga, k'a wɔɔ bʊmbɔ ʊ mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ, k'a a da ma a wɔɔ yɔ durnya bʊnyaa naa do wɔ ʊ, amba wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Woso tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
A bɔ k'awɔɔ nawʊm Woso k'a awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ n yɩ a gʊɔɔ Krista barka minto b'ʊ, a ta k'a zu lemim nyɩnta vanta ʊ bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ n zɛ kədə.
A bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ lemim nyɩnta vanta n ta ʊ wa, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ warm kʊ ma, ŋn'a kam ma k'a Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ zaar ba.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa lemim nyɩnta vanta dɩnda awɔɔ m, an a hɔ kan lemim kʊ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ, baa kʊ wɔɔ m, baa kʊ malɛɛka y'a to arzana ʊ an bɩ naa ba, kʊ Woso nɔmaa n a kərgu a zaa ra.
Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m so ra, kʊ gʊaa lemim nyɩnta vanta pa da awɔɔ m, bɩ lemim k'awɔɔ si hɔɔ bɩ bɛɛ, kʊ Woso nɔmaa n a kərgu a zaa ra.

Ncɩnaaʊ naa, m ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔ n yɩ kan m kɩ ra? Gɛɛ, kʊ Woso nɔ n yɩ kan m kɩ ra? A ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ gʊɔɔ n m ŋʊa ra? Ayy…, kʊ m ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔ n yɩ m la, mɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam Krista zibəənyɩ dɔ y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, lemim nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ n a to gʊɔɔ zi y.
Bala, a ma bɛɛ mɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ zi y, bɩ gʊɔɔ bɛɛ y'a dɩnda mɔɔ n sɔ y, Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa y'a hɩnka mɔɔ m, mɔɔ n a dɔ.
Nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ hɔ niŋŋə biisi, m nɩ zum zɩɩfʊrɔ wosozaa ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ mim ma. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ fɩr ka Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ ma gʊta maam-maam, kʊ m a zaar ba.
Zu kʊ mɔɔ nawʊm zɩɩfʊrɔ wosozaa b'ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ cem m muno zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ han zaa bɩ zuure nɔ ʊ gʊta, m nɩ m yoŋ ʊ gʊta m lɛ da ŋ la, m yaabɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ Woso lɛɛ ka an mɔɔ bɔ ʊ a barka bɩ tɔ ma kʊ m a zi ba, bɩ ma bɩ, mɔɔ n yɩ cɩna y. Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, an mɔɔ bir zibəə bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ k'a b'a ŋʊa kʊ mɔɔ n'a Nyɩ bɩ dɔ kʊ m a pa da do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ m bɩ, mɔɔ n m ka ma kʊ m gʊaa lar ma y,
mɔɔ n ta Zerizalɛm ʊ sɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka mɔɔ m ŋn'a ba kristazibəəzannɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi y, m hʊr mɔɔ ʊ lɛɛm m ta Araabɩrɔ kʊ ʊ, m m to b'ʊ, m bʊr Damas kʊ ʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ dɔɔraa kaakʊ kur bɩ, mɔɔ n ta Zerizalɛm ʊ, kʊ m aa Sefas
dɔ, mɔɔ gɔɔta b'ʊ kan kɩ dɔmɩm bueeresoor.
Mɔɔ n zibəəzaa vanta yɩ kʊ *Zakkɩ bɛɛ y, Zuuba danzaa bɩ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m ci b'ʊ naa, Woso n mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, ŋʊaar bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a barɛ y.
M hʊr kʊ mɔɔ ʊ Zerizalɛm ʊ bɩ jɛ ʊ, ta mɔɔ ʊ Siiri kʊrɔ ʊ, kan Silisii kʊrɔ ʊ kɩ.
Bɩ, Zidee kʊrɔ wɔɔ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ yɩ deem y.
A ma ŋ y'a ʊ bala, n n'a dɩndarɛ, n ʊ: «Gʊaa k'a nɩ fɩr kam wɔɔ ma biisi bɩ, a ɩ Krista zaa k'a nyɩnta an n'a zaar bam bɩ pa dam kɛɛrɛ.»
Naa do n a ka, ŋn'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ mɔɔ minto.
Dɔɔraa bueeresi cenle jɛ ʊ, mɔɔ m bɔ, m m ya, m ta Zerizalɛm ʊ kan Barnabas kɩ, mɔɔ Tiitɩ gaa m ta m kan m kɩ sɔ.

Woso y'a hɩ mɔɔ m hɔhɩnkarɛ nɔ ʊ, a ʊ, mɔɔ n ta, bɩ minto m mɔɔ n ta. Kʊ wɔɔ yaa lee ku bɩ, mɔɔ lemim nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ n'a pa dam do vantɔɔ barla bɩ sa, m a dɩnda ŋ nɩ. Mɔɔ sokʊma ba kan lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ a minto m a dɩnda ŋ nɩ sɔ, kʊ zi kʊ mɔɔ ba kan zi kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ kɩ bɩ bɔ vam y.
Baa mɔɔ zukuuzaa Tiitɩ kʊ grɛkkɩ gʊaa m bɩ, ŋ n a ka ma k'a paŋŋa ba ma k'an gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ y.

A n bɔkarɛ gʊɔɔ a da wɔɔ zi ŋn'a hɩrɛ a ma kristagʊɔɔ bɩ ŋʊaarzannɔ m, brɔɔ a nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ kʊ Tiitɩ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ. A da ŋ y'a ʊ wɔɔ zi k'a soamɩŋŋaʊ kʊ Krista Yeezuu a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ sɩnsɩɩ, a ŋʊa ŋ y'a ʊ k'a a ya, a wɔɔ da lɔmbaa ma.
Wɔɔ n yɛ ŋ ma y, wɔɔ n'ʊ ka ma k'ʊ kʊ ma kan ŋ kɩ baa poore tɔkkɛ y, a ba wɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ sɩra k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ m bɩr a bɩncɛ ʊ.
Kʊ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ m, ŋ lɛɛzaabaa mim n pakra ba mɔɔ ma y, bala, Woso bɩr gʊɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y. Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ n mɔɔ da hɔsɩ vanta barɛ ma lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ nɔ ʊ y.
Bɩ, ŋ yɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, Woso mɔɔ da ʊ kʊ m lemim nyɩnta pa da do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ m, amba Woso Pɩyɛɛr da ʊ k'an a pa da zɩɩfʊrɔ m bɩ m.
Bala, Woso k'a Pɩyɛɛr bɔ ʊ, an a nyɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ ma bɩ, Woso bɩ do ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ sɔ, an mɔɔ nyɔɔ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ zi.

Kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɩgam Zakkɩ kan Sefas kɩ Zaan kɩ ma a lɛɛzannɔ, brɔɔ yɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ Woso a barka ka mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n zi bɩ ba denter. A m naa, ŋnɩ mɔɔ wɔ nyasʊ, k'a hɩnka a ʊ, kʊmarɛ ɩ wɔɔ bire ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ m ta do vantɔɔ wɔɔ zi, kʊ ŋ bɔɔm n ta zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ zi.
Bɩ, hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a cɩnta bɩ, ŋ ʊ, ʊ ʊ da ŋʊazannɔ han, bɩ kʊ hɔ bɩ do nɩ, mɔɔ ba denter.
Bɩ, Sefas k'a bɩ bʊr Antɩyɔs ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ ba kan kɩ gʊaa haay lɛɛ, k'a kʊrɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Bala nyɩnta a ʊ, an nɩ hɔ bɩm kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, Zakkɩ gʊɔɔ nyɔɔ bɩ ŋnɩ lee ku cɩna y. Kʊ ŋ bɩ lee ku bɩ, an a da a ra, an a gʊ ŋ ma an jɩm a hɔ, nyi k'a n'a bam zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ m gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m bɩ minto.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ m ŋnɩ nyɩnta b'ʊ kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a hɔbaa sa sɔ, naa n a ka Barnabas mɩŋŋa n gasʊ ŋ hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zibəə b'ʊ.

Kʊ mɔɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ bɩr zum sɩra k'a nɩ lemim nyɩnta b'ʊ tɩrga bɩ, mɔɔ hɩ Sefas m gʊaa haay lɛɛ mɔɔ ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n zɩɩfʊ bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam am do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ hɔ bɩ m bɩ, ɩ bɩr a bam am zɩɩfʊrɔ hɔ m bɩ, a a ba lɔ ɩbɩɩ n'a ŋʊam k'ɩ paŋŋa ba do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma kʊ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa ba am zɩɩfʊrɔ hɔ nɩ?»
Zɩɩfʊrɔ m wɔɔ m, wɔɔ zɩrɔ ɩ nyɩnta maam, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso lɛrɔ dɔ rɔ bɛɛ n wɔɔ nɩ y.

Bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, gʊaa b'a dam ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ Moyiisi lɛrɔ zibəəro barɛ minto y, sɩra ka Yeezuu Krista ʊ nɩ gʊaa bam tɩrga bala. Sɩra wɔɔ ka Krista Yeezuu ʊ sɔ kʊ Woso n'ʊ ba tɩrga a tɔ ma, bɩ lɛrɔ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, bala, n bɩ gɔsɩ bam tɩrga lɛrɔ zuure tɔ ma y.
Wɔɔ, ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ n n'ʊ ba tɩrga Krista tɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, ʊ ba wɔɔ ʊ mimbʊnyaabənno sɔ am do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ m. K'a maam Krista bɩ mimbʊnyaa zi an n'a bam na? Ayy… fɩɩga!
Bala, kʊ mɔɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure to k'a b'a dam ma an gʊaa ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ bɩ minto, kʊ mɔɔ n ya m m bɔ kʊ m zu ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ m bam lɛrɔbɩsɩkamazaa kɛɛrɛ.
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto bɩ, mɔɔ bɩr m mɩsɩrbaa bam lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma dɔ y, kʊ m m da ma m m mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba Woso tɔ ma. Kʊ n Krista wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ, mɔɔ ga kan kɩ.

Mɩsɩrbaa kʊ mɔɔ n ta m naa, mɔɔ bɛɛ m ta nɩ y, Krista n a mɩsɩrbaa bam mɔɔ ʊ. Mɩsɩrbaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam her-her naa, a ba mɔɔ nawʊm sɩra ka Krista ʊ nɔ ʊ, a m Woso Nyɩ, an mɔɔ ŋʊa an yɛ an ga mɔɔ tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ bɩr Woso barka bɩ bam hɔ nɩbɩr y, bala, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma gʊaa a da ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ, k'a maam, Krista bɩ ga a ʊ vam.
Aba! Galasii zannɔ, hɔɔnwarzannɔ. Nka ɩ wɔ ʊ an awɔɔ hɔɔn wusigə ncɩnaaʊ? A n bɔkarɛ n y'a hɩnka awɔɔ m mɩŋŋa, a dɔ a ʊ, Yeezuu Krista ga gɔdarkʊra ma.
Kʊ m laaka da a han wa: Lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure minto y'a ka Woso n a Ɛspri bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ ra, gɛɛ zu k'awɔɔ ʊ sɩrakarɛ lemim b'ʊ bɩ minto nɩ?
Bɔ yarmabaa m naa? Woso zuure bɩ sɩŋŋɩda sa awɔɔ ʊ Woso Ɛspri paŋŋa m, a bɔkarɛ an n'a ŋʊam kɛɛrɛ k'a nyambʊr a mɛsim paŋŋa m na?
Ziro kʊ Woso ŋ ba awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ vam kan awɔɔ kɩ ra? Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɔɔ ʊ, ŋ bɩ vam kan awɔɔ kɩ sɩɩn!
Kʊ Woso y'a Ɛspri karɛ awɔɔ ʊ, an nɩ hoserlo barɛ awɔɔ bire ʊ, naa ba an nawʊm lɛrɔ wɔɔ k'awɔɔ nɩ zure ŋ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma ra? Gɛɛ zu k'awɔɔ ʊ sɩrakarɛ lemim b'ʊ bɩ tɔ ma nɩ?
K'a a yo Abraham n sɩra ka Woso ʊ, Woso n dɩga ma tɩrga a mɩm ʊ bɩ,
k'a maam, k'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, sɩrakənno wɔɔ n Abraham nyɩnɔ.

A n ta ʊ sɔ bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ ka an a hɩ hɔɔ a ʊ, Woso do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bam tɩrga a mɩm ʊ ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, bɩ minto m Woso n lemim nyɩnta naa do hɩ Abraham m, a ʊ: ‹Tara burə gʊɔɔ do haay barka yɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.›
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ sɩrakənno m nɔ wɔɔ nɩ barka yɩm kan sɩrakarɛzaa Abraham kɩ.
Bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yom lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Gʊaa k'a bɩr hɔ haay kʊ n y'a da lɛrɔ wɔɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ bam tee… bɩ, lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ ɩ kan kɩ.›
Sɩra nɔ ʊ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma y, bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: ‹Gʊaa k'an tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bam.›
Lɛrɔ wɔɔ zaa bɩ y'a hɔ kan sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ kɩ, bala, n ʊ: ‹Gʊaa k'a nɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ haay bɩ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩm.›

Krista a mɩŋŋa ka n a zɛ wɔɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʊ maam k'a wɔɔ bʊmbɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ nɔ ʊ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ sompi wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʊ an lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ bɩ yɩ, bala, Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ ɩ kan gʊaa kʊ n y'a zeŋŋə gɔ ma bɩ kɩ.›
Nyɩnta ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m barka kʊ Abraham a yɩ bɩ yɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, wɔɔ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, ʊ makra sa gʊɔɔ minkəm zibəə nɔ ʊ, kʊ gʊaa a hɔɔnhɔ da ci ʊ an a cɩnta, amba a a ga m bɩ nɩ, kʊ n a ba a zɛ kur, gɔsɩ bɩr hɔ k'a hɩ bɩ zaar barɛ, b'a bɩr hɔ nam ma sɔ y.
A do m bɩ sɔ, lerbɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ bɔ Woso ʊ Abraham m kan a nyɩ bɩ kɩ m. N n a hɩ, n ʊ: «A nyɩnɔ y,» ɩ ʊ a hɩ n y'a ʊ nyɩnɔ hɔka ma y, ayy…, nyɩ bɩ deem, bɩ nyɩ bɩ, Krista m, bɩ n ʊ, k'a hɩ ma.

Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɔɔnhɔ hɩ an a cɩnta, dɔɔraa zorsi bukərku kur bɩ, n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ bɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, ncɩnaaʊ naa, lɛrɔ wɔɔ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Woso lɛɛ ka an a hɩ bɩ zaar ba, ŋnɩ ler kʊ Woso a bɔ bɩ zaar ba sɔ wa.
Bala, kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma m gʊaa nɩ hɔjirle yɩm Woso zi, k'a maam Woso lerbɔrɛ tɔ ma bɛɛ dɔ y. A n bɔkarɛ ler kʊ Woso a bɔ bɩ y'a ka Woso n a barka ka Abraham ʊ.

Kʊ ncɩnaaʊ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ zibəə n bɔ m kɛɛrɛ? Lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka Woso ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ hɩnkam wɔɔ m, kʊ nyɩ kʊ Woso ler bɩ bɔ a tɔ ma bɩ n tolle ba an yɩ. Malɛɛkarɔ ɩ bʊr lɛrɔ wɔɔ m, gʊaa deem ɩ nyɩnta malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ bire ʊ.
Lɛrɔ wɔɔ karɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, a yɩ pakra kʊ gʊaa n nyɩnta ʊ ŋ karɛ ma, bɩ ler bɩ bɔrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, Woso mɩŋŋa mim m bɩ a deem.

Naa k'a hɩ a ʊ, lɔ? Lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ŋn'a kam Woso lerbɔrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma ra? Ayy…, a bɛɛ m naa y. Bala, kʊ yɩ an nawʊrɛ ɩ ʊ, lɛ niŋŋə n ta ʊ, gʊɔɔ n'a dam ma ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa yɩ a tɔ ma, k'a maam lɛ bɩ do n'a kam gʊɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, Wosoci b'a hɩ a ʊ, mimbʊnyaa paŋŋa y'a so durnya gʊɔɔ ʊ jilli. Maam bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ, sɩra kʊ ŋ y'a ka Yeezuu Krista ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
