Dɔmɩm kʊ sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ n bʊr cɩna bɩ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ ɩ wɔɔ ba a lɔnnɔ ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma, kʊ Woso n tolle ba an sɩrakarɛ zaa bɩ hɩnka.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ, dɔ ŋ y'a ʊ wɔɔ ma, kʊ Krista n tolle ba an bʊr, kʊ Woso n wɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʊ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, sɩra ka Krista ʊ dɔmɩm m, lɛrɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'ɩ dɔm wɔɔ ma bɩ, ŋ bɛɛ y'a so wɔɔ ʊ dɔ y.
Bala, awɔɔ woo… naa, Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Krista Yeezuu ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Denter m, awɔɔ haay k'a batɛm si Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa n n'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʊ jilli.

Naa tɔ ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, kʊ zɩɩfʊ n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ do vanta gʊaa n'ɩ mɩ, minsi bɛɛ n bɩ y, kʊ lɔ n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʊzaa n'ɩ mɩ, minsi bɛɛ n bɩ sɔ y, kʊ yar n'ɩ mɩ, gɛɛ lʊ n'ɩ mɩ minsi bɛɛ sɔ y. Bala, awɔɔ woo… naa, awɔɔ a ba deem Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ Krista y'a so awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, k'a maam Abraham nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ nɩ hɔjirle kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Nyɩ k'a nɩ zɛm b'a so a zɩ hɔnyɩ ʊ bɩ, a nyɩbaa dɔmɩm ʊ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan lɔ kɩ, an bɔkarɛ a y'a so hɔnyɩ b'ʊ jilli.
A nyɩbaa dɔmɩm ʊ, gʊɔɔ nɩ nyasʊm nɩ, ŋnɩ dɩgarɛ a mim woo… ma, kʊ dɔmɩm k'a zɩ b'a cɩnta k'an a so a hɔnyɩ b'ʊ bɩ n tolle ba an a ku.
A do m bɩ sɔ kan wɔɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm kʊ wɔɔ n Krista dɔ cɩna bɩ, bɔ wɔɔ ʊ kʊ ʊ kan nyɩnɔ kɩ, dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʊ gʊaa bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ y'a so wɔɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ wɔɔ ba lɔnnɔ.
Bɩ, dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku bɩ, a a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ, lʊ y'a yɩ. Yɩ a ʊ, dɔmɩm kʊ Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ ma.
K'a a da ma a gʊɔɔ kʊ lɔnnɔ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ minto rɔ wɔɔ yɔ, kʊ Woso n wɔɔ ba a nyɩnɔ.
Kʊ Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m bɩ y'a ka, an a Nyɩ bɩ Ɛspri bɩ zer wɔɔ heerlɔ ʊ, wɔɔ n'ʊ dam ma Ɛspri bɩ tɔ ma, ʊ nɩ Woso birm, ʊ ʊ: «Ʊ Zɩ.»
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, lɔnnɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m dɔ y, Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ k'a nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a so a hɔjirle b'ʊ, Woso n nɩ naa barɛ.
Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ biisi awɔɔ n Woso dɔ bɩ, zu awɔɔ nawʊm hɔɔ kʊ n n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ma wosoro, a a ba ŋ lɔnnɔ, bɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro, Woso bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y.

Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ Woso dɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, Woso awɔɔ dɔ, b'a a ba lɔ kɛɛrɛ, a a ya, a a bɔ k'a zu durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʊ gʊaa bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ ʊ, k'a a ya, a a ba ŋ lɔnnɔ? Bɩ hɔɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, ŋ ba paŋŋa nɩ y.
Awɔɔ ɩ dɩgam dɔmɩnnɔ niŋŋoo ma dɔmɩm wɩsɩrɔ a yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ, an n'a bam maam sɔ kan monno niŋŋoo kɩ, hɔɔ niŋŋoo dɔmɩm kɩ, dɔɔraarɔ kɩ.
Awɔɔ mim naa ɩ mɔɔ da bɔŋ ʊ, ɩ b'a ka zi mɔɔ ba awɔɔ minto vam wa?
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ n nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han gʊta, amba mɔɔ m ba awɔɔ gʊaa deem bɩ, k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa sɔ. A zar bɛɛ awɔɔ ʊ mɔɔ ma y.
Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, mɔɔ yaaba zɛrɛ sabaabʊ y'a ka mɔɔ n lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m, m lɛɛkarɛ zɛrɛ ma awɔɔ zi b'ʊ.
K'awɔɔ bɩ to a kɔ mɔɔ yaaba bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ n mɔɔ bɔ ʊ y, b'awɔɔ n a si mɔɔ lɛɛ y. Bɩ mɔɔ si awɔɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʊ, Woso malɛɛka deem awɔɔ si, ɩ ʊ, Krista Yeezuu mɩŋŋa awɔɔ si.
Heernyɔɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m biisi b'ɩ ka? Mɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa m ʊ, k'awɔɔ n'a dam ma, awɔɔ y'a mɩnyaarɔ waaŋ ʊ a ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, m ba mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ jɩm sɩra kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ minto ra?
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋʊaar hɔ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ, tʊntɔʊrɛ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta m kan awɔɔ kɩ naa, tʊntɔʊrɛ paan… bɛɛ y, a ka ŋ nawʊm ma k'a awɔɔ gʊ mɔɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n a tɔ ʊ kan a kɩ.
A mɩŋŋa kʊ gʊɔɔ n bɩr ta tʊntɔʊrɛ m hɔ mɩŋŋa tɔ ma, b'a ga a ʊ m kʊ tʊntɔʊrɛ bɩ do n bɩr tam lɛɛ tee…, baa kʊ mɔɔ ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, gɛɛ kʊ mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ b'ʊ y.
Mɔɔ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, mɔɔ m ya m nɩ fɩr yɩm paan… m heer ʊ awɔɔ tɔ ma, m nɩ nyoosi bam am lʊ jɩsɩzaa hɔ bɩ m, kʊ m a ka k'awɔɔ n Krista mɩsɩrbaa yɩ paan….
A ŋʊa mɔɔ nawʊm paan… kʊ m bɩr awɔɔ bire ʊ b'ʊ dɩɩtaa, kʊ m m meerbaa bɩ lʊr m a ba, bala, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ mɔɔ meer bɩ bam kan awɔɔ kɩ lʊnlɔ y.
Awɔɔ k'a n'a ŋʊam kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a so a ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a hɩ m m wa. Awɔɔ n hɔ kʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ ma ra?
N y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ, Abraham nyɩnɔ yɩ hɩɩya, deem yɩ a ʊ kan Agaar kɩ, lɔ m bɩ, an deem yɩ kan Saara kɩ soamɩŋŋaʊzaa m bɩ.
Bɩ lʊ kʊ lɔ m bɩ nyɩ bɩ, yɩ b'ʊ amba gʊaa haay nɩ yɩm bɩ m, an bɔkarɛ, nyɩ kʊ soamɩŋŋaʊzaa b'a yɩ bɩ, Woso ɩ lɛɛ ka an a yɩrɛ ler bɔ.

Mim naa do naa, hɔ a ʊ k'a dɩnda wɔɔ m, a ba n nɩ: Lannɔ hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ, gʊaasɩbabaa hɩɩyɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ da rɔ wɔɔ makra nɩ ŋ mɩ. Lɛɛkarɛ gʊaasɩbabaa makra m Agaar m. Gʊaasɩbabaa kʊ Woso a da Sinayii ci burə ʊ bɩ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ do a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ.
Bala, Agaar bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, Sinayii ci bɩ m, Araabɩrɔ kʊ ci bɩ do n ta ʊ, a bɔ kʊ ʊ sɔ ɩ ʊ, Zerizalɛm kʊnɔ k'an ta ʊ her-her naa m, bala, a ɩ lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
Bɩ arzana Zerizalɛm bɩ, soamɩŋŋaʊzaa m bɩ, wɔɔ kʊnɔ bɩ m bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, wɔɔ da m.
Bala, n y'a gʊrsɩra ba Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n cɩna bɩ, ɩ heer nyɔɔ,
bala, ɩbɩɩ bɩr nyɩnɔ yɩm biisi y,
heernyɔɔ zee da,
ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ n nyoosibarɛ fɩr yɩ biisi bɩ,
bala, lʊ kʊ n kaanm m bɩ nyɩnɔ yɩm gʊta,
an lɛ da lʊ k'a zim n ta ʊ bɩ nyɩnɔ ra.
B'awɔɔ, m danyɩnɔ, amba Izakkɩ m bɩ, ler kʊ Woso a bɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Biisi bɩ, amba nyɩ k'a yɩ am gʊaa haay hɔ bɩ m bɩ nɩ fɩr kam nyɩ kʊ Woso Ɛspri a ka an yɩ bɩ ma bɩ, her sɔ naa, a maam sɔ.
Bɩ, bɔ n y'a hɩ Wosoci b'ʊ? N ʊ: ‹La lʊ kʊ lɔ m bɩ ra kan a nyɩ bɩ kɩ, bala, a n a ga m kʊ lɔ bɩ nyɩ bɩ n hɔjirle yɩ kan soamɩŋŋaʊzaa bɩ nyɩ bɩ kɩ y.›
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, lɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y, lʊ kʊ soamɩŋŋaʊzaa n bɩ nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m.
Krista bɩ, wɔɔ yɔ a ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ so ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ paan…. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a ya a to gɔsɩ n'a ba hɔ niŋŋə lɔnnɔ y.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ a m, m ʊ, k'awɔɔ ʊ kʊ n a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, hɔ kʊ Krista a ba awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ nyɔɔdʊ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ dɔ y.
Kʊ m m ya m so ra paan…, kʊ gʊaa a bɔ an gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, k'an a dɔ a ʊ, pakra m k'an zu lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ haay.
Awɔɔ k'a n'a kam ma k'a yɩ tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ a gʊ Krista ma, a do awɔɔ ʊ Woso barka bɩ ma sɔ.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, a ta wɔɔ ʊ ʊ heer lɛ kʊ Woso n'ʊ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʊ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ n'a mɩm dam Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m bɩ n naa.
Bala, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, kʊ wɔɔ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, gɛɛ kʊ wɔɔ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ m bɩ y, hɔ k'a a ga m bɩ, sɩrakarɛ m, an nɩ zi bam ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ tam lɛɛ mɩŋŋa Woso zaa bɩ ra, nka y'a ta awɔɔ m toore k'awɔɔ bɩ zu sɩra ʊ dɔ?
Woso k'awɔɔ bir bɩ bɛɛ nɩ naa barɛ awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bɔɔr deem y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ: «Nyʊnyɔɔ poore ɩ nyisi derm haay.»
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ heer kookoo Zuuba tɔ ma awɔɔ mim bɩ bɩncɛ ʊ. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ yɩm deem kan mɔɔ hɔɔndarɛ bɩ kɩ. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a n'awɔɔ warm kʊ ma bɩ, Woso bɩ zaa hʊnhʊrm, baa kʊ nka m.
M danyɩnɔ, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ bɩr baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ mim pa dam dɔ y, k'a pa mɔɔ n'a dam, gʊɔɔ bɩ fɩr kam mɔɔ ma dɔ y, bɩ ŋ bɩ kaanm Krista gɔdarkʊra zɛ bɩ m sɔ y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ warm kʊ ma rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, kʊ ŋ lɛ taa kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ŋn'aa mɩŋŋɔɔ bɔ am hɔbɩsɩ hɔ bɩ m, a pakra ba ŋ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, awɔɔ bir Woso ʊ k'awɔɔ n a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ, b'a bɩ yo soamɩŋŋaʊ bɩ do ma k'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ zi ba y. Bɩ k'a yɩ kʊ zibəənyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, lemim k'a so lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ haay bɩ ba n nɩ: «Ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ ɩ mɩŋŋa ŋʊa bɩ m.»
Bɩ k'awɔɔ y'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʊ poohɔɔ n'a mɩ, an nɩ sɔ dɩndam kʊ ʊ, an nɩ kʊ kɩnkaansʊrɛ, k'a dundo a zi, kʊ n bɛɛ a kʊ nyam.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a to kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n ka a lɛɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, maam bɩ, awɔɔ b'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ barɛ y.
Hɔ kʊ mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ n'a ŋʊam bɩ bɩr yɛm Sɛnt-Ɛspri ma y, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a ŋʊam sɔ bɩ bɩr yɛm mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, jɩnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ kan kʊ kɩ, maam bɩ awɔɔ b'a dam ma a a mɩŋŋɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ ba y.
Bɩ, kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ y'a so awɔɔ ʊ dɔ y.
Mɛsim zibəəro ɩ yɩm garga ra, ŋ ba n nɩ: Jaandarɛ m, lannɔ kan yaarɔ barɛ kɩ m, dintim zibəə haay m,
yaa da *wosobaawɔnnɔ m, nyɩsɩrɔ bɩrɛ m, sɔkʊm m, bakʊmarɛ m, jɩmbaa m, kan nɔmaa kɩ, ka a mɩŋŋa daahan ma m, gʊngʊrɛ m, bazɛkʊra m,

kan mɩm bɩr gʊɔɔ hɔ ma kɩ, bɛɛmire waasɩ kɩ, kan hɔ bɩ maam-maam kɩ, kan zibəəro kʊ ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan nawɔnnɔ kɩ. Kʊ m m ya m so ra, amba mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m awɔɔ bɔ zaa ʊ bɩ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɩ gasʊm Woso cirbəə b'ʊ y.
Bɩ nyɩ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a dam gʊaa mɩsɩrbaa ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ: ŋʊarɛ m, kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, laafɩɩ kɩ, bʊraama kɩ, mɩŋŋabaa kɩ, bamɩŋŋa kɩ, taalɛra kɩ,
kan bʊgʊ-bʊgʊdabaa kɩ, kan da a mɩŋŋa ma kɩ. Lɛrɔ wɔɔ bɩr nyaa bam hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ma y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ Krista a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ kan a hɔɔnhɔrɔ kɩ wɔ gɔdarkʊra ma.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʊ, bɩ minto bɩ, a a ga m k'an ka wɔɔ lɛɛ, ʊ mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ.
Ʊ b'ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ busu y, ʊ bɩ kʊ da nɔmaa ma y, ʊ bɩ jɩm ba kʊ ma y.

M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ gʊaa yɩ an nɩ mimbʊnyaa bam, awɔɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ karɛ a lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ, k'awɔɔ n dundo zi a bɔ zaa ʊ, bɩ kʊ m a hɩ awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə m, gʊaa biyəə n dundo a zi k'a bɩ gasʊ kʊrɔma bɩ do ʊ sɔ y.
K'a bɩr kɔm kʊ ma, a bɩr a dam kʊ han, k'awɔɔ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ, lɛ kʊ Krista a cɩnta b'awɔɔ nɩ zuŋ ʊ.
Kʊ gʊaa y'a hɔɔn darɛ a ʊ, hɔsɩ n' a mɩ, an bɔkarɛ hɔsɩ bɛɛ n'a zaa nɩ, bra an n'a barɛ a mɩŋŋa m.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa biyəə n a hɔɔn da a mɩŋŋa zibəə ma an dɩga a, kʊ lɛbɔʊrɛ y'a nɔ ʊ, k'a n'a heer nyɔɔ kan a mɩŋŋa kɩ, b'a ba gɩnga gʊaa ma k'a heer nyɔɔ y.
Bala, gʊaa biyəə n'a mɩŋŋa mim nyɩ bɔŋ ʊ Woso taa.
Gʊaa kʊ n nɩ Woso lemim dɩndam nɩ b'a ga m, an hɔ haay k'an ta m bɩ bɔ ʊ an a ka hɔdɩndarɛzaa b'ʊ.
A bɩ bra bɩmba a mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ y, Woso bɩ yɛm gʊaa n yaa wʊ a ma y, bala, hɔ kʊ gʊaa a duu b'a n'a dam.
Kʊ gʊaa a mɩŋŋa lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ zibəəro duu, hɔ k'a n'a dam bɩ n zɛ m. Bɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri hɔɔnhɔ zibəəro duum bɩ, hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ an n'a yɩm, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ m.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ bɩ kɔ kan zi mɩŋŋa barɛ kɩ y, ʊ bɩr tam lɛɛ tee…, bala, kʊ wɔɔ n kɔ y, wɔɔ y'ʊ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʊ yɩm, a dɔmɩm ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ nɩ toore n naa, ʊ zi ba gʊaa haay daahan minto, an lɛ da bɩ, ʊ a mɩŋŋa ba ʊ danyɩnɔ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ nɩ gʊrsɩra bɩ barɛ m zim, bɩ minto m gʊrsɩranyɩ bɩ n gʊta-gʊta.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ, a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a ka ŋ nawʊm ma kʊ gʊɔɔ n'a yɩ, mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ tɔ ma. Ŋ lɛ baa k'a fɩr yɩ Krista gɔdarkʊra bɩ pa darɛ tɔ ma y.
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gasʊm baŋŋʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ bɩr zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ y. Ŋ nɩ bɔkarɛ, ŋn'a ŋʊam k'awɔɔ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, k'a a da ma a a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ k'awɔɔ yɛ a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ.
Kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ ba ʊ kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista gɔdarkʊra bɩ bɛɛ y. Kan mɔɔ kɩ durnya bɩ hɔgər m Krista gɔdarkʊra bɩ tɔ ma, kan durnya bɩ kɩ sɔ, gər m mɔɔ m Krista gɔdarkʊra bɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, gɛɛ k'a n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, hɔsɩ bɛɛ n bɩ y, an lɛ da bɩ, yɩrɛdaa kʊ Woso n'a kam bɩ m.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zum hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ naa do ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, kan Woso gʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ, kʊ Woso n laafɩɩ kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ ka ŋ ʊ.
A n a sa naa ma, gɔsɩ b'a ya an mɔɔ da kɔrɛ ma y, bala, mɔɔ ɩ fɩryɩrɛ jɩrɔ m m mɛ ma, an n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Yeezuu y'a so mɔɔ ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, bɩ kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ. Amina.
Ephesians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci bɩ barɛ awɔɔ ma. Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ kʊ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ kʊ wosogʊɔɔ n'a mɩ, [an nɩ Efɛɛzɩ ʊ,] an nɩ yɛm Krista Yeezuu ma, an nɩ zɛkʊra m kan kɩ rɔ wɔɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Ʊ Woso barka da, a m Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ.
A *Sɛnt-Ɛspri barka do haay ka wɔɔ ʊ arzana ʊ, Krista zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
Woso lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ bɔ ʊ
Krista zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ,
bɩ ma bɩ, a n durnya da y,
wɔɔ bɔ a ʊ maam k'ʊ yɩ a gʊɔɔ,
kʊ minsi bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ gʊr zi a mɩm ʊ y.
K'a nɩ wɔɔ ŋʊam bɩ minto bɩ,
a a cɩnta hɔɔ tee…
kʊ wɔɔ n b'ʊ ba a nyɩnɔ
Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma,
naa a lɛ n taa a ŋʊarɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ,
a barka k'an ta lɛbɔʊrɛ m bɩ tɔ ma,
a ka an nawʊm wɔɔ ʊ vam,
kʊ wɔɔ nɩ zɛkʊra m kan a Nyɩ ŋʊarɛzaa bɩ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
Bala, Krista ma bɩ tɔ ma bɩ,
Woso wɔɔ bʊmbɔ,
an wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʊ.
A barka bɩ gʊtabaa tɔ ma m.
A barka bɩ k'a ka wɔɔ ʊ gʊta bɩ minto bɩ,
a a ka wɔɔ nɩ mindɔrɛ m kan hɔɔn kɩ m.
A a ka wɔɔ n a hɔɔnhɔ k'a nyaakʊm da bɩ dɔ,
hɔ k'a cɩnta biisi tee… k'a ba Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Hɔ kʊ Woso a cɩnta k'a ba a nyambʊr dɔmɩm k'a bɔ ʊ bɩ ma bɩ,
a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔ k'a nɩ brama haay kan hɔ k'a nɩ tara burə ʊ haay kɩ bɩ,
an n'a som kʊ ma kʊ Krista deem taan… n yɩ ŋ soʊrezaa.
Hɔ woo… ba Woso n nawʊm a hɔɔnhɔ ma,
bɩ y'a ka an lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ bɔ ʊ,
amba a lɛ n taa bɩ m,
kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ a gʊɔɔ.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ zɛkʊra m kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ bɩ tɔ ma m.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, an wɔɔ hɔjirle ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Naa ba a ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a gʊtabaa ʊ wɔɔ tɔ ma,
wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʊ Krista ta ʊ heer lɛ rɔ wɔɔ.
A do n naa sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Krista nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ sɩra lemim bɩ ma, lemim nyɩnta k'a n'awɔɔ bʊmbɔm bɩ m.
Awɔɔ n sɩra ka Krista ʊ,
a m bɩ Woso n Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ler bɔ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ ka a ʊ wɔɔ ʊ,
k'a hɩnka a ʊ, a hɔ haay, k'a ler bɔ bɩ kam wɔɔ ʊ,
wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩm, dɔmɩm kʊ wɔɔ n bɩ bɔlɛm yɩŋ ʊ fasɩ b'ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ Woso gʊtabaa ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma m, kʊ mɔɔ sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Zuuba Yeezuu ʊ bɩ mim ma bɩ, m a ma sɔ, n ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay ŋʊam bɩ,
kʊ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n'a barka dam awɔɔ minto dɔmɩm haay.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Woso bɩ han, wɔɔ Zɩ k'a nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m gʊta bɩ, k'an mindɔrɛ ka awɔɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a bɩr Woso dɔm, k'a b'a dɔ paan….

A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm han sɔ, k'a n'awɔɔ hɔɔn gu a lɛɛgure bɩ m, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ bir ma bɩ dɔ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a hɔnyɩ k'an a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ dɔ sɔ, hɔjirle hɔnyɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm sɔ, k'a n a ka k'awɔɔ n a paŋŋa gʊta k'a zi bam wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ dɔ, wɔɔ kʊ sɩrakarɛzannɔ m wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ. K'awɔɔ n a paŋŋa bɩ gʊtabaa k'a cem haay dɔ.
Paŋŋa bɩ do Woso zi ba m an a hɩnka, Yeezuu Krista mɩm k'a a bɔ ʊ bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ, an a ka an nyɩnta a bɩsɩ ra arzana ʊ.
A n a ka Yeezuu nɩ paŋŋazannɔ do haay burə ʊ, lɛɛzannɔ do haay, lɛɛsoʊrezannɔ haay, cirbəə do haay kɩ burə ʊ. A a ka an nɩ hɔ k'an ta ʊ her durnya naa ʊ gɛɛ booti m haay burə ʊ.
A a ka Krista n a so hɔ haay ʊ. A a ka an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ, an a ka an a ba a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma minzaa.
Kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ m Krista mɛ. A mɩŋŋa n'a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ a gʊr zi jilli, Woso mɩŋŋa n'ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bam Krista mɩŋŋa gʊr zi jilli sɔ.
Biisi bɩ, gəəno n'awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ kan a mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ ma.
A mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba awɔɔ nawʊm am durnya gʊɔɔ hɔ bɩ m. A n nɩ zum paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ warkʊ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ cir b'ʊ. Cir bɩ do bɩ, zinəro cir k'a nɩ zi bam kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam Woso ma kɩ bɩ m.

Wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ nyɩnta ŋ barla sɔ, ʊ nɩ hɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ wɔɔ mɛsim lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ bam. Ʊ nɩ zure ʊ mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ ʊ, kan ʊ hɔɔndarɛrɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʊ. Kʊ wɔɔ n maam bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso nɔmaa n n'a kərgure ŋ la rɔ wɔɔ m wɔɔ m, amba gʊɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ, Woso cicirzɛrɛ bɩ gʊta maam-maam, k'a nɩ wɔɔ ŋʊam gʊta bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ y'a ka, gɩnga kʊ wɔɔ ʊ, ʊ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʊ Krista zɛkʊra tɔ ma. Denter m, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ bɩ, Woso wɔɔ mɩm bɔ ʊ kan kɩ, an wɔɔ nyɩnta kan kɩ arzana ʊ, ʊ nɩ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ.
A ba a ʊ wɔɔ m mɩŋŋa ncɩnaaʊ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ, k'a barka gʊtabaa hɩnka gʊɔɔ m, wakatɩ haay k'a nɩ zɛm nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ minto bɛɛ y'a ka awɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ y, Woso ganwʊrɛ m an a ka awɔɔ ʊ vam.
Awɔɔ zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y, ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ y.
Bala, Woso ɩ wɔɔ da, wɔɔ da a ʊ, Krista Yeezuu zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ba zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ nɔ ʊ gʊta, Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛɛ ka an zibəəro wɔɔ duro banka kʊ wɔɔ n bɩ ŋ ba.

Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: awɔɔ, kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, biisi bɩ, awɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ a ma ŋ ʊ, awɔɔ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ y. Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma ŋ ʊ, a gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ makra n a mɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Dɔmɩm kʊ ŋ nɩ naa hɩrɛ awɔɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ laatʊ Krista ma, awɔɔ ba gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla y, nyɩnta awɔɔ ʊ saanɔɔ. Gʊaasɩbabaarɔ kʊ Woso ŋ da a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma, an ler bɔ ŋnɩ bɩ, awɔɔ n nyɩnta ŋ nɔ ʊ y. Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ a n'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ bam durnya nɔ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ ba taaheerlɛ nɩ, b'awɔɔ n Woso dɔ sɔ y.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ k'a nyɩnta laatʊ Woso ma bɩ, Krista Yeezuu zɛkʊra bɩ nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ a zɔ Woso ma, Krista ma bɩ tɔ ma.

Bala, Krista mɩŋŋa ɩ bʊr laafɩɩ m an ba ka wɔɔ ʊ, a zɩɩfʊrɔ kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kɩ zɛ kʊ ra an ŋ ba do deem. K'a yɛ an ga gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a sɔkʊm k'a nɩ ŋ bire ʊ am pəŋŋə hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ ŋ gʊngʊm kʊ ma bɩ zaar ba.
A zɩɩfʊrɔ lɛrɔ wɔɔ, kan ŋ damarɔ kɩ, ŋ sʊfɔrɔ kɩ ci zɛ, k'a ka kʊ do hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm n a ba do deem taan… a mɩŋŋa zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ. A ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, an ŋ zɛ kʊ ra laafɩɩ nɔ ʊ.
Krista sɔkʊm zaar ba, ga k'a ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ. A zɛ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a do hɩɩyɔɔ wɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra, an ŋ ba mɛ deem, an ŋ zɛ kʊ ra kan Woso kɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, Krista n bʊr an laafɩɩ pa da awɔɔ m, awɔɔ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ bɛɛ n'a mɩ, an laatʊ Woso ma biisi rɔ wɔɔ. Bʊr a ʊ sɔ k'a laafɩɩ bɩ pa da zɩɩfʊrɔ m, brɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ jɩnjɛɛm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ.
Krista mɩŋŋa barka tɔ ma m, zɩɩfʊrɔ kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ n'ʊ dam ma, ʊ ʊ zɔ Woso ma Sɛnt-Ɛspri deem nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ kʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, saanɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m dɔ, bɩ lɛɛ laatʊrɛ gʊɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ m sɔ y. Awɔɔ ɩ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla, Woso hargʊɔɔ n'a mɩ.
Awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan cɛ kʊ n n'a dɔm kɩ, n n'a dɔm cɛjɩr kʊ kristazibəəzannɔ wɔɔ kan wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ n a cɩnta bɩ ra, cɛ bɩ jɩr jaa wɩsɩ bɩ m Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa m.
A mɩŋŋa n'a kam cɛ bɩ jaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ kʊ nyasʊm kɔɔkɔɔ, cɛ bɩ nɩ derm tee… an bɩ zɛm b'a ba Wosocɛ, Zuuba zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
Zɛkʊra k'awɔɔ n ta m kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ b'a ka, cɛ kʊ n n'a dɔm bɩ, awɔɔ n sɔ, k'a b'a ba cɛ kʊ Woso n a nɔ ʊ a Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, awɔɔ kʊ do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʊ Krista tɔ ma awɔɔ daahan minto.
Zibəə kʊ Woso mɔɔ da ʊ a barka tɔ ma, kʊ mɔɔ n a ba m m da awɔɔ han k'a hɔɔnhɔ n kʊ yɩ awɔɔ gʊr zi bɩ, awɔɔ zibəə bɩ do mim ma mɩŋŋa.
Gɩnga kʊ Woso n ta m an a nyaakʊm da bɩ, a a hɩnka mɔɔ m kʊ mɔɔ n a dɔ. A mim mɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m ci bɩ nɔ ʊ poore m cem bɩ.
K'awɔɔ ci kʊ mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma naa karɩnda ba, awɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ a ʊ, mɔɔ Krista mim k'a nyaakʊm da bɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa.
Biisi bɩ, Woso n Krista mim k'a nyaakʊm da bɩ hɩnka gɔsɩ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso mim bɩ do hɩnka a zibəəzannɔ m, kan a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.

Krista mim k'a nyaakʊm da Woso n a hɩnka bɩ ba n nɩ: A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra kan Krista kɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, brɔɔ hɔjirle kʊ Woso a cɩnta zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ m bɩ yɩm sɔ kan ŋ kɩ. Ŋ y'a ba hɔdeem kan zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ler kʊ Woso a bɔ Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ, ŋ woo… hɔ m.
Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n ganwʊrɛ yɩ, m m ba lemim nyɩnta bɩ zibəənyɩ, Woso y'a paŋŋa zi ba an yɩ mɔɔ ma ncɩnaaʊ.
Mɔɔ m wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ poorero wɔɔ poore, baa kan naa kɩ haay, Woso gan wʊ mɔɔ ma. Kʊ mɔɔ m hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Krista nɔ ʊ, bɩ ŋ tɛkka ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ pa da do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.
Kʊ m a ka, kʊ gʊɔɔ m hɔ kʊ Woso a nyaakʊm da biisi bɩ kʊ yɩrɛ zaa dɔ. Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ hɔ haay da, a ɩ hɔ naa do nyaakʊm da sɔ biisi tee….
Woso bɩ, naa do ba a ʊ, kʊ paŋŋazannɔ kan paŋŋasoʊrezannɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ n Woso mindɔrɛ k'a zaa n hɔka bɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ tɔ ma.
Naa ba Woso ʊ, bala, a a cɩnta hɔɔ laatʊ, bɩ ma bɩ durnya ba ʊ y, k'a hɔɔnhɔ naa do ba wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan Krista kɩ ʊ sɩra ka ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ lɛ m k'ʊ zɔ Woso ma kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han k'a b'a heer zar kʊ mɔɔ nɩ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ awɔɔ minto bɩ tɔ ma y. Mɔɔ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ bɩ, a ka a nawʊm awɔɔ m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ.
Naa tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ kukurə zɛm Zɩ Woso taa.
A mɩŋŋa har haay a to zi brama kan tara burə ʊ kɩ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm han, a lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊtabaa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a n'awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra Sɛnt-Ɛspri m, k'a a da ma a bɩr paŋŋa m a heer nɔ ʊ.
K'an a ka sɔ, kʊ Krista n nyɩnta awɔɔ heer ʊ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm sɔ, k'awɔɔ m məsi da a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ kʊ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Maam bɩ, awɔɔ wɔŋ ʊ kan wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay, a Krista ŋʊarɛ gʊtabaa kan a jintəbaa kɩ, a hɛ kɩ, kan a nɔyaa kɩ jɩ dɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ n a ŋʊarɛ bɩ dɔ, baa kʊ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a dɔ haay bɩ kɩ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a dɔ, kʊ Woso mɩsɩrbaa jilli n'awɔɔ heer han.
Woso mɩŋŋa a da ma an hɔ woo… ba, an lɛ da hɔ haay kʊ wɔɔ n'a yɛm, gɛɛ ʊ n'ʊ hɔɔn dam ma bɩ ra, naa ba a nawʊm kan paŋŋa k'a nɩ zi bam wɔɔ gʊr zi bɩ kɩ m.
Bɩ k'a tɔ m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ gʊr zi, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma, wakatɩ haay nɔ ʊ, dɔmɩm haay. Amina!
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a yɛ awɔɔ han kɛɛrɛ bɩ, ba n nɩ: awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʊ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ Krista zi bam bɩ tɔ ma. K'a mɩsɩrbaa ba amba Woso mɩŋŋa lɛ n taa, an awɔɔ bir ma bɩ m.
K'a bɩr a mɩŋŋɔɔ zerm tee…, a bɩr bʊgʊ-bʊgʊ, a bɩr bʊraama m, k'a yɛ kʊ ma ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
K'a a yo ʊ, a bɩr deem Sɛnt-Ɛspri zɛkʊra bɩ tɔ ma, laafɩɩ kan kʊ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Krista mɛ bɩ deem, Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ deem, taaheerlɛ hɔ kʊ Woso wɔɔ bir ma, k'ʊ b'a yɩ bɩ deem sɔ.
Wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ deem, sɩrakarɛ bɩ deem, batɛm deem wɔɔ n'a sim,
Woso deem, a m gʊaa haay Zɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʊ, an nɩ zi bam kan gʊaa haay kɩ, an nɩ gʊaa haay heer ʊ.
Bɩ Woso barka ka wɔɔ gʊaa biyəə ʊ, Krista n a jir a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Naa do Wosoci b'a hɩ ma, a ʊ:
K'a der mim ʊ bɩ,
a lɔnnɔ gaa an ta ŋ nɩ,
an gan wʊ gʊɔɔ ma.
N ʊ: ‹A der.› Naa jɩ n bɔ nɩ? Naa ʊ k'a hɩ, a ʊ, lɛɛ a ka an zer tara noom ʊ paan….
Gʊaa k'a zer bɩ, a mɩŋŋa ɩ der brama laatʊ, k'a nyɩnta hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, a ka kʊ ŋ nɩ yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ.
A ɩ gan wʊ gʊɔɔ ma. A a ka gɔsɩnnɔ n a ba a zibəəzannɔ, an a ka gɔsɩnnɔ m wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ. A n a ka nɔɔ m lemim nyɩnta padənno, an nɔɔrɔ ba a gʊɔɔ dundonno, hɔdɩndagʊɔɔnzannɔ m sɔ.
A ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a da ma ŋnɩ Woso zuure zibəə bɩ ba, kʊ Krista mɛ bɩ m ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Maam bɩ, wɔɔ tam lɛɛ haay. Ʊ sɩrakarɛ, kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ dɔrɛ kʊ wɔɔ n ta m bɩ kɩ n yɩ deem. Ʊ ma Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʊ, ʊ bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan Krista mɩŋŋa kɩ fasɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, wɔɔ bɩ nyɩntam nyɩnɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ to gʊɔɔ n bɩr ʊ yəŋŋəm jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ a hɔdɩndarɛ haay nɩ y, ŋʊaarzannɔ m, bɩ ŋ bɩ wɔŋ ʊ dɔ ŋnɩ ŋʊaar ba wɔɔ m, wɔɔ n fɔ y.
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ sɩra hɩm ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, wɔɔ mam hɔ haay nɔ ʊ Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʊ, ʊ tolle ba ʊ ʊ ba amba Krista m, a m minzaa.

A mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m, mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ jilli n kʊ nyasʊ ŋnɩ deem. Gʊaa mɛ kunəro n'a kam mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro wɔɔ nɩ kʊ nyasʊm, mɛ bɩ n deem. Maam bɩ, kʊ mɛ bɩ vəŋŋə biyəə y'a zi bam, bɩ n'a kam mɛ bɩ n bɩr tam lɛɛ tee… an bɩr mam ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, m n'a yɛrɛ awɔɔ han Zuuba tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: A b'a ya a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba am gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y, zu ŋ nawʊrɛ a hɔɔndarɛrɔ ʊ, ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩm naa barɛ nɔ ʊ y.
Monsigə y'a so ŋ hɔɔn ʊ, ŋ laatʊ mɩsɩrbaa kʊ Woso n'a kam bɩ ma. Bala, ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ y, kʊ ŋ y'a heer ta bɩ tɔ ma.
Nyannɩ bɩr ŋ zɛm fɩɩga y, a da ŋ y'a ʊ jaandarɛ lɛ ʊ, ŋnɩ dintim mɩsɩrbaa do haay bam, b'a nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ y.
B'awɔɔ, mɩsɩrbaa naa do bɛɛ Krista a dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y.
A mɩŋŋa mim n y'a dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, kʊ kristagʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, n nɩ sɩra k'a nɩ Yeezuu nɔ ʊ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m.
Naa minto bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m, a a biisi mɩsɩrbaa bɩ to, a a bɔ a mɛsim k'a lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ nɩ bra bɩmbarɛ awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ zaar ba b'ʊ.
K'a lʊrlɛ yɩ a heer kan a hɔɔn kɩ ʊ.
K'a mɩsɩrbaa daa kʊ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ ba. Woso ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do da an bɔ a mɩŋŋa rɛ, bɩ y'a ka mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do n tɩrga, an Woso nɔ yɩ, an sɩra sɔ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a b'a ya, a ŋʊaar ba y. Gʊaa biyəə n sɩra hɩ a mim m, bala mɛ deem vəŋŋoo n wɔɔ m.
K'awɔɔ nɔ ma ʊ, a b'a ka a mimbʊnyaa ba y. A b'a nɔmaa bɩ to a nɔ ʊ gum n da nɩ y.
A bɩ zaa ka Sʊtaana ʊ, an bʊr a ra y.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ koor bam biisi bɩ, an a wɔ bɔ koorbaa b'ʊ k'an zi ba an a lɛɛmaa hɔ yɩ, maam bɩ, a y'a dam ma an hɔ yɩ, an n'a dam gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa daahan ma han.
Meerbaa bʊnyaa sɩ n a ga m an bɔ awɔɔ lɛ ʊ y, k'a meerbaa k'a n'a dam gʊɔɔ han, ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ ba. K'a meerbaa mɩŋŋa ba, k'an a da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ han.
A b'a ka a Sɛnt-Ɛspri heer zɛ ma y, Woso bɩ, a ka a ʊ awɔɔ ʊ, k'a a jɩ da wɔɔ ʊ, bɩ n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Woso y'a so awɔɔ ʊ, an n'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʊ, dɔmɩm ɩ zɛm Woso n bɩ wɔɔ yɔm fasɩ-fasɩ.
A b'a to mim n bɩr a heer ʊ kan gʊaa kɩ y, a bɩ yɩ heerbusuzannɔ y, a bɩ nɔmaa ba y. A bɩ yɩ hany-hany zannɔ y, a bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊ y, k'a zi bʊnyaabarɛ do haay to.
Bɩ, k'a bɩr mɩŋŋa kan kʊ kɩ, a bɩr kʊ ŋʊam gʊta, a bɩr sugur kam kʊ ʊ, amba Woso sugur ka awɔɔ ʊ Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
K'a Woso hɔbaa dɩnda, bala, a nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, an n'awɔɔ ŋʊam.
K'a mɩsɩrbaa ba ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ amba Krista m. A ɩ wɔɔ ŋʊa, an a meeyaa ka wɔɔ tɔ ma, a mɩŋŋa a ka amba n tɩr hɔ zɛ n a ka Woso ʊ, an Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ m.
Wosogʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, an a ga m kʊ jaandarɛ mim, dintim do haay mim, lɛ n bɩr gʊaa hɔ zi mim n nyɩnta awɔɔ bire ʊ y, a bɩ sʊʊra ba ŋ ma sɔ fɩɩga y.
A n a ga m sɔ, kʊ meerbaarɔ yaarsɩrɔ n bɔ a lɛ ʊ y, hɔɔnwar kan dɔkarɛrɔ meerbaarɔ kɩ y. A ga a ʊ m k'awɔɔ n bɩr barka yaa dam Woso m.

K'a dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, jaandənno, lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔbənno, mɩnyɔɔzaa. Mɩnyɔɔzaa bɩ, wosobaawɔm yaadər m, bala, a hɔnyɩ ŋʊa an lɛ da Woso ra. Nawɔnnɔ haay, ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ gasʊm Krista kan Woso kɩ cirbəə b'ʊ fɩɩga y.
A n a ga m kʊ gʊaa n bra bɩmba awɔɔ m meerbaa vanvannɔ nɩ y. Naa woo… tɔ ma m, Woso nɔmaa n'a kərgum gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ ra.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a b'a zɛ kʊ ra kan ŋ kɩ y.
Biisi bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ monsigə ʊ, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ ɩ leegure nɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʊ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʊ naa, kʊ leegure gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, k'a leegure mɩsɩrbaa ba.
Bala, hɔ kʊ leegure nɩ zɛm nɩ bɩ, bamɩŋŋa m, kan tɩrgabaa zibəə kɩ, kan sɩra kɩ.
K'a a yo ʊ, a hɔ kʊ Zuuba lɛ n taa bɩ dɔ, a bɔ kʊ zi.
A bɩ monsigə zibəəro wɔɔ ba sɔ y, ŋ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ y, k'a ŋ bʊnyaabaa bɩ hɩ garga ra.
Hɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro n'a bam sɛɛrɛ bɩ, a hɩrɛ mɩŋŋa nyannɩ ta ʊ.
Bɩ, hɔ haay k'ʊ n nɩ bɔrɛ a mim n garga ra bɩ, hɔ bɩ do ɩ yɩm fasɩ, ʊ n'a mim dɔm.
Bala, hɔ haay k'a nɩ bɔm garga ra bɩ, a ba a nawʊm leegure. Bɩ y'a ka n a hɩ, n ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ nɩ hinceem bam bɩ,
gu hinceem ma, wuti gəəno gaa ʊ,
kʊ Krista n lɛɛ gu ɩ m.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a dundo mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ zi mɩŋŋa. A b'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba hɔɔnwar nɔ ʊ y, bɩ k'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba hɔɔntaʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bʊnyaabaa y'a so her dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔ ʊ gʊta, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a yo ʊ, a bɩr hɔ k'a ga barɛ m bɩ bam wakatɩ haay nɔ ʊ.
A bɩ yɩ hɔɔnwarzannɔ a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ nɔ ʊ y, bɩ k'a a ka ma a hɔ kʊ Zuuba lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ n a ba bɩ dɔ.
A bɩ dɩvɛn mi an a mɩm durgə y. Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa an n'a zaar bam. Bɩ, k'a to kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a a han.
K'a kʊ paŋŋa da ra Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ laarɔ m: K'a laa lɔ laarɔ ciro wɔɔ ʊ, kan mim ma laarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan laa haay kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da a heer ʊ kɩ. K'a laarɔ wɔɔ lɔ a Zuuba da ʊ kan a heer kɩ haay.
Wakatɩ haay kan mim haay kɩ nɔ ʊ, k'a Zɩ Woso barka da, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
K'a yɛ kʊ ma, k'awɔɔ nɩ Krista daŋ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Lannɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma, amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm Zuuba ma bɩ m.
Bala, lʊ minzaa n'a zim m, amba Krista n'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma bɩ minzaa bɩ m, Krista mɩŋŋa mɛ n'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma bɩ m, an a mɛ bɩ bʊmbɔrɛzaa.
Bɩ, amba kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma bɩ nɩ yɛm Krista mɩŋŋa ma bɩ, lannɔ wɔɔ k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma sɔ hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Yaarɔ wɔɔ, k'a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa, amba Krista a gʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ ŋʊa an yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma a tɔ ma bɩ m.
A a ba ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, k'a ka k'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ Woso mɩm ʊ. A gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma hu a bɔ hi m kan a lemim kɩ m.
A ŋʊa a ʊ, k'a gʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ, hubɔrɛ nɔ ʊ, mɩŋŋabaa fasɩ nɔ ʊ, kʊ kʊrɔma sɩ, gɛɛ hɔ bʊnyaa sɩ bɩ yɩ ʊ a gʊr zi y, k'an bɩr Woso soʊhɔ fasɩ, minsi bɩ yɩ ʊ a gʊr zi y.
Yaarɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, n n'a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa ncɩnaaʊ, amba ŋn'a mɛ ŋʊam bɩ m. Gʊaa k'a n'a lʊ ŋʊam bɩ, a mɩŋŋa a n'a ŋʊam.
Gʊaa ba ʊ an nɩ sɔrɛ a mɩŋŋa mɛ nɩ y, nyasʊ a nawʊm nɩ, an n'a tʊrm, amba Krista n n'a barɛ a gʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ m bɩ m.
K'a mɛ bɩ vəŋŋəro n wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma m, an nɩ nyasʊm wɔɔ m maam.
N y'a da Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: ‹Naa tɔ ma m, gʊaa n n'a gʊrɛ a zɩ kan a da kɩ ma, an a na a lʊ ma, ŋ gʊaa hɩɩya haay n a ba gʊaa deem.›
Mim naa do nɔyaa ta ʊ gʊta, mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ m ʊ, Krista kan a gʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ kɩ mim n y'a hɩ.
Bɩ, a hɩ n nawʊrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ, gʊaayar biyəə n a lʊ ŋʊa amba a a mɩŋŋa ŋʊa bɩ m, kʊ lʊ biyəə n a zim da ʊ sɔ.
Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ k'a a zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛ si, amba Zuuba lɛ n taa bɩ m, a ga a ʊ m.
Lɛɛkarɛ lɛ kʊ Woso ler bɔ an a na ma bɩ ba n nɩ: ‹Ɩ zɩ kan ɩ da kɩ da ʊ.
Maam bɩ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta yɩm, ɩ meeyaa jintə yɩm tara burə ʊ.›
Awɔɔ k'a m nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ, a bɩ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ da nɔmaa ma y, bɩ k'a ŋ tʊr, a ŋ bɔ zaa ʊ, dʊndɔrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to Zuuba zi m.
Awɔɔ kʊ lɔnnɔ n a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a zu a soʊrezannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʊ daʊrɛ gʊta m, kan a heer kɩ m haay, amba awɔɔ nɩ yɛm Krista ma bɩ m.
A bɩ ŋ zi ba kʊ ŋ nɩ dundore awɔɔ zi bɩ tɔ ma y, ɩ ʊ a ka awɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔ n yɩ a ra y. Bɩ k'a ŋ zi bɩ ba, kʊ Zuuba zibəənyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m a n nɩ zum Woso hɔɔnhɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a a zuubɔɔ wɔɔ zi ba kan a heer kɩ haay, ɩ ʊ, Zuuba zi awɔɔ n'a bam gʊɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, zi mɩŋŋa kʊ gʊaa n'a bam haay, Zuuba y'a zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʊ karɛ a zaa ʊ, baa k'a zaa bɩ lɔ m gɛɛ soamɩŋŋaʊzaa m.
Awɔɔ kʊ lɔnnɔ soʊrezannɔ n'awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ, k'a ba maam sɔ a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ m, a bɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ kan a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ Zuuba bɩ deem an nɩ brama, b'a bɩr gʊɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a nyambʊrm nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: k'a a paŋŋa da ra Zuuba zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ, a paŋŋa gʊta bɩ nɔ ʊ.
K'a yarmɔdrɔ kʊ Woso nɩ ŋ karɛ a ʊ bɩ da a ma, k'a a da ma a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Sʊtaana hɔɔnkarɛrɔ zibəə bɩ lɛ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ bɛɛ wɔɔ nɩ yar bɩ bam kan ŋ kɩ y. A ba wɔɔ nawʊm kan zinəro kɩ, kan lɛɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa bam, ŋ n'a so lɛɛrɔ ʊ, ŋ n'a so durnya naa do kʊ monsigə n b'ʊ, ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a Woso yar mɔdrɔ wɔɔ da a ma. K'a wɔ ʊ, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ dɔmɩm bʊnyaa hinni ʊ, a a da jɩm bɩ lɛ ʊ, a yar ba paan… a a da ma, k'a gɔɔta a jɩm a gam la.
K'a a banka a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ. K'a sɩra so a mɔr ʊ, am hɔsoaʊ hɔ bɩ m, k'a bɩr tɩrgabaa m, goŋŋo kʊ n n'a dure a ma n bɩ, k'a du a ma.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɩ laafɩɩ kam, k'a pa da kaarɛ-kaarɛ, kʊsɔ n bɩ awɔɔ n'a daŋ ʊ.
K'a bɩr sɩrakarɛ m, goŋŋo kʊ n n'a tarɛ a m n bɩ sɔ, awɔɔ nɩ bʊnyaabarɛzaa bɩ karɔ kʊ sɛwurə n ta ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ linlihim nɩ.
Bʊmbɔrɛ kʊ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, yarbarɛ firgə m, k'a ku a mim ma. K'a Woso lemim bɩ sa sɔ, yarbarɛ kargʊ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ.
K'a yaa da wakatɩ haay. K'a yaadarɛ do haay da Sɛnt-Ɛspri daahan nɔ ʊ. A bɩ kɔ kan yaa bɩ darɛ kɩ y, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee…. K'a yaa da wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma sɔ.
K'a yaa da mɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʊ Woso n a lemim da m lɛ ʊ, kʊ m a pa da kan heerkoodəbaa kɩ, kʊ m hɔ k'a nyaakʊm da lemim nyɩnta nɔ ʊ bɩ hɩ fasɩ-fasɩ.
Mɔɔ bɔ Woso ʊ kʊ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da, baa kʊ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ naa. Naa minto bɩ, k'a yaa da Woso m mɔɔ tɔ ma, kʊ m lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da amba a a ga m bɩ m.
Tisikkɩ mɔɔ mim dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m, k'awɔɔ n hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ dɔ. Wɔɔ danyɩ m, ʊ n'a ŋʊam, an nɩ Zuuba zi bam mɩŋŋa.
A nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ ma tɔkkɛ, k'an bɩ mɔɔ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, an awɔɔ heer yo.
Bɩ kʊ Zɩ Woso, kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ m laafɩɩ kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ, kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ ka ʊ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ŋʊam, ŋʊarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ, kʊ Woso n ŋ barka da ʊ.
Philippians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol kan Timote kɩ bɩ, Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m, ci bɩ ba wɔɔ nawʊm wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ Filipii kʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, kan a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ kɩ kan a daahanzannɔ kɩ ma.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʊ.
Kʊ mɔɔ tɩr m hɔɔn da awɔɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ yaa da Woso m barka awɔɔ tɔ ma.
Kʊ mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, a da mɔɔ n nawʊm kan heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Bala, awɔɔ jɩm mɔɔ m paan… lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʊ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ an ta an her ku.
Mɔɔ dɔ fasɩ m ʊ: zi mɩŋŋa kʊ Woso a sɩŋŋɩda ba awɔɔ gʊr zi bɩ, a tam lɛɛ an tolle ba an zibəə bɩ do nyambʊr Krista Yeezuu wusigəre hinni ʊ.

A a ga m kʊ mɔɔ nɩ m hɔɔn da awɔɔ haay ma ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʊam gʊta bɩ minto. Bala, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ naa ʊ naa, gɛɛ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ lemim nyɩnta pa dam m n'a hɩnkam sɔ m ʊ, sɩra m bɩ, awɔɔ a na mɔɔ ma barka kʊ Woso a ka mɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Denter m, Woso m mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa, a a dɔ a ʊ, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ gʊaa haay ŋʊam paan… Krista Yeezuu ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a yɛm Woso han awɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ ŋʊarɛ n bɩr a dam la tee…, k'awɔɔ m bɩr hɔdɔrɛ m, k'a a da ma a bɩr mim jɩ marɛ m.
K'a a da ma sɔ, a hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa dɔ a bɔ kʊ zi a ba. Maam bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm mɩŋŋa fasɩ, minsi bɩ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ ma hinni kʊ Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ b'ʊ y.
Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, tɩrgabaa zibəəro y'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa hanm, an yɩ Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ kan a daʊrɛ kɩ.
M danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, mim niŋŋə k'a mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, a da a ʊ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ta lɛɛ han denter m.
Bala, mim bɩ do tɔ ma bɩ, Rɔm cir dɔmazannɔ wɔɔ kan gʊɔɔ haay kɩ sɔ a dɔ ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ du n y'a ʊ Krista tɔ ma.
Bɩ wɔɔ danyɩnɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa a da ra Zuuba zuure nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ dure bɩ tɔ ma, a a ka ŋ heer n kookoo gʊta, ŋn'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa dam bɩ nyibəə ba ŋ nɩ y.
Sɩra m, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa dam jɩmbaa kan bakʊmarɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ, gɔsɩnnɔ y'a pa dam noom hu m.
A pa bɩ da brɔɔ n nawʊm ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, ŋ y'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ naa, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ tɔ ma m.
Bɩ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, pa bɩ da brɔɔ n nawʊm noom kundə m, jɩmbaa nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʊ, a mɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ gore daŋ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ b'ʊ.
Baa kʊ ŋ yɩ pa bɩ dam noom m gɛɛ sɩra nɩ, mɔɔ bɩr kɔm sɩ ma y, bala, Krista lemim bɩ n'a pa dam. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔrɛ, bɩ mɔɔ gɔɔtam m m heer nyɔɔ.
Bala, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, naa woo… zɛm bɩ yɩ mɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ, awɔɔ yaadarɛ kan Yeezuu Krista Ɛspri daahan kɩ tɔ ma.

Bala, hɔ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma, m a ta m heer lɛ kan m paŋŋa kɩ haay bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ hɔsɩ nyannɩ n bɩ m nyasʊ y, mɔɔ gɔɔta m heerkoodəbaa m. Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ sɔ naa, amba dɔmɩm haay m bɩ, kʊ Krista n lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊta yɩ m mɛ ʊ, m mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, gɛɛ m zɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, kan mɔɔ kɩ, Krista m mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa, zɛ b'ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔnyɩ m.
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ gɔɔta tara burə ʊ kʊ m mɩsɩrbaa ba, a y'a kam m zi ba gʊɔɔ daahan tɔ ma. Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ n a dɔ kʊ kara mɔɔ n'a bɔŋ ʊ y.
Hɔ hɩɩya naa nɩ mɔɔ gaarɛ: Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ m m hʊr, m ta m bɩr kan Krista kɩ. Bɩ n mɩŋŋa mɔɔ ma an lɛ da paan….
Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ gɔɔta tara burə ʊ naa ʊ sɔ, a yɩrɛ awɔɔ daahan gʊta.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ paan…, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ gɔɔtam mɩsɩr, m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ k'awɔɔ n ta lɛɛ, a bɩr heernyɔɔ m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ m bɔ m bʊr awɔɔ zi, awɔɔ y'a heer nyɔɔm a a lɛ bɔ Krista Yeezuu ʊ gʊta, mɔɔ tɔ ma.

Bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba amba Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ m. Maam bɩ kʊ mɔɔ wɔ ʊ m bʊr awɔɔ zi, gɛɛ kʊ mɔɔ n m da ma, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim mam, m a dɔ m ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ a lɛ n deem, an nɩ zoo bam heer deem m, kʊ sɩrakarɛ kʊ lemim nyɩnta bɩ n'a kam bɩ n ta lɛɛ.
A bɩ yɛ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ n nyibəə da a ma fɩɩga y. Bɩ n'a karɛ ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a nyaam, b'awɔɔ ɩ bʊmbɔrɛ m. Bɩ naa do naa, a to a ʊ, Woso zi.
Bala, mimbirenyɩnta kʊ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʊ Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n sɩra ka ʊ bɛɛ n a deem y, bɩ k'awɔɔ n fɩr yɩ a tɔ ma sɔ.
Awɔɔ kan mɔɔ kɩ, zoo deem wɔɔ m tara ʊ n'a bam. Zoo deem bɩ do mɔɔ ba biisi awɔɔ mɩm la bɩ, bɩ, awɔɔ dɔ, a mɩŋŋa mɔɔ gɔɔta m m ta ra.
Zɛkʊra k'awɔɔ n ta m kan Krista kɩ bɩ, a bɩr awɔɔ heerkoodəbaa dam la ra? Awɔɔ ŋʊa k'a nawʊm bɩ bɩr awɔɔ heer yom na? Awɔɔ n a zɛ kʊ ra *Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɔ ʊ ra? Awɔɔ ɩ kʊ ŋʊam an nɩ kʊ cicir zɛm, gɛɛ lɔ?
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a kʊ ma, a a lɛ ba deem, a bɩr ŋʊarɛ deem m, a bɩr hɔɔn deem m. Maam bɩ, mɔɔ heernyɔɔ yɩm fasɩ.
A bɩ hɔsɩ ba jɩmbaa nɩ y, b'a bɩ hɔsɩ ba k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ hɩnka y, naa nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ y. Bɩ, gʊaa biyəə n a mɩŋŋa zer a muno taa, a ʊ, ŋ lɛ da a m.
A b'a ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma bala y, k'a a ka a muno daahan ma sɔ.
K'a bɩr hɔɔn kʊ Krista Yeezuu n ta m bɩ m kan kʊ kɩ.
A mɩŋŋa kan Woso kɩ bɩ, ŋ deem,
bɩ, a n a ka ma wʊɩɩn… kan paŋŋa kɩ,
k'a gɔɔta a a ga kʊ ʊ kan Woso kɩ y.
Bɩ, a yɛ an hɔ haay to,
an a ba zibəənyɩ,
a ba a ʊ gʊaa, am gʊaa woo… hɔ bɩ m.
A n yɩ amba gʊɔɔ n nɩ yɩm bɩ m.
A a mɩŋŋa ba poore, an yɛ Woso ma,
an tolle ba an yɛ an ga,
b'a zɛ bɩ, zɛ bʊnyaa m,
ga a ʊ, gɔdarkʊra ma.
Naa k'a a ba bɩ minto bɩ,
Woso a gore da ʊ, an cem haay,
an tɔ k'a nɩ tɔrɔ haay woo… burə ʊ bɩ ka ma.
A ba a ʊ maam kʊ Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ,
kʊ kunkonno haay kʊ ŋ nɩ brama kan tara burə ʊ kɩ,
tara noom kɩ ʊ, n kukurə zɛ.
Kʊ nɛɛm haay n a bɔ a lɛ ma a ʊ, Yeezuu Krista m Zuuba,
bɩ nɩ yɩm Zɩ Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ.

M ŋʊarɛ gʊɔɔ, nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ yɛm Woso ma tee…. Bɩ, dɩɩtaa naa, mɔɔ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ b'ʊ y. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, k'a banka a yɛ ma gʊta. K'a bʊmbɔrɛ kʊ Woso a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ zi ba, nyi ba Woso m, kan mɛhinkə kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ zi barɛ awɔɔ ʊ, an n'a kam awɔɔ nɩ lɛtaama m kan paŋŋa kɩ m, k'a hɔ k'a ga kʊ ʊ kan a hɔɔnhɔ kɩ bɩ ba.
Kʊ zibəə kara n ta ʊ, k'a ba, a bɩ kukur ba, b'a bɩ bɩsɩ ka a barɛ nɔ ʊ y.

Maam bɩ, awɔɔ yɩm noonhuzannɔ, gɔsɩ bɩ hɔsɩ yɩrɛ an a hɩ awɔɔ ma y. Awɔɔ yɩm Woso nyɩnɔ kʊ mim daŋŋada sɩ ba ŋ ma y, a n nɩ durnya naa do gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ vɔn, ŋnɩ zibʊnyaabənno nɔɔm bire ʊ. Awɔɔ a ga m, a yɔ ŋ bire ʊ am fɩtɩrɛrɔ m.

Bala, awɔɔ n ta mɩsɩrbaa lemim bɩ m, an n'a pa darɛ ŋ nɩ. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ, bɩ n n'a kam awɔɔ n yɩ mɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ, hinni kʊ Krista n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ b'ʊ. Bala, bɩ n n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, mɔɔ zibəə bɩ, kan mɔɔ kɔrɛ bɩ kɩ n yɩ vam y.

Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, mannɩ awɔɔ n'a kam Woso ʊ. A a da ma, n nɩ mɔɔ zɛ gər, bɩ k'a yɩ maam m meeyaa bɩ mɔɔ na awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mannɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ, a yɩm mɔɔ ma heernyɔɔ, bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm kan awɔɔ kɩ.
A maam sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a heer nyɔɔ, a heernyɔɔ ba kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Kan Zuuba Yeezuu daahan kɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kʊ m Timote nyɔɔ awɔɔ zi zɔɔ. Maam bɩ, k'a b'a bɔ an bʊr, mɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim mam sɔ m heer koodə yɩ.
Gɔsɩ vanta ba naa ʊ, an n'a hɔɔn dam, an nɩ kɔrɛ awɔɔ mim ma kan mɔɔ kɩ y.
Ŋ woo… naa, a ka ŋ nawʊrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma, ŋ bɩr a kam Yeezuu Krista hɔɔnhɔ ma y.
Bɩ, kʊ Timote nɩ, awɔɔ sɩra bɩ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, a nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ amba nyɩ tɩr kan a zɩ kɩ bɩ m, ʊ lemim nyɩnta bɩ zi ba.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ m mim bɩ zaa yɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɔɔ n'a nyɔɔrɛ awɔɔ ma zɔɔ-zɔɔ.
Mɔɔ sɩra ka Zuuba nɔ ʊ, m a dɔ m ʊ, mɔɔ zɛm sɔ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ zɔɔ.
Bɩ mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kɛɛrɛ mɔɔ ʊ, pakra m kʊ m Epafrodit da zaa ra awɔɔ m, mɔɔ danyɩ m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m, mɔɔ zoobarɛkɔɔn m sɔ. Awɔɔ y'a nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma, k'an b'a da mɔɔ han.
A y'a ŋʊam paan… k'a a ya, a awɔɔ yɩ haay, a ma k'a ʊ, n ʊ, awɔɔ a yaaba bɩ ma bɩ, a heer a zar gʊta.
Denter m, a yaaba zɛ an a yo k'a ga, Woso a cicir zɛ, b'a deem bɛɛ Woso a cicir zɛ y, mɔɔ cicir a a zɛ sɔ, kʊ mɔɔ heerzarlɛ b'a da ra y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ n'a darɛ awɔɔ m zaa ra zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'awɔɔ n a yɩ, a heernyɔɔ ba, kʊ mɔɔ heerzar bɩ n'a bɔrɛ sɔ.
K'a bɩ lee ku, k'a si kan heernyɔɔ gʊta kɩ Zuuba nɔ ʊ. K'a gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ da ʊ.
Bala, a a yo k'a ga Krista zibəə bɩ tɔ ma, a a meeyaa ka zɛ ma, k'a a da ma, a zi k'awɔɔ a ga m a ba mɔɔ m bɩ ba awɔɔ bɩncɛ ʊ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, m danyɩnɔ, k'a a heer nyɔɔ, k'awɔɔ a zɛ kʊ ra kan Zuuba kɩ bɩ tɔ ma. Meerbaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ mɔɔ m ya m nɩ sore ŋ la, bɩ naa bɩr mɔɔ kɔrɛ y, bala, a y'a darɛ awɔɔ han.
K'a dundo a zi kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ, jino m, ŋʊaar baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ bɩ hɔdɩndarɛzannɔ m, k'a dundo a zi kan ŋ kɩ.
Wɔɔ nɩ baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ paan… bɩ zi bam. Bala, zu wɔɔ nawʊm Woso ʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa m. Krista Yeezuu n wɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ, wɔɔ bɩr yom zɩɩfʊrɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ ma k'ʊ lɛ bɔ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, mɔɔ m da ma m yo yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ duro ma sɔ. Kʊ gʊaa y'a gɩngarɛ a ʊ, a hɔ yɩm yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ zibəə nɔ ʊ, k'a maam mɔɔ ɩ lɛ da.

Mɔɔ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm sinnyə hinni ʊ, m mɔɔ gasʊ ʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ. Israyɛl gʊaa paan… m mɔɔ m, Bɛnzamɛn do gʊaa m mɔɔ m, mɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ haay zɩɩfʊrɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ. Kʊ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure nɩ, nyɩnta mɔɔ ʊ farizɛn m nɩ zure ŋ ʊ paan….
Wɔɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ŋʊa gʊta bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ m fɩr ka kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ ma. Kʊ tɩrgabaa kʊ n n'a kam ma lɛrɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ nɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta mɩŋŋa fasɩ, gɔsɩ n mim yɩ k'a hɩ mɔɔ ma y.
A n bɔkarɛ, hɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʊ ŋ nyɔɔdʊ n ta mɔɔ ma biisi bɩ, mɔɔ ɩ dɩgarɛ ŋ ma dore hɔɔ kɛɛrɛ, Krista kʊ mɔɔ dɔ bɩ tɔ ma.

Sɩra m, mɔɔ ɩ dɩgam hɔ haay woo… ma dore hɔ, mɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu dɔrɛ mɩŋŋabaa k'a lɛ da hɔ haay ra bɩ tɔ ma. A tɔ ma m mɔɔ m hɔ haay to, m nɩ dɩgam hɔɔ wɔɔ duro ma bʊtʊrɔ, kʊ Krista n yɩ mɔɔ hɔ haay.
K'an a so mɔɔ ʊ jilli sɔ. Mɔɔ bɩr a gɩngam dɔ, mɔɔ ʊ, m tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ lɛrɔ wɔɔ zuure tɔ ma y. Sɩra kʊ mɔɔ ka Krista ʊ b'ɩ mɔɔ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ. Tɩrgabaa kʊ Woso n'a kam sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ m.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ m Krista mɩŋŋa dɔ, kʊ m a mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ paŋŋa dɔ. Kʊ m m na ma a fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ, kʊ m bɔ kʊ ʊ kan kɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
K'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ bɩ m da ma sɔ, m bɩ m mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.
Mɔɔ n a hɩ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma bɩ yɩ m wɔ ʊ wa. Gɛɛ, mɔɔ m ba mɩŋŋa fasɩ wa. Bɩ, m tɔ mɔɔ nawʊŋ ʊ, kʊ m brasire ganwʊrɛ bɩ ku m wɔ ʊ, bala, Krista-Yeezuu mɔɔ ku a wɔ ʊ.
Ayy… m danyɩnɔ, mɔɔ bɩr a gɩngarɛ m ʊ, mɔɔ brasire ganwʊrɛ bɩ ku m wɔ ʊ y. Bɩ hɔ deem mɔɔ n'a bam, hɔ k'a ba an cem bɩ bɔ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ m nɔ ʊ, m nɩ m tɔŋ ʊ kʊ m hɔ k'a nɩ lɛɛ bɩ ku.
M tɔ mɔɔ nawʊŋ ʊ, kʊ m hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a cɩnta wɔɔ m lɛɛ bɩ ku. Brasire ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso wɔɔ bir ma Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ, k'a b'a ka wɔɔ ʊ arzana ʊ bɩ m.
Wɔɔ gʊɔɔ k'ʊ yaa ka sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ʊ bɩr hɔɔndarɛ deem naa m. Bɩ, k'awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ a hɔ, mim naa do nɔ ʊ, Woso y'awɔɔ hɔɔn gum ma.
Bɩ, hɔ k'an ta ʊ bɩ, ʊ gɔɔta ʊ bɩr tam lɛɛ kan kʊ kɩ, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ dɔ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ haay k'a mɔɔ hɔbaa sa, k'a dɩga gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bam am wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma, wɔɔ hɔbaa ŋ y'a sa.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa bam ɩ ʊ, Krista gɔdarkʊra bɩ jɩnnɔ m. Mɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m hɔɔ gallɛm hɔka, m m ya m nɩ som la kɛɛrɛ kan nyikəre kɩ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro nyambʊrlɛ bɩ, nyaanlɛ m, ŋ nɔ nɩ ŋ woso, hɔ k'a nyannɩ n ta ʊ bɩ n ŋ lɛbɔʊrɛ, durnya naa do hɔ ŋn'a hɔɔn dam ma bala.
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ kʊ bɩ m arzana m. Wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʊ wɔɔ nɩ dɔm ma bɩ, a to a nawʊm arzana ʊ b'ʊ an bʊr.
K'a bɩ bʊr, a wɔɔ mɛrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ rɔ nɔɔm lʊrlɛ, an ŋ ba, an a mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʊrɛ mɛ bɩ m. Naa ba a nawʊm paŋŋa k'an ta m k'a a so hɔ haay ʊ bɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Zuuba nɔ ʊ. Mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ m m ya m awɔɔ yɩ, mɔɔ heer ɩ nyɔɔm awɔɔ tɔ ma, awɔɔ m mɔɔ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʊ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kan m heer kɩ haay Evodi kan Sɩntɩsɩ kɩ han, kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊ ma mɩŋŋa, Zuuba nɔ ʊ.

Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ m mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn paan… bɩ, ɩ da ŋ han, bala, ŋ y'a na mɔɔ ma ʊ zoo ba lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ nɔ ʊ. Lannɔ nɔɔn duro, kan Kleman kɩ, kan mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ y'a na mɔɔ ma ʊ zoo bɩ ba. Ŋ haay tɔrɔ ɩ mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʊ.
K'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm Zuuba nɔ ʊ, dɔmɩm haay. Kʊ m m ya m so ra, k'a bɩr a heer nyɔɔm.
K'a bɩr bʊgʊ-bʊgʊ kan gʊaa woo… kɩ. Zuuba wusigəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
A b'a heer kɔ hɔsɩ mim ma y, bɩ mim haay nɔ ʊ, k'a hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa ma bɩ yɛ Woso han, a a wɔ zɩnzɛ m, bɩ, k'a yaa dam barka sɔ.
Maam bɩ, Woso y'a laafɩɩ k'a cem hɔ haay kʊ gʊaa n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ han bɩ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ. Bɩ laafɩɩ bɩ do dɔrɛ awɔɔ heerlɔ kan awɔɔ hɔɔndarɛrɔ kɩ ma Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ.

M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta mɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a a tɔ ʊ a bɩr hɔ k'an sɩra, an ta daʊrɛ m, an tɩrga m. A a tɔ ʊ a bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa, an a ga ŋʊarɛ m, a goredaʊrɛ n ta ʊ, hɔ kʊ zorebaa m fasɩ, an a ga lɛbɔʊrɛ m bɩ m.
Hɔ haay k'awɔɔ dɩnda mɔɔ zi, a si, a ma, gɛɛ a yɩ mɔɔ gʊr zi bɩ, k'a sa a zi ba m. K'awɔɔ ba maam, Woso k'a nɩ heer laafɩɩ kam wɔɔ ʊ bɩ bam bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Mɔɔ m heernyɔɔ gʊta Zuuba nɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ a ya, a a da mɔɔ han bɩ tɔ ma. Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔn dam mɔɔ ma hɔɔ, bɩ, daahan bɩ dɔmɩm b'ɩ n'a a zaa ka y.
Hɔ bɛɛ ɩ jɩra mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ nɩ meer bɩ barɛ ncɩnaaʊ y. Bala mɔɔ minkə m, m nɩ m zergam hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n ta m bɩ rɛ, k'a gʊta gɛɛ k'a poore, a bɩ mim kan mɔɔ kɩ y.

Mɔɔ wɔ ʊ, m nɩ m mɩsɩrbaa bam ŋʊazaabaa nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ wɔ ʊ, m n'a bam sɔ hɔtaʊrɛ nɔ ʊ. Lɛɛ haay ʊ, wakatɩ haay nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ m da ma m mɩsɩrbaa ba, kʊ mɔɔ hɔ bɩ an m ka, gɛɛ kʊ nɔ ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, hɔtaʊrɛ nɔ ʊ, gɛɛ hɔjɩrarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ m da ma, m naa haay ba, Krista k'a nɩ paŋŋa kam mɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, a da k'awɔɔ ʊ mɔɔ han m kɔrɛ nɔ ʊ naa, awɔɔ ba mɩŋŋa.
Filipii zannɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, m hʊr kʊ mɔɔ ʊ Masedʊan kʊ ʊ, lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa darɛ sɩŋŋɩda dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ y'a deem ɩ nyɩnta kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ barla, a a da mɔɔ han, hɔ ka kʊ ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Baa kʊ mɔɔ nyɩnta Tesaloniki ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ daahan nyɔɔ mɔɔ ma gallɛm hɔka, hɔ k'a jɩra mɔɔ ma dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ.
M ka bɛɛ mɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ n nɩ bɩr hɔ karɛ m ʊ y. Bɩ, m ka mɔɔ nawʊm ma, k'awɔɔ n hɔ k'awɔɔ ba bɩ nyɔɔdʊ yɩ gʊta.

Hɔ k'awɔɔ ka haay bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, a bɔ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ la m. Hɔ k'awɔɔ ka Epafroditɩ ʊ k'an b'a ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, hɔsɩ n jɩra mɔɔ ma dɔ y. Ganwʊrɛrɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ bɩ, bɔ ŋ y'a a ʊ kʊ rɛ kan mannɩ k'a ji n nyɩnta Woso ma, an a ŋʊa an a si kɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ Zɩ Woso hɔnyɩ gʊtabaa cem haay, a hɔ k'a jɩra awɔɔ ma haay karɛ awɔɔ ʊ gʊta, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
K'a yaa da wosogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yɛm Krista Yeezuu ma rɔ wɔɔ m. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
Wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay ɩ yaa darɛ a m, an lɛ da bɩ, Rɔm cir hargʊɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m.
Bɩ, kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
Colossians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ kʊ m yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa. Mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ barɛ awɔɔ ma.
Awɔɔ, kʊ wosogʊɔɔ n'a mɩ, an nɩ Kolɔɔsɩ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ danyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m Krista nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ tarɛ a lɛ ra. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka dɔmɩm haay.
Wɔɔ ma denter n n'awɔɔ sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʊ mim hɩm, kan ŋʊarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ mim kɩ.
Awɔɔ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m, a n nɩ ŋʊarɛ m, bala, Woso hɔ cɩnta awɔɔ m arzana ʊ, awɔɔ n a ta a heer lɛ. Bɩ lemim nyɩnta kʊ n y'a pa da awɔɔ m, a m sɩra lemim b'ɩ taaheerlɛ bɩ do ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do ɩ tam durnya lɛɛ haay ʊ, an nɩ nyɩ dam, an n'a kərgum lɛɛ ra, amb'a a ba awɔɔ zi, Woso barka mim k'awɔɔ ma bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ saa…, a b'a dɔ a ʊ, barka paan… m bɩ.
Wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn Epafras naa do dɩnda awɔɔ m, wɔɔ gʊaasɩba m, Krista zibəənyɩ m, a m taalɛrazaa, zi bɩ ba a nawʊm kan awɔɔ kɩ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʊ.
A ɩ ŋʊarɛ kʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da awɔɔ heer ʊ bɩ mim hɩ wɔɔ m.
Bɩ y'a ka, hinni kʊ wɔɔ naa ma ʊ bɩ tɛkka ma, wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma dɔmɩm haay. A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm Woso han, k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n a hɔɔnhɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, a bɩr Sɛnt-Ɛspri mindɔrɛ m kan a hɔdɔrɛ kɩ m.
Maam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a dam ma, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Zuuba nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ nɔ ʊ. Naa n'a kam awɔɔ n zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba, a ta lɛɛ Woso dɔrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Wɔɔ y'a yɛm han sɔ k'an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, a mɩŋŋa paŋŋa k'a cem hɔ haay han bɩ m. K'awɔɔ n a da ma a bɩr a tʊntɔŋ ʊ, a bʊr a ma hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
K'a Zɩ Woso barka da kan heernyɔɔ kɩ, a ɩ zaa ka k'awɔɔ n hɔjirle yɩ kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʊ.
A wɔɔ yɔ monsigə paŋŋa wɔ ʊ, an ta wɔɔ m a Nyɩ k'a n'a ŋʊam bɩ cirbəə nɔ ʊ.
A Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma m, Woso wɔɔ bʊmbɔ, an wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Gɔsɩ bɩr Woso yɩrɛ y,
bɩ kʊ gʊaa Yeezuu yɩ,
k'a lʊnlɔ Woso maam.
A m lɛɛkarɛzaa an nɩ hɔ haay
kʊ Woso a da bɩ burə ʊ.
Bala, zu Woso ʊ kʊ ʊ kan kɩ
an hɔ haay da,
brama ʊ kan tara burə ʊ kɩ,
hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yɩm mɩm ʊ
kan hɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yɩm kɩ,
cirbəəro, kan lɛɛsoʊrezannɔ kɩ,
lɛɛzannɔ kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ kɩ.
Zu Woso ʊ kʊ ʊ kan kɩ
an hɔ haay da,
an a ka ʊ, an a so ʊ.
A ɩ lɛɛ ka an ta ʊ,
hɔ haay lɛɛ,
a tɔ ma m hɔ haay n gɔɔta an a bɩncɛ ʊ.
A mɩŋŋa n a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ sokʊma bɩ minzaa.
A m lɛɛkarɛzaa,
a ɩ lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ,
k'a gɔɔta a bɩr hɔ haay lɛɛ,
hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a ŋʊa
k'an yɩ an a mɩŋŋa m jilli.
Woso a cɩnta,
k'a hɔ haay zɛ kʊ ra kan a kɩ
a Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma,
hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama kan tara burə ʊ kɩ,
ga k'a ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ tɔ ma.
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi a m laatʊ Woso ma, zibəə bʊnyaarɔ k'awɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma, a nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ a ka, awɔɔ n a ba a jɩnnɔ.

Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso awɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan a kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ k'a ga mɛsim nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma. A ba a ʊ maam, k'awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, k'awɔɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋabaa nɔ ʊ, kʊ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʊr zi y. Kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ mim yɩ k'a hɩ awɔɔ ma y.

Bɩ, a y'awɔɔ ma k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta a bɩr sɩra kam, a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a b'a to kʊ hɔsɩ n awɔɔ gʊ taaheerlɛ kʊ lemim nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ma b'a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ ma y. N lemim nyɩnta bɩ do pa da gʊaa haay m durnya nɔ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, m ba mɔɔ ʊ a zibəənyɩ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, mɔɔ yɩ m heer nyɔɔm fɩr kʊ mɔɔ n'a yɩm k'awɔɔ n daahan yɩ a nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma. Bɩ, mɔɔ gɔɔta m nɩ Krista fɩryɩrɛ bɩ yɩrɛ m mɛ ʊ, a mɛ bɩ tɔ ma, naa k'a hɩ a ʊ, a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ so kʊ ma.
Zibəə kʊ Woso a da mɔɔ wɔ ʊ kʊ m a ba k'awɔɔ n daahan yɩ bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m ba kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ zibəənyɩ, kʊ m Woso lemim bɩ pa da jilli, gʊaa haay m.
Lemim bɩ do bɩ, hɔ kʊ Woso a nyaakʊm da biisi tee… bɩ m. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso a hɩnka a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.

A ŋʊa a ʊ, k'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m hɔ k'a a nyaakʊm da, am gʊta, a gore n ta ʊ, k'a ka do vantɔɔ haay ʊ bɩ dɔ. Hɔ bɩ do ba n nɩ: Krista y'awɔɔ heer ʊ, k'a maam, awɔɔ ɩ taaheerlɛ m, a ʊ, a nyɩntam Woso lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, wɔɔ nɩ Krista pa dam gʊaa haay m. Ʊ nɩ gʊaa biyəə bɔ n zaa ʊ, ʊ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊaa biyəə m, mindɔrɛ haay nɔ ʊ. K'a ka kʊ gʊaa biyəə n yɩ amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m Krista zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
Naa mɔɔ nɩ m kam ma, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ zi bam, m nɩ zoo bam Krista paŋŋa k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ, an nɩ zi bam mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʊ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n zoo kɔɔda kʊ mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ tɔ ma, kan Lawodisee zannɔ kɩ tɔ ma, kan gʊɔɔ cir kʊ ŋ n mɔɔ yɩ a mɩm m fɩɩgaa rɔ wɔɔ kɩ tɔ ma bɩ dɔ.
Zoo bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ ŋ nɩ heer koodə yɩ, kʊ ŋ lɛ n bɩr deem ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra dɔ fasɩ, ŋnɩ heer koodə yɩ a nɔ ʊ. Maam bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʊ Woso a nyaakʊm da biisi bɩ dɔm. Hɔ bɩ do bɩ, Krista m.
A mɩŋŋa n ta mindɔrɛ hɔnyɩ haay woo… kan hɔdɔrɛ haay woo… kɩ m.
Naa hɩ mɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ bra bɩmba awɔɔ m meerbaa nyɩntɔɔ nɩ y.
Sɩra m, mɔɔ ba b'ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ y, bɩ mɔɔ heer ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, m nɩ m heer nyɔɔm k'awɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kan kʊ kɩ kɔɔkɔɔ a sɩra ka Krista ʊ nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, k'awɔɔ Krista Yeezuu si k'an yɩ a Zuuba bɩ, k'a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee… kan kɩ a zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
K'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ a yaa ka a nɔ ʊ, a a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ dɔ ra am cɛ hɔ bɩ m. A nyasʊ a sɩrakarɛ bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, amba n y'a dɩnda awɔɔ n bɩ m, a bɩr yaa dam Woso m barka kan a heer kɩ haay.
K'a a dundo a zi, kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ bra bɩmba a m, gʊɔɔ hɔdɔrɛ yaarsɩ nɩ y. Gʊɔɔ minkəm hɔdɔrɛ m, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ hɔ m, a n a to Krista zi y.
Bala, Woso k'an lʊnlɔ haay bɩ, Krista maam sɔ a mɛsim nɔ ʊ.
K'awɔɔ a zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ haay m, a mɩŋŋa nɩ lɛɛzannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yɩm mɩm m nɔ wɔɔ burə ʊ.
K'awɔɔ a zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ bɩ, n y'awɔɔ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ, bɩ gʊɔɔ baŋŋʊgasʊrɛ bɩ bɛɛ y, Krista y'awɔɔ gasʊ baŋŋʊ bɩ do ʊ, awɔɔ yɔ k'a ʊ mɛsim k'an awɔɔ dam mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma bɩ wɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Batɛm kʊ n y'a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ bir n y'a ʊ kan Krista kɩ, awɔɔ n a mɩm bɔ ʊ kan kɩ sɔ, k'awɔɔ sɩra ka Woso paŋŋa k'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ tɔ ma m.
Biisi bɩ, gəəno n'awɔɔ m a mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ ba zɩɩfʊrɔ do barla bɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso awɔɔ mɩm bɔ ʊ kan Krista kɩ,
an wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ haay sugur ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Biisi bɩ, wɔɔ ɩ kʊrɔma nɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n zu Woso lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma,
bɩ Krista bɩ, a mim k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm wɔɔ kʊrɔmarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ ciro wɔɔ zaar ba,
a wɔ a ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma.
A lɛɛzannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ bɩr ŋ yɩm nɔ wɔɔ paŋŋa da,
an nyannɩ da ŋ ma garga ra, kʊ gʊɔɔ n ŋ yɩ,
a bʊr ŋ la, an ŋ gɩngaata a jɛ ʊ, an yirbə si ŋ nɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a b'a to gɔsɩ n'awɔɔ dʊdɔ yar, hɔbɩrɛ, gɛɛ hɔmire, gɛɛ cibsarɔ bɩrɛ mim ma, gɛɛ mom daarɔ kan *sabaa dɔmɩnnɔ kɩ mim ma y.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay bɩ, hɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ga m ŋnɩ bʊr lɔ wɔɔ ŋn'a hɩnkam, hɔɔ paan…rɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y. Hɔ paan… bɩ, Krista m.

A b'a to gɔsɩ n a ka a ter bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ ma y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɛ dam kɔrɛ ma, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam malɛɛkarɔ m, ŋn'ɩ hɔhɩnkarɛrɔ mim dɩndam can rɔ wɔɔ m. Mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ vam, a hɔɔn ŋ n'a darɛ am gʊɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Ŋ n gɔɔta n a kʊsɩ Krista ma y, an bɔkarɛ, bɩ m minzaa. Krista tɔ ma m, mɛ bɩ jilli nɩ tʊrlɛ yɩm, an n'a kam mɛ bɩ n deem, mɛ bɩ məsiro kan a kunəro kɩ tɔ ma, an nɩ mam amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m.
K'awɔɔ gɩnga kan Krista kɩ bɩ, durnya paŋŋazannɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ n a so awɔɔ ʊ dɔ y, bɔ m kɛɛrɛ awɔɔ n'a mɩsɩrbaa bam ɩ ʊ, durnya gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ? Bɔ m awɔɔ nɩ yɛrɛ gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ dam lɛrɔ zuure ʊ?
N n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: Ɩ bɩ hɔ naa do sa y, ɩ bɩ naa da ɩ lɛ ma y, ɩ b'ɩ wɔ da naa do ma y.
Lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro haay gʊɔɔ hɔɔ m, hɔɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ nɩ zi barɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋnɩ nyam mim ŋn'a dɩndam.

Sɩra m, kʊ gʊaa dɩga lɛrɔ nɔɔn duro ma, b'a ʊ hɔɔntaʊrɛ hɔɔ m, bala, ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, gʊɔɔ n yaa da, ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer, ŋnɩ fɩr ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, an bɔkarɛ, nawɔnnɔ haay naa, ŋ bɩr a dam gʊaa han k'an bʊr a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ma y.
K'awɔɔ a mɩm bɔ ʊ kan Krista kɩ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ, k'a ka hɔɔ kʊ mim ʊ hɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ma, lɛɛ kʊ Krista n ta ʊ Woso bɩsɩ ra ʊ bɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ.
K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam arzana hɔɔ ma, a b'a hɔɔn da durnya hɔɔ ma y.
Bala, awɔɔ gɩnga, awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa n'a nyaakʊm da Woso zi kan Krista kɩ.
Kʊ Krista n'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ, k'a b'a hɩnka, a y'awɔɔ hɩnkam sɔ kan a kɩ, a nyɩnta a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, k'a hɔ kʊ tara burə hɔ m an awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ʊ bɩ zɛ. Hɔɔ wɔɔ duro ba n nɩ: Jaandarɛ m, lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ barɛ m, lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ n'a som gʊɔɔ ʊ m, mɛsim hɔɔnhɔ kama m, mɩnyɔɔ m, mɩnyɔɔ bɩ, *wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadarɛ do vanta m bɩ.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ zɛm Woso nɔmaa m gʊɔɔ [kʊ ŋ bɩr yɛm Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ] zi.
Naa awɔɔ n'a bam biisi a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, k'a a bɔ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ʊ haay. A bɩ nɔmaa ba y, a b'a heer der y, a bɩ bʊnyaabaa ba y, a bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊ y, a bɩ dintim meerbaarɔ ba y.
A bɩ ŋʊaar ba kʊ nɩ y, bala, awɔɔ a bɔ a mɩsɩrbaa gusire b'ʊ, kan a zibəəro bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ ʊ.
Mɩsɩrbaa daa awɔɔ n ta m kɛɛrɛ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do, a lʊr a nawʊm tee… an nɩ bɔm kʊ ʊ kan a darɛzaa bɩ kɩ. Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ awɔɔ n Woso bɩ dɔ fasɩ.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, jirəbɔrɛ ba ʊ dɔ, zɩɩfʊrɔ bire ʊ kan do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ kɩ y, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ kɩ bire ʊ y, jirebɔrɛ bahɔdonno kan pooyaa gʊɔɔ kɩ bire ʊ sɔ y, b'a ba lɔnnɔ kan soamɩŋŋaʊzannɔ kɩ bire ʊ y. Bala, Krista ɩ lɛ da haay, an nɩ gʊɔɔ k'a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ haay heer ʊ.
K'awɔɔ nɩ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ, Woso y'awɔɔ ŋʊa, an awɔɔ bɔ ʊ k'a a so awɔɔ ʊ. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a bɩr kʊ ŋʊarɛ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋabaa bam kʊ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m, kan bʊgʊ-bʊgʊdabaa kɩ m, bʊraama kɩ m.
K'a bɩr yɛm kʊ ma, bɩ kʊ gʊaa ɩ mim m kan a mim kɩ, k'a sugur ka kʊ ʊ. Amba Zuuba sugur ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ, k'a ba maam sɔ.
A n cem woo… bɩ, k'a bɩr ŋʊarɛ m, bala, ŋʊarɛ nɩ hɔ haay nam kʊ ʊ paan….
K'a ka kʊ heer laafɩɩ kʊ Krista n'a kam bɩ n a so awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ bir Woso ʊ naa tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n yɩ deem. K'a bɩr yaa dam Woso m barka.

K'a Krista lemim bɩ da a heer ʊ jilli. K'a bɩr hɔ dɩndam kʊ m, a bɩr kʊ bɔm zaa ʊ, hɔɔntaʊrɛ m. K'a bɩr laa lɔm, laarɔ ciro wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, kan mim ma laarɔ wɔɔ kɩ, laa kʊ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri a da a heer ʊ haay kɩ. A laa bɩ lɔ ncɩnaaʊ, a Woso barka da kan a heer kɩ haay.
Kʊ bɔ awɔɔ n'a bam, gɛɛ kʊ bɔ awɔɔ n'a hɩm, k'a ba Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma, a bɩr Woso barka dam a tɔ ma.
Lannɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a zino wɔɔ ma, amba a ga m Zuuba zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Zino wɔɔ, k'a a lannɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa, a bɩ nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y.
Nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, k'a a zɩrɔ wɔɔ lɛ si hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, hɔ kʊ Zuuba n'a ŋʊarɛ awɔɔ gʊr zi bɩ n naa.
Awɔɔ k'a m zɩrɔ wɔɔ, a b'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ da nɔmaa ma y, ŋ heer y'a a zar.
Lɔnnɔ wɔɔ, k'a zu a soʊrezannɔ wɔɔ lɛ ʊ, hɔ haay nɔ ʊ. A bɩ ŋ zi ba dundo kʊ ŋ nawʊrɛ a zi tɔ ma, kʊ ŋ n'a lɛ bɔ a ʊ y. Bɩ, k'a ŋ zi ba kan a heer kɩ haay, k'awɔɔ nɩ Zuuba gore daŋ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʊ bɔ zi awɔɔ n'a bam, k'a ba kan a heer kɩ haay, ɩ ʊ, Zuuba zi awɔɔ n'a bam, gʊɔɔ hɔ bɛɛ y.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Zuuba nɩ ganwʊrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ hɔ k'a cɩnta a gʊɔɔ m arzana ʊ bɩ yɩm. Awɔɔ Minzaa bɩ n Krista m, a zi awɔɔ n'a bam.
Gʊaa k'a n'a bʊnyaa bam bɩ, Zuuba y'a zi bʊnyaa bɩ yawʊra bam nɩ, a bɩr gʊɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ y.
Awɔɔ, kʊ lɔnnɔ soʊrezannɔ n'awɔɔ n nɔ wɔɔ, k'a tɩrgabaa kan sɩra kɩ zi ba kan a lɔnnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ soʊrezaa ta ʊ, an nɩ arzana ʊ.
K'a bɩr yaa dam tee… a b'a zu a ʊ y, k'a bɩr Woso barka dam.
K'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʊ Woso n a ka k'ʊ toore mɩŋŋa yɩ, ʊ a lemim bɩ pa da gʊɔɔ m. K'ʊ Krista mim k'a n dɔ biisi bɩ pa da, bɩ tɔ ma m mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ.
Kʊ m a pa da kʊ n a jɩ ma paan…, amba mɔɔ m ga m, m a ba bɩ m.
K'a dundo a mɩsɩrbaa barɛ zi gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ bɛɛ n ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ. K'a a tɔ ʊ kan hɔ k'a a ga barɛ m kɩ wakatɩ haay.
K'a ka k'a meerbaa n bɩr mɩŋŋa, yɛ n bɩr ta ma. Kʊ laakarɔ gʊɔɔ n'a darɛ a han, k'a nyɩbɔʊrɛ dɔ a bɔ ŋ nʊ, amba a ga m bɩ m.
Kʊ mɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, wɔɔ danyɩ ŋʊarɛzaa Tisikkɩ zɛm b'a dɩnda awɔɔ m haay. Zuuba zi a n'a bam taalɛra m, mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m Zuuba zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ.
A nyɔɔ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ ma tɔkkɛ k'an bɩ wɔɔ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, an awɔɔ heer yo.
Wɔɔ danyɩ Onezim, awɔɔ gʊaa deem m, a zɛm kan Tisikkɩ kɩ sɔ. Taalɛrazaa m, wɔɔ n'a ŋʊam. Ŋ nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ naa ʊ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m.
Aristarkɩ k'a nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ naa ʊ b'ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m. Barnabas danyɩ Markɩ b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m sɔ. Mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a hɩ awɔɔ m m ʊ, k'a lee ku awɔɔ zi b'ʊ k'a si mɩŋŋa, k'a ba maam denter.

Yeezuu kʊ n so ra n n'a birm Zistus b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Gʊɔɔ kaakʊrɔ nɔɔm y'a minto n zɩɩfʊrɔ, ŋn'ɩ zi bam kan mɔɔ kɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ tɔ ma. Zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ yɩ mɔɔ heer wʊtam gʊta.
Awɔɔ kʊrɔ gʊaa Epafras ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ m an nɩ zoo bam awɔɔ tɔ ma yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ. K'awɔɔ n jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a ma Woso zaa bɩ ra, K'a Woso hɔɔnhɔ haay dɔ a ba.
Mɔɔ sɩra bɩ, m a dɔ m ʊ, a ɩ kɔm gʊta awɔɔ tɔ ma, kan Lawodisee zannɔ kɩ, Hierapolis zannɔ kɩ tɔ ma sɔ.
Wɔɔ gʊaasɩba Likki k'a m lɔɔtɔr bɩ, kan Demas k'ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
K'a yaa da wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Lawodisee ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, kan Nɩnfa kɩ m, kan kristagʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a som kʊ ma a har ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
K'awɔɔ mɔɔ ci bɩ karɩnda ba, k'a ka Lawodisee kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma b'ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a karɩnda ba sɔ. K'awɔɔ n ci k'a n'a tom Lawodisee ʊ bɩ karɩnda ba sɔ.
K'a hɩ Arsip m a ʊ, an dundo a zi kan zibəə kʊ Zuuba a ka ʊ bɩ kɩ, an a tɔ ʊ an zi bɩ ba mɩŋŋa.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore yaa bɩ darɛ gʊrsɩra nyambʊrlɛ m zim, a ba n nɩ: K'a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, a dɔ a ʊ, lɔnnɔcɛ mɔɔ n ta ʊ.
Bɩ kʊ Woso barka n bɩr kan a kɩ.
I Thessalonians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, kan Silas kɩ Timote kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ ci naa do barɛ awɔɔ ma. Awɔɔ k'a m Tesaloniki kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ, Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n'a so awɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm kʊ Woso m barka, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
Wɔɔ yaa darɛ nɔ ʊ haay, wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam awɔɔ tɔ ma, ʊ nɩ Woso barka dam dɔmɩm haay awɔɔ minto.
Wɔɔ y'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ zibəə tɔ darɛ ʊ nɔ ʊ tee… wɔɔ Zɩ Woso lɛɛ, kan ŋʊarɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ tʊntɔʊrɛ zibəə kɩ, kan taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m kɔɔkɔɔ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ Woso awɔɔ ŋʊa, an awɔɔ bɔ ʊ k'a a so awɔɔ ʊ.

Bala, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, a n yɩ lɛ meerbaa m bala y, yɩ a ʊ, kan *Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kɩ wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ m ʊ heer ʊ, ʊ ʊ sɩra lemim m. Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kʊ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ bire ʊ awɔɔ daahan minto bɩ dɔ.
Awɔɔ wɔɔ hɔbaa sa, wɔɔ kan Zuuba kɩ, bala, awɔɔ nyɩnta fɩryɩrɛ gʊta nɔ ʊ, a a gu a Woso lemim bɩ si heernyɔɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kam bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, Masedʊan kan Akayii kɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ haay n a ba awɔɔ hɔbaa dɩndarɛ zannɔ.

Bala, Zuuba lemim b'a to awɔɔ zi an ta Masedʊan kan Akayii kɩ kʊrɔ ʊ, bɩ, kʊrɔ wɔɔ duro bɛɛ m bala y, sɩra k'awɔɔ ka Woso ʊ bɩ mim ta lɛɛ haay ʊ, an nɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, pakra bɛɛ m dɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ ya ʊ a dɩnda ŋ nɩ y.
Bala, ta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi awɔɔ m wɔɔ si mɩŋŋa bɩ, gʊaa haay ɩ bɩ mim dɩndam, a bɔ k'awɔɔ ʊ *wosobaawɔnnɔ yaadarɛ ʊ, a a bɔ a taam k'a zu Woso k'a m mɩsɩr a m sɩra b'ʊ bɩ, n yɩ bɩ mim dɩndam sɔ.
A n nɩ dɔrɛ a Nyɩ Yeezuu kʊ Woso mɩŋŋa a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, an n'a tom brama k'a bʊr bɩ ma, an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm Woso nɔmaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ wɔ ʊ.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a zim a ʊ, ta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi bɩ, a n bɔ vam y.

Awɔɔ dɔ sɔ a ʊ, fɩr kʊ ŋ y'a ka wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ wɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊ Filipii ʊ bɩ wɔɔ ʊ hʊr ma lɛɛ m, ʊ bʊr awɔɔ zi. Bɩ Woso heerkoodəbaa ka wɔɔ ʊ, baa kʊ jɩnnɔ nyɩnta ʊ gʊta bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ da ma, ʊ lemim nyɩnta k'a a to zi bɩ pa da awɔɔ m.
Nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ pa bɛɛ wɔɔ n'a darɛ y, gɩnga bʊnyaa bɛɛ wɔɔ n ta m sɔ ʊ nɩ pa bɩ darɛ y, wɔɔ bɩr ʊ kam ma sɔ k'ʊ ŋʊaar ba gʊɔɔ nɩ y.

Bɩ, kʊ Woso wɔɔ ka lɛɛ an dɩga wɔɔ ma, an a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ ʊ ga m bɩ, an a lemim nyɩnta bɩ da wɔɔ wɔ ʊ. Naa y'a ka kʊ wɔɔ ɩ meer bam, wɔɔ bɩr ʊ kam ma kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔ n yɩ ʊ ra y, ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm ma kʊ Woso nɔ n yɩ ʊ ra, bala, a mɩŋŋa nɩ hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer ʊ yɩm.
Awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa a ʊ, wɔɔ n yɛ fɩɩgaa k'ʊ bra bɩmba gʊɔɔ nɩ y, wɔɔ n meer ba ʊ n'a gɩngam k'awɔɔ m hɔ ka wɔɔ ʊ y, naa woo… naa, Woso m wɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa.
Wɔɔ n'ʊ ka ma fɩɩgaa kʊ gʊɔɔ m wɔɔ da ʊ y, wɔɔ n'ʊ ka ma awɔɔ zi, wɔɔ n'ʊ ka ma gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ zi sɔ y.

A n bɔkarɛ, a ga k'a ʊ m kʊ wɔɔ m daʊrɛ kʊ Krista zibəəzannɔ a ga m, ŋn'a yɩ bɩ yɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n ʊ ka ma k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʊ awɔɔ gʊr zi y. Bɩ, nyɩntabaa wɔɔ ba awɔɔ m gʊta, amba nyɩnɔ da tɩr nyasʊrɛ a nyɩnɔ m nyɩnta bɩ m.
Awɔɔ ŋʊa kʊ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ n a ŋʊa k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, lemim nyɩnta bɩ wɔɔ ka awɔɔ ʊ a minto y, wɔɔ ŋʊa sɔ k'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ka awɔɔ tɔ ma. Bala, wɔɔ awɔɔ ŋʊa maam-maam.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, ziro kʊ wɔɔ ŋ ba, ʊ kɔrɛ yɩ bɩ, ŋ tɔ y'awɔɔ nɔ ʊ, wɔɔ zi ba sinuu ʊ kan gunuu ʊ kɩ, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ kɔ wɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ mim tɔ ma y, a ba wɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, ʊ Woso lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da awɔɔ m.

Awɔɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ kan Woso kɩ sɔ, a dɔ a ʊ, nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ k'a m sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ, mɩsɩrbaa kʊ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ zi bɩ, nyɩnta a ʊ mɩŋŋabaa kan tɩrgabaa kɩ nɔ ʊ, mim n nyɩnta wɔɔ gʊr zi y.
Awɔɔ a ya a dɔ sɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ nyasʊ awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə m, amba nyɩnɔ zɩ tɩr nyasʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ m:
Ʊ a dʊndɔ, ʊ awɔɔ heer yo, ʊ a hɩ awɔɔ m karɛ, paan… ʊ ʊ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, a y'awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ n nyɩnta kan a kɩ a cirbəə kan a lɛbɔʊrɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ.

Wɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka sɔ dɔmɩm haay, bala, Woso lemim kʊ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ si a dɔ a ʊ, Woso lemim m, gʊaa lemim bɛɛ y, bɩ Woso lemim m denter paan…, an n'a zi bam awɔɔ gʊɔɔ k'a sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ heer ʊ.

Ʊ danyɩnɔ, mim kʊ Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ, Zidee kʊrɔ wɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a yɩ bɩ, awɔɔ yɩ sɔ. Bala, awɔɔ danyɩnɔ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma sɔ, amba brɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ fɩr ka ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ m.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ duro ɩ Zuuba Yeezuu zɛ gər, ŋ yɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ, ŋ yɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma sɔ. Woso heer bɩ nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ y, gʊɔɔ haay jɩnnɔ n ŋ mɩ.
Ŋ y'a tam wɔɔ m toore, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ lemim nyɩnta pa da do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ m kʊ ŋ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ y, a ba kʊ ŋ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ naa, a mimbʊnyaa ŋn'a dam la tee… bɩ naa haay jɛ ʊ, Woso a nɔmaa kərgu ŋ la.

Bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ʊ ba awɔɔ ma laatʊ, a maasɩrɛ ba poore. Ʊ n ʊ ya, ʊ n nɩ kʊ yɩrɛ y. Bɩ wɔɔ heer gɔɔta an nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ, wɔɔ ŋʊa paan… k'ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ awɔɔ yɩ, naa tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ tʊntɔ ʊ gʊta k'ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ awɔɔ yɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, wɔɔ n a ŋʊa k'ʊ ʊ wusigə ʊ ta awɔɔ zi. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ m tɔ ʊ gallɛm hɔka kʊ m ta awɔɔ zi, bɩ Sʊtaana wɔɔ zaa tii, wɔɔ n'ʊ da ma y.
Sɩra nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ sɔ, awɔɔ n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ taaheerlɛ m, awɔɔ tɔ ma m wɔɔ nɩ zɛm bɩ heernyɔɔ yɩ, ʊ ʊ da ma ʊ lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu taa, a zɛrɛ hinni ʊ.
Denter m, awɔɔ m wɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ kan wɔɔ heernyɔɔ kɩ.
Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n'a ŋʊam kʊ awɔɔ yɩ, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr ʊ dam ma bɩ, wɔɔ n kɔ ʊ lɛ sa, ʊ ʊ k'ʊ gɔɔta ʊ minto Atɛnnɩ ʊ.
A m bɩ, wɔɔ n'ʊ danyɩ Timote nyɔɔ, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn m an nɩ Woso zi bam Krista lemim nyɩnta bɩ padarɛ nɔ ʊ. A nyɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ ma k'an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, an awɔɔ heer yo a sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ,
k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a bɔ a jɛ m fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm naa minto y. Bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʊ, pakra m kʊ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ.
Nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ ser ka ʊ a hɩ awɔɔ m, ʊ ʊ, pakra m kʊ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ, b'awɔɔ dɔ, a ʊ, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ hɩ b'ɩ ba bɩ.

Naa tɔ ma m, kʊ mɔɔ n m da ma dɔ, m bʊr m ma kʊ m awɔɔ mim dɔ bɩ, mɔɔ n Timote nyɔɔ, k'an awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ mim dɔ, k'an b'a hɩ m m. Bala, mɔɔ da bɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ʊ, ɩ b'a ka Sʊtaana n awɔɔ makra ba, awɔɔ m sɩrakarɛ to, zi kʊ wɔɔ ba awɔɔ zi bɩ n bɔ vam y.

Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Timote a to awɔɔ zi b'ʊ an bʊr, a lemim nyɩnta hɩ wɔɔ m, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kan awɔɔ ŋʊarɛ kɩ mim bɩncɛ ʊ, a a hɩ, a ʊ, wɔɔ tɔ gɔɔta an awɔɔ nɔ ʊ nyɩnta, bɩ amba wɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ awɔɔ yɩ bɩ, awɔɔ lɛ taa k'a a ya, awɔɔ yɩ sɔ.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ minto bɩ, wɔɔ n heerkoodəbaa yɩ, ʊ fɩryɩrɛ kan ʊ makrarɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, wɔɔ ɩ heernyɔɔ m kɛɛrɛ ɩ ʊ, mɩsɩrbaa daa wɔɔ yɩ, k'awɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Zuuba zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ minto.
Awɔɔ tɔ ma, wɔɔ b'ʊ dam ma ʊ Woso barka da, ʊ a nya y, heernyɔɔ gʊta k'awɔɔ n'a kam wɔɔ ʊ a taa bɩ minto.
Sinuu ʊ kan gunuu ʊ kɩ wɔɔ y'a yɛm han gʊta, k'an a ka k'ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ awɔɔ yɩ k'ʊ hɔ k'a jɩra awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ ma bɩ na awɔɔ m ma.
Wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ n'a yɛm wɔɔ Zɩ Woso mɩŋŋa kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu kɩ han, kʊ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ zaa banka k'ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ bʊr awɔɔ zi.
Wɔɔ y'a yɛm kʊ Zuuba n a ka k'awɔɔ ŋʊarɛ kan kʊ kɩ kan gʊɔɔ haay kɩ bɩ n a da ra an bɩr tam lɛɛ tee…, amba wɔɔ n'awɔɔ ŋʊam bɩ m.
K'an a ba maam, an awɔɔ heer yo, k'awɔɔ m bɩr mɩŋŋa, mim ba awɔɔ gʊr zi wɔɔ Zɩ Woso taa y, hinni kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ kan a gʊɔɔ kɩ haay bɩ tɔ ma.

M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m, ʊ awɔɔ dʊndɔ m wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: Biisi bɩ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ n'a bam an Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do awɔɔ n'a bam, bɩ k'a ta lɛɛ tee… kan mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do kɩ a da ra.
Awɔɔ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ awɔɔ dʊndɔ m wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu tɔ ra bɩ dɔ.
Hɔ kʊ Woso lɛ n taa bɩ ba n nɩ: A lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa a mɩm ʊ ba, k'a a gʊ jaandarɛ do haay ma.
Awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə a ga m, an a da a mɛsim ma dɔ, k'an a da ma, an mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba kan daʊrɛ kɩ.
K'a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to kʊ lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ n a so awɔɔ ʊ, amba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ hɔ bɩ nɩ y.
Mim naa do nɔ ʊ, a b'a ka gɔsɩ n kʊrɔma kan a danyɩ kɩ an zambʊ ba ma y, bala, Zuuba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ minno nɔɔn duro bam nɔ wɔɔ hʊnhʊrm, amba wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ʊ a hɩ awɔɔ m, ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ so ra paan… bɩ m.
Sɩra nɔ ʊ, Woso n wɔɔ bir kʊ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba lannɔ gɛɛ yaarɔ barɛ nɔ ʊ y, bɩ kʊ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba mɩŋŋabaa nɔ ʊ.
Naa minto bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ kaanɩm hɔdɩndarɛ naa do m bɩ, gʊaa bɛɛ a nɩ kaanɩm nɩ y, Woso k'a n'a *Sɛnt-Ɛspri karɛ awɔɔ ʊ b'a kaanm m.
M danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʊ, kʊ kʊ ŋʊarɛ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, pakra bɛɛ m kan awɔɔ kɩ kʊ mɔɔ n ci ba awɔɔ ma, m a mim dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y. Bala, Woso mɩŋŋa hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m k'awɔɔ m bɩr kʊ ŋʊam.
Bɩ, amba n ŋʊarɛ mim dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ, awɔɔ ɩ danyɩnɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ Masedʊan kʊ b'ʊ jilli rɔ wɔɔ ŋʊarɛ. Bɩ, kʊ a yɛ awɔɔ han k'a ta lɛɛ tee… kan ŋ ŋʊarɛ kɩ a da ra.
K'a a yo ʊ kʊ laafɩɩ n nyɩnta awɔɔ kan gʊɔɔ kɩ bire ʊ, gʊaa biyəə n a zerga a mɩŋŋa mim lɛ, an zi ba an a mɩsɩrbaa ba m, amba wɔɔ lɛɛ ka, ʊ a hɩ awɔɔ m bɩ m.
K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʊ, awɔɔ bɩ gɔsɩ mɩm kam sɔ y.
M danyɩnɔ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, wɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n gɔɔta badɔ nɔ ʊ, a bɩr heerzarlɛ m amba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ba taaheerlɛ m nɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.
Kʊ wɔɔ sɩra ka, ʊ ʊ Yeezuu ga an a mɩm bɔ ʊ bɩ, maam sɔ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Yeezuu ʊ ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ, Woso brɔɔ mɩm bɔŋ ʊ ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba kan Yeezuu kɩ.
Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ kʊ a hɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Zuuba ɩ nyɩnta an a dɩnda. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, wɔɔ gʊɔɔ k'ʊ gɔɔta ʊ m mɩsɩr naa, Zuuba zɛrɛ hinni ʊ, wɔɔ bɩ lɛɛ kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.

Bala, kʊ Woso bɩ zaa ka, malɛɛka jɩtaarɛ deem n a leer busu, n nɩ Woso huure bɩ hɛ, Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa y'a tom arzana ʊ, an zer. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Krista ʊ ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋnɩ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ n lɛɛ ka ŋn'a mɩm bɔ ʊ.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ kɛɛrɛ, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ m mɩsɩr hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, n wɔɔ nam kʊ ʊ kan ŋ kɩ n nɩ wɔɔ busu warkʊ nɔ ʊ, kʊ aa Zuuba zɛ ʊ brama, yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ wɔɔ n nyɩnta kan Zuuba kɩ dɔmɩm haay.
K'a meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro ba kan kʊ kɩ, a bɩr kʊ heer yom.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, pakra bɛɛ m kʊ n nɩ ci ba awɔɔ ma n nɩ dɔmɩm gɛɛ wakatɩ kʊ minno nɔɔn duro n nɩ baŋ ʊ bɩ mim dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y.
Bala, awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ a dɔ a zim a ʊ, hinni kʊ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ bɩ, nyɩnta a nawʊm amba koor tɩr bʊr gunuu ʊ gʊaa n a wakatɩ dɔ bɩ m.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ bʊr ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ: «Laafɩɩ dɔmɩm wɔɔ n ta ʊ kɛɛrɛ, minsi ba ʊ y.» Dɔmɩm bɩ do fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ daata zɛrɛ ŋ la amba nyoosibarɛ tɩr daata zɛ lʊ jɩsɩzaa ra bɩ m, ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, ʊ danyɩnɔ, monsigə bɛɛ awɔɔ n ta ʊ, kʊ dɔmɩm bɩ do n bɩ daata zɛ awɔɔ ra, amba koor tɩr daata zɛ gʊaa ra bɩ nɩ y.
Bala, awɔɔ haay, lɛɛgure gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, sinuu gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Gunuu gʊɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ, bɩ monsigə gʊɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ m sɔ y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʊ bɩ hinceem ba am gʊɔɔ mɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ nɩ y, ʊ b'a to kʊ hɔsɩ n'ʊ zu ʊ y, ʊ ʊ da ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.
Hinceem zannɔ wɔɔ a ba ŋ nawʊm gunuu ʊ, gunuu ʊ ŋnɩ bɛɛ miŋ ʊ sɔ an nɩ ŋ zɛm.

Bɩ, wɔɔ kʊ sinuu gʊɔɔ m wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ʊ ʊ da ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, k'ʊ gɔɔta ʊ sɩra ka, ʊ bɩr ŋʊarɛ m, ɩ ʊ pɔyaa goŋŋo wɔɔ ka ʊ ma, ʊ bɩr bʊmbɔrɛ kʊ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm ba yɩ bɩ taaheerlɛ m, ɩ ʊ, pɔyaa firgə wɔɔ ku ʊ mim ma.
Bala, Woso n wɔɔ bɔ ʊ k'a bɩ fɩr ka wɔɔ ma a nɔmaa nɔ ʊ y, bɩ wɔɔ bɔ a ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa ɩ ga wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta ʊ m mɩsɩr, gɛɛ gɩnga wɔɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ m mɩsɩrbaa ba kan kɩ a zɛrɛ hinni ʊ.
Naa minto bɩ, k'a kʊ heer yo, a kʊ sɩrakarɛ da ra, amba awɔɔ n'a bam kara bɩ m.
M danyɩnɔ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso zi bam awɔɔ barla ŋnɩ karɛ awɔɔ lɛɛ, ŋn'awɔɔ bɔm zaa ʊ Zuuba zaa nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han k'a ŋ gore da ʊ.
K'a ŋ da ʊ gʊta kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ, ŋ zibəə bɩ minto. Awɔɔ haay, k'a bɩr laafɩɩ kan kʊ kɩ.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, kʊ a yɛ a han, k'a həən si gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa zore bam nɔ wɔɔ ma, k'a heerkoodəwarzannɔ heer yo, k'a a da paŋŋawarzannɔ han, k'a bɩr bʊraama m kan gʊaa haay kɩ.
K'a dundo a zi kʊ gɔsɩ b'a bʊnyaa sompi gʊaa n'ʊ y, bɩ k'a bɩr a karɛ a mɩŋŋa barɛ ma tee…, awɔɔ kan kʊ kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ haay kɩ bire ʊ.
K'a bɩr heernyɔɔ m dɔmɩm haay,
k'a bɩr yaa dam tee….
Mim woo… nɔ ʊ, k'a Woso barka da, bala, naa Woso lɛ n taa awɔɔ gʊr zi Krista Yeezuu zuure bɩ nɔ ʊ.
A b'a ta Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə m toore y,
a bɩ wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʊrɛ meerbaarɔ gore bɔ ʊ y.
Bɩ, mim haay nɔ ʊ, k'a a hɔɔn da ma, a dɩga hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa a nɔ ʊ bɩ ma, a nyasʊ hɔ bɩ do m.
K'a a gʊ mimbʊnyaa do haay ma laatʊ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ wɔɔ Woso kʊ laafɩɩ karɛzaa m bɩ n'awɔɔ hu bɔ jilli, k'an dɔ awɔɔ hɔɔn ma, kan awɔɔ nyi kɩ a mɛ kɩ ma haay, kʊ minsi bɩ nyɩnta awɔɔ gʊr zi wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛrɛ hinni ʊ y.
Woso mɩŋŋa y'awɔɔ bir, jɩnalɛrazaa m, an nɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ yɛ naa barɛ.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, k'a yaa da Woso m wɔɔ minto sɔ.
K'a yaa da danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay m, amba a a ga m bɩ m.
Zuuba tɔ ma, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han paan…. K'a ci naa do karɩnda ba danyɩnɔ wɔɔ haay lɛɛ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ kɩ.
II Thessalonians: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, kan Silas kɩ Timote kɩ, wɔɔ nɩ ci naa do barɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a m Tesaloniki kristagʊɔɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n'a so awɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊm kʊ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, a a ga m, kʊ wɔɔ n yaa da Woso m barka, awɔɔ tɔ ma tee…. A ga a ʊ m, kʊ wɔɔ n a ba ncɩnaaʊ, bala awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ y'a dam la, awɔɔ kʊ ŋʊarɛ nɩ tam lɛɛ tee….

Naa minto m, kʊ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ mim dɩndam Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ vantɔɔ lɛɛ, a dɩnda wɔɔ nawʊm ʊ n'ʊ mim kam brama, bala, gʊɔɔ sɔ awɔɔ m, ŋnɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ nɩ yɛm naa haay ma, an n'a tʊntɔŋ ʊ a gɔɔta an nɩ sɩrakarɛ m.

Naa woo… n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, dʊdɔ kʊ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka bɩ yɩm tɩrga, fɩryɩrɛrɔ nɔɔn duro k'awɔɔ nɩ yɛrɛ ŋ ma naa n n'a karɛ awɔɔ n'a ga Woso cirbəə gasʊrɛ m, Woso cirbəə bɩ do tɔ ma m awɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm.
Sɩra m, hɔ k'an tɩrga bɩ Woso n n'a bam, a y'awɔɔ zɩm bɔm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma, an fɩryɩrɛ ka ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, awɔɔ k'a nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ, a mɛnyɔɔ karɛ awɔɔ ʊ kan wɔɔ kɩ, naa ba a nawʊm hinni kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu n'a tom brama an zer kan a malɛɛkarɔ paŋŋazannɔ kɩ bɩ ma.
Zer a nawʊm sɛwurə nɔ ʊ, k'a bɩ fɩr ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr yɛm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ ma.
Fɩryɩrɛ kʊ ŋ n'a yɩm bɩ, zaarbarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ m, n nyɔɔ n nawʊm laatʊ Zuuba taʊrɛ kan a cirbəə paŋŋa kɩ ma.

Zɛ k'a nawʊm dɔmɩm gʊta bɩ do hinni ʊ bɩ, naa n nɩ baŋ ʊ. Zɛ a nawʊm k'a bɩ nyɩnta lɛbɔʊrɛ m a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zi, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ n a lɛ bɔ a ʊ. Awɔɔ nyɩntam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, bala, awɔɔ sɩra ka lemim kʊ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m b'ʊ.

Bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ nɩ yaa dam Woso m awɔɔ tɔ ma tee…, k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n a ga mɩsɩrbaa k'a mɩŋŋa awɔɔ bir k'awɔɔ m b'a ba bɩ m. K'an a ka, a paŋŋa bɩ minto bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma, a hɔ mɩŋŋa haay k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa k'a ba bɩ ba, kʊ zi k'awɔɔ n'a bam sɩra k'awɔɔ ka bɩ tɔ ma bɩ m nyɩ da.
Naa n'a kam wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ awɔɔ gʊr zi, awɔɔ m lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ a gʊr zi, wɔɔ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ barka tɔ ma.
M danyɩnɔ, kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zɛrɛ hinni bɩ nɩ, kan ba wɔɔ n'ʊ som kʊ ma kan kɩ bɩ mim nɩ, hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a yɛ awɔɔ han bɩ ba n nɩ:

A a da ma, n ʊ, wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʊrɛ meerbaa niŋŋə, gɛɛ Woso lemim padarɛ niŋŋə, gɛɛ ci niŋŋə y'a to wɔɔ zi an n'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, Zuuba zɛrɛ hinni bɩ lee ku, a b'a hɔɔn war kʊ ma a nyi ba naanaa, naa do tɔ ma y.
A b'a to kʊ gɔsɩ n bra bɩmba a m fɩɩga y. Bala, pakra m kʊ gʊɔɔ cir gʊta m wuti ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka Woso ma, kʊ gʊaa bʊnyaa kʊ Woso n n'a dam sɛhar ʊ bɩ n a hɩnka, bɩ jɛ ʊ, Zuuba dɔmɩm bɩ n n'a kuŋ ʊ.
Gʊaa bʊnyaa bɩ do bɩ yɛm, gʊɔɔ n yaa da hɔsɩ m dɔ y, baa Woso mɩŋŋa, a y'a mɩŋŋa cɩntam hɔ haay burə ʊ, baa Woso burə ʊ. A gasʊm Wosocɛ gʊta mɩŋŋa ʊ, an aa nyɩnta an a hɩ a ʊ, Woso n'a mɩ.
Nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, mɔɔ naa mim dɩnda awɔɔ m, a tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʊ ra?
Dɩɩtaa naa, hɔ n'a tam gʊaa bʊnyaa bɩ m toore, k'a b'a da ma, an a hɩnka k'a dɔmɩm bɛɛ y'a ku y, awɔɔ hɔ bɩ do dɔ.
Denter m, gʊaa bʊnyaa bɩ paŋŋa a nyaakʊm da an nɩ zi bam kara, bɩ pakra m kʊ gʊaa k'a n'a tam gʊaa bʊnyaa bɩ m toore bɩ n'a gaa toore.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ, gʊaa bʊnyaa bɩ y'a hɩnkam kɛɛrɛ, bɩ Zuuba Yeezuu y'a zɛm gər a lɛ hoonsire m, an a hɔɔnsɩ a hɩnkarɛ leegure paŋŋa gʊtabaa m.
Gʊaa bʊnyaa bɩ, a hɩnka a nawʊm kan Sʊtaana paŋŋa kɩ, a zi paŋŋazannɔ do haay bam, an makrarɔ ba kan hoserlo kɩ, k'a gʊɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ.
A yom zi bʊnyaa do haay ma, an gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyaanɩm nɔ wɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ, brɔɔ nyaanɩm, bala, sɩra k'a n'a dam ma an ŋ bʊmbɔ bɩ, ŋ n a ŋʊa, bɩ, ŋ n yɛ ma y.
Bɩ y'a ka, Woso n a ka nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ paŋŋa nɩ zi bam kan ŋ kɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka ŋʊaar ʊ.
Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, Woso m bɩ zɛm bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n yɛ sɩra ma y, bɩ zibʊnyaa barɛ ŋn'a ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yar.

M danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ yaa da Woso m barka awɔɔ tɔ ma tee…, awɔɔ kʊ Zuuba n'a ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ. Bala, Woso awɔɔ bɔ ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʊ cɩna y. *Sɛnt-Ɛspri zibəə tɔ ma, kan yɛ k'awɔɔ ʊ sɩra ma bɩ kɩ minto, k'awɔɔ n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, a yɩ Woso soʊre hɔɔ.
Bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ tɔ ma m, an zu kʊ ʊ kan lemim nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ pa da awɔɔ m bɩ kɩ, an awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ m bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, danyɩnɔ, k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, a hɔ haay kʊ wɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m meerbaa nɔ ʊ gɛɛ ci ʊ bɩ nyasʊ mɩŋŋa.
Wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa, kan wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kɩ wɔɔ ŋʊa, ŋnɩ heerwʊtarɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ, kan taaheerlɛ mɩŋŋa kɩ ka wɔɔ ʊ.
A yɛ wɔɔ nawʊrɛ ŋ han, kʊ ŋ n'a ka kʊ heerwʊtarɛ n'awɔɔ heer han, kʊ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa ka awɔɔ ʊ k'a bɩr hɔ k'an mɩŋŋa haay bam tee…, zibəə kan meerbaa kɩ nɔ ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ, k'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma, kʊ Zuuba lemim n gɔɔta an bɩr tam lɛɛ tee…, k'an daʊrɛ yɩ amba a nyɩnta ʊ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ bɩ m.
K'a yaa da wɔɔ tɔ ma sɔ, kʊ Woso n wɔɔ yɔ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊsɩ rɔ wɔ ʊ, bala, gʊɔɔ haay bɛɛ nɩ sɩra karɛ y.
Bɩ, jɩnalɛrazaa m Zuuba m, a y'awɔɔ paŋŋa dam la, an dɔ awɔɔ ma kan a bʊnyaabarɛzaa bɩ kɩ.
K'awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ nɩ, Zuuba a ka wɔɔ heer n kookoo ʊ a dɔ, ʊ ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bam b'awɔɔ gɔɔtarɛ a ta lɛɛ kan a barɛ kɩ.
Bɩ, kʊ Zuuba n a ka k'awɔɔ n Woso ŋʊa kan a heer kɩ, k'a a da ma sɔ, a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee…, baa kʊ bɔ m, amba Krista a ba bɩ m.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, a yɛ wɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ han, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma, danyɩnɔ haay kʊ yakʊzannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, k'a gʊ ŋ ma laatʊ, brɔɔ bɩr yɛm hɔ haay kʊ wɔɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ ma y.
Awɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ, awɔɔ hɔ k'a n'a bam a wɔɔ hɔbaa dɩnda bɩ dɔ. Bala, nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n nyɩnta yakʊzannɔ y.
Wɔɔ n gɔsɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ vam y. Bɩ, zi wɔɔ ba ʊ kɔ, wɔɔ zi ba sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ kɔ wɔɔ hɔbɩrɛ mim tɔ ma y.
Sɩra nɔ ʊ, wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ daahan yɩ awɔɔ zi, bɩ, wɔɔ y'a ŋʊa ʊ zim k'ʊ lɛɛmaa hɔ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n zu wɔɔ hɔbaa ʊ.
Bala, nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ zi b'ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ hɩ awɔɔ m, wɔɔ ʊ: «Kʊ gʊaa ʊ, a lɛ baa zibəə ma, k'a bɩ hɔ bɩ sɔ y.»
A n bɔkarɛ, wɔɔ y'a marɛ n n'a hɩrɛ n ʊ, awɔɔ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʊ, ŋn'ɩ yakʊ bam, ŋ bɩr zi barɛ y, a war ŋ nawʊm gʊɔɔ minno ma.
Lɛ kʊ wɔɔ n'a cɩntam gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro m, ʊ nɩ ŋ dʊndɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ ba n nɩ: K'a a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ zibəə lɛ ʊ zɛny…, a a lɛɛmaa hɔ bɩ.
Ʊ danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ nɩ, a bɩ kɔ kan zi mɩŋŋa barɛ kɩ y.
Kʊ gʊaa n zu hɔ kʊ wɔɔ dɩnda ci naa do nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, k'a zaa da lɛ ʊ, a b'a ya, a a zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ y, kʊ nyannɩ n a nyasʊ.
Bɩ, a b'a zaa ba a jɩm y, k'a dʊndɔ, amba n tɩr a danyɩ dʊndɔ bɩ m.
Bɩ, kʊ Zuuba mɩŋŋa k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ n laafɩɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ dɔmɩm haay, hɔ haay m. Bɩ, kʊ Zuuba m bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ leersore yaa kʊ mɔɔ n'a darɛ awɔɔ m naa gʊrsɩra barɛ m zim, ciro haay kʊ mɔɔ tɩr ŋ nyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ, m wɔjɩ mɔɔ tɩr a daŋ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ. Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa gʊrsɩra n naa.
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
I Timothy: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ ci naa do barɛ. Woso kʊ wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ kan Krista Yeezuu k'an wɔɔ taaheerlɛ bɩ k'ɩ zaa ka, mɔɔ nɩ m ba Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa.
Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Timote, mɔɔ nyɩ paan… sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ kʊ Zɩ Woso kan wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʊ.
Amba mɔɔ yɛ ɩ han, m hʊrlɛ ma, kʊ m ta Masedʊan ʊ bɩ, gɔɔta ɩ nyɩnta Efɛɛzɩ ʊ, k'ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋʊaar hɔ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ da jɩm ʊ.
A hɩ ŋ nɩ sɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ biisi minno kan yaabɔɔ tɔrɔ gaandarɛrɔ sʊʊra jintoo wɔɔ kɩ to. Minno wɔɔ duro, bɩsɩkarɛ ŋn'ɩ zɛm nɩ bala, ŋ bɩr a dam Woso hɔɔnhɔ barɛ kʊ wɔɔ n'a dɔm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ han y.
Meerbaa naa do ba ɩbɩɩ nawʊm kan ŋ kɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋnɩ heer hu yɩ, kʊ ŋʊarɛ n nyɩnta ŋ heer ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa yɩ, ŋnɩ sɩra ka paan….
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a gʊ zaa kʊ wɔɔ hɩnka naa ma, ŋnɩ nyaam, meerbaa yaarsɩrɔ nɔ ʊ.
Ŋ ʊ, Woso lɛrɔ hɔdonno n a mɩ, an bɔkarɛ hɔ kʊ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a hɩm, ŋn'ɩ som la kan paŋŋa kɩ bɩ, ŋn'a jɩ dɔ y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋa, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, gʊaa ɩ zuŋ ʊ amba a a ga m bɩ m.

Ʊ a tɔ da ʊ nɔ ʊ, ʊ ʊ, n nɩ lɛrɔ wɔɔ ka gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ tɔ ma y, a ka n y'a ʊ bayɛrɛzannɔ tɔ ma, kan bɩsɩkənno kɩ, gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kɩ, mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr Woso daŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso hɔ gore bɔŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a zɩrɔ kan a dɔɔ kɩ meeyaa bɔŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ kan gərzenno kɩ,
jaandənno kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ yaarɔ wʊta kan kʊ kɩ zannɔ kɩ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊna ŋnɩ ŋ hɛɛ zannɔ kɩ, ŋʊaarzannɔ kɩ, kan ŋʊaarkasɛtɩzannɔ kɩ. Lɛ bɩ ka n y'a ʊ sɔ mim haay k'a nɩ hɔdɩndarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ zarm tɔ ma.
Hɔdɩndarɛ naa do a ga kʊ ʊ kan lemim nyɩnta kʊ Woso a da mɔɔ wɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ. Lemim bɩ do nɩ Woso k'a a so heernyɔɔ ʊ bɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ hɩnkarɛ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu m barka, k'a paŋŋa ka mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a zi ba bɩ minto. Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka k'a gɩnga a ʊ, mɔɔ n ga a zibəə bɩ m an mɔɔ da ʊ bɩ minto.
A n bɔkarɛ biisi bɩ, mɔɔ nyɩnta n meerbaa bʊnyaa ba ma, m fɩr ka a gʊɔɔ ma, m a sʊnsɔ wʊ. Bɩ, a mɔɔ cicir zɛ, bala, badɔ ɩ mɔɔ da naa haay barɛ ma, kʊ mɔɔ n sɩra ka bɩ tɔ ma.
Wɔɔ Zuuba bɩ barka ka mɔɔ ʊ gʊta, an a ka mɔɔ n sɩra ka, m nɩ ŋʊarɛ m Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ.
Meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ ma ba naa, sɩra m, gʊaa haay a ga m, an a si mɩŋŋa: «Krista Yeezuu bʊr durnya ʊ, k'a bɩ mimbʊnyaabənno bʊmbɔ.» Bɩ, mɔɔ mimbʊnyaa barɛ ɩ lɛ da.

Bɩ, Woso mɔɔ cicir zɛ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Krista Yeezuu a bʊraama gʊta hɩnka mɔɔ gʊr zi mɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ m mimbʊnyaabər gʊta k'a lɛ da bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ m yɩ makra gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ sɩra ka ŋnɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n a a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ,
ŋn'a da ʊ dɔmɩm haay,
an cir an nɩ cirbəə m dɔmɩm haay,
an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m tee…,
gʊaa bɩr a mɩŋŋa yɩrɛ y,
a deem m Woso. Amina.
M nyɩ Timote, ɩ b'ɩ dʊndɔ mɔɔ nawʊm, amba wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʊrɛ meerbaa zannɔ nyɩnta ŋ n'ɩbɩɩ mim hɩ bɩ m, hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a hɩ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ, ɩ sa ɩ zoobarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ bam.
Zoo bɩ ba sɩrakarɛ m, kan hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa kɩ m. Hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa bɩ do, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a to, a tore bɩ n a ka ŋ sɩrakarɛ n a zar.
Yimene kan Alɛsandɩr k'ɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro barla, mɔɔ wɔ daa ŋ ma Sʊtaana wɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔɔn ka, kʊ ŋ b'a ya ŋnɩ Woso sʊnsɔ wʊ y.
Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m n'a yɛm bɩ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ, kʊ gʊɔɔ n yaa da Woso m gʊɔɔ haay tɔ ma, a ŋ mim haay da Woso wɔ ʊ, a yaa da m barka ŋ tɔ ma.
K'a yaa da cinno wɔɔ tɔ ma, kan lɛɛzannɔ haay kɩ tɔ ma sɔ, k'ʊ nyɩnta laafɩɩ nɔ ʊ, ʊ bɩr zum Woso ʊ zenyy…, mɩsɩrbaa zore nɔ ʊ kan daʊrɛ kɩ.
Naa m mɩŋŋa, an Woso kʊ wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ nɔ yɩ,
a lɛ taa kʊ gʊɔɔ haay n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ.
Bala, Woso deem n ta ʊ,
gʊaa deem taan… nɩ gʊɔɔ zɛm kʊ ra kan Woso kɩ,
Krista Yeezuu m.
A ɩ yɛ an a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma,
kʊ gʊɔɔ haay n bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku an naa ba bɩ, a yɩ kasɛtɩ, an a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Woso lɛ taa k'a gʊaa haay bʊmbɔ.
Naa mɩŋŋa tɔ ma m Woso n mɔɔ bɔ ʊ kʊ m yɩ a lemim padər, an mɔɔ ba kristazibəəzaa, sɩra mɔɔ n'a hɩm, mɔɔ bɩr ŋʊaar barɛ y, mɔɔ cɩnta a ʊ, kʊ m sɩrakarɛ kan sɩra kɩ dɩnda do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m.
