Naa minto bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ gʊɔɔ yaarɔ wɔɔ n yaa da Woso m, lɛɛ haay ʊ, ŋn'a wɔrɔ busu brama kʊ mimbʊnyaa bɩ nyɩnta ŋ gʊr zi y, ŋ bɩ nɔmaa kan nyaa kɩ to a heer ʊ ŋnɩ yaa bɩ da y.

Kʊ lannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa, kʊ ŋ nɩ huu k'a ga kʊ ʊ ba du a ma, ŋnɩ bɩr sappɩ, mɩŋŋahɩnkarɛ ba ŋ zi y, ŋ b'a ka mim kʊsɩrɛ waasɩ ma, gɛɛ sarma nyɛɛnnɔ ma y, gɛɛ busoo gʊta huu ma, gɛɛ mɩŋŋabankarɛ waasɩ ma y.
Bɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a ka zi mɩŋŋa barɛ ma, bala, lannɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ, a ɩ zum Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a ga a wʊm kʊ ŋ n'a ba ncɩnaaʊ.
Hɔdɩndarɛ wakatɩ ʊ, lannɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ…, ŋnɩ yɛ hɔ haay ma.
Mɔɔ bɩ yɛm kʊ lannɔ n hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ yaarɔ m, ŋn'a so ŋ ʊ y, a a ga m, ŋnɩ zɛ sɩɩ….
Bala, Adam Woso lɛɛ ka an a da, Ɛɛvɩ n bɔkarɛ an a nya ʊ.
Adam bɛɛ Sʊtaana bra ba nɩ y, Ɛɛvɩ a bra ba m, an yɛ, an bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ ma.
Bɩ, k'a yɛ nyɩdazaambaa ma an a tʊntɔ ʊ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ, mɩŋŋabaa kɩ, mɩŋŋazerle kɩ, a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm.
Sɩra m, meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ba naa m, kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa k'a ka wosogʊɔɔ lɛɛ, zibəə mɩŋŋa a ʊ k'a ba.

Bɩ, kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzaa a ga m, an bɩr gʊaa kʊ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a lʊ m bɩr deem, an bɩr gʊaa k'a a da a mɩŋŋa ma zaa, hɔɔndamimmazaa, nyasʊ a mɩŋŋa m zaa, an bɩr saanɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa a har ʊ, an n'a dam ma an hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m.
A bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirezaa waasɩ y, a bɩ yɩ wɔkaarɛzaa nyaa bɩncɛ ʊ y, bɩ k'an yɩ kʊmarɛzaa, laafɩɩkamazaa, a bɩ yɩ busooŋʊarɛzaa y.
K'an dɩga a har mim ma mɩŋŋa, an a da a nyɩnɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr zuŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr a daŋ ʊ hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa n a da ma an nyasʊ a har mim m mɩŋŋa, a y'a bam lɔ k'a a da ma, a nyasʊ Woso gʊɔɔ sokʊma nɩ?
Kʊ gʊaa k'a yɩ kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzaa, a n a ga m, an yɩ sɩrakarɛzaa daa y, kʊ m bɛɛ m, a y'a mɩŋŋa busum, an dʊdɔyarlɛ kʊ Sʊtaana a yɩ bɩ yɩ.
A a ga m sɔ, k'a kasɛtɩ m bɩr mɩŋŋa gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr zum Krista ʊ rɔ wɔɔ zi, kʊ n b'a da ma, n a gore bɔ ʊ y, k'a b'a da Sʊtaana baŋŋa ʊ y.
Daahanzannɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ yɩ mɩsɩrbaa zore zannɔ, sɩrazannɔ, ŋ bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirezannɔ waasɩ y, ŋ bɩ yɩ zambʊ hɔkamazannɔ y.
Ŋ y'a ga m, ŋnɩ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩra kʊ sɩrakarɛ a hɩnka bɩ nɔ ʊ, hɔɔndarɛ mɩŋŋa m.
K'a lɛɛ ka a ŋ ka lɛɛ, a dɩga ŋ ma, kʊ mim ba ŋ gʊr zi, k'a bɔkarɛ a ŋ da daahanbaa zibəə b'ʊ.
Daahanzannɔ kʊ lannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa m, ŋ bɩ yɩ meerbaa bʊnyaa ba gʊɔɔ ma zannɔ y, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ yɩ jɩnalɛrazannɔ hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Daahanzaa biyəə lʊ a ga m an bɩr deem, an a da a nyɩnɔ ma mɩŋŋa, an dɩga a har mim ma mɩŋŋa.
Bala, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ daahanbaa zi bam mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ gore daʊrɛ yɩrɛ ŋnɩ heerkoodəbaa gʊta yɩ sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʊ zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ y'a gɩngam kʊ m bʊr ɩbɩɩ zi zɔɔ, bɩ naa haay gʊrsɩra mɔɔ ba ɩbɩɩ ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ,

kʊ mɔɔ bʊr m bɩr zɛm zɔɔ, k'ɩbɩɩ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a a ga m, an bɩr bam Woso gʊɔɔ gʊr zi bɩ dɔ. Wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma bɩ m, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ y'a so ʊ, sokʊma bɩ do n ta hɔdɩndarɛ k'a m sɩra bɩ m, an n'a kam gʊɔɔ n'a dɔrɛ.
Wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ hɔ gʊta k'a nyaakʊm da Woso n a hɩnka bɩ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an bɩsɩ ka ma y.
A a hɩnka mɛsim nɔ ʊ,
Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a hɩnka gʊaa tɩrga,
malɛɛkarɔ m dɩga a.
N n'a mim pa da do vantɔɔ zi.
Gʊɔɔ sɩra ka ʊ durnya nɔ ʊ jilli.
Woso n a busu an a nyɩnta lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ arzana ʊ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri a hɩ paan… a ʊ, jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩrakarɛ tore, ŋnɩ yɛ brabagʊɔɔ m zinəro ma, kan hɔdɩndarɛrɔ kʊ zinəro wɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ, gʊɔɔ nɩ ŋ dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɔ bam ɩ ʊ, gʊɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n ŋ mɩ, ŋn'ɩ ŋʊaar bam nɔ wɔɔ n'a karɛ ŋn'a nyʊnnyɔɔ, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro heer ga, amba sɛ tɩr na hɔ ma bɩ m, nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ fɩɩga y.

Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, gʊɔɔ bɩ lʊ ka cɛ ʊ dɔ y, bɩ lannɔ bɩ cɛ ka sɔ y, ŋ hɔbɩrɛrɔ niŋŋoo bɩrɛ cizɛm, an bɔkarɛ Woso ɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro da sɩrakarɛzannɔ tɔ ma, bala, brɔɔ sɩra dɔ, kʊ ŋ nɩ barka yaa da Woso nɩ, ŋn'a dɔ ŋnɩ ŋ bɩ.
Bala, hɔ haay kʊ Woso a da bɩ mɩŋŋa, kʊ gʊɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka ŋn'a dɔ ŋn'a sarɛ, ʊ n'ʊ ga m, ʊ dɩga deem taan… ma hɔ bʊnyaa y.
Bala, Woso lemim bɩ kan wɔɔ yaadarɛ kɩ y'a hu bɔm.
Naa dɩnda sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m, k'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ, ɩbɩɩ yɩm Krista Yeezuu zibəənyɩ k'an mɩŋŋa, bɩ n'a hɩnkam sɔ a ʊ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ tʊrm sɩrakarɛ lemim bɩ m, kan sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩ nɩ yɛm ma mɩŋŋa bɩ kɩ.
Ɩ bɩ yɛ biisi minno yaarsɩrɔ wɔɔ dɩndarɛ ma y, ŋ bɩr a dam gʊaa han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ y. Ɩ bɩr ɩ tʊntɔŋ ʊ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ kɩ.

Bala, kʊ gʊaa y'a mɛ paŋŋa dam la tʊntɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ, daahan m, b'a gʊaa bankarɛ bɩ gʊta y, an bɔkarɛ, kʊ gʊaa ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ, a y'a dam gʊaa han hɔ haay nɔ ʊ. Woso ler bɔ, k'a zaa m mɩsɩrbaa paan… yɩ tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, kan booti hinni ʊ kɩ.
Meerbaa naa do, sɩra m, gʊaa haay n'a ga m, an a si mɩŋŋa.
Naa minto m, wɔɔ nɩ yɛm kɔrɛ ma, ʊ n'ʊ yoŋ ʊ, bala, Woso k'a m mɩsɩr bɩ wɔɔ ta ʊ heer lɛ. A m gʊaa haay bʊmbɔrɛzaa, bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ bʊmbɔm.
Naa, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m, ɩ hɩ paan…, ɩ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m.

Ɩ b'a ka gɔsɩ n ɩ gore bɔ ʊ, k'ɩ m gʊaa poo bɩ tɔ ma y. Bɩ, a ka k'ɩ yɩ makra mɩŋŋa sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ mɩm ʊ, ɩ meerbaa nɔ ʊ, ɩ tarɛ nɔ ʊ, ɩ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa Woso mɩm ʊ barɛ nɔ ʊ.
Ɩ bɩr ɩ tɔŋ ʊ, kan Woso lemim bɩ karɩnda barɛ kɩ, gʊɔɔ sokʊma nɔ ʊ. Ɩ tɔ ʊ kan gʊɔɔ dʊndɔrɛ kɩ, kan hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m kɩ, k'an ta an mɔɔ bʊrlɛ ku.
Ɩ bɩ ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso a ka ɩ ʊ, k'ɩ zi bam bɩ to y. A ka k'a ʊ ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ, nyɩnta ʊ kan wosolɛsinnɩsora ganwʊrɛ meerbaa zannɔ kɩ, kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ y'a wɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ra kɩ sɔ.
Naa ɩbɩɩ ga m, ɩ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ ɩ heer ʊ, ɩ ɩ tʊntɔ ʊ kan a zibəə kɩ, gʊaa woo… n a dɔ ŋ ʊ ɩ y'ɩ yoŋ ʊ, ɩ nɩ tam lɛɛ.
Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi, ɩ dundo hɔ k'ɩ n'a dɩndam gʊɔɔ m bɩ zi, ɩ bɩr ɩ tɔŋ ʊ kan naa haay kɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ba ncɩnaaʊ, ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ mɩŋŋa yɔm, ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr karɛ ɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ sɔ.
Ɩ bɩ həən si gʊaa gusire ma kan paŋŋa kɩ y, bɩ, dɩga ma ɩ zɩ, ɩ dʊndɔ. Nyukumbonno wɔɔ dʊndɔ danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ.
Ɩ lannɔ gusinno wɔɔ dʊndɔ, ɩ ʊ, ɩ dɔɔ m, lannɔ pooro wɔɔ dʊndɔ kan heer hu kɩ, ɩ ʊ, ɩ danlʊrɔ m.
Zonno kʊ ŋ gɔsɩ ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, nyasʊ ŋ nɩ kan daʊrɛ kɩ.

Zoro k'a nyɩnɔ n ta ʊ gɛɛ a yaŋŋɔɔ, nyɩnɔ wɔɔ, gɛɛ yaŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ y'a ga m, ŋn'a yɩrɛzannɔ nyasʊm dɩnda. Naa ŋ y'a ga m, ŋn'a ba, a Woso zuure bɩ nɔ ʊ. Kʊ ŋ yɩrɛzannɔ wɔɔ nyasʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ nyasʊ ŋ nɩ sɔ. Woso n'a ŋʊam bɩ m naa.
Kʊ zoro k'an zoro paan… an gɔɔta a deem bɩ nɩ, yo b'ʊ Woso ma, an nɩ yaa dam tee… sinuu ʊ kan gunuu ʊ kɩ, an nɩ daahan yɛm Woso han.
Bɩ, kʊ zoro k'a n'a kam mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ma bɩ nɩ, a mɩsɩr mɩnyaa dɩgarɛ nɔ ʊ, bɩ, sɩra nɔ ʊ, gər m Woso mɩm ʊ.
Ŋ bɔ zaa ʊ meerbaarɔ nɔɔn duro m, kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ mim yɩ ŋ gʊr zi k'a dɩnda y.
Kʊ gʊaa bɩr nyasʊrɛ a hargʊɔɔ nɩ, an lɛ da bɩ, a jɛɛrzannɔ nɩ y, a zaa sɩrakarɛ bɔ a jɛ m, a bʊnyaabaa lɛ da basɩrakarɛzaa m.
K'ɩ ʊ k'ɩ zoro tɔ da zombaa daahan ci b'ʊ, a a ga m, kʊ zoro bɩ do dɔɔraa m busɔrdɩ ku, bɩ nyɩnta a ʊ, gʊaa deem taan… lʊ sɔ.
A a ga m sɔ, gʊɔɔ n a zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ kasɛtɩ ka, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a a nyɩnɔ tʊr mɩŋŋa, a saanɔɔ si mɩŋŋa a har ʊ, an wosogʊɔɔ gannɔ sʊrgɔ,
an a da cicirzannɔ han, an zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba.
Kʊ zonno pooro wɔɔ nɩ, ɩ bɩ ŋ tɔ da ci b'ʊ y, bala, kʊ gʊaayar sʊra bʊr an ta ŋ nɩ, bɩ ŋ y'a gʊ Krista zuure ma, ŋn'a ŋʊam k'a a ya a zim sa.
A ba kʊ ŋ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, n yɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yarlɛ, bala, ŋ n jɩm a lɛ ra lɛɛkarɛ ler kʊ ŋ y'a bɔ Krista m bɩ nɔ ʊ y.
A n ta ʊ sɔ bɩ, mim ŋ y'a ka nyɩnta vam m, ŋn'ɩ gʊɔɔ harlɛrɔ sam, an lɛ da bɩ, a lɛ n'a zum gʊɔɔ minno ʊ, ŋ bɩr dundore a zi y, hɔ k'a n'a ga hɩrɛ m bɩ, bɩ ŋn'a hɩm.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ taa kʊ zonno pooro wɔɔ n'a ya ŋnɩ cɛ ka, ŋnɩ nyɩnɔ yɩ, ŋnɩ dɩga a jɛɛr mim ma mɩŋŋa, kʊ ŋ bɩ zaa ka wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋn'a da ma, ŋn'a bʊnyaa hɩ wɔɔ ma y.
Bala, zonno pooro wɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a bɔ zaa tɩrga b'ʊ kara, ŋn'ɩ zum Sʊtaana ʊ.
Kʊ lʊ sɩrakarɛzaa ɩ zonno m a har gʊɔɔ barla, k'an nyasʊ ŋ nɩ, a b'a to kʊ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma n kɔ ŋ tɔ ma y, k'an a da ma, an a da zonno kʊ ŋ gʊɔɔ ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ han.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ m ŋn'a zi bam mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a ga daʊrɛ m gallɛm hɩɩya, an lɛ da bɩ, niŋŋoo kʊ ŋ nɩ kɔm kan Woso lemim padarɛ zibəə kɩ, hɔdɩnda gʊɔɔ m zibəə kɩ rɔ wɔɔ.
Bala, Wosoci b'a hɩ a ʊ:
Ɩ bɩ hɔ du der k'a n'ɩ yɩr zɔm bɩ lɛ ma y.
A a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Zibəəzaa a ga m,
an a zibəə nyɔɔdʊ yɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a ʊ, lɛɛzaa mim ba, kʊ gʊaa hɩɩya gɛɛ kaakʊ n a hɩ ŋ ʊ, a mim bɩ do ba denter y, ɩ bɩ mim bɩ do si sɩra y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mimbʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ, həən si ŋ ma gʊɔɔ woo… lɛɛ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ m nyi ba, ŋnɩ dundo a zi.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, Woso kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ, Woso malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ kɩ lɛɛ, k'ɩ zu hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m haay naa ʊ, ɩ bɩ jirə bɔ k'ɩ zɛ gʊaa m gumə ma y, gɛɛ k'ɩ gumə ka ʊ y.
Ɩ b'ɩ wɔ ka gɔsɩ mim la nyagɩra m, k'an zi ba wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla y, ɩ bɩ gasʊ gʊaa mimbʊnyaa ʊ y. Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi, k'a bʊnyaa b'a nɔ ɩ ma y.
Ɩ bɩ gɔɔta ɩ bɩr hi mire a minto bala y, dɩvɛn mi poore, ɩ nɔ k'a tɩr busum an tɩr ɩ dam kɔrɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Gʊɔɔ niŋŋoo mimbʊnyaarɔ ɩ yɩm garga ra, bɩ n ŋ dʊdɔ ka cɩna y, gɔsɩnnɔ hɔɔ bɩr dɔm zɔɔ y, ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ dɔ n tɩr a ʊ jɛ ʊ.
Zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ do m bɩ sɔ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ hɔɔ tɩr yɩm garga ra, nɔɔ zibəə bɩr yɩm garga ra lɛɛm nɩ y, bɩ ŋ zɛm bɩ bɔ garga ra.
Gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ lɔmbaa kɔrɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ a ga m, ŋn'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a soʊrezannɔ wɔɔ a ga daʊrɛ m. Kʊ gʊɔɔ bɩ Woso tɔ zar y, kʊ ŋ bɩ wɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ tɔ zar sɔ y.

Lɔnnɔ kʊ ŋ soʊrezannɔ wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ zannɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ b'a hɩ ŋ ʊ, a hɔdeem kan ŋ kɩ Krista danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ gore bɔ ʊ y. A ga a ʊ m, ŋnɩ ŋ zi ba mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa denter an lɛ da, kʊ sɩrakarɛzannɔ m, ŋ bɔɔ m ŋnɩ ŋ ŋʊam, ŋn'ɩ ŋ zi bam bɩ tɔ ma.
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ga m, ɩ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m, ɩ ŋ dʊndɔ m bɩ n naa.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ hɔ vanta dɩndam, a bɩr yɛm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista sɩra meerbaarɔ wɔɔ ma y, b'a bɩr yɛm hɔdɩndarɛ k'a ga kʊ ʊ ba kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ kɩ ma sɔ,

gʊaa bɩ do bɩ, mɩŋŋabusurezaa m. A n hɔsɩ dɔ y, bɩsɩkarɛ waasɩ yaaba n ta m, an n'a kam ma k'a nyaa ba meerbaanyɩrɔ tɔ ma. Naa nɩ zɛm lɛtaama bʊnyaa m kan kʊmarɛwar kɩ, kʊ tɔ zarlɛ kɩ, hɔɔn da kʊ ma bʊnyaa kɩ m.
A ɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔɔn m daŋŋada rɔ wɔɔ dam bɩsɩkarɛ jintoo ma, bala, ŋ n sɩra dɔ y, ŋn'a gɩngarɛ ŋ ʊ, sɩrakawosoʊ bɩ, hɔnyɩ yɩrɛ zaa m.
Denter m, sɩrakawosoʊ bɩ, hɔnyɩ gʊta m, k'a ɩ yɩrɛ ʊ, ɩ y'ɩ zergam hɔ k'ɩ m ta m bɩ rɛ.
Bala, bʊr kʊ wɔɔ ʊ durnya ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ n bʊr hɔsɩ nɩ y, wɔɔ y'ʊ bɔm sɔ ʊ wɔ m vam.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ m kan huu kɩ m, naa a ga m, an wɔɔ bɔ.
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a kam ma k'a ba hɔnyɩzannɔ wɔɔ, a do ŋ nawʊm makra nɔ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ gasʊm lɛtaamarɔ nɩbɩɩrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊnyaa baŋŋa nɔ ʊ. Lɛtaamarɔ wɔɔ duro nɩ gʊɔɔ dam zaarbarɛ kan nyaanlɛ kɩ ma.
Bala, mimbʊnyaarɔ do haay məsi m busoo ŋʊarɛ m. Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ a nyʊnnyɔɔ ŋn'a ba sɩrakarɛ ma laatʊ, ŋn'ɩ fɩr do y'a hʊnhɔ yɩm a mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, busoo ŋʊarɛ kʊ ŋ gasʊ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
B'ɩbɩɩ, Woso gʊaa n'ɩ mɩ, ɩ ba laatʊ naa woo… ma, ɩ ɩ tɔ ʊ kan tɩrgabaa zibəə kɩ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ kɩ, kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ, ŋʊarɛ kɩ, tʊntɔʊrɛ kɩ, nyɩntabaa kɩ.
Zoo mɩŋŋa kʊ sɩrakarɛ zoo m bɩ ba, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ. Ɩbɩɩ bir Woso ʊ bɩ tɔ ma, ɩbɩɩ m nyɩnta ɩ yɛ ma, ɩ ɩ sɩrakarɛ bɔ ɩ lɛ ma mɩŋŋa gʊɔɔ cir lɛɛ.
Kʊ m lɛ cɩnta ɩ m, Woso k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa kam hɔ haay ʊ bɩ taa, kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ taa, bɩ nyɩnta an a sɩrakarɛ kasɛtɩ ka mɩŋŋa Pɔns Pɩlatɩ taa.
Lɛ kʊ mɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ: Zu hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m haay b'ʊ, ɩ nyasʊ m kʊ dintim b'a nɔ ma y, kʊ minsi bɩ nyɩnta ɩ gʊr zi sɔ y, kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n tolle ba an a bɔ an bʊr.
A zɛm dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a cɩnta k'an b'ʊr ma b'ʊ,
Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛ da haay,
a y'a so heernyɔɔ ʊ,
a m cinno haay Cir,
a m zuubarɔ haay Zuuba,
a mɩŋŋa y'a deem taan… ɩ bɩr garɛ y,
lɛɛgure kʊ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma
an a zɔ ma nɔ an nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ,
gɔsɩ n a yɩ y,
bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a yɩ y.
A y'a so lɛbɔʊrɛ ʊ
kan paŋŋa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ kɩ!
Amina.

A hɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ m durnya naa do nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m, ɩ ʊ, ŋ b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ busu, bɩ ŋ bɩ yo hɔnyɩ ma y, bala hɔ cenlezaa m. Bɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ yo Woso ma, a m nɩ hɔ woo… kam wɔɔ ʊ gʊta, kʊ wɔɔ m bɩr ta ŋ nɩ, ʊ ʊ heer nyɔɔ ŋ nɩ.
A hɩ ŋ nɩ ɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ zi mɩŋŋa ba, ŋn'a ba zi mɩŋŋa barɛzannɔ gʊtɔɔ, ŋnɩ yɩ hɔkarɛzannɔ, ŋn'a da gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ han a hɔnyɩ bɩ m.
Kʊ ŋ y'a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ, hɔnyɩ mɩŋŋa k'a b'a zarlɛ, ŋn'a cɩntarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ m booti hinni tɔ ma, k'a bɩ mɩsɩrbaa paan… yɩ.
Timote ra, nyasʊ hɔ kʊ Woso a da ɩ wɔ ʊ bɩ m, ɩ b'ɩ lɛ zu meerbaarɔ yaarsɩrɔ kʊ bɩsɩkawosoma meerbaarɔ m nɔ wɔɔ ʊ y, kan bɩsɩkarɛ kʊ n n'a hɩm ma hɔdɔrɛ, bɩ ŋʊaar hɔdɔrɛ m b'ʊ y.
Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ sɩrakarɛ to ŋn'a nyʊnnyɔɔ, kʊ ŋ ʊ, a ta hɔdɔrɛ naa do m bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʊ Woso barka n nyɩnta kan ɩ kɩ!
II Timothy: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol ɩ ci naa do ba, Woso ɩ mɔɔ bɔ ʊ, kʊ mɔɔ n yɩ Krista Yeezuu zibəəzaa, kʊ m mɩsɩrbaa kʊ Woso a ler bɔ, wɔɔ n'a yɩm Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ bɩ pa da.
Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Timote, mɔɔ nyɩ n'ɩbɩɩ m, m n'ɩ ŋʊam, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ kʊ Zɩ Woso, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʊ.
Mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m barka, a zi mɔɔ n'a bam kan noom hu kɩ, amba mɔɔ yaabɔɔ zu ʊ bɩ m. Sinuu ʊ kan gunuu ʊ kɩ mɔɔ yaadarɛ nɔ ʊ haay, mɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma, m n'a barka darɛ.
Nyi k'ɩbɩɩ ka bɩ tɔ ɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam paan… kʊ m m ya, m ɩ yɩ, kʊ m heer n nyɔɔ gʊta.
Sɩra k'ɩbɩɩ ka denter bɩ, a tɔ ɩ mɔɔ nɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ yaabalʊ Loyis ɩ nyɩnta sɩrakarɛ bɩ do m, ɩ da Enis nyɩntam sɔ. Bɩ, mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ta sɩrakarɛ bɩ do m sɔ.
Naa minto m, mɔɔ nɩ m ya, m n'a hɩrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, m ʊ, ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso a ka ɩ ʊ k'ɩ zi ba m, mɔɔ nɩ m wɔ ka ɩbɩɩ ra ɩbɩɩ n a yɩ bɩ, zi ba m.
Bala, Ɛspri kʊ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ bɩr wɔɔ dam nyibəə ma y, bɩ, paŋŋa kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ, daamɩŋŋama kɩ an n'a kam wɔɔ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ɩ bɩ nyannɩ zɛ wɔɔ Zuuba kasɛtɩ karɛ ma y, ɩ bɩ nyannɩ zɛ mɔɔ tɔ ma kʊ mɔɔ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ a tɔ ma bɩ minto sɔ y. Bɩ, yo Woso paŋŋa ma, ɩ yɛ fɩr ma lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.

Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ yɔ, wɔɔ bir a ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ a gʊɔɔ. A n naa ba, wɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ tɔ ma y, a mɩŋŋa hɔɔnhɔ kan barka k'a n'a kam bɩ kɩ tɔ ma m. Barka bɩ do ka a ʊ wɔɔ ʊ, Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya n a sɩŋŋɩda ba y.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa Krista Yeezuu k'a bʊr bɩ, barka bɩ do a hɩnka garga ra. Bala, a zɛ paŋŋa zaar ba, an mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ hɩnka lemim nyɩnta bɩ m.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do padarɛ tɔ ma m, Woso n mɔɔ bɔ ʊ, kʊ m yɩ a padarɛzaa, kristazibəəzaa, a hɔdɩndarɛzaa.

Bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ fɩr naa yɩm, bɩ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ nyannɩ ba mɔɔ nɩ y, bala, gʊaa kʊ mɔɔ sɩra ka ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ zaa dɔ mɩŋŋa, bɩ mɔɔ heer kookoo sɔ, m a dɔ m ʊ, a ɩ paŋŋa m k'a dɔ hɔ k'a a da mɔɔ wɔ ʊ bɩ ma, k'an ta an a zɛrɛ hinni ku.
Yo sɩra meerbaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan ɩ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ jɩm sɩrakarɛ kan ŋʊarɛ kʊ wɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Dɔ hɔdɩndarɛ mɩŋŋa kʊ n y'a da ɩ wɔ ʊ bɩ ma, ɩ dɔ ma Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa k'a nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ m.
Ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʊ, kristagʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Azii kʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ haay a bɔ mɔɔ ʊ, Fizɛl kan Hɛrmozɛnnɩ kɩ yɩ ŋ barla sɔ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ Woso n'a cicirzɛrɛ kərgu Onezifɔɔr hargʊɔɔ ra, bala, a tɩr mɔɔ heer ba kookoo dɔmɩm niŋŋoo ʊ, nyannɩ n a nyasʊ mɔɔ dure bɩ tɔ ma y.
Bala, bʊr k'a ʊ Rɔm ʊ naa ʊ bɩ, a a ka mɔɔ bɩncɛ ma paan…, an aa mɔɔ yɩ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ Zuuba n a ka, k'an Woso ba mɩŋŋa yɩ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa zɛrɛ hinni ʊ. Ɩbɩɩ dɔ mɩŋŋa sɔ ɩ ʊ, nyɩnta kʊ mɔɔ ʊ Efɛɛzɩ ʊ bɩ, a a da mɔɔ han gʊta.
K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, m nyɩ, ɩ paŋŋa da ra, barka kʊ wɔɔ n ta m Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ ma gʊɔɔ cir lɛɛ bɩ, a dɩnda gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ nyasʊm nɩ mɩŋŋa rɔ wɔɔ m, kʊ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a dɩnda gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ m sɔ.
Yɛ fɩryɩrɛ ma am mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m, hɔ kʊ Krista Yeezuu yarbər mɩŋŋa a ga m, an a ba bɩ m naa.
Kʊ yarbər ta yar ma, k'a lɛ taa kʊ yarbənno cir bɩ nɔ n yɩ a ra, a bɩr a kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta har ʊ rɔ wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ma y.
A dɔ sɔ ɩ ʊ, kʊ n brasire ganwʊrɛ cɩnta, kʊ gʊaa n zu bra bɩ sire zaa ʊ, n bɩ ganwʊrɛ bɩ kaŋ ʊ y.
Danwur k'a kɔ dam lɛ ra bɩ n nɩ lɛɛ kam an aa dam bɩ wʊrɛ hɔ yɩ.
Ɩ hɔɔn da hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a hɩm naa ma k'ɩ jɩ ma, bala, Zuuba hɔɔn karɛ ɩ ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ da ma, ɩ jɩ ma haay.
Yeezuu Krista tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ,
Davɩd do gʊaa m,
a a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ,
amba lemim nyɩnta
kʊ mɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ
n'a hɩm bɩ m.
Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ fɩr yɩm, n nɩ mɔɔ du, ɩ ʊ, zibʊnyaabarɛzaa m mɔɔ m. Bɩ, kʊ lemim nyɩnta bɩ nɩ, n a du y.
Bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ nɩ yɛm fɩr do haay ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ minto, kʊ brɔɔ n a da ma sɔ, ŋnɩ bʊmbɔrɛ kʊ Krista Yeezuu n'a kam bɩ yɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ gasʊ lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ b'ʊ.
Meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ba naa, sɩra m an a ga sire m:
Kʊ wɔɔ ga kan Yeezuu Krista kɩ,
wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bam kan kɩ sɔ.
Kʊ wɔɔ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ kan kɩ,
wɔɔ cirbəə bɩm kan kɩ sɔ,
kʊ wɔɔ bɩsɩ ka ma,
a bɩsɩ kam wɔɔ ma sɔ.
Kʊ wɔɔ n jɩm ʊ lɛ ra kan kɩ,
a mɩŋŋa ɩ jɩnɩm a lɛ ra tee…,
bala, a b'a dam ma, an bɩsɩ ka a mɩŋŋa ma y.

Meerbaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ba nɔɔn m tɔ da gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ haay, ɩ hɩ ŋ nɩ paan… Woso lɛɛ, ɩ ʊ, ŋn'a si nyaa kʊ n n'a bam meerbaarɔ tɔ ma lɛɛ. Bala, ŋ hɔsɩ ba ʊ y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr karɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ an nɩ ŋ zaar bam.
Ɩ tɔ ʊ k'ɩ yɩ gʊaa k'a a ga m kʊ Woso nɔ n yɩ ra, k'ɩ yɩ zibəəzaa k'a zibəə nyannɩ ba ʊ y, an nɩ sɩra lemim bɩ dɩndam mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa.
Ɩ bɩ yɛ sʊʊra yaarsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr a dam gʊaa han sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam nɔ wɔɔ gɔɔtam tee… ŋnɩ bɩr a bam laatʊ Woso ma.
Ŋ meerbaarɔ wɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan nyim k'a nɩ gʊaa mɛ bɩm haay kɩ. Himene kan Filɛtɩ kɩ yɩ ŋ barla.
Ŋ hɔ, ŋnɩ sɩra bɩ to, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ cem kara, ŋn'a kam gʊɔɔ gʊta n'a bɔm sɩrakarɛ ʊ.
Bɩ, kan naa kɩ haay Woso sɩra bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ, kan cɛjɩr kɩ, an gɔɔta an n'a bɩncɛ ʊ, n nɩ gʊrsɩra ba cɛjɩr bɩ ma, n ʊ:
Zuuba a gʊɔɔ dɔ.
N n'a ya, n ʊ:
Gʊaa k'a ʊ Zuuba gʊaa n'a mɩ bɩ, k'an a gʊ mimbʊnyaa ma.

Cɛ gʊta nɔ ʊ, mɔr y'a hʊnhɔ ta ʊ, n n'a ba sarma m kan wanzurfu kɩ m, n nɩ nɔɔrɔ ba gɔ m kan taa kɩ m. Lɛɛkarɛ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ dɔmɩm gʊta hinni ʊ n nɩ bɔrɛ ŋ nɩ, n nɩ zi barɛ ŋ nɩ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, dɔmɩm biyəə, n yɩ zi yaarsɩrɔ barɛ ŋ nɩ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ gʊaa a gʊ zi bʊnyaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ gaa da rɔ wɔɔ ma, an a hu bɔ, a bɔm mɔr gorezaa rɛ, mɔr k'an zore, an mɩŋŋa Zuuba ma, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ haay tɔ ma.
Ɩ si nyukumbombaa lɛtaamarɔ lɛɛ, ɩ ɩ tɔ ʊ kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, ɩ bɩr ɩ kam tɩrgabaa zibəə ma, sɩrakarɛ ma, kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ, laafɩɩ kɩ ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa dam Zuuba m kan heer hu kɩ rɔ wɔɔ zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, ɩ bɩ yɛ, hɔɔnwar kan badɔ kɩ bɩsɩkarɛrɔ wɔɔ ma y, ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʊ, ŋ nyambʊrlɛ bɩ, nyaa m.
A n bɔkarɛ, Zuuba zibəənyɩ n a ga m, an nyaa ba y, a ga a ʊ m, an bɩr mɩŋŋa kan gʊaa woo… kɩ, an a da hɔdɩnda gʊɔɔ m ma, an bɩr bʊraama m.
A a ga m, k'an hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩsɩ kam ma rɔ wɔɔ m, heer bʊgʊ-bʊgʊda m, bala, a a da ma, brɔɔ n a bɔ a taa m, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ.
Maam bɩ, ŋ hɔɔn zerm, ŋn'a yɔ Sʊtaana k'a ŋ gʊr a baŋŋarɔ ʊ, an ŋ ba a lɔnnɔ, kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔnhɔ ba bɩ m.
A dɔ mɩŋŋa ɩ ʊ, dɔmɩnnɔ jɛzannɔ ʊ, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.

Bala, gʊɔɔ y'a kam a mɩŋŋɔɔ daahan ma bala, busoo ŋʊarɛ n'a so ŋ ʊ, nyɩnta ŋ nawʊm lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋa ʊ zannɔ, mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ, Woso sʊnsɔwʊrɛzannɔ, bɩsɩ ka a zɩrɔ ma zannɔ, bajindɔrɛzannɔ, Woso hɔ gore bɔʊrɛzannɔ.
Ŋ bɩ nyɩntam ŋʊarɛ m y, ŋ nyɩntam bacicirzɛrɛzannɔ, gʊɔɔtɔzarlɛzannɔ, badaamɩŋŋazannɔ, ŋ nyɩntam bʊnyaa gʊta, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ jɩnnɔ,
bɩmbɩrkʊmazannɔ, badundoamɩŋŋazizannɔ, mɩŋŋabusure n'a so ŋ ʊ maam-maam, ŋ y'a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ ŋʊarɛ an lɛ da Woso ŋʊarɛ m.
Ŋ y'a hɔ barɛ ɩ ʊ, wosozuurezannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, bɩ ŋ zibəəro y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Woso paŋŋa bɩ n ŋ mɩsɩrbaa lʊr y. Ɩ gʊ gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma.
Ŋ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ gasʊm gʊɔɔ hadrɔ ʊ sɩɩ…, ŋnɩ lannɔ hɔɔnwarzannɔ kum hɔɔnkarɛ m, lannɔ wɔɔ duro mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊta, ŋn'ɩ zum a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ haay ʊ.
Ŋ yɩ hɔ dɩndam tee…, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dam ma ŋn'ɩ sɩra dɔrɛ y.
Amba Zanɛs kan Zambrɛs kɩ a da Moyiisi lɛ ʊ ŋ bɩr yɛm bɩ, gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro sɔ, a da ŋ nawʊm sɩra lɛ ʊ ŋ bɩr yɛrɛ y. Hɔɔn nyaanlɛzannɔ m, ŋ n sɩra ka Woso ʊ denter y.
Bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ ta lɛɛ y, bala, gʊaa woo… sʊrlɛ ŋ hɔɔnwar zibəə bɩ ra, amba n nyɩnta n nɩ sʊr Zanɛs kan Zambrɛs kɩ hɔ ra bɩ m.
Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, ɩbɩɩ zu mɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ ʊ mɩŋŋa, ɩ mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ dɔ, kan mɔɔ gɩngarɔ kɩ, m sɩrakarɛ kɩ, m bʊr m mɩŋŋa ma kɩ, m ŋʊarɛ kɩ, m tʊntɔʊrɛ kɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ fɩr kʊ gʊɔɔ a ka mɔɔ ma, kan cicir kʊ mɔɔ yɩ Antɩyɔs kʊ ʊ, kan Ikoniyɔm kʊ ʊ kɩ, Listɩr kʊ ʊ kɩ bɩ dɔ. Mɔɔ fɩr do haay yɩ, bɩ Zuuba mɔɔ yɔ ŋ haay nɔ ʊ.
Pakra m hɔɔ, kʊ gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a zu Woso ʊ mɩŋŋa, Krista Yeezuu nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n fɩr yɩ gʊɔɔ wɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ, bra bɩmba gʊɔɔ m zannɔ wɔɔ nɩ, ŋ gɔɔtarɛ ŋnɩ bɩr tam lɛɛ zi bʊnyaa barɛ nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr bra bɩmbam gʊɔɔ m ŋnɩ bɩr tarɛ, ŋnɩ bɩr bra bɩmbarɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ m sɔ.
K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, jɩm hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ dɩnda ɩ sɩra ka ʊ paan… bɩ nɔ ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ. Bala, ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a dɩnda ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ sɩra bɩ.
A n a sa ɩbɩɩ nyɩbaa ma, ɩbɩɩ Wosoci bɩ dɔ, a y'a dam ma an hɔɔn ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ m sɩra ka Krista Yeezuu ʊ, ɩ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Hɔ kʊ n y'a da Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʊ haay bɩ, Woso Ɛspri y'a ka n n'a da ʊ, bɩ, ta an a wʊ ʊ gʊɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ minto, k'a nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ da jɩm ʊ, k'a gʊaa bɔ zaa ʊ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga barɛ dɩnda gʊaa m.
Kʊ Woso gʊaa mɩsɩrbaa n bankarɛ yɩ mɩŋŋa, k'a n a da ma an zi mɩŋŋa do haay ba.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ han paan… Woso mɩm ʊ, kan Krista Yeezuu kɩ mɩm ʊ, bɩ zɛm bɩ gʊɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʊdɔ ka, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, hinni k'a nɩ zɛŋ ʊ k'a bɩ cirbəə bɩ bɩ tɔ ma sɔ,

k'ɩ Woso lemim bɩ pa da, ɩ bɩr som la tee…. K'a so ra dɔmɩm naanaa, gɛɛ k'a kʊsɩ, k'ɩ gɔɔta ɩ bɩr som la, həən si gʊɔɔ ma, ɩ bɔ ŋ lɛɛ kʊ ŋ n'a mimbʊnyaa to, ŋ heer yo kʊ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa ba, naa haay ba bʊraama gʊta nɔ ʊ, ɩ bɩr hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.

Bala, dɔmɩm zɛm, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'a tʊr ka sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ ma y, bɩ zu ŋ nawʊrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛtaamarɔ ʊ, ŋn'a ka a hɔɔnhɔ karɩnsaambɔɔ ma ŋn'a bɩr a ma yɔɔgʊ, brɔɔ n bɩr hɔ k'an nyɩnta ŋ ma dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ.
Ŋ bɩ yɛrɛ ŋn'a tʊr ka sɩra ma dɔ y, ŋʊaar minno ŋn'a tʊr karɛ ŋ ma.
B'ɩbɩɩ, bʊr ɩ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, yɛ fɩr ma, lemim nyɩnta padarɛzaa zi ba, zibəə kʊ Woso a ka ɩ ʊ bɩ ba mɩŋŋa.
Bala, kʊ mɔɔ nɩ, wakatɩ a ku kʊ m yɛ zɛ ma. Mɔɔ zɛ bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan mannɩ kɩ, mɔɔ hʊrlɛ wakatɩ a ku.
Mɔɔ zoo mɩŋŋa ba, mɔɔ brasire a tɛkka ku, mɔɔ nyasʊ sɩrakarɛ m.

Kɛɛrɛ naa, Woso dama ganwʊrɛ cɩnta mɔɔ m, ganwʊrɛ bɩ do bɩ, tɩrgabaa m, an b'a kam mɔɔ ʊ, dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ b'ʊ. A mɩŋŋa m dʊdɔkarɛzaa tɩrga. Mɔɔ bɛɛ an n'a karɛ m ʊ m deem nɩ y, a y'a kam gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ n'a ŋʊam k'an bʊr lɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Ɩ tɔ ʊ, k'ɩ bʊr mɔɔ zi zɔɔ.
Bala, Demas a bɔ mɔɔ ʊ, k'a nɩ her durnya naa ŋʊam bɩ tɔ ma. A a hʊr an ta Tesaloniki ʊ, Gresans ta Galasii ʊ, Tiitɩ ta Dalmasi ʊ.
Likki y'a deem ɩ gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ. K'ɩ bʊr ɩ n nɩ zɛm k'ɩ Markɩ gaa ɩ bʊr m, bala, a y'a dam mɔɔ han gʊta m zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ Tisikkɩ nyɔɔ Efɛɛzɩ ʊ.
K'ɩ zɛm, kɩ bɔ Trowas kʊ ʊ Karpus zi, ɩ nyɛɛm huu kʊ mɔɔ to b'ʊ bɩ sa ɩ bʊr m, ciro wɔɔ gʊr ɩ bʊr ŋ nɩ sɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, n nɩ ŋ ba hɔbɩsɩ ci m nɔ wɔɔ.
Alɛsandɩr, saar bɩ, a zi bʊnyaa ba mɔɔ m gʊta, Zuuba y'a zibəə zɩm kaŋ ʊ.
Dundo ɩ mɩŋŋa zi kan kɩ sɔ, bala, a bɩsɩ ka wɔɔ meerbaarɔ ma gʊta.
Mɔɔ lɛɛkarɛ dʊdɔ bɩ karɛ ma bɩ, gɔsɩ n nyɩnta ʊ k'a a da mɔɔ han y, a bɔ ŋ y'a mɔɔ ʊ haay. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm Woso han, k'a b'a taar ka ŋ la y.
Bɩ, Zuuba a da mɔɔ han an paŋŋa ka mɔɔ ʊ, yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ mɔɔ n zi kʊ n y'a ka mɔɔ ʊ lemim nyɩnta padarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ ba haay, do vantɔɔ gʊɔɔ haay n a ma. Bɩ, Zuuba mɔɔ yɔ taatii bɩ lɛ ʊ!
Zuuba gɔɔtarɛ an mɔɔ yɔ zi bʊnyaa haay wɔ ʊ, an dɔ mɔɔ ma, mɔɔ n gasʊ a cirbəə kʊ ʊ arzana ʊ. A tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay! Amina.
Yaa da Priska kan Akilas kɩ m, yaa da Onezifɔɔr har gʊɔɔ m sɔ.
Erastɩ gɔɔta Korɛntɩ kʊ ʊ. Trofim yaaba zɛ, mɔɔ n a to Milɛ kʊ ʊ.
Ɩ tɔ ʊ ɩ bʊr, kʊ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm n bɔkarɛ an a ku. Ebulus kan Pudɛns kɩ, Linus kɩ, Klodɩya kan danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ naa ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ k'ɩ yaa darɛ ɩ m.
Bɩ, kʊ Zuuba n bɩr kan ɩ kɩ. Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Titus: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, Woso zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, Yeezuu Krista zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m, kʊ m a ka kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n sɩra ka, ŋnɩ sɩra dɔ, an a ga mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ m,
kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ ta a heer lɛ. Woso ɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do ler bɔ wɔɔ m, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʊ y. Bɩ, Woso bɩr ŋʊaar barɛ y.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a cɩnta bɩ k'a b'a ku bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do hɩnka, lemim k'a ka kʊ gʊɔɔ n a pa da bɩ m. Woso mɩŋŋa, k'an wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, a lɛ ka mɔɔ ʊ, an lemim bɩ do da mɔɔ wɔ ʊ, kʊ m a pa da.
Tiitɩ, ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, mɔɔ nyɩ paan… n'ɩbɩɩ m, sɩrakarɛ deem kʊ wɔɔ m ta m bɩ nɔ ʊ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa Krista Yeezuu kɩ n barka, kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka ɩ ʊ.
Ɩbɩɩ to mɔɔ ʊ Krɛtɩ kʊ ʊ b'ʊ, k'ɩ gɔɔta ɩ hɔ k'a n bankarɛ yɩ cɩna bɩ banka, k'ɩ gʊɔɔ nyʊkɔ ʊ, ɩ ŋ ba kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ Krɛtɩ kʊnɔ rɔ wɔɔ biyəə nɔ ʊ, amba hɔ kʊ mɔɔ hɩ ɩbɩɩ m bɩ m.
K'ɩ ʊ k'ɩ lɛɛzaa bɔ ʊ, a a ga m, an yɩ gʊaa kʊ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a lʊ m bɩr deem, a nyɩnɔ m sɩrakarɛzannɔ, ŋ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa bʊnyaa barɛ y, balɛsire zannɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ sɔ y.

Bala, kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzaa bɩ, wosogʊɔɔ nyasʊnzaa m, bɩ minto bɩ, a a ga m, k'an bɩr gʊaa kʊ n bɩ mim yɩrɛ n a hɩ ma y, a n a ga m, an yɩ mɩŋŋabusurezaa, nɔmaazaa, gɛɛ bɛɛmirezaa waasɩ y, a n a ga m, an yɩ wɔkaarɛzaa nyaa bɩncɛ ʊ, gɛɛ zambʊ hɔ kamazaa y.
A a ga m, an bɩr saanɔɔ sim a har ʊ mɩŋŋa, an bɩr zi mɩŋŋabarɛ ŋʊarɛ, an bɩr hɔɔndamimmazaa, an bɩr gʊaa tɩrga, gʊaa k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, bʊraamazaa.
A a ga m, k'an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ Woso lemim paan… kʊ ŋ y'a dɩndam bɩ nɔ ʊ. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, a y'a dam ma, an gʊɔɔ dʊndɔ sɩra hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ, an bɩsɩkənno da jɩm ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ nyʊkɔ ʊ amba wɔɔ hɩ bɩ m, bala, gʊɔɔ ta ʊ gʊta, an lɛ da bɩ, zɩɩfʊrɔ kʊ ŋ gasʊ baŋŋʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ barla, ŋ bɩr yɛm k'a zu sɩra ʊ y. Ŋ nɩ bra bɩmbam gʊɔɔ m meerbaa yaarsɩrɔ m.
A ka kʊ ŋ n'a meerbaarɔ wɔɔ barɛ to, bala, ŋ yɩ hadrɔ gɔsɩnnɔ gʊɔɔ zaar bam, ŋn'ɩ hɔ k'a n a ga m dɩndam gʊɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ, zambʊ hɔ yɩrɛ m.
Krɛtɩ zannɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ gʊaa deem, kʊ ŋ nɩ dɩgam ma a lɛsinnɩsorazaa nyɩnta an a hɩ, a ʊ:
«Krɛtɩ zannɔ wɔɔ,
ŋʊaarzannɔ m tee…,
poohɔɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ,
yakʊzannɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ,
ŋ n hɔ vanta dɔ
kʊ hɔbɩrɛ bɛɛ y.»
Hɔ kʊ gʊaa b'a hɩ naa, sɩra m, naa minto bɩ, həən si ŋ ma paan…, kʊ ŋ sɩrakarɛ n yɩ mɩŋŋa.
Kʊ ŋ nɩ zɩɩfʊrɔ hɔdɩndarɛ k'ɩ ʊ noondarɛ m bɩ to, ŋ bɩ zu lɛrɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra to rɔ wɔɔ a cɩnta rɔ wɔɔ ʊ y.

Kʊ gʊaa heer hu ta ʊ, hɔ haay hu ta ʊ sɔ kan kɩ. Bɩ kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ dintinzannɔ m, ŋ bɩr sɩra kam nɔ wɔɔ nɩ, dintim m hɔ haay m kan ŋ kɩ. Bala, ŋ hɔɔndarɛrɔ bʊnyaa, kʊ ŋ y'a bʊnyaa bam sɔ, nyannɩ ba ŋ nɩ y.
Ŋ y'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, a Woso dɔ, bɩ ŋ zibəə bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ y'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ ʊ, ŋ n Woso dɔ y. Hɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ Woso mɩm ʊ, bayɛrɛzannɔ m, ŋ b'a dam zi mɩŋŋa sɩ barɛ ma y.
K'ɩbɩɩ nɩ, hɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ga kʊ ʊ kan hɔdɩndarɛ k'an sɩra bɩ kɩ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m.
A hɩ gʊɔɔ gusinno wɔɔ m ɩ ʊ, ŋn'a da a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr daʊrɛ m, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɔɔn dam mim ma mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ bɩr sɩrakarɛ m paan…, ŋnɩ bɩr ŋʊarɛ denter m, ŋnɩ bɩr a tʊntɔŋ ʊ tee….
A hɩ lannɔ gusinno wɔɔ m sɔ ɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, ŋ bɩ yɩ gʊɔɔ tɔzarlɛzannɔ y, ŋ bɩ yɩ bɛɛmirewaasɩzannɔ y, ŋnɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m.
Ŋ n'a ba ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ lannɔ pooro wɔɔ n hɔɔntaʊrɛ dɩnda a zino kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ ŋʊarɛ minto,
kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr hɔɔndamimmazannɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩsɩrbaa zore barɛ, ŋnɩ bɩr nyasʊrɛ a jɛɛr m mɩŋŋa, ŋnɩ bɩr nyɩntabaa m, ŋnɩ bɩr yɛrɛ a zino lɛ ma, kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ Woso lemim bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊ y.
Nyukumbonno wɔɔ dʊndɔ maam sɔ ɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɔɔn dam mim ma mɩŋŋa hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
A ka k'ɩ mɩŋŋa n yɩ makra mɩŋŋa, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ nɔ ʊ, hɔ dɩnda gʊɔɔ m sɩra m kan ɩ heer kɩ haay, a ka k'ɩ hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ, kʊ n n'ɩ gore da ʊ.
A ka k'ɩ meerbaa n bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʊ gʊaa bɩ hɔsɩ yɩ k'a hɩ ɩ ma y, kʊ wɔɔ jɩnnɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma, ŋnɩ hɔ bʊnyaa hɩ wɔɔ ma y, kʊ ŋ nɩ nyannɩ bɩ.
Lɔnnɔ wɔɔ dʊndɔ ɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ yɛ a soʊrezannɔ wɔɔ ma hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, ŋ n'a ka ma k'a ŋ heer nyɔɔ, ŋ bɩ bɩsɩ ka ŋ ma y.
Ŋ bɩ hɔsɩ kʊna y, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam tee…, kʊ ŋ n'a dɔ ŋ ʊ, a ɩ sɩra bam. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Woso kʊ wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ, hɔ kʊ n n'a dɩndam bɩ daʊrɛ yɩm hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso a barka hɩnka gʊaa haay bʊmbɔrɛ tɔ ma.

Woso barka bɩ n'a ŋʊam bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ bɔ mɩsɩrbaa bʊnyaa haay ʊ, kan durnya naa do lɛtaamarɔ haay kɩ ʊ. K'ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ her-her mɩsɩrbaa naa ba mɩŋŋanyasʊrɛ nɔ ʊ, kan tɩrgabaa kɩ, Woso hɔɔnhɔ mɩsɩrbaa kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Ʊ bɩr ʊ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ ncɩnaaʊ, ʊ bɩr dɔm dɔmɩm nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ta ʊ heer lɛ, wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa Yeezuu Krista lɛbɔʊrɛ n n'a hɩnkaŋ ʊ bɩ ma, a m wɔɔ Woso a m gʊta.
A a mɩŋŋa ka zɛ ma wɔɔ tɔ ma, k'a a da ma, a wɔɔ bʊmbɔ mimbʊnyaa haay nɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ hu bɔ, awɔɔ ba a mɩŋŋa dogʊɔɔ, k'ʊ bɩr zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ ŋʊam tee….
Naa haay dɩnda, ɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ heer yo, ɩ ŋ bɔzaa ʊ lɛ kʊ Woso a ka ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ m. Ɩ b'a to kʊ gɔsɩ n'ɩ gore bɔ ʊ y.
A hɩ sɩrakarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m haay, ɩ ʊ, ŋnɩ yɛ kʊ lɛɛzannɔ haay ma, ŋnɩ ŋ lɛ si, ŋnɩ bɩr zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ do haay barɛ ŋʊarɛ.
Ŋ bɩ gɔsɩ sʊnsɔ wʊ y, ŋ bɩ nyaa ba y, ŋnɩ bɩr mɩŋŋabaa bam, ŋnɩ bɩr nyɩnta kan gʊɔɔ haay kɩ.

Bala, wɔɔ nyɩnta biisi sɔ, ʊ n nɩ hɔɔnwar zi bam, ʊ m bayɛrɛzannɔ, ʊ nyaam, mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ do haay kan a hɔɔnhɔrɔ kɩ n'a so wɔɔ ʊ, ʊ n nɩ bʊnyaabaa bam, ʊ n n'ʊ kam ma k'ʊ yɩ am gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ m, ʊ a ka gʊɔɔ m sɔ ʊ m, ʊ sɔ kʊ m.
Bɩ, Woso wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa bɩ, k'a b'a mɩŋŋabaa kan a ŋʊarɛ k'an ta m gʊɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ hɩnka bɩ,

a wɔɔ bʊmbɔ vam, a n wɔɔ bʊmbɔ zibəə tɩrga kʊ wɔɔ ba barɛ m tɔ ma y, wɔɔ bʊmbɔ a ʊ, k'awɔɔ cicir zɛ bɩ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ bʊmbɔ a ʊ, an wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sʊrgɔ, *Sɛnt-Ɛspri n yɩrɛ daa ka wɔɔ ʊ, an mɩsɩrbaa daa ka wɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso a ka Sɛnt-Ɛspri n zer wɔɔ ra gʊta wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
A ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, k'awɔɔ ba tɩrga a mɩm ʊ, a barka tɔ ma, kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ hɔjirlezannɔ, wɔɔ taaheerlɛ bɩ m bɩ sɔ.

Meerbaa kʊ mɔɔ ba naa, sɩra m, mɔɔ lɛ taa k'ɩbɩɩ m bɩr a hɩm paan…, ɩ bɩr som la, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n bɩr a tʊntɔŋ ʊ ŋnɩ bɩr lɛɛ, kan zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ kɩ tee…. Zi mɩŋŋa barɛ bɩ, hɔ mɩŋŋa m, a y'a dam gʊɔɔ han sɔ.
Bɩ, ɩ bɩ yɛ bɩsɩkarɛ yaarsɩrɔ ma y, yaabɔɔ tɔrɔ gaandarɛrɔ sʊʊrarɔ ma y, Moyiisi lɛrɔ nyaabarɛ kan ŋ bakʊmarɛ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, ŋ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ, bɩ ŋ bɩr a dam gʊaa han sɔ y.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ gʊɔɔ gʊngʊ kʊ ma zi bam, k'ɩ həən si ma, k'a gɔɔta an nɩ tam lɛɛ, k'ɩ ɩ ya ɩ həən si ma, k'a a gu an nɩ tam lɛɛ k'ɩ bɔ ɩ zi.
Ɩbɩɩ dɔ ɩ ʊ, gʊɔɔ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ zaa tɩrga bɩ to, ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ ŋ nyaanlɛ hɩnkarɛ.
Mɔɔ Artemas gɛɛ Tisikkɩ nyɔɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. K'a bɩ lee ku, k'ɩ tɔ ʊ ɩ bʊr Nikopolis ʊ mɔɔ zi. Bala, kʊ bɩ do mɔɔ hɔɔn bɔ ʊ, kʊ m nyɩnta ʊ nyɛɛm dɔmɩm ʊ.
Ɩ tɔ ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ da lɛrɔ karɩnsaamba Zenas han, kan Apolɔs kɩ, kʊ hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra ŋ ma, ŋ zaakʊrɛ bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ y.
Wɔɔ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ a ga m sɔ, ŋnɩ bɩr a kam ma k'a bɩr lɛɛ kan zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ barɛ dɩndarɛ kɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a da ma, ŋn'a da gʊɔɔ kʊ hɔ jɩra ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ han. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ŋ bɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ barɛ y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ haay rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩ m. Yaa da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ wɔɔ ŋʊam sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m. Bɩ, Kʊ Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
Philemon: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol, mɔɔ kʊ m nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma, mɔɔ kan wɔɔ danyɩ Timote kɩ m nɩ ci bɩ bam. A ba wɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma, Filemɔn, wɔɔ gʊaasɩba n'ɩbɩɩ m, wɔɔ zibəəkɔɔn n'ɩbɩɩ m sɔ.
A ba wɔɔ nawʊm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma k'a n'a som kʊ ma ɩbɩɩ har ʊ bɩ ma sɔ, kan wɔɔ danlʊ Apɩya kɩ ma, kan lemim nyɩnta zoobarɛkɔɔn Arsip kɩ ma sɔ.
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ n barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ ka a ʊ.
Filemɔn, kʊ mɔɔ ɩ yaa dam Woso m, bɩ mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ tɔ da m nɔ ʊ, m n'a barka dam tee… ɩbɩɩ tɔ ma.
Bala, mɔɔ ɩ ŋʊarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay tɔ ma bɩ mim mam, kan sɩrakarɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m Zuuba Yeezuu nɔ ʊ bɩ mim kɩ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm Woso han, k'ɩbɩɩ sɩrakarɛ k'awɔɔ zɛ kʊ ra kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ n zi ba, an hɔ mɩŋŋa haay kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ dam ma ʊ a ba Krista zibəə tɔ ma bɩ hɩnka.
M danyɩ, zi k'ɩbɩɩ ba ɩ ŋʊarɛ bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, a mɔɔ heer nyɔɔ gʊta, an mɔɔ heer wʊta, bala, ɩbɩɩ wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ heer ba kookoo.
Naa minto nɩ, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ to m nɩ lɛ m Krista tɔ ma, kʊ m lɛ ka ɩ ʊ, k'ɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa ɩbɩɩ gʊr zi bɩ ba bɩ,
kʊ mɔɔ hɔ bɩ do yɛ ɩbɩɩ han ŋʊarɛ tɔ ma, a jɩra mɔɔ m lɛ kʊ mɔɔ n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ m. Ɩɩn… mɔɔ mɩŋŋa m Pol, gʊaa gusire m mɔɔ m, m nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ kɛɛrɛ, Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
M wɔ mɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ m, Onezim tɔ ma, a a ba mɔɔ nyɩnnɩ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ naa ʊ.
Biisi bɩ a zibəə ba ɩbɩɩ ma y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a zibəə ta ɩbɩɩ ma, a zibəə n ta mɔɔ ma sɔ.
A da mɔɔ nawʊrɛ ɩbɩɩ m zaa ra, a mɩŋŋa a ba hɔdeem kan mɔɔ kɩ kɛɛrɛ.
Kʊ mɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ m, mɔɔ ŋʊa k'an gɔɔta kan mɔɔ kɩ naa ʊ, k'an bɩr mɔɔ ziro bam ɩbɩɩ bɩncɛ ʊ, lɔnnɔcɛ kʊ mɔɔ n ta ʊ lemim nyɩnta bɩ tɔ ma naa nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m hɔsɩ ba k'ɩbɩɩ n zaa ka y. Mɔɔ lɛ baa k'ɩbɩɩ n zi mɩŋŋa ba mɔɔ m paŋŋa nɩ y, mɔɔ lɛ n taa k'ɩbɩɩ n a ba ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ma.
A a da ma Onezim bɩ, a gʊ a ʊ ɩbɩɩ ma dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ, k'an b'a bɔ an bɩ gɔɔta kan ɩ kɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ.

Dɩɩtaa naa, lɔ bɛɛ m bala dɔ y, a lɛ da lɔ m gʊta kɛɛrɛ, a ba a ʊ wɔɔ danyɩ wɔɔ n'a ŋʊam karɩ paan…. Mɔɔ y'a ŋʊam gʊta paan…, bɩ ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga m ɩ ŋʊa an lɛ da, bala, gʊaa m, bɩ wɔɔ danyɩ m sɔ Krista nɔ ʊ.
K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ dɩgam mɔɔ ma ɩ danyɩ, k'a maam k'ɩ si, amba ɩbɩɩ nɩ mɔɔ sim bɩ m.
Bɩ, k'a kʊrɔ ma kan ɩ kɩ, gɛɛ ɩbɩɩ zɩm an ta m, k'ɩ ba mɔɔ mɩŋŋa mim.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pol nɩ gʊrsɩra naa do bam: «K'a zɩm bɩ wuti karɔ, mɔɔ n n'a karɛ,» bɩ pakra bɛɛ m kʊ m a hɩ ɩ m sɔ m ʊ, mɔɔ zɩm ta ɩbɩɩ ra y, ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ m.
Ɩɩn… m danyɩ, m wɔ mɔɔ n'a zɩnzɛrɛ ɩ m, naa ba m m denter Zuuba tɔ ma. Mɔɔ heer ba kookoo Krista ŋʊarɛ bɩ tɔ ma.
Ci bɩ kʊ mɔɔ n'a barɛ ɩbɩɩ ma naa, a dɔ mɔɔ ʊ paan… m ʊ, ɩbɩɩ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a yɛm bɩ bam, bɩ mɔɔ dɔ sɔ m ʊ, ɩbɩɩ y'a barɛ an cem hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a yɛm bɩ han.
Kʊ m a yɛ ɩ han lɛɛm k'ɩ cɛ banka ɩ cɩnta m m, bala, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam mɩŋŋa awɔɔ yaadarɛrɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma, m ʊ, n wɔ daam mɔɔ ma zɔɔ mɔɔ n bʊr awɔɔ zi b'ʊ.
Epafras ɩ yaa darɛ a m, a du n y'a ʊ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ naa ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ Krista Yeezuu tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ, Markɩ kan Aristarkɩ kɩ, Demas kɩ, Likki kɩ ɩ yaa darɛ a m sɔ.
Bɩ kʊ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista barka n bɩr kan a kɩ.
Hebrews: Biisi bɩ, Woso meer ba kan wɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ lɛ m, gallɛm hɔka, zaa y'a hʊnhɔ m.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, jɛ dɔmɩm kʊ wɔɔ n ta ʊ naa ma bɩ, Woso meer ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a nyɩ bɩ lɛ m. A Nyɩ bɩ tɔ ma y'a ka an durnya bɩ da, a Nyɩ bɩ bɔ a ʊ sɔ k'an a so hɔ haay ʊ.

Nyɩ bɩ nɩ Woso mɩŋŋa lɛbɔʊrɛ hɩnkam, kʊ Woso lʊnlɔ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa maam, an n'a kam durnya bɩ nɩ gɔɔtarɛ a bɩncɛ ʊ, a lɛ meerbaa paŋŋa m. K'a gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊ ŋ ma zi ba an a nya bɩ, a a hʊr an aa nyɩnta Woso k'a nɩ cirbəə m bɩ bɩsɩ ra arzana ʊ.
Woso Nyɩ bɩ tɔ bɩ lɛ da malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ tɔ m soyy…. Naa n'a hɩnkam wɔɔ m, ʊ a dɔ ʊ ʊ, a lɛ da malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ m gʊta maam-maam.
Woso n meer ba kan malɛɛka kɩ cɩna, a ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ Nyɩ,
an a sa her ma,
mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ y.
A n a hɩ malɛɛka ma sɔ cɩna, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ yɩrɛ a Zɩ,
an yɩ mɔɔ Nyɩ y.
Bɩ, Woso k'a bʊr k'a Nyɩ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ nyɔɔ durnya ʊ bɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ:
Bɩ kʊ Woso malɛɛkarɔ haay
n kukurə zɛ a taa.
Hɔ kʊ Woso a hɩ malɛɛkarɔ mim nɔ ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ:
Malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ, ŋ ba a ʊ,
ɩ ʊ hɩnhɛr nɩ ŋ mɩ,
a zibəənyɩnɔ m,
am sɛ nɛɛnnɔ m.
Bɩ meerbaa k'a a ba a Nyɩ bɩ mim nɔ ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ, a ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ m Woso,
ɩ cirbəə nyarɛ ba ʊ y.
Ɩ so ɩbɩɩ nawʊrɛ
ɩ cirbəə kʊ b'ʊ tɩrgabaa nɔ ʊ.
Ɩbɩɩ hɔ k'an tɩrga ŋʊa,
ɩ n'ɩ sɔm hɔ bʊnyaa m.
Bɩ y'a ka, Woso,
ɩ Woso bɩ n'ɩ bɔ ʊ,
an heernyɔɔ nyɔɔ tɔ ɩ mim ʊ.
A ɩbɩɩ ŋʊa an cem ɩ muno wɔɔ han,
bɩ tɔ ma m an ɩ bɔ ʊ.
A a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Zuuba, durnya sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ,
ɩbɩɩ ɩ tara burə da,
bɩ, brama k'an ta ʊ naa,
ɩbɩɩ wɔ zibəə m.
Brɔɔ cenim,
b'ɩbɩɩ gɔɔtam tee….
Brama kan tara bɩ kɩ zarm
am huu hɔ bɩ m,
ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ huŋŋum
am huu hɔ bɩ m,
denter m, ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ lʊrm
am huuro m.
Bɩ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr ɩ lʊrlɛ y,
ɩbɩɩ cenle ba ʊ y.
Woso n a hɩ malɛɛka m cɩna, amba a a hɩ a Nyɩ bɩ m, a ʊ:
Bʊr ɩ nyɩnta mɔɔ bɩsɩ ra,
kʊ m a ka k'ɩ jɩnnɔ n bɩ nyɩnta ɩ taa y.
Malɛɛkarɔ wɔɔ, nyiro m, ŋn'ɩ Woso zi bam, Woso n ŋ nyɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ ziro ba ŋn'a da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ hɔjirle yɩ rɔ wɔɔ han.
K'a a yo Woso n meer ba kan wɔɔ kɩ a Nyɩ bɩ lɛ m bɩ, ʊ hɔ k'a hɩ wɔɔ m bɩ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ gʊta, kʊ n bɛɛ m, wɔɔ nyaanɩm.
Lemim kʊ malɛɛkarɔ nyɩnta ŋnɩ b'a pa da bɩ, a a zi ba fasɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n yɛ ma y, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka ma rɔ wɔɔ, brɔɔ a bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ fɩr yɩ amba a a ga m bɩ m.

Bɩ, wɔɔ sɔ, kʊ wɔɔ n nyasʊ bʊmbɔrɛ gʊta maam-maam naa do nɩ, Woso wɔɔ dʊdɔ kam sɔ, wɔɔ bɩ bɔm lɛ nɩ y. Zuuba mɩŋŋa ɩ lɛɛ ka an bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ pa da, bɩ jɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ma rɔ wɔɔ n a mɩŋŋabaa k'an ta ʊ hɩnka wɔɔ m.
Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ ŋ kasɛtɩ bɩ karɛ gore da ʊ, hoserlo paŋŋazannɔ barɛ nɔ ʊ, kan makra do y'a hʊnhɔ kɩ m. A *Sɛnt-Ɛspri ganwʊrɛrɔ jir amba a lɛ n taa bɩ m.
Durnya daa kʊ wɔɔ n'a mim dɩndam bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ bɛɛ Woso ŋ da ʊ, kʊ ŋ n'a so ʊ y, a Nyɩ b'a da ʊ.
Bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə ʊ, n y'a hɩ, n ʊ:
Woso ra, bɔ m gʊaa m,
ɩbɩɩ n'ɩ hɔɔn dam ma?
Gʊaa nyɔɔdʊ n bɔ m,
ɩbɩɩ n nɩ nyasʊm nɩ?
Ɩbɩɩ ka an nɩ malɛɛkarɔ taa
dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ,
ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ b'a gore da ʊ,
ɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ ka ʊ gʊta.
Ɩbɩɩ ka an a so hɔ haay ʊ,
an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ.
Kʊ n y'a hɩ, n ʊ: ‹Woso a ka gʊaa nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ bɩ, naa k'a hɩ, a ʊ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʊ, hɔsɩ n gɔɔta k'a bɛɛ y'a so ʊ y.› A n bɔkarɛ, dɩɩtaa naa, dɩgarɛ nɔ ʊ, gʊaa bɛɛ y'a so hɔ haay ʊ y.

Bɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ n naa do: Woso a ka Yeezuu n a ba poore malɛɛkarɔ taa dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Woso barka bɩ tɔ ma, a ga gʊɔɔ haay minto. Bɩ wɔɔ y'a yɩm kɛɛrɛ an nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ kan daʊrɛ gʊta kɩ m, fɩr k'a yɩ a zɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.

Woso ɩ hɔ haay da, ŋn'a bɩncɛrɔ ʊ, a a ŋʊa kʊ gʊɔɔ gʊta n yɩ a nyɩnɔ, ŋnɩ nyɩnta a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ. A ga a ʊ m denter, k'an a ka kʊ Yeezuu n fɩr yɩ, k'an wɔ ʊ an yɩ gʊɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛzaa k'a a ga m. Bala, Yeezuu nɩ karɛ ŋ lɛɛ kʊ ŋ nɩ bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ.
Yeezuu nɩ gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊrɛ ŋ ma, a mɩŋŋa kan gʊɔɔ k'a nɩ ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ Zɩ deem. Bɩ y'a ka, Yeezuu nɩ ŋ birle a danyɩnɔ b'a nyannɩ ba nɩ y.
A a hɩ denter, a ʊ:
Woso ra, mɔɔ y'ɩ mim dɩndarɛ
m danyɩnɔ m,
m m lɛ bɔ ɩ ʊ,
sokʊmagʊɔɔ haay lɛɛ.
A a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ yom Woso ma.
A n a ya, an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ ba n nɩ kan nyɩnɔ
kʊ Woso ŋ ka mɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Nyɩnɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m, ŋnɩ yɩ mɛsim kan ma kɩ nɔ ʊ, Woso Nyɩ bɩ mɩŋŋa a ba am ŋ hɔ bɩ m an nyɩnta gʊaa sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m. A ba a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ, k'a Sʊtaana zaar ba, bɩ k'a a so zɛ paŋŋa ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a a da ma, a gʊɔɔ kʊ lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩ, nyi kʊ ŋ n'a bam zɛ m a mɩsɩrbaa tɛkka ma rɔ wɔɔ yɔ.
Bala, Yeezuu bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ bɛɛ an n'a darɛ ŋ han y, Abraham nyɩnɔ wɔɔ an n'a darɛ ŋ han.

Bɩ y'a ka, an yɩ pakra k'an a ba am a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ m hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, k'a wɔ ʊ, a yɩ ŋ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʊ taalɛrazaa m, a m cicirzɛrɛzaa, a zibəə bɩ nɔ ʊ Woso lɛɛ. K'a gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, a ka ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, kɛɛrɛ naa, a a da ma an a da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ makra lɛɛ rɔ wɔɔ han, bala, a mɩŋŋa makra yɩ, an fɩr yɩ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ wosogʊɔɔ, Woso y'awɔɔ bir sɔ k'awɔɔ n yɩ a gʊɔɔ. K'a a hɔɔn da Yeezuu ma mɩŋŋa, bala, Woso y'a nyɔɔ k'an bɩ yɩ sɩrakarɛ kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ.
Sɩra m, Yeezuu zi kʊ Woso a bɔ ʊ k'an a ba bɩ ba taalɛra nɔ ʊ, amba Moyiisi nyɩnta an a ba bɩ m, n n a da Wosoci ʊ, n ʊ: «Moyiisi yɩ taalɛrazaa zibəə kʊ Woso a ka ʊ haay a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ nɔ ʊ.»
Gʊaa k'a cɛ dɔ b'ɩ daʊrɛ yɩm an lɛ da cɛ bɩ mɩŋŋa m. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, Yeezuu a ga lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊta m an lɛ da Moyiisi lɛbɔʊrɛ ra.
Cɛ k'an ta ʊ haay, gʊɔɔ yɩ ŋ dɔ, an bɔkarɛ, Woso ɩ hɔ woo… da.
Kʊ Moyiisi nɩ, zibəənyɩ m, ta a ʊ a lɛ ra zi kʊ Woso a ka ʊ haay a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla bɩ nɔ ʊ, a zibəə bɩ, hɔ kʊ Woso ʊ k'a hɩ bɩ kasɛtɩ a a ka.
Bɩ, kʊ Krista nɩ, a m Woso Nyɩ an nɩ dɩgarɛ a Zɩ bɩ har bɩ nyasʊm ma, taalɛra nɔ ʊ. A har bɩ, wɔɔ m, kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, ʊ n'ʊ heer nyɔɔm hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ta ʊ heer lɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma m, amba Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm bɩ, a ʊ:
K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her dɔmɩm naa ʊ,
a b'a gu ma, amba awɔɔ nyɩnta a bɩsɩ ka ma biisi bɩ nɩ y,
amba hinni k'awɔɔ nyɩnta a makra ba poo ʊ bɩ nɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ m Woso n a hɩ, a ʊ:
Poo ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ yaabɔɔ wɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ k'a dɩga hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a bam bɩ ma,
bɩ, ŋ hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ba bɩ yɩ, dɔɔraa bam busi.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɔ n ma ʊ kan gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro kɩ,
m a hɩ, m ʊ:
A nyʊnnyɔɔ ŋ nawʊm a hɔɔndarɛ nɔ ʊ tee…,
ŋ n hɔ kʊ mɔɔ lɛ n taa ŋ gʊr zi bɩ jɩ dɔ y.
Naa y'a ka mɔɔ nɔ n ma ʊ, mɔɔ n m wer si, m ʊ:
Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.
M danyɩnɔ, k'a dundo a zi, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta heer bʊnyaa m a n a gu sɩrakarɛ ma, a n a bɔ Woso k'an mɩsɩr b'ʊ y.
Bɩ, an ta ʊ bɩ, k'a bɩr kʊ heer yom dɔmɩm biyəə, a b'a hɩ a ʊ k'a dɔ booti ma y. K'a bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ gɔsɩ b'a mɩŋŋa to kʊ mimbʊnyaa n bra ba nɩ y.
Bala, Krista hɔjirlezannɔ n wɔɔ m, bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ gɔɔta sɩra kʊ wɔɔ ka a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, an ta an a tɛkka ku.
Hɔ kʊ Wosoci bɩ n'a hɩm bɩ, mɔɔ m ya m nɩ som la:
K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her,
a b'a gu ma, amba awɔɔ nyɩnta biisi a bɩsɩ ka ma, a a gu ma bɩ nɩ y.
Nkɔɔ ɩ Woso leer bɩ ma, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a gu ma? Gʊɔɔ kʊ Moyiisi ŋ bɔ Eziptɩ ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ m.
Nkɔɔ Woso nɔ ma ʊ kan ŋ kɩ dɔɔraa bam busi bɩ? Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ mimbʊnyaa ba, ŋnɩ gɩnga poo ʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Woso k'a wer si, a ʊ: «Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ yɩm bɩ.» Nkɔɔ a a hɩ ŋ ma? Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩsɩ ka ma rɔ wɔɔ a a hɩ ŋ ma.
Wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ denter, kʊ ŋ n sɩra ka bɩ y'a ka, ŋ n a da ma, ŋnɩ hoonsire kʊ Woso ʊ k'a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ yɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ nyi ba. Woso ler bɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ, wɔɔ ʊ da ma ʊ hoonsire k'a ʊ k'a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ yɩ. Ʊ dundo ʊ zi mɩŋŋa, kʊ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩnta wɔɔ barla an jɩra hoonsire bɩ do yɩrɛ zi y.
Bala, wɔɔ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma, amba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta poo ʊ b'ʊ ŋn'a ma biisi rɔ wɔɔ m. Ŋ lemim bɩ ma, b'a nyɔɔdʊ n nyɩnta ŋ ma y, bala, a ma kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ bɩ, ŋ n a si kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ y.
Wɔɔ, k'ʊ sɩra ka rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ hoonsire bɩ do yɩ. Woso hoonsire bɩ do mim hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ m wer si m ʊ,
ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.
Meer naa do ba a ʊ, an bɔkarɛ, a a zibəə bɩ nya laatʊ dɔmɩm k'a durnya da ʊ b'ʊ.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə ʊ, n dɔmɩm saanhɩna hɔ bɩ mim hɩ, n ʊ: ‹Woso a zi haay ba, an hoon si dɔmɩm saanhɩna hinni ʊ.›
Wɔɔ ʊ ya ʊ a yɩ, n a gʊrsɩra ba, n ʊ: ‹Ŋ bɩ hoonsire kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ yɩm fɩɩga y.›
K'a maam, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'a dam ma ŋn'a yɩ. A n bɔkarɛ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n hoonsire bɩ yɩ y, kʊ ŋ n yɛ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ y'a ka, Woso n a ya, an dɔmɩm bɔ ʊ, n n'a birm, n ʊ: ‹Her›. Maasɩrɛ k'a bɩ ba gʊta bɩ, a dɔmɩm bɩ do mim hɩ gʊta Davɩd lɛ m, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ niŋŋə kʊ wɔɔ mim hɩ b'ʊ, a ʊ:
K'awɔɔ Woso leer ma her,
a b'a gu ma y.
Denter sɔ, kʊ yɩ a nawʊrɛ ɩ ʊ, Zoziye wɔ ʊ an hoonsire ka Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ, Woso bɩ bɩ tom k'a a ya, a dɔmɩm vanta mim hɩ y.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hoonsire dɔmɩm ta ʊ Woso n a cɩnta a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ, an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan dɔmɩm saanhɩna hinni kʊ Woso hoonsire dɔmɩm m bɩ kɩ.
Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ hoonsire kʊ Woso n'a kam bɩ yɩm bɩ, a zaa zibəə nya an nɩ hoon sim, amba Woso mɩŋŋa a zi ba, an a nya an hoon si bɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ ʊ tɔ ʊ, k'ʊ hoonsire bɩ do yɩ. Ʊ dundo ʊ zi kʊ wɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ bɩsɩ ka Woso lɛ ma, an a do hoonsire bɩ yɩrɛ ma, amba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta poo ʊ rɔ wɔɔ nɩ y.

Bala, Woso lemim bɩ mɩsɩr an nɩ paŋŋa m. A lɛ ta ʊ an cem hɛɛnm lɛhɩɩyazaa han. A ɩ gasʊm gʊaa ʊ an nɩ tam lɛɛ kʊ wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa kan wɔɔ nyi kɩ nɩ kʊ zɛŋ ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ tam lɛɛ kʊ wɔɔ yaarɔ kan a hɩnɔ kɩ nɩ kʊ zɛŋ ʊ b'ʊ. A ɩ gʊaa lɛtaamarɔ kan a hɔɔndarɛrɔ kʊ ŋ n'a heer ʊ kɩ dʊdɔ kam.
Hɔsɩ ba ʊ, an nɩ wɔŋ ʊ an a nyaakʊm da Woso lɛɛ y. Hɔ k'a nɩ durnya ʊ haay dɩgɩ, an garga ra, Woso mɩm ʊ. Bɩ, a mɩŋŋa, ʊ woo… n nɩ zɛm bɩ jɩm a taa, an wɔɔ lɩnlar mim kʊ wɔɔ ba haay ma.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʊ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kʊ wɔɔ n'a pa dam bɩ nɔ ʊ. Bala, wɔɔ ɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ k'a lɛ da haay m, an der an cem brama han, an wɔ ʊ an lee ku Woso mɩŋŋa zi, Woso Nyɩ, Yeezuu m.
Wɔɔ mannɩbər b'ɩ kɔm wɔɔ ma, ʊ paŋŋawarlɔ nɔ ʊ. A mɩŋŋa makra yɩ mim haay nɔ ʊ, amba wɔɔ nɩ makra yɩm bɩ m, b'a n a do mimbʊnyaa nɔ ʊ fɩɩga y.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ ʊ zɔ Woso ma a cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʊ heer koodə nɔ ʊ, a mɩŋŋa n ta barka m an n'a kam. Ʊ ʊ zɔ ma, k'an ʊ cicir zɛ an barka ka wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ daahan yɩ, daahan lɛtaama dɔmɩm ʊ.

Kʊ wɔɔ dɩga a, wosocɛmannɩbər jɩtaarɛ biyəə bɩ, Woso n'a bɔŋ ʊ gʊɔɔ gaa ma, an n'a darɛ a zibəə ʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ daahan tɔ ma. A zibəə bɩ, ganwʊrɛrɔ kan mannɩrɔ kɩ an nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʊ, mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ tɔ ma.
K'a mɩŋŋa ɩ paŋŋawar minno nɔ ʊ bɩ, a a da ma, an gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kʊrɔm ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim jɩ ma, an a da ŋ han.
Kʊ paŋŋawarzaa n a mɩŋŋa m bɩ, pakra m k'an mannɩ ba a mɩŋŋa mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma sɔ, amba an n'a bam Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɩ m.
Gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a mɩŋŋa gore da ʊ, an a ba mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ a zim nɩ y. Woso mɩŋŋa nɩ gʊaa birm an n'a dam zibəə bɩ do ʊ, amba a a ba kan Aarɔn kɩ bɩ m.
Maam bɩ, Krista bɛɛ y'a mɩŋŋa gore da ʊ, k'a yɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ y. Bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa y'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ m mɔɔ Nyɩ,
an a sa her ma bɩ,
mɔɔ n'ɩbɩɩ Zɩ.
Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ vanta ʊ, a a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ yɩm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.

Yeezuu k'a nyɩnta tara burə ʊ bɩ, a yaa da Woso m gʊta, an a wɔ zɩnzɛ m gʊta, an nyi ka kan zee gʊta kɩ. A n a yɛ Woso k'a a da ma an a yɔ zɛ wɔ ʊ bɩ han k'an a yɔ zɛ wɔ ʊ. Bɩ, Woso a yaa bɩ si, k'a nɩ yɛm Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma bɩ tɔ ma.
Baa kʊ Woso Nyɩ m bɩ, yɛ Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma bɩ dɔ a ʊ, a fɩryɩrɛrɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ m, Woso a ka an yɩ amba a a ga m bɩ m fasɩ k'an yɩ bʊmbɔrɛzaa. Maam m, an a ba gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ zaa.
Bɩ Woso a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ, a m mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
Wɔɔ ɩ hɔ m gʊta, k'ʊ a hɩ mim naa do nɔ ʊ, bɩ k'awɔɔ bɩr mim jɩ mam zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ, a jɩ dɩnda awɔɔ m wer ta ʊ.

A ga a ʊ m hɔɔ tee… k'awɔɔ n a ba karɩnsaambɔɔ, kan bɩ kɩ, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a ŋʊam kʊ n n'a ya n nɩ Woso lemim bɩ minno k'awɔɔ ma a sɩrakarɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ dɩnda a m. Kʊ hɔ m, k'awɔɔ ɩ hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩm, bɩ ayy…, awɔɔ gɔɔta an n'a ŋʊam kʊ n nɩ nyonhi ka a ʊ.
Nyɩ ɩ tɩr nyonhi mi, a n hɔ k'an tɩrga gɛɛ bʊnyaa dɔ kʊ nɩ y.
Bɩ, hɔbɩrɛ gorezaa bɩ, gʊɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ m, brɔɔ mim ka hɔ mɩŋŋa kan hɔ bʊnyaa kɩ dɔ n n'a bɔ kʊ zi m.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ cem sɩra ka Krista ʊ lɛɛkarɛ hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nyʊgɔ rɔ wɔɔ han, k'ʊ ta lɛɛ, ʊ gʊɔɔ burgurɔ hɔ dɩnda. Hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nyʊgɔrɔ wɔɔ duro jɩr ba n na: Pakra m kʊ gʊaa n a gʊ zibəəro kʊ ŋ nɩ tam gʊaa m zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, k'an sɩra ka Woso ʊ.
Batɛnnɔ wɔɔ mim ba n nɩ, kan wɔrɔ kɩnka gʊaa ra bɩ mim kɩ, kan gəəno mɩmbɔʊrɛ bɩ mim kɩ, kan durnya nyarɛ dʊdɔ bɩ mim kɩ. Wɔɔ b'ʊ yarɛ ʊ jɩm k'ʊ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro dɩnda y.
Ʊ ta lɛɛ, ʊ hɔɔ vantɔɔ dɩnda, kʊ Woso yɛ, naa wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a ba.
Ʊ makra sa gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Woso lɛɛgure yɩ biisi, ŋnɩ Woso mɩsɩrbaa ganwʊrɛ yɩ, ŋnɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri si a heer ʊ am gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ m,
ŋnɩ Woso lemim mɩŋŋabaa kasɛtɩ bɩ, ŋnɩ hɔɔ gʊtɔɔ paŋŋa k'a nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ durnya daa b'ʊ bɩ kasɛtɩ bɩ sɔ rɔ wɔɔ ma.

Baa kan naa haay kɩ, kʊ ŋ y'a gu ŋnɩ sɩrakarɛ to, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a ka gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro n a ya, ŋn'a bɔ gallɛm hɩɩya hɔ ma, ŋn'a mɩsɩrbaa lʊr y. Bala, a ya ŋ y'a ʊ ŋnɩ so ra a zim ŋn'ɩ Woso Nyɩ bɩ wɔm gɔdarkʊra ma, ŋn'a kam gʊɔɔ n'a sʊnsɔ wʊm lɛɛ kar ʊ.
Ʊ ʊ ya, ʊ makra sa, kʊ hɔsɩra ɩ la hi yɩm tee… an n'a mim, k'a ɩ hɔ bam mɩŋŋa a wʊrɛzannɔ wɔɔ n'a bɩrɛ, naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Woso tara bɩ do barka da ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ laa gɔrɔ an nɩ ŋ bɔm kan bur kɩ, hɔsɩra bɩ do nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ y. Woso ler bʊnyaa dam n'ʊ zɔɔ-zɔɔ, a nyambʊrlɛ bɩ, sɛ n n'a bɩ m.
M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, baa kʊ wɔɔ ɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ, wɔɔ heer kookoo gʊta awɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʊ. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ zaa mɩŋŋa ra, bʊmbɔrɛ zaa bɩ m.
Woso tɩrga, a bɩ ziro k'awɔɔ n ba rɔ wɔɔ tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʊ y, ŋʊarɛ k'awɔɔ n tam kan kɩ a zi ba, a ka a danyɩnɔ wosogʊɔɔ ʊ, a gɔɔta an n'a bam bɩ, a b'a tɔ bɔrɛ a nɔ ʊ sɔ y.
Bɩ, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə n gɔɔta an bɩr a yoŋ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ tee…, k'an ta an dɔmɩnnɔ nyarɛ ku, kʊ hɔ k'awɔɔ ta a heer lɛ bɩ n yɩ fasɩ-fasɩ.
Wɔɔ lɛ baa k'awɔɔ n a ba yakʊzannɔ y, bɩ, k'awɔɔ n gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ sɩra ka ŋn'ɩ bʊrlɛ a mɩŋŋa ma, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩm maam nɔ wɔɔ makra sa.
Woso k'a nyɩnta an ler bɩ bɔ Abraham m bɩ, a a wer si an a na ma. Kʊ gɔsɩ ba ʊ, an lɛ da m an n'a wer bɩ sire a tɔ m bɩ, am naa an a wer bɩ si a mɩŋŋa m.
A n a hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ n wer si,
mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ barka daŋ ʊ,
m yaŋŋɔɔ ka ɩ ʊ gʊta.
Abraham ler bɩ bɔrɛ mɩm da bʊraama nɔ ʊ, an hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ y'a wer sire, a si ŋ nawʊm gʊaa k'a lɛ da ŋ nɩ bɩ tɔ ra, bɩ, wer bɩ sire nɩ mim kʊ ŋ ʊ k'a ba bɩ kʊyɩrɛ kasɛtɩ, an nɩ bɩsɩkarɛ haay bɔrɛ ŋ bire ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma m Woso n a wer si, an a na a ler bɩ bɔrɛ ma, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ k'a ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ yɩ rɔ wɔɔ n a dɔ fasɩ ŋ ʊ, a bɩ hɔsɩ lʊrm hɔ k'a cɩnta k'a ba bɩ nɔ ʊ y.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hɔ hɩɩya n ta ʊ, ŋ b'a lʊrlɛ y, bɩ Woso b'a dam ma a n ŋʊaar ba ŋ mim nɔ ʊ sɔ y, ler bɩ bɔrɛ kan wer bɩ sire kɩ m. Ncɩnaaʊ naa, wɔɔ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ si, ʊ b'ʊ nyaakʊm da Woso zi rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ heer kookoo hɔ hɩɩya naa do tɔ ma, k'ʊ hɔ kʊ Woso wɔɔ bir ma, k'ʊ b'a yɩ bɩ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ.

Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ta ʊ heer lɛ naa do a ka, wɔɔ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ wɔɔ bɩr digə darɛ y. Amba kɔɔlʊʊ gʊta pɔyaa k'a n'a dam jɩm ʊ bɩ hɔ bɩ m. Taaheerlɛ bɩ do n'a kam wɔɔ nɩ cenim pɛɛra k'a ta lɛɛ kʊ Woso n ta ʊ bɩ rɛ bɩ han Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, ʊ nɩ gasʊm Woso mɩŋŋa zi, lɛɛ k'an ta ʊ b'ʊ.
Bɩncɛ bɩ do Yeezuu lɛɛ ka wɔɔ m, an gasʊ ʊ, gasʊ a ʊ wɔɔ tɔ ma. Bala, a a ba mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ, amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ bɩ, nyɩnta a ʊ Salɛm cir, bɩ Woso k'a lɛ da haay bɩ mannɩbər m sɔ. Abraham k'a nyɩnta an yar ba an a da cinno ma, an a bɔ an nɩ zɛm bɩ, Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ta an aa a zɛ ʊ, an barka da a mim ʊ.
Abraham n hɔ k'an ta m haay bɩ bɔ ʊ, bu biyəə barla deem, an a ka ʊ. Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ tɔ bɩ mɩŋŋa jɩ ba n nɩ: «Tɩrgabaa cir», an ta ʊ sɔ bɩ, nyɩnta a ʊ, Salɛm cir, naa jɩ ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ: «Laafɩɩ cir».
Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ bɩ, a ba zɩ nɩ, b'a ba da nɩ y, a ba do gʊɔɔ nɩ y. A taʊrɛ sɩŋŋɩda ba ʊ, b'a nyarɛ ba ʊ sɔ y. Bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, mannɩbər m dɔmɩm haay.
K'a dɩga a, awɔɔ n a dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʊ, gʊaa gʊta m na? Abraham yɛ an hɔ k'a yɩ haay yar bɩ k'a a da ma bɩ nɔ ʊ bɔ ʊ bu biyəə nɔ ʊ, deem an a ka ʊ.

Levii nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ wosocɛmannɩbənno wɔɔ, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ lɛ cɩnta ŋ nɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔ haay buganwʊrɛ si Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ han, naa ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ, a si ŋ nawʊrɛ a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ han, an bɔkarɛ Abraham yaŋŋɔɔ n brɔɔ m sɔ.
Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ n nyɩnta Levii nyɩ y, an bɔkarɛ a hɔ kʊ Abraham m ta m haay bɩ buganwʊrɛ si han, an lɛ da sɔ bɩ, Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ Abraham barka da ʊ, an bɔkarɛ bɩ Woso lerlɔ bɔ m.
Bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ ʊ ʊ, gʊaa k'a lɛ da b'ɩ tɩr barka da gʊaa poore mim ʊ.
Levii har gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ buganwʊrɛ sim nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ yɩ gɩngarɛ am gʊaa haay m. Bɩ, kʊ Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ k'a buganwʊrɛ si bɩ nɩ, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «A garɛ ba ʊ y.»
Wɔɔ ʊ da ma, ʊ meerbaa bɩ nyambʊr, ʊ ʊ, Abraham k'a nyɩnta an buganwʊrɛ bɩ yawʊra bɩ ka Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ʊ bɩ, Levii k'a yaŋŋɔɔ nɩ buganwʊrɛ bɩ sim her naa, a buganwʊrɛ bɩ ka Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ʊ sɔ.
Bala, baa kʊ Levii n yɩ cɩna dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, bɩ Abraham yaŋŋa m bɩ, bɩ y'a ka mɔɔ ʊ, hinni kʊ Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ ta an aa Abraham zɛ ʊ bɩ, Levii nyɩnta ʊ hinni bɩ do ʊ sɔ, Abraham mɛ ʊ.

Levii dogʊɔɔ mannɩbər biyəə bɩ, a to a ʊ lɛrɔ kʊ Woso ŋ ka Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ. A n bɔkarɛ, kʊ yɩ an nawʊrɛ ɩ ʊ, Levii hargʊɔɔ wɔɔ mannɩbər zibəə b'a da ma an a ka gʊɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga fasɩ, pakra bɛɛ m kʊ mannɩbər vanta n nyɩnta ʊ, a zibəə n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ hɔ kɩ y. Mannɩbər bɩ do bɩ, Aarɔn yaŋŋa bɛɛ dɔ y.
Bala, kʊ mannɩbərbaa b'a lʊr, pakra m kʊ lɛ k'a nyɩnta ʊ bɩ n lʊr sɔ.
Bɩ, mannɩbər vanta kʊ wɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu m. A ba Levii dogʊɔɔ barla y, do k'a a to ʊ bɩ gɔsɩ n nyɩnta mannɩbər Wosocɛ b'ʊ y.
Gʊaa haay a dɔ, a ʊ, Ziida do gʊaa m, Moyiisi n do naa do mim hɩ mannɩbənno wɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʊ y.
Hɔ k'a n'a kam wɔɔ n mim naa do jɩ ma fasɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mannɩbər vanta n ta ʊ kɛɛrɛ, Levii dogʊɔɔ wɔɔ bɩncɛ ʊ, bɔ b'ʊ kʊ ʊ kan Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ kɩ.
Lɛrɔ k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ yaŋŋɔɔ mim dɩndam nɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma bɛɛ m an a ba mannɩbər y, a ba a ʊ mannɩbər a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ paŋŋa tɔ ma.
Denter sɔ, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
Ɩ ba ɩbɩɩ nawʊm mannɩbər
dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ,
amba Mɛlkisedɛkkɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, n nɩ lɛ k'a nyɩnta ʊ biisi bɩ ci zɛ, bala, a paŋŋa ba ʊ, b'a b'a dam ma an a da gʊaa han y.
Bala, Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ n a da ma, ŋn'a ka gʊɔɔ n yɩ tɩrga fasɩ Woso mɩm ʊ y. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, taaheerlɛ k'a lɛ da haay n ta ʊ, a tɔ ma m wɔɔ n'ʊ dam ma, ʊ n'ʊ zɔm Woso ma.
A n a na ma bɩ, Woso mɩŋŋa a wer si kʊ Yeezuu n yɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ. Levii dogʊɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ mannɩbənno, bɩ wersire naa do lɔɔ n nyɩnta ʊ y.
Bɩ kʊ Yeezuu nɩ, Woso a cɩnta mannɩbər, an a hɩ a ʊ: «Zuuba a wer si, b'a b'a bɔrɛ a taa nɩ y. A ʊ, ɩbɩɩ yɩm mannɩbər dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ.»
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, Yeezuu tɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ nɩ gʊaasɩbabaa k'a lɛ da biisi hɔ bɩ ra bɩ m kan Woso kɩ.
Hɔ vanta n ta ʊ sɔ, a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, Levii dogʊɔɔ mannɩbənno wɔɔ, ŋ nyɩnta yɔɔgʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ gɩngam ŋn'a zibəə bɩ tom bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, kʊ Yeezuu nɩ, a garɛ ba ʊ y, a b'a mannɩbər zibəə bɩ tom gʊaa nɩ y.
Naa tɔ ma m, an n'a dam ma an gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yom ma, k'a a zɔ Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʊ. Bala, k'a nɩ mɩsɩrbaa m dɔmɩm haay bɩ, a ɩ yaa dam Woso m dɔmɩm haay ŋ tɔ ma.

Naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Yeezuu n mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ ga m ʊ a yɩ. A tɩrga fasɩ, kʊrɔma sɩ kan mimbʊnyaa sɩ kɩ ba a gʊr zi y. A mɩsɩrbaa y'a hɔ kan mimbʊnyaabənno hɔ kɩ, Woso a busu, an nɩ hɔ haay burə ʊ.

A n bɔ kʊ ʊ kan biisi mannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, pakra bɛɛ m k'an mannɩ ba dɔmɩm biyəə a mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma, k'a bɔkarɛ a gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ hɔ ba y. Ga k'a ʊ gɔdarkʊra ma bɩ, a mɩŋŋa a ka am mannɩ hɔ bɩ m, gallɛm deem taan… dɔmɩm haay minto.

Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbənno jɩtannɔ wɔɔ, gʊɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, ŋ yɩ kʊrɔma bam. Bɩ ler kʊ Woso a bɔ, an a wer si lɛrɔ wɔɔ cenle jɛ ʊ bɩ, a Nyɩ k'a mɩŋŋa a ka an a ba mɩŋŋa fasɩ dɔmɩm haay tɔ ma b'a cɩnta mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ.
Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ k'ʊ a hɩ bɩ ba n nɩ: Mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ kʊ wɔɔ mim hɩ bɩ, wɔɔ n ta m denter, a ɩ nyɩntam cirbəə nɔ ʊ, Woso k'a a so hɔ haay ʊ bɩ jɩr ʊ arzana ʊ.
A mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ zi an n'a bam b'ʊ Woso taʊrɛ nɔ ʊ, pɛɛracɛ paan… kʊ Woso a dɔ, gʊɔɔ bɛɛ y'a dɔ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Mannɩbər haay zibəə n ganwʊrɛrɔ kan mannɩrɔ kɩ ka Woso ʊ m, a a ga m sɔ, kʊ wɔɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ n bɩr hɔ m k'a ka Woso ʊ sɔ.
Kʊ durnya naa do gʊaa nɩ, a b'a dam ma an yɩ mannɩbər y. Bala, mannɩbənno ta ʊ kara, ŋn'ɩ mannɩrɔ kam Woso ʊ amba Moyiisi lɛrɔ a hɩ bɩ m.
Bɩ, mannɩbənno wɔɔ duro zibəə bɩ, mannɩbər zibəə paan… k'a nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ bɔkʊrɛ m, a makra m. A do m ba Moyiisi nyɩnta k'a pɛɛracɛ dɔ a ka Woso ʊ bɩ m. Woso a hɩ m, a ʊ:
Ɩ tɔ ʊ k'ɩ pɛɛracɛ bɩ dɔ
k'an yɩ hɔdeem
kan mɔɔ n a hɩnka ɩbɩɩ m
ci bɩ burə ʊ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, mannɩbər zibəə k'a lɛ da brɔɔ hɔ bɩ ra gʊta bɩ Yeezuu n n'a bam. Bala, am gʊaasɩbabaa k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ zɛkʊrazaa, gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ do jɩr bɩ, lerbɔrɛrɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ da a yo ma.
Kʊ nyɩnta lɛɛkarɛ gʊaasɩbabaa b'ʊ zore, a bɩ yɩm pakra kʊ gʊaasɩbabaa k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da n sompi a yaa ʊ y.
Bɩ, Woso nyaa ba kan a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋ kʊrɔmarɔ tɔ ma, a ʊ:
Dɔmɩnnɔ ɩ zɛm, mɔɔ m bɩ gʊaasɩbabaa daa dam Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma, kan Ziida gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ do bɩ bɩr yɩrɛ, am gʊaasɩbabaa kʊ mɔɔ da ŋ zɩrɔ ma bɩ nɩ y,
hinni kʊ mɔɔ ŋ gaa ŋ wɔ ma, m bɔ ŋ nɩ Eziptɩ ʊ bɩ, ŋ n ta a lɛ ra gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ do nɔ ʊ y,
bɩ tɔ ma m, mɔɔ nɩ m bɔ ŋ ʊ.
Mɔɔ m Zuuba, mɔɔ ɩ meer bɩ ba.
Dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn duro jɛ ʊ, gʊaasɩbabaa kʊ mɔɔ n n'a dam Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ba n nɩ:
Mɔɔ yɩ m lɛrɔ wɔɔ darɛ ŋ hɔɔn ʊ, m ŋ gʊrsɩra ba ŋ heer ʊ.
Mɔɔ yɩrɛ ŋ Woso, ŋnɩ yɩ mɔɔ gʊɔɔ.
Ŋ gɔsɩ bɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ k'a a ka ma k'a hɔ dɩnda a mim nɩ y,
gɛɛ a danyɩ m an bɩr a hɩrɛ a ʊ, a ka k'ɩ Zuuba dɔ.
Bala, ŋ haay mɔɔ dɔm, an a sa ŋ poore ma an ta m ŋ gʊtɔɔ ma.
Mɔɔ yɩ ŋ kʊrɔmarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ bɩ ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʊ y.
Woso k'a bʊr an nɩ gʊaasɩbabaa daa mim dɩndam bɩ, naa ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ, lɛɛkarɛ gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ ba a ʊ hɔgusire. A n bɔkarɛ hɔ k'a gusi, b'a zibəə ba ʊ bɩ, a nyaanɩm zɔɔ.
Lɛɛkarɛ gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, lɛrɔ nyɩnta ʊ ŋn'ɩ yaa bɩ darɛ zaarɔ hɩnkam, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ cɛ dɔ sɔ k'a bɩr yaa bɩ daŋ ʊ.
Cɛ bɩ ba ŋ y'a ʊ pɛɛra m, a nɔ n hɩɩya, lɛɛkarɛ hɔ bɩ bir ŋ nawʊm lɛɛ k'an jɩnjɛɛm Woso ma. Lɛɛ bɩ do ŋ fɩtɩrɛ bɩ kan mɔrcɩntarahɔ bɩ kɩ, bur kʊ ŋ n'a kam Woso ʊ bɩ kɩ kuntə ʊ.
Cɛ nɔ hɩɩyazaa bɩ, pɛɛra ŋ y'a ta a lɛ ma, cɛ nɔ bɩ do Woso taʊrɛ bɩncɛ m.

Lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, mannɩduu ŋ y'a ba sarma m, ŋn'a cɩnta b'ʊ, tidəər nyisi sɛnyaʊrɛ mɔr m bɩ, cɛ nɔ bɩ do ʊ sɔ bɩ, daka kʊ ŋ y'a ba gɔ m, ŋn'a lihi sarma m bɩ cɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ b'ʊ, daka bɩ do bir ŋ nawʊrɛ, ŋ ʊ, *gʊaasɩbabaa daka. Daka bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, laaga nɩ b'ʊ ŋn'a ba sarma m, ŋnɩ *mann zar ʊ, Aarɔn bənkə k'a vu da bɩ nyɩnta daka b'ʊ sɔ, jaa wargarɔ hɩɩyɔɔ kʊ Woso a gʊaasɩbabaa gʊrsɩra ba ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyɩnta daka b'ʊ sɔ.

Gʊaasɩbabaa daka bɩ burə ʊ bɩ, hɔɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba hɩɩya ŋ zarɔ n ta ŋ ma, malɛɛkarɔ makra m, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro jɩ ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ, Woso ɩ lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ. A zarɔ wɔɔ ku ŋ y'a ʊ lɛɛ kʊ n nɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩhɔ ma zaasʊm ma bɩ ra. Wɔɔ bɩ toore yɩm dɩɩtaa k'ʊ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro mim dɩnda fasɩ y.
Pɛɛracɛ bɩ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ cɩncɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ biyəə kan a bɩncɛ kɩ, mannɩbənno wɔɔ nɩ gasʊm cɛ bɩ nɔ lɛɛkarɛ hɔ b'ʊ dɔmɩm biyəə ŋn'a zi bam.

Bɩ, cɛ nɔ hɩɩyazaa bɩ, mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ y'a deem taan… nɩ gasʊm b'ʊ, dɔɔraa nɔ ʊ gallɛm deem. Gasʊ an nawʊm b'ʊ hɔbɩsɩ hɩɩya ma m k'a ka Woso ʊ, k'a a mɩŋŋa mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, kan Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ y'a ba badɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ sugur yɩrɛ kɩ.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay naa, ŋ sa Sɛnt-Ɛspri ʊ k'a hɩnka wɔɔ m a ʊ, kʊ cɛ nɔ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ gɔɔta an ta ʊ, zaa ba ʊ cɩna gʊɔɔ n nɩ gasʊm Woso taʊrɛ bɩncɛ b'ʊ y.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɩ hɔ k'an ta ʊ her-her naa hɩnkam. Ŋ jɩ ʊ k'a hɩ a ʊ, ganwʊrɛrɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ nɩ ŋ kam Woso ʊ kan hɔbɩsɩrɔ mannɩrɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋn'a ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ kam nɔ wɔɔ heer hu n bɔ y.
Hɔɔ wɔɔ duro haay, hɔbɩrɛ kan hɔmire kɩ bankarɛ kan wɔɔ zɩɩfʊrɔ hɔbɩrɛ zaarɔ kɩ, ŋn'a dɩnda gʊɔɔ m. Durnya naa zibəə hɔɔ m. Nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ tolle ba ŋnɩ dɔmɩm kʊ Woso hɔ haay lʊr ʊ bɩ ku.

Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, Krista bʊr, mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m, a ɩ bʊr hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ her lɔ nɔɔm m. Cɛ k'a n'a zi bɩ baŋ ʊ bɩ gore kan a mɩŋŋabaa kɩ lɛ da biisi pɛɛracɛ bɩ m. Gʊɔɔ bɛɛ cɛ bɩ do dɔ y, durnya naa hɔ bɛɛ y.

Krista k'a gasʊ lɛɛ kʊ Woso n ta ʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a n gasʊ bɔnsannɔ kan dinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ kɩ ma nɩ y. Gasʊ a ʊ b'ʊ a mɩŋŋa ma m gallɛm deem taan… dɔmɩm haay tɔ ma. Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, an bʊmbɔrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ yɩ an a ka wɔɔ ʊ.

Biisi bɩ, bɔnsannɔ kan ŋʊannɔ kɩ n nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ m, ŋn'ɩ zullur zɛm sɔ ŋn'a dam sɛ rɛ, ŋnɩ ma bɩ, kan zullur bɩ suu bɩ kɩ sarɛ, ŋn'a zɩnzaasʊm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ kʊrɔmarɔ ba, a minkəm bɩ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ hu bɔ yɩnnɩbayɩrɔ wɔɔ mim nɔ ʊ.

K'a ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, hɔbɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ ma a da ma an gʊɔɔ hu bɔ, k'a maam, Krista ma b'ɩ lɛ da haay. A a mɩŋŋa ka Woso ʊ amba mannɩ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da bɩ m, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'an mɩsɩr dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ bɩ paŋŋa m. A ma b'ɩ wɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ sʊrgɔm, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ minno kʊ ŋ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ba y. Kʊ wɔɔ n Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ zi ba.

Krista k'a naa ba bɩ y'a ka, an a ba gʊɔɔ kan Woso kɩ zɛkʊrazaa, gʊaasɩbabaa daa a a cɩnta ŋ bire ʊ. A ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bir lɔ wɔɔ n hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyarɛ ba ʊ, Woso nɩ ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ yɩ, kʊ gʊaa ga bɩ tɔ ma m, Krista m. A zɛ b'ɩ gʊɔɔ yɔm mimbʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba, gʊaasɩbabaa gusire bɩ zuure dɔmɩm ʊ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʊ.
Kʊ gʊaa ci ba an a hɔnta jirle zaa hɩnka, kʊ n a jir a zɛ jɛ ʊ, hɔnta bɩ b'a dam ma an jir k'a zaa bɩ bɛɛ ga y.
Bala, k'a zaa bɩ n ga, ci k'a ba bɩ nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ y, bɩ k'a zaa bɩ bɩ ga, ci bɩ nyɔɔdʊ ta ʊ kɛɛrɛ.
Naa y'a ka, lɛɛkarɛ gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, an yɩ pakra kʊ ma n nyɩnta ʊ, kʊ gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ n a dɔ an a zi ba.

Biisi bɩ, lɛɛ Moyiisi a ka, an lɛrɔ kʊ Woso a ka bɩ pa da haay Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m. A n bɔkarɛ an *hizɔp gɔ sa, serka piinə n ta ma, an a nyɔɔ dinnyɛɛnnyɩnɔ kan bɔnsannɔ kɩ ma ma, kan hi kɩ, an a zaasʊ lɛrɔ ci bɩ ma, kan gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ ma haay.
A n a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ma naa do n'a kam Woso nɩ gʊaasɩbabaa darɛ awɔɔ ma. Woso lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n ta a lɛ ra gʊaasɩbabaa bɩ nɔ ʊ.»
Moyiisi ma zaasʊ pɛɛracɛ bɩ ma sɔ, kan yaa bɩ darɛ mɔdrɔ wɔɔ haay kɩ ma.
Lɛrɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ, pakra m kʊ n nɩ ma sa n nɩ hɔ gʊta hu bɔ m. Bɩ, kʊ ma n a lo sɔ, Woso bɩ gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur karɛ ŋ ʊ y.
Hɔɔ nɔɔn duro, hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ arzana ʊ bɩ makrarɔ m, b'a yɩ pakra kʊ n nɩ ŋ hu bɔ amba wɔɔ yɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, arzana hɔɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ lɛ taa mannɩrɔ kʊ ŋ mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da fasɩ ma.
Bala, pɛɛracɛ kʊ gʊɔɔ a ba bɩ bɛɛ Krista gasʊ ʊ y, pɛɛracɛ bɩ do bɩ, lɛɛ kʊ Woso n ta ʊ paan… bɩ makra m. Krista bɩ, gasʊ a ʊ arzana ʊ, lɛɛ kʊ Woso n ta ʊ b'ʊ, an nɩ b'ʊ wɔɔ tɔ ma.

Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ, gasʊ a tɩr a ʊ Woso taʊrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ b'ʊ gallɛm deem dɔɔraa biyəə nɔ ʊ, hɔbɩsɩ ma m. Bɩ kʊ Krista nɩ, a n gasʊ Woso zi k'a mɩŋŋa ba mannɩ gallɛm hɔka y. A mɩŋŋa ka a ʊ vugur.

K'a bɛɛ y'a ba ncɩnaaʊ, pakra m k'an fɩr yɩ gallɛm hɔka an a sa durnya sɩŋŋɩda ma, an lee kum her la. Bɩ, bʊr a ʊ, gallɛm deem taan… biisi dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn nyarɛ ma, an b'a mɩŋŋa ka mannɩ, k'a mimbʊnyaa zaar ba.
Pakra m kʊ gʊaa biyəə n ga gallɛm deem taan…, bɩ jɛ ʊ, Woso n a zaa dʊdɔ ka.

Ncɩnaaʊ m sɔ, Krista n a mɩŋŋa ka mannɩ, an ga gallɛm deem taan… k'a gʊɔɔ gʊta mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊ ŋ ma. A y'a yarɛ an bʊr, k'a bɩ bʊr, mimbʊnyaarɔ bɛɛ an nɩ zɛm k'a b'a gʊ gʊɔɔ ma y, zɛ an nawʊm k'a bɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩm dam nɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ.

Moyiisi lɛrɔ wɔɔ, hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka wɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ŋnɩ ŋ hɩnkam, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ y. Mannɩrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ bam tee… rɔ wɔɔ hɔdeem, ŋnɩ ŋ bam dɔɔraa biyəə, ŋ barɛ nyarɛ ba ʊ y, bɩ, ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ba tɩrga y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ yaa bɩ do dam Woso m nɔ wɔɔ, kʊ yaa bɩ do darɛ ɩ wɔ ʊ, an ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊ ŋ ma fasɩ, ŋ b'a yarɛ ŋn'a heer kɔ ŋ ʊ a mimbʊnyaa ba y, bɩ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ barɛ nyam sɔ.
Sɩra nɔ ʊ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ bɩ, gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ an nɩ ŋ tɔ darɛ ŋ nɔ ʊ dɔɔraa biyəə.
Bala, ŋʊannɔ kan bɔnsannɔ kɩ ma b'a dam ma fɩɩga an gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊ ŋ ma y.
Naa y'a ka, Krista k'a bʊr durnya ʊ bɩ, an a hɩ Woso m, a ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mannɩ ma, bɩ ganwʊrɛ nɩ y, bɩ y'a ka ɩbɩɩ n mɛsim ka mɔɔ ʊ.
Hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ dam sɛ rɛ k'a ŋ ka ɩ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bɩr ɩbɩɩ nɔ yɩrɛ y, mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ bɩr ɩbɩɩ nɔ yɩm sɔ y.
Naa tɔ ma m mɔɔ n a hɩ, m ʊ,
Woso ra, mɔɔ ba n nɩ, zɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ m b'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba,
amba hɔ kʊ n y'a gʊrsɩra ba mɔɔ mim bɩncɛ ʊ lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Lɛɛ a ka an a hɩ a ʊ:
Ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mannɩrɔ ma,
b'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa ganwʊrɛrɔ ma y,
ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa hɔbɩsɩrɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ da sɛ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y,
b'ɩbɩɩ lɛ baa mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩrɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ y, ɩbɩɩ bɩr ŋ ŋʊarɛ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ a ga m, lɛrɔ ci bɩ nɔ ʊ.
A n a ya an a na ma, a ʊ:
Woso ra, mɔɔ ba n nɩ, zɛ mɔɔ nawʊm kʊ m b'ɩ hɔɔnhɔ ba.
Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, Woso n biisi mannɩrɔ wɔɔ haay ci zɛ, an Krista mannɩ bɩ sompi ŋ yaa ʊ.
Kʊ Yeezuu Krista Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba, an a mɩŋŋa sa an a ba mannɩ gallɛm deem taan… bɩ y'a ka, wɔɔ n'ʊ ba tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ mannɩbənno wɔɔ, jɩm ŋ nawʊm dɔmɩm biyəə ŋn'a zi bɩ bam, ŋnɩ mannɩrɔ deem-deem nɔ wɔɔ bam, an bɔkarɛ mannɩrɔ wɔɔ duro b'a dam ma fɩɩga ŋnɩ gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊ ŋ ma y.
Bɩ kʊ Krista nɩ, mannɩ deem taan… a a ba gʊɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma, mannɩ naa do barɛ nyɔɔdʊ bɩr nyam fɩɩga y, bɩ jɛ ʊ an ta an aa nyɩnta cirbəə nɔ ʊ Woso jɩr ʊ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, dɔ a nawʊm ma, kʊ Woso n a jɩnnɔ da a wɔ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ nɩ, mannɩ deem taan… tɔ ma, an a ka gʊɔɔ k'a ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ sʊrgɔ ŋ ma rɔ wɔɔ n a ba tɩrga fasɩ dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri ɩ naa hɩm wɔɔ m paan… denter. Bala, a y'a hɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, a ʊ:
Zuuba y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ,
gʊaasɩbabaa kʊ mɔɔ n n'a darɛ ŋ ma dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔn jɛ ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ,
mɔɔ yɩ ŋ lɛrɔ wɔɔ darɛ ŋ heer ʊ, m a gʊrsɩra ba ŋ hɔɔn ʊ.
A n a ya an a na ma, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ bɩ ŋ mimbʊnyaarɔ kan ŋ kʊrɔmarɔ kɩ tɔ darɛ m nɔ ʊ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, kʊ Woso mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka bɩ, a n a ga m dɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ n mannɩ ba k'a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ heer kookoo kɛɛrɛ k'ʊ gasʊ lɛɛ kʊ Woso n ta ʊ b'ʊ, Yeezuu ma bɩ mannɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
A pɛɛra k'a ta Woso taʊrɛ bɩncɛ bɩ rɛ bɩ kaansʊ kʊ wɔɔ n gasʊ. A zaa daa gʊ wɔɔ m, zaa mɩsɩr m. Pɛɛra k'a kaansʊ bɩ, a mɩŋŋa mɛ bɩ m.
Wɔɔ ɩ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ m, a m Wosocɛ bɩ nyasʊm minzaa.
K'a maam, k'ʊ ʊ zɔ Woso ma kan ʊ heer kɩ haay, heerkoodəbaa m sɩrakarɛ denter nɔ ʊ, heer kʊ zi bʊnyaa haay bɔ ʊ Yeezuu ma tɔ ma, kan mɛ k'a sʊrgɔrɛ yɩ hi mɩŋŋa m kɩ.
Ʊ taaheerlɛ kʊ wɔɔ n ta m, ʊ n'a pa dam bɩ nyasʊ kɔɔkɔɔ, bala, wɔɔ dɔ denter m, ʊ ʊ, hɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ ler bɔ wɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, a yɩ ŋ kam wɔɔ ʊ.
Ʊ bɩr ʊ dam kʊ han, zi mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋʊarɛ kan ŋ barɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Ʊ b'ʊ gʊ ʊ sokʊmarɔ tarɛ ma y, ʊ bɩ yɩ am gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ kʊ ŋ minkə yarlɛ n nɔ wɔɔ nɩ y. Bɩ, an ta ʊ bɩ, ʊ bɩr kʊ heer yom, ʊ bɩr a barɛ ncɩnaaʊ, bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Zuuba dɔmɩm y'a zɔm.
Bala, kʊ wɔɔ sɩra dɔ, ʊ tɔ ka, ʊ ʊ gu ʊ nɩ mimbʊnyaa barɛ, mannɩ vanta ba ʊ dɔ an nɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊm wɔɔ ma y.
Kʊ wɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ, hɔ k'a gɔɔta wɔɔ m bɩ, nyibəə wɔɔ nɩ ba n bɩr a nɔ ʊ, ʊ bɩr dɔm mim k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm bɩ ma, mim bɩ do bɩ, dʊdɔyarlɛ k'a nɩ wɔɔ yɩm, ʊ gasʊ sɛ gʊta k'a nɩ Woso jɩnnɔ bɩm bɩ m.
Kʊ gʊaa bɩsɩ ka Moyiisi lɛ bɩ ma, a bɩsɩ bɩ karɛ kasɛtɩzannɔ n ta ʊ hɩɩya, gɛɛ kaakʊ, a zaa bɩ zɛ n nawʊm gər, cicirzɛrɛ ba ʊ y.

Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa Woso Nyɩ bɩ gore bɔ ʊ, bɩ zaa n a ga fɩryɩrɛ m an lɛ da ra? Bala, naa zaa bɩ, dɩga a ʊ, ma kʊ Woso a sa an gʊaasɩbabaa da an a mɩŋŋa sʊrgɔ m bɩ ma hɔnɩbɩr. Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a nɩ barka kam wɔɔ ʊ b'a n'a sʊnsɔ wʊm sɔ.
Bala, wɔɔ Woso k'a hɩ, a ʊ: ‹Mɔɔ nɩ zɩm bɔm, mɔɔ n'a sompim gʊaa n'ʊ› bɩ dɔ. A a hɩ sɔ a ʊ: ‹Zuuba y'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ kam.›
Kʊ Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ gʊaa ku, k'a dʊdɔ ka, a yɩrɛ a zaa ma kʊsɩ maam-maam.
Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ biisi, a sɩrakarɛ daa baa ma, a Woso lɛɛgure yɩ, a fɩr yɩ gʊta, a a gu a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ zoo bɩ barɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ tɩr awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊ, ŋnɩ fɩr ka awɔɔ ma gʊɔɔ gaa ʊ, awɔɔ tɩr a dam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩrɛ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ rɔ wɔɔ han.
Awɔɔ kɔ, gʊɔɔ kʊ n yɩ ŋ du Krista tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ minto, gʊɔɔ awɔɔ hɔnta yɔ awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n yɛ a to kan heernyɔɔ kɩ. Bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ ɩ hɔnta k'a mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da bɩ m, bɩ nyarɛ ba ʊ y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a bɩ heerkoodəbaa k'awɔɔ n ta m sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ bɩ to y, awɔɔ zɛm bɩ ganwʊrɛ gʊta yɩ.
Pakra m k'awɔɔ n bʊr a ma k'a a da ma, a hɔ k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ba, k'a hɔ k'a ler bɔ bɩ yɩ.
Naa y'a ka Wosoci bɩ n a hɩ, a ʊ:
A gɔɔta poore, poore tɔkkɛ,
gʊaa k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ n bʊr,
a bɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ y.
Bɩ, gʊaa k'an tɩrga mɔɔ mɩm ʊ bɩ, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba a nawʊm sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, k'a zaa a bɔ a jɛ m, mɔɔ heer bɩ yɩm nyɩnta kan kɩ dɔ y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ tɩr a bɔ a jɛ m, ŋnɩ nyaam nɔ wɔɔ bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ y. Sɩra wɔɔ n'a kam, ʊ nyiro wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ tɔ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ bɩ, kasɛtɩ m gʊaa n ta m a heer ʊ, a ʊ, a hɔ k'a ta a heer lɛ bɩ yɩm, an a dɔ paan… a heer ʊ a ʊ, hɔ k'a bɩr yɩm mɩm m bɩ ta ʊ denter.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta biisi rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Woso nɔ ŋ yɩ ŋ la.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka wɔɔ n a dɔ ʊ ʊ, Woso ɩ durnya da a lemim m. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, hɔ k'a nɩ yɩm mɩm m haay naa, a to a ʊ hɔ kʊ mɩm bɩr a yɩm nɔ ʊ.

Abɛl sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an mannɩ k'a mɩŋŋabaa cem Kayɛn hɔ han ba an a ka Woso ʊ. A sɩra bɩ karɛ y'a ka Woso n a hɩ a ʊ, a tɩrga a mɩm ʊ, bala, Woso mɩŋŋa yɛ a ganwʊrɛrɔ wɔɔ ma. Abɛl ga, bɩ, a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma bɩ, a gɔɔta an nɩ meer bam.
Enɔk sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Woso n a busu a zi, b'a n ga y. Gʊɔɔ n a ka ma bɩ ŋ n a yɩ y, kʊ Woso a busu a zi bɩ tɔ ma. Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩrɛ a ʊ, kʊ Woso n bɔkarɛ an Enɔk busu a zi bɩ, Woso nɔ yɩ ra.
Woso nɔ b'a dam ma an yɩ gɔsɩ ra, k'a zaa n sɩra ka y. Bala, gʊaa k'a n'a zɔm Woso ma b'a ga m an sɩra ka a ʊ Woso ta ʊ, an sɩra ka sɔ a ʊ, Woso gan wʊm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n a kam ma k'a a dɔ rɔ wɔɔ ma.

Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Nowee n zu hɔ kʊ Woso a hɩ m b'ʊ. Minno kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ ba rɔ wɔɔ a lɛɛ ka an a hɩ m. Nowee n hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, b'a gu an zu hɔ kʊ Woso a hɩ b'ʊ. A kɔɔlʊʊ gʊta ba an gasʊ ʊ kan a hargʊɔɔ kɩ, ŋnɩ bɔlɛm yɩ. Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, an a hɩnka a ʊ, a zamaana gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bʊnyaa, a sɩra bɩ karɛ tɔ ma, Woso n dɩga a gʊaa tɩrga.
Woso k'a Abraham bir bɩ, sɩrakarɛ y'a ka, an yɛ Woso ma, an ta tara kʊ Woso n'a kaŋ ʊ k'an yɩ a hɔjirle bɩ ra. A n a hʊr a kʊ b'ʊ, b'a n a dɔ kʊ ta a nawʊm ka y.
A sɩra bɩ karɛ y'a ka an nyɩnta kʊ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ m b'ʊ, am saana hɔ bɩ m. Nyɩnta a ʊ pɛɛracɛrɔ ʊ, Izakkɩ kan Zakɔɔb kɩ nyɩnta pɛɛracɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ sɔ. Lerbɔrɛ deem-deem bɩ Woso a bɔ brɔɔ m.
Bala, Abraham bɩ, dɔ a nawʊm kʊ k'a jɩr paŋŋa n ta ʊ bɩ ma, k'a nyɩnta ʊ. Woso mɩŋŋa n kʊ bɩ do dɔrɛzaa.
Abraham sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an wɔ ʊ an nyɩ yɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, a gusi an cem nyɩyɩrɛ dɔmɩm han, a lʊ Saara maam sɔ. Bɩ, a a gu an sɩra ka a ʊ, Woso hɔ k'a ler bɔ a m bɩ bam.
Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, gʊaa deem taan… naa tɔ ma, baa k'a gusi an a zɔ zɛ ma bɩ, yaŋŋɔɔ n nyɩnta ʊ gʊta, am monyaarɔ hɔ bɩ m, am nyɩntaayaa k'a nɩ higʊta lɛ ra bɩ m.

Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay, gɩnga ŋ y'a ʊ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ. Ŋ n hɔɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ bɩ yɩ y, bɩ, ŋ y'a to ŋnɩ hɔɔ wɔɔ duro yɩ laatʊ, ŋn'a heer nyɔɔ ŋ tɔ ma, ŋn'a hɩ ŋ ʊ, saanɔɔ n'a mɩ, bɩ zaakʊrɛzannɔ n'a mɩ sɔ tara burə ʊ naa ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ meer barɛ ncɩnaaʊ rɔ wɔɔ, a hɩnka ŋ nawʊrɛ ŋ ʊ, a ka a nawʊrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ma.
Kʊ kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kʊrkʊr n ta ŋ nɩ, ŋ toore yɩrɛ ŋn'a bɔ ŋnɩ ta ŋ ʊ.
Bɩ, ncɩnaaʊ bɛɛ y, a ka ŋ nawʊm kʊ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da ma, arzana ŋn'a kam ma. Naa tɔ ma nɩ, nyannɩ bɩr Woso zɛm kʊ n ŋ bir a gʊɔɔ y, bala, a kʊ banka, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ nyɩnta ʊ.

Abraham sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an yɛ k'a Izakkɩ zɛ Woso m mannɩ, dɔmɩm kʊ Woso a ka lɛɛ k'a dɩga ma bɩ ma. Woso mɩŋŋa ɩ ler bɔ Abraham m k'a nyɩ ka ʊ, an bɔkarɛ Abraham yɛ zɔɔ-zɔɔ k'a nyɩ deem taan… bɩ ka ʊ mannɩ.
Woso nyɩnta an a hɩ m, a ʊ:
Izakkɩ n nɩ yaŋŋɔɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ler bɔ ɩbɩɩ m nɔ wɔɔ yɩm.
A dɔ Abraham ʊ a heer ʊ a ʊ, Woso ɩ paŋŋa m k'a Izakkɩ mɩm bɔ ʊ, denter sɔ, Woso a ya an Izakkɩ ka Abraham ʊ ɩ ʊ, a mɩm a a bɔ ʊ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Izakkɩ n Zakɔɔb kan Eso kɩ barka da ʊ ŋ booti mim nɔ ʊ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m sɔ, Zakɔɔb zɛ k'a b'a zɔ bɩ, a Zozɛf nyɩnɔ wɔɔ barka da ʊ. A n yo a bənkə ma an zerga, an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka, Zozɛf n Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ bɔ Eziptɩ ʊ bɩ mim hɩ, bɩ ma bɩ, a garɛ a zɔ. A n a hɩ ŋ nɩ kʊ ŋ n'a yaarɔ gʊr, ŋnɩ bɔ ŋ nɩ bɔrɛ bɩ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Moyiisi zɩrɔ wɔɔ n a nyaakʊm da a yɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, mom bam kaakʊ. Dɩga kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ nyɩ bɩ gʊɛrɛ ma bɩ y'a ka, ŋ n nyi ba cir bɩ lɛ k'a ka bɩ bɩsɩ ka ma nɩ y.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Moyiisi k'a b'a ba gʊaa burgu bɩ, a n yɛ kʊ ŋ n'a bir Farawɔn nyɩmbʊɛɛrɛ nyɩ y.
A yɛ k'a fɩr yɩ kan Woso dogʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ, an a gu mim bʊnyaa heernyɔɔ k'a nɩ cenim bɩ ma.
A dɔ a ʊ a heer ʊ, a ʊ, k'ɩ fɩr yɩ amba Krista nɩ, a nyɔɔdʊ ta ʊ an lɛ da Eziptɩ hɔnta haay yɩrɛ m. Bala, dɩga a nawʊm ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a ka a gʊɔɔ ʊ bɩ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Moyiisi n a hʊr Eziptɩ kʊ b'ʊ, a n nyi ba cir bɩ nɔmaa nɩ y, an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, amba gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso kʊ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a yɩ a mɩm m bɩ yɩm.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka an pakkɩ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ ba, an a hɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ m kʊ ŋ nɩ ma zaasʊ a hallɛrɔ, kan a sɩgarɔ kɩ ma, kʊ zɛ malɛɛka bɩ bɩ Israyɛl lɛɛkarɛ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ y.
Sɩrakarɛ y'a ka Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n bra higʊta piinə bɩ ma, a tara n gər. Bɩ, Eziptɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ k'a bra ma sɔ bɩ, hi bɩ nɩ ŋ bɩ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Zeriko pəŋŋəro wɔɔ n a dɩnda, Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr ma dɔmɩm saanhɩna bɩ tɔ ma.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, Rahab n ga kan bɩsɩkawosomazannɔ wɔɔ kɩ y, a yɛ an dundolɛɛzizannɔ wɔɔ si a har ʊ an a mɩŋŋa ba ŋ nɩ.
M ya m bɔ hɩ? Toore ba ʊ mɔɔ nɩ Zedenyɔɔ mim dɩndarɛ y, kan Barakkɩ hɔ kɩ, Samsɔn kɩ, Zɛfte kɩ, Davɩd kɩ, Sanwɛl kɩ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ hɔ kɩ y.
Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ wɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ yar ba ŋn'a so kʊrɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ tɩrgabaa zi ba, ŋnɩ hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ yɩ. Ŋ n'a ka poozannɔ n wɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ bɩ y.
Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ sɛrɔ gʊtɔɔ lihi, gʊɔɔ n a ŋʊa k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ hɛnnɔ m, ŋnɩ bɔ lɛ m. Ŋ nyɩnta paŋŋawar nɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩ paŋŋa yɩ, ŋ nyɩnta yarbənno wɩsɩrɔ, ŋnɩ bʊr kʊrɔ vantɔɔ yarbənno ra, brɔɔ n a si.

Lannɔ niŋŋoo sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩngarɔ a mɩm bɔ ʊ. Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ fɩr yɩ, ŋnɩ gɩnga sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, ŋ n yɛ ŋn'a bɔ a taa m k'a bɩ ga y, a ba ŋ y'a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, k'a wɔ ʊ, a mɩmbɔʊrɛ k'an mɩŋŋa an lɛ da yɩ.
Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ n yɛ gʊɔɔ n yaa wʊ ŋ ma, ŋnɩ ŋ zɛ mawʊr m, ŋnɩ nɔɔrɔ kʊsɩ baŋŋarɔ m, ŋnɩ ŋ du.

Ŋ gɔsɩnnɔ bɩmba jaarɔ m, ŋnɩ ŋ meeyaa bɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ gɔsɩnnɔ zɛ kumbir sii m, gɛɛ ŋnɩ zɛ kargʊ m. Sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m nɔɔrɔ n kʊrɔ cɛ ma, ŋn'a dam lɛɛ zi, seero ci gɛɛ biiro ciro ɩ nyɩnta ŋ huuro, ŋnɩ ŋʊazaabaa nɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ nɩ nyannɩ darɛ ŋ ma, ŋn'ɩ fɩr karɛ ŋ ma.

A n bɔkarɛ gʊɔɔ wɩsɩrɔ m Woso mɩm ʊ, durnya naa do gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n a ga m kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro n nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ y. Ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma m, ŋ ba lɛɛ nɩ y, ŋn'ɩ poo sam kan ciro gaa kɩ, ŋn'ɩ wʊtam yaarɔ ʊ kan ciro yaarɔ kɩ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay, Woso nɔ nyɔɔ ŋ la ŋ sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma. A n bɔkarɛ ŋ n hɔ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ ŋ nɩ bɩ yɩ y.
Bala, Woso hɔ mɩŋŋa k'a lɛ da hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɔɔn dam ma bɩ cɩnta k'a b'a ba wɔɔ m, a ŋʊa a ʊ k'a ka kʊ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro kan wɔɔ kɩ, k'ʊ b'ʊ dakʊ ʊ, ʊ yɩ amba Woso n lɛ n taa kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ bɩ m fasɩ.

Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro haay kʊ ŋ sɩra ka Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, kasɛtɩzannɔ m, ŋnɩ bɩr wɔɔ ma. Ʊ mɔr haay k'a nɩ wɔɔ tarɛ dam jɩm ʊ bɩ to, kan mimbʊnyaa k'a n'a som wɔɔ ʊ zɔɔ-zɔɔ bɩ kɩ. K'ʊ gɔɔta ʊ ta lɛɛ tee… hɔ kʊ Woso ʊ wɔɔ n a ba bɩ nɔ ʊ k'an ta an a nyarɛ ku.

Ʊ ʊ mɩm ka Yeezuu zi, a m wɔɔ sɩra bɩ karɛ sɩŋŋɩda kan a nyambʊrlɛ kɩ. A yɛ n n a zɛ gɔdarkʊra ma, a n nyannɩ zɛ k'a ga gɔdarkʊra ma y, bala, dɩga an nawʊm heernyɔɔ niŋŋə k'a nɩ zɛm ba yɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, nyɩnta an nawʊm Woso jɩr ʊ cirbəə nɔ ʊ.
K'a a hɔɔn da ma a dɩga a, a yɛ an fɩr yɩ mimbʊnyaabənno wɔ ʊ, k'a a hɔɔn da ma denter k'a b'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to heerzar nɔ ʊ, a paŋŋa n a da y.
Bala, zoo k'awɔɔ n'a bam kan mimbʊnyaa kɩ bɩ, awɔɔ n a ba cɩna an wɔ ʊ a n awɔɔ meeyaa bɔ ʊ y.
Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m, meerbaarɔ k'a ŋ ba k'awɔɔ heer yo bɩ, ŋ tɔ ba awɔɔ nɔ ʊ ra? A a hɩ, a ʊ:
M nyɩnnɩ, ɩ bɩ hʊnhʊrlɛ kʊ Zuuba n'a karɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ bɩ ba hɔnɩbɩr y,
ɩ b'ɩ heer zar sɔ ɩ bɔ k'a nawʊm zaa ʊ bɩ tɔ ma y.
Bala, gʊaa kʊ Zuuba a ŋʊa bɩ,
bɩ zaa an n'a hʊnhʊrm,
gʊaa k'a nɩ dɩgam ma a nyɩ bɩ,
bɩ zaa an nɩ mawʊr soŋ ʊ.
K'a yɛ fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm bɩ ma, ɩ ʊ, hʊnhʊrlɛ m. Bala, awɔɔ fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, Woso ɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ ma a nyɩnɔ. Nyɩ ka n ta ʊ, a zɩ bɩr a hʊnhʊrlɛ?
K'awɔɔ bɩr hʊnhʊrlɛ yɩrɛ amba a nyɩnɔ haay n'a yɩm bɩ nɩ, k'a maam, a nyɩnɔ paan…rɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y, gʊsɩmarɔ n'awɔɔ m.
Ʊ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ zɩrɔ n'a bam wɔɔ m bɩ tɔ da ʊ nɔ ʊ, wɔɔ hʊnhʊr ŋ nawʊm, wɔɔ nɩ ŋ da ŋ ʊ. Bɩ, wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ yɛ ʊ Zɩ Woso ma an lɛ da, maam bɩ a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ kam wɔɔ ʊ.
Wɔɔ zɩrɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ hʊnhʊr ŋ nawʊm dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ bala, amba a a ga m ŋ hɔɔn ʊ bɩ m. Bɩ, Woso bɩ, wɔɔ hʊnhʊr an nawʊm k'a wɔɔ banka kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ amba a mɩŋŋa m.

Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm, wɔɔ heer tɩr a zaar ba fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, heernyɔɔ ba ʊ y. Bɩ, k'a bɩ maasɩrɛ ba fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔ dɩnda fɩr bɩ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ y'a nyɔɔdʊ yɩm, laafɩɩ m kan mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga kɩ.
Awɔɔ kɔ kan Woso hɔɔnhɔ bɩ barɛ kɩ, k'a a ya, a bɩr a bam paan…, a b'a to y, awɔɔ kɔ kan mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ kɩ, k'a banka a ta lɛɛ kan kɩ.
K'a zaarɔ tɩrgɔɔ sa, kʊ gʊaa k'a n'a bam k'a do bɩ b'a do y, bɩ k'a n'a banka an jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ.
K'a a tɔ ʊ, a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan gʊaa woo… kɩ. A bɩr mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam, bala, kʊ gʊaa bɩr mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ barɛ a bɩ Zuuba yɩrɛ y.
K'a dundo a zi k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ b'a do Woso barka bɩ ma y. K'a dundo a zi k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gɔnyim kʊsɩ kɩ y. Kʊ n bɛɛ m a lɛɛ warm kʊ ma an a kʊsɩrabaa bɩ da gʊɔɔ gʊta ma.
Gɔsɩ bɩ yɩ jaandər
awɔɔ barla, b'a bɩ yɩ Woso hɔɔ gore bɔʊrɛzaa am Eso hɔ bɩ nɩ y. Bɩ yɛ an a jɩtambaa hɔjirle hɛɛ a dam han k'an hɔbɩrɛ ka a ʊ poore k'a bɩ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, maasɩrɛ k'a bɩ ba bɩ, a a ŋʊa k'a zɩ n a barka da ʊ, bɩ n a gu. A n nyi ka k'a zɩ bɩ n a barka da ʊ ŋʊɩɩ…, k'an bɩ kɩ haay, an wɔ ʊ an hɔ k'a ba bɩ lʊr y.

K'a dɔ a ʊ, bɩncɛ k'awɔɔ n ta ʊ Woso taa naa, a do bɛɛ m Israyɛl gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta Sinayii ci jɩr ʊ, ŋ n a da ma, ŋn'a wɔ da ma bɩ nɩ y. Sɛ wurə ɩ nyɩnta ci bɩ ma, monsigə n bɩr ma bidə, kan hɩnhɛr gʊta kɩ.
Ŋ huure kan leer kɩ ma b'ʊ. Israyɛl gʊɔɔ wɔɔ kʊ ŋ leer bɩ do ma bɩ, ŋ n a ŋʊa k'a a ya a tʊr ka ma y.
Bala, ŋ n wɔ ʊ ŋnɩ lɛ kʊ leer b'a cɩnta naa do si y. Leer b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Gʊaa k'a n'a nɔm ci bɩ ma bɩ,
baa kʊ hɔbɩsɩ m,
a zaa bɩmba n nawʊm jaarɔ m an ga.
Hɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a yɩ b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ŋ da bɔ ʊ gʊta, baa Moyiisi mɩŋŋa, nyibəə a nyasʊ an kɔ an a hɩ, a ʊ: «Nyibəə ɩ mɔɔ zɛm, mɔɔ mɛ nɩ hinkəm maam-maam.»
Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, a zɔ awɔɔ ʊ *Siyɔn ci bɩ ma, Woso k'an mɩsɩr bɩ kʊ bɩ awɔɔ a zɔ ma, arzana Zerizalɛm bɩ m, kan a malɛɛkarɔ tisi-tisi rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Woso lɛɛkarɛ nyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ heernyɔɔ bam nɔ wɔɔ awɔɔ a zɔ ŋ ma, Woso brɔɔ tɔrɔ gʊrsɩra ba arzana ʊ. A zɔ awɔɔ ʊ Woso ma, a m gʊɔɔ haay dʊdɔkər, a zɔ awɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ kʊ Woso a ka ŋnɩ yɩ amba a lɛ n taa rɔ wɔɔ ma fasɩ.
A zɔ awɔɔ ʊ Yeezuu ma, a m gʊaasɩbabaa daa bɩ zɛkʊrazaa, a zɔ awɔɔ ʊ a ma zaasʊrɛ
bɩ ma, a ma bɩ nɩ mimbʊnyaa gʊm gʊɔɔ ma, an nɩ meer bam wɔɔ daahan tɔ ma, an lɛ da Abɛl ma bɩ ra.

Naa minto bɩ, k'a dundo a zi. Woso k'a nɩ meer bam kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ, a b'a tʊr ta a meerbaa bɩ rɛ y. Awɔɔ yaabɔɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ŋn'a tʊr ta a zaa k'a nɩ ŋ bɔm zaa ʊ tara burə ʊ bɩ meerbaa bɩ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ, Woso y'a to brama an nɩ wɔɔ bɔm zaa ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ tʊr ta a meerbaa bɩ rɛ, ʊ ʊ gu ma, wɔɔ fɩr yɩm an lɛ da paan….
Biisi bɩ, Woso bɩ leer a ka tara n hinkə, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a ler bɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ yɩ m yarɛ m tara hinkə,
bɩ, bɩ bɛɛ nɩ yɩrɛ a deem nɩ y,
mɔɔ brama hinkəm sɔ.
K'a a hɩ a ʊ: «Mɔɔ yɩ m yam» bɩ, naa ʊ k'a hɩ, a ʊ, hɔɔ k'a ŋ da ŋnɩ hinkəm nɔ wɔɔ hinkəre ŋnɩ nyaam, kʊ hɔɔ kʊ ŋ b'a dam ma ŋnɩ hinkə rɔ wɔɔ n gɔɔta ŋnɩ bɩr ta ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ yɩ Woso barkadarɛzannɔ, k'a cirbəə kʊ k'a bɩ hinkəm ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ barka bɩ darɛ ba n nɩ: Ʊ bɩr Woso daŋ ʊ amba a a ŋʊa bɩ m, yɛ a lɛ ma nɔ ʊ, kan a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Bala, wɔɔ Woso bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan sɛ k'a nɩ bɩm kɩ. Hɔ k'a bɩr a nɔ yɩm bɩ zaar an n'a barɛ.
Kristagʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr kʊ ŋʊam tee…,
k'a bɩr saanɔɔ sim mɩŋŋa a hadrɔ ʊ, a bɩ naa tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ y. Bala, gʊɔɔ nyɩnta ŋnɩ naa ba, ŋnɩ malɛɛkarɔ si a hadrɔ ʊ bɩ ŋ n a dɔ ŋ ʊ, malɛɛkarɔ nɩ y.
K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʊ, lɔnnɔcɛ awɔɔ n ta ʊ kan ŋ kɩ. K'a bɩr a hɔɔn dam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ wɔɔ ma, ɩ ʊ, fɩr awɔɔ n'a yɩm sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.
Gʊaa haay n harcɩntarɛ gore da ʊ, gʊaa kan a lʊ kɩ n bɩr sɩra zi bam kan kʊ kɩ, ŋ bɩ jaan da y. Bala, Woso yɔɔdɩrbənno wɔɔ kan jaandənno wɔɔ kɩ dʊdɔ kam.
A bɩ busoo ŋʊa y, k'a zerga hɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ rɛ, bala, Woso a hɩ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ b'ɩbɩɩ tore y, bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ sɔ fɩɩga y.
Naa y'a ka wɔɔ n'ʊ dam ma ʊ a hɩ, ʊ ʊ:
Zuuba n mɔɔ daahanzaa, mɔɔ bɩ nyi bam hɔsɩ nɩ y.
Bɔ gʊaa n nɩ wɔŋ ʊ an a ba mɔɔ nɩ?

K'a gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ka awɔɔ lɛɛ biisi rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Woso lemim dɩnda awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ. K'a a hɔɔn da ŋ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ barɛ lɔɔ ma, kan ga kʊ ŋ y'a ʊ lʊnlɔ bɩ kɩ ma, k'a sɩra ka Woso ʊ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m.
Yeezuu Krista k'a nyɩnta lʊnlɔ jim bɩ, a maam her sɔ a gɔɔtam maam dɔmɩm haay.
A b'a to hɔdɩndarɛrɔ daarɔ do y'a hʊnhɔ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ y. Woso barka bɩ y'a da ma an paŋŋa ka wɔɔ heer ʊ, hɔbɩrɛrɔ bɩrɛ minno bɛɛ y. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ zu minno wɔɔ duro ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ n a nyɔɔdʊ yɩ y.
Zɩɩfʊrɔ wɔɔ mannɩbənno kʊ ŋ n'a zi barɛ ŋ Wosocɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ ba lɛ m k'a wɔɔ mannɩduu hɔ bɩ y.

Zɩɩfʊrɔ mannɩbər jɩtaarɛ bɩ, hɔbɩsɩrɔ k'a ŋ zɩnzɛ rɔ wɔɔ ma bɩ, ta an nawʊm nɩ Woso taʊrɛ bɩncɛ ʊ Wosocɛ ʊ b'ʊ, an n'a kam Woso ʊ k'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur ka ŋ ʊ. Bɩ, sɛ n n'a dam hɔbɩsɩrɔ wɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ rɛ kʊ bɩ bɔlɛɛma.
Naa y'a ka Yeezuu mɩŋŋa n bɩ ga kʊ bɩ bɔlɛɛma, k'a gʊɔɔ hu bɔ a ma bɩ m.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, ʊ bɔ ʊ ta zi amba a mɩŋŋa ga bɔlɛɛma bɩ m, ʊ b'ʊ gu y.
Bala, wɔɔ ba kʊ m tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, ʊ n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ dɔmɩm haay y. Ʊ ka wɔɔ nawʊm booti kʊ bɩ ma.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ʊ bɩr ʊ lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ tee… Yeezuu tɔ ma. Ʊ lɛ kʊ wɔɔ n'a bɔŋ ʊ bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, mannɩ wɔɔ n'a kaŋ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n'ʊ lɛ bɔŋ ʊ tee… bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a bɩr a bam kʊ m mɩŋŋa, a bɩr a dam kʊ han, a bɩ naa barɛ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ y. Bala, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, mannɩrɔ m, Woso yɩ ŋ ŋʊam.

K'a bɩr yɛm a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma, a bɩr hɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ awɔɔ m bɩ barɛ. Bala, dɔ ŋ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ ma dɔmɩm haay, kʊ Woso n nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ lar awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ mim ma bɩ y'a ka ŋn'a bam maam. K'awɔɔ ɩ zure ŋ lɛ ʊ, ŋ y'a zi bɩ bam kan heernyɔɔ kɩ. Kʊ n bɛɛ m, zi bɩ ba ŋ nawʊm kan heerzar kɩ, bɩ, naa b'a darɛ awɔɔ han fɩɩga y.
K'a gɔɔta a bɩr yaa dam wɔɔ tɔ ma. Wɔɔ dɔ paan…, ʊ ʊ, ʊ n a bʊnyaa ba y, bala, wɔɔ lɛ taa k'ʊ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam tee… hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm gʊta k'a yaa da mɔɔ tɔ ma, kʊ Woso n a ka kʊ m m bɔ m bʊr awɔɔ zi zɔɔ.

Bɩ, kʊ Woso k'a nɩ laafɩɩ kam bɩ n'awɔɔ barka da ʊ. Wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu n wɔɔ dundor gʊta, amba hɔbɩsɩrɔ dundor m, a ma k'a ka Woso ʊ am mannɩ hɔ bɩ m bɩ tɔ ma m. A ma bɩ tɔ ma m sɔ gʊaasɩbabaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ n ta ʊ. Woso a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ.

A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm k'an a ka k'awɔɔ n wɔ ʊ a hɔ haay k'an mɩŋŋa ba, maam bɩ, awɔɔ y'a hɔɔnhɔ barɛ. K'an a ka kʊ hɔ k'a nɔ yɩ haay n kʊ yɩ wɔɔ gʊr zi Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma. Bɩ kʊ Yeezuu Krista tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.
M danyɩnɔ, a yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm k'a a hɔɔn da meerbaarɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ nɔɔn ma kan bʊraama kɩ, a zu ŋ ʊ. Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ gʊrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma sɔ naa, a bɩ jintə y.
K'a dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ danyɩ Timote bɩ, n y'a bɔ lɔnnɔcɛ b'ʊ. K'a bʊr mɔɔ zi zɔɔ, mɔɔ y'a gaam ʊ zu kʊ ʊ, ʊ bʊr ʊ bɩ dɩga awɔɔ ma.
K'a yaa da a lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ m haay, kan wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ kɩ haay. Wɔɔ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Italii ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ a m.
Bɩ kʊ Woso barka n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay kɩ.
James: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zakkɩ, Woso kan Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kɩ zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m. Yaa mɔɔ n'a dam Woso dogʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a kərgu lɛɛ haay ra durnya nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ ɩ fɩr do haay yɩm k'a a heer nyɔɔ,
bala, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, fɩryɩrɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, awɔɔ bʊraama yɩm.
Bɩ, pakra m, k'awɔɔ bʊraama bɩ n a hɩnka fasɩ, k'awɔɔ n yɩ mɩŋŋa fasɩ, hɔsɩ bɩ jɩra a ma y.
Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa y'awɔɔ barla mindɔrɛ n jɩra ma, k'an a yɛ Woso han, a y'a kaŋ ʊ, bala, Woso ɩ hɔ kam gʊaa haay ʊ an lɛ da a zaa n'a yɛm bɩ ra, b'a bɩr meer bam ma y.
