A n ta ʊ bɩ, pakra m, k'a zaa n a yɛ sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, a bɩ sɩnsɩm ka y. Bala, gʊaa k'a nɩ sɩnsɩm kam bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ, kan higʊta kurə kɩ, hɩnhɛr n'a yəŋŋəm jɩsa kan bɩsɩ kɩ.
Gʊaa naa do lɔɔ n a ga m an a gɩnga a ʊ, a hɔ yɩm Zuuba zi y.
Bala, hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zaa m, a heer n sɩra ka kan hɔsɩ barɛ kɩ y.
Kristagʊaa k'an ŋʊazaa bɩ n a heer nyɔɔ, bala, Woso a busu.
Kʊ kristagʊaa kʊ hɔntazaa m bɩ, n a heer nyɔɔ sɔ, bala, Woso a ka an zer. Sɩra nɔ ʊ, hɔntazaa cenim amba burvu tɩr sur bɩ m.
Bala, kʊ woso haan, b'a gu kan paŋŋa kɩ an na bur bɩ ma, bur bɩ n ga, a vu bɩ n sur, a gʊɛrɛ k'an ta ʊ bɩ n nyaam. Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, hɔntazaa n cem zɔɔ-zɔɔ a zibəəro dɔmɩm ʊ.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʊaa k'a nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ makra nɔ ʊ bɩ m. Bala, k'a wɔ makra b'ʊ an bɔ ʊ, a mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ yɩm, ganwʊrɛ kʊ Woso a ler bɔ k'a ka gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ n bɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ makra lɛɛ, a b'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Woso nɩ mɔɔ makra barɛ y.» Bala, mimbʊnyaa b'a dam ma an Woso makra ba y, bɩ Woso mɩŋŋa bɩr gɔsɩ makra bam k'an mimbʊnyaa ba y.
Bɩ, gʊaa lɛtaama bʊnyaa ɩ tɩr a zaa gaa an wɔ ʊ an a da makra ʊ, k'an mimbʊnyaa ba.
Kʊ lɛtaama bʊnyaa bɩ paŋŋa yɩ a zaa zi, b'a a ka a zaa n mimbʊnyaa ba. Kʊ mimbʊnyaa bɩ ba an nya, b'a zaa ga.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, a b'a nyʊnnyɔɔ y.
Hɔ mɩŋŋa haay kʊ wɔɔ n'a yɩm, ganwʊrɛ k'an mɩŋŋa fasɩ haay, a to a nawʊm Woso zi, brama, a ɩ lɛɛgurehɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ da. A mɩŋŋa bɩr a lʊrm fɩɩgaa y, bɩ monsigə ba zi y.
A mɩŋŋa ɩ hɔɔn bɔ ʊ a zim, an mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ ʊ a lemim k'an sɩra bɩ m. A ba a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ kʊ wɔɔ n yɩ lɛɛkarɛzannɔ hɔɔ daarɔ k'a nɩ ŋ dam nɔ wɔɔ barla.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, k'a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ, a ʊ, gʊaa biyəə a ga m an bɩr a tʊr kam mɩŋŋa, b'a bɩ nyagɩra ba k'a meer ba, a bɩ nyagɩra ba sɔ k'a nɔmaa ba y.
Bala, nɔmaa kʊ gʊaa n'a bam bɩ bɛɛ n'a kam an hɔ k'an tɩrga Woso mɩm ʊ bɩ ba y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a hɔ k'an bʊnyaa a heer ʊ haay to, a a gʊ mimbʊnyaa haay ma.
A bɩ ŋʊaar ba a mɩŋŋɔɔ m a ʊ, a y'a tʊr kam Woso lemim bɩ ma y, k'a sa a zi bam paan….
Bala, gʊaa k'a n'a tʊr kam lemim bɩ ma b'a bɩr zi bam nɩ bɩ, bɔ a ʊ kʊ ʊ, kan gʊaa k'a nɩ dɩgarɛ a meer ma jɛtɩga ʊ kɩ,
dɩga k'a ʊ a ma an a hʊr bɩ, a meer bɩ k'an lʊnlɔ bɩ, an bɩ tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ lɛɛm.

Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso lɛ bɩ k'an mɩŋŋa fasɩ bɩ karɩnda bam k'a zu ʊ bɩ, a kʊsɩ a nawʊm ma taalɛra nɔ ʊ, a bɩr a tʊr kam ma bala k'a b'a tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ y, bɩ, zi an n'a bam nɩ, Woso bɩ zaa bɩ barka daŋ ʊ, a zibəə haay nɔ ʊ.
Kʊ gʊaa ʊ, zu a nawʊm Woso ʊ b'a bɩr bʊrlɛ a nɛɛm ma kan meerbaarɔ bʊnyaarɔ kɩ, bra an n'a barɛ a mɩŋŋa m, wosozuure bɛɛ m bɩ y.
Wosozuure k'an mɩŋŋa, dintim ba ma Zɩ Woso mɩm ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ: Ʊ nyasʊ sʊnnɔ m, kan zonno kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm nɔ kɩ m, ʊ dundo ʊ zi kʊ durnya hɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ b'ʊ da mimbʊnyaa barɛ ma y.
M danyɩnɔ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista n nɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m gʊta, awɔɔ n sɩra ka ʊ. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, a n a ga m k'awɔɔ n gʊɔɔ jirə bɔ y.
Ʊ makra sa, a a da ma, gʊɔɔ hɩɩyɔɔ n bɩ gasʊ awɔɔ sokʊma nɔ ʊ, deem n huu mɩŋŋa du a ma an sarma tolleŋŋarɔ dɩnda a nyʊkʊnnɔ ma, deem n bɩr ŋʊazaa an huu yaarsɩrɔ du a ma.

K'awɔɔ gʊaa k'a huu wɩsɩrɔ du a ma bɩ nyaasɩ ka mɩŋŋa, a bɔkarɛ a hɩ m a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ, bʊr ɩ nyɩnta bɩncɛ mɩŋŋa naa do ʊ», a bɔkarɛ a hɩ ŋʊazaa bɩ m, a ʊ: «Ɩbɩɩ, jɩm brama» gɛɛ, a hɩ m, a ʊ: «Bʊr ɩ nyɩnta tara ʊ naa ʊ, mɔɔ gam taa».
K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ, jirə bɛɛ awɔɔ bɔ a barla ra? Bɩ, naa k'awɔɔ n'a bam naa, a ba bɛɛ awɔɔ ʊ dʊdɔkənno hɔɔndarɛ bʊnyaarɔ m na?

M danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, k'a tʊr ka mɩŋŋa! Woso gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋʊazannɔ m durnya naa do ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bɔ ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔnta paan… kʊ sɩrakarɛ m bɩ yɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso cirbəə bɩ yɩ, Woso ɩ cirbəə bɩ do ler bɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a ŋʊam nɔ wɔɔ m.
B'awɔɔ, awɔɔ ɩ ŋʊazannɔ gore bɔŋ ʊ. A n bɔkarɛ, hɔntazannɔ wɔɔ nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋn'ɩ tarɛ awɔɔ m dʊdɔkənno taa.
Ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ tɔ mɩŋŋa kʊ Woso a ka awɔɔ ma bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊm.
N y'a da Wosoci b'ʊ, n ʊ: «Ɩ ɩ mim ŋʊa amba ɩ mɩŋŋa m», Woso cirbəə bɩ mɩsɩrbaa zaa n naa do. K'awɔɔ ɩ zuŋ ʊ, awɔɔ y'a bam mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ jirə bɔrɛ, mimbʊnyaa awɔɔ n'a bam bɩ, b'awɔɔ ɩ kʊrɔma nɔ ʊ, bala awɔɔ n zu Woso lɛ b'ʊ y.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa ɩ zum lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ haay, k'a bɩ bɔ deem la m, bɔ a ʊ ŋ haay la m.
Bala, Woso y'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ jaan da y,» a a ya an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ: «Ɩ bɩ gʊaa meeyaa bɔ ʊ y.» Bɩ kʊ gʊaa n jaan da y, an bɔkarɛ an gər zɛ, bɩsɩ a a ka lɛrɔ wɔɔ ma.
Kʊ meer awɔɔ n'a bam, kʊ zi awɔɔ n'a bam, k'a dɔ a ʊ, lɛ k'a nɩ soamɩŋŋaʊ kam bɩ, Woso n nɩ zɛm b'a sa an awɔɔ dʊdɔ ka m.
Bala, gʊaa k'a n a mim cicir zɛ bɩ, Woso b'a cicir zɛm dʊdɔkarɛ nɔ ʊ y, bɩ kʊ gʊaa y'a muno cicir zɛm, a bɩ nyi bam dʊdɔkarɛ nɩ y.
M danyɩnɔ, kʊ gʊaa ʊ, a sɩra ka Woso ʊ, an bɔkarɛ a bɩr sɩrakarɛ zibəəro sɩ barɛ y, sɩrakarɛ k'a ʊ, a ta m bɩ y'a dam ma an a bʊmbɔ ra?
A a da ma kristagʊaa n ta ʊ yar gɛɛ lʊ, ŋ b'a huuro m k'a du a ma, bɩ ŋ ba hɔsɩ m k'a bɩ y.
K'awɔɔ gʊaa deem a hɩ ŋ nɩ, a ʊ: «K'a doo laafɩɩ, a huu du a ma, k'a hɔ bɩ mɩŋŋa.» B'awɔɔ n hɔ k'a jɩra ŋ ma bɩ ka ŋ ʊ y, meerbaa naa do nyɔɔdʊ ta ʊ ra?
Ncɩnaaʊ sɔ bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a bɩr zi bam bɩ, hɔgər m fasɩ.

A a da ma gʊaa n a hɩ, a ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m, mɔɔ nɩ zibəəro m. Mɔɔ y'a hɩrɛ a zaa m, m ʊ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ bɩ hɩnka m m, zibəəbarɛ war nɔ ʊ, kʊ m m zibəəro wɔɔ barɛ hɩnka a ɩ m, k'ɩ dɔ ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩ sɩrakarɛ m.
Ɩbɩɩ sɩra ka ɩ ʊ, Woso deem taan… n ta ʊ, ɩ y'a bam mɩŋŋa, bɩ, zinəro naa dɔ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ nyi bam.
Yarma ra, a dɔ ɩ ʊ, sɩrakarɛ k'a bɩr zi bam bɩ vam.
Wɔɔ yaaba Abraham bɩ, a zibəəro tɔ ma bɛɛ y'a ka Woso n a ba tɩrga ra, k'a yɛ k'a mannɩ ba a nyɩ Izakkɩ m bɩ bɛɛ ra?
Ɩbɩɩ dɔ kɛɛrɛ ɩ ʊ, Abraham sɩrakarɛ bɩ, zu a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan a zibəəro kɩ, a zibəəro wɔɔ y'a ka a sɩrakarɛ bɩ n yɩ paan….
Ncɩnaaʊ m, hɔ kʊ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ n kʊ yɩ, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Abraham sɩra ka Woso ʊ, am naa, Woso n dɩga a gʊaa tɩrga.» Woso n a bir a gʊaasɩba sɔ.
Awɔɔ dɔ kɛɛrɛ a ʊ, Woso bɩ, gʊaa ba a nawʊm tɩrga a zibəəro tɔ ma, a sɩrakarɛ y'a deem tɔ ma bɛɛ y.
Yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ kan lʊmɩŋŋahɛɛrɛzaa Rahab kɩ, a zibəəro y'a ka Woso n tɩrgabaa ka ʊ, Israyɛl dundolɛɛzizannɔ k'a ŋ si a har ʊ, an zaa vanta hɩnka ŋ nɩ ŋn'a sa ŋn'a hʊr bɩ tɔ ma m.
Denter m, amba gʊaa nyi nɩ bɔrɛ a mɛ ʊ, a zaa nɩ gam bɩ, sɩrakarɛ k'a n zu kʊ ʊ kan zibəəro kɩ bɩ, hɔ gər m sɔ.
M danyɩnɔ, a b'a ka ma k'a yɩ hɔdɩndagʊɔɔnzannɔ woo… y. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, wɔɔ kʊ ʊ nɩ hɔ dɩndam gʊɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, n wɔɔ dʊdɔ kam kʊsɩ an lɛ da.
Bala, wɔɔ haay, wɔɔ ɩ kʊrɔm ma. Gʊaa k'a bɩr kʊrɔm ma a meerbaa nɔ ʊ bɩ, gʊaa tɩrga m fasɩ, a a da ma an bʊr a mɩŋŋa ma jilli.
Kʊ wɔɔ tɩr sarbɩr da sisiro lɛ ʊ kʊ ŋ nɩ zu wɔɔ ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ y'ʊ so ŋ mɛ b'ʊ jilli sɔ ŋn'ɩ wɔɔ hɔɔnhɔ bam.
K'a dɩga kɔɔlʊʊ gʊtɔɔ wɔɔ ma sɔ, kʊ ŋ bɩ to ŋnɩ gʊta maam-maam, hɩnhɛr gʊtɔɔ nɩ ŋ nyɔɔtam bɩ, ŋ hɔ poore n ta ʊ, an a ka ŋn'ɩ tam lɛɛ haay k'a brarɛzaa bɩ lɛ n taa b'ʊ.
A maam sɔ kan gʊaa nɛɛm kɩ, vəŋŋə poore m gʊaa mɛ ʊ, an bɔkarɛ an n'a mɩŋŋa busum hɔɔ gʊtɔɔ barɛ mim nɔ ʊ. Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, sɛ poore a da ma, an poo gʊta bɩ.
Gʊaa nɛɛm bɩ do m bɩ, sɛ m sɔ, an ta hɔ bʊnyaa haay m, wɔɔ mɛ b'an ta ʊ, an nɩ dintim kam wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa ma jilli, an nɩ sɛ dam wɔɔ ma haay, sɛhar sɛ y'a so a mɩŋŋa ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ a da ma, ŋn'ɩ hɔmɩsɩr haay tʊntɔrɛ, poohɔɔ kan bɛnnɔ kɩ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kʊ ŋ n'a gaatam kan zɔnɔ kɩ, ŋ wɔ ŋ ʊ denter.
Bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an nɛɛm tʊntɔ y. Hɔ bʊnyaa m, an nɩ lɛɛ sam, gʊɔɔ meeyaa bɔʊrɛ nyɩsɩ y'a han.
Ʊ nɛɛm wɔɔ sa, ʊ n'ʊ lɛ bɔm Zuuba ʊ, ʊ Zɩ b'ʊ, ʊ n'a sam sɔ, ʊ nɩ lɛ kʊsɩ dam gʊɔɔ n'ʊ, an bɔkarɛ Woso yɩ ŋ da ŋnɩ bɔ a mɩŋŋa rɛ.
M danyɩnɔ, a n a ga m kʊ wɔɔ lɛ deem-deem bɩ n bɩr ler mɩŋŋa bɔm, an bɩr a bʊnyaa bɔm sɔ y.
Hiyəə ba ʊ, an nɩ bɔm hi nyɩnta m kan hi kʊsɩ kɩ nɩ y.
Sɔɔn b'a dam ma an tʊgɔ nyɩ da y, gɛɛ dɩvɛn gɔ n sɔɔn nyɩ da y. Yɛhiyəə b'a dam ma, an bɔ hi nyɩnta nɩ y.
Gʊaa y'awɔɔ barla an mim dɔ ra? K'an a hɩnka mɩsɩrbaa tɩrga nɔ ʊ, bʊraama zibəə nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ jɩmbaa kan heer kʊsɩ kɩ, lɛɛzaabaa kama kɩ y'awɔɔ heer han, a b'a lɛ bɔ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ y, b'a bɩ sɩra gore bɔ ʊ a ŋʊaarlɔ nɩ y.
Bala, mindɔrɛ naa do n a to Woso zi y, durnya hɔ m, a to a ʊ gʊɔɔ zi, bɔ a ʊ Sʊtaana zi.
Sɩra nɔ ʊ, lɛɛ kʊ jɩmbaa n ta ʊ, gʊɔɔ n'a hɔɔn darɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma con bɩ, lɛɛ bɩ do ʊ bɩ, hɔ haay woo… yɩm bʊrga, ziro bʊnyaarɔ n nyɩnta ʊ sɔ.
Bɩ, mindɔrɛ k'a a to Woso zi bɩ y'a hɔ, a mɩŋŋa, laafɩɩ kama m, a bʊgʊ-bʊgʊ, kʊmarɛ kama m, cicirzɛrɛ m gʊta, zi mɩŋŋa barɛ m gʊta, jɩmbaa b'a nɔ ʊ, bɩ zambʊ b'a nɔ ʊ sɔ y.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a kam ma kʊ laafɩɩ n bɩr ta ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, tɩrgabaa mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba ŋ nawʊm laafɩɩ kama nɔ ʊ, a nyɔɔdʊ bɩ, tɩrgabaa mɩsɩrbaa ŋn'a yɩm.
A a ba lɔ awɔɔ bɩr kʊ marɛ, an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʊ kɩ tee…? K'awɔɔ lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ nɩ zoo bam awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma m.

Awɔɔ lɛ taa hɔɔ niŋŋoo ma, b'awɔɔ bɩr ŋ yɩrɛ y, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, awɔɔ y'a kam ma k'a gər zɛ, awɔɔ ɩ jɩm bam bɩ hɔsɩ bɩr kʊyɩrɛ awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ n a ka awɔɔ nɩ zoo bam an nɩ nyaa bam kan kʊ kɩ. Awɔɔ bɩr hɔsɩ yɛm Woso han y, bɩ y'a ka awɔɔ ba hɔ k'awɔɔ lɛ n taa bɩ nɩ y.
Awɔɔ y'a yɛm b'awɔɔ bɩr a yɩrɛ y, k'awɔɔ bɩr a yɛm han mɩŋŋa bɩ tɔ ma, bala, a yɛ awɔɔ nawʊm k'a sa, a a hɔɔnhɔ ba m.
Taalɛrazannɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y! Awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ durnya jɛ ʊ, Woso jɩm n'ɩ mɩ ra? Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa durnya ma bɩ, a ba a nawʊm Woso jɩm.
A hɔɔn awɔɔ n'a darɛ a ʊ, hɔ kʊ Wosoci b'a hɩ bɩ vam m na? A a hɩ a ʊ, Woso ɩ jɩm bam k'a a Ɛspri ka wɔɔ ʊ, an nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ bɩ tɔ ma.
Bɩ, a y'a barka kam wɔɔ ʊ gʊta, bɩ tɔ ma m Wosoci bɩ n a hɩ a ʊ, Woso y'a gum mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ ma, b'a ɩ barka kam mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer a yɛ Woso ma. K'a a gu Sʊtaana ma, a y'a sire an a gʊ awɔɔ ma laatʊ.
K'a zɔ Woso ma, a y'a zɔrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ. Awɔɔ k'an kʊrɔmazannɔ, k'a zi bʊnyaa barɛ to! K'a heer hu bɔ hɔɔn hɩɩya-hɩɩya zannɔ ra!
K'a heer zaar ba a kʊrɔmarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma! K'a zɛ heerzar ba a nyi ka! K'a yaawʊrɛ to a nyi ka, k'a a heernyɔɔ bɩ to, a a heer zar!
K'a a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer Zuuba taa, k'an awɔɔ busu.

M danyɩnɔ, a ba bʊnyaa hɩ kʊ ma y. Gʊaa k'an a bʊnyaa hɩrɛ a mim ma, gɛɛ an a dʊdɔ karɛ, a bʊnyaa an n'a hɩm Woso lɛ ma, an nɩ Woso lɛ bɩ dʊdɔ kam. Bɩ, k'ɩbɩɩ ɩ Woso lɛ bɩ dʊdɔ kam, ɩ ba ɩ ʊ, a dʊdɔkər, a zuurezaa bɛɛ n'ɩ mɩ dɔ y.
A n bɔkarɛ, Woso y'a deem taan… nɩ lɛ bɩ kam, a y'a deem taan… m dʊdɔkər sɔ. A n n'a dam ma an gʊɔɔ bʊmbɔ, an n'a dam ma an ŋ zaar ba sɔ. Nka n'ɩbɩɩ m, ɩ n'ɩ mim dʊdɔ karɛ?
K'a tʊr ka mɔɔ ma kɛɛrɛ, awɔɔ k'a n'a hɩrɛ a ʊ: «Her, gɛɛ booti m, wɔɔ tam kʊ na ʊ gɛɛ kʊ na ʊ, ʊ gɔɔta b'ʊ dɔɔraa deem, ʊ ter ba ʊ busoo yɩ,»
awɔɔ n a dɔ k'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ yɩm lɔ booti nɩ y, bala, awɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan sɛbtur kɩ, k'a bɔ b'a nyaam lɛɛm.
A ga awɔɔ ʊ m, a hɩ a ʊ: «Kʊ Zuuba yɛ, wɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa barɛ, ʊ na ba kan na kɩ.»
A n bɔkarɛ a lɛ awɔɔ n'a bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ a dɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ. Lɛbɔaʊ naa do lɔɔ bʊnyaa.
Gʊaa k'a hɔ k'a ga barɛ m dɔ, b'a n a ba y, a zaa mimbʊnyaa ba.
Hɔntazannɔ wɔɔ, k'a tʊr ka mɔɔ ma, k'a nyi ka a baa da, bala, awɔɔ fɩr yɩm gʊta.
Awɔɔ hɔnta bɩ, hɔ vəm m, bɛɛ y'awɔɔ huuro bɩm sɔ.
Tankampiisi y'awɔɔ sarma kan awɔɔ busoo kɩ zaar bam, ŋ zaarbarɛ bɩ nɩ nyɩntam kasɛtɩ an awɔɔ bɩ, am sɛ hɔ bɩ m. Awɔɔ hɔnta gʊr a kuntə jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ nɔɔm nɔ ʊ.
Awɔɔ n gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ zi ba awɔɔ hɔsɩrarɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ yawʊra ba y, k'a a tʊr ka, ŋ yɩ zee dam, bɩ, ŋ zee bɩ darɛ lee ku Zuuba k'a paŋŋa jirə ba ʊ bɩ zi.
Awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa nyɩnta yɩ tara burə ʊ, a a hɔɔnhɔ yɩ, awɔɔ hɔ bɩ gʊta a mɛ ka am hɔbɩsɩrɔ m, bɩ awɔɔ zɩnzɛrɛ dɔmɩm y'a kum.
Awɔɔ gʊaa tɩrga dʊdɔ yar, a meeyaa bɔ ʊ, a n wɔ ʊ an jɩm awɔɔ lɛɛ y.
M danyɩnɔ, ʊ bʊr ʊ ma, kʊ Zuuba n tolle ba an bʊr. K'a makra sa danwur ma, bʊr a nawʊrɛ a ma an nɩ dɔm mɔsa ma, k'a a tara zibəə hɔ yɩ, an nɩ dɔm lɛɛkarɛ labarɛrɔ, kan jɛ labarɛrɔ kɩ ma.
Awɔɔ, k'a bʊr a ma sɔ, a bɩr heer koodə m, bala, Zuuba wusigəre dɔmɩm a zɔ.
M danyɩnɔ, a bɩ kukur ba kʊ ma y, kʊ Woso b'a dʊdɔ ka y. K'a dɩga a, ba dʊdɔkər bɩ nɩ cɛlɛ ma na.
M danyɩnɔ, wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ŋnɩ meer ba Zuuba tɔ ra rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ fɩr yɩ, bɩ ŋ bʊr a ma fɩr bɩ nɔ ʊ. K'a ŋ hɔbaa sa.

K'a dɩga a, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, wɔɔ y'a hɩm wɔɔ ʊ, ŋ mimbirenyɩnta. Awɔɔ Zɔɔb k'a jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ fɩr nɔ ʊ bɩ mim ma, awɔɔ hɔ kʊ Zuuba a ba m fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʊ bɩ dɔ sɔ, bala, Zuuba ɩ gʊɔɔ cicir zɛm gʊta, an n'a mɩŋŋa barɛ ŋ nɩ.

M danyɩnɔ, an lɛ da bɩ, a b'a wer si y, a b'a wer si brama tɔ nɩ, b'a ba si tara tɔ nɩ y, a b'a wer si fɩɩga y. K'awɔɔ yɛ mim ma, k'a ʊ ɩɩn… bala. K'awɔɔ n yɛ, k'a ʊ ayy…. A bɩ hɔsɩ na ma y, kʊ Woso b'awɔɔ dʊdɔ ka y.
Kʊ gʊaa y'awɔɔ barla an nɩ fɩr yɩm k'an yaa da. Kʊ gʊaa nɩ heernyɔɔ m, k'an laa lɔ an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ.
K'awɔɔ gʊaa deem bɩ laafɩɩ, k'an kristagʊɔɔ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ bir, kʊ ŋ nɩ nyɔɔ nɔ ma Zuuba tɔ ra, ŋnɩ yaa da a tɔ ma.
Kʊ ŋ yaa bɩ da kan sɩrakarɛ kɩ, yaabazaa bɩ laafɩɩ yɩm, Zuuba y'a waam, k'a mimbʊnyaarɔ ba sɔ, Zuuba sugur kaŋ ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mimbʊnyaarɔ bɔ a lɛ ma, a hɩ kʊ m, k'a yaa da kʊ tɔ ma, kʊ Woso n a waa. Gʊaa tɩrga yaadarɛ ɩ zi bam kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, *Elii nyɩnta gʊaa am wɔɔ m, a yaa da Woso m ŋʊɩɩ…, kʊ la bɩ ba y, denter sɔ, la a gʊsɩ dɔɔraa kaakʊ kan a kur kɩ.
A n a ya an yaa da, kʊ la bɩ n ba, Woso n a ka la bɩ n ba, hɔbɩrɛ n nyɩnta ʊ tara burə ʊ.
M danyɩnɔ, k'awɔɔ gʊaa deem nyaam, an Woso zaa k'an sɩra bɩ to, kʊ gʊaa a ka an a ya an bʊr zaa bɩ ra,
k'a dɔ a ʊ, gʊaa k'a ka mimbʊnyaabər n a bɔ a mimbʊnyaabarɛ zaa ʊ, k'a zu Woso ʊ bɩ, a zaa bɩ meeyaa a a bʊmbɔ, an a ka sɔ, baa k'a mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊta, Woso n ŋ sugur ka ʊ haay.
I Peter: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Pɩyɛɛr nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m. A ba mɔɔ nawʊm awɔɔ kʊ Woso a bɔ ʊ k'a yɩ a gʊɔɔ a hɩsɩga da, a m saanɔɔ Pɔn kʊ ʊ kan Galasii kʊ kɩ ʊ, Kapadɔs kʊ kɩ ʊ, Azii kan Bitinii kʊrɔ kɩ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma.

Zɩ Woso y'awɔɔ bɔ ʊ, amba a lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta a hɔɔnhɔ nɔ ʊ k'a ba bɩ tɔ ma, a y'a so awɔɔ ʊ, a Ɛspri k'a a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n yɛ Yeezuu Krista ma, k'a ma bɩ n'awɔɔ hu bɔ. A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm, kʊ Woso n a barka, kan a laafɩɩ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ gʊta.
Ʊ ʊ lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ, wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista Zɩ bɩ, bala, a cicirzɛrɛ gʊta bɩ nɔ ʊ, a a ka wɔɔ n yɩrɛdaa yɩ, k'ʊ taaheerlɛ paan… yɩ, Yeezuu Krista k'a a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
A ba a ʊ maam kʊ wɔɔ n hɔjirle k'a b'a dam ma an vɔn gɛɛ an dintim ka, gɛɛ a paŋŋa n a bɔ ʊ yɩ, hɔjirle bɩ do Woso a cɩnta awɔɔ m arzana ʊ.
Awɔɔ kʊ Woso paŋŋa nɩ dɔrɛ a ma sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma, k'awɔɔ n bɩ bʊmbɔrɛ k'an b'a hɩnkam lɛɛm jɛ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ yɩ.
Bɩ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer nyɔɔm gʊta, baa kʊ pakra m k'awɔɔ n fɩr yɩ dɩɩtaa, makrarɔ y'a hʊnhɔ kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ heer zarm dɔmɩm poorero nɔɔn duro nɔ ʊ.

Fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ bɩ, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ makra an n'a bam, kʊ sɩrakarɛ paan… m gɛ. Awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ mɩŋŋabaa lɛ da sarma m, hɔcenlezaa m bɩ, an bɔkarɛ n tɩr a makra ba sɛ ʊ, k'a mɩŋŋabaa dɔ. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ bɩ makra jɛ ʊ, awɔɔ lɛbɔʊrɛ kan cirbəə kɩ, daʊrɛ kɩ yɩm dɔmɩm kʊ Yeezuu Krista n b'a hɩnkaŋ ʊ b'ʊ.

Awɔɔ ɩ Yeezuu Krista mɩŋŋa ŋʊam b'awɔɔ n a yɩ a mɩm nɩ y, awɔɔ sɩra ka ʊ, b'awɔɔ n a yɩ cɩna y. Naa tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n'a heer nyɔɔm heernyɔɔ gandaa ʊ m, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an heernyɔɔ gʊta bɩ do dɔ an a hɩ y.
K'awɔɔ nɩ zɛm b'a nyiro wɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ bɩ, bɩ y'a ka Woso ʊ awɔɔ n sɩra ka.
Wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta biisi ŋnɩ so Woso lɛ ra, ŋnɩ barka kʊ Woso ʊ k'a ka awɔɔ ʊ bɩ mim hɩ bɩ, ŋ bʊmbɔrɛ k'awɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a yɩ bɩ daasɩ ŋn'a a ka.

A ka ŋ y'a ʊ ma, k'a minno kʊ Krista Ɛspri b'a hɩnka ŋ nɩ bɩ kʊyɩrɛ dɔmɩm kan ŋ zaarɔ kɩ dɔ, bala, Ɛspri bɩ do k'a nyɩnta kan ŋ kɩ bɩ lɛɛ ka an fɩryɩrɛrɔ kʊ Krista n'a yɩm bɩ mim hɩ, kan lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a n'a yɩm, fɩr bɩ yɩrɛ jɛ ʊ bɩ kɩ.

Bɩ, Woso a hɩnka a lɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ duro m, a ʊ, lemim k'a ka kʊ ŋ nɩ so ra bɩ, a n a ka ŋ bɔɔm tɔ ma y, awɔɔ hɔ m. Lemim nyɩnta bɩ do padənno wɔɔ a hɩ awɔɔ m, bɩ, a pa ŋ y'a da awɔɔ m *Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa kʊ Woso a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ m. Malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ n lɛ taa k'a lemim bɩ do dɔ gʊta.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a banka, k'a ta lɛɛ kan zibəə kɩ, a b'a zu a ʊ y, k'a barka kʊ Woso n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ Yeezuu Krista hɩnkarɛ ma bɩ ta a heer lɛ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Amba nyɩnɔ nɩ yɛrɛ a zɩrɔ ma bɩ, k'a yɛ Woso ma, a b'a ya a zu lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ k'awɔɔ n ta ŋ nɩ biisi badɔ nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ y.
Bɩ, amba Woso k'awɔɔ bir bɩ n mɩŋŋa bɩ, awɔɔ sɔ k'a bɩr mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa bam a tarɛ haay nɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso a hɩ a ci b'ʊ, a ʊ: «K'a yɩ mɩŋŋa, bala, mɔɔ mɩŋŋa.»

Woso k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ dʊdɔ kam b'a bɩr ŋ jirə bɔm bɩ, awɔɔ nɩ yaa dam nɩ a ʊ, a Zɩ m, gʊaa biyəə dʊdɔ an n'a kam amba a zaa zibəə a ga m bɩ m. Bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a gɔɔta awɔɔ m, awɔɔ n'a bam tara burə ʊ bɩ ba, Woso mɩŋŋa daʊrɛ kan a nyibəə kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyɔɔdʊ ba ʊ, awɔɔ zɩrɔ n a to awɔɔ m bɩ, Woso awɔɔ yɔ b'ʊ. Bɩ, hɔ k'a n'a zaar bam, gɛɛ wanzurfu gɛɛ sarma bɛɛ a a sa, an awɔɔ yɔ nɩ y.
Awɔɔ yɔ a ʊ, Krista ma kʊ n b'a dam ma n a lɛ hɩ bɩ m, bɔ b'ʊ kʊ ʊ kan sinnyɛɛm k'a m mɩŋŋa, hɔ bʊnyaa sɩ ba ma bɩ kɩ.
Woso lɛɛ ka an a bɔ ʊ, bɩ ma bɩ, durnya ba ʊ y. Kɛɛrɛ naa, a a hɩnka jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ, awɔɔ daahan tɔ ma.
A tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n sɩra ka Woso ʊ, bɩ y'a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, an lɛbɔʊrɛ ka ʊ, yɩ a ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, k'awɔɔ sɩrakarɛ kan awɔɔ taaheerlɛ kɩ n yo Woso ma.
Yɛ k'awɔɔ ʊ sɩra ma b'a ka, awɔɔ nyiro wɔɔ hu n bɔ, k'a a da ma, a kʊ ŋʊa paan… danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ. K'a kʊ ŋʊa gʊta noom hu m.
Bala, yɩrɛdaa awɔɔ yɩ, b'a n a to gʊaa zi y, gʊaa ɩ gam, bɩ Woso y'awɔɔ yɩ, a garɛ ba ʊ y. A lemim k'an mɩsɩr a cenle ba ʊ b'a sa an awɔɔ yɩ m.
Amba Wosoci n'a hɩm bɩ m bɩ:
Gʊɔɔ haay bɔ kʊ ʊ kan bur kɩ,
lɛbɔʊrɛ kʊ ŋ nɩ tam haay bɩ
bɔ kʊ ʊ kan burvu kɩ,
kʊ bur bɩ ga, b'a vu bɩ sur.
Bɩ Zuuba lemim b'ɩ gɔɔtam
dɔmɩm haay.
Bɩ, lemim bɩ do bɩ, lemim nyɩnta kʊ n y'a pa da awɔɔ m bɩ m.
K'a bʊnyaabaa do haay to kan ŋʊaar do haay kɩ, noombakʊma kɩ, a bɩ jɩm ba y, b'a b'a bʊnyaa hɩ gɔsɩ ma y.
Amba nyɩnɔ poorero nɩ nyonhi ŋʊam bɩ, k'a Woso lemim k'an mɩŋŋa bɩ ŋʊa tee… k'a a da ma a ma Woso zaa bɩ nɔ ʊ, a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ y'a hɩm denter, a ʊ:
Awɔɔ b'a dɔ a ʊ, Zuuba mɩŋŋa.
K'a zɔ Zuuba ma, jaa mɩsɩr m, gʊɔɔ n kaanm m, bɩ, Woso dɩga a jaa tɔzaa m, an a bɔ ʊ.

K'a a zɔ ma, bala, awɔɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan jaa mɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ sɔ, kʊ Woso n awɔɔ sa an awɔɔ ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri cɛ. Awɔɔ yɩrɛ a mannɩbənno kʊ ŋ y'a mɩŋŋa ka ʊ, k'a mannɩrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a to Sɛnt-Ɛspri zi rɔ wɔɔ ba a ŋ ka Woso ʊ, a yɩ ŋ ŋʊam Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma.
Bala, Wosoci bɩ nɔ ʊ, n ʊ:
K'a dɩga a, mɔɔ ɩ jaa paŋŋazaa cɩntam *Siyɔn ʊ,
mɔɔ y'a bɔ ʊ, jaa tɔzaa m gʊta,
gʊaa k'a sɩra ka ʊ bɩ, a bɩ nyannɩ bɩrɛ y.
Awɔɔ k'a sɩra ka ʊ rɔ wɔɔ,
jaa naa do tɔ ma awɔɔ ɩ lɛbɔʊrɛ m,
bɩ kʊ bɩsɩkənno wɔɔ nɩ, Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Jaa kʊ cɛdonno wɔɔ kaanm m bɩ y'a ba cɛ bɩ jɩrjaa paŋŋazaa.
Wosoci b'a y'a an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ:
Jaa bɩ do a ba gʊɔɔ gənzɛrɛ jaa, ŋ dore jaa.
Kʊ ŋ n sɩra ka Woso lemim b'ʊ bɩ y'a ka ŋn'a gəm zɛm ma, Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta k'an yɩ ncɩnaaʊ.

B'awɔɔ, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ bɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, cir m Woso m, a mannɩbənno n'awɔɔ m, gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso a so ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, Woso mɩŋŋa y'awɔɔ ba a hɔ, k'awɔɔ n a zibəəro gʊtɔɔ wɔɔ pa da, a y'awɔɔ bir an bɔ awɔɔ m monsigə ʊ, an bʊr awɔɔ m a lɛɛgure k'an mɩŋŋa gʊta b'ʊ.
Biisi bɩ, Woso bɩ gʊɔɔ bɛɛ n'awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a gʊɔɔ n'awɔɔ m. Biisi bɩ, Woso n a cicirzɛrɛ hɩnka awɔɔ nɩ y, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, a awɔɔ cicir zɛ.
M danyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, cenlezannɔ n'awɔɔ m tara burə ʊ naa ʊ, saanɔɔ n'awɔɔ m, bɩ tɔ ma bɩ, k'a gʊ lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ ma, a ka ŋ nawʊm ma k'a awɔɔ zaar ba.

K'awɔɔ nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ kristagʊɔɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ bire ʊ bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'an zore ba, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ ŋ y'awɔɔ tɔ zaar barɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ ŋ ʊ, gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ n'awɔɔ nɩ, kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ zibəəro mɩŋŋɔɔ wɔɔ yɩ, maam bɩ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔm Woso ʊ, hinni k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ ŋ nɩ b'ʊ.
K'a yɛ lɛɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ durnya ʊ naa ʊ haay rɔ wɔɔ ma Zuuba tɔ ma. Kʊ cir nɩ, k'a yɛ ma k'a m cir bɩ tɔ ma.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ cir n cɩncɩnta kʊ ŋ n a so lɛɛrɔ ʊ wɔɔ nɩ, k'a yɛ ŋ ma sɔ, ŋ cɩncɩnta a ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ hʊnhʊr, ŋn'a lɛ bɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a mɩŋŋa bam nɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
Bala, Woso lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam, kʊ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ hɔɔn ba ʊ, ŋ n hɔsɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ b'a da ma ŋnɩ hɔsɩ hɩ y.
K'awɔɔ a so a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ bɩ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba, b'a bɩ yo soamɩŋŋaʊ bɩ do ma, k'a bʊnyaa ba y. Bɩ k'a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba, kʊ Woso zibəənyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ tɔ ma.
K'a gʊɔɔ haay da ʊ, k'a danyɩnɔ Krista nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa, k'a nyi ba Woso m, k'a cir da ʊ sɔ.

Awɔɔ kʊ zibəənyɩnɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ a soʊrezannɔ wɔɔ ma daʊrɛ gʊta nɔ ʊ, k'a ba ncɩnaaʊ kan bɔɔ n nyɩnta kan awɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'a mɩŋŋa barɛ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ kɩ. K'a ba ncɩnaaʊ sɔ, kan bɔɔ n kʊsɩ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
Bala, kʊ gʊaa ɩ yɛm fɩr ma Woso tɔ ma, bɩ kʊrɔ bɛɛ a ʊ ma an nɩ fɩr bɩ do yɩrɛ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩm bɩ zaa ra.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ bʊnyaa ba, ŋnɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, nka n'a lɛ bɔrɛ awɔɔ ʊ naa tɔ ma? Bɩ, k'awɔɔ mɩŋŋa ba, n nɩ bɔkarɛ n nɩ fɩr karɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ nɩ yɛm ma bʊraama nɔ ʊ, Woso nɔ ɩ yɩrɛ awɔɔ ra naa nɔ ʊ.
A n bɔkarɛ Woso bɩ, awɔɔ bir a ʊ, naa tɔ ma. Bala, Krista fɩr yɩ awɔɔ tɔ ma, an n'a ŋʊam k'awɔɔ n a hɔbaa sa.
A mɩŋŋa n mimbʊnyaa sɩ ba y,
a n ŋʊaar ba fɩɩga y,
n y'a sʊnsɔ wʊ,
b'a n a sompi gʊaa n'ʊ y,
gʊɔɔ fɩr ka ma,
b'a n nyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ y,
a mɩŋŋa to a ʊ, Woso wɔ ʊ,
bɩ n nɩ dʊdɔ kam tɩrga.
A mɩŋŋa ɩ yɛ an wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ sa
an fɩr yɩ ŋ nɩ, an ga gɔdarkʊra ma, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ,
gəəno n wɔɔ m wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ,
k'ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ba tɩrgabaa nɔ ʊ.
A mɩŋŋa sampɔɔrlɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma m, awɔɔ n laafɩɩ yɩ.
Bala, biisi bɩ, awɔɔ nyaam am seero hɔ bɩ m, bɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ a bɔ a bʊr a dundor bɩ zi, an nɩ dɔrɛ awɔɔ ma sɔ.
Lannɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ sɔ, k'a zu a zino wɔɔ lɛ ʊ, maam bɩ, kʊ gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʊ, ŋ bɩr sɩra kam Woso lemim b'ʊ, kʊ ŋ lannɔ wɔɔ zibəə n a ka, kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩra ka Woso ʊ, baa kʊ ŋ n meer ba y.
Ŋ y'awɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa k'an mɩŋŋa, an nɩ zure ŋ lɛ ʊ bɩ yɩm.
A b'a ka ma k'a a mɛ gʊɛrɛ da ma, mintɔɔnrɛ m, gɛɛ sarma nyɛɛnnɔ nɩ, gɛɛ garbarɛ waasɩ nɩ y.
Bɩ k'a ka k'a gʊɛrɛ bɩ n bɩr a heer ʊ, bʊgʊ-bʊgʊdabaa kan bʊraama kɩ gʊɛrɛ bɩ, bɩ nyarɛ ɩ ba ʊ y, a nyɔɔdʊ ta ʊ sɔ Woso mɩm ʊ gʊta.
Lannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta biisi ŋn'ɩ zum Woso ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, gʊɛrɛbaa naa do ŋnɩ ta m, ŋn'ɩ zure a zino lɛ ʊ.
Nyɩnta Saara ʊ ncɩnaaʊ, an nɩ yɛm Abraham lɛ ma, an n'a birm a zuuba, k'awɔɔ y'a mɩŋŋa bam, awɔɔ bɩr a tom hɔsɩ nɩ nyibəə darɛ a ma, awɔɔ nyɩntarɛ a nyɩnɔ.

Awɔɔ k'an zino wɔɔ, k'a mɩsɩrbaa mɩŋŋa ba kan a lannɔ wɔɔ kɩ, a dɔ a ʊ, ŋ paŋŋa n awɔɔ hɔ ku y, k'a daʊrɛ zi ba kan ŋ kɩ, bala, ŋ mɩsɩrbaa denter bɩ hɔjirle yɩm sɔ kan awɔɔ kɩ, Woso barka bɩ nɔ ʊ. K'a ŋ da ʊ, kʊ hɔsɩ b'a ta a yaadarɛ nɩ y.
Meer naa do ba mɔɔ nawʊm kan awɔɔ haay kɩ kɛɛrɛ: K'a ka, k'a hɔɔn n bɩr deem, a bɩr kʊ cicir zɛm, a bɩr kʊ ŋʊam danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ, a bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam kʊ m, a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m.
A b'a bʊnyaa sompi gʊaa nʊ y, kʊ gʊaa awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊ, a b'a sʊnsɔ wʊ sɔ y. Bɩ, k'a barka da ʊ, bala, awɔɔ bir Woso ʊ, k'awɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba ncɩnaaʊ, k'awɔɔ n a barka hɔjirle yɩ.
Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Kʊ gʊaa lɛ taa mɩsɩrbaa ma,
k'a taʊrɛ n yɩ a ma mɩŋŋa,
a zaa a ga m,
an meerbaa bʊnyaa barɛ to,
kan ŋʊaarbarɛ kɩ.
K'a zaa n a bɔ a bʊnyaa barɛ ʊ,
an a mɩŋŋa ba,
an bɩr a kam ma tee…
kʊ laafɩɩ n bɩr gʊɔɔ bire ʊ.
Bala, Zuuba mɩm ɩ gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ wɔɔ ra, an n'a tʊr karɛ ŋ yaadarɛ ma,
bɩ, a bɩr yɛm gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a bʊnyaa bam nɔ wɔɔ ma y.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ ɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ ŋʊarɛ, nka n n'a bʊnyaa barɛ awɔɔ nɩ?
Baa k'awɔɔ fɩr yɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ tɔ ma, k'a dɔ a ʊ, mimbirenyɩnta m. A bɩ nyi ba gʊɔɔ nɩ y, b'a b'a heer kɔ y.
Bɩ, k'a Krista da ʊ a heer nɔ ʊ, a m Zuuba. K'a banka mɩŋŋa, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, kʊ gʊɔɔ awɔɔ lar taaheerlɛ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ mim ma, k'a a da ma a jɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ mɩŋŋa.
Bɩ, k'a jɩ dɩnda ŋ nɩ bʊgʊ-bʊgʊdabaa m, kan daʊrɛ kɩ m, a bɩr noom hu m. Maam bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ tɔ zarm, ŋn'a bʊnyaa hɩrɛ awɔɔ tarɛ ma Krista Zuure tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ nyannɩ bɩrɛ.
Bala, k'awɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm zi mɩŋŋa k'awɔɔ n'a bam tɔ ma, kʊ Woso hɔɔnhɔ m maam nɩ, naa jɩra fɩr yɩ a bʊnyaa barɛ tɔ ma m.

Krista mɩŋŋa ga wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma, ga a ʊ gallɛm deem taan…, a mɩŋŋa tɩrga, an bɔkarɛ an ga gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma, a ba a ʊ maam, k'a wɔɔ gaa a bʊr wɔɔ m Woso zi, n y'a zɛ gər a mɛsim nɔ ʊ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n a ya, an mɩsɩrbaa ka ʊ.
Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ do a nyɩnta m biisi, an Woso lemim pa da m. Pa bɩ da a ʊ, bayɛrɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nyɩnta ʊ, ŋnɩ gɩnga, ŋnɩ gəənokʊ ʊ, lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ m.
Bayɛrɛzannɔ wɔɔ duro dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ, Woso bʊr a ma, Nowee nɩ kɔɔlʊʊ bɩ bam. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bɩ gʊta y, ŋ gʊaa sinnyə ŋnɩ bɔlɛm yɩ hi bɩ wakatɩ ʊ.

Dɩɩtaa sɔ naa, bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ awɔɔ ʊ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ, batɛm kʊ wɔɔ n'a sim bɩ bɔkʊrɛ m minno wɔɔ duro m. Batɛm bɩ bɩr wɔɔ mɛ dintim sʊrgɔrɛ y, bɩ, a ka a nawʊm wɔɔ nɩ hɔɔn bɔŋ ʊ, k'ʊ zu Woso ʊ kan noom hu kɩ. Bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ yɩ wɔɔ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ Yeezuu Krista a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ bɩ tɔ ma.
A a busu, an ta arzana ʊ, an nɩ nyɩntam Woso bɩsɩ ra, malɛɛkarɔ haay kan lɛɛsoʊzannɔ kɩ, paŋŋazannɔ kɩ haay nɩ zure a lɛ ʊ.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, kʊ Krista fɩr yɩ a mɛsim nɔ ʊ bɩ, awɔɔ sɔ, k'a naa da a heer ʊ a dɔ a ʊ, gʊaa k'a fɩr yɩ a mɛsim nɔ ʊ bɩ, a a gʊ mimbʊnyaa ma.
A n a sa dɩɩtaa ma, k'a dɔmɩm k'a gɔɔta awɔɔ m k'a mɩsɩrbaa ba tara burə ʊ bɩ sa, a Woso hɔɔnhɔ ba m, a b'a sa a lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ gʊɔɔ nɩ ŋ ŋʊam bɩ ba nɩ y.

Nyɩnta k'awɔɔ ʊ biisi, a bawosodonno mɩsɩrbaa ba bɩ, a kɔ an bʊrbɔ kɛɛrɛ. Dɔmɩm bɩ do ʊ bɩ, ta awɔɔ nawʊm yɔka, a n nɩ lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ m, a n nɩ bɛɛ mim waasɩ, a n nɩ hɔ bɩm waasɩ, a n nɩ hɔ mim waasɩ, a n nɩ yaa dam *wosobaawɔnnɔ m zibʊnyaabarɛ nɔ ʊ.
Kɛɛrɛ naa, bawosodonno kʊ ŋ nɩ dɩgarɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ bɩr a mɩŋŋɔɔ kam zibʊnyaarɔ nɔɔn duro barɛ ʊ kan a kɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'a dɔ kʊ bɔ an n'a hɩrɛ y, am naa, ŋn'awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊm.
Bɩ, Woso zɛm bɩ ŋ da lɛ ʊ, ŋn'a zi bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ mim nyɩ bɔ ʊ, Woso mɩŋŋa a banka an nya, k'a gʊɔɔ mɩsɩɩrɔ kan gəəno kɩ dʊdɔ ka.

Naa y'a ka, n nɩ lemim nyɩnta bɩ pa da gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɩnga rɔ wɔɔ m sɔ, n brɔɔ dʊdɔ ka, amba n nɩ gʊaa woo… dʊdɔ kam bɩ m, lemim bɩ pa n y'a da ŋ nɩ, kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa ba Sɛnt-Ɛspri tɔ ma, amba Woso n mɩsɩr bɩ m.
Hɔ haay nyarɛ a zɔ, maam bɩ, gʊaa biyəə n bʊr a ma, a b'a zu a ʊ y, k'a a da ma, a bɩr yaa dam.
A n lɛ da haay bɩ, k'a bɩr kʊ ŋʊam paan…, bala, ŋʊarɛ ɩ hɔ kam mimbʊnyaa yɔɔgʊ ra.
K'a saana ba kʊ m, b'a bɩ kukur ba y.
Woso ganwʊrɛ y'a hʊnhɔ ka awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə ʊ, gʊaa biyəə n zi ba a ganwʊrɛ bɩ m, a mim daahan tɔ ma. K'a ba ncɩnaaʊ, amba zibəənyɩnɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ m, a nyasʊ Woso barka k'a nɩ zi hɔka bam bɩ m mɩŋŋa.

Kʊ gʊaa ɩ lemim padarɛ ganwʊrɛ nɩ, k'an Woso lemim pa da. Gʊaa k'a nɩ daahan zi bam bɩ, k'an a ba paŋŋa kʊ Woso a ka ʊ bɩ m. K'a ba ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ Woso n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ hɔ haay woo… nɔ ʊ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma. Woso mɩŋŋa y'a so lɛbɔʊrɛ ʊ, kan paŋŋa kɩ dɔmɩm haay, Amina.
M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, a bɩ dɩga fɩr k'awɔɔ n'a yɩm a sɩrakarɛ tɔ ma naa ma, ɩ ʊ, mim daŋŋada nɩ, a zɛ kədə y.
K'a a heer nyɔɔ, bala a na awɔɔ ʊ Krista ma a fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ, maam bɩ, k'a lɛbɔʊrɛ b'a hɩnka, awɔɔ nyɩntam heernyɔɔ nɔ ʊ sɔ.
Kʊ gʊɔɔ y'awɔɔ sʊnsɔ wʊm Krista tɔ ma, mimbirenyɩnta m kan awɔɔ kɩ, bala, Woso Ɛspri kʊ lɛbɔʊrɛ Ɛspri m b'ɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ.
A b'a ka, awɔɔ gɔsɩ n fɩr yɩ, k'a gər zɛ, gɛɛ k'a kom ba, gɛɛ k'a zi bʊnyaa ba, gɛɛ k'a a lɛ zu gʊɔɔ minno ʊ tɔ ma y.
Bɩ, k'awɔɔ gʊaa ɩ fɩr yɩm, kʊ kristagʊaa m bɩ tɔ ma, nyannɩ b'a zɛ y, k'an a lɛ bɔ Woso ʊ denter, kʊ n n'a birm kristagʊaa bɩ tɔ ma.
Dɔmɩm kʊ Woso n nɩ dʊdɔ kam b'a ku, a sa a nawʊm a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Bɩ, k'a sa a nawʊm wɔɔ ma, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n sɩra ka Woso lemim nyɩnta b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, kʊ dʊdɔ bɩ ŋ ku, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma lɔ?
Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Gʊɔɔ tɩrgɔɔ bʊmbɔrɛ yɩm,
B'a wer nyɩntaŋ ʊ.
K'a maam, a nyɩntam gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ kan mimbʊnyaabənno kɩ ma lʊnlɔ?
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ fɩr yɩm Woso hɔɔnhɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ, ŋnɩ gɔɔta ŋn'a mɩŋŋɔɔ to a darɛzaa Woso wɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩŋŋa bam. Taalɛrazaa m Woso m.

Lɛɛzannɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m ŋ dʊndɔ. Lɛɛzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m, bɩ Krista fɩryɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ, mɔɔ nyɩntam lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a n'a hɩnkam b'ʊ sɔ. Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m a hɩ ŋ nɩ bɩ ba n nɩ:
K'a nyasʊ bakʊ kʊ Woso a da awɔɔ wɔ ʊ bɩ m mɩŋŋa. A bɩ dɔ ma pakra nɩ y, k'a dɔ ma heernyɩnta m, amba Woso lɛ n taa bɩ m. A bɩ dɔ bakʊ bɩ ma sɔ, k'a busoo yɩ y, bɩ k'a dɔ ma kan a heer kɩ haay.
A b'a so gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ da a wɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ paŋŋa nɩ y, bɩ k'a a tɔ ʊ k'a hɔbaarɔ n bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʊ gʊɔɔ n a da ma ŋnɩ ŋ sa.
K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ, kʊ dundonno jɩtaarɛ bɩ bɩ bʊr, a y'a kam awɔɔ n nyɩnta a lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a bɩr a zarm bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ gɔɔta rɔ wɔɔ, k'a yɛ lɛɛzannɔ wɔɔ ma. Awɔɔ haay k'a bɩr mɩŋŋazerle m kan kʊ kɩ, bala, Wosoci b'a hɩ, a ʊ:
Woso bɩr yɛm mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ wɔɔ ma y,
b'a y'a barka bɩ kam mɩŋŋazerlezannɔ ʊ.
K'a mɩŋŋɔɔ zer Woso taa, a paŋŋa ɩ lɛ da haay, maam bɩ, a y'awɔɔ gore daŋ ʊ a dɔmɩm ʊ.
K'a minno kʊ ŋ n'awɔɔ kɔm nɔ wɔɔ haay da a wɔ ʊ, bala, a mɩŋŋa ɩ nyasʊrɛ awɔɔ m.
A b'a zu a ʊ y, k'a dundo a zi. Sʊtaana awɔɔ jɩm b'ɩ kumkum lɛɛ ma am poozaa hɔ bɩ m, an nɩ baa dam, an n'a kam gʊaa ma k'a nyasʊ a bɩ.
K'a a da a lɛ ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ, sɩrakarɛ nɔ ʊ, a dɔ a ʊ, awɔɔ fɩryɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ y'awɔɔ danyɩnɔ yɩm sɔ durnya b'ʊ jilli.

Awɔɔ ɩ fɩr yɩm dɔmɩm poore nɔ ʊ, bɩ, Woso k'a a so barka do haay ʊ, an awɔɔ bir, k'awɔɔ n nyɩnta a lɛbɔʊrɛ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ, Krista zuure nɔ ʊ bɩ y'awɔɔ bankam fasɩ, an awɔɔ paŋŋa da ra, an a ka awɔɔ n jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ, hɔsɩ b'a darɛ awɔɔ ma y.
A y'a so paŋŋa ʊ dɔmɩm haay. Amina.

Wɔɔ danyɩ Silas mɔɔ da ʊ, an ci poore naa gʊrsɩra ba, kʊ m a nyɔɔ awɔɔ ma. Mɔɔ ɩ dɩgam ma sɩrabarɛzaa sɩrakarɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ ma, kʊ m awɔɔ heer yo, kʊ m a hɩ a m paan… m ʊ, Woso barka denter b'awɔɔ n a nɔ ʊ naa, k'a gɔɔta a nɔ ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ.
Gʊɔɔ kʊ Woso ŋ ba a gʊɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ sokʊma k'a nɩ *Babɩlɔnnɩ ʊ naa ʊ b'ɩ yaa darɛ a m. Mɔɔ nyɩ Markɩ ɩ yaa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ.
K'a yaa da kʊ m mɩŋŋa-mɩŋŋa danyɩbaa nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, kʊ Woso laafɩɩ n bɩr kan awɔɔ haay k'a nɩ Krista nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ.
II Peter: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Simɔn Pɩyɛɛr, mɔɔ nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, a zibəəzaa m mɔɔ m sɔ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊm awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a sɩrakarɛ n hɔdeem kan wɔɔ hɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ. Yeezuu Krista m wɔɔ Woso, a m wɔɔ Bʊmbɔrɛzaa sɔ, a tɩrgabaa y'a ka, awɔɔ n sɩra ka.
A yɛ mɔɔ nawʊm k'awɔɔ n bɩr Woso dɔm, kan wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu kɩ, k'a a da ma a barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ yɩ gʊta.

Woso zi ba a paŋŋa bɩ m, an a ka wɔɔ nɩ hɔ haay kʊ wɔɔ ʊ ga m ʊ a yɩ, k'ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ba a zuure nɔ ʊ mɩŋŋa bɩ m. A ka k'a ʊ wɔɔ n Krista dɔ bɩ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ mɩŋŋa ɩ wɔɔ bir a lɛbɔʊrɛ kan a paŋŋa kɩ m.

Yɩ a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ, an hɔɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ gʊtɔɔ Woso n ŋ ler bɔ rɔ wɔɔ ka wɔɔ ʊ, ŋ ka a ʊ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a a yɔ lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ durnya ʊ, ŋn'ɩ gʊɔɔ zaar bam nɔ wɔɔ m. K'a wɔ ʊ, a Woso mɩŋŋa mɩsɩrbaa ba.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a a tɔ ʊ paan… a mɩsɩrbaa zore na a sɩrakarɛ bɩ ma, a Woso dɔrɛ na mɩsɩrbaa zore bɩ ma.
A a tɔ ʊ gʊta, a a da a mɩŋŋa ma, k'a tʊntɔʊrɛ na daamɩŋŋama bɩ ma, k'a mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ na tʊntɔʊrɛ bɩ ma,
k'a a tɔ ʊ sɔ, a bakʊmmɩŋŋa na mɩsɩrbaa k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bɩ ma, k'a ŋʊarɛ na bakʊmmɩŋŋa bɩ ma.
K'awɔɔ ɩ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro bam tee…, ŋ y'a karɛ awɔɔ n ziro ba gʊta a bɩr wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista dɔm tee….
Bala, gʊaa kʊ hɔɔ nɔɔn duro ba zi bɩ, bʊʊ n a zaa m, an n'a wɔ dɩndam, a tɔ ba a nɔ ʊ dɔ, a ʊ, n y'a mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊ a ma biisi y.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m danyɩnɔ, Woso y'awɔɔ bɔ ʊ, k'a a tɔ ʊ, a gɔɔta a zuure nɔ ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ. K'awɔɔ ba ncɩnaaʊ, awɔɔ b'a dom fɩɩga y.
Yɩ a nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ, Woso n zaa ka awɔɔ ʊ fasɩ, awɔɔ n gasʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʊ wɔɔ Bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ cirbəə kʊ k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ b'ʊ.
Naa tɔ ma m, mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam kʊ m bɩr hɔɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʊ, baa k'awɔɔ ŋ dɔ kara, an nɩ zum sɩra naa do ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ bɩ kɩ.
Bɩ, mɔɔ y'a gɩngam m ʊ, a a ga m kʊ m bɩr hɔɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ darɛ awɔɔ nɔ ʊ tee…, kʊ mɔɔ gɔɔta m m mɩsɩr naa dɔmɩm ʊ, k'awɔɔ b'a zu a ʊ y.
Mɔɔ dɔ mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ hʊrlɛ a zɔ durnya naa ʊ, amba wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista nyɩnta an a hɩ mɔɔ m bɩ m.
Bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ m tɔŋ ʊ, k'an bɩr yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, mɔɔ baʊrɛ jɛ ʊ, awɔɔ a da ma dɔmɩm haay nɔ ʊ a hɔdɩndarɛrɔ nɔɔn duro tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Bala, yo bɛɛ wɔɔ ʊ ŋʊaar dɔrɛ noonno ma, ʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista k'a nɩ zɛm kan paŋŋa gʊta kɩ bɩ dɩnda awɔɔ nɩ y. A mɩŋŋa yɩ wɔɔ ʊ ʊ zim a lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊta nɔ ʊ.
Wakatɩ kʊ Zɩ Woso daʊrɛ kan lɛbɔʊrɛ kɩ ka ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ nyɩnta b'ʊ. Woso mɩŋŋa nyɩnta a lɛbɔʊrɛ gʊta nɔ ʊ, an meer ba kan kɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ Nyɩ m naa do, mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam gʊta.»
Nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ ʊ kan kɩ ci mɩŋŋa bɩ burə ʊ bɩ, wɔɔ leer naa do k'a a to brama bɩ ma ʊ zim.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, wɔɔ sɩra ka gʊta, ʊ ʊ, lemim kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ a hɩ bɩ, sɩra m. A a ga m, k'awɔɔ n lemim bɩ si mɩŋŋa, bala, fɩtɩrɛ m, an nɩ yɔm monsigə ʊ, k'a gɔɔta a lemim bɩ si kʊ lɛɛgure dɔmɩm n a ku, kʊ Krista k'a bɔ kʊ ʊ kan dɔgta monyaa kɩ bɩ n bʊr, an lɛɛ gu awɔɔ heerlɔ wɔɔ ʊ.
A n cem haay bɩ, k'a dɔ a ʊ, gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an wosolɛsinnɩsorameerbaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Wosoci b'ʊ rɔ wɔɔ jɩ dɩnda a zim nɩ y.
Bala, gʊaa bɛɛ hɔɔn bɔ ʊ a zim, k'a wosolɛsinnɩsora meer ba y, fɩɩga. Bɩ, *Sɛnt-Ɛspri y'a ka gʊɔɔ n wɔ ʊ, ŋnɩ Woso lɛ si, ŋnɩ so ra.

Biisi bɩ, ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ nyɩnta ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ dogʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla. Kɛɛrɛ sɔ naa, ŋʊaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ nyɩntarɛ awɔɔ barla. Ŋ gasʊm hɔdɩndarɛrɔ bʊnyaarɔ m awɔɔ bire ʊ lɔɔ…, ŋnɩ bɩsɩ ka Zuuba k'a ŋ bʊmbɔ bɩ ma. Naa ŋn'a bam hʊnhʊrlɛ n bɩ daata zɛ ŋ la, an ŋ zar.
Gʊɔɔ gʊta zure ŋ jɛ ʊ, ŋ jaandarɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ, ŋn'a kam gʊɔɔ n sɩra zaa bɩ sʊnsɔ wʊ.
Busoo lɛtaama gʊta y'a sore ŋ ʊ, bɩ n a ka, ŋnɩ bra ba awɔɔ m meerbaarɔ nyɩntɔɔ m, k'a hɔ yɩ awɔɔ gʊr zi. Bɩ, Woso lɛɛ ka an a cɩnta tee… k'a ŋ dʊdɔ yar, ŋ zaarbarɛ ɩ zɛm k'a bɩ ŋ ku.
Makrarɔ ba n nɩ: Woso n malɛɛkarɔ kʊ ŋ kʊrɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ to y, ŋ nyɔɔ a ʊ, an ŋ da sɛhar ʊ, ŋnɩ baŋŋarɔ n'a ma monsigə ʊ, ŋnɩ dɔm dʊdɔyarlɛ hinni ma.

Woso n durnya k'a nyɩnta ʊ biisi bɩ to y, a a ka hi gʊta n bʊr an bɩ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zaar ba, nyɩnta brɔɔ ʊ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ. Bɩ, Woso Nowee bʊmbɔ, kan gʊɔɔ vantɔɔ kɩ saanhɩna. Bɩ nyɩnta an nɩ zi mɩŋŋa barɛ pa dam.
Woso Sodɔm kʊ kan Gomɔɔr kʊ kɩ dʊdɔ yar an a ka sɛ n bɩ ŋ zar. A ba a ʊ maam, k'a hɔ k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ yɩm bɩ hɩnka.
A Lɔttɩ yɔ, nyɩnta b'ʊ gʊaa tɩrga, an nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa bʊnyaa bam a zamaana nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ, a heer n'a zarm.
Bala, k'a mɩŋŋa n tɩrga, an nɩ ŋ kʊ b'ʊ bɩ, a yɩ ŋ zibəə bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ yɩm, an nɩ ŋ mim mam, naa n a ka k'an tɩrga bɩ, a heer nɩ kɔm, gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zibəə bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.

Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a yɩm minno nɔɔn duro haay nɔ ʊ, ʊ ʊ, zaa kʊ Zuuba n'a sam, an n'a gʊɔɔ bʊmbɔm bɩ, a a dɔ. K'a y'a bam lɔ sɔ an gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ to, k'a bɩ ŋ dʊdɔ ka dʊdɔyarlɛ hinni ʊ, a fɩr ka ŋ ma, a a dɔ sɔ.

A fɩr kam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zure a lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma, an lɛ da. Brɔɔ bɩr yɛm Woso ma y. Ŋʊaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ kʊ mɔɔ ŋ mim hɩ awɔɔ m nɔ wɔɔ, ŋ heer ka, mɩŋŋabusurezannɔ m sɔ, ŋ leer ba malɛɛkarɔ ʊ y, brɔɔ sʊnsɔ ŋ n'a wʊm a hɔɔnhɔ ma.
Baa malɛɛkarɔ mɩŋŋɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ da ŋʊaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ wɔɔ m a paŋŋa kan a lɛbɔʊrɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ bɩ, ŋ bɩr malɛɛkarɔ vantɔɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yarlɛ y, bɩ ŋ bɩr ŋ sʊnsɔ wʊm Zuuba lɛɛ y.
Bɩ gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro bɔ kʊ ʊ kan poohɔɔ kɩ, ŋ hɔɔn ba ʊ y, ta ŋ nawʊ ʊ, kʊ n nɩ bɩ ŋ gʊr baŋŋarɔ ʊ, n nɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ. Hɔ kʊ ŋ n a dɔ bɩ n n'a sʊnsɔ wʊm. N zɛm bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ am poohɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.

Kʊ ŋ y'a ka gʊɔɔ ŋ fɩr yɩ bɩ, fɩryɩrɛ n nɩ nyɩntarɛ ŋ yawʊra sɔ. A lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ ŋʊa ŋ tɩr a ʊ, ŋnɩ ŋ ba sinsebir ma. A so k'awɔɔ ʊ tɩr a ʊ kʊ ma, k'a kʊ ŋʊarɛ hɔbɩrɛ bɩ bɩ, nyɩnta kʊ ŋ tɩr a ʊ kan awɔɔ kɩ ŋnɩ bɩr a heer nyɔɔm a ŋʊaar zibəə nɔ ʊ bɩ, ŋ taʊrɛ awɔɔ bire ʊ b'ɩ nyannɩ darɛ awɔɔ ma.

Ŋ ba zibəə m kʊ dɩga lannɔ ma, k'a mim bʊnyaa ba kan ŋ kɩ bɛɛ y. Ŋ bɩr kɔm kan mimbʊnyaa barɛ kɩ y, ŋn'a kam sɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ paŋŋa ba ʊ Woso zaa bɩ ra rɔ wɔɔ, ŋn'a dam mimbʊnyaa ʊ kan ŋ kɩ. Busoo yɩrɛ lɛtaama y'a so ŋ heer ʊ jilli. Woso lerbɔrɛ kʊsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ.
Ŋ zaa tɩrga bɩ to, ŋn'a nyʊnnyɔɔ. Bozɔɔr nyɩ Balam
zaa bɩ ŋ y'a sa, bɩ yɛ an a bʊnyaa ba k'a busoo yɩ.
Bɩ, Woso həən si ma a kʊrɔma bɩ tɔ ma. Bra bɩr meer barɛ y, bɩ, hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, bra meer ba kan kɩ am gʊaa hɔ bɩ m. Yɩ a ʊ, ncɩnaaʊ bra bɩ n wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa bɩ hɔɔzaabaa zibəə bɩ da jɩm ʊ.
Ŋʊaarhɔdɩndarɛzannɔ nɔɔm bɔ kʊ ʊ, kan hiyəə gəəro kɩ. Ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ sɔ kan warkʊ kʊ hɩnhɛr gʊta nɩ cenim nɩ kɩ, Woso lɛɛ banka ŋ nɩ monsigə gʊta ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩ gɔɔta ʊ.
A lɛ ŋn'a bɔrɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ʊ meerbaa vanvannɔ m, ŋn'ɩ ŋʊaar bam gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɔ nyaanlɛzannɔ bire ʊ lɛɛm nɔ wɔɔ m. Naa ba ŋ nawʊm a jaandarɛ lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ m, kʊ brɔɔ n jaan da sɔ.
Soamɩŋŋaʊ ler ŋn'a bɔm gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro m, an bɔkarɛ mimbʊnyaa lɔnnɔ nɩ ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ m. Bala, kʊ hɔ a so ɩ ʊ, hɔ bɩ do lɔ n'ɩ mɩ.

Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista, kʊ wɔɔ Bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ dɔ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋ bɔlɛm yɩ durnya zibəə bʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ dintim kam gʊaa ma rɔ wɔɔ wɔ ʊ. Bɩ, kʊ ŋ y'a ya, ŋnɩ gasʊ minno wɔɔ duro barɛ ʊ, hɔɔ wɔɔ duro barɛ n'a so ŋ ʊ, a yɩrɛ ŋ ma bʊnyaa gʊta, an lɛ da biisi m.
Kʊ jɩra ŋ y'a ʊ zaa k'an tɩrga bɩ dɔrɛ ra, k'a jɩra hɔɔ. Bɩ, ŋ y'a ku ŋn'a dɔ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ ŋn'a bɔ Woso lɛrɔ kʊ ŋ y'a dɩnda ŋ nɩ rɔ wɔɔ ʊ.

Mim niŋŋə k'a ŋ yɩ naa y'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, hɔ kʊ bɔɔr naa do a hɩ naa, sɩra m, a a hɩ, a ʊ: «Ji b'a bɔ, an aa hɔ k'a bɔ a rɛ bɩ bɩ.» A a y'a an a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ: «Kurkur kʊ n y'a sʊrgɔ lɛɛm-lɛɛm b'a ya an ta, an n'a birmim bɩtɛ ʊ.»

M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, mɔɔ ci hɩɩyazaa m naa, mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma. Ciro hɩɩyɔɔ nɔɔm haay nɔ ʊ bɩ, m ya mɔɔ ʊ, m nɩ som hɔɔ k'awɔɔ ŋ dɔ hɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ ra, kʊ ŋ tɔ n bɩr awɔɔ nɔ ʊ, k'a bɩr a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ma, amba a a ga m bɩ m.

Mɔɔ lɛ taa k'awɔɔ n meerbaarɔ kʊ wosolɛsinnɩsorazannɔ nyɩnta ŋn'a ba biisi rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ. K'a wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista, kʊ wɔɔ Bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ lɛ bɩ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ. A zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ a ŋ da ʊ, ŋn'a dɩnda awɔɔ m.
K'a ser ka a dɔ a ʊ, jɛ dɔmɩnnɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam a lɛtaamarɔ bʊnyaarɔ tɔ ma bala.
Ŋ yaa wʊrɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Yeezuu a hɩ a ʊ, a zɛm, gɛɛ lɔ? Bɩ bɔ m, an bʊr? Bala, wɔɔ zɩrɔ gɩnga laatʊ, bɩ durnya bɩ gɔɔta an n'a bɩncɛ ʊ, amba a nyɩnta ʊ a darɛ dɔmɩm ʊ bɩ m.»

Meerbaa naa do kʊ gʊɔɔ wɔɔ n'a bam naa, a tɔ ŋn'a bɔrɛ a nɔ ʊ, ŋ ʊ, biisi-biisi bɩ, Woso nyɩnta an meer ba, an a ka, brama kan tara kɩ n nyɩnta ʊ. Tara bɩ banka a ʊ hi m, zu a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan hi kɩ tara bɩ n ta ʊ.
Bɩ, durnya k'a nyɩnta ʊ biisi bɩ, hi a a zaar ba m sɔ.

Bɩ, Woso lemim deem-deem bɩ do a hɩ sɔ, a ʊ, kʊ sɛ n bɩ brama kan tara kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ʊ her lɔ nɔɔm zaar ba. Ŋ to Woso ʊ, k'a bɩ ŋ zaar ba hinni k'a nɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ bɩr yɛm ma rɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yarm, an ŋ zaar ba b'ʊ.
Bɩ, m gʊaasɩbɔɔ, hɔ deem n ta ʊ, a n a ga m k'awɔɔ n a tɔ bɔ a nɔ ʊ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ: Zuuba mɩm ʊ, dɔmɩm deem bɔ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, dɔɔraa tisi m, dɔɔraa tisi n bɔ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, dɔmɩm deem m.

Gʊɔɔ y'a hɔɔn darɛ ŋ ʊ, Zuuba bɩr hɔ k'a ler bɔ bɩ bam zɔɔ y. A bɩ ncɩnaaʊ y. A ɩ yɩrɛ ɩ ʊ, bʊr a nawʊrɛ a ma kan awɔɔ kɩ, k'a lɛ baa, k'awɔɔ gɔsɩ n nyaam bɩ tɔ ma. A ŋʊa a nawʊm kʊ gʊaa haay n a bɔ a taa m, an sugur yɛ.

A n bɔkarɛ, hinni kʊ Zuuba n nɩ zɛŋ ʊ bɩ, yɩ a nawʊrɛ am koor hɔ bɩ m. Hinni bɩ do ʊ bɩ, brama nyaanɩm bʊrga guta maam-maam nɔ ʊ, sɛ n hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama haay bɩ. Tara burə kan hɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a nɔ ʊ haay kɩ mim bɔm garga ra.
K'a yo sɛ n nɩ zɛm bɩ hɔ haay bɩ bɩ, awɔɔ a ga m a mɩsɩrbaa k'awɔɔ a ga m, a ba bɩ dɔ. Awɔɔ a ga m, a a mɩsɩrbaa ba zorebaa nɔ ʊ, a bɩr hɔ k'a Woso nɔ yɩ bam hɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
A bɩr dɔm Woso dɔmɩm bɩ ma, a bɩr a tʊntɔŋ ʊ gʊta, k'an bʊr zɔɔ. Hinni bɩ do ʊ, sɛ n nɩ brama zaar baŋ ʊ, hɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ brama rɔ wɔɔ haay n faan sɛwurəro wɔɔ sebtur nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ, Woso brama kan tara daa kɩ ler bɔ, tɩrgabaa nyɩntam durnya daa bɩ do ʊ. Naa wɔɔ ta ʊ heer lɛ, ʊ nɩ dɔm ma.
Naa tɔ ma bɩ, m gʊaasɩbɔɔ, kʊ dɔ wɔɔ nawʊm dɔmɩm naa do ma bɩ, k'a a tɔ ʊ paan… a bɩr mɩŋŋa, kʊ minsi bɩ nyɩnta a ma Woso mɩm ʊ y, k'a bɩr laafɩɩ m kan kɩ.

K'a dɩga wɔɔ Zuuba bʊraama bɩ ma, a dɔ a ʊ, toore an n'a karɛ awɔɔ ʊ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma a bʊmbɔrɛ yɩ. Wɔɔ danyɩ Pol kʊ wɔɔ n'a ŋʊam bɩ, a ci ba awɔɔ ma an a hɩ ncɩnaaʊ sɔ. Ci bɩ ba a ʊ, mindɔrɛ kʊ Woso a ka ʊ bɩ m.

Ciro k'a ŋ ba haay, k'a hɔ naa do mim dɩnda bɩ, naa do an n'a hɩm tee…. Ciro k'a ŋ ba rɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ bɩ, lɛɛ niŋŋoo ta ʊ ŋ jɩ marɛ wer n ta ʊ. Gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hɔsɩ dɔ, bɩ ŋ bɩr jɩnɩm kɔɔkɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ tɩr ŋ jɩ bɩ lʊr, amba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n'a bam Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ vantɔɔ m bɩ m. A ba kʊ ŋ nawʊrɛ ncɩnaaʊ naa, a mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋn'a zaar barɛ a zim.
Bɩ, m gʊaasɩbɔɔ, k'awɔɔ m, mɔɔ lɛɛ ka, m hɔ k'a n ta ʊ hɩ awɔɔ m. Naa tɔ ma bɩ, k'a dundo a zi, kʊ gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ nyʊnnyɔɔrɛ zibəəro b'a nyʊnnyɔɔ y, k'a b'a gaa jɩnjɩ k'a ŋ ta ʊ kɔɔkɔɔ naa ʊ y.
Bɩ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr tam lɛɛ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista kʊ wɔɔ Bʊmbɔrɛzaa m bɩ barka kan a dɔrɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ tee…. A tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʊ. Amina!
I John: Hɔ k'a nyɩnta ʊ a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ, wɔɔ n a ma, wɔɔ n a yɩ, ʊ mɩm m. Wɔɔ n dɩga a sɩɩ…, ʊ ʊ wɔ da ma, an nɩ mɩsɩrbaa Lemim dɩndam bɩ,
bala, mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do a hɩnka wɔɔ n a yɩ, ʊ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ, ʊ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ mim hɩrɛ awɔɔ m. A ɩ nyɩnta Zɩ zi, an b'a hɩnka wɔɔ m.
Hɔ kʊ wɔɔ yɩ, ʊ a ma sɔ bɩ, wɔɔ y'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m sɔ, k'awɔɔ n a da ma, a a zɛ kʊ ra kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan Zɩ kɩ kan a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista kɩ.
Naa wɔɔ n'a gʊrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma, kʊ wɔɔ heernyɔɔ bɩ n yɩ gʊta.
Lemim kʊ wɔɔ ma zi, ʊ n'a pa darɛ awɔɔ m bɩ ba n nɩ. Woso bɩ, lɛɛgure m. Monsigə ba zi fɩɩgaa y.
Kʊ wɔɔ hɩ, wɔɔ ʊ: «Wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan kɩ», ʊ bɔkarɛ, ʊ nɩ tam monsigə ʊ, ŋʊaar wɔɔ n'a barɛ, bɩ wɔɔ bɩr sɩra barɛ y.
Bɩ, kʊ wɔɔ ɩ tam lɛɛgure ʊ, amba a mɩŋŋa nɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʊ bɩ nɩ, wɔɔ ʊ zɛ kʊ ra kan ʊ muno kɩ, b'a Nyɩ Yeezuu bɩ ma bɩ nɩ wɔɔ hubɔm wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ haay nɔ ʊ.
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ: «Mimbʊnyaa ba wɔɔ ma y», bra wɔɔ n'a barɛ ʊ mɩŋŋɔɔ m, sɩra bɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y.
Kʊ wɔɔ ʊ mimbʊnyaarɔ bɔ ʊ lɛ ma Woso taa, a wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur kam wɔɔ ʊ, an tɩrgabaawar haay gʊ wɔɔ ma, bala, sɩrazaa m b'a tɩrga sɔ.
Kʊ wɔɔ hɩ, wɔɔ ʊ: «Mimbʊnyaabənno bɛɛ m wɔɔ nɩ», a ba wɔɔ ʊ ŋʊaarzaa, b'a meerbaa ba wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y.
M nyɩnzɛɛnnyɩnɔ, naa gʊrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ minto, k'a bɩ mimbʊnyaa ba y. Bɩ, kʊ gʊaa mimbʊnyaa ba, wɔɔ mimbankarɛzaa ta ʊ Zɩ taa, Yeezuu Krista k'an tɩrga bɩ m.
Bala, a mɩŋŋa ɩ nyɩnta mannɩhɔ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ minto. Bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔ wɔɔ minto bɛɛ m bala y, durnyazannɔ haay hɔɔ minto m sɔ.
Kʊ wɔɔ zu a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, wɔɔ Woso dɔ.
Gʊaa k'a hɩ, a ʊ: «Mɔɔ dɔ», b'a bɩr zure a lɛrɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ŋʊaarzaa m, sɩra b'a nɔ ʊ y.
Bɩ kʊ gʊaa a meerbaa bɩ si, kan sɩra kɩ, a zaa Woso ŋʊa paan…. Bɩ minto bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, ʊ ɩ kan kɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa a ʊ, a ɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ, pakra m k'a mɩŋŋa m zu zaa kʊ Yeezuu a sa b'ʊ.
M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, lɛ daa bɛɛ mɔɔ n'a gʊrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma y, lɛ gusire m, awɔɔ n ta m a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ. Lɛ gusire naa do, meerbaa k'awɔɔ ma bɩ m.
Bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, lɛ daa mɔɔ n'a gʊrsɩra barɛ awɔɔ ma. Bɩ naa sɩra, kan Krista kɩ, kan awɔɔ kɩ sɔ. Bala, monsigə ɩ cenim, lɛɛgure denter paan… b'ɩ yɔm kaka.
Gʊaa k'a ʊ, a ɩ lɛɛgure nɔ ʊ, an bɔkarɛ, an sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, a gɔɔta, an nɩ monsigə ʊ tee….
Gʊaa k'a danyɩ ŋʊa b'ɩ lɛɛgure ʊ, bɩ hɔsɩ ba zi an b'a dam ma, an a ka an a gəm zɛ y.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, monsigə nɔ an ta ʊ. A n nɩ tam monsigə ʊ, b'a n a dɔ kʊ ta an nawʊm ka y. Bala, monsigə b'a mɩm ta.
A gʊrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma, m nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, bala, awɔɔ a mimbʊnyaarɔ sugur yɩ, Yeezuu Krista tɔ minto.
Zɩrɔ, a gʊrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma, bala, awɔɔ Gʊaa k'a nyɩnta ʊ a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ dɔ. A gʊrsɩra mɔɔ n'a barɛ awɔɔ ma gʊɔɔ pooro, bala, awɔɔ bʊr *Bʊnyaabarɛzaa ra.

A gʊrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, m nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, bala, awɔɔ Zɩ dɔ. A gʊrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, zɩrɔ, bala, awɔɔ Gʊaa k'a nyɩnta ʊ a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ dɔ. A gʊrsɩra mɔɔ ba awɔɔ ma, gʊɔɔ pooro, bala, awɔɔ paŋŋa ta ʊ, bɩ Woso lemim gɔɔta awɔɔ ʊ, a bʊr *Bʊnyaabarɛzaa ra.
A bɩ durnya ŋʊa, kan hɔ k'a n'a nɔ ʊ bɩ kɩ y. Kʊ gʊaa durnya ŋʊa, Zɩ ŋʊarɛ b'a nɔ ʊ y.
Bala, hɔ haay k'a nɩ durnya nɔ ʊ bɩ, mɛsim lɛtaama, mɩm lɛtaama bʊnyaa, mɩŋŋabusure arzaka nɔ ʊ, naa haay n a to Zɩ zi y. A to a ʊ durnya nɔ ʊ.
Durnya ɩ cenim kan a lɛtaamarɔ kɩ. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso hɔɔnhɔ bam bɩ gɔɔtam dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
M nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, dɔmɩm jɛzaa a ku. Awɔɔ ma, n n a pa da, n ʊ, Krista jɩm b'ɩ zɛm. A n a sɩŋŋɩda sa naa ma, Krista jɩnnɔ wɔɔ a hɩnka gʊta. Naa minto y'a ka, wɔɔ n'a dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, dɔmɩm jɛzaa a ku.
A to ŋ y'a ʊ wɔɔ zi, bɩ ŋ n nyɩnta wɔɔ gʊɔɔ y. Kʊ nyɩnta ŋ y'a ʊ wɔɔ gʊɔɔ, ŋ gɔɔtam kan wɔɔ kɩ. Bɩ, pakra m, kʊ gʊaa haay n a dɔ paan… a ʊ, wɔɔ gʊɔɔ bɛɛ m gʊaa haay nɩ y.
K'awɔɔ nɩ, Krista bɩ *Sɛnt-Ɛspri ka awɔɔ ʊ, b'awɔɔ haay, awɔɔ sɩra dɔ kɛɛrɛ.
Mɔɔ n a gʊrsɩra ba awɔɔ ma, mɔɔ ʊ, awɔɔ n sɩra dɔ y, awɔɔ dɔ. B'awɔɔ dɔ sɔ, a ʊ, ŋʊaar n a to sɩra nɔ ʊ y.
Nka m ŋʊaarzaa? Kʊ bɩ m gʊaa k'a nɩ bɩsɩ karɛ, a ʊ, Yeezuu bɩ Krista bɛɛ nɩ y. Krista jɩm bɩ, gʊaa k'a bɩsɩ ka Zɩ kan Nyɩ kɩ ma m.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a bɩsɩ ka Nyɩ bɩ ma, a ba kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ sɔ y. Gʊaa k'a a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʊ, a Nyɩ bɩ dɔ bɩ, a ɩ kan Zɩ bɩ kɩ sɔ.
Bɩ k'awɔɔ nɩ, kʊ lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma a sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ n gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʊ. Kʊ lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma bɩ gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʊ, awɔɔ gɔɔta sɔ, an nɩ Nyɩ kan Zɩ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Lerbɔrɛ niŋŋə kʊ Zɩ a bɔ wɔɔ m bɩ m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m.
Naa gʊrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ ma gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa k'awɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ rɔ wɔɔ minto.

K'awɔɔ nɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'awɔɔ si Krista bɩ zi bɩ, a gɔɔta awɔɔ heer ʊ. Pakra bɛɛ m kʊ n nɩ hɔ dɩnda a m dɔ y. Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ hɔ haay dɩndarɛ awɔɔ m. A hɔdɩndarɛ bɩ sɩra m, ŋʊaar bɛɛ y. K'a gɔɔta Krista nɔ ʊ, amba a hɔ dɩnda awɔɔ m bɩ m.
Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, m nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, k'a gɔɔta Krista nɔ ʊ, k'a b'a hɩnka, k'ʊ heer n bɩr kookoo, kʊ wɔɔ bɩ nyannɩ yɩ a taa, ʊ ʊ ba ma laatʊ a zɛrɛ hinni ʊ y.
K'awɔɔ dɔ, a ʊ, Krista tɩrga bɩ, k'a dɔ sɔ a ʊ, gʊaa k'a nɩ tɩrgabaa zi barɛ, Woso nyɩ m paan….
K'a dɩga ŋʊarɛ gʊta kʊ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʊ, an nɩ wɔɔ birm a nyɩnɔ bɩ ma. Bɩ, sɩra m, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ y'a ka, durnya b'a dam ma, an wɔɔ dɔ y. Bala, durnyazannɔ wɔɔ n Woso dɔ y.

M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, Woso nyɩnɔ m wɔɔ m. Bɩ, nyɩnta kʊ wɔɔ n nɩ zɛm b'a ʊ hɔ niŋŋə bɩ, bɩ n a hɩnka cɩna y. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, k'a b'a hɩnka, wɔɔ zɛm bɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan kɩ. Bala, k'a lɔ, wɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ.
Gʊaa niŋŋə k'an ta taaheerlɛ naa do m Krista nɔ ʊ bɩ, a ɩ dintim gʊrɛ a ma, k'a yɩ mɩŋŋa amba Yeezuu m mɩŋŋa bɩ m.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a mimbʊnyaa ba, kaanm a nawʊm Woso lɛ m, bala, mimbʊnyaa bɩ, kaanm lɛ m m.
Awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Yeezuu bʊr k'a bɩ mimbʊnyaarɔ gʊngʊ wɔɔ ma, bɩ mimbʊnyaa ba ma y.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a gɔɔta kan kɩ, a bɩr mimbʊnyaa bam dʊntɔ y. Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaa bam, a n a yɩ, b'a n a dɔ sɔ y.
M nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, k'a bɩ yɛ kʊ gɔsɩ n'awɔɔ nyʊnnyɔɔ y. Gʊaa k'a nɩ tɩrgabaa zi bam bɩ tɩrga, amba Yeezuu n tɩrga bɩ m.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ mimbʊnyaa bam, Sʊtaana gʊaa m. Bala, mimbʊnyaabər m Sʊtaana m a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ. Bɩ minto y'a ka Woso Nyɩ bɩ n bʊr k'a bɩ Sʊtaana zibəəro zaar ba.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay kʊ Woso a yɩ bɩ bɩr mimbʊnyaa bam dʊntɔ y, a mɩsɩrbaa hɔdo bɩ y'a nɔ ʊ, a b'a dam ma, an mimbʊnyaa ba dʊntɔ y, bala Woso y'a yɩ.
Naa minto y'a ka n nɩ Woso nyɩnɔ dɔ, n nɩ ŋ bɔ kʊ zi kan Sʊtaana hɔɔ kɩ. Gʊaa k'a bɩr tɩrgabaa zi barɛ y, b'a bɩr a danyɩ ŋʊam sɔ y, Woso gʊaa bɛɛ y.
Kʊ sɩra m, lemim niŋŋə k'awɔɔ ma a sɩŋŋɩda ma bɩ n naa: Ʊ kʊ ŋʊa.
A b'a ba am Kayɛn hɔ bɩ nɩ y, kʊ *Bʊnyaabarɛzaa gʊaa m bɩ, a a danyɩ zɛ gər. Bɩ, bɔ minto an a zɛ? K'a zibəəro wɔɔ nyɩnta bʊnyaa, a danyɩ bɩ zibəəro wɔɔ n nyɩnta tɩrga bɩ m.
Kʊ durnya sɔ awɔɔ m, m danyɩnɔ, a bɩ zɛ kədə y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, bɔ wɔɔ ʊ zɛ nɔ ʊ, ʊ bʊr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ ʊ danyɩnɔ ŋʊa bɩ minto. Gʊaa k'a bɩr a danyɩ ŋʊam bɩ gɔɔta zɛ nɔ ʊ.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a sɔ a danyɩ m bɩ, gərzer m. B'awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, gərzer deem taan… ba mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɩ a zi y.
Hɔ k'a a ka wɔɔ n ŋʊarɛ k'an hɔ niŋŋə bɩ dɔ ba n nɩ: Yeezuu a mɩsɩrbaa ka wɔɔ minto. A a ga m sɔ, wɔɔ n ʊ mɩsɩrbaa ka, ʊ danyɩnɔ minto.
Kʊ gʊaa ɩ durnya naa do arzakarɔ m, an a danyɩ yɩ cicir nɔ ʊ, b'a n a da han y, Woso ŋʊarɛ bɩ y'a bam lɔ k'a bɩr a zaa ʊ?
M nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, ʊ bɩ ŋʊarɛ ba lɛmindɔ m kan meerbaa kɩ nɔ ʊ y. Ʊ kʊ ŋʊa, zibəə barɛ kan sɩra kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Naa minto, wɔɔ y'a dɔrɛ ʊ ʊ, ʊ ɩ sɩra nɔ ʊ, bɩ wɔɔ heerkoodəbaa yɩm zi.
Bala, kʊ wɔɔ heer ɩ mim kam wɔɔ ra, Woso gʊtabaa lɛ da wɔɔ heer la, a hɔ haay dɔ.
M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, kʊ wɔɔ heer bɩr mim kam wɔɔ ra, wɔɔ heer koodə Woso zi.
Kʊ wɔɔ hɔ yɛ han, wɔɔ y'a yɩrɛ, bala, wɔɔ a lɛrɔ wɔɔ si, ʊ nɩ hɔ k'a nɔ yɩ bɩ barɛ.
Ba a lɛ n na: K'ʊ sɩra ka a Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista bɩ tɔ ʊ, k'ʊ kʊ ŋʊa amba a lɛ ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Gʊaa k'a n'a lɛrɔ wɔɔ sire, a ɩ kan Woso kɩ, Woso nɩ kan kɩ sɔ. Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, a ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto.

M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, a bɩ sɩra ka gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ ʊ, a ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m nɔ wɔɔ ʊ y. K'a ŋ ka a lɛɛ a dɩga ŋ ma, kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri ŋ nɩ ta m paan… gɛɛ hɔ vanta m gɛ. Bala, ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ gʊta y'a kərgu durnya ra.
Hɔ niŋŋə k'a n'a karɛ awɔɔ m Sɛnt-Ɛspri bɩ dɔ bɩ ba n nɩ: Gʊaa k'a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʊ, Yeezuu Krista a ba gʊaa bɩ, a ɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri m.
Bɩ gʊaa haay k'a bɩr Yeezuu Krista kasɛtɩ karɛ ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, bɩ zaa b'a Sɛnt-Ɛspri nɩ y. Zinə k'a nɩ Krista jɩm nɔ ʊ bɩ m, awɔɔ n a ma, n n'a hɩrɛ n ʊ, a ɩ zɛm bɩ. B'a lee ku durnya nɔ ʊ kaka.
Awɔɔ kʊ Woso nyɩnɔ n'awɔɔ m bɩ, m nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, awɔɔ paŋŋa bʊr ŋʊaarlɛsinnɩsorazannɔ wɔɔ duro ra. Bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a nɩ kan awɔɔ kɩ bɩ paŋŋa lɛ da zinə k'a nɩ kan durnyazannɔ kɩ bɩ ra.
Durnyazannɔ n ŋ mɩ, ŋn'ɩ durnya mim dɩndam, durnya n'a tʊr karɛ ŋ ma.

Wɔɔ, Woso gʊɔɔ m wɔɔ m. Gʊaa k'a Woso dɔ bɩ, a tʊr an n'a kam wɔɔ ma. Gʊaa kʊ Woso gʊaa bɛɛ bɩ bɩr a tʊr kam wɔɔ ma y. Bɩ, wɔɔ nɩ Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'an sɩra bɩ dɔm ma kan zinə k'a nɩ Krista jɩm nɔ ʊ, an nɩ ŋʊaar bam bɩ kɩ.
M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, ʊ kʊ ŋʊa, bala, ŋʊarɛ bɩ, a to a ʊ Woso zi. Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a a mim ŋʊa Woso y'a yɩ, a Woso dɔ.
Gʊaa k'a bɩr a mim ŋʊarɛ, a n Woso dɔ y, bala, Woso bɩ ŋʊarɛzaa m.
Woso ŋʊarɛ k'a hɩnka wɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ ba n nɩ: Woso a Nyɩ deem nyɔɔ durnya ʊ, kʊ wɔɔ n mɩsɩrbaa ba a minto.
Ba a ŋʊarɛ bɩ n na: Wɔɔ bɛɛ ɩ Woso ŋʊa y, a ɩ wɔɔ ŋʊa. A y'a Nyɩ nyɔɔ, k'an bɩ nyɩnta mannɩhɔ wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ minto.
M gʊaasɩbɔɔ, kʊ Woso wɔɔ ŋʊa ncɩnaaʊ, wɔɔ sɔ, wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ kʊ ŋʊa.
Gɔsɩ n Woso yɩ cɩna y. Kʊ wɔɔ kʊ ŋʊa, Woso ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, b'a ŋʊarɛ b'ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ paan….
Sɛnt-Ɛspri k'a a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ minto, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, wɔɔ ɩ kan kɩ, an nɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ.
Bɩ wɔɔ yɩ, wɔɔ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ, wɔɔ ʊ, Woso a Nyɩ bɩ nyɔɔ k'an bɩ yɩ durnya bʊmbɔrɛzaa.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a bɔ a lɛ ma, a ʊ, Yeezuu Krista bɩ Woso Nyɩ nɩ, Woso ɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ, an nɩ kan Woso kɩ.
Bɩ wɔɔ, wɔɔ Woso ŋʊarɛ k'an ta m wɔɔ minto bɩ dɔ, wɔɔ sɩra ka naa ʊ sɔ. Woso bɩ, ŋʊarɛzaa m. Gʊaa k'a gɔɔta ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, a zaa ɩ gɔɔtam kan Woso kɩ, Woso nɩ gɔɔtam kan kɩ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋʊarɛ nɩ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ paan…, wɔɔ n n'ʊ dam ma, ʊ heerkoodəbaa yɩ dʊdɔkarɛ hinni ʊ. Bala, Yeezuu k'an hɔ niŋŋə bɩ, wɔɔ maam sɔ durnya naa do nɔ ʊ.
Dabɔʊ ba ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ y. Bɩ ŋʊarɛ paan… ɩ lam nyibəə ra. Bala, nyibəə ɩ kan booti fɩryɩrɛ kɩ. Bɩ, gʊaa k'a nɩ nyi barɛ, ŋʊarɛ paan… b'a nɔ ʊ y.
Kʊ wɔɔ nɩ, wɔɔ ɩ kʊ ŋʊam, bala, Woso ɩ lɛɛ ka an wɔɔ ŋʊa.
Kʊ gʊaa a hɩ a ʊ: «Mɔɔ ɩ Woso ŋʊam», an bɔkarɛ, an sɔ a danyɩ m, ŋʊaarzaa m. Sɩra m, gʊaa k'a bɩr a danyɩ k'a n'a yɩm bɩ ŋʊarɛ, a b'a dam ma, an Woso k'a bɩr a yɩm bɩ ŋʊa y.
Ba lɛ kʊ Krista a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ n na: Gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso ŋʊam, k'an a danyɩ ŋʊa sɔ.
Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a sɩra ka a ʊ, Yeezuu bɩ Krista m, Woso nyɩ m. Gʊaa niŋŋə haay k'a Zɩ ŋʊa, a a Nyɩ ŋʊa sɔ.
Hɔ k'a n'a hɩnkarɛ a ʊ, wɔɔ Woso nyɩnɔ ŋʊa bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʊ wɔɔ Woso ŋʊa, ʊ nɩ zure a lɛrɔ ʊ.
Ba wɔɔ ŋʊarɛ kan Woso kɩ bɩ n na: Kʊ wɔɔ n a lɛrɔ si. B'a lɛrɔ wɔɔ, mɔr gorezaa bɛɛ y.
Bala, gʊaa haay kʊ Woso y'a yɩ bɩ bʊr durnya ra. Hɔ k'a bʊr durnya ra bɩ, wɔɔ sɩrakarɛ m.
Nka ɩ bʊr durnya ra? Kʊ bɩ m, gʊaa k'a sɩra ka, a ʊ, Yeezuu bɩ, Woso Nyɩ m.
Yeezuu Krista ɩ bʊr durnya ʊ, an a hɩnka hi m kan ma kɩ. Hi bɛɛ m bala y, hi m kan ma kɩ. Bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a kasɛtɩ kam, bala, Sɛnt-Ɛspri m sɩra.
Ŋ kaakʊ, ŋ n'a kasɛtɩ karɛ:
Sɛnt-Ɛspri, hi kan ma kɩ. Bɩ ŋ kaakʊ rɔ wɔɔ kasɛtɩ deem ŋ n'a karɛ.
Kʊ wɔɔ ɩ gʊɔɔ kasɛtɩ sire, Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ gʊtabaa lɛ da. Ba Woso kasɛtɩ bɩ n na: A kasɛtɩ ka a Nyɩ b'ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a sɩra ka Woso Nyɩ b'ʊ, a ɩ kasɛtɩ naa do m a heer ʊ. Gʊaa k'a n sɩra ka Woso ʊ bɩ, Woso ba an nawʊm ŋʊaarzaa. K'a n sɩra ka kasɛtɩ kʊ Woso a ka a Nyɩ b'ʊ bɩ minto.
Ba kasɛtɩ bɩ n na: Woso mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ ka wɔɔ ʊ, bɩ mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do ɩ Nyɩ bɩ zi.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ kan Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa m. Gʊaa k'a ba kan Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ, a ba mɩsɩrbaa bɩ do nɩ y.
Naa haay gʊrsɩra ba mɔɔ ʊ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ k'a nɩ sɩra kam Woso Nyɩ b'ʊ bɩ, k'awɔɔ n a dɔ a ʊ, a ɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ m.
Hɔ k'a nɩ wɔɔ heer bam kookoo Woso zi bɩ ba n nɩ: Kʊ wɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə yɛ han an zu a hɔɔnhɔ ʊ, a y'a tʊr kam wɔɔ ma.
Bɩ kʊ wɔɔ dɔ, ʊ ʊ, kʊ bɔ wɔɔ yɛ han a y'a tʊr kam wɔɔ ma bɩ, wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, wɔɔ ɩ hɔ kʊ wɔɔ yɛ bɩ m.

Kʊ gʊaa a danyɩ yɩ, an nɩ mimbʊnyaa barɛ, mimbʊnyaa bɩ do bɩr tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ, k'an yaa da. Woso mɩsɩrbaa kaŋ ʊ, kʊ mimbʊnyaa bɩ do bɩr tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ paan… y. Bala, mimbʊnyaa ta ʊ, an nɩ tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ. Mimbʊnyaa bɩ do minto bɛɛ mɔɔ ʊ, a yaa da y.
Zibəə bʊnyaa haay bɩ, mimbʊnyaa m. Bɩ, mimbʊnyaa haay bɛɛ nɩ tam zɛ bɩncɛ ʊ y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, gʊaa niŋŋə haay kʊ Woso a yɩ bɩ bɩr mimbʊnyaa bam dʊntɔ y. Bala, Woso Nyɩ b'ɩ dɔm ma, *Bʊnyaabarɛzaa bɩr heer bam ma y.
Wɔɔ dɔ wɔɔ ʊ, Woso gʊɔɔ m wɔɔ m, bɩ durnya haay jilli ɩ *Bʊnyaabarɛzaa wɔ ʊ.
Bɩ wɔɔ dɔ sɔ wɔɔ ʊ, Woso Nyɩ bʊr, an bɩ wɔɔ hɔɔn gu, k'ʊ Woso paan… bɩ dɔ. Bɩ Woso paan… Nyɩ Yeezuu Krista nɔ wɔɔ n ta ʊ. A m Woso paan…, a m mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ.
M nyɩnɔ ŋʊarɛrɔ, a b'a ka a *wosobaawɔnnɔ wɔɔ da ʊ y.
II John: Mɔɔ, *Gʊaagusire, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do nyɔɔ lʊ kʊ Woso a bɔ ʊ bɩ ma kan a nyɩnɔ kɩ, mɔɔ nɩ ŋ ŋʊam paan…. Mɔɔ bɛɛ bala y, bɩ mɔɔ kan gʊɔɔ haay kʊ ŋ sɩra dɔ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ.
Sɩra ɩ kan wɔɔ kɩ, b'a nyɩntam kan wɔɔ kɩ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kan Yeezuu Krista, Woso Nyɩ bɩ kɩ barka nyɩntam kan wɔɔ kɩ, kan a cicirzɛrɛ kɩ, a laafɩɩ kɩ, sɩra kan ŋʊarɛ kɩ nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʊta yɩ, kʊ mɔɔ ɩ nyɩnɔ gɔsɩnnɔ yɩ, ŋn'ɩ tam sɩra zaa ra, amba lɛ kʊ wɔɔ Zɩ Woso a ka wɔɔ ʊ bɩ m.
Naa ma kɛɛrɛ bɩ, lʊ, mɔɔ y'a yɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ han, ʊ kʊ ŋʊa. Mɔɔ bɩr lɛ daa gʊrsɩra barɛ ɩbɩɩ ma y, lɛ kʊ wɔɔ yɩ hallɩ a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ m.
Ba ŋʊarɛ n na: k'ʊ ta a lɛrɔ wɔɔ zaa bɩ ra. Lɛ naa do awɔɔ nyɩnta a ma a sɩŋŋɩda ʊ, k'awɔɔ n ŋʊarɛ zaa bɩ sa.
Bala, braba gʊɔɔ m zannɔ a kərgu durnya ra. Ŋ bɩr kasɛtɩ karɛ ŋ ʊ, Yeezuu Krista a ba gʊaa y. Gʊaa k'a nɩ naa bam bɩ, ŋʊaarzaa m, Krista jɩm m.
K'a dundo a zi, a b'a ka awɔɔ zibəə bɩ nyɔɔdʊ bɩ n nyaam y, bɩ k'a ganwʊrɛ haay k'an ta ʊ yɩ.
Gʊaa haay k'a bɩr gɔɔtam Krista hɔdɩndarɛ nɔ ʊ, an n'a hɔɔnhɔ zum la bɩ, a zaa ba kan Woso kɩ y. Gʊaa k'a gɔɔta a nɔ ʊ, a ɩ kan wɔɔ Zɩ Woso kɩ, a Nyɩ kɩ.
Kʊ gʊaa bʊr awɔɔ zi, b'a ba hɔdɩndarɛ naa do nɔ ʊ, a b'a si a har ʊ y, a b'a nyaasɩ ka y.
Bɩ gʊaa k'a nyaasɩ ka, a zɛ a ʊ kʊ ra kan kɩ a mimbʊnyaarɔ nɔ ʊ.
Minno ta ʊ gʊta mɔɔ nɩ ŋ ci barɛ awɔɔ ma, bɩ mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m ŋ ba, ci m kan gar hi kɩ nɩ y. A ŋʊa mɔɔ ʊ kʊ m bʊr awɔɔ zi, kʊ m bɩ meer ba, m lɛ m kan awɔɔ kɩ, kʊ wɔɔ heernyɔɔ n yɩ gʊta paan….
Ɩ danlʊ kʊ Woso a bɔ ʊ sɔ bɩ nyɩnɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m.
III John: Mɔɔ, *Gʊaagusire, mɔɔ ɩ ci naa do nyɔɔ m ŋʊarɛzaa paan… Gayus ma.
M gʊaasɩba mɩŋŋa, mɔɔ y'a yɛm Woso han k'ɩbɩɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa hɔ haay nɔ ʊ, k'ɩbɩɩ laafɩɩ bɩ n bɩr mɩŋŋa, amba ɩ nyi hɔ bɩ m.
Mɔɔ heer yɩ nyɩnta gʊta, bala, danyɩnɔ bʊr naa ʊ, ŋn'ɩbɩɩ mɩsɩrbaa kasɛtɩ karɛ, ŋ ʊ, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʊ. Bɩ denter m, ɩbɩɩ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʊ.
Mɔɔ heernyɔɔ gʊta k'a lɛ da haay bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ ma, ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ nyɩnɔ wɔɔ ɩ tam sɩra nɔ ʊ bɩ m.
M gʊaasɩba mɩŋŋa, ɩbɩɩ hɔbaa mɩŋŋa kan danyɩnɔ wɔɔ kɩ, baa kan saanarɔ wɔɔ kɩ sɔ bɩ, sɩrakarɛ zibəə m.
Ŋ y'ɩbɩɩ mɩŋŋabaa kasɛtɩ ka Krista gʊɔɔ taa. K'ɩbɩɩ ɩ da ŋ han amba Woso hɔɔnhɔ m, ŋ zaa sarɛ minto bɩ, a mɩŋŋa gʊta.
Krista tɔ minto y'a ka, ŋnɩ wuti, ŋn'ɩ tam, bɩ ŋ n hɔsɩ si gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Krista dɔ rɔ wɔɔ zi y.
Bɩ wɔɔ, wɔɔ ʊ ga m, ʊ daahan ka gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro ʊ, k'ʊ ʊ da ma, ʊ zi ba kan kʊ kɩ sɩra tɔ ma.
Mɔɔ ci ba Krista gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ma. Bɩ, Diyotrefɛs k'a nɩ lɛɛzaabaa ŋʊam ŋ barla bɩ, a bɩr yɛm mɔɔ hɔ ma y.

Bɩ, kʊ mɔɔ bɩ bʊr, mɔɔ bɔm hɔ niŋŋə k'a a ba mɔɔ m haay kan a meerbaa bʊnyaa kɩ bɩ m. Bɩ, a n a ba naa n a bɔ y. A lɛ baa k'a danyɩnɔ wɔɔ si sɔ y, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ lɛ n taa k'a ŋ si rɔ wɔɔ a y'a tarɛ ŋ nɩ tolle, an nɩ ŋ bɔm Krista gʊɔɔ wɔɔ barla.
M gʊaasɩba mɩŋŋa, ɩ bɩ gʊaa k'a bʊnyaa ba tar sa y, gʊaa k'a mɩŋŋa ba tar sa. Gʊaa k'a n'a mɩŋŋa barɛ, Woso gʊaa m, gʊaa k'a n'a bʊnyaa barɛ, a n Woso yɩ y.
Kʊ Demetrus nɩ, gʊaa haay y'a kasɛtɩ mɩŋŋa karɛ. Sɩra mɩŋŋa y'a kasɛtɩ kam. Wɔɔ y'a kasɛtɩ kam, b'ɩbɩɩ dɔ, ɩ ʊ, wɔɔ kasɛtɩ bɩ, sɩra m.
Minno ta ʊ gʊta, mɔɔ n a ŋʊa kʊ m ŋ ci ba ɩbɩɩ ma, bɩ mɔɔ lɛ baa kʊ m ŋ ba gʊrsɩrabarɛhɔ m kan gar hi kɩ nɩ y.
A ŋʊa mɔɔ ʊ, kʊ m b'ɩ yɩ dɔmɩm niŋŋə ʊ, k'ʊ sʊʊra ba kan kʊ kɩ.
Kʊ laafɩɩ n bɩr kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ! Gʊaasɩbɔɔ wɔɔ ɩ yaa darɛ ɩbɩɩ m, k'ɩ yaa da gʊaasɩbɔɔ wɔɔ m, gʊaa biyəə m.
Jude: Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Ziidi m nɩ ci bɩ bam, Yeezuu Krista zibəənyɩ m mɔɔ m, Zakkɩ dam m mɔɔ m sɔ. Ci bɩ ba mɔɔ nawʊrɛ awɔɔ ma, awɔɔ kʊ Zɩ Woso a ŋʊa, an awɔɔ bir k'a yɩ a gʊɔɔ, an nɩ dɔrɛ awɔɔ ma Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma rɔ wɔɔ.
Bɩ, kʊ Woso n a cicirzɛrɛ kan a laafɩɩ kɩ, a ŋʊarɛ kɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ gʊta.

M gʊaasɩbɔɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, mɔɔ ŋʊa gʊta kʊ m ci ba awɔɔ ma, kʊ m bʊmbɔrɛ kʊ wɔɔ ʊ da kʊ ʊ, ʊ n ta m bɩ mim dɩnda. Bɩ, mɔɔ bɩ dɩga a, pakra m kʊ m ci bɩ ba awɔɔ ma dɩɩtaa, kʊ m a yɛ a han k'a zoo ba sɩrakarɛ kʊ Woso a ka a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ ʊ gallɛm deem taan… dɔmɩm haay minto bɩ tɔ ma.

Bala, gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ a da wɔɔ zi, Woso barka lemim bɩ ŋ n'a nʊkʊm, k'a a da ma a mɩsɩrbaa ba a hɔɔnhɔ ma mimbʊnyaa barɛ nɔ ʊ, bɩsɩ ŋn'a kam Yeezuu Krista ma, an bɔkarɛ a mɩŋŋa y'a deem n soʊrezaa, a m wɔɔ Zuuba sɔ. Bɩ, Wosoci bɩ lɛɛ ka an gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro dʊdɔyarlɛ kʊ ŋ n'a yɩm mim hɩ laatʊ.

Hɔ kʊ mɔɔ n'a ŋʊam kʊ m a hɩ kɛɛrɛ naa, awɔɔ dɔ mɩŋŋa, bɩ, mɔɔ lɛ n taa kʊ m a tɔ da a nɔ ʊ. Zuuba k'a gʊɔɔ wɔɔ bʊmbɔ lɔmbaa nɔ ʊ Eziptɩ kʊ ʊ bɩ, a a ya an so ra an gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n yɛ ŋnɩ sɩra ka ʊ rɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛ.
Bɩ, malɛɛkarɔ kʊ ŋ y'a bɩncɛrɔ to, ŋn'a zerga paŋŋa kʊ Woso a ka ŋ ʊ bɩ rɛ rɔ wɔɔ, awɔɔ dɔ a ʊ, Woso brɔɔ da baŋŋarɔ ʊ monsigə nɔ ʊ dɔmɩm haay minto, k'a bɩ ŋ dʊdɔ ka dʊdɔkarɛ hinni gʊta b'ʊ.

Kʊ Sodɔm kan Gomɔɔr kɩ, kan kʊrɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ ŋ jɩr ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ mim nɩ, awɔɔ dɔ sɔ. Kʊrɔ nɔɔn duro a mɩŋŋɔɔ sa, ŋn'a ka dintim zibəəro wɔɔ ʊ sɔ, ŋn'ɩ jaandarɛ k'an bʊnyaa maam-maam bam. Naa tɔ ma m, Woso n ŋ dʊdɔ yar, ŋn'ɩ sɛ k'a lihire ba ʊ fɩryɩrɛ nɔ ʊ, ŋ fɩryɩrɛ bɩ, makra m sɔ, k'a gʊaa haay zɛ kəbə.

Kan naa kɩ haay, gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a da wɔɔ zi rɔ wɔɔ, a ba ŋ nawʊrɛ am kʊrɔ nɔɔn duro hɔ bɩ m. A hɔɔn ŋ n'a dam mim daŋŋadɔɔ ma, bɩ n'a kam ŋn'ɩ jaan dam, ŋ bɩr yɛm Zuuba ma y, malɛɛkarɔ paŋŋazannɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ sʊnsɔ wʊm sɔ.
A n bɔkarɛ, Malɛɛkarɔ haay cir Misɛl mɩŋŋa, bʊr k'a ʊ, an nɩ bɩsɩ kam kan Sʊtaana kɩ Moyiisi gər sarɛ ma bɩ, a n yɛ an meerbaa bʊnyaa ba Sʊtaana ma y. A hɩ a ʊ bala, a ʊ: «Zuuba fɩr karɛ ɩ ma.»
Bɩ, gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro, hɔ kʊ ŋ n a dɔ bɩ ŋn'a sʊnsɔ wʊm. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan poohɔɔ kɩ, ŋ ba hɔɔndarɛ zore nɩ y, hɔ k'a bʊr ŋ heer ʊ bɩ n'a bam, hɔ bɩ do bɔkarɛ an nɩ nyaanlɛ ŋ nɩ.
Kʊsɩ ɩ kan ŋ kɩ, bala, zu ŋ y'a ʊ Kayɛn hɔbaa ʊ, zi bʊnyaa ŋn'a bam k'a busoo yɩ am Balam
hɔ bɩ m. A mɩŋŋɔɔ ŋ n'a zarm, bala, ŋ y'a da a nyaa ma kan Woso kɩ, amba Kooree a ba bɩ m.

B'awɔɔ tɩr a so kʊ ma k'a hɔ bɩ danyɩbaa zɛkʊra nɔ ʊ bɩ, kʊ ŋ y'awɔɔ barla nyannɩ m, nyannɩ ba ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ nɩ kan hɔ bɩ bɩ maam-maam kɩ y, a hɔɔn ŋn'a darɛ a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma bala. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ, kan warkʊ kʊ hɩnhɛr n'a gaam, bɩ la bɩ bam bɩ kɩ. Ŋ bɔ kʊ ʊ sɔ kan gɔ k'a bɩr nyɩ darɛ y, baa a nyɩdarɛ dɔmɩm ʊ, bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan gɔrɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ wʊnwʊr ŋnɩ gɩnga fɩɩgaa rɔ kɩ.

Amba higʊta kurəro tɩr a fur bɔ a rɛ bɩ, a nyannɩ zibəəro wɔɔ kərgu ŋ nawʊm lɛɛ ra maam sɔ. Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ kʊ ʊ kan monyaarɔ kʊ ŋ n a tajɩ dɔ rɔ kɩ, Woso n ŋ to kʊ ŋ nɩ gɔɔta monsigə gʊta maam-maam nɔ ʊ dɔmɩm haay.
Adam yaŋŋa tɔɔlɛma saanhɩnazaa Enɔk lɛɛ ka an gʊɔɔ nɔɔm mim hɩ laatʊ hɔɔ, Woso lɛsinnɩsora meerbaa nɔ ʊ, a ʊ: «A ba n nɩ, Zuuba ɩ zɛm kan malɛɛkarɔ kɩ miliyɔn bam hɔka,

k'a bɩ durnya jilli dʊdɔ ka. A gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n Woso dɔ rɔ wɔɔ dʊdɔ yarm, ŋ zibəə bʊnyaarɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ ba haay bɩsɩ ka Woso ma nɔ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma. A yɩ ŋ dʊdɔ yarm sɔ meerbaarɔ bʊnyaarɔ kʊ bawosodɔrɛzannɔ nɔɔm ŋ ba Woso ma rɔ wɔɔ tɔ ma.»
Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro nɔ bɩr nyɔɔm fɩɩga y, kukur ŋn'a bam can, a mɩsɩrbaa bɩ ba ŋ nawʊm a lɛtaamarɔ barɛ nɔ ʊ bala. Mɩŋŋabusure meerbaarɔ ŋn'ɩ ŋ bam, ŋn'ɩ bra bɩmbam gʊɔɔ m k'a hɔ yɩ.
B'awɔɔ, m gʊaasɩbɔɔ ŋʊarɛ nɔ ʊ, k'a meerbaarɔ kʊ wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista zibəəzannɔ wɔɔ lɛɛ ka ŋnɩ ŋ ba kan awɔɔ kɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔ da a nɔ ʊ.
Ŋ y'a hɩ awɔɔ m, ŋ ʊ: «Dɔmɩm jɛzannɔ ʊ, gʊɔɔ nyɩntaŋ ʊ, ŋnɩ bɩr yaa wʊrɛ awɔɔ ma, ŋnɩ bɩr a mɩsɩrbaa bam a mɛsim lɛtaamarɔ nɔ ʊ, bawosodɔrɛ nɔ ʊ.»
Gʊɔɔ wɔɔ duro nɩ zɛm gʊngʊrɛrɔ m bɩ, durnya hɔɔndarɛrɔ y'a so ŋ ʊ, ŋ ba Woso Ɛspri nɩ y.
B'awɔɔ, m gʊaasɩbɔɔ, k'a gɔɔta a bɩr tam lɛɛ tee… a sɩrakarɛ k'an mɩŋŋa an cem bɩ nɔ ʊ, k'a bɩr yaa dam *Sɛnt-Ɛspri paŋŋa nɔ ʊ.
K'a gɔɔta Woso ŋʊarɛ bɩ nɔ ʊ, a bɩr dɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista ma, an nɩ zɛm bɩ mɩsɩrbaa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ bɩ ka awɔɔ ʊ, a cicirzɛrɛ nɔ ʊ.
K'a bɩr gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ sɩnsɩm kam nɔ wɔɔ cicir zɛm.

K'a ŋ yɔ sɛ zaa ra, a ŋ bʊmbɔ. Gɔsɩnnɔ n ta ʊ, k'a brɔɔ cicir zɛ, bɩ k'a dundo a zi kʊ ŋ b'awɔɔ da a kʊrɔmarɔ wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y. K'a sɔ ŋ zibəə bʊnyaarɔ wɔɔ m, bala, kʊ mimbʊnyaabənno nɩ ŋ mɩ bɩ, ŋ dintim ka a mɩŋŋɔɔ ma.

Bɩ kʊ Woso k'an deem an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ. A a da ma, an a ka awɔɔ b'a dore y, an a ka sɔ, awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, bɩ, kʊrɔma sɩ ba awɔɔ ma y, heernyɔɔ gʊta nɔ ʊ, a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, kan gʊtabaa kɩ, paŋŋa kɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʊ. Biisi tee…, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʊ. Amina.

Bɩ kʊ Woso k'an deem an nɩ wɔɔ yɔm wɔɔ Zuuba Yeezuu Krista tɔ ma bɩ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ. A a da ma, an a ka awɔɔ b'a dore y, an a ka sɔ, awɔɔ n bɩ jɩm a lɛɛ, bɩ, kʊrɔma sɩ ba awɔɔ ma y, heernyɔɔ gʊta nɔ ʊ, a lɛbɔʊrɛ nɔ ʊ. Bɩ k'a tɔ n lɛbɔʊrɛ yɩ, kan gʊtabaa kɩ, paŋŋa kɩ, a y'a so hɔ haay ʊ. Biisi tee…, dɩɩtaa kan dɔmɩm haay kɩ nɔ ʊ. Amina.
Revelation of John: Yeezuu Krista bɩ, Woso y'a ka ʊ, k'an hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ dɩɩtaa bɩ hɩnka a zibəənyɩnɔ m. A malɛɛka a nyɔɔ k'an b'a hɩ a zibəənyɩ Zaan m.
A n nɩ Woso lemim bɩ hɩrɛ, an Yeezuu Krista kasɛtɩ ka kan hɔ haay k'a a yɩ bɩ kɩ.
Mimbirenyɩntazaa m gʊaa k'a nɩ karɩnda bam, kan gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a tʊr kam wosolɛsinnɩsora meerbaa ma rɔ wɔɔ kɩ, ŋn'ɩ zum hɔ kʊ ŋ y'a gʊrsɩra ba b'ʊ. Bala, wakatɩ b'a zɔ.
Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan m nɩ gʊrsɩra naa do bam kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Azii kʊ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ ma:
K'a barka kan laafɩɩ kɩ yɩ, gʊaa k'an ta ʊ, an nyɩnta ʊ, an nɩ zɛm bɩ zi, kan ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ kʊ ŋ n a duu jɩr ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ zi,
kan Yeezuu Krista, kasɛtɩzaa paan…, k'a lɛɛ ka an a mɩm bɔ ʊ gəəno bire ʊ, a m durnya cinno wɔɔ cir bɩ kɩ zi.
Bɔ nɩ wɔɔ ŋʊam, an wɔɔ mimbʊnyaarɔ sʊrgɔ a ma m,
an a ka, wɔɔ n ʊ ba a cirbəə mannɩbənno a Zɩ Woso zibəə minto. A y'a ga lɛbɔʊrɛ m kan paŋŋa kɩ dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ. Amina!
Ba n nɩ, a ɩ zɛm warkʊ nɔ ʊ, bɩ gʊaa haay y'a yɩm, baa gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ rɔ wɔɔ y'a yɩm sɔ. Tara burə gʊɔɔ heerzarlɛ nyi karɛ a minto. Ɩɩn…, k'an yɩ maam!
Zuuba Woso a hɩ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa. Mɔɔ n ta ʊ, m nyɩnta ʊ, m n nɩ nyɩntaŋ ʊ, hɔ haay Zuuba.

Mɔɔ mɩŋŋa Zaan, awɔɔ danyɩ awɔɔ zukuuzaa, fɩryɩrɛ, cirbəə kan tʊntɔʊrɛ kɩ Yeezuu zuure nɔ ʊ, nyɩnta mɔɔ ʊ, m nɩ tara deem kʊ hi bɩr ma, n n'a hɩm ma Patmɔs ʊ, Woso lemim kan Krista kasɛtɩ karɛ kɩ minto.
*Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra Zuuba dɔmɩm deem hinni ʊ, mɔɔ n leer paŋŋazaa ma m jɛ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, huure n n'a hɛm, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ:
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ n'a yɩm bɩ gʊrsɩra ba ci ʊ, ɩ nyɔɔ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ ma: Efɛɛzɩ ʊ, Simɩrnɩ ʊ, Pɛrgam ʊ, Tɩyatɩɩr ʊ, Sardɩ ʊ, Filadɛlfii ʊ, kan Lawodisee kɩ ʊ.
Mɔɔ n bɔ kʊ m dɩga gʊaa k'a nɩ meer bam kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ ma. Bɩ kʊ mɔɔ m wusigə bɩ, mɔɔ sarma fɩtɩrɛrɔ yɩ saanhɩna.
Fɩtɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ bire ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ gʊaa yɩ, an bɔ kʊ ʊ ɩ ʊ, Gʊaanyɩ m, an huu jintə da a ra, an sarma hɔsoaʊ so a cɩ ʊ.
A mim bɩ kan a minkə bɩ kɩ nyɩnta fu fɩtɩtɩ ɩ ʊ, ser ka m, gɛɛ lajaa m, a mɩnyaarɔ wɔɔ nɩ yɩrɛ ʊ, sɛwurə m.
A gannɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan zaan kʊ n y'a sʊr, an nɩ yɔm bɩ kɩ. A leer nɩ yɩrɛ ʊ hiro gʊtɔɔ susur m,
an nɩ monyaa saanhɩna m a bɩsɩ ʊ. Kargʊ lɛ hɩɩya nɩ bɔrɛ a lɛ ʊ. A meer nɩ yɔrɛ ɩ ʊ, woso nɩ gum kan paŋŋa kɩ.
Kʊ mɔɔ yɩ bɩ, mɔɔ m do a taa ɩ ʊ ga mɔɔ ʊ. A n a bɩsɩ wɔ ka mɔɔ ra, an a hɩ, a ʊ: Ɩ da bɩ bɔ ʊ y, mɔɔ m lɛɛkarɛzaa, mɔɔ m jɛzaa,
mɔɔ n mɩsɩr. Mɔɔ nyɩnta, m ga, bɩ ba n nɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩr dɔmɩm k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ, bɩ mɔɔ ɩ zɛ cɛlɛnyɩnɔ m kan gəənokʊ hɔɔ kɩ.
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ bɩ gʊrsɩra ba, kan hɔ kan ta ʊ kɩ, kan hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr bɩ kɩ.

Ba monyaa saanhɩnarɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ yɩ mɔɔ bɩsɩ wɔ ʊ kan sarma fɩtɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kɩ jɩ n na: Monyaa saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ, kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ malɛɛkarɔ m. Fɩtɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m.
Gʊrsɩra ba Efɛɛzɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
Gʊaa k'an ta monyaa saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m a bɩsɩ ʊ, an nɩ tam sarma fɩtɩrɛ saanhɩnarɔ bire ʊ,

bɩ y'a hɩ, a ʊ: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ kɔrɛ kan ɩ tʊntɔʊrɛ kɩ dɔ, ɩbɩɩ bɩr yɛm gʊɔɔ bʊnyaarɔ ma y. Ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ n'a hɩrɛ a ma kristazibəəzannɔ, bɩ kristazibəəzannɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ ka lɛɛ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩ ŋ dɔ ŋʊaarzannɔ.
Tʊntɔʊrɛ ta ɩbɩɩ ʊ: ɩbɩɩ fɩr yɩ mɔɔ tɔ ma, b'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ bɔ ɩ jɛ nɩ y.
Bɩ mim kʊ mɔɔ n ta m kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ bɩ, ɩbɩɩ wɔ saa ɩ lɛɛkarɛ ŋʊarɛ kan mɔɔ kɩ bɩ ma.
Bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ nyɩnta ʊ, ɩ ɩ bɔ ʊ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ. Ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam k'ɩ biisi zibəəro wɔɔ bɔɔta. Kʊ n bɛɛ nɩ, mɔɔ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi. Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n ɩ bɔ ɩ taam, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ fɩtɩrɛ bɩ sarɛ a bɩncɛ ʊ.
Hɔ niŋŋə k'ɩbɩɩ n ta m bɩ, ɩbɩɩ nyi sɔ Nikola gʊɔɔ wɔɔ zibəəro m, amba mɔɔ hɔ bɩ m.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa gɔ k'a nɩ arzana ʊ nyɩ kaŋ ʊ an a bɩ.
Gʊrsɩra ba Simɩrnɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
A m lɛɛkarɛzaa, a m jɛzaa. A nyɩnta an ga, an a bɔ an bʊr mɩsɩrbaa nɔ ʊ, bɩ n nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ fɩryɩrɛ dɔ kan ɩ ŋʊa kɩ. Bɩ arzakazaa n'ɩbɩɩ m, mɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ zɩɩfʊrɔ n'a mɩ, ŋnɩ bɔkarɛ zɩɩfʊrɔ bɛɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ rɔ wɔɔ tɔzarlɛ zibəə kʊ ŋ nɩ ta m bɩ dɔ, Sʊtaana sokʊmacɛ nɩ ŋ mɩ.
Ɩ bɩ nyi ba hɔ k'a n'a kam k'ɩ fɩr yɩ bɩ ma y. Sʊtaana y'ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ dum lɔnnɔcɛ ʊ, k'a a gɩnga awɔɔ ma, b'awɔɔ fɩr yɩm dɔmɩm bu. Jɩm kɔɔkɔɔ k'an ta an ɩ zɛ ku. Mɔɔ mɩsɩrbaa firgə karɛ ɩ ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Damazaa bɩ bɩ fɩr yɩm zɛ hɩɩya hɔ ma fɩɩga y.
Gʊrsɩra ba Pɛrgam kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
A n nɩ kargʊ lɛ hɩɩyazaa m bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ:

Mɔɔ bɩncɛ k'ɩbɩɩ n ta ʊ bɩ dɔ. Sʊtaana cirbəəduu bɩncɛ m. Ɩbɩɩ gɔɔta ɩ nɩ nyasʊm mɔɔ tɔ m, ɩbɩɩ n sɩra ka mɔɔ ʊ to y, baa dɔmɩm niŋŋə kʊ ŋ mɔɔ kasɛtɩzaa paan… Antipas zɛ ʊ gər awɔɔ zi bɩncɛ kʊ Sʊtaana n ta ʊ b'ʊ.
Bɩ mɔɔ ɩ mim m kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ. Gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ y'awɔɔ bire ʊ, ŋnɩ yɛ Balam
mim ma. A ɩ dʊndɔrɛ bʊnyaa ka Balak ʊ k'an Israyɛl nyɩnɔ nyʊnnyɔɔta kʊ ŋ nɩ *wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩ sim sʊ kan jaandarɛ do haay kɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ zi sɔ bɩ, gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ta ʊ, ŋnɩ yɛ Nikola gʊɔɔ hɔdɩndarɛ ma.
Bɩ minto bɩ, ɩ bɔ ɩ taam, kʊ n bɛɛ mɔɔ zɛrɛ ɩbɩɩ zi dɩɩtaa, m bɩ yar ba kan ŋ kɩ, m lɛ kargʊ bɩ m.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ *mann k'a nyaakʊm da kaŋ ʊ, m jaa fu kʊ n tɔdaa gʊrsɩra ba ma bɩ ka ʊ. Gɔsɩ n tɔ bɩ do dɔ kʊ gʊaa k'a a si bɩ bɛɛ y.
Gʊrsɩra ba Tɩyatɩɩr kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
Woso Nyɩ k'a mɩnyaarɔ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan sɛwurə kɩ, a gannɔ m bɔ kʊ ʊ kan zaantɔzaa kɩ bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro, ɩbɩɩ ŋʊarɛ, ɩ sɩrakarɛ, ɩ zibəə kan ɩ tʊntɔʊrɛ kɩ dɔ. Ɩ zibəəro k'ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba jɛ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ lɛ da biisi hɔɔ wɔɔ ra.

Bɩ, mɔɔ heer bɩ nyɩnta kan ɩbɩɩ kɩ y. Ɩbɩɩ k'ɩ yɛ Zezabɛl ma. Lʊ naa do n'a hɩrɛ a ma wosolɛsinnɩsorazaa, an nɩ mɔɔ zibəənyɩnɔ nyʊnnyɔɔm, an nɩ hɔ dɩndarɛ ŋ nɩ kʊ ŋ nɩ jaan da, kʊ ŋ nɩ wosobaawɔnnɔ mannɩ sim sʊ.
Mɔɔ toore ka ʊ k'an a bɔ a taam, b'a lɛ baa k'a a bɔ taam a jaandarɛ nɔ ʊ y.
Dɩga! Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an wʊta yaaba m, an fɩr yɩ, a muno jaandənno wɔɔ maam sɔ, kʊ ŋ n a bɔ a taam a zibəəro wɔɔ nɔ ʊ y.
Mɔɔ y'a nyɩnɔ wɔɔ zɩnzɛm. Bɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ haay y'a dɔrɛ ŋ ʊ: mɔɔ m gʊaa k'a gʊaa haay lɛtaama dɔ kan a heer kɩ. Bɩ mɔɔ y'awɔɔ gʊaa biyəə hɔ kaŋ ʊ, an a ga kʊ ʊ kan a zaa zibəə kɩ.

B'awɔɔ gʊɔɔ k'a nɩ Tɩyatɩɩr ʊ, a gɔɔta a n yɛ hɔdɩndarɛ naa do ma bɩ, awɔɔ n yɛ hɔ kʊ n'a hɩm ma Sʊtaana minno kʊ ŋ y'a nyaakʊm da rɔ wɔɔ ma y, awɔɔ n a ka ma k'a ŋ dɔ y. Maam bɩ mɔɔ bɩ m yarɛ m mɔr gorezaa ka awɔɔ m la y.
Bɩ, k'a nyasʊ hɔ k'awɔɔ n ta m bɩ m bala kɔɔkɔɔ, k'an ta an mɔɔ zɛrɛ dɔmɩm ku.

Damazaa bɩ, gʊaa k'a nyasʊ mɔɔ zibəə bɩ m an ta an a nyarɛ ku, mɔɔ paŋŋa kʊ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ kaŋ ʊ: Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an a so do gʊta ʊ, a y'a sore ŋ ʊ kʊsɩ-kʊsɩ, a yɩ ŋ zɔrɛ amba nɩ gedro zɔm bɩ m. Mɔɔ dɔmɩrɛ monyaa kaŋ ʊ.

Damazaa bɩ, gʊaa k'a nyasʊ mɔɔ zibəə bɩ m an ta an a nyarɛ ku, mɔɔ paŋŋa kʊ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ kaŋ ʊ: Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an a so do gʊta ʊ, a y'a sore ŋ ʊ kʊsɩ-kʊsɩ, a yɩ ŋ zɔrɛ amba nɩ gedro zɔm bɩ m. Mɔɔ dɔmɩrɛ monyaa kaŋ ʊ.

Damazaa bɩ, gʊaa k'a nyasʊ mɔɔ zibəə bɩ m an ta an a nyarɛ ku, mɔɔ paŋŋa kʊ mɔɔ mɩŋŋa a yɩ m Zɩ zi bɩ kaŋ ʊ: Mɔɔ y'a karɛ an a so do gʊta ʊ, a y'a sore ŋ ʊ kʊsɩ-kʊsɩ, a yɩ ŋ zɔrɛ amba nɩ gedro zɔm bɩ m. Mɔɔ dɔmɩrɛ monyaa kaŋ ʊ.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Gʊrsɩra ba Sardɩ kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
Gʊaa k'a nɩ Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ m kan monyaa saanhɩnarɔ kɩ bɩ nɩ meer naa do barɛ: Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ, ŋ y'a lɛ bɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ʊ ŋ ʊ, ɩ mɩsɩr, bala gər n'ɩ mɩ.
Ɩ tɔ ʊ, ɩ b'a ka an gɔɔta an n'a ŋʊam k'a ga bɩ n a nyambʊr y, a mɩm bɔ ʊ. Bala, mɔɔ yɩ, ɩbɩɩ zibəə bɩ mɩŋŋabaa bɩ gʊta mɔɔ Woso mɩm ʊ y.
Hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ yɩ, ɩ ma sɔ bɩ tɔ da ɩ nɔ ʊ. Nyasʊ m k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam. K'ɩbɩɩ n dundo ɩ zi, mɔɔ zɛrɛ am koor hɔ bɩ m. B'ɩbɩɩ bɩ wakatɩ kʊ mɔɔ n nɩ zɛm bɩ daata zɛ ɩbɩɩ ra bɩ dɔrɛ y.
Bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ gʊɔɔ gɔsɩnnɔ ɩ Sardɩ ʊ, ŋ n dintim ka a huuro ma y. Ŋ zum kʊ ʊ kan mɔɔ kɩ, huu furo n a ma, bala, ŋ y'a ga m.
Damazaa bɩ, huu fu dure a ma ncɩnaaʊ, mɔɔ b'a tɔ bɔm mɩsɩrbaa ci b'ʊ y. Mɔɔ y'a kasɛtɩ kam m Zɩ kan a malɛɛkarɔ kɩ taa, mɔɔ ʊ, mɔɔ gʊaa m.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Gʊrsɩra ba Filadɛlfii kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
Gʊaa mɩŋŋa, sɩrazaa bɩ, k'a nɩ Davɩd cɛlɛnyɩ m, an a gʊm bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma a n a ta y, an n'a tam bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a gʊ y bɩ nɩ meer barɛ, a ʊ:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ: Ba n nɩ, mɔɔ cɛlɛ gʊ, ɩ lɛɛ, bɩ gɔsɩ b'a dam ma an a ta y. Ɩbɩɩ paŋŋa bɩ bɩ gʊta y, bɩ kan bɩ kɩ, ɩbɩɩ gɔɔta ɩ zu mɔɔ lemim ʊ, ɩbɩɩ n bɩsɩ ka mɔɔ tɔ ma y.
Sʊtaana sokʊmacɛ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ ʊ, zɩɩfʊrɔ n'a mɩ rɔ wɔɔ, ŋʊaar ŋn'a barɛ, zɩɩfʊrɔ bɛɛ n ŋ mɩ y. Mɔɔ y'a karɛ, ŋnɩ bʊr, ŋnɩ bɩ kukurə zɛ ɩbɩɩ taa, bɩ ŋn'a dɔm ma ŋ ʊ, mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ ŋʊa.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ zum mɔɔ lemim ʊ kan tʊntɔʊrɛ kɩ, mɔɔ dɔrɛ ɩbɩɩ ma sɔ fɩryɩrɛ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ bʊr durnya jilli nɔ ʊ k'a bɩ durnyazannɔ makra ba bɩ dɔmɩm ʊ.
Mɔɔ zɛm zɔɔ, nyasʊ hɔ k'ɩbɩɩ ta m bɩ m kɔɔkɔɔ, kʊ gɔsɩ b'ɩbɩɩ firgə bɩ yɔ ɩ nɩ y.

Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a bam mɔɔ Zɩ Wosocɛ bɩ sagɔ, a bɩ bɔm dɔ fɩɩga y. Bɩ mɔɔ yɩ m Woso tɔ gʊrsɩra bam ma, kan mɔɔ Woso kʊ tɔ kɩ, Zerizalɛm daa k'a a to brama mɔɔ Woso zi an nɩ zerm bɩ kɩ, kan mɔɔ tɔ daa bɩ kɩ.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Gʊrsɩra ba Lawodisee kristagʊɔɔ sokʊma malɛɛka bɩ ma ncɩnaaʊ:
Ba hɔ kʊ Amina, kasɛtɩzaa paan…, sɩrazaa, an a zɛ kʊ ra kan Woso kɩ hɔ haay darɛ sɩŋŋɩda ʊ bɩ n'a hɩm na:
Mɔɔ ɩbɩɩ zibəəro dɔ. Ɩbɩɩ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ kaarɛ y. A ŋʊa mɔɔ ʊ k'ɩbɩɩ n bɩr nyɔɔrɛ gɛɛ kaarɛ.
Bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n zaarɔɔ, ɩbɩɩ bɩ nyɔɔrɛ, b'ɩbɩɩ bɩ kaarɛ bɩ, mɔɔ y'ɩbɩɩ bɔrɛ m lɛ.
Bala, ɩbɩɩ y'a hɩrɛ, ɩ ʊ: Hɔnyɩzaa n'ɩ mɩ, mɔɔ m ba hɔnyɩzaa, mɔɔ bɩr m kam hɔsɩ ma dɔ y, bɩ k'ɩbɩɩ n a dɔ ɩ ʊ, ɩ ɩ fɩr nɔ ʊ, cicir nɔ ʊ, ɩ m ŋʊazaa, ɩ m bʊʊ, ɩ m dɩgɩ bɩ.
Ɩbɩɩ dʊndɔ mɔɔ nawʊm k'ɩ sarma kʊ ŋ y'a sʊr bɩ si mɔɔ zi k'ɩ ba hɔnyɩzaa, k'ɩ huuro furo si, k'ɩ du ɩ ma, k'ɩ nyannɩ nyaakʊm da m. Ɩ hɔ si ɩ tɔ ɩ mɩm la k'ɩ ɩ da ma ɩ lɛɛ yɩ.
Gʊɔɔ haay kʊ mɔɔ ŋʊa rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ nɩ ŋ bɔm zaa ʊ, m nɩ ŋ hʊnhʊrm. Ncɩnaaʊ bɩ, ɩ tɔ ʊ, k'ɩ ɩ bɔ ɩ taam!
Ba mɔɔ jɩm cɛlɛ ma, m n'a zɛm na. Kʊ gʊaa mɔɔ leer ma, an cɛ bɩ lɛ gʊ, mɔɔ gasʊm zi. M hɔ bɩ kan kɩ, an a bɩ kan mɔɔ kɩ.
Damazaa bɩ, mɔɔ y'a karɛ, an nyɩnta kan mɔɔ kɩ, m cirbəəduu ra, amba mɔɔ m da ma sɔ, m ta m aa nyɩnta kan m Zɩ kɩ a cirbəəduu ra bɩ m.
Gʊaa k'a lɛ n taa, k'an hɔ kʊ Sɛnt-Ɛspri n'a hɩm kristagʊɔɔ sokʊmarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ ma.
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ m ya m a yɩ cɛlɛ n a gʊ brama, bɩ leer kʊ mɔɔ lɛɛ ka m a ma, an meer ba kan mɔɔ kɩ an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan huure leer kɩ b'a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ:
Der naa ʊ, kʊ m hɔ k'a nɩ zɛm bɩ nyɩnta ʊ bɩ hɩnka ɩ m.
Lɛɛm bɩ, Sɛnt-Ɛspri zer mɔɔ ra. Bɩ, mɔɔ duu yɩ brama b'ʊ, gʊaa nɩ nyɩntam la.
Gʊaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam la bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan jaa kʊ n n'a birm zaspɩ, n n'a birm sardʊannɩ bɩ kɩ. Bramahɔwosɩʊrɛ k'a bɔ kʊ ʊ kan jaa kʊ n n'a birm emerodɩ bɩ n bɩr duu bɩ ma.
Duuro buhɩra a yaa si ɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma, bɩ duuro wɔɔ duro burə ʊ, gʊɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si ɩ nyɩnta ŋ la, ŋnɩ huuro furo du a ma, sarma firgəro nɩ ŋ mim ma.
Brama nyakɩ nɩ bɔm duu bɩ nɔ ʊ kan leerlo kɩ, kan bramahəənsire kɩ. Fɩtɩrɛ saanhɩnarɔ nɩ cirbəəduu bɩ jɩr ʊ, ŋn'ɩ yɔm kan paŋŋa kɩ, brɔɔ m Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ.
Duu bɩ lɛɛ bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ, ɩ ʊ, higʊta hi k'a nɩ yɔm pɛkʊ-pɛkʊ am kristal hɔ bɩ m bɩ m.
Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ si ɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma. Ŋ nɩ mɩnyaarɔ m a mɛ ma jilli lɛɛ kan jɛ kɩ.
Lɛɛkarɛ hɔmɩsɩr bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan poozaa kɩ. A hɩɩya hɔ bɩ, bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan ŋʊaapoo kɩ. A kaakʊ hɔ bɩ meer ɩ bɔ kʊ ʊ kan gʊaa hɔ kɩ. A si hɔ bɩ bɔ a kʊ ʊ kan caa gʊta k'a wer bɩ kɩ.
Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ za sɔrdɩ-sɔrdɩ, mɩnyaarɔ n bɩr ŋ ma jilli, kan ŋ nɔ ʊ kɩ. Sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ, a hɩ nawʊm ncɩnaaʊ bɩ ŋ bɩr a tore y, ŋ ʊ:
«Mɩŋŋa, Mɩŋŋa, Mɩŋŋa, Zuuba, Woso paŋŋa k'a jirə ba ʊ, a ɩ nyɩnta ʊ, an ta ʊ, an nɩ zɛm bɩ.»
Bɩ kʊ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ bʊr ŋn'ɩ laa lɔm ŋn'a lɛ bɔm bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ ra an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ b'ʊ, ŋn'a daŋ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ yaa dam nɩ barka,
*gʊɔɔgusinno buhɩra a yaa si rɔ wɔɔ ɩ kukurə zɛrɛ bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu burə ʊ an mɩsɩr dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ bɩ taa, ŋn'a daŋ ʊ, ŋn'a firgəro wɔɔ zom duu bɩ lɛɛ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«Zuuba wɔɔ Woso, ɩbɩɩ ɩ ga lɛbɔʊrɛ, daʊrɛ kan paŋŋa kɩ m. Bala, ɩbɩɩ ɩ hɔ haay da: ɩbɩɩ yɩ ŋ ŋʊa, kʊ ŋ nɩ bɩr ta ʊ, bɩ y'a ka, ɩ ŋ da.»
Mɔɔ ci yɩ gʊaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ ra bɩ bɩsɩ wɔ ʊ, n n a gʊrsɩra ba a nɔ ʊ kan a burə kɩ, n n a kʊsɩ kʊsɩrɛ saanhɩna m.
Mɔɔ malɛɛka paŋŋazaa yɩ, an n'a hɩm kan paŋŋa kɩ, a ʊ:
Nka y'a ga m, an ci bɩ gʊ, an a kʊsɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ cincer?
Bɩ gʊaa ba ʊ an nɩ brama gɛɛ, tara burə ʊ gɛɛ, tara noom ʊ, an n'a dam ma, an ci bɩ gʊ, gɛɛ an dɩga a y.
Bɩ, mɔɔ heer a zar kʊ n n gʊaa yɩ an a ga m an ci bɩ gʊ, gɛɛ, an dɩga a bɩ tɔ ma.
Gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ gʊaa deem n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ:
Ɩ b'ɩ heer zar y. Ba n nɩ, Ziida do poozaa k'an Davɩd yaŋŋa bɩ, k'a yɩ damazaa bɩ, an nɩ ci bɩ gʊm kan a kʊsɩrɛrɔ saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ kɩ.

Kɛɛrɛ bɩ, mɔɔ sinnyɛɛm yɩ an jɩm, ɩ ʊ, a zɛ n y'a ʊ, duu bɩ bire ʊ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ wɔɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ m bɩr ma. A mɩnnɔ saanhɩna kan a mɩnyaarɔ kɩ saanhɩna, ŋ mɩŋŋɔɔ n Woso ɛspri saanhɩnarɔ k'a ŋ nyɔɔ tara burə ʊ rɔ wɔɔ.
A a zɔ k'a ci bɩ si bɔ nɩ nyɩntam duu bɩ burə ʊ bɩ bɩsɩ wɔ ʊ.
K'a ci bɩ si bɩ, hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ si rɔ wɔɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno buhɩra yaa si rɔ wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ sinnyɛɛm bɩ taa. Gʊaa biyəə nɩ kɔnnɩ m kan sarma laagarɔ kɩ, tidəər nyisi nɩ ŋ hɩnhan. Wosogʊɔɔ yaadarɛ m.
Ŋ nɩ laa daa lɔrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«Ɩbɩɩ y'ɩ ga m ɩ ci bɩ si,
ɩ kʊsɩrɛrɔ wɔɔ cincer,
bala, n y'ɩbɩɩ zɛ ɩbɩɩ n gʊɔɔ bʊmbɔ do haay nɔ ʊ,
lemim biyəə nɔ ʊ,
kʊrɔ y'a hʊnhɔ kɩ nɔ ʊ,
tara y'a hʊnhɔ ɩ ma bɩ m,
ɩ ŋ ka Woso ʊ.
Ɩbɩɩ ŋ ba cinno,
mannɩbənno wɔɔ Woso minto,
bɩ ŋ cirbəə bɩm tara burə ʊ.»
Mɔɔ dɩga, m malɛɛkarɔ cir leer ma, ŋ lɛ tisi-tisi kan tisi-tisi k'a lɛ ba ʊ y, ŋnɩ bɩr duu bɩ ma kan hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ kɩ, gʊɔɔgusinno kɩ.
Ŋ n a leer busu kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«Sinnyɛɛm kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ b'a ga m an paŋŋa yɩ kan arzaka kɩ, mindɔrɛ kɩ, kan dama kɩ, daʊrɛ kɩ, cirbəə kɩ, lɛbɔʊrɛ kɩ.»
Hɔɔdarɛ haay k'a nɩ brama, an nɩ tara burə ʊ, tara noom ʊ kan hi burə kɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ haay kʊ ŋ nɩ ta ŋ ʊ rɔ wɔɔ, mɔɔ ma ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ:
«Bɔ nɩ duu burə ʊ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ m lɛbɔʊrɛ, daʊrɛ, cirbəə kan paŋŋa kɩ yɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ.»
Hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Amina!» Gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ n kukurə zɛ, ŋn'a daŋ ʊ.
Kʊ sinnyɛɛm bɩ lɛɛkarɛ kʊsɩrɛ bɩ hʊr saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ bar la bɩ, mɔɔ yɩ, m a ma hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ lɛɛkarɛzaa bɩ həən si bramahəənsire m, a ʊ: «Bʊr!»
Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi fu yɩ. Gʊaa k'a da ʊ bɩ n sa nyasʊ a wɔ ʊ. N n cirbəə firgə ka ʊ, an ta k'a yaa yar ba, a ɩ dama m, b'a dama yɩm.
K'a kʊsɩrɛ hɩɩya hɔ bɩ hʊr bɩ, mɔɔ ma hɔmɩsɩr hɩɩya hɔ bɩ n həən si, a ʊ: «Bʊr!»
Sisi vanta n a hɩnka piin…: N lɛ ka gʊaa k'a da ʊ b'ʊ k'an laafɩɩ bɔ durnya ʊ kʊ gʊɔɔ n bɩr kʊ zɩnzɛm, n kargʊ jintə ka ʊ sɔ.
K'a kʊsɩrɛ kaakʊ hɔ bɩ hʊr bɩ, mɔɔ ma, hɔmɩsɩr kaakʊ hɔ bɩ həən si, a ʊ: «Bʊr!» Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi kundə yɩ. Gʊaa k'a da ʊ bɩ nɩ hɔ kʊ n nɩ mɔr gore makra bam nɩ bɩ n'a wɔ ʊ.

Bɩ, mɔɔ hɔ niŋŋə ma an bɔ kʊ ʊ kan leer kɩ hɔɔmɩsɩɩrɔ siro wɔɔ bire ʊ, an n'a hɩrɛ, a ʊ: «Yɩryaa makra ba deem, hindeem zibəə busoo ma, naanyaa makra kaakʊ, hindeem zibəə busoo ma. K'a gɔɔta nyɔɔ bɩ ma kan dɩvɛn bɩ kɩ, ɩ b'ɩ wɔ da ma y.»
K'a kʊsɩrɛ si hɔ bɩ hʊr bɩ, mɔɔ ma hɔmɩsɩr si hɔ bɩ m həən si, a ʊ: «Bʊr!»

Bɩ, mɔɔ sisi vɔnnɩmɛzaa yɩ. Gʊaa k'a da ʊ bɩ bir n nawʊm «zɛ» gəənokʊ n zu a jɛ ʊ. Ŋ paŋŋa ka ŋ ʊ kʊ ŋ n'a so tara burə zɛkumbir si kər bɩ deem ʊ, kʊ ŋ nɩ gʊɔɔ zɩnzɛ kargʊ m, nɔ m, yaaba bʊnyaa m kan poohɔɔ kɩ m.
K'a kʊsɩrɛ soor hɔ bɩ hʊr bɩ, mɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ yɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ Woso lemim kan kasɛtɩ kʊ ŋ y'a ka bɩ minto rɔ wɔɔ nyiro yɩ, mannɩduu bɩ lɛtaa.
Ŋ n'ɩ zee dam kan paŋŋa kɩ, ŋ ʊ: «Zuuba mɩŋŋa, sɩrazaa, ɩbɩɩ maasɩrɛ barɛ an ta an dɔmɩm kara ku k'ɩ bɔkarɛ ɩ dʊdɔ ka, ɩ wɔɔ ma bɩ zɩm bɔ durnyazannɔ ma?»
N n huu fu ka ŋ gʊaa biyəə ʊ, n n a hɩ ŋ nɩ, kʊ ŋ n'a ya, ŋnɩ bʊr a ma poore, k'an ta, an ŋ zibəəkɔɔnrɔ kan ŋ danyɩnɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ zɛm bɩ ŋ zɩnzɛ am ŋ hɔ bɩ m nɔ wɔɔ lɛzerle dɔmɩm ku.
Bɩ, k'a kʊsɩrɛ sɔrdɩ hɔ bɩ hʊr bɩ, mɔɔ taranyiŋŋəre gʊta yɩ. Woso n a ba kundə ɩ ʊ pɛɛra kʊ n y'a ba hɔmɩsɩr ka kundə m, mom bɩ jilli n a ba ɩ ʊ ma m.
Monyaarɔ n sur tara ʊ, ɩ ʊ, hɩnhɛr gandaara ɩ sɔɔn jɩngɩr sur.
Brama n a gʊr ɩ ʊ, wʊtaa n y'a gʊr. Ciro haay kan tararɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ hi bire ʊ rɔ wɔɔ kɩ n'a gaa a bɩncɛrɔ ʊ.
Tara burə cinno, gʊɔɔ gʊtɔɔ, yarbənno cinno, arzakazannɔ kan paŋŋazannɔ kɩ, lɔnnɔ kan soamɩŋŋaʊzannɔ kɩ, ŋ haay, a nyaakʊm dɩnda ciyaarɔ kan cigəəziro kɩ ʊ.
Ŋ n a hɩ ciro kan jaarɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, ŋ ʊ: «K'a dɩnda wɔɔ ra, k'a wɔɔ nyaakʊm da laatʊ gʊaa k'a nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu burə ʊ bɩ meer ma, kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ nɔmaa kɩ.
Bala, ŋ nɔmaa dɔmɩm gʊta ɩ bʊr, nka n n'a dam ma an bɔlɛ nɩ?»
Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛkarɔ yɩ si, ŋnɩ jɩm tara gʊrga si bɩ nɔ ʊ. Ŋ nɩ tara burə hɩnhɛr si bɩ nyasʊ, kʊ hɩnhɛr sɩ b'a da ma an hɔn tara burə ʊ, higʊta burə ʊ, gɛɛ gɔ deem taan… burə ʊ y.

Mɔɔ malɛɛka vanta yɩ, an a to dɔgʊr ʊ, an Woso mɩsɩr bɩ hɔ makra sa a wɔ ʊ. A n a leer busu gʊta an a hɩ malɛɛkarɔ siro kʊ ŋ nɩ paŋŋa m, ŋn'a dam ma, ŋn'a bʊnyaa ba tara kan higʊta kɩ m nɔ wɔɔ m, a ʊ:
«A bɩ hɔsɩ ba tara m kan higʊta kɩ, gɔrɔ wɔɔ kɩ m, kʊ wɔɔ n makra da wɔɔ Woso zibəənyɩnɔ wɔɔ tusə ʊ y.»
Bɩ, mɔɔ gʊɔɔ kʊ ŋ Woso makra bɩ yɩ a tusə ma rɔ wɔɔ lɛ ma: Ŋ tisi-tisi zɔrɔ busi yaa si, ŋnɩ makra bɩ yɩ, Israyɛl nyɩnɔ paryaa bueerehɩɩya bɩ nɔ ʊ.
Ziida paryaa ma, gʊaa tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya, ŋ makra bɩ nɔ ŋ tusə ma. Rubɛn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Gaad paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
Asɛɛr paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Nɛftalii paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Manase paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
Sɩmɩnyɔn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Levii paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Isakaar paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya;
Zabɩlɔn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Zozɛf paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya; Bɛnzamɛn paryaa ma, ŋ tisi-tisi bueerehɩɩya, ŋnɩ makra bɩ m a tusə ma.

Bɩ jɛ ʊ bɩ, mɔɔ gʊɔɔ cir gʊta yɩ, gʊaa b'a dam ma, an ŋ lɛ sa y. Tara y'a hʊnhɔ, do y'a hʊnhɔ, kʊrɔ y'a hʊnhɔ, lemim y'a hʊnhɔ gʊɔɔ m. Ŋ n jɩm brama cirbəəduu bɩ kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ taa, ŋnɩ zaba huuro du a ma, ŋn'ɩ bɛ lɛɛrɔ m a wɔ ʊ.
Ŋ n a leer busu brama, ŋn'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Bʊmbɔrɛ bɩ, a to a ʊ wɔɔ Woso k'a nɩ nyɩntam cirbəəduu ra kan sinnyɛɛm bɩ kɩ zi!»
Malɛɛkarɔ haay kʊ ŋ y'a zɛ kʊ ra ŋnɩ bɩr cirbəəduu bɩ ma rɔ wɔɔ kan gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ kɩ, hɔmɩsɩr siro wɔɔ kɩ kukurə zɛ ŋn'a meer ku tara ma duu bɩ lɛ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ Woso daŋ ʊ.
Ŋ n'a hɩrɛ, ŋ ʊ: «Amina! Wɔɔ Woso n daʊrɛ yɩ kan lɛbɔʊrɛ kɩ, mindɔrɛ, barka yaa, cirbəə kan paŋŋa kɩ yɩ dɔɔraa k'a nyarɛ ba ʊ nɔ ʊ. Amina!»
Gʊɔɔgusinno wɔɔ gʊaa deem meerbaa sa, an a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: Gʊɔɔ nɔɔn duro kʊ ŋ zaba furo du a ma rɔ wɔɔ, nkɔɔ nɩ? A to ŋ y'a ʊ ka?
Mɔɔ n a nyɩ bɔ nʊ, mɔɔ ʊ: Mɔɔ Zuuba, ɩbɩɩ y'a dɔ! A n a hɩ mɔɔ m, a ʊ: Bɔ ŋ y'a ʊ fɩr gʊta bɩ nɔ ʊ. A huuro wɔɔ sʊrgɔ ŋ y'a ʊ, sinnyɛɛm ma bɩ nɔ ʊ, ŋ fu n bɔ.
Bɩ minto y'a ka, ŋn'ɩ jɩnɩm Woso cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʊ, ŋn'ɩ daʊrɛ zi bam sinuu ʊ kan a gunuu ʊ kɩ a cɛ ʊ b'ʊ. Bɩ, bɔ nɩ nyɩntam a cirbəəduu bɩ ra bɩ dɔrɛ ŋ ma.
Nɔ bɩ ŋ zɛm dɔ, mɩsɩ bɩ ŋ nyasʊm dɔ y, wosogure kan sɩnsɛɛm kɩ bɩ narɛ ŋ ma dɔ y.
Bala, sinnyɛɛm k'a nɩ jɩnɩm cirbəəduu bɩ burə ʊ bɩ n nɩ yɩrɛ ŋ dundor. A karɛ ŋ lɛɛ, an ta ŋ nɩ mɩsɩrbaa himinyaarɔ bɩncɛ ʊ. Bɩ Woso yɩ ŋ nyifeer do haay gʊngʊm ma.
Kʊ sinnyɛɛm bɩ kʊsɩrɛ saanhɩna hɔ bɩ hʊr bɩ, lɛɛ zɛ sɩɩ… brama ʊ, an ta, an miniti bukərku ku.
Bɩ, mɔɔ malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ Woso taa rɔ wɔɔ yɩ. Ŋ n huurero gʊtɔɔ ka ŋ ʊ saanhɩna.

Malɛɛka vanta n bʊr an bɩ jɩm mannɩjaa bɩ lɛ ʊ. A n tidəər nyisi laaga kʊ n y'a ba sarma m bɩ sa a wɔ ʊ, n n tidəərlo ka ʊ gʊta k'an a zɛ kʊ ra kan wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ haay yaadarɛrɔ kɩ k'a nɩ ŋ ka Woso ʊ sarma mannɩjaa k'a nɩ cirbəəduu bɩ lɛ ʊ bɩ burə ʊ.
Tidəər siŋŋə bɩ n a to malɛɛka bɩ wɔ ʊ kan wosogʊɔɔ wɔɔ yaa darɛ kɩ, an der an ta Woso taa.
Malɛɛka bɩ n tidəər nyisi mɔr bɩ sa, an mannɩduu bɩ sɛ sa an a da ʊ, an a han, an a zo tara burə ʊ. Bramahəənsirero, leerlo kɩ, brama nyakɩ kan taranyiŋŋəre kɩ nyɩnta ʊ.
Malɛɛka saanhɩnarɔ kʊ ŋ nɩ huurero saanhɩnarɔ wɔɔ m bɩ, ŋ y'a banka ka ŋ hɛ.
